title: Was sind Spaces?
content:
Setze dir Ziele, erstelle, personalisiere und √ºberweise Geld zwischen den verschiedenen Spaces in Echtzeit. Spaces ist in deiner App und¬†WebApp(neuen Tab)¬†verf√ºgbar.
Neben deinem Hauptkonto (oder prim√§ren Space) kannst du noch weitere Spaces erstellen und l√∂schen. Die Anzahl der parallel aktiven Spaces h√§ngt von deinem Kontotyp ab: Bei einem N26 Konto und N26 Business Konto kannst du¬†2 weitere Spaces¬†neben deinem prim√§ren Space nutzen, bei unseren Premium-Konten N26 You, N26 Business You und N26 Metal sind es¬†10 zus√§tzliche Spaces.
Die Kontoausz√ºge deines Hauptkontos enthalten alle Transaktionen, die an die verschiedenen Spaces √ºberwiesen oder empfangen wurden. Die Kontoausz√ºge kannst du online herunterladen.
Nur dein prim√§rer Space kann sich im Minus befinden (wenn du einen¬†Dispokredit¬†hast). In allen anderen Spaces kann dein Kontostand nicht negativ sein. Du kannst also zwischen den verschiedenen Spaces nur Betr√§ge √ºberweisen, die dort jeweils auch verf√ºgbar sind.
Du kannst nur das Guthaben von deinem prim√§ren Space f√ºr Mastercard Zahlungen verwenden. Beachte also, dass du eventuell erst Geld √ºberweisen musst, bevor du einen Kauf t√§tigen kannst.
Verschiebe Geld von einem zum anderen Space, indem du dein Hauptkonto gedr√ºckt h√§ltst und es per Drag and Drop in den anderen Space ziehst.
Du kannst einen Space jederzeit sperren und wieder entsperren, direkt aus deiner App oder dem Online Banking. Dazu musst du nur deine Best√§tigungs-PIN eingeben. Wenn ein Space gesperrt ist, kannst du noch immer Geld darauf √ºberweisen. Wenn du aber Geld von einem gesperrten Space entnehmen m√∂chtest, musst du ihn zuerst entsperren.
Du kannst den Betrag in einem Space verstecken, sodass er nicht in dein Gesamt-Saldo eingerechnet wird. Gehe daf√ºr zum gew√ºnschten Space, tippe auf die drei Punkte und dann auf "Space-Saldo verstecken".
Spaces enth√§lt eine Funktion, die ‚ÄúRegeln‚Äù hei√üt. Diese Funktion hilft dir dabei, dein Geld und deine Zeit effektiver zu verwalten.

Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erhalte 15 ‚Ç¨ f√ºr jeden Freund, dem du N26 erfolgreich empfiehlst. Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: How to download my personal data?
content:
The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a European regulation on data protection and privacy that went into effect on May 25th, 2018. We‚Äôve added a data export option to the WebApp(new tab) as a response to Art. 20 GDPR. And, as with everything we do, getting your personal data you provided to us is transparent and simple, and you‚Äôre in complete control: go to üë§ My Account then Personal settings and Your personal data.
The right to data portability under Art. 20 GDPR covers personal data you provided to us. Art. 20 GDPR shall enable you to easily switch the service provider in case you want to use these data to open a bank account at another bank. This is why Art. 20 GDPR requires to provide these data in a machine-readable format to you. ¬†It's important to keep in mind that the file is to be used for data portability purposes only and your computer might not be able to read a JSON file. Also, if you can open the JSON file the data might be difficult to understand as it is not intended to be human-readable, but machine-readable. The file we provide has the only purpose of being transmitted to another bank.¬†
As a mobile bank, we know the importance of data security. For this reason we take additional security measures before you can download your data, which are described below. We do so in order to make sure that you, the account holder, is in fact the person who downloads the data.¬†¬†
You can request to download the personal data you provided for a current or previous account with us up to 6 months after account closure date. It will come in a machine-readable format so you can share it with a third party if you choose to.
Please request your data through our web form(new tab).
You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.
You can download personal data you provided up to 6 months after account closure date. To request this information, complete a data request form(new tab) and make sure that the information you provide correctly matches all your previous account information. You‚Äôll need to know:
the first and last name, personal ID number, and expiration date of the identification document (national ID card or passport) you used to verify the account,
the registered email address of the account,
the date (month and year) you created and closed your account (check your verification email).
For security reasons, we have to make sure it‚Äôs really you downloading the data: if any field is inaccurate or missing, your request will not be successful.
You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.
If you want more information about the collection, use, and processing of your personal data, please visit our updated Privacy Policy (DEU(new tab)) (EU(new tab)).

title: Wie lange dauert eine √úberweisung mit TransferWise?
content:
Wenn du eine √úberweisung mit TransferWise machst, wird dir ein gesch√§tztes Eingangsdatum angezeigt.
Falls eine TransferWise-√úberweisung fehlschl√§gt, benachrichtigen wir dich mit einer Push-Mitteilung. Der Betrag wird einige Tage sp√§ter automatisch auf dein Konto zur√ºckgebucht.
Weder wir noch TransferWise berechnen zus√§tzliche Geb√ºhren f√ºr eine R√ºckzahlung. Einige teilnehmende Banken erheben jedoch Geb√ºhren; in diesem Fall zieht TransferWise gem√§√ü seinen¬†Nutzungsbedingungen(neuen Tab)¬†diese Betr√§ge von dem zur√ºckgezahlten Geld ab.
H√§ufige Gr√ºnde f√ºr eine fehlgeschlagene √úberweisung:
Fehler in den √úberweisungsangaben (z. B. bei der Eingabe des Empf√§ngernamens oder der Kontoinformationen).
Sonderzeichen oder zu viele Zeichen im Namen des Empf√§ngers oder im Feld f√ºr den Zahlungszweck.
Limits wurden erreicht oder Online-Zahlungen sind in den Karteneinstellungen nicht aktiv.
√úberweisungen in Fremdw√§hrungen sind mit dem N26 Business oder N26 Business You Konto nicht m√∂glich; zudem darf das Empf√§ngerkonto kein Gesch√§ftskonto sein.

title: How to manage my visibility as an N26 user?
content:
To grant you access to all our in-app features, N26 matches your contact data with other N26 users.
In order to manage your consent to be seen as a N26 user, you can simply go to üë§ My Account in the app and selecting Settings then Personal Settings and Personal information. Then just check or uncheck the box ‚ÄúI agree to be identifiable for other users as N26 customer‚Äù.
All of your contacts who have an N26 account set to visible will show up in the in-app contact list. Similarly, you‚Äôll also appear in the list of other N26 customers who have your contact information. Your contact list is not permanently stored by N26 and is only used when accessing the respective N26 feature.
You can access to all our in-app features,¬†e.g.¬†MoneyBeam, which carries out real-time transactions without¬†typing in a 22-digit IBAN, but only by selecting a name from your contact list. Vice versa, you can also request money from people in your contact list who then only have to accept (or decline) your request. Also, being visible¬†enables you to use Shared Spaces, a sub-account, which you can share with other N26 users¬†selected from your contact list.

title: How often can I withdraw cash for free?
content:
Cash withdrawals using your Mastercard depend on your T&C country (the address you originally shipped your first card to):
Germany: 3 to 5* free ATM withdrawals per month in Germany and unlimited free withdrawals in the eurozone or by using¬†CASH26
Austria and Italy: unlimited free withdrawals (including¬†CASH26)
France, Spain, the Netherlands, and the Rest of Europe: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in your country of residence and the eurozone
Switzerland: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in the eurozone and a 1.7% markup on local withdrawals
UK: unlimited free withdrawals
There‚Äôs always a ‚Ç¨2 fee if you use your¬†Maestro¬†card to withdraw cash (only available in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands).
Check our¬†pricing lists¬†if you‚Äôve been¬†charged an ATM fee.
*Germany only: You receive 5 free withdrawals during the first three months. After that you'll receive 3 free withdrawals but you can keep receiving 5 if:
You are younger than 26 years old.
You receive your salary, pension, student allowance, or government benefits for at least two consecutive months (your additional free withdrawals start the following month).
You receive payments of at least ‚Ç¨1.000 per month for at least two months (your additional free withdrawals start the following month).

title: O√π est mon remboursement par carte ?
content:
Votre remboursement sera visible dans la liste de vos transactions √† la date o√π la transaction initiale contest√©e a √©t√© effectu√©e. Vous pouvez √©galement le retrouver dans le relev√© de compte mensuel correspondant.
Vous pouvez consulter et t√©l√©charger vos relev√©s de compte sur l'application mobile : depuis l'√©cran d'accueil, cliquez sur les 3 traits en haut √† droite et s√©lectionnez Relev√©s.
Vous pouvez trouver vos relev√©s sur votre espace personnel en ligne (app.n26.com). Sur la page¬†Transactions, cliquez sur l‚Äôic√¥ne nuage √† c√¥t√© du symbole ‚Äú+‚Äù. Vous verrez ensuite la section¬†Relev√©s de compte.

title: Wie erstelle ich eine SEPA-√úberweisung?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Ausgehende √úberweisungen kannst du in jedes Land innerhalb des SEPA Raums ausf√ºhren.¬†
Ausgehende √úberweisungen kannst du sowohl in der N26 App als auch in der WebApp erstellen:

Gib den legalen Namen und die IBAN des Empf√§ngers ein und klicke Weiter
Gib den Betrag ein und klicke Weiter

√úberpr√ºfe die Zusammenfassung deiner √úberweisung. Hier kannst du auch entscheiden, ob es eine Termin√ºberweisung werden soll oder ein Dauerauftrag
Klicke Absenden und best√§tige mit deiner Best√§tigungs-PIN.

Sobald die √úberweisung best√§tigt wurde, k√∂nnen wir sie nicht r√ºckg√§ngig machen oder die Daten des √úberweisungsempf√§ngers √§ndern.

title: ¬øC√≥mo activar la tarjeta?
content:
Para poder usar tu tarjeta, primero tendr√°s que activarla. Esto se hace desde la app, una vez que¬†tu m√≥vil est√© vinculado¬†a tu cuenta o directamente desde la web app.
Si vives en Espa√±a, Francia, Irlanda, Grecia, Finlandia, Estonia o el Reino Unido, deber√°s realizar una primera retirada de efectivo en un cajero autom√°tico para activar la tarjeta por completo.
Recuerda tambi√©n que:
Necesitas tener la tarjeta f√≠sicamente para poder activarla porque se te pedir√° tu n√∫mero¬†token de 10 d√≠gitos, el cual encontrar√°s bajo tu nombre en la cara frontal de la tarjeta (o en la cara posterior si tienes una tarjeta N26 You, N26 Metal o Maestro). Te pediremos dicho n√∫mero cada vez que nos contactes para asegurarnos de que eres t√∫.
Puedes activar tu tarjeta desde la app:
Desde la pantalla principal pulsa sobre la pesta√±a ''Gestionar''.
Selecciona ''Configuraci√≥n de tarjetas'' y desliza hasta ver la tarjeta que quieres activar.
Pulsa ''Activar''.
Si tienes¬†varias tarjetas¬†(porque pidieras m√°s de una o porque tu env√≠o se retrasara, por ejemplo), solo podr√°s activar tu tarjeta m√°s reciente. Todas las dem√°s tarjetas quedar√°n desactivadas, ya que solo se puede tener una tarjeta activa por cuenta (adicional a la Maestro si vives en Alemania, Austria o los Pa√≠ses Bajos).
Deber√°s seguir estos pasos para la activaci√≥n cada vez que¬†pidas una nueva tarjeta, por ejemplo si la tuya se pierde, se rompe, te la roban, o si te pasas a N26 You o N26 Metal.
Despu√©s de activarla, el siguiente paso es elegir el c√≥digo¬†PIN de la tarjeta.
¬øPrefieres verlo en v√≠deo? Echa un vistazo al tutorial(pesta√±a nueva) en nuestro canal de YouTube N26 Support.(pesta√±a nueva)

title: Can I open an N26 account in my country?
content:
We offer our accounts in the following countries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, and the US.
You can open your account if you live in one of these countries and meet our¬†requirements. Our products and services vary by country. Should you have an existing account with us and move to a country where N26 is not yet available for 18 months or more please get in touch with our Customer Support.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: How to top up by card, Apple Pay, and Google Pay
content:
You can now add money by using a debit or credit card as well as Apple or Google Pay. This is the fastest and easiest way to fund your N26 account.¬†


Adding money with a Debit or Credit card
Open your N26 app and navigate to the Actions tab
Just tap ‚ÄúAdd money‚Äù and select ‚ÄúCard transfer‚Äù
Choose an amount and enter your name on card, card number, expiration date and CVC (we never store your card information)
Follow the steps to confirm the payment
The money is available on your account instantly 

Adding money with a Apple or Google Pay
Open your N26 app and navigate to the Actions tab
Just tap ‚ÄúAdd money‚Äù and select ‚ÄúApple Pay‚Äù or ‚ÄúGoogle Pay‚Äù
Choose an amount¬†
Follow the steps to confirm the payment
The money is available on your account instantly

Accepted cards: 
Visa and Mastercard cards that have a 16-digit card number. 
Prepaid cards are not accepted (ex: Brand A, Brand B etc.). 
To find out more about the difference between debit, credit and prepaid cards read this article(new tab).¬†

Cost:
Whilst this is the fastest and easiest way to instantly add funds in your N26 account, for us, processing these instant top-up transactions is more expensive than other account funding methods(new tab) we offer.

For both methods, the first deposit is always free but extra deposits are charged a fee of 3% of the deposit amount. By charging a card or digital wallet, your money is not sent to N26 instantly, and the fee covers additional costs associated with funding accounts before the money is received so that it is instantly available for your use.

content:

title: Comment suivre mes d√©penses quotidiennes ?
content:
Toutes les¬†transactions¬†que vous effectuez sont automatiquement class√©es et nous vous permettons d‚Äôacc√©der aux statistiques de vos d√©penses (accessibles depuis le symbole en haut √† droite de l‚Äô√©cran de votre application mobile).
Vos transactions sont class√©es gr√¢ce aux :
Cat√©gories.¬†Nous utilisons les informations transmises par les marchands et le libell√© des transactions pour am√©liorer la classification de vos transactions (Retrait, Shopping, Logement & Charges‚Ä¶). Si vous r√©alisez par exemple une transaction¬†MoneyBeam¬†avec le libell√©¬†Repas de midi, celle-ci sera automatiquement affect√©e √† la cat√©gorie¬†Bars et restaurants. Vous pouvez √† tout moment ajuster la cat√©gorie correspondant √† une transaction. Pour cela, s√©lectionnez la transaction et choisissez ensuite la cat√©gorie qui lui correspond parmi les suggestions propos√©es.
Hashtags.¬†Des hashtags par d√©faut sont associ√©s √† vos transaction selon le moment o√π elles ont √©t√© effectu√©es (#weekend), selon le type de produit achet√© (#books) ou le lieu de l‚Äôachat (#berlin). Vous pouvez cr√©er vos propres hashtags : il vous suffit de s√©lectionner une transaction, puis d‚Äôappuyer sur le pinceau pour personnaliser votre hashtag (#cadeau_anniv ou #touslesmois) ou supprimer ceux que vous n‚Äôutilisez pas.
Vous souhaitez parler de nous √† vos amis ? Recevez 15 ‚Ç¨ √† chaque fois que l‚Äôun d‚Äôentre eux nous rejoint. D√©couvrez notre¬†programme de parrainage.

title: Perch√© mi √® stata addebitata una commissione sui prelievi ATM?
content:
Le commissioni bancomat possono avvenire per vari motivi:
Si applica una commissione di 2 ‚Ç¨ su qualsiasi prelievo aggiuntivo oltre la nostra politica di utilizzo.
¬†Riceverai una notifica push quando stai per esaurire i prelievi gratuiti.
Alcuni bancomat potrebbero applicare commissioni individuali.
¬†Non abbiamo alcun controllo su queste commissioni e non possiamo rifiutarle o annullarle. Se si applicano commissioni aggiuntive sarai informato prima di completare il prelievo e potrai annullarlo.
I prelievi ATM in valuta estera a volte includono commissioni.
¬†Con il conto N26, si applica una commissione dell‚Äô1,7% dell‚Äôimporto del prelievo. Questa commissione non si applica ai possessori di N26 You e N26 Metal.
Utilizzo della carta Maestro per i prelievi ATM.
¬†I prelievi nazionali o internazionali sono soggetti a una commissione di 2 ‚Ç¨. Maestro √® disponibile solo in Germania, Austria e Paesi Bassi.
Per evitare le commissioni, soprattutto in viaggio, puoi utilizzare il¬†localizzatore di ATM Mastercard(nuova tabella)¬†per trovare i dispositivi da cui prelevare gratuitamente nelle tue vicinanze.
Trovi una panoramica delle nostre commissioni nel listino¬†prezzi(nuova tabella).

title: Was ist N26 Insurance?
content:
Mit N26 Insurance kannst du deine Versicherung digitalisieren und alle deine bestehenden Versicherungspolicen an einem Ort verwalten.
So funktioniert's: Unser Partner¬†Clark Germany GmbH(neuen Tab)¬†wird dein Versicherungsmakler. Diese Firma √ºbernimmt die Kontaktaufnahme mit deinen aktuellen Versicherungsgesellschaften und beschafft alle notwendigen Informationen √ºber deine Policen. Auch Auftr√§ge fr√ºherer Makler werden f√ºr dich √ºbernommen. Von da an kannst du alle Versicherungsanspr√ºche einfach direkt in der App melden. Um den Prozess zu starten, logge dich in deine mobile App ein:
Streiche nach rechts, bis du den Tab Versicherung erreichst
Tippe auf Digitalisiere deine Versicherung oder auf +
W√§hle die erste Police, die du hinzuf√ºgen m√∂chtest, und f√ºge Informationen √ºber deinen Versicherer hinzu
Schlie√üe die Eingabe ab (du kannst den Eintrag l√∂schen oder erneut eingeben)
¬†Wenn du bis zu 10 Versicherungspolicen angelegt hast, tippe auf Weiter
Lies und akzeptiere die AGB(neuen Tab)
Best√§tige den Maklerauftrag mit deiner elektronischen Unterschrift
Wenn du fertig bist, kannst du alle Versicherungsfragen unter +49 69 153 229 339, Montag bis Freitag von 9 bis 18 Uhr, direkt an die Firma Clark richten.
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erhalte 15‚Ç¨ f√ºr jeden Freund, dem du N26 erfolgreich empfiehlst. Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: Come gestire la mia visibilit√† come utente N26?
content:
Per poterti offrire l'accesso a tutte le opzioni presenti nell'app, N26 associa i tuoi dati con altri utenti N26.
Per gestire il tuo consenso ad essere visibile come utente N26, puoi andare nell‚Äôapp su üë§ Il mio conto, selezionare Impostazioni e poi Impostazioni Personali e Informazioni Personali. Successivamente dovrai solo spuntare o rimuovere la spunta dalla casella ‚ÄúAccetto di poter essere visualizzato da altri utenti N26‚Äù.
Gli utenti N26 che hanno deciso di rendersi visibili appariranno nella tua lista contatti. Allo stesso tempo, se ti sei reso visibile, anche tu apparirai nella lista contatti di altri utenti N26.¬†La lista contatti non viene memorizzata in modo permanente da N26 e viene utilizzato solo quando si accede ad opzioni specifiche.
Puoi avere accesso a tutte i nostri prodotti presenti nell'app, come ad esempio Moneybeam, che ti permette di trasferire denaro in maniera instantanea senza utilizzare un IBAN, ma solo selezionando un nome dalla tua lista dei contatti. Viceversa, puoi anche richiedere un trasferimento da uno dei tuoi contatti, il quale dovr√† solo accettare (o declinare) la richiesta. Renderti visibile ti permetter√†, inoltre, di usare Spazi Condivisi, sottoconti tramite i quali potrai condividere denaro con altri utenti N26.

title: Comment signaler un sinistre √† l'assurance ?
content:
Votre adh√©sion √†¬†N26 You(nouvel onglet)¬†ou¬†N26 Metal(nouvel onglet), vous donne droit √† un ensemble d'assurances propos√©es par Allianz Global Assistance Europe*.
Pour signaler un sinistre, connectez-vous √† votre application mobile N26, puis rendez vous dans la rubrique üë§ Mon compte et N26 You/Metal. 
Vous y trouverez :

La possibilit√© de contacter Allianz directement en cas d‚Äôurgence.
Si vous contactez Allianz Global Assistance* en cas d'urgence, veillez √† avoir sous les yeux les informations suivantes :
L'adresse compl√®te et le num√©ro de t√©l√©phone de votre lieu de s√©jour actuel
Les noms de tous les interlocuteurs officiels (m√©decins, h√¥pitaux, police)
La description pr√©cise des √©v√©nements survenus
*Allianz Global Assistance Europe, d√©nomination commerciale AWP P&C S.A. - Filiale hollandaise, membre du Groupe Allianz.

title: What does N26 do with my tax information?
content:
The OECD requires certain tax information to be shared by means of the Common Reporting Standard(new tab) (ECR). To carry out our obligations, we must establish which country you‚Äôre taxable in. We do this through your tax identification or National Insurance number. 
We forward this information via the German Federal Tax Office to tax authorities in other countries if: 
You live in a ECR participating country.
You have a postbox or a second registered address in another ECR participating country.
When registering you gave a telephone number belonging to another ECR participating country.
You have a standing order, or make regular payments, to an account located in another ECR participating country.
We also forward data to the U.S. Internal Revenue Service(new tab) (IRS) according to the Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act(new tab) (FATCA). We may request your Social Security Number (SSN) in order to check your tax status in the U.S. because:
You are a citizen of the U.S (including dual citizenship).
When registering you gave a telephone number belonging to the U.S.
You were born in the U.S. (or in a U.S. embassy located abroad).
You‚Äôre married to a U.S. national.
You gave us an address in the U.S.
You make regular payment transfers to the U.S.
To update your tax identification or social security number in the N26 app:
Go to  My Account and tap on Settings and Account settings
Select Personal settings then Tax information
Select the country in which you‚Äôre tax-liable
Enter either your tax identification number or your social security number
Important information
In Germany, we need your Steueridentifikationsnummer (11 digits) not your Steuernummer (9 digits).
If you‚Äôre not tax-liable in another country, contact us so we can confirm your tax status.
In each and every case your personal data will be securely stored and only used for the fulfillment of ECR and FATCA requirements.
We‚Äôre unable to advise you on your tax status. If you‚Äôre unsure of your status please discuss the matter with a tax advisor.
If you‚Äôve entered the country in which you are liable for tax but not your tax identification number, please remove the country from the list shown to you in the app, reenter the country, and enter your tax identification number again.

title: How to keep track of my daily spending?
content:
We automatically sort¬†your transactions¬†and display our findings in¬†Statistics¬†(top-right corner of the mobile app) by sorting your:
Categories: We collect information on retailers and payment reasons in order to improve our categorization (such as ATM, Food & Groceries, or Shopping). For example, if you send a MoneyBeam with the reference text Lunch, we‚Äôll put it in the Bars & Restaurants category. If you feel like a category doesn‚Äôt fit, you can just change it by selecting the transaction and choosing a category from the drop-down list.

Hashtags: We‚Äôve also added default hashtags for transaction times (#weekend), types of transactions (#books), or locations of purchases (#berlin). You can further sort your transactions by adding your own hashtags: tap on a transaction and then the pencil icon to add tags (such as #portugal_trip or #everymonth) or remove unwanted tags.

title: ¬øCu√°nto tiempo tarda una transferencia con TransferWise?
content:
Una vez creas la transferencia con TransferWise, obtienes una fecha estimada de finalizaci√≥n.
Si una transferencia con TransferWise falla, te enviaremos un mensaje push inform√°ndote. La cantidad volver√° a estar disponible en tu saldo al cabo de unos d√≠as.
TransferWise no cobra comisiones extra por un pago devuelto y nosotros tampoco. Sin embargo, algunos bancos que intervienen en la operaci√≥n s√≠ que lo hacen. En ese caso TransferWise restar√° esa comisi√≥n de la cantidad total devuelta,  tal y como est√° escrito en sus¬†Condiciones de Uso(pesta√±a nueva).
Razones principales por las que falla una transferencia:
Errores en los detalles de la transferencia (al introducir el nombre del destinatario o su informaci√≥n bancaria, por ejemplo).
Caracteres especiales o demasiados caracteres en el nombre del destinatario o campo de referencia.
Has sobrepasado los l√≠mites o los pagos online no est√°n activados en los ajustes de tu tarjeta.
No se pueden realizar transferencias en moneda extranjera con las cuentas N26 Business o N26 Business You, ni tampoco si la cuenta del destinatario es una cuenta comercial.

title: Comment fonctionne Google Pay ?
content:
(S'applique uniquement √† l'Allemagne, la France, l'Italie, l'Espagne, la Belgique, le Danemark, la Finlande, l'Irlande, la Norv√®ge, la Pologne, la Slovaquie, la Su√®de et √† la Suisse)
Google Pay est une m√©thode de paiement qui vous permet de payer facilement vos achats depuis votre smartphone, sans avoir besoin de votre portefeuille ni de votre Mastercard.
Google Pay est disponible chez tous les marchands qui proposent les paiements sans contact (NFC), y compris sur les sites de vente en ligne. En magasin, il vous suffit de d√©verrouiller votre t√©l√©phone et de le pr√©senter au terminal de paiement sans contact. Le paiement sera alors automatique. Lorsque vous payez en ligne, s√©lectionnez Google Pay comme option de paiement, une confirmation de paiement vous sera demand√©e sous forme d‚Äôun¬†message pop-up.
Si vous n‚Äôarrivez pas √† payer avec Google Pay, veuillez v√©rifier les points suivants :
Afin d‚Äôajouter votre Mastercard N26 √† votre Google Wallet, votre t√©l√©phone doit √™tre √©quip√© d‚ÄôAndroid 5.0 (Lollipop) ou d‚Äôune version plus r√©cente et compatible avec la technologie sans contact (NFC). Une fois l‚Äôapplication Google Pay install√©e, il vous faudra cliquer sur Ajouter une carte.
Il est indispensable d‚Äôavoir un code de verrouillage sur l‚Äô√©cran de votre t√©l√©phone lorsque vous utilisez Google Pay. Si vous n‚Äôen avez pas, il vous sera demand√© d‚Äôen configurer un avant d‚Äôajouter votre Mastercard √† votre Google Wallet.
Si votre t√©l√©phone est prot√©g√© par une coque, il est possible que vous deviez la retirer pour pouvoir payer. Certains terminaux de paiement ne reconnaissent pas le t√©l√©phone si la coque est trop √©paisse.
Si le terminal de paiement vous demande de pr√©senter √† nouveau votre carte, il se peut que vous ayez retir√© votre t√©l√©phone trop rapidement o√π que celui-ci n‚Äôait pas √©t√© plac√© suffisamment proche du terminal de paiement.

Utilisez votre carte avant m√™me de la recevoir avec Google Pay
N26 vous permet d‚Äôutiliser votre nouvelle carte avant m√™me de la recevoir en l‚Äôajoutant √† votre compte Google Pay.
Cette fonctionnalit√© est disponible si vous venez d‚Äôouvrir un compte N26 ou si vous commandez une nouvelle carte suite au vol ou √† la perte de l‚Äôancienne.
Cette fonctionnalit√© est utilisable pendant 30 jours √† partir de la date de la commande de votre carte. Si vous n‚Äôactivez pas votre nouvelle carte physique dans ce d√©lai, vous ne pourrez temporairement plus utiliser les paiements mobiles.
D√®s que vous aurez re√ßu votre carte, activez-la depuis votre application mobile ou votre espace client en ligne en suivant les √©tapes indiqu√©es.
Vous pouvez effectuer des paiements avec votre smartphone dans la limite de 200 ‚Ç¨ par jour. Ces limites ne s‚Äôappliquent pas si vous changez de formule de compte ou commandez une nouvelle carte sans que l‚Äôancienne ne soit d√©sactiv√©e (carte endommag√©e par exemple). Veuillez noter que cette fonctionnalit√© ne vous permet pas de retirer des esp√®ces en DAB ni d‚Äôutiliser CASH26 (si disponible dans votre pays).

title: How do I dispute a transaction?
content:
We can only process disputes for transactions that have settled into your account.  In order to properly process a dispute, we will ask you for details about the charge and the reason for the dispute:
You‚Äôll need to provide all or some of the following information:
The full name on the account
The account number
Name of merchant
Date of the disputed charge
Amount of the disputed charge
Reason for the dispute
Important:  If you believe a charge on your account is the result of fraud, or if you believe that your card has been lost or stolen, please block your card immediately and contact our customer support either by phone or by chat.  
The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Come verifico la mia identit√†?
content:
In qualit√† di banca, abbiamo bisogno di sapere chi sei. Ecco perch√© devi dimostrare la tua identit√† con un documento supportato quando apri un conto con noi o richiedi alcuni prodotti. Dall'8 Luglio 2019 i clienti con nazionalit√† italiana residenti in Italia, potranno utilizzare anche patente di guida (emessa dal 2013) + tessera sanitaria durante il processo di verifica.
Non ti chiederemo¬†mai¬†di dimostrare la tua identit√† per conto di altre persone o aziende. Abbiamo raccolto dei¬†suggerimenti per aiutarti a proteggere la tua identit√†.
Puoi mostrarci il tuo documento d‚Äôidentit√† in due modi:¬†foto o¬†video. Il modo in cui puoi dimostrare la tua identit√† dipende dalla tua nazionalit√†, dal tuo paese di residenza e dal tipo di documento d‚Äôidentit√† che utilizzi:
Vivo in Germania(nuova tabella)
Vivo fuori dalla Germania(nuova tabella)
Se il tuo passaporto o la tua carta d‚Äôidentit√† non sono inclusi nel nostro elenco, significa che non possiamo offrirti un conto in questo momento. La verifica dell‚Äôidentit√† √® un argomento serio per noi. Se il tuo documento d‚Äôidentit√† non √® presente nell‚Äôelenco, la nostra assistenza clienti non potr√† fare eccezioni per te.
Aggiungiamo continuamente nuovi documenti a questo elenco, quindi vale la pena controllare di tanto in tanto se il tuo √® stato aggiunto.
La chat √® disponibile dal luned√¨ alla domenica dalle 07:00 alle 23:00.

title: Perch√© la verifica video non funziona?
content:
Alcuni consigli per fare la¬†verifica¬†video con successo:
La maggior parte delle videochiamate non riesce a causa della connessione Internet scarsa o della cattiva qualit√† dell‚Äôimmagine (ad es. troppo sfocata o scarsa illuminazione). Fai la chiamata in un ambiente luminoso, utilizza un telefono con una buona fotocamera e assicurati di avere una connessione Internet veloce.
Assicurati di essere l‚Äôunica persona nel video.
Per aprire un conto con noi devi vivere in uno dei paesi supportati.
Possiamo accettare solo carte d‚Äôidentit√† nazionali e passaporti (non si possono usare permessi di soggiorno). Inoltre, il documento non deve essere danneggiato.
Dall'8 Luglio 2019 i clienti con nazionalit√† italiana residenti in Italia, potranno utilizzare anche patente di guida (emessa dal 2013) + tessera sanitaria durante il processo di verifica.
Una volta completata la verifica, ti invieremo la tua Mastercard N26. Le¬†consegne¬†richiedono da 4 a 14 giorni.
La chat √® disponibile da Luned√¨ alla Domenica dalle 07:00 alle 23:00.

title: How to make a SEPA transfer?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è You can send debit transfers to any country within the SEPA zone (if the receiving bank accepts Euros).
Outgoing debit transfers can be made in either the N26 app or our Web app.
From the Home screen choose the Actions tab,

Select Send Money followed by Bank Transfer and then ‚Äúadd a new recipient‚Äù,

Enter the recipient's name and IBAN and select Continue,

Choose the amount and select Next,

Add a message if required or select Skip It,

Check the Transfer Review screen (which sums up the transfer),

Here you can also schedule the date of your transfer and save it as a standing order,

Press send and confirm with your confirmation PIN.
You‚Äôll then need to either Confirm or Cancel the transfer via push notification in the app from your paired device.
Once the transfer was confirmed in the mobile app, we can't reverse it or change the recipient's details.
If you cannot confirm your debit transfer within the app you need to:
Ensure that you have a stable internet connection.
Ensure that your mobile phone has push notifications enabled. This is done through the phone settings, not in our app.
Ensure that you use your paired device.
Once your debit transfer is sent you‚Äôll be able to download a PDF confirmation of it. To do so:
Go to your Transactions list.

Locate and select the specific debit transfer.

Scroll down to the Transaction Information and tap PDF by selecting Transfer Confirmation.

title: Wie oft kann ich kostenlos Bargeld abheben?
content:
Bargeldabhebungen mit deiner Mastercard h√§ngen von dem Land ab, in dem deine AGB gelten (die Adresse, an die du deine Karte urspr√ºnglich hast liefern lassen):
Deutschland: 3 bis 5* kostenlose Abhebungen am Geldautomaten pro Monat in Deutschland und unbegrenzte kostenlose Abhebungen in der Eurozone (oder mit¬†CASH26)
√ñsterreich und Italien: unbegrenzte kostenlose Abhebungen (inklusive¬†CASH26)
Frankreich, Spanien, Niederlande und das √ºbrige Europa: 5 kostenlose Abhebungen am Geldautomaten pro Monat in deinem Wohnsitzland und in der Eurozone
Vereinigtes K√∂nigreich: unbegrenzte kostenlose Abhebungen
Wenn du mit deiner¬†Maestrocard¬†Bargeld abhebst (nur in Deutschland, √ñsterreich und den Niederlanden verf√ºgbar), f√§llt grunds√§tzlich eine Geb√ºhr von 2 ‚Ç¨ an.
Pr√ºfe unsere¬†Preislisten, wenn dir eine¬†Geldautomatengeb√ºhr berechnet¬†wurde.
*Nur in Deutschland: Du hast in den ersten drei Monaten 5 kostenlose Auszahlungen. Danach kannst du 5 statt 3 kostenlose Abhebungen erhalten, wenn:
du j√ºnger als 26 Jahre bist
du dein Gehalt, deine Rente, dein Baf√∂g oder staatliche Leistungen mindestens zwei aufeinander folgende Monate erh√§ltst (deine zus√§tzlichen kostenlosen Auszahlungen beginnen im Folgemonat)
du f√ºr mindestens zwei Monate Zahlungseing√§nge von mindestens 1.000 ‚Ç¨ pro Monat hast (deine zus√§tzlichen kostenlosen Auszahlungen beginnen im Folgemonat)

title: Why didn't I receive my pairing code via SMS?
content:
A pairing code is required to¬†connect your smartphone¬†to your account. If you didn‚Äôt receive this code via SMS for whatever reason, you can request a new one up to five times in the mobile app. Please wait 30 seconds before requesting a new one. 
If all five codes are requested and pairing is still unsuccessful, then for security reasons you‚Äôll be blocked from making further requests for 24 hours. If this happens, you can either wait or contact our Customer Support via chat - who would be happy to help you.
If your country code is outside of the EU, it‚Äôs likely that you‚Äôll need to contact us to receive a pairing code.

title: FATCA - Warum wir bestimmte Informationen von dir ben√∂tigen
content:
N26 ist als reguliertes Finanzinstitut dazu verpflichtet, dem United States Department of Treasury sowie dem Internal Revenue Service (IRS) Informationen √ºber Kundenkonten von U.S. Steuerzahlern oder ausl√§ndischen Entit√§ten zur Verf√ºgung zu stellen, die laut FATCA f√ºr U.S. Steuerzahler von erheblichem Interesse sind.
FATCA steht f√ºr Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act und ist ein Gesetz zur Bek√§mpfung von Steuerhinterziehung. Eingef√ºhrt vom IRS erreicht FATCA bessere steuerliche Entsprechungen, indem er U.S. Steuerzahler daran hindert, ausl√§ndische Banken oder Finanzinstitute daf√ºr zu nutzen, ihre Verm√∂genswerte und Einkommen der Besteuerung zu entziehen. Mehr √ºber FATCA oder den IRS erf√§hrst du auf: www.irs.gov.
Anders als die meisten L√§nder haben die Vereinigten Staaten ein Steuersystem, das auch diejenigen US-Staatsb√ºrger erfasst, deren Wohnsitz nicht in den Vereinigten Staaten liegt. Die meisten anderen L√§nder besteuern die weltweiten Einkommen ihrer B√ºrger nur insofern, als letztere ihren Wohnsitz im Inland haben bzw. besteuern nicht diejenigen B√ºrger, die permanent im Ausland leben und arbeiten.
Um zuverl√§ssig festzustellen, ob dein Kundenkonto dem IRS mitzuteilen ist, m√ºssen wir dir die folgenden 3 Fragen stellen:
Hast du (auch) die US-amerikanische Staatsangeh√∂rigkeit oder besitzt du eine Green Card?

Bist du in den Vereinigten Staaten steuerpflichtig?
In den Vereinigten Staaten steuerpflichtig zu sein, hei√üt nicht ohne Weiteres, dass du dort eine pers√∂nliche Einkommensteuer zahlen musst. Es bedeutet zun√§chst nur, dass du laut amerikanischem Recht verpflichtet bist, eine Steuererkl√§rung abgeben musst und dein (weltweites) Einkommen dem IRS angeben musst - selbst wenn du schlie√ülich keine Steuern in den Vereinigten Staaten zahlen musst.

Falls ja, wie lautet deine US-amerikanische Steuer-Identifikationsnummer (US-TIN)?
Als US-TIN kannst du entweder deine US-Sozialversicherungsnummer (SSN) oder deine US-Steuer-Identifikationsnummer (ITIN) benutzen.
Bitte beachte: Falls in deinem Konto eine amerikanische Telefonnummer oder ein amerikanischer Geburtsort registriert ist oder du einen Dauerauftrag in die USA erstellst, haben wir nach FATCA davon auszugehen, dass die in FATCA festgelegten Bestimmungen f√ºr dich Geltung haben, bis du uns das Gegenteil best√§tigst.
Falls sich deine Lage ver√§ndert, kannst du deine Steuerdaten jederzeit in deiner N26 App aktualisieren. Logge dich dazu einfach in deine N26 App ein und gehe zu: 

Mein Konto > Einstellungen > Pers√∂nliche Einstellungen > Steuerdaten, und aktualisiere dort deine Informationen.

title: Can I use the same email address for my U.S. and European N26 accounts?
content:
No. For security purposes, you must have a unique email address linked to each N26 account. When signing up for your U.S. N26 account, please select a different email address than the one used for your European N26 account.
Additionally, in order to sign-up for a U.S. N26 account you must be a U.S. citizen or a U.S. permanent resident.
The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Custom Audiences
content:
Data Processing in the framework of Facebook Custom Audiences
Custom Audiences allows us to exclude you, as an existing N26 customer, from our advertisements. We do not want to display irrelevant ads to you. Furthermore, it allows us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other Facebook users. These so called ‚ÄúLookalike-Audiences‚Äù are more similar to our customers than the average Facebook user.¬†
In order to profit from the benefits as described above we provide a hashed version of your N26 email address to Facebook. The so-called ‚Äúhashing‚Äù is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. Facebook then matches this email address against your potential Facebook email address. After the matching, regardless of whether it was successful or not, any hashed email addresses are deleted within 6-8 hours by Facebook. Facebook does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. You can find this and further information in the terms of Facebook Custom Audiences(new tab).
You can revoke your consent according to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR to this data processing in the N26 web app at any time.

title: How to cancel my N26 You or N26 Metal membership?
content:
N26 You(new tab) or¬†N26 Metal(new tab)¬†contracts have a term of one year. This contract automatically renews for another year unless you cancel it. 
In this article you will find the difference between revocation, cancellation of the membership and cancellation of the renewal of your membership. You have 3 options:
Revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period
Cancel your membership at any time up to 1 month before your contract ends
Stop your membership‚Äôs renewal up to 1 month before it expires
Find in details how to do so below. 
You can revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period. Simply open a chat with us and we'll assist you from there.
Keep in mind that if you cancel your contract before it ends, you won‚Äôt be able to sign up for the same membership plan in the future.
If you want to terminate your membership at any time up to *1 month before your contract ends and after the 14-day revocation period, please contact us.
If you choose this option all your N26 You or N26 Metal benefits will end, which includes your insurance coverage.
You have up to 4 weeks before your membership expires to cancel the renewal of your N26 You or N26 Metal membership. To do so:
Log into the mobile app and go to üë§ My Account
Select N26 You/Metal
Tap Membership details followed by Cancel Membership
 you can also see your membership expiration date here
Confirm the cancellation via the push message we send you
You can continue to use your N26 You or N26 Metal Mastercard fully until your membership expires. That means you‚Äôll keep your insurance coverage as long as you‚Äôre still required to pay your membership fee. After that, your Mastercard will work like a standard card without the benefits. We‚Äôll send you a standard card before your contract ends. No need to contact us about it.
We‚Äôll notify you of the renewal via email 8 weeks before your anniversary date.
If you want to definitely close your account, visit our article How to close my N26 account.

title: Do I need to declare my N26 account?
content:
N26 is a German bank operating in Italy through an Italian branch since 26th March 2020 in order to offer its customers an account with an Italian IBAN.
Therefore, if you opened an N26 account after 26th March 2020 and reside in Italy, you‚Äôre the holder of an Italian N26 account and won‚Äôt need to submit any particular tax declaration.¬†
Please note that:
If you‚Äôve an annual average account balance of ‚Ç¨5,000 or above, and are subject to the ordinary stamp duty on your statements, we‚Äôll automatically debit your account to the extent required by law. Alternatively, it will be at our expense according to any existing promotions.¬†
In addition to this, your account remains protected by the German Deposit Protection Fund up to ‚Ç¨100,000.¬†
If you opened an N26 account before 26th March 2020 with an Italian address, your account is considered a foreign account. Opening an account abroad is entirely legal‚Äîyou  simply need to comply with the regulations of your country of residence and the country where the account is held.
For individuals residing in Italy, foreign accounts with an average annual balance of ‚Ç¨5,000 or above must be declared to the Italian tax authorities. It‚Äôll be necessary to fill out the dedicated Rw section of the tax return form and pay VAT, a fixed amount of ‚Ç¨34.20.¬†
If your balance exceeds ‚Ç¨15,000 even for just one day during the year, in addition to paying VAT, you‚Äôll need to fill out the Rw section of the tax return form for the purposes of tax monitoring as required by law no.186/2014.¬†
For more detailed and personalized information, please refer to a tax expert.
Please note that the Italian tax authorities have the possibility to identify undeclared foreign current accounts and to trace the relevant transactions back to the holder (Directive 2011/16/EU).

title: How to protect my identity?
content:
To protect and help avoid the misuse of your personal data, please keep in mind that:
We will never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. This includes verifications for apartment rental contracts, lines of credit, or job offers (including jobs with N26). Only complete the verification process if you want to open an N26 bank account for yourself.
As the account owner, only you should create and have access to your login details. Never create an N26 bank account with a predefined email address and password. If you use login credentials that were given to you, these credentials may be used to reach your personal and legal information. Also, never log into an N26 account that is not yours.
Do not send your ID or passport to unknown or unverified recipients.
We may ask for certain documents when your transaction is subject to a routine check. Only send valid documentation to verified N26 email accounts.
We will never ask for your username, password, or PIN codes outside the N26 app. Never provide this information in an external website or app, even if it looks N26-related.
If you ever feel in doubt, have received a suspicious request from a third party, or think your N26 login may be compromised, please do not hesitate to contact us.

title: How to prove my identity?
content:
As a licensed bank, it‚Äôs important that we know who our customers are. That‚Äôs why we request our customers to prove their identity with a supported ID document when they open an account or use certain products.
We would never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. We‚Äôve gathered other tips to help you protect your identity.
There are two different ways you can show us your ID, and we've also collected some troubleshooting tips for each: photo and video. The method you can choose to show us your ID depends on your nationality, your country of residence, and the type of ID you use:
I live in Germany(new tab)
I live in Spain(new tab)
I live in a different country(new tab)
If your ID isn't on the list, it means we cannot offer you an account with us at the time. We take identity verification very seriously and our Customer Support will not be able to make an exception for you regarding the supported documents.
But we're always adding new documents to this list so it's worth checking back to see if yours has been added.
In case your residential address is in Germany and you're unable to complete your photo or video verification due to a disability, please start the registration process by entering your details and then contact our Customer Support. We're happy to assist you.
Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.¬†

title: Dov‚Äô√® il mio rimborso?
content:
Nella app, il tuo rimborso riporter√† la data in cui la transazione √® originariamente avvenuta (e non la data in cui il rimborso √® stato effettuato). Scorri nella tua lista delle transazioni oppure scarica l‚Äôestratto conto per individuarlo.
Per visualizzare e scaricare il PDF del tuo estratto conto:
da webapp: vai a Transazioni, clicca sull‚Äôicona a forma di nuvola nell‚Äôangolo in alto a destra, poi Scarica e, infine, seleziona Estratto Conto.
da app mobile:¬†
-per iOS, seleziona i tre puntini alla destra del tuo saldo sulla schermata principale. Un menu a comparsa ti dar√† modo di accedere al tuo estratto conto.
-per Android, troverai l‚Äôopzione sotto Statistiche (seleziona i tre puntini nell‚Äôangolo in alto a destra)

title: Why do I pay the church tax?
content:
We‚Äôre legally required to request data relating to church tax deductions and to make the deductions where applicable. This happens every year from September 1st to October 31st.
You‚Äôre entitled to appeal against the passing of information about your religious affiliation through an¬†Erkl√§rung zum Sperrvermerk(new tab)¬†form. You can do this before June 30th each year. If you file an objection, your local tax office will request that you submit a church tax declaration yourself.
Further information is available on the website of the¬†German Federal Central Office for Taxation(new tab).

title: Warum zahle ich Kirchensteuer?
content:
Wir sind gesetzlich verpflichtet, Daten √ºber kirchensteuerliche Abz√ºge anzufordern und diese gegebenenfalls vorzunehmen. Dies wird jedes Jahr vom 1. September bis zum 31. Oktober durchgef√ºhrt.
Du hast das Recht, gegen die Weitergabe von Informationen √ºber deine Religionszugeh√∂rigkeit durch das Formular¬†‚ÄûErkl√§rung zum Sperrvermerk‚Äú(neuen Tab)¬†Berufung einzulegen. Du kannst dies vor dem 30. Juni eines jeden Jahres tun. Wenn du Widerspruch einlegst, wird dein Finanzamt dich auffordern, eine Kirchensteuererkl√§rung abzugeben.
Weitere Informationen findest du auf der Website des¬†Bundeszentralamtes f√ºr Steuern(neuen Tab).

title: Warum bekomme ich kein Basiskonto?
content:
Unter bestimmten Umst√§nden kann N26 deinen Antrag auf ein¬†Basiskonto¬†ablehnen. Das ist der Fall, wenn:
du au√üerhalb eines von uns unterst√ºtzten Landes lebst.
du bereits ein N26 Bankkonto oder ein anderes Bankkonto in Deutschland hast und es in vollem Umfang nutzen kannst.
du innerhalb der letzten 3 Jahre wegen einer Straftat gegen die Bank, ihre Mitarbeiter oder ihre Kunden verurteilt wurdest.
du bereits in der Vergangenheit ein Basiskonto bei N26 unterhalten hast, das wegen √úberziehung oder unzul√§ssiger Nutzung geschlossen wurde.
du die Mindestanforderungen gem√§√ü des Geldw√§sche- und Kreditwesengesetzes nicht erf√ºllst.

title: How to order my card with express delivery?
content:
Not available for Metal cards.
Express delivery is a good option if you need your card in a hurry or if postal deliveries have sometimes failed to reach you for whatever reason.
You‚Äôll be given the option to select express delivery when choosing a delivery method for your first card or if you¬†reorder a card. You‚Äôll then receive a tracking link by email. If you‚Äôre not home during the delivery and your mailbox can‚Äôt be accessed, the card will be left at a nearby access point (you can find it through the provided tracking link). The card only stays at the access point for a limited amount of time. After that, it‚Äôll be returned to us. We‚Äôll inform you by email if that happens.
If you order via express delivery, keep in mind that:
Your new Standard or N26 You Mastercard will be delivered within 2-3 working days. Express delivery is not available for Metal cards.
Deliveries take place between 08:00 and 12:00. 
Deliveries can be made by DHL express to all of our supported countries within Europe. It‚Äôs currently not possible to make deliveries to other countries.
It‚Äôs not possible to cancel or change an express delivery once it‚Äôs been selected as the delivery method.
To close an account, you must pay for the express delivery of your card.
If your card hasn‚Äôt arrived within 3-5 working days of placing your order, please check the tracking link for an update. You can also use the tracking link to inform DHL directly about the details of your delivery address or to redirect the shipment if you can‚Äôt be there at the time of delivery.
N26 Standard and N26 You cards have a fee of ‚Ç¨6 for standard shipping and ‚Ç¨25 for express shipping (which includes the ‚Ç¨6 card replacement fee).

title: Comment commander ma carte en livraison express ?
content:
Disponibilit√© limit√©e.
La livraison express est disponible pour les cartes N26 Standard, N26 You, N26 Business et N26 Business You et est factur√©e 25 ‚Ç¨ (6 ‚Ç¨ de frais de remplacement de la carte inclus). Cette option est disponible pour vous permettre de recevoir votre carte dans de brefs d√©lais si vous en avez besoin rapidement. ¬†La livraison express est √©galement conseill√©e si vous avez d√©j√† eu des difficult√©s avec la livraison de votre courrier.
Vous pourrez s√©lectionner la livraison Express lorsque vous choisirez la m√©thode de livraison lors de la commande de votre premi√®re carte ou lorsque vous commandez une nouvelle carte.
Vous recevrez ensuite un lien de suivi par email. Si vous n‚Äô√™tes pas √† votre domicile lors de la livraison et si votre bo√Æte aux lettres est hors d‚Äôacc√®s, la carte sera d√©pos√©e dans un point relais √† proximit√© de chez vous (vous pourrez consulter son adresse depuis le lien de suivi).
La carte sera conserv√©e en point relais pour une dur√©e limit√©e. Pass√© un certain d√©lai, elle nous sera retourn√©e. Dans ce cas, nous vous tiendrons inform√© par email.
¬†Veuillez √©galement noter que :
Votre Mastercard N26 sera livr√©e dans un d√©lai de 3 jours ouvr√©s (ce d√©lai d√©pend de l‚Äôheure √† laquelle vous commandez votre carte et du temps de fabrication de celle-ci).
Les livraisons DHL Express interviennent entre 8:00 et 12:00, du lundi au vendredi. Une signature sera n√©cessaire lors de la r√©ception du colis √† domicile.
L'exp√©dition via DHL Express est possible dans tous les pays europ√©ens o√π N26 est pr√©sent. En dehors de ces pays, l'exp√©dition n'est pas encore possible.
Il n'est pas possible d'annuler ou modifier la m√©thode de livraison express une fois celle-ci valid√©e.
Pour cl√¥turer un compte si vous avez d√©j√† command√© votre carte, vous devrez payer les frais de livraison express de cette derni√®re.
Dans le cas o√π votre carte ne vous serait pas parvenue 3 jours ouvr√©s apr√®s votre commande, veuillez cliquer sur le lien de suivi pour surveiller l'exp√©dition. Ce lien de suivi vous permet aussi de fournir des informations suppl√©mentaires √† DHL concernant votre adresse de livraison ou de modifier cette adresse dans le cas o√π vous ne pourriez pas √™tre √† votre domicile √† l'heure pr√©vue.

title: Bin ich in den USA steuerpflichtig?
content:
Als lizenzierte Bank sind wir gem√§√ü FATCA verpflichtet, dem ‚ÄúInternal Revenue Service‚Äù (IRS) alle Konten zu melden, die von Personen gef√ºhrt werden, die in den USA steuerpflichtig sind. Dieses Gesetz wurde vom amerikanischen Finanzministerium verabschiedet, um eine bessere Einhaltung von Steuervorschriften zu erreichen. So soll verhindert werden, dass amerikanische Staatsangeh√∂rige ausl√§ndische Banken und andere Finanzinstitute dazu verwenden, Steuern auf ihr Einkommen und Kapital zu vermeiden.¬†
Mehr Informationen zu FATCA findest du hier.(neuen Tab)
Laut FATCA ist ein amerikanischer Staatsangeh√∂riger unter anderem so definiert:
Staatsangeh√∂riger der USA (auch bei doppelter Staatsangeh√∂rigkeit)
Einwohner der USA, beispielsweise Inhaber einer g√ºltigen U.S. Greencard oder Person, die den ‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù erf√ºllt (siehe unten).
Falls du dir nicht sicher bist, ob du ein amerikanischer Staatsangeh√∂riger bist, wende dich bitte an einen Steuerberater.
‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù bedeutet:
Du warst im aktuellen Kalenderjahr 183 oder mehr Tage in den USA physisch anwesend.
ODER
Du warst innerhalb der letzten 3 Kalenderjahre 183 Tage in den USA physisch anwesend.
(31 Tage oder mehr im aktuellen Kalenderjahr) + (Anzahl der Tage, die du im letzten Jahr in den USA physisch anwesend warst) geteilt durch 3 + (Anzahl der Tage, die du im vorletzten Jahr in den USA physisch anwesend warst) geteilt durch 6.

Dar√ºber hinaus auch, wenn dein Konto die diese Angaben enth√§lt:
US-amerikanische Staatsangeh√∂rigkeit oder Wohnsitz in den USA
Geburtsort in den USA
Postanschrift oder Postfach in den USA
US-amerikanische Rufnummer
Dauerauftr√§ge an eine US-amerikanischen Adresse oder ein Konto, das in den USA verwaltet wird
F√ºr den Fall, dass wir folgende Dokumente nicht von dir erhalten, sind wir weiterhin dazu verpflichtet, dich als US Staatsangeh√∂rigen anzusehen:
Ein W-8BEN Formular oder eine √§hnliche Eigenerkl√§rung und
einen nicht US-amerikanischen Pass oder einen anderen regierungsamtlichen Ausweis, der deine Staatsangeh√∂rigkeit oder Nationalit√§t eines anderen Landes als den USA nachweist.
Falls du in den USA geboren bist, eine Kopie der Best√§tigung √ºber den Verlust deiner Staatsb√ºrgerschaft.

title: How to use Google Pay?
content:
Applies to Germany, Spain, Italy, Ireland, Belgium, Slovakia, France, Denmark, Finland, Sweden, Norway, Poland and Switzerland. 
Google Pay is a payment method that allows you to pay with your smartphone so you don‚Äôt have to carry your Mastercard with you all the time.
Google Pay is available in all shops supporting contactless (NFC) payments as well as online shops. Hold your smartphone near the contactless terminal and your payment will automatically process. When paying online, select Google Pay as the payment option. We‚Äôll ask you to confirm your payment via¬†push message¬†during checkout.
Some tips to keep in mind:
To add your N26 Mastercard, download the Google Pay app and select Get Started to enter your card details. You‚Äôll need Android 5.0 (Lollipop) or higher as well as an NFC-capable smartphone.
Google Pay requires a screen lock. If you didn‚Äôt set it up yet, you‚Äôll be asked to before adding your Mastercard to the Google Pay app.
If you‚Äôre protecting your smartphone with a case, you might have to remove it to pay. Some payment terminals don‚Äôt recognize your phone if the case is too big.
If the payment terminal asks you to present your card (again), you might have removed the smartphone too fast or didn‚Äôt hold it close enough. Just try again while keeping this in mind.

title: How to reorder a card?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Deliveries normally take up to 10 working days. Deliveries may take longer in some specific areas in the following countries: Estonia, Greece, Italy, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia and Spain.
If you‚Äôre waiting for your first card¬† and it has been more than 10 working days since you've successfully completed your identity verification, please contact us via live chat.
¬†For any other reason, please re-order your card via the N26 app.
First, check and update your shipping address
You can do this within the N26 app: üë§ My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Shipping Address.
To reorder your card go to Actions and tap Card Settings.¬†
From your list of cards, swipe until you see the card you wish to reorder and select Reorder.¬†¬†
Note that the Standard and the N26 You replacement cards have a fee of ‚Ç¨6 for standard shipping and ‚Ç¨25 for express shipping. For N26 Metal cards, the fee is ‚Ç¨45 for standard shipping. Express delivery for Metal cards is not available.
Once you‚Äôve ordered your new card, you can activate a digital version while your card is on its way. You can do this within the N26 app by scrolling to your card in Card Settings and adding it to the mobile wallet of choice. This feature is available for 30 days starting from the day your card has been ordered. After this you'll need to activate your physical card through the N26 app. Once the physical card is activated, your mobile wallet will continue working normally. If you don‚Äôt activate your physical card during this period, the digital version will expire until your card is activated.
This feature is not be enabled for customers who reorder their card or move to another account without blocking their current card. In these cases their current card will continue working with Apple Pay or Google Pay until the new one is activated.

title: How to get a Basiskonto?
content:
Download the request form(new tab) and complete it with a handwritten signature.
Take your signed form and the attached PostIdent coupon to your nearest branch of Deutsche Post to prove your identity.
Once we‚Äôve received your form and determined whether we can open a Basiskonto for you, we‚Äôll send you an email including the contract and the T&Cs(new tab).
Send your signed contract to us at Klosterstra√üe 62, 10179 Berlin.
Once we‚Äôve received your contract, we‚Äôll open your account within 10 business days.
You‚Äôll then receive a notification about your card delivery and accessing your account.

title: How to upgrade to N26 You?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Poland, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden.
You can upgrade to N26 You¬†during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you have a standard N26 bank account. 
To upgrade to N26 You in the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 You. You can choose between one of our five new colours when ordering a new card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.
Then choose your preferred delivery method, accept the N26 You T&C's(new tab) and your new card will be on the way. 
Standard deliveries take up to 10 business days whereas express deliveries take 3 business days. 
The membership fee of ‚Ç¨9,90 will be deducted directly from your account every month on the date of your upgrade.
The minimum contract period for the N26 You membership is one year. Your membership will automatically renew unless you cancel it up to four weeks before the contract ends. 
You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 14‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.

title: PSD2 - Open Banking f√ºr Drittanbieter
content:
Wir arbeiten mit Token.io(neuen Tab) zusammen, um Drittanbietern eine unterst√ºtzte Schnittstelle anzubieten, durch die sie ihre Dienstleistungen anbieten k√∂nnen. Eine vollst√§ndige √úbersicht √ºber die Dokumente sowie zugeh√∂rige Anleitungen findest im Portal f√ºr Entwickler(neuen Tab) von token.io.
Im Rahmen der Erf√ºllung regulatorischer Anforderungen unter PSD2 hat die N26 Bank ein Fallback-Interface implementiert. Dieses Interface gew√§hrleistet:
Zuverl√§ssige Identifizierung von Drittanbietern anhand eines Qualified Website Authentication Certificate‚Äôs (QWAC);
Sicheren und autorisierten Zugang zum Kundenkonto
Drittanbieter erhalten √ºber die folgende URL Zugang zu unserem Fallback-Interface.¬†
https://tpp.tech26.de
Der Zugang zur vorgenannten URL und die Einrichtung der TLS-Verbindung bedarf der Implementierung eines qualifizierten Zertifikats.
Im Folgenden findest du detaillierte technische Angaben f√ºr das Fallback-Interface:
ASIP Fallback technische Angaben(neuen Tab)
PISP Fallback technische Angaben(neuen Tab)
Drittanbieter k√∂nnen N26 durch durch eine E-Mail an open.banking@n26.com kontaktieren, um ihre QWAC-Zertifikate bereitzustellen und technischen Support zu erhalten.
Die folgenden Berichte vergleichen die Verf√ºgbarkeit und Leistung unserer unterst√ºtzten PSD2-Schnittstelle mit der N26-Benutzeroberfl√§che:
3. Quartal 2019(neuen Tab)

title: How to contact N26?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏èFor UK customers, click here(new tab)
If you want to reach out, you can open a chat with us directly within the mobile or WebApp, or from certain Support Center(new tab) articles.¬†As an online bank we don't have branches.
First of all, make sure you're up-to-date with the newest version of the app. If not, update your app in the Apple App Store(new tab) or the Google Play Store(new tab).
When accessing your account from our WebApp(new tab), you can find the chat in the bottom right corner.¬†

Or from your paired smartphone, go to üë§ My Account then Support. Then scroll down and tap Support chat under Get in touch.¬†

You‚Äôll then see your place in the queue. Keep your Mastercard close by, it's optional but you'll get faster service.
Our chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.
Please visit this article if you represent a bank or an authority and need to contact N26(new tab).

title: ¬øC√≥mo protege mi dinero N26?
content: La¬†protecci√≥n de dep√≥sitos alemana(pesta√±a nueva)¬†asegura todos los dep√≥sitos de¬†hasta 100.000 ‚Ç¨¬†para todos los miembros de la Uni√≥n Europea. Como titulares de una licencia bancaria, N26 ha de cumplir todas las normas de las autoridades regulatorias financieras alemanas.

title: How do I add money to my N26 account?
content:
We make it easy to fund your N26 account. You can add money via several methods, including direct deposit, transfer from external bank, external bank account to N26 (ACH transfer) debit card transfer (non funded accounts only), and MoneyBeam, to name a few. Please look below for more information. 
Direct Deposit:  If you intend to fund your account via direct deposit, simply provide the sender (your employer, financial institution, Armed Forces, Social Security, etc.) with our ABA routing number (122287675) and your personal N26 account number.¬†
You can locate your account number by clicking on the ‚ÄúMy Account‚Äù option on the top right side of the website (and the mobile application) after logging into your N26 account.
In case your employer needs a direct deposit form, please click here(new tab).¬†

Transfer from external bank:  Transfer money from your external bank into your N26 account, conveniently, from within the N26 mobile application.
To transfer funds to your N26 account using the N26 mobile application, follow these steps:
Launch your N26 mobile application.
Tap the Actions button at the bottom right of your mobile's screen.
Tap on Add Money.
Tap External bank transfer
Select the account to use to transfer funds from.
Enter the amount you want to transfer.
Tap Continue.
Enter your 4 digit Confirmation PIN.
Tap Confirm transfer to initiate the transfer.
A message will be displayed in your Transaction List indicating that the transfer is scheduled.

External Bank Account to N26 (ACH transfer):  Transfer funds directly from your primary bank account into your N26 account with an ACH Transfer.
Log into your financial institution's online banking platform or mobile app (if applicable).
Locate the ‚ÄúExternal Transfers‚Äù or ‚ÄúTransfer Money‚Äù or ‚ÄúExternal Account‚Äù or similar option and add your N26 checking account as a new account.
The bank account originating the transfer does not have to be under your name. However, please make sure that the recipient‚Äôs name is your full name as entered during the account sign-up process.
Input our ABA routing number (122287675) and your personal checking account number.
You can locate your account number by clicking on the ‚ÄúMy Account‚Äù option on the top right side of the website or by clicking the icon in the mobile app, after logging into your N26 account.
Your financial institution may make a small test deposit(s) into your N26 account, within a few days, to verify your account. Typically, to complete the process, you may have to confirm the test deposit(s) with the originating financial institution.
Upon completing the initial process, you should be able to transfer funds in or out of your N26 account using the third party banks fund transfer feature.
¬†Note:¬†
Please be advised that these are general guidelines and your financial institution‚Äôs requirements may differ.
Some banks may experience issues processing money transfers to the routing number 122287675. At this time, ACH bank transfers from Capital One and from USAA are not available to fund your N26 account. If you encounter this issue, please use another bank account to transfer money into your N26 account.

Debit card transfer (Non Funded Accounts Only):  Use a debit card to instantly fund your account right from the app. This is the fastest and simplest way to add money to your N26 account with a free, one-time transaction. Just log into the iOS or Android app and follow the instructions on the main screen.
This option is available to customers who have not previously funded their N26 account. 
Find additional details in this document(new tab). 

MoneyBeam:  Instantly send money to (or receive money from) other N26 members. Find additional details in our "What is MoneyBeam?(new tab)" article. 

Third party payment processors
Put money into your account using these services:
Cash App(new tab)
PayPal(new tab)
Venmo(new tab)
Zelle¬Æ(new tab)
Ingo Money(new tab) (mobile check cashing service)
Apple Cash¬Æ:  You can transfer money from Apple Cash into your N26 account.
How can I link my N26 Visa¬Æ debit card to Apple Cash?
You can link your N26 card to Apple Cash by following these steps"
Open "Wallet" on your Apple device.
Select "Apple Cash".
Tap the three dots on the upper right hand corner.
Select "Add Money".
Select "Add Card".
Position your N26 card in the frame to scan.
Tap "next" when the scan is complete.
Enter your card's 3-digit security code.
Tap "Next".
Your card is now linked.
How can I transfer money to my N26 account from Apple Cash?
Transferring money to your N26 account from Apple Cash can be achieved by following these steps:
Select "Transfer to Bank".
Enter the amount you want to transfer.
Select how quickly you want the money transferred.
"Instant Transfer".  There is a fee associated with this option.
"1-3 Business Days".  There is no charge for this option.
Done.

The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: How to block my N26 card?
content:
You can block and unblock your cards at any time in the app. Go to¬†üë§ My Account¬†and select¬†Card settings. There you can decide if you want to temporarily limit or disable your ATM withdrawals, online payments or payments abroad, or block your card entirely.
This way, you have full control of your card and can protect yourself against¬†unauthorized transactions. You should immediately block your card if anything looks suspicious. You can always unblock it later.

If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126.

title: Wie kann ich meine Identit√§t sch√ºtzen?
content:
Um deine pers√∂nlichen Daten zu sch√ºtzen und deren Missbrauch zu vermeiden, beachte bitte Folgendes:
Wir werden dich niemals danach fragen, deine Identit√§t im Namen anderer Personen oder Unternehmen zu √ºberpr√ºfen. Dazu geh√∂ren √úberpr√ºfungen f√ºr Wohnungsmietvertr√§ge, Kreditvergaben oder Stellenangebote (einschlie√ülich Stellen bei N26). F√ºhre den Verifizierungsprozess nur durch, wenn du ein N26 Bankkonto f√ºr dich selbst er√∂ffnen m√∂chtest.
Als Kontoinhaber solltest nur du allein deine Zugangsdaten anlegen und darauf zugreifen k√∂nnen.¬†Erstelle niemals ein N26 Bankkonto mit einer vordefinierten E-Mail-Adresse und einem vordefinierten Passwort. Wenn du von anderen Stellen erhaltene Anmeldedaten verwendest, k√∂nnen diese dazu verwendet werden, um an deine pers√∂nlichen und rechtlichen Informationen zu gelangen. Logge dich auch nie in ein N26 Konto ein, das nicht deines ist.
Sende deinen Ausweis oder Reisepass nicht an unbekannte oder nicht √ºberpr√ºfte Empf√§nger.
Es kann sein, dass wir dich nach bestimmten Dokumenten fragen, wenn deine Transaktion einer Routinepr√ºfung¬†unterzogen wird.¬†Sende nur g√ºltige Unterlagen an verifizierte N26 E-Mailadressen.
Wir werden dich au√üerhalb der N26 App niemals nach deinem Benutzernamen, Passwort oder PIN-Code fragen.¬†Stelle diese Informationen niemals auf einer externen Website oder App zur Verf√ºgung, auch wenn sie N26 √§hnelt.
Solltest du jemals Zweifel haben, eine verd√§chtige Anfrage von einem Dritten erhalten, oder vermuten, dass dein N26 Login missbraucht worden sein k√∂nnte, z√∂gere bitte nicht damit, uns zu kontaktieren.

title: Why didn't I receive my pairing code via SMS?
content:
A pairing code is required to¬†connect your smartphone¬†to your account. If you didn‚Äôt receive this code via SMS for whatever reason, you can request a new one up to five times in the mobile app. Please wait 30 seconds before requesting a new one. 
If all five codes are requested and pairing is still unsuccessful, then for security reasons you‚Äôll be blocked from making further requests for 24 hours. If this happens, you can either wait or contact our Customer Support via chat - who would be happy to help you.
If your country code is outside of the EU, it‚Äôs likely that you‚Äôll need to contact us to receive a pairing code.
