title: Why was I charged more than expected?
content:
All transactions take place in real-time. We'll alert you when any incoming or outgoing transaction happens via push message.
Sometimes a transaction could look suspicious because the final debited amount can differ from the original transaction amount for a few reasons:
A merchant blocks a higher amount for a deposit (for example, at a gas station, or a car rental or hotel booking), and the difference is credited to your account once the deposit is no longer required.
Changes in exchange rates may result in slight differences in the total for transactions made in foreign currencies.
In both cases, we don‚Äôt charge interest for the difference in amounts.
But if you‚Äôre certain that a transaction is unauthorized by you, we could help¬†get your money back.

title: Why are some products and services unavailable to me?
content:
We collaborate with many partners. That‚Äôs why certain products and services require that you meet their requirements as well. The most common reasons why you wouldn‚Äôt be eligible for certain products:
Expired or unsupported identity documents (for example, certain passports due to a lack of security features).
You‚Äôre taxable in the United States. If so, you won‚Äôt be able to use certain invest or savings products. If this is not the case, contact our Customer Support via chat so we can look into your account details. You may need to switch your telephone number if it starts with a North American area code (+1).
You proved your identity using PostIdent (in Germany). We‚Äôll have to reset your account and you‚Äôll have to prove your identity again in order to use certain products and services. If this is the case, we‚Äôll email you about it and find a convenient time for you to do so.
The product or service is not yet available in your country.

title: How to use Google Pay?
content:
Applies to Germany, Spain, Italy, Ireland, Belgium, Slovakia, France, Denmark, Finland, Sweden, Norway, Poland and Switzerland. 
Google Pay is a payment method that allows you to pay with your smartphone so you don‚Äôt have to carry your Mastercard with you all the time.
Google Pay is available in all shops supporting contactless (NFC) payments as well as online shops. Hold your smartphone near the contactless terminal and your payment will automatically process. When paying online, select Google Pay as the payment option. We‚Äôll ask you to confirm your payment via¬†push message¬†during checkout.
Some tips to keep in mind:
To add your N26 Mastercard, download the Google Pay app and select Get Started to enter your card details. You‚Äôll need Android 5.0 (Lollipop) or higher as well as an NFC-capable smartphone.
Google Pay requires a screen lock. If you didn‚Äôt set it up yet, you‚Äôll be asked to before adding your Mastercard to the Google Pay app.
If you‚Äôre protecting your smartphone with a case, you might have to remove it to pay. Some payment terminals don‚Äôt recognize your phone if the case is too big.
If the payment terminal asks you to present your card (again), you might have removed the smartphone too fast or didn‚Äôt hold it close enough. Just try again while keeping this in mind.

title: How do I close my N26 account?
content:
To close your N26 account, please contact us at 1-888-N26-0-N26 (1-888-626-0626) or via chat in our mobile application or WebApp(new tab) and we'll help you take care of it.
A few tips to help speed up the account closure process:
In order to close your account your balance must be zero.
Accounts with a positive balance: If you have a positive balance in your main account or in Spaces, you have a few options to take your balance to zero. Please don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out to us if you need help with any of these options. Please note that direct transfers and/or withdrawals cannot be made directly out of Spaces. Any balance in your Spaces must first be moved into your main account for it to be accessible. 
If you have a balance in a denomination that you can withdraw from an ATM, you can easily take your balance to zero this way (please see our article ‚ÄúAll about Allpoint(new tab)‚Äù for more information).
You can use your N26 debit card to make a purchase that will take your balance to zero.
You can use a third-party payment processor (PayPal, for example) and transfer your remaining balance. 
You can transfer your balance to an external bank account. This can be done by initiating a withdrawal by the external bank from your N26 account. Please see our article ‚ÄúHow to add money to my N26 account(new tab)‚Äù to learn more about linking an external bank account to your N26 account. Please note that the transfer must be initiated at the external bank account. We do not currently offer the ability to transfer funds from your N26 account to an external bank account from within our mobile or web applications. 
Accounts with negative balance: If you have a negative balance, please add funds to bring your balance to $0. Please see our article ‚ÄúHow to add money to my N26 account?(new tab)‚Äù for more information. 
After your account is closed, please destroy your card by cutting it with scissors or a shredder. The chip, NFC antenna, and the magnetic strip should all be cut into pieces and disposed of separately.
Please note that the process of closing your account will take a minimum of 10 business days. We will notify you via email when it is closed.
The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: How to declare my N26 account for my taxes in France?
content:
(Applies to all French residents)
According to the French General Tax Code, all French residents are required to declare any bank accounts they have opened, used, or closed within the year of declaring an income. This includes your N26 bank account. To do this:
In your tax return, check the box Foreign account opened, used or closed (8UU) (Compte √©tranger ouvert, utilis√© ou ferm√©).
Complete the Cerfa n¬∞ 3916(new tab) form and attach it to your tax return.

title: Wie lege ich meine Karten-PIN fest?
content:
Wir senden dir keine PIN per Post; du legst die PIN f√ºr deine Mastercard oder Maestro Card selbst fest, nachdem du dein Smartphone erfolgreich mit deinem Konto verkn√ºpft und deine Karte(n)¬†aktiviert hast. So legst du deine PIN fest oder √§nderst sie:
Gehe zu üë§ Mein Konto
W√§hle Karteneinstellungen und streiche nach links, um eine Karte auszuw√§hlen
W√§hle PIN √§ndern
Gib die 10-stellige Token-Nummer auf deiner Karte ein
W√§hle deine neue PIN und best√§tige sie
Beachte:
Wenn du in Frankreich, Spanien, Irland, Griechenland, Finnland oder Estland wohnst, musst du deine erste Zahlung mit dem Chip und der PIN deiner Karte t√§tigen, um die Karte vollst√§ndig zu aktivieren. Alternativ kannst du daf√ºr an einem Geldautomaten auch deinen Kontostand abfragen oder Geld abheben.
Aus Sicherheitsgr√ºnden akzeptieren wir keine PIN, die Elemente deines Geburtsdatums, deiner Adresse oder eine Kombination aus wiederholten Ziffern oder Zahlenfolgen (z. B. 1111, 1234 oder 4321) enth√§lt. Wenn die von dir gew√§hlte Nummer nicht akzeptiert wird, versuche es bitte erneut mit einer anderen Kombination.
Wird eine PIN dreimal hintereinander falsch eingegeben, wird die Karte aus Sicherheitsgr√ºnden automatisch gesperrt. In diesem Fall wende dich bitte per Chat an unseren Kundenservice, damit wir die Sperre f√ºr dich aufheben k√∂nnen.
Deine Karten-PIN ist eine andere als deine Best√§tigungs-PIN, du kannst jedoch f√ºr beide dieselbe Zahlenkombination w√§hlen.

title: Come posso far accreditare la pensione sul mio conto N26?
content:
Far accreditare la tua pensione sul tuo conto N26 √® molto semplice.¬†
Ecco cosa devi fare:
informa l‚ÄôINPS;

title: Chi pu√≤ ottenere un Conto base?
content:
Puoi aprire un¬†conto corrente N26¬†gratuito nel nostro sito web o scaricando la nostra¬†app.
La legge tedesca sulla mobilit√† bancaria (Zahlungskontengesetz o ZKG) consente inoltre a tutti i cittadini con residenza legale nell‚ÄôUnione europea di avere un conto base. Questo vale per tutti coloro che vivono in un paese supportato.
Il conto base N26 ha un costo di gestione mensile di 6‚Ç¨. Puoi trovare tutte le altre tariffe nei nostri listini prezzi.
Puoi¬†richiederlo¬†se non hai gi√† un conto corrente  conN26 o con un altro istituto bancario in Germania. In alcune circostanze, N26 pu√≤¬†rifiutare la tua richiesta.
Alcuni prodotti e servizi come lo Scoperto N26, N26 Credit, N26 You o N26 Metal ¬†non sono accessibili con un conto base N26.

title: When will my card arrive?
content:
Your card will be sent via USPS and delivery can take up to 5-7 business days. Your card is immediately produced and processed for shipment once you have successfully completed the N26 account sign-up process. If you need to change your address after you have finished the account sign-up process, you will need to order a new card. Our customer support team is available via chat or phone and to assist you with this.
If you need to replace your card for any reason except for card expiration, you can do so through our app or by contacting our customer support team via chat or phone.¬†
Once ordered, your card will be sent via USPS and delivery can take up to 5-7 business days.
Tips for successful delivery:
Make sure to enter a residential address (we do not send cards to business addresses, P.O. boxes, or US territories).
Do not include any spaces when entering the zipcode for your delivery address.
Make sure you include important delivery information (for example, your apartment number, the name on your mailbox).
If you are staying somewhere temporarily (with a friend or in an Airbnb), make sure to include the name on the mailbox that belongs to the main tenant of the apartment.

The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Comment puis-je me faire rembourser apr√®s une transaction frauduleuse ?
content:
Si vous n‚Äô√™tes pas √† l‚Äôorigine d‚Äôune transaction,¬†verrouiller votre carte¬†ne sera pas suffisant. Vous devez agir le plus vite possible et suivre ces √©tapes :
Commander une nouvelle carte et d√©clarer votre carte actuelle comme vol√©e
D√©truisez ensuite votre carte en la d√©coupant. La puce, l‚Äôantenne NFC et la bande magn√©tique devraient √™tre jet√©es s√©par√©ment
Compl√©ter et signer notre formulaire de contestation d‚Äôune transaction par carte(nouvel onglet).
Envoyer ce formulaire √† l'adresse email support@n26.com. Nous √©tudierons ensuite votre dossier pour pouvoir proc√©der au remboursement de la transaction frauduleuse.
Vous pourrez continuer √† utiliser votre compte N26 jusqu‚Äô√† ce que votre nouvelle carte arrive. Si vous avez ouvert votre compte en Allemagne ou en Autriche, vous pourrez √©galement utiliser¬†CASH26¬†pour vos retraits d‚Äôargent.
Veuillez noter que des changements entre le¬†montant final d√©bit√©¬†et la transaction d‚Äôorigine n‚Äôindiquent pas n√©cessairement une transaction frauduleuse.

title: Will my direct debit go through if I'm low on funds?
content:
If your balance can‚Äôt cover a direct debit* when it‚Äôs due, it‚Äôll bounce and you‚Äôll be charged a¬†‚Ç¨3 fee. And if you have a negative account balance, you'll be charged an overdraft interest of 8.9%. It‚Äôs not possible to delay a direct debit.
To avoid this fee in the future, you can instantly check whether you‚Äôre eligible for an¬†Overdraft¬†directly in the app (available in Germany and Austria).
*For Poland, Sweden, Denmark, and Norway only: if you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and ultimate amount that is collected from us.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: Wie kann ich meinen Kreditantrag widerrufen?
content:
Der Widerruf von¬†N26 Credit¬†Darlehen ist kostenlos und innerhalb von 14 Tagen nach Unterzeichnung eines Kreditvertrages m√∂glich.
Wir ben√∂tigen eine schriftliche Best√§tigung deiner Widerrufsanfrage, daher ist es am besten, wenn du mit uns chattest. Ab hier k√ºmmern wir uns darum; wir benachrichtigen dich per E-Mail, wenn der Vertrag aufgehoben wurde.
Bitte stelle sicher, dass der volle Betrag deines Guthabens auf deinem Konto verf√ºgbar ist, bis der Widerruf abgeschlossen ist.
Wenn dein Guthaben von einem unserer Partner ausgezahlt wird, wende dich bitte direkt an diesen. Wir arbeiten mit auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) in Deutschland und Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99) in Frankreich zusammen.

title: Why didn't an ATM give me cash?
content:
It happens: you go to an ATM, the requested amount is deducted from your balance, but the machine doesn‚Äôt give you cash. 
First, check your card limits by going to üë§ My Account and selecting Card settings. Make sure ATM withdrawals are active. 
While we can‚Äôt say for sure why it happened, we can definitely help get your money back. The amount that was deducted from your balance is only an authorization (a reservation or blocked amount). Because the transaction wasn‚Äôt successful, this reserved amount will expire either in a few hours or a maximum of 12 working days and return to your balance. 
If the reserved amount doesn‚Äôt expire after 12 working days, please complete a dispute form. We‚Äôll do our best to get the money back for you. 
In the meantime, we suggest you try another ATM from a different operator. This rarely happens twice in a row.

title: How to change my confirmation PIN?
content:
You can change your¬†Confirmation PIN¬†at any time in the app:
Go to üë§ My Account then: Settings and Security (mobile app) or Security Settings (WebApp(new tab))
Select Change Confirmation PIN
Enter the 10-digit token number on your Mastercard
Create and confirm your new Confirmation PIN
If you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times, you'll need to reset it before trying again.
For security reasons, your PIN can‚Äôt contain parts of your date of birth or your address, repeated numbers (such as 1111, 111, or 11), or sequences (such as 1234 or 4321). If the PIN you‚Äôve chosen is not accepted, please try again using a different one.
Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial(new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube(new tab) channel.

content:

title: Shared Spaces - Was ist eine Kontovollmacht?
content:
Shared Spaces sind keine Gemeinschaftskonten im klassischen Sinn. Sie funktionieren durch die Erteilung einer Kontovollmacht.
Die Person, die die anderen Teilnehmer dazu berechtigt, in dessen Namen zu handeln, wird ‚ÄúBesitzer‚Äù genannt. Diese Person ist und bleibt der alleinige Kontoinhaber. Der Besitzer muss ein N26 Premium-Kunde sein, das hei√üt N26 You, N26 Metal oder N26 Business You nutzen.
Teilnehmer eines Shared Space sind nicht Kontoinhaber des Shared Space. Durch die Erteilung der Kontovollmacht erhalten alle Teilnehmer das Recht, im Namen des Besitzers √ºber die Gelder innerhalb des Shared Spaces zu verf√ºgen.
Das bedeutet, dass diejenige Person, die den Shared Space erstellt hat, dessen alleiniger Inhaber ist. Der Besitzer eines Shared Space

ist Besitzer des gesamten Guthabens auf dem Shared Space.
kann √ºber die Gelder des Shared Space jederzeit verf√ºgen.
kann andere Teilnehmer einladen, indem er ihnen eine Kontovollmacht erteilt.
kann die Kontovollmacht eines Teilnehmers jederzeit widerrufen.
kann einen Shared Space schlie√üen, nachdem alle Teilnehmer entfernt worden sind (in diesem Fall werden alle Gelder innerhalb des Shared Space dem Hauptkonto des Besitzers gutgeschrieben).

Die Erteilung der Kontovollmacht hat zur Folge, dass der jeweilige Teilnehmer vollen Zugriff auf das gesamte Guthaben des Shared Space hat. Das bedeutet, dass auch die Teilnehmer eines Shared Spaces √ºber alle dort verbuchten Gelder frei verf√ºgen k√∂nnen.
Die N26 Bank GmbH kann nicht haftbar gemacht werden f√ºr Zahlungen, die von einer Kontovollmacht gedeckt sind.
Was sind Shared Spaces?
Wie kann ich Teilnehmer zu einem Shared Space hinzuf√ºgen oder davon entfernen?

title: ¬øPuedo abrir una cuenta si vivo fuera de la zona euro?
content:
Si vives en Dinamarca, Islandia, Liechtenstein, Noruega, Polonia, Suecia o Suiza tienes la posibilidad de abrir una cuenta con nosotros. Te ofrecemos: 
La opci√≥n de elegir entre una cuenta N26 Est√°ndar o N26 Business. 
Una cuenta en euros, un IBAN alem√°n, transferencias SEPA o Moneybeam.

title: Warum funktioniert meine Video-Verifizierung nicht?
content:
Einige Tipps f√ºr eine erfolgreiche Video-Verifizierung:
Die meisten Anrufe scheitern aufgrund einer schwachen Internetverbindung oder schlechter Bildqualit√§t (z.B. zu verschwommen oder unterbelichtet). Bitte f√ºhre den Anruf in einer hellen Umgebung durch, verwende ein Smartphone mit einer guten Kamera und stelle sicher, dass du eine schnelle Internetverbindung hast.
Bitte gehe sicher, dass du die einzige Person im Video bist.
Du musst in einem unserer unterst√ºtzten L√§nder leben, um ein Konto bei uns er√∂ffnen zu k√∂nnen.
Wir akzeptieren nur nationale Ausweise und Reisep√§sse (F√ºhrerscheine oder Aufenthaltsgenehmigungen sind nicht zul√§ssig). Stelle au√üerdem sicher, dass dein Ausweisdokument unbesch√§digt ist.
Sobald deine Identit√§tspr√ºfung abgeschlossen ist, senden wir dir deine N26 Mastercard zu. Die Lieferzeit betr√§gt 10 Tage.
Du erreichst uns im Chat t√§glich von 07:00 - 23:00 Uhr, auch an Sonn- und Feiertagen.

title: Shared Spaces - Vertrauensw√ºrdiger Empf√§nger
content:
Vertrauensw√ºrdige Empf√§nger eines Shared Spaces k√∂nnen:
Geld von ihren eigenen Spaces (inklusive anderer Shared Spaces, in denen sie Teilnehmer sind) zu einem Shared Space √ºberweisen.
Jederzeit frei auf das Guthaben eines Shared Spaces zugreifen.
Einen Shared Space jederzeit verlassen.
√úberweisungen zwischen vertrauensw√ºrdigen Empf√§ngern und einem Shared Space m√ºssen nicht mit einer PIN und Push-Nachricht autorisiert werden. Das bedeutet, dass die Empf√§nger per Drag-and-Drop Geld verschieben k√∂nnen, √§hnlich wie bei normalen Space-Transaktionen in der N26 App oder WebApp.
Warum muss ich einen Besitzer oder einen Teilnehmer als vertrauensw√ºrdigen Empf√§nger bestimmen?
Das europ√§ische Bankrecht regelt, wie Bank√ºberweisungen autorisiert werden m√ºssen. Hiernach ist die Anwendung einer starken Kundenauthentifizierung (SCA) eine Ma√ünahme, um Online-Zahlungen sicherer zu machen.¬†
Eine Ausnahme hiervon bildet die Klassifizierung einer Person in einem Shared Space als "vertrauensw√ºrdigen Empf√§nger". √úberweisungen an diese Person bed√ºrfen keiner starken Kundenauthentifizierung.
Was sind Shared Spaces?
Wie kann ich Teilnehmer zu einem Shared Space hinzuf√ºgen oder davon entfernen?

title: What to do if my account was hacked?
content:
If you suspect possible fraudulent activity on your account, please contact us as soon as possible. Our chat function is available in the app, on the N26 website(new tab), and at the end of some of our Support Center articles, such as this one. Just click on Start a chat. 
If you‚Äôd rather speak on the phone, you can request this during the chat. We‚Äôll arrange a callback within the hour so we can discuss the matter further with you. Once in contact with one of our agents, please thoroughly explain the situation to us.  Every detail here is important. 

Please be assured that we‚Äôll take all necessary measures to assist you in this situation. 
In addition to our legal obligations for fraud prevention, and in order to continually improve our security safeguards, we have a dedicated team who analyzes each fraud case individually. The fraud cases themselves are often relatively complicated and have to be dealt with in detail. Depending on the complexity, this can take a few days, but in some cases it can take several weeks.
Finally, if you have evidence or strong feelings that the account might have been hacked, we recommend that you file a police report as well.
To learn more about how we protect your account in case of fraud, visit our blog article(new tab). Visit our page about Security at N26(new tab) to discover our commitment to protect your funds and your account.
Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.
If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126.

title: How to declare my N26 account for my taxes in France?
content:
(Applies to all French residents)
According to the French General Tax Code, all French residents are required to declare any bank accounts they have opened, used, or closed within the year of declaring an income. This includes your N26 bank account. To do this:
In your tax return, check the box Foreign account opened, used or closed (8UU) (Compte √©tranger ouvert, utilis√© ou ferm√©).
Complete the Cerfa n¬∞ 3916(new tab) form and attach it to your tax return.

title: How to prove my identity?
content:
As a licensed bank, it‚Äôs important that we know who our customers are. That‚Äôs why we request our customers to prove their identity with a supported ID document when they open an account or use certain products.
We would never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. We‚Äôve gathered other tips to help you protect your identity.
There are two different ways you can show us your ID, and we've also collected some troubleshooting tips for each: photo and video. The method you can choose to show us your ID depends on your nationality, your country of residence, and the type of ID you use:
I live in Germany(new tab)
I live in Spain(new tab)
I live in a different country(new tab)
If your ID isn't on the list, it means we cannot offer you an account with us at the time. We take identity verification very seriously and our Customer Support will not be able to make an exception for you regarding the supported documents.
But we're always adding new documents to this list so it's worth checking back to see if yours has been added.
In case your residential address is in Germany and you're unable to complete your photo or video verification due to a disability, please start the registration process by entering your details and then contact our Customer Support. We're happy to assist you.
Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.¬†

title: What are Shared Spaces?
content:
Shared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 users to share money together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.
Shared Spaces are available to N26 premium users (You / Business You / Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their Space. 
Participants can be any N26 account holder regardless of their account type.
The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.
The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants for their space.
Similar to regular Spaces, Shared Spaces have neither an IBAN nor a card attached to them.

title: ¬øPor qu√© N26 hace controles en las transacciones?
content:
Tenemos la responsabilidad de realizar controles rutinarios en cuentas y transacciones para asegurar la seguridad de tu cuenta (ver¬†GwG ¬ß 10(pesta√±a nueva)). Estos controles se basan en transacciones individuales y los inicia nuestro sistema de forma autom√°tica.
Como consecuencia, podemos llegar a pedirte alg√∫n documento. Si recibes una solicitud de este tipo, simplemente env√≠a los documentos necesarios v√≠a Mensajes de N26. No habr√° excepciones ni forma de pasar por alto dichos controles. 
Este es un proceso est√°ndar para todos los bancos que nos permite asegurar la seguridad a nuestros clientes. Tanto el proceso como el resultado son confidenciales y se tratan de forma interna, lo cual nos ayuda a garantizar la seguridad para nuestros clientes y sus transacciones.
Aqu√≠ tienes algunos consejos que te ahorrar√°n tiempo en el proceso:
El documento que necesitas se especifica en el correo que has recibido de N26. Estos documentos nos los puedes enviar escaneados, en fotos o en capturas de pantalla (siempre y cuando el documento est√© claramente legible). Env√≠a tambi√©n una descripci√≥n detallada. 
S√© concreto en tus respuestas, detalles y documentos. Si tus documentos no corroboran claramente tus declaraciones o si omites detalles, tendremos que preguntar otra vez.
Responde lo antes posible y dentro del plazo que se indica en el mensaje. Puedes usar el email que has recibido de N26 para responder directamente y adjuntar los documentos.
El servicio de Atenci√≥n al Cliente de N26 no tiene m√°s informaci√≥n sobre este tema.
Debes proporcionar¬†documentos v√°lidos¬†dependiendo de tu situaci√≥n, a continuaci√≥n puedes ver algunos ejemplos:
Has recibido ayuda econ√≥mica de tu familia para alg√∫n proyecto o has heredado propiedades o dinero: un contrato de concesi√≥n o pr√©stamo, un documento oficial de herencia o un documento oficial de la fuente del pr√©stamo (como por ejemplo los documentos de venta de una propiedad para financiar el pr√©stamo o los extractos bancarios de los parientes que lo otorgan. 
Has vendido una propiedad o acciones en el mercado de valores: el contrato que muestra el acuerdo o el documento oficial del notario respecto a la transacci√≥n de la propiedad. 
Has recibido o enviado dinero para pagar facturas o alg√∫n producto: documentos que demuestren el saldo disponible confirmando la procedencia del dinero o documentos que muestren el uso del dinero para dicho dep√≥sito.
Has recibido el finiquito de tu antigua empresa: documentos que prueben el cese de la actividad, detallando el pago y/o un extracto bancario de tu antigua empresa.

title: Where does N26 invest my money?
content:
We strive to provide our clients' deposits for loans to our customers (provided that they have the appropriate credit rating). For the liquidity not required in the customer business, our investment strategy is low in risk.
We invest our customers' money at short notice with the Deutsche Bundesbank and other European banks in the eurozone with only good risk classes. And we refinance public-law customers mainly in Germany (cities and municipalities) and invest in euro government bonds
We're not a trading book institute. That is: we do not trade for short-term profit.
And we don't engage in speculation, whether on food, foreign exchange, bitcoins or other asset classes.

title: How to upgrade to N26 You?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Poland, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden.
You can upgrade to N26 You¬†during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you have a standard N26 bank account. 
To upgrade to N26 You in the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 You. You can choose between one of our five new colours when ordering a new card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.
Then choose your preferred delivery method, accept the N26 You T&C's(new tab) and your new card will be on the way. 
Standard deliveries take up to 10 business days whereas express deliveries take 3 business days. 
The membership fee of ‚Ç¨9,90 will be deducted directly from your account every month on the date of your upgrade.
The minimum contract period for the N26 You membership is one year. Your membership will automatically renew unless you cancel it up to four weeks before the contract ends. 
You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 14‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.

title: Why isn‚Äôt my photo verification working?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Applies to all regions except Germany
First, geolocation must be enabled. Then review the¬†guide(new tab)¬†we‚Äôve created to help you take the best pictures.
Most photo¬†verifications¬†fail due to bad picture quality.
Complete the process in a bright environment and use a phone with a good camera.
If you're using an Android, ensure a proper auto focus.
Enable or disable your flash according to the surrounding light (only with Android)
Take your selfie with your id document at eye level (the camera and your document should be at the same height as your eyes).
Make sure you‚Äôre the only person in the photo.
Check your document.
We only accept photos of your original ID (photocopies or screenshots are not permitted).
Keep your document on a flat surface and make sure your document is fully visible and the information on it is readable.
We only accept national IDs and passports.
Make sure your document isn't damaged in any way.
If you take a picture of your ID and a selfie and the first attempt doesn‚Äôt go through, you can just start over again.
As soon as your verification is complete, we‚Äôll send you your N26 Mastercard.¬†Deliveries¬†take up to 10 days.
Chat is available Monday to Sunday from 07:00-23:00.¬†

title: How to change my confirmation PIN?
content:
You can change your¬†Confirmation PIN¬†at any time in the app:
Go to üë§ My Account then: Settings and Security (mobile app) or Security Settings (WebApp(new tab))
Select Change Confirmation PIN
Enter the 10-digit token number on your Mastercard
Create and confirm your new Confirmation PIN
If you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times, you'll need to reset it before trying again.
For security reasons, your PIN can‚Äôt contain parts of your date of birth or your address, repeated numbers (such as 1111, 111, or 11), or sequences (such as 1234 or 4321). If the PIN you‚Äôve chosen is not accepted, please try again using a different one.
Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial(new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube(new tab) channel.

title: Comment contacter N26 ?
content:
Si vous souhaitez nous contacter, vous pouvez ouvrir une session Livechat depuis votre application mobile N26, depuis l‚Äôapplication Web N26 ou en visitant certains articles de notre Support Center. En tant que banque mobile, nous ne disposons pas d'agences physiques.

Depuis l‚Äôapplication mobile, rendez vous dans la rubrique¬†üë§ Mon compte¬†puis appuyez sur¬†Aide, ensuite, faites d√©filer vers le bas et appuyez sur¬†Livechat.
Depuis l‚Äôapplication Web N26(nouvel onglet), une fois connect√© √† votre compte, vous trouverez le Livechat en bas √† droite de votre √©cran. Il vous suffit de cliquer sur¬†Besoin d‚Äôaide ?.
Vous pourrez voir votre place dans la file d‚Äôattente avant qu‚Äôun de nos agents vous r√©ponde. Conservez votre Mastercard pr√®s de vous, c'est optionnel mais nous pourrons vous assister plus rapidement.
Si vous repr√©sentez une banque ou une autorit√© veuillez consulter notre article Je repr√©sente une banque ou une autorit√© et je dois contacter N26(nouvel onglet).

title: Why was I charged more than expected?
content:
All transactions take place in real-time. We'll alert you when any incoming or outgoing transaction happens via push message.
Sometimes a transaction could look suspicious because the final debited amount can differ from the original transaction amount for a few reasons:
A merchant blocks a higher amount for a deposit (for example, at a gas station, or a car rental or hotel booking), and the difference is credited to your account once the deposit is no longer required.
Changes in exchange rates may result in slight differences in the total for transactions made in foreign currencies.
In both cases, we don‚Äôt charge interest for the difference in amounts.
But if you‚Äôre certain that a transaction is unauthorized by you, we could help¬†get your money back.

title: What are the benefits of N26 You?
content:
Once you upgrade to N26 You, you‚Äôll receive 10 additional¬†Spaces¬†and the option to choose one of our five new card colours: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate. 
N26 You customers are also covered under the premium account's¬†insurance package provided by Allianz Global Assistance*, which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:
Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.

Snow and mountain rescue.¬†Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.
Car, bike and scooter sharing. Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.
Extra card. You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 14‚Ç¨ through your N26 app. 
If you‚Äôre an N26 You customer, or if you want to upgrade to N26 You, you‚Äôll have the possibility to choose one of our five new colors when ordering a new card: 
Keep these in mind when considering¬†N26 You(new tab):
The N26 You Mastercard has no embossing: the card details, including the number, CVV code, and 10-digit token are printed on the back.
If you upgrade to N26 You, the monthly fee of ‚Ç¨9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade. If you‚Äôre a new customer, the first fee will be deducted 15 days after you prove your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on your sign-up date. Meaning that, if you opened your account at the end of the month, the first two  monthly fees will be charged the following month.
The minimum membership is one year. Your contract automatically renews if you don‚Äôt cancel your membership at least 4 weeks before the contract expires.
You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 14‚Ç¨ through your N26 app. 

*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: ¬øQu√© hace N26 con mi informaci√≥n fiscal?
content:
La OCDE (Organizaci√≥n para la Cooperaci√≥n y el Desarrollo Econ√≥micos) requiere cierta informaci√≥n fiscal que ha de ser compartida por medio del¬†Est√°ndar Com√∫n de Reporte(pesta√±a nueva)¬†(ECR). Para cumplir esta obligaci√≥n, debemos establecer en qu√© pa√≠s est√°s sujeto a impuestos. Lo hacemos mediante tu n√∫mero de informaci√≥n fiscal o seguridad social.
Reenviamos toda esta informaci√≥n mediante la oficina Federal de Impuestos de Alemania a las autoridades fiscales de otros pa√≠ses si:
Vives en un pa√≠s integrado en el ECR (Est√°ndar Com√∫n de Reporte).
Tienes una direcci√≥n postal o una segunda direcci√≥n en otro pa√≠s integrado en el ECR.
Al registrarte proporcionaste un n√∫mero de tel√©fono perteneciente a un pa√≠s no integrado en el ECR.
Tienes una transferencia programada o haces pagos frecuentes a una cuenta en otro pa√≠s integrado en el ECR.
Tambi√©n enviamos datos al¬†IRS (Internal Revenue Service)(pesta√±a nueva)¬†de los Estados Unidos, de acuerdo con¬†FATCA (Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act)(pesta√±a nueva). Puede que te pidamos el n√∫mero de la Seguridad Social para verificar tu estado fiscal en Estados Unidos, en los siguientes escenarios:
Eres ciudadano de los Estados Unidos (incluidas las personas con doble nacionalidad).
Al registrarte proporcionaste un n√∫mero de tel√©fono de los Estados Unidos.
Naciste en los Estados Unidos (o en una embajada de los Estados Unidos en el extranjero).
Te has casado con una persona de nacionalidad estadounidense.
Has facilitado una direcci√≥n en Estados Unidos.
Realizas pagos regulares a los Estados Unidos.
Para actualizar tu informaci√≥n fiscal o el n√∫mero de la seguridad social en la app N26:
Ve a¬†üë§ Mi cuenta >¬†Configuraciones¬†y pulsa en¬†Configuraci√≥n Personal.
Selecciona¬†Configuraci√≥n personal¬†y luego¬†Informaci√≥n de Impuestos.
Elige el pa√≠s en el que est√°s sujeto a pagar impuestos.
Introduce tu n√∫mero de identificaci√≥n fiscal o tu n√∫mero de la Seguridad Social.
Informaci√≥n importante
En Alemania necesitamos tu Steueridentifikationsnummer de 11 d√≠gitos, no el Steuernummer de 9 d√≠gitos.
Si no est√°s sujeto a pagar impuestos en otro pa√≠s, contacta con nosotros para que podamos comprobarlo.
En todos y cada uno de los casos, tu informaci√≥n personal se mantendr√° almacenada de forma segura y ser√° utilizada √∫nicamente para cumplir con los requisitos del ECR y FATCA.
No estamos capacitados para asesorarte en tu estado fiscal. Si est√°s inseguro, h√°blalo con un asesor de impuestos.
Si ingresaste el pa√≠s en el que est√°s sujeto a impuestos pero no tu n√∫mero de identificaci√≥n fiscal, elimina el pa√≠s de la lista que se muestra en la app, vuelve a seleccionar el pa√≠s e ingresa de nuevo tu n√∫mero de identificaci√≥n fiscal.

title: Why can't I get an overdraft?
content:
Many factors are considered toward your¬†creditworthiness¬†including your SCHUFA or CRIF score (we let both know about any overdraft requests). Being a long-time customer or making your N26 account your¬†main account¬†will have a positive impact on your overdraft application.
This decision is an automated process. If you don‚Äôt qualify right now, you can apply again another time when your financial circumstances have changed. 
If you'd like more information, here's how you can get in touch with us.

title: N26 pu√≤ chiudere il mio account?
content:
In breve: s√¨.
Possiamo chiudere il tuo conto in 3 modi (con 2 mesi di preavviso, 14 giorni di preavviso o immediatamente). Queste cancellazioni sono definitive: la nostra assistenza clienti non pu√≤ fornire alcun tipo di informazione riguardo le singole decisioni di cancellazione account e non pu√≤ influenzare la decisione. Anche tu puoi cancellare la tua relazione con noi in ogni momento, immediatamente, senza alcuna motivazione. Ogni tassa rimanente dovr√† essere pagata prima della cessazione del rapporto.
2 mesi di preavviso
Abbiamo il diritto di terminare qualsiasi relazione commerciale con 2 mesi di preavviso, senza una causa precisa (guarda la sezione 12 paragrafo (1) dei nostri¬†T&Cs(nuova tabella)¬†o ¬ß 675h del Codice Civile Tedesco).
14 giorni di preavviso
Abbiamo il diritto di terminare qualsiasi relazione lavorativa con 14 giorni di preavviso (guarda la sezione 12 paragrafo (2) dei nostri¬†T&Cs(nuova tabella)) se viene data una causa ragionevole che riguarda una violazione dei doveri contrattuali. Ci√≤ pu√≤ includere:
Utilizzo di un conto personale per scopi commerciali.
¬†
Secondo i nostri T & C, un conto personale pu√≤ essere utilizzato solo per uso privato. Qualsiasi trasferimento di credito relativo a compensi professionali per servizi forniti e / o prodotti venduti sono considerati transazioni commerciali. Se desideri utilizzare il tuo conto per questo scopo, registrati per un conto N26 Business or N26 Business You.¬†

Fornire informazioni errate o insufficienti per un controllo di routine.
¬†
Siamo una banca quindi a volte eseguiamo controlli sulle transazioni. Se non fornisci informazioni corrette e / o sufficienti sulla transazione in questione, abbiamo il diritto di interrompere il rapporto commerciale, per essere conforme alle normative finanziarie tedesche.

Visualizzazione di comportamenti abusivi nei confronti di dipendenti N26.
¬†
Non tolleriamo comportamenti offensivi nei confronti dei nostri dipendenti. La minaccia di danno fisico o di comportamento abusivo generale pu√≤ essere considerata un reato secondo la legge tedesca e sar√† segnalata alla rispettiva autorit√† senza eccezioni.
Cancellazione immediata
Potremmo anche interrompere qualsiasi relazione commerciale su base straordinaria (vedi la sezione 12 paragrafo (2) dei nostri¬†T&Cs(nuova tabella)). Ci√≤ significa: in qualsiasi momento, senza preavviso e senza un periodo di cancellazione in cui vi sia una causa ragionevole per tale decisione. Si include:
Fornire dichiarazioni errate a N26 sulla tua situazione finanziaria, soprattutto quando richiedi un credito
Non puoi ripagare il tuo prestito o qualsiasi debito verso N26
Non rispetti le richieste di N26 sul tuo prestito (vedi disposizione o aumento della sicurezza, sezione 13 (2) dei nostri¬†T&Cs(nuova tabella)).

content:

If you‚Äôd rather speak on the phone, you can request this during the chat. We‚Äôll arrange a callback within the hour so we can discuss the matter further with you. Once in contact with one of our agents, please thoroughly explain the situation to us.  Every detail here is important. 

Please be assured that we‚Äôll take all necessary measures to assist you in this situation. 
In addition to our legal obligations for fraud prevention, and in order to continually improve our security safeguards, we have a dedicated team who analyzes each fraud case individually. The fraud cases themselves are often relatively complicated and have to be dealt with in detail. Depending on the complexity, this can take a few days, but in some cases it can take several weeks.
Finally, if you have evidence or strong feelings that the account might have been hacked, we recommend that you file a police report as well.
To learn more about how we protect your account in case of fraud, visit our blog article(new tab). Visit our page about Security at N26(new tab) to discover our commitment to protect your funds and your account.
Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.
If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126.

title: Wie k√ºndige ich meine N26 You oder N26 Metal Mitgliedschaft?
content:
N26 You(neuen Tab) oder¬†N26 Metal(neuen Tab)¬†Mitgliedschaften haben eine Laufzeit von einem Jahr. Die Mitgliedschaft verl√§ngert sich automatisch um ein weiteres Jahr, wenn du sie nicht k√ºndigst. 
In diesem Artikel erkl√§ren wir dir den Unterschied zwischen Widerruf, K√ºndigung der Mitgliedschaft und K√ºndigung der Erneuerung. Du kannst:
Deine Mitgliedschaft innerhalb der 14-t√§gigen Widerrufsfrist vollst√§ndig widerrufen
Deine Mitgliedschaft zu einem beliebigen Zeitpunkt bis einen Monat vor Laufzeitende k√ºndigen
Die automatische Erneuerung deiner Mitgliedschaft bis einen Monat vor Laufzeitende k√ºndigen
So funktioniert‚Äôs im Detail:
Du kannst deine Mitgliedschaft innerhalb der 14-t√§gigen Widerrufsfrist stornieren. Er√∂ffne dazu einfach einen Live-Chat aus der App oder WebApp und wir helfen dir gerne weiter.
Beachte, dass du dich nach einer vorzeitigen Beendigung nicht mehr f√ºr die gleiche Mitgliedschaft anmelden kannst.
Wenn du deine Mitgliedschaft sofort oder zu einem bestimmten Zeitpunkt k√ºndigen m√∂chtest, der *einen Monat vor der Erneuerung und nach der zweiw√∂chigen Widerrufsfrist liegt, kontaktiere uns bitte.
Wenn du diese Option w√§hlst, enden auch alle Vorteile von N26 You oder N26 Metal vorzeitig, wie z. B. deinen Versicherungsschutz.
Du kannst die automatische Erneuerung bis zu 4 Wochen vor Ablauf deiner N26 You oder N26 Metal Mitgliedschaft k√ºndigen. So funktioniert‚Äôs:
Logge dich in die mobile App ein und gehe zu üë§ Mein Konto
W√§hle N26 You/Metal aus
Tippe auf Details der Mitgliedschaft und dann auf Mitgliedschaft k√ºndigen
(hier siehst du auch das Ende der Vertragslaufzeit)
Best√§tige die Stornierung √ºber die Push-Mitteilung, die wir dir senden
Du kannst deine N26 You oder N26 Metal Mastercard bis zum Ablauf deiner Mitgliedschaft voll nutzen. Das bedeutet, dass du deinen Versicherungsschutz so lange beh√§ltst, wie du deinen Mitgliedsbeitrag bezahlen musst. Danach funktioniert deine Mastercard genauso wie die Standardkarte, jedoch ohne die Vorteile. Wir schicken dir automatisch eine Standardkarte, bevor dein Vertrag endet. Dazu brauchst du uns nicht zu kontaktieren.
8 Wochen vor der Erneuerung erinnern wir dich noch einmal per Push-Nachricht.
Wenn du dein Konto endg√ºltig schlie√üen m√∂chtest, sieh dir unseren Artikel Wie kann ich mein Konto schlie√üen? an.

title: ¬øC√≥mo verificar mi identidad?
content:
Como banco, necesitamos saber qui√©n eres. Por ello necesitas demostrar tu identidad mediante un pasaporte o un carnet de identidad cuando te das de alta o al usar ciertos productos.
Nunca te pediremos que verifiques tu identidad a nombre de otras personas o empresas. Aqu√≠ tenemos una recopilaci√≥n de consejos para ayudarte a proteger tu identidad.
Puedes verificar tu identidad de dos formas diferentes y hemos recopilado algunos consejos para cada una de ellas:¬†foto y¬†v√≠deo. El m√©todo con el que demuestras tu identidad depende de tu nacionalidad, de tu pa√≠s de residencia y del tipo de documento que utilices:
Vivo en Espa√±a(pesta√±a nueva)
Vivo en Alemania(pesta√±a nueva)
Vivo en otro pa√≠s(pesta√±a nueva)
Si tu pasaporte o tu carnet de identidad no est√°n en nuestra lista, quiere decir que no podemos ofrecerte una cuenta por el momento. Nos tomamos la verificaci√≥n de la identidad muy en serio. Si tu documento de identidad no est√° en nuestras listas, nuestro Servicio de Atenci√≥n al Cliente no podr√° hacer una excepci√≥n por ti.
De todas formas, estamos a√±adiendo documentos a esta lista constantemente, de modo que merece la pena comprobar de vez en cuando si se ha a√±adido el tuyo.
El chat est√° disponible todos los d√≠as de 07:00 a 23:00, domingos y festivos incluidos.

title: Security
content: The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. title: Come posso richiedere la giacenza media?
content:
Con giacenza media si intende il saldo medio depositato su un conto corrente in un anno. Viene determinata sulla base degli estratti conto relativi al periodo di riferimento, sommando tutte le giacenze giornaliere e dividendo il totale per 365.¬†
Pu√≤ essere richiesto anche se il conto √® stato aperto da meno di un anno.
La giacenza media viene richiesta per poter compilare il modello ISEE e ottenere prestazioni agevolate in ambito sociale.¬†
Richiedere la giacenza media del tuo conto N26 √® molto semplice. Sar√† sufficiente:
aver aperto un conto con N26 nell‚Äôanno di riferimento;
avere l‚Äôindirizzo di residenza in Italia;
Se hai bisogno di conoscere la giacenza media relativa all‚Äôanno scorso, contattaci via chat tramite l‚Äôapp N26. Riceverai il calcolo della tua giacenza media via email in circa 3 giorni lavorativi.

title: Comment contacter N26 ?
content:
Si vous souhaitez nous contacter, vous pouvez ouvrir une session Livechat depuis votre application mobile N26, depuis l‚Äôapplication Web N26 ou en visitant certains articles de notre Support Center. En tant que banque mobile, nous ne disposons pas d'agences physiques. 
Le Livechat est disponible du lundi au dimanche de 07:00 √† 23:00 h.
Depuis l‚Äôapplication mobile, rendez vous dans la rubrique¬†üë§ Mon compte¬†puis appuyez sur¬†Aide, ensuite, faites d√©filer vers le bas et appuyez sur¬†Livechat.
Depuis l‚Äôapplication Web N26(nouvel onglet), une fois connect√© √† votre compte, vous trouverez le Livechat en bas √† droite de votre √©cran. Il vous suffit de cliquer sur¬†Besoin d‚Äôaide ?.
Vous pourrez voir votre place dans la file d‚Äôattente avant qu‚Äôun de nos agents vous r√©ponde. Conservez votre Mastercard pr√®s de vous, c'est optionnel mais nous pourrons vous assister plus rapidement.
Si vous repr√©sentez une banque ou une autorit√© veuillez consulter notre article Je repr√©sente une banque ou une autorit√© et je dois contacter N26(nouvel onglet).

title: How to manage my visibility as an N26 user?
content:
To grant you access to all our in-app features, N26 matches your contact data with other N26 users.
In order to manage your consent to be seen as a N26 user, you can simply go to üë§ My Account in the app and selecting Settings then Personal Settings and Personal information. Then just check or uncheck the box ‚ÄúI agree to be identifiable for other users as N26 customer‚Äù.
All of your contacts who have an N26 account set to visible will show up in the in-app contact list. Similarly, you‚Äôll also appear in the list of other N26 customers who have your contact information. Your contact list is not permanently stored by N26 and is only used when accessing the respective N26 feature.
You can access to all our in-app features,¬†e.g.¬†MoneyBeam, which carries out real-time transactions without¬†typing in a 22-digit IBAN, but only by selecting a name from your contact list. Vice versa, you can also request money from people in your contact list who then only have to accept (or decline) your request. Also, being visible¬†enables you to use Shared Spaces, a sub-account, which you can share with other N26 users¬†selected from your contact list.

title: How to reorder a card?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Deliveries normally take up to 10 working days. Deliveries may take longer in some specific areas in the following countries: Estonia, Greece, Italy, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia and Spain.
If you‚Äôre waiting for your first card¬† and it has been more than 10 working days since you've successfully completed your identity verification, please contact us via live chat.
¬†For any other reason, please re-order your card via the N26 app.
First, check and update your shipping address
You can do this within the N26 app: üë§ My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Shipping Address.
To reorder your card go to Actions and tap Card Settings.¬†
From your list of cards, swipe until you see the card you wish to reorder and select Reorder.¬†¬†
Note that the Standard and the N26 You replacement cards have a fee of ‚Ç¨6 for standard shipping and ‚Ç¨25 for express shipping. For N26 Metal cards, the fee is ‚Ç¨45 for standard shipping. Express delivery for Metal cards is not available.
Once you‚Äôve ordered your new card, you can activate a digital version while your card is on its way. You can do this within the N26 app by scrolling to your card in Card Settings and adding it to the mobile wallet of choice. This feature is available for 30 days starting from the day your card has been ordered. After this you'll need to activate your physical card through the N26 app. Once the physical card is activated, your mobile wallet will continue working normally. If you don‚Äôt activate your physical card during this period, the digital version will expire until your card is activated.
This feature is not be enabled for customers who reorder their card or move to another account without blocking their current card. In these cases their current card will continue working with Apple Pay or Google Pay until the new one is activated.

title: What is MoneyBeam?
content:
MoneyBeam is a service that allows you to send money to (or receive money from) other N26 members.
How can I send money using MoneyBeam?
Launch the N26 mobile app.
Tap the "Actions" icon at the bottom right corner of the screen.
Tap "Send Money" in the Transfer Money section.
Select the contact you are sending a MoneyBeam to.
Enter the amount you are sending in dollars and cents.
Tap "Continue".
Enter an optional, brief message to the recipient (max. 135 characters).
Tap "Send".
Enter your Confirmation PIN to initiate the transfer.
A "Confirm MoneyBeam" screen will be displayed showing the transaction details.
If all is in order, tap "Confirm" to execute the MoneyBeam.
Your Home screen will be displayed showing the MoneyBeam transaction that was just completed.
How can I request money using MoneyBeam?
Launch the N26 mobile app.
Tap the "Actions" icon at the bottom right corner of the screen.
Tap "Request money" in the Transfer Money section.
Select the contact you are requesting a MoneyBeam from.
Enter the amount you are requesting in dollars and cents.
Enter an optional, brief message to the person from whom you are requesting money (max. 135 characters).
Tap "Request".
Your Home screen will be displayed once the request has been successfully sent.
When the requested MoneyBeam is sent to you, an entry will be made in your Transaction List showing the credited amount.
What do I do when I receive a MoneyBeam Request?
When you receive a MoneyBeam Request from another US N26 customer, you can either accept or reject it.  Either way, you will first have to launch the N26 mobile app to see the details of the request.
Your Home screen will be displayed along with a transaction list showing a "Pending transaction" (the MoneyBeam Request).
Tap on the transaction to go to the next screen.
The "Request details" screen will be displayed.  Either accept or decline the request by tapping on the appropriate icon.
If you accept the request, you will be taken to the "Identity Check" screen.
Enter the 4 digit Confirmation PIN that you created earlier.  This will initiate the transfer.
After entering your Confirmation PIN, you will be asked a final time to either confirm or delete the transaction.  Please note:  Once confirmed, the transaction cannot be canceled.
After the transfer is complete, your Home screen will be displayed with a Transaction List showing the funds that were withdrawn from your account.

Related topics
"Can I send a MoneyBeam to a Non-N26 customer?"
Unfortunately, no. MoneyBeam transfers can only occur between N26 customers.
"Can I send a MoneyBeam to a Non-US N26 customer?"
Unfortunately, no. US MoneyBeam transfers can only be made to fellow US N26 customers.
"Do I actively have to opt in to use MoneyBeam?"
Yes, both parties have to actively opt in to use the MoneyBeam feature.
"Are there limits to MoneyBeam?"
Yes. The maximum amount that you can transfer is¬†$3,000 (per transaction), $3,000 daily limit (rolling 24 hours), and a $12,000 monthly limit (= per calendar month).
"Are there fees associated with MoneyBeam?"
No, there are no fees to use MoneyBeam.
"How will this transaction show up in my account?"
Each MoneyBeam transaction will show up as a 2 line item in the transaction detail file. One line will have a positive amount, and the other line will have a negative amount depending on who is sending the money (debited) and who is receiving the money (credited).
"How can I make sure that I am visible/not visible to all of my contacts?"¬†
That's easy! To make sure that you are visible/not visible:
Go to¬†üë§My Account¬†in the application.
Select¬†"Settings"‚Üí"Personal settings"‚Üí"Personal Information".¬†
To allow other N26 users in your contact list to find you for easier transfers, make sure the toggle switch at the bottom of the screen is activated. 
To be invisible, simply deactivate the switch.
"Why can't I see other N26 users on MoneyBeam?"
If you don‚Äôt see a friend on MoneyBeam but you know they are an N26 user:
They most likely haven‚Äôt made themselves visible. Please share the process above with them.
Make sure your friend's contact number/email is the same as the one associated with their N26 account.

All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Comment rejoindre, ajouter ou retirer des participants d‚Äôun espace partag√© ?
content:

Lorsque vous souhaitez rejoindre¬† un espace partag√©, veuillez noter que vous devrez modifier la photo ou/et le nom de votre espace individuel dans le cas o√π ces param√®tres seraient identiques avant de pouvoir accepter l‚Äôinvitation.¬†

title: How to create a barcode for CASH26?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Applies to German, Austrian and Italian T&C
To create a barcode for¬†CASH26:
From the Home screen, select the Actions tab,
Tap CASH26 and choose whether you want to Deposit cash or Withdraw cash,
Enter the amount and your Confirmation PIN,
Confirm the transaction via push message.
Simply show this barcode to a partner representative and you'll either be given cash on the spot or asked for the cash you wanted to deposit. It can take up to 10 minutes until this change is reflected on your bank balance. If you delete the barcode or don't use it within 10 minutes, it‚Äôll expire and be removed from your transaction list automatically.
Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial(new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube(new tab) channel.

title: Can I open an account if I live outside the eurozone?
content:
If you live in Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Liechtenstein, Switzerland or Iceland you may¬†open an account with us. We offer:
The choice between a standard bank account or N26 Business.
Accounts in ‚Ç¨, a German IBAN, and transfers with SEPA or Moneybeam.
Good currency conversion with your Mastercard debit card.
Free shipping of your Mastercard or ‚Ç¨25 for express.
Foreign currency transfers with TransferWise (with the standard account).
5 free ATM withdrawals in ‚Ç¨ in the EU (1.7% markup on foreign currencies withdrawals).
0.1% cashback on all card payments (for Business accounts).
2 Spaces in addition to the main account.
A bonus for every friend you successfully invite to N26 with our Refer a Friend Program.
Contactless payment with Google Pay and Apple Pay.
Tips for incoming and outgoing transfers:
We recommend choosing your local currency to get the best exchange rate when using your Mastercard for purchases or to withdraw cash (if not, additional fees may apply).
To top up your account using your local currency, we recommend converting your currency via SEPA transfer either using TransferWise (on their website(new tab)) or using your local bank.
For outgoing transfers to ‚Ç¨ accounts, simply use the app's internal SEPA transfer. For outgoing transfers to non-‚Ç¨ accounts, use TransferWise in the app.*
*Please note: TransferWise is unavailable for N26 Business accounts (only SEPA transfers in EUR).

title: Why didn't an ATM give me cash?
content:
It happens: you go to an ATM, the requested amount is deducted from your balance, but the machine doesn‚Äôt give you cash. 
First, check your card limits by going to üë§ My Account and selecting Card settings. Make sure ATM withdrawals are active. 
While we can‚Äôt say for sure why it happened, we can definitely help get your money back. The amount that was deducted from your balance is only an authorization (a reservation or blocked amount). Because the transaction wasn‚Äôt successful, this reserved amount will expire either in a few hours or a maximum of 12 working days and return to your balance. 
If the reserved amount doesn‚Äôt expire after 12 working days, please complete a dispute form. We‚Äôll do our best to get the money back for you. 
In the meantime, we suggest you try another ATM from a different operator. This rarely happens twice in a row.

title: How to use Apple Pay?
content:
(Applies to Germany, Austria, France, Italy, Spain, Finland, Ireland, Iceland, Greece, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Portugal, Slovakia, Estonia, Belgium, Poland, Norway, Netherlands, Sweden, Denmark, Switzerland and the UK)
Apple Pay allows you to make payments with your smartphone so you don‚Äôt have to carry your Mastercard everywhere.
We‚Äôve made a¬†video(new tab)¬†to help you set up your N26 Mastercard with Apple Pay.
Some tips to keep in mind:
Your iPhone region matches the country where your Mastercard was first shipped to (you can check your region by selecting Settings then General and Language & Region in your phone).

If you‚Äôve lost your iPhone and aren‚Äôt able to find it again using Find My iPhone, you can always access your iCloud and remove all Apple Pay devices via the web browser on a Mac or PC. In addition, you should turn on Lost Mode to block your Mastercard for Apple Pay. Payments with your physical card will still be possible.

If your N26 Mastercard is unexpectedly removed from Apple Wallet, it may be because you have logged out of your iCloud, turned off Passcode or Touch ID, reset your device to factory settings via iTunes, or deleted all the content and settings from your device. In all cases, you can simply add your card again. Keep in mind that the card won‚Äôt be removed if you update your operating system, reset your personal device settings, or turn off Find My iPhone.

For in-store or online purchases, you must authorize your payment via Touch ID or using your passcode. If you‚Äôre using Apple Watch, authorizations are done by double-clicking on the side button. And if you‚Äôre using your Mac, authorize your payment by using Touch ID via the Touch Bar in the top-right corner of your keyboard.

If you're an N26 Metal or N26 Business You customer, it may happen that the card image displayed in your Apple Wallet shows as an N26 You card (for Metal customers) or as an N26 Business card (for Business You customers). We're working now to resolve this. Rest assured that this does not affect the usability of Apple Pay or your premium membership.

Make sure your device meets the technical requirements by visiting Apple Support(new tab):
iPhone 6 or later, iPhone SE: available in apps, stores and web
Apple Watch paired with iPhone 5 or later: available in apps and stores
iPad Pro, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 3, iPad mini 4: available in apps and web
Macs introduced in 2012 or later (Macs other than the MacBook Pro with Touch Bar and Touch ID require an iPhone or Apple Watch: available in web

title: Puis-je ouvrir un compte N26 si je r√©side hors de la zone euro ?
content:
Si vous r√©sidez en Pologne, Su√®de, Suisse, Danemark, Norv√®ge, Liechtenstein et en Islande, vous pouvez ouvrir un compte bancaire avec N26. Voici un aper√ßu de ce que nous offrons :¬†
Le choix entre un compte personnel ou un compte N26 Business.
Un compte en ‚Ç¨, un IBAN allemand et les virements SEPA ou Moneybeam.
Le taux de change avantageux et une carte de d√©bit Mastercard.

Quelques conseils concernant vos virements entrants et sortants :¬†

Pour alimenter votre compte N26 en euros en utilisant votre devise locale, nous recommandons de convertir votre devise locale en utilisant notre partenaire Transferwise depuis leur site web ou de faire un virement SEPA vers votre compte N26 depuis votre banque locale.
Pour effectuer des virements sortants vers un compte en ‚Ç¨, vous pouvez simplement utiliser la fonctionnalit√© Virement de votre application N26. Pour vos virements sortants vers un compte en devise √©trang√®re, utilisez la fonctionnalit√© Transferwise de votre application N26 en s√©lectionnant la devise du compte vers lequel vous envoyez votre virement*.
*Rappel: TransferWise est uniquement disponible pour les comptes N26 Standard. Seuls les virements SEPA en euros peuvent √™tre effectu√©s.

title: Who can get a Basiskonto?
content:
You can open a free N26 bank account through our website or by downloading our app. 
The German Payment Accounts Act (Zahlungskontengesetz or ZKG) also gives all consumers who legally reside in the European Union the right to hold a basic payment account. This applies to those who live in a supported country.
The N26 Basiskonto comes with a monthly 6‚Ç¨ account management fee. You can find all other fees in our pricing lists. 
If you don‚Äôt have a bank account at N26 or at any other financial institution in Germany yet, you can apply. Under some circumstances, N26 is allowed to reject your request. ¬†
Please note that some products and services such as N26 Overdraft, N26 Credit, N26 You, or N26 Metal are not accessible with an N26 Basiskonto.

content:
Bargeldabhebungen mit deiner Mastercard h√§ngen von dem Land ab, in dem deine AGB gelten (die Adresse, an die du deine Karte urspr√ºnglich hast liefern lassen):

Wenn du mit deiner¬†Maestrocard¬†Bargeld abhebst (nur in Deutschland, √ñsterreich und den Niederlanden verf√ºgbar), f√§llt grunds√§tzlich eine Geb√ºhr von 2 ‚Ç¨ an.
Pr√ºfe unsere¬†Preislisten, wenn dir eine¬†Geldautomatengeb√ºhr berechnet¬†wurde.
