title: What does N26 do with my tax information?
content:
The OECD requires certain tax information to be shared by means of the Common Reporting Standard(new tab) (ECR). To carry out our obligations, we must establish which country you‚Äôre taxable in. We do this through your tax identification or National Insurance number. 
We forward this information via the German Federal Tax Office to tax authorities in other countries if: 
You live in a ECR participating country.
You have a postbox or a second registered address in another ECR participating country.
When registering you gave a telephone number belonging to another ECR participating country.
You have a standing order, or make regular payments, to an account located in another ECR participating country.
We also forward data to the U.S. Internal Revenue Service(new tab) (IRS) according to the Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act(new tab) (FATCA). We may request your Social Security Number (SSN) in order to check your tax status in the U.S. because:
You are a citizen of the U.S (including dual citizenship).
When registering you gave a telephone number belonging to the U.S.
You were born in the U.S. (or in a U.S. embassy located abroad).
You‚Äôre married to a U.S. national.
You gave us an address in the U.S.
You make regular payment transfers to the U.S.
To update your tax identification or social security number in the N26 app:
Go to  My Account and tap on Settings and Account settings
Select Personal settings then Tax information
Select the country in which you‚Äôre tax-liable
Enter either your tax identification number or your social security number
Important information
In Germany, we need your Steueridentifikationsnummer (11 digits) not your Steuernummer (9 digits).
If you‚Äôre not tax-liable in another country, contact us so we can confirm your tax status.
In each and every case your personal data will be securely stored and only used for the fulfillment of ECR and FATCA requirements.
We‚Äôre unable to advise you on your tax status. If you‚Äôre unsure of your status please discuss the matter with a tax advisor.
If you‚Äôve entered the country in which you are liable for tax but not your tax identification number, please remove the country from the list shown to you in the app, reenter the country, and enter your tax identification number again.

title: Pourquoi N26 effectue des contr√¥les sur les transactions ?
content:
Nous sommes tenus de proc√©der √† des contr√¥les de routine sur les transactions afin d‚Äôassurer la s√©curit√© des comptes de nos clients (voir¬†GwG ¬ß 10(nouvel onglet)). Ces contr√¥les sont d√©clench√©s de fa√ßon automatique par nos syst√®mes.
Pour cette raison, il est possible que nous vous demandions des informations compl√©mentaires concernant l‚Äôorigine ou la provenance des fonds. Si vous recevez une telle demande de notre part, il vous suffit de nous envoyer les documents demand√©s par le biais de la fonction Messages de N26 de votre compte. Nous ne faisons aucune exception lors de ces contr√¥les et vous devez envoyer les documents demand√©s. Si vous ne le faites pas ou refusez de nous donner plus d‚Äôinformations, votre compte peut √™tre saisi et cl√¥tur√©.
Il s‚Äôagit d‚Äôune proc√©dure bancaire standard mis en place pour assurer la s√©curit√© de nos clients. Cette proc√©dure et son r√©sultat sont confidentiels et exclusivement g√©r√©s en interne.
Voici quelques conseils pour acc√©l√©rer la proc√©dure :
Le document que vous nous fournissez doit exactement correspondre √† celui que nous vous avons demand√© par email. Vous pouvez nous envoyer ces justificatifs scann√©s, en photo, ou des captures d‚Äô√©crans (du moment que l‚Äôoriginal du document est lisible). Veuillez √©galement ajouter une description d√©taill√©e de chaque document.
Veuillez √™tre pr√©cis dans vos r√©ponses. Elles doivent √™tre d√©taill√©es et les documents doivent correspondre. Si les documents ne prouvent pas vos d√©clarations ou s‚Äôil ne sont pas suffisamment d√©taill√©s, il est possible que nous vous recontactions pour obtenir plus de d√©tails.
Veuillez r√©pondre le plus t√¥t possible, avant la date mentionn√©e dans l'email que nous vous avons envoy√© √† ce sujet. Veuillez utiliser l‚Äôemail qui est associ√© √† votre compte N26 pour nous transmettre votre r√©ponse et vos documents.
Notre Service Client ne dispose d‚Äôaucune information compl√©mentaire √† propos de ce type de proc√©dure.
Vous devez nous faire parvenir des¬†documents valides, qui d√©pendent de votre situation :
Si vous avez re√ßu une aide financi√®re d‚Äôun membre de votre famille pour r√©aliser un projet ou vous avez h√©rit√© de biens ou d‚Äôargent d‚Äôun proche qui est d√©c√©d√© : Un contrat de pr√™t ou de subvention, un acte notari√© ou un certificat prouvant l‚Äôh√©ritage, un document officiel prouvant la provenance du pr√™t (l‚Äôacte de vente d‚Äôun bien immobilier qui a permis de financer ce pr√™t ou les relev√©s bancaires de la personne qui vous pr√™te de l‚Äôargent par exemple).
Si vous avez vendu un bien ou vos parts sur le march√© des actions : Un contrat prouvant la transaction ou un acte notari√© prouvant la vente.
Si vous avez re√ßu de l‚Äôargent pour payer vos factures ou acheter un produit : Les relev√©s de compte prouvant l‚Äôorigine de cette transaction, les documents montrant que cet argent a √©t√© utilis√© et comment, dans le cas o√π vous avez d√©j√† re√ßu le virement qui fait l‚Äôobjet d‚Äôun contr√¥le.
Si vous avez re√ßu le solde de tout compte de votre ancien employeur : Les documents prouvant que votre contrat de travail a pris fin, d√©taillant le paiement de votre solde de tout compte et/ou un relev√© de compte bancaire de votre employeur.

title: How to make N26 my main account?
content:
We can help make N26 your main account by moving your daily banking from another account: we‚Äôll inform any payment partners who charge recurring direct debits (like for your monthly subscriptions or bills) or who transfer money to your account (such as your employer), and we‚Äôll explain how to set up standing orders or transfer any remaining funds over.
There are three ways to switch your bank accounts over to N26:
Together with our partner finleap we‚Äôre offering you a platform to easily switch your bank accounts online. It‚Äôs an automated process and completely free.
To begin, use our¬†form(new tab)¬†and log in with your previous bank account details. Once you‚Äôve filled in all required information, it‚Äôll take 5 to 7 business days for us to send out all notification letters. Your payment partners may need additional time to change your bank details for future transactions.
You could also inform your payment partners yourself. To do this, fill out the letter to notify your payment partners(new tab) and send it to them. You could also request the¬†termination of your bank account(new tab) with your previous bank by filling out the form and sending it to them.
This service is also free. If you need help with this process, contact our Customer Support via chat.
All German licensed banks are required to offer a bank account switching service as part or ¬ß21 ZKG (Zahlungskontengesetz). To initiate this service, please download and print the¬†account switching form(new tab) and send it to: N26 Bank GmbH Kundenservice Klosterstra√üe 62 10179 Berlin.
Once we‚Äôve received your request, we‚Äôll process it within 7 business days. Your payment partners may need additional time to change your bank details for future transactions.
We charge a fee of up to ‚Ç¨20 for this service, depending on your individual request.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: Is there a fee if I make a purchase while I am abroad?
content:
No, N26 does not charge you a fee for purchases made while you are abroad, but we do apply the current conversion rate. You can use Visa‚Äôs currency converter(new tab) to get an indication of the rate you may receive when using your N26 Visa debit card. Please note that this is only an indication, not a guarantee, and is therefore subject to change. Please also note that international ATM transactions may incur other fees as disclosed in your Consumer Account Agreement and Disclosures(new tab).
The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Warum ist N26 sicher?
content:
Zum Schutz deines Kontos verwenden wir eine dreistufige Sicherheitsarchitektur:
Sichere Anmeldung:¬†Die Zugangsdaten der mobilen App und der¬†WebApp(neuen Tab)¬†bestehen aus einem Benutzernamen und einem Passwort oder einer Fingerabdruck-/Gesichtserkennung (abh√§ngig von deinem Smartphone). Bitte w√§hle ein¬†sicheres Passwort¬†und gib deine Zugangsdaten nicht an Dritte weiter.
Best√§tigungs-PIN:¬†Dies ist ein¬†4-stelliger Code, den du jedes Mal ben√∂tigst, wenn du eine √úberweisung durchf√ºhrst oder dein Smartphone verkn√ºpfst/trennst. Du richtest diese PIN erstmalig ein, wenn du dein Smartphone erfolgreich mit deinem Konto verkn√ºpft hast. Danach kannst du sie in der App selbst √§ndern.
Push-Nachrichten:¬†F√ºr jede eingehende und ausgehende Zahlung wird eine Push-Nachricht an dein verkn√ºpftes Smartphone gesendet. Sie dient auch zur Best√§tigung und zum Abschluss deiner Transaktionen. Au√üerdem haben wir¬†3D Secure¬†eingerichtet, um dich vor Online-Kartenbetrug zu sch√ºtzen.
Jedes Mal, wenn du uns kontaktierst, werden wir dir einige Sicherheitsfragen stellen um sicherzugehen, dass wir wirklich mit dir sprechen. Aber wir werden dich nie nach deiner Kartennummer, deinem Card Verification Code (CVV), Passwort und deiner Karten- oder Best√§tigungs-PIN fragen.
Wir haben weitere Schritte eingef√ºhrt, um deine pers√∂nlichen Daten zu sch√ºtzen: Wir speichern so wenige Informationen √ºber dich wie m√∂glich; nur so lange wie wir rechtlich dazu verpflichtet sind und l√∂schen diese Daten, sobald sie f√ºr das Produkt oder die Dienstleistung nicht mehr ben√∂tigt werden. Du kannst deine¬†pers√∂nlichen Daten¬†bis zu 6 Monate nach deiner Kontoschlie√üung herunterladen. Mehr Informationen dazu findest du in unserer¬†Datenschutzerkl√§rung(neuen Tab).

title: Wie verwende ich Apple Pay?
content:
(Verf√ºgbar in Belgien, D√§nemark, der Slowakei, Deutschland, Estland, Finnland, Frankreich, Griechenland, Irland, Italien, Liechtenstein, Luxemburg, Norwegen, √ñsterreich, Polen, Portugal, Schweden Slowenien, Spanien, in der Schweiz und im Vereinigten K√∂nigreich)
Apple Pay erm√∂glicht dir, mit dem Smartphone zu bezahlen, so dass du deine Mastercard nicht √ºberallhin mitnehmen musst.
Wir haben ein¬†Video(neuen Tab)¬†erstellt, das dir hilft, deine N26 Mastercard mit Apple Pay einzurichten. Hier sind einige Tipps, die du beachten solltest, wenn deine Zahlung nicht funktioniert:
Deine iPhone-Region muss dem Land entsprechen, in das deine Mastercard zuerst geliefert wurde (du kannst deine Region √ºberpr√ºfen, indem du Einstellungen/Allgemein/Sprache und Region auf deinem Handy ausw√§hlst).
Wenn du dein iPhone verloren hast und es nicht mehr √ºber die Funktion¬†Mein iPhone finden wiederfindest, kannst du jederzeit auf deine iCloud zugreifen und alle Apple Pay-Ger√§te √ºber den Webbrowser auf einem Mac oder PC entfernen. Zus√§tzlich solltest du den¬†Verloren-Modusaktivieren, um deine Mastercard f√ºr Apple Pay zu sperren. Zahlungen mit deiner physischen Karte sind weiterhin m√∂glich.
Wenn deine N26 Mastercard unerwartet aus dem Apple Wallet entfernt wird, kann dies daran liegen, dass du dich von deiner iCloud abgemeldet, den Passcode oder die Touch-ID deaktiviert, dein Ger√§t √ºber iTunes auf die Werkseinstellungen zur√ºckgesetzt oder alle Inhalte und Einstellungen von deinem Ger√§t gel√∂scht hast. In allen F√§llen kannst du deine Karte einfach wieder hinzuf√ºgen. Beachte, dass die Karte nicht entfernt wird, wenn du dein Betriebssystem aktualisierst, deine pers√∂nlichen Ger√§teeinstellungen zur√ºcksetzt oder¬†Mein iPhone finden deaktivierst.
F√ºr Eink√§ufe in Gesch√§ften oder online musst du deine Zahlung per Touch ID oder mit deinem Passwort autorisieren. Wenn du Apple Watch verwendest, erfolgen Autorisierungen durch einen Doppelklick auf die seitliche Taste. Und wenn du deinen Mac verwendest, autorisiere deine Zahlung mit der Touch ID √ºber die Touch Bar in der oberen rechten Ecke deiner Tastatur.
Stelle sicher, dass dein Ger√§t die technischen Anforderungen erf√ºllt, indem du den¬†Apple Support (neuen Tab)besuchst: 
iPhone 6 oder neuer, iPhone SE: verf√ºgbar in Apps, Gesch√§ften und online
Apple Watch verkn√ºpft mit iPhone 5 oder neuer: verf√ºgbar in Apps und Gesch√§ften
iPad Pro, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 3, iPad mini 4: verf√ºgbar in Apps und online
Macs ab 2012 (andere Macs als das MacBook Pro mit Touch Bar und Touch ID erfordern ein iPhone oder Apple Watch): verf√ºgbar online

title: Are N26 accounts FDIC-insured?
content:
Yes - N26 accounts are FDIC-insured through our partner bank, Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. This means that deposits in N26 accounts are insured up to $250,000. 
Please note that all deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank¬Æ are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546, and that all deposit accounts through Axos Bank¬Æ brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank¬Æ. 
This means that if you have an Axos Bank¬Æ account (non-N26) in addition to an N26 account, the total coverage will be $250,000.
The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Come contestare una transazione?
content:
Comprendiamo che le contestazioni di pagamento possono costarti tempo e denaro.
Puoi contestare una transazione direttamente dalla tua app N26, mobile o web, semplicemente:
Clicca sulla transazione che vuoi contestare
In "Azioni", seleziona "Chiedi aiuto per questa transazione"
Verrai quindi guidato attraverso una serie di domande per aiutarci a registrare e inoltrare il problema che hai avuto con la transazione.

title: How to close my account?
content:
To cancel your N26 account, please send your request through live chat or via email to support@n26.com from your registered email address including the following information:
A statement requesting the closure of your account on a specific date or ASAP
Your name
Your N26 IBAN 
If you have a positive balance in your main account or your Spaces, we also need an IBAN within SEPA  to transfer your remaining balance.
A statement with your consent to send your account closure confirmation to your registered email address: ‚ÄúI hereby agree that N26 Bank is allowed to exchange personal data with me via email.‚Äú (Otherwise, the confirmation of account closure can be sent via post, but keep in mind that this solution will slow the process.)
Or you can reply using our¬†cancellation form(new tab).
A few things to consider when closing your account:
For a quick account closure: if you have a positive balance, please transfer your remaining balance yourself. If you have a negative balance, top up your account.
All outstanding fees are due immediately. This includes fees related to express delivery, and N26 You or N26 Metal (if applicable).
Destroy your cards by cutting them with scissors or a shredder. The chip, NFC antenna, and the magnetic strip should all be cut into pieces and disposed of separately.

title: Why was I charged more than expected?
content:
All transactions take place in real-time. We'll alert you when any incoming or outgoing transaction happens via push message.
Sometimes a transaction could look suspicious because the final debited amount can differ from the original transaction amount for a few reasons:
A merchant blocks a higher amount for a deposit (for example, at a gas station, or a car rental or hotel booking), and the difference is credited to your account once the deposit is no longer required.
Changes in exchange rates may result in slight differences in the total for transactions made in foreign currencies.
In both cases, we don‚Äôt charge interest for the difference in amounts.
But if you‚Äôre certain that a transaction is unauthorized by you, we could help¬†get your money back.

title: ¬øC√≥mo funcionan los pagos contactless?
content:
Los pagos sin contacto (contactless o NFC) son una opci√≥n que viene de forma predeterminada y no se puede desactivar. Si tienes alg√∫n problema con los pagos sin contacto, ten en cuenta que:
Para activar los pagos NFC, primero deber√°s utilizar tu tarjeta en el cajero o en un terminal de pago.

Las transacciones de hasta 50‚Ç¨ no requieren el PIN de la tarjeta*. Para cantidades superiores a 50‚Ç¨, necesitar√°s introducir el PIN. 
*Siempre que el sistema que utiliza el comercio acepte esta opci√≥n.
Si has realizado varias transacciones y has gastado en total 150‚Ç¨, tendr√°s que usar el PIN antes de poder seguir haciendo transacciones NFC. 

Aseg√∫rate de que tu tarjeta est√° sobre un terminal de pago compatible con la tecnolog√≠a NFC. Ten en cuenta que, si retiras la tarjeta demasiado r√°pido o si no la mantienes lo bastante cerca, podr√≠as tener que volver a repetir la operaci√≥n.

Las tarjetas N26 Metal solo tienen NFC en la cara posterior. Aseg√∫rate de apoyar la cara posterior de la tarjeta contra el terminal de pago para usar el NFC (si lo haces con la cara frontal, no funcionar√°).

title: Why was I charged an ATM fee?
content:
ATM fees could happen for a few reasons: 
A ‚Ç¨2 fee applies to any additional withdrawal beyond our Fair Use Policy. We‚Äôll remind you via push message when you‚Äôre running low on free withdrawals. 
Some ATMs may come with their own fees. We have no control over these fees and can‚Äôt reject or reverse them. You‚Äôll be informed before the end of a withdrawal if additional fees apply and will have the possibility of cancelling it.
Foreign currency ATM withdrawals sometimes include fees. With the N26 account, there‚Äôs a fee of 1.7% of the withdrawal amount. This fee is waived for N26 You or N26 Metal members. 
Using your Maestro for ATM withdrawals. A ‚Ç¨2 fee applies to both domestic or international withdrawals. Maestro is only available in Germany, Austria, or the Netherlands. 

To avoid certain fees, especially when travelling, you can use the Mastercard ATM Locator(new tab) to find free ATMs nearby by selecting no access fee. 
You can find an overview of our plans and fees on our website(new tab).

title: ¬øPor qu√© me han cobrado m√°s de lo esperado?
content:
Todas las transacciones se hacen en tiempo real. Te avisaremos cada vez que haya una transacci√≥n entrante o saliente mediante una notificaci√≥n push.
En ocasiones, una transacci√≥n puede resultar sospechosa debido a que la cantidad final es diferente a la cantidad original. Esto puede deberse a varias razones:
Un comerciante puede bloquear una cantidad superior a la del precio del servicio a modo de dep√≥sito (ocurre a menudo en las estaciones de servicio, con el alquiler de veh√≠culos o con reservas de hotel). La diferencia entre el dep√≥sito y el precio del servicio se ingresar√° en tu cuenta cuando pase la fecha de vencimiento.
Los tipos de cambio pueden dar lugar a ligeras variaciones en las transacciones en moneda extranjera.
En ambos casos, no cobramos ning√∫n inter√©s por la diferencia de las cuant√≠as. 
Pero da por sentado que si una transacci√≥n no se ha autorizado por ti, el propietario de la cuenta, te ayudaremos a¬†recuperar tu dinero.

title: How to close my account?
content:
To cancel your N26 account, please send your request through live chat or via email to support@n26.com from your registered email address including the following information:
A statement requesting the closure of your account on a specific date or ASAP
Your name
Your N26 IBAN 
If you have a positive balance in your main account or your Spaces, we also need an IBAN within SEPA  to transfer your remaining balance.
A statement with your consent to send your account closure confirmation to your registered email address: ‚ÄúI hereby agree that N26 Bank is allowed to exchange personal data with me via email.‚Äú (Otherwise, the confirmation of account closure can be sent via post, but keep in mind that this solution will slow the process.)
Or you can reply using our¬†cancellation form(new tab).
A few things to consider when closing your account:
For a quick account closure: if you have a positive balance, please transfer your remaining balance yourself. If you have a negative balance, top up your account.
All outstanding fees are due immediately. This includes fees related to express delivery, and N26 You or N26 Metal (if applicable).
Destroy your cards by cutting them with scissors or a shredder. The chip, NFC antenna, and the magnetic strip should all be cut into pieces and disposed of separately.

title: How to use Google Pay?
content:
Applies to Germany, Spain, Italy, Ireland, Belgium, Slovakia, France, Denmark, Finland, Sweden, Norway, Poland and Switzerland. 
Google Pay is a payment method that allows you to pay with your smartphone so you don‚Äôt have to carry your Mastercard with you all the time.
Google Pay is available in all shops supporting contactless (NFC) payments as well as online shops. Hold your smartphone near the contactless terminal and your payment will automatically process. When paying online, select Google Pay as the payment option. We‚Äôll ask you to confirm your payment via¬†push message¬†during checkout.
Some tips to keep in mind:
To add your N26 Mastercard, download the Google Pay app and select Get Started to enter your card details. You‚Äôll need Android 5.0 (Lollipop) or higher as well as an NFC-capable smartphone.
Google Pay requires a screen lock. If you didn‚Äôt set it up yet, you‚Äôll be asked to before adding your Mastercard to the Google Pay app.
If you‚Äôre protecting your smartphone with a case, you might have to remove it to pay. Some payment terminals don‚Äôt recognize your phone if the case is too big.
If the payment terminal asks you to present your card (again), you might have removed the smartphone too fast or didn‚Äôt hold it close enough. Just try again while keeping this in mind.

title: Wie kann ich mein Smartphone mit meinem Konto verkn√ºpfen oder trennen?
content:
Um dein N26 Konto nutzen zu k√∂nnen, brauchst du ein Smartphone: entweder ein iPhone (5s oder neuer, mindestens iOS 11) oder ein Android-Ger√§t (6.0 oder neuer - wir unterst√ºtzen keine Custom-ROMs oder Aftermarket-Firmware von Amazon Fire oder Oxygen OS). Jedes Konto kann nur mit einem einzigen Ger√§t verkn√ºpft werden.
Du musst dein Smartphone verkn√ºpfen und/oder entkn√ºpfen, wenn du dein Konto er√∂ffnest oder wenn du eine neue Telefonnummer oder ein neues Ger√§t verwendest.
Um dein Smartphone mit deinem Konto zu verkn√ºpfen, √∂ffne einfach die App auf deinem Smartphone. Du wirst aufgefordert, deine Handynummer zu best√§tigen.
Gib den 4-stelligen Code ein, den wir dir per SMS senden und schon ist dein Smartphone verkn√ºpft.
Wenn du ein neues Ger√§t verkn√ºpfen m√∂chtest, musst du aus Sicherheitsgr√ºnden die Verbindung zu deinem alten Ger√§t trennen. Das kannst du in der App unter üë§ Mein Konto, dann Einstellungen und Sicherheit tun oder in der WebApp(neuen Tab) unter üë§ Mein Konto und Sicherheitseinstellungen; falls du auf dein Smartphone keinen Zugriff mehr hast. Du erh√§ltst dann eine E-Mail mit weiteren Anweisungen.
Wenn du dich nach dem Entkn√ºpfen des alten Handys auf deinem neuen Handy in deine N26 App einloggst, erh√§ltst du 2 Codes - einen 6-stelligen Login-SMS-Code und einen 4-stelligen Pairing-SMS-Code. Mit dem Login-Code loggst du dich in dein Konto ein und mit dem Pairing-Code verkn√ºpfst du dein neues Ger√§t mit deinem Konto.

title: Wie kann ich Push-Nachrichten erhalten?
content:
Wir senden dir Push-Mitteilungen, um √úberweisungen abzuschlie√üen (z. B.¬†MoneyBeam) oder einen Service zu best√§tigen (wie bei¬†CASH26). Wenn du diese Push-Nachrichten nicht erh√§ltst, √ºberpr√ºfe zun√§chst, ob die Benachrichtigungen sowohl f√ºr dein Smartphone als auch f√ºr die App aktiviert sind. Dann kannst du abh√§ngig von deinem Smartphone einige unserer Vorschl√§ge zur Fehlerbehebung ausprobieren:
L√∂sche die App und starte dein Smartphone neu. Lade die neueste Version der App aus dem Apple App Store herunter, installiere sie und¬†verkn√ºpfe dein Smartphone¬†wieder.
√úberpr√ºfe, ob du in der App eingeloggt bist.
Die Benachrichtigungsoption f√ºr die App muss in den allgemeinen Einstellungen deines Smartphones aktiviert sein.
L√∂sche die App und starte dein Smartphone neu. Lade die neueste Version der App aus dem Google Play Store herunter, installiere sie und¬†verkn√ºpfe dein Smartphone¬†wieder.
Gehe zu¬†Einstellungen¬†und¬†Optionen¬†und setze im¬†App Manager¬†ein H√§kchen bei¬†Benachrichtigungen anzeigen.
Huawei und Xiaomi: Gehe zu¬†Einstellungen, dann zu¬†Erweiterte Einstellungen¬†und¬†Akkueinstellungen¬†und setze N26 als gesch√ºtzte App.
OnePlus: W√§hle die¬†Akkuoptimierung, √∂ffne dann die N26 App und¬†nicht optimieren.
Oppo: Deaktiviere die¬†Akkuoptimierung¬†f√ºr die App und sperre sie in der¬†Recent apps overview.

title: Am I liable to tax in the United States?
content:
As a licensed bank we're required to report directly to the IRS information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers according to FATCA, a legislation designed by the US Department of Treasury and the U.S. Internal Revenue Service to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets.
You can find more information about FATCA here(new tab).¬†
In the context of FATCA, a U.S. Person is defined as, among other things:
A citizen of the United States (including dual citizens)
A resident in the United States, for example as a holder of a valid U.S. Green Card or as a person who passes the ‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù (see below).
If you're unsure as to how to determine whether you're a U.S. Person, please consult a tax advisor.
‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù means:
That you've been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more in the current calendar year
OR
That you have been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more over the last three calendar years, to be calculated as follows: 


(31 days or more in the current calendar year) + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. last year) divided by 3 + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. the year before last) divided by 6.
¬†In addition, if your account shows any of the following:
U.S. citizenship or U.S. residence
U.S. place of birth
U.S. mailing or residence address, including U.S. PO boxes
U.S. telephone number
Standing instructions to a U.S. address or an account maintained in the US
we're still obliged to treat you as a U.S. Person, unless we receive the following from you:¬†
A W-8BEN or similar agreed self-certification form and
A non-U.S. passport or other government-issued identification evidencing your citizenship or nationality in a country other than the U.S.
In case you were born in the US, a copy of your Certificate of Loss of Nationality of the US.

title: Is there a fee if I make a purchase while I am abroad?
content:
No, N26 does not charge you a fee for purchases made while you are abroad, but we do apply the current conversion rate. You can use Visa‚Äôs currency converter(new tab) to get an indication of the rate you may receive when using your N26 Visa debit card. Please note that this is only an indication, not a guarantee, and is therefore subject to change. Please also note that international ATM transactions may incur other fees as disclosed in your Consumer Account Agreement and Disclosures(new tab).
The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Wie erstelle ich ein Passwort?
content:
Wenn du dein Passwort vergessen hast oder es √§ndern m√∂chtest, w√§hle in der App beim Login¬†Vergessen?¬†oder¬†Passwort vergessen?(neuen Tab)¬†in der¬†WebApp(neuen Tab). Wir senden dir einen Link an deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse, damit du ein neues Passwort erstellen kannst. Stelle sicher, dass dein neues Passwort unseren Anforderungen entspricht:
Wir haben keine spezifischen Anforderungen f√ºr unsere Passw√∂rter. Wir berechnen die St√§rke in Echtzeit und akzeptieren nur Passw√∂rter, die unser Algorithmus als stabil erkennt.
Wir empfehlen, dass du anstatt eines Passworts eher eine Passphrase (einen Satz) verwendest, im Sinne von ‚Äúschwer zu erraten, einfach zu erinnern‚Äù.
Wenn unser System dein Passwort nicht akzeptiert, f√ºge weitere Buchstaben hinzu, verwende eine Kombination von Sonderzeichen und Zahlen und achte darauf, dass du zwischen Gro√ü- und Kleinschreibung variierst.
Wenn du dein Passwort sechsmal hintereinander falsch eingibst, wird dein Kontozugriff vor√ºbergehend gesperrt. Nach 30 Minuten kannst du es erneut versuchen.
Du erreichst uns im Chat t√§glich von 07:00 - 23:00 Uhr, auch an Sonn- und Feiertagen.

title: Can I open an N26 account in my country?
content:
We offer our accounts in the following countries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, and the US.
You can open your account if you live in one of these countries and meet our¬†requirements. Our products and services vary by country. Should you have an existing account with us and move to a country where N26 is not yet available for 18 months or more please get in touch with our Customer Support.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: How to use N26 Savings?
content:
(Applies to Germany and Austria)
With N26 Savings, you can open a fixed savings account with a deposit between ‚Ç¨2.000 to ‚Ç¨100.000 for free. You can find it in the¬†Explore section then¬†N26 Financial Products. You won‚Äôt be able to access the deposited amount until the plan matures (from 3 to 60 months) but you‚Äôll earn up to 1.48% in interest during that time. After that, you‚Äôll receive the payout directly into your N26 account.
N26 Savings is possible through the close cooperation of three companies(new tab) with different partner banks. You‚Äôll have to accept the T&Cs of all four participating parties to open an account.
For regulatory reasons, we‚Äôll need information about your tax status. If you‚Äôre taxable in the United States, we‚Äôre currently unable to offer you our savings product.
You may be eligible for tax exemption. If so, complete our form(new tab) and open a chat with us. We'll forward your request to our partner bank.
As soon as you open your Savings account, the one-off amount will be debited from your current account. Please note that it can take up to 7 working days before your account is opened.
When the plan matures, you‚Äôll receive the deposited amount and the interest (minus any capital gains tax if applicable) into your N26 account within 2 days.
European law requires all member states to provide legal protection of up to ‚Ç¨100.000 per person per bank. We set an additional limit on Savings accounts in countries outside the eurozone so that this protection doesn‚Äôt fall below this limit in the event of exchange rate fluctuations.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: Comment √™tre visible aupr√®s des autres utilisateurs N26 ?
content:
Pour pouvoir utiliser toutes les fonctionnalit√©s de votre application, vous et vos contacts devez √™tre visibles en tant qu‚Äôutilisateur N26.¬† Lorsque vous nous autorisez √† le faire, nous acc√©dons √† votre r√©pertoire pour identifier vos contacts qui utilisent √©galement N26.
Pour modifier votre visibilit√© en tant que client N26 aupr√®s de vos contacts, vous pouvez √† tout moment activer ou d√©sactiver cette option depuis votre application N26. Pour cela, rendez-vous dans la rubrique Mon compte > Param√®tres > Param√®tres personnels > Informations personnelles, vous pouvez ensuite cocher ou d√©cocher la case ‚Äúj‚Äôaccepte d‚Äô√™tre identifiable en tant que client N26 par les autres utilisateurs‚Äù.
Parmi tous vos contacts, ceux qui sont √©galement clients N26 seront visibles dans votre liste de contacts de l‚Äôapplication N26. De la m√™me fa√ßon, vous apparaitrez dans leur liste de contacts, vous identifiant comme √©tant client N26. Nous ne sauvegardons pas votre liste de contacts de fa√ßon permanente. Nous ne l‚Äôutilisons que lorsque vous acc√©dez √† l‚Äôoption MoneyBeam ou Espaces Partag√©s.
Vous pouvez notamment effectuer des transactions en temps r√©el sans saisir d‚ÄôIBAN gr√¢ce √† Moneybeam, en s√©lectionnant seulement le nom du destinataire dans votre liste de contacts. Vous pouvez √©galement demander de l'argent aux personnes de votre liste de contacts qui n'ont plus qu'√† accepter (ou refuser) votre demande.
De plus, en √©tant visible aupr√®s des autres utilisateurs vous pouvez utiliser les Espaces Partag√©s. Cette fonctionnalit√© vous permet de partager des espaces avec d'autres utilisateurs N26 s√©lectionn√©s dans votre liste de contacts.

title: Why can‚Äôt I get a loan?
content:
(Applies to Germany and France)
When applying for N26 Credit, we ask about your personal and financial situation during our assessment. If N26 isn‚Äôt your main account, you‚Äôll need to securely log into your online bank account at another bank to continue with the application.
For second bank accounts, we only accept banks from the country where you‚Äôre applying from (for example, French customers can only add a French bank account and German customers can only add a German bank account).
We‚Äôll also look at your current SCHUFA credit score. This won't negatively impact your score. However, your score isn‚Äôt the only factor: we also require information about your monthly income, excluding any payments from public authorities (such as unemployment or child benefits).
Once you‚Äôve sent an application to us, you‚Äôre unable to change your answers for 90 days (even if your creditworthiness improves). You‚Äôll have to wait until then to apply for another loan.
The decision is then calculated through an automated process.
If you'd like more information, here's how you can get in touch with us.

title: How to set my card PIN?
content:
We don‚Äôt send you a PIN via post; you set the PIN for your Mastercard or Maestro card¬†once you‚Äôve successfully connected your smartphone to your account and¬†activated¬†your card(s). To set or change your card PIN:
Go to üë§ My Account.
Select Card settings and swipe to choose a card.
Select Reset PIN on the mobile or WebApp(new tab).
Enter the 10-digit token number on your card.
Choose your new PIN and confirm it.
Keep in mind that:
If you live in France, Spain, Ireland, Greece, Finland, Estonia or the UK, you must make your first payment using Chip and PIN before you can use your card anywhere else. You can also first make a withdrawal or balance inquiry at ATM instead.
For security reasons we don‚Äôt accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences (such as 1111, 1234, or 4321). If the number you‚Äôve chosen is not accepted please try again using a different combination.
If a PIN is entered incorrectly three times in a row, the card will automatically be blocked for security reasons. If this happens, please contact our Customer Support via chat so we can unblock it for you.
Your card PIN is separate from your Confirmation PIN, however you can choose the same PIN for both.

title: Come annullare l‚Äôiscrizione a N26 You o N26 Metal?
content:
I contratti¬†N26 You¬†(nuova tabella)o¬†N26 Metal(nuova tabella)¬†hanno una durata di un anno. Il contratto si rinnova in maniera automatica per un ulteriore anno, salvo disdetta. 
In questo articolo troverai informazioni su come:
revocare la tua iscrizione entro il periodo di revoca di 14 giorni. 
cancellare la tua iscrizione in qualsiasi momento entro 1 mese dal rinnovo del tuo contratto. 
annullare il rinnovo della tua iscrizione entro 1 mese dalla data di rinnovo.

Puoi revocare la tua iscrizione entro il periodo di revoca di 14 giorni dall'apertura del conto. Apri semplicemente una chat con noi e ti assisteremo con la procedura. 
Richiedendo la revoca, non sar√† possibile aprire un conto premium in futuro.
Se desideri cancellare la tua iscrizione dopo il periodo di revoca di 14 giorni ed entro 1 mese dalla scadenza del tuo contratto, puoi farlo mettendoti in contatto con noi. Scegliendo questa opzione non si avr√† pi√π accesso ai vantaggi N26 You o N26 Metal, come la copertura assicurativa.
Fino a 4 settimane prima della data di rinnovo, puoi richiedere l'annullamento del tuo contratto N26 You o N26 Metal. Per fare questo:
Effettua l'accesso alla app e vai a üë§ Il mio conto
Seleziona N26 You o N26 Metal
Seleziona Dettagli iscrizione (qui puoi anche vedere la data di scadenza della tua iscrizione)
Annulla l'iscrizione
Conferma l'annullamento tramite il messaggio push che ti invieremo
Con l'annullamento, potrai continuare ad utilizzare pienamente la tua Mastercard N26 You o N26 Metal fino alla scadenza della sottoscrizione, mantenendo la copertura assicurativa fino a quella data. Successivamente, passerai ad un conto standard gratuito che non prevede i benefici dei conti premium. Ti invieremo una carta standard prima della scadenza del contratto. Non √® necessario richiederla.
Ti avviseremo del rinnovo via email 8 settimane prima della data del rinnovo.

Se vuoi chiudere il tuo conto definitivamente, visita il nostro articolo su Come chiudere il conto?

title: Why didn't I receive my pairing code via SMS?
content:
A pairing code is required to¬†connect your smartphone¬†to your account. If you didn‚Äôt receive this code via SMS for whatever reason, you can request a new one up to five times in the mobile app. Please wait 30 seconds before requesting a new one. 
If all five codes are requested and pairing is still unsuccessful, then for security reasons you‚Äôll be blocked from making further requests for 24 hours. If this happens, you can either wait or contact our Customer Support via chat - who would be happy to help you.
If your country code is outside of the EU, it‚Äôs likely that you‚Äôll need to contact us to receive a pairing code.

title: ¬øC√≥mo descargar mi informaci√≥n personal?
content:
La Regulaci√≥n General de Protecci√≥n de Datos (RGPD) es una nueva regulaci√≥n europea sobre la protecci√≥n de datos y la privacidad que entr√≥ en vigor el 25 de mayo de 2018. Como respuesta a esta ley, hemos a√±adido la opci√≥n de exportar tu informaci√≥n en la¬†Web App(pesta√±a nueva): entra en¬†üë§ Mi Cuenta, despu√©s en¬†Configuraci√≥n Personal¬†y finalmente haz clic en¬†Tus datos personales.
Como banco m√≥vil que somos, entendemos la importancia de la seguridad de los datos. Debes saber que almacenamos el m√≠nimo de datos posibles, solo aquellos que estamos obligados a tener por ley. Adem√°s, eliminamos los datos una vez que dejan de ser necesarios para nuestros productos o servicios.
El art√≠culo 20 de la RGPD afirma que tienes derecho a la portabilidad de tus datos y te permite cambiar de proveedor de servicios en caso de que quieras abrir una cuenta bancaria con otro banco. Por ello y de acuerdo con este art√≠culo tenemos que enviarte estos datos en un formato legible por m√°quina. 
Ten en cuenta que este archivo est√° destinado a la portabilidad de datos y puede que tu ordenador no pueda leer archivos en formato JSON. En caso de que puedas abrir el archivo, es posible que sea dif√≠cil de entender ya que no est√° pensando para que las personas lo puedan comprender, si no una m√°quina. 
Como somos un banco online, entendemos la importancia de la protecci√≥n de datos. Por ello, tomamos medidas de seguridad extra antes de que puedas descargar tus datos. Hacemos esto para asegurarnos de que el titular de la cuenta es la persona que est√° solicitando los datos.
Puedes solicitar la descarga de datos personales tanto de tu cuenta actual como de una cuenta que hayas cerrado en los √∫ltimos 6 meses. La informaci√≥n viene en un formato de lectura electr√≥nica para que puedas compartirla con terceros si lo deseas.
Por favor inicie sesi√≥n en¬†esta p√°gina(pesta√±a nueva)¬†utilizando la misma informaci√≥n de acceso a su cuenta de N26.
Tendr√°s que crear una contrase√±a temporal para cuando te enviemos el documento a tu email. Este link estar√° activo 24 horas desde que recibes el email. Recuerda que si la contrase√±a se introduce err√≥neamente 5 veces, el link caducar√° y tendr√°s que realizar otra solicitud.
Solo podr√°s descargar tus datos si has cerrado tu cuenta en los √∫ltimos 6 meses. Para solicitar esta informaci√≥n completa el¬†formulario(pesta√±a nueva)¬†y aseg√∫rate de que los datos coinciden con los de tu antigua cuenta. Necesitar√°s:
nombre, apellido, n√∫mero de identidad y fecha de expiraci√≥n del documento que proporcionaste al abrir la cuenta (DNI o pasaporte)
email registrado en tu cuenta
fecha (mes y a√±o) en la que creaste y cerraste la cuenta (revisa el email que recibiste al confirmar tu direcci√≥n de correo electr√≥nico en el proceso de registro)
Por motivos de seguridad, tenemos que asegurarnos de que realmente eres t√∫ quien est√° descargando los datos; si alg√∫n campo est√° incorrecto o incompleto, tu petici√≥n no ser√° aceptada.
Tendr√°s que crear una contrase√±a temporal para cuando te enviemos el documento a tu email. Este link estar√° activo 24 horas desde que recibes el email. Recuerda que si la contrase√±a se introduce err√≥neamente 5 veces, el link caducar√° y tendr√°s que realizar otra solicitud.
Si quieres m√°s informaci√≥n sobre la recopilaci√≥n, el uso y el procesamiento de tus datos personales, visita nuestra¬†Pol√≠tica de Privacidad(pesta√±a nueva).

title: What are Shared Spaces?
content:
Shared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 users to share money together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.
Shared Spaces are available to N26 premium users (You / Business You / Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their Space. 
Participants can be any N26 account holder regardless of their account type.
The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.
The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants for their space.
Similar to regular Spaces, Shared Spaces have neither an IBAN nor a card attached to them.

title: What you need to know about the Italian IBAN
content:
IMPORTANT - Currently new customers signing up in Italy will receive an Italian IBAN. For our existing customers in Italy with a German IBAN, as soon as we have information to share on how and when you can obtain an Italian IBAN, we will get back in touch. 

Why didn‚Äôt N26 offer an Italian IBAN from the beginning?
Theoretically, having a German IBAN in Italy shouldn‚Äôt be an issue under EU law which states that all EU IBANs should be accepted, regardless if it‚Äôs from a different country than your country of residence. However, we‚Äôve been listening to our customers and know that this isn‚Äôt always the case. To make things easier, we‚Äôve now decided to offer our Italian customers their own local Italian IBAN.
Can I receive my salary/social/unemployment benefit/pension?
You can indeed receive incoming transfers in Euros to the Italian IBAN associated with your N26 account.
Can I create Direct Debits?
Yes, you can. Simply provide the relevant company with your N26 IBAN to set up Direct Debits.
Can I create Standing orders?
Yes, you can. Standing orders can be set up in the N26 app via the "Transfers" section.
When trying to send a transfer to my N26 Italian IBAN, the sending bank said the account details aren't recognised. What is the issue?
It's possible that the sending bank doesn't yet have our new Italian BIC in their system. Please contact the sending bank so they can update their database and process your transfer.
Can I deposit cash on my N26 account?
Our customers in Italy can use CASH26 to withdraw and deposit cash through our partner stores. You can see how this works by visiting our Support Center here.
Does anything change in terms of the fees or cost related to using the account (price list)?
Offering an Italian IBAN won't change the costs associated with your account. You can check the price list with all relevant information here(new tab).
Is it true that if I open an account now, I won‚Äôt have to pay the stamp duty?
A stamp duty of ‚Ç¨34.20 is due on accounts with an annual average balance exceeding ‚Ç¨5,000 (subject to subsequent changes to the law). It is paid by the Bank on bank statements until 30th September 2020. Unless the promotion is extended, the annual stamp duty will be paid by the customer from 30th  September 2020. It will be charged on the customer's account by direct debit. Customers will not not need to provide any kind of declaration.

title: Why did my online purchase fail?
content:
Some reasons why your online payment failed:
If you are unable to confirm the push message within 5 minutes, simply restart the payment process on the merchant's website.
If you do not receive a push message, please make sure that your smartphone is connected and that push messages are enabled on your smartphone.
Ensure that online payments and payments abroad are enabled in your card settings.
A stable internet connection is required.
If you are using an iOS device, make sure you turn off the Do Not Disturb mode.
If the amount on the merchant's site is different from the one stated in the push message, this may be due to the conversion of a foreign currency into euros.
Make sure that you disable any Adblockers running on your browser.
Your Maestro card can‚Äôt be used for online purchases.

En tu declaraci√≥n de impuestos, marca la casilla de Cuenta Extranjera abierta, usada o cerrada (8UU) (Compte √©tranger ouvert, utilis√© ou ferm√©).
Completa el¬†formulario Cerfa n¬∞ 3916(pesta√±a nueva) y a√±√°delo a tu declaraci√≥n de impuestos.

title: How to add or remove Shared Space participants?
content:
For an owner to remove a participant from a Shared Space:
In the Space overview, tap the menu indicated by the 3 dots in the top right.
From the ‚ÄòParticipants‚Äô list, tap on the arrow to the right of the relevant participant‚Äôs name (iOS). Android users can just simply tap on the participant's name.
Tap ‚Äòrevoke power of attorney‚Äô.
¬†Confirm the notification on the next screen and tap ‚Äòrevoke power of attorney‚Äô.¬†

Accept an invitation and join a Shared Space:
In the Spaces overview, tap the Space with ‚ÄòPending‚Äô and the Shared Space icon. 
Read the Shared Space summary and continue to the Power of Attorney screen.
Once you‚Äôve read and understood the information on the Power of Attorney page (the legal screen), tick the box and tap the ‚ÄòAccept power of attorney‚Äô button.
Enter your Confirmation PIN.
Confirm the ‚ÄòAccept Power of Attorney‚Äô push notification on your paired mobile device
You‚Äôll need to have enough free Space(s) to accept an invitation to a Shared Space. If not, you can only proceed if you delete other Space(s) to free up ‚Ä¶ Space.
You must also not have any open Space with the same name or image as the Shared Space. You can only accept the invitation to join a Shared Space once you change the name/image of the other Space(s).

To leave a Shared Space:
In the Space overview, tap the menu indicated by the 3 dots in the top right.
Inside the settings tap on ‚ÄòExit Shared Space‚Äô.
Confirm the notification on the next screen and tap ‚ÄòLeave the Space‚Äô.
A Shared Space can be created and modified within the N26 app or Webapp

title: How to cancel my N26 You or N26 Metal membership?
content:
N26 You(new tab) or¬†N26 Metal(new tab)¬†contracts have a term of one year. This contract automatically renews for another year unless you cancel it. 
In this article you will find the difference between revocation, cancellation of the membership and cancellation of the renewal of your membership. You have 3 options:
Revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period
Cancel your membership at any time up to 1 month before your contract ends
Stop your membership‚Äôs renewal up to 1 month before it expires
Find in details how to do so below. 
You can revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period. Simply open a chat with us and we'll assist you from there.
Keep in mind that if you cancel your contract before it ends, you won‚Äôt be able to sign up for the same membership plan in the future.
If you want to terminate your membership at any time up to *1 month before your contract ends and after the 14-day revocation period, please contact us.
If you choose this option all your N26 You or N26 Metal benefits will end, which includes your insurance coverage.
You have up to 4 weeks before your membership expires to cancel the renewal of your N26 You or N26 Metal membership. To do so:
Log into the mobile app and go to üë§ My Account
Select N26 You/Metal
Tap Membership details followed by Cancel Membership
 you can also see your membership expiration date here
Confirm the cancellation via the push message we send you
You can continue to use your N26 You or N26 Metal Mastercard fully until your membership expires. That means you‚Äôll keep your insurance coverage as long as you‚Äôre still required to pay your membership fee. After that, your Mastercard will work like a standard card without the benefits. We‚Äôll send you a standard card before your contract ends. No need to contact us about it.
We‚Äôll notify you of the renewal via email 8 weeks before your anniversary date.
If you want to definitely close your account, visit our article How to close my N26 account.

title: What are the benefits of N26 You?
content:
Once you upgrade to N26 You, you‚Äôll receive 10 additional¬†Spaces¬†and the option to choose one of our five new card colours: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate. 
N26 You customers are also covered under the premium account's¬†insurance package provided by Allianz Global Assistance*, which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:
Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.

Snow and mountain rescue.¬†Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.
Car, bike and scooter sharing. Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.
Extra card. You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 14‚Ç¨ through your N26 app. 
If you‚Äôre an N26 You customer, or if you want to upgrade to N26 You, you‚Äôll have the possibility to choose one of our five new colors when ordering a new card: 
Keep these in mind when considering¬†N26 You(new tab):
The N26 You Mastercard has no embossing: the card details, including the number, CVV code, and 10-digit token are printed on the back.
If you upgrade to N26 You, the monthly fee of ‚Ç¨9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade. If you‚Äôre a new customer, the first fee will be deducted 15 days after you prove your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on your sign-up date. Meaning that, if you opened your account at the end of the month, the first two  monthly fees will be charged the following month.
The minimum membership is one year. Your contract automatically renews if you don‚Äôt cancel your membership at least 4 weeks before the contract expires.
You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 14‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.

Vous avez la possibilit√© de choisir une Mastercard parmi les 5 nouvelles couleurs disponibles. Pour cela, depuis la rubrique ‚ÄúParam√®tres de votre carte‚Äù, choisissez Renvoyer puis s√©lectionnez la couleur de votre choix parmi celles-ci:¬†Rhubarbe, Oc√©an, Sable, Menthe et Ardoise.
Par ailleurs, vous b√©n√©ficiez de¬†garanties d'assurance et d‚Äôassistance¬†N26 You fournies par Allianz Global Assistance Europe*, qui couvrent un large √©ventail d'incidents dans votre vie personnelle et financi√®re :
Protection voyage ‚Äì Remboursement des frais m√©dicaux √† l'√©tranger et des frais d'annulation de voyage en cas d'urgence m√©dicale, des frais encourus lors d‚Äôun retard de vol sup√©rieur √† 4 heures, des frais engag√©s si vos bagages enregistr√©s arrivent plus de 6 heures apr√®s vous √† destination √† l'√©tranger, et des frais de rapatriement depuis l'√©tranger.
Sauvetage en montagne ‚Äì Couverture concernant la recherche, le sauvetage, les premiers frais de transport et les frais m√©dicaux en cas d'accident lors d'un s√©jour en montagne.
Location de voiture, v√©lo ou trottinette √©lectrique en libre-service ‚Äì Couverture en cas de dommage ou de vol d‚Äôun v√©hicule lou√© en libre-service depuis une application. 
Par ailleurs :
La carte N26 You(nouvel onglet) est une Mastercard sans d√©tails en relief sur la face avant, pour plus de confidentialit√©. Seul votre nom est inscrit √† l‚Äôavant de la carte, les d√©tails de votre carte sont imprim√©s au verso : vous y trouverez votre num√©ro de carte, sa date d‚Äôexpiration, le code de v√©rification CVV et le Token, le code d‚Äôidentification de votre carte √† 10 chiffres.
Si vous √™tes d√©j√† un utilisateur N26 et que vous passez √† N26 You, les frais d'adh√©sion mensuels de 9,90 ‚Ç¨ par mois sont pr√©lev√©s directement sur votre compte N26, en fonction de la date √† laquelle vous avez activ√© votre N26 You Mastercard (par exemple si vous avez activ√© votre carte le 5 janvier, nous continuerons √† vous facturer le 5 de chaque mois). Si vous √™tes un nouvel utilisateur N26, le premier d√©bit est retard√© de 15 jours apr√®s avoir compl√©t√© votre v√©rification d'identit√© pour vous laisser la possibilit√© d‚Äôalimenter votre compte N26 avant qu‚Äôil ne soit effectu√©. √Ä partir du deuxi√®me pr√©l√®vement, le d√©bit se fera √† la date de la validation de votre v√©rification d'identit√©. Cela signifie que si vous avez ouvert votre compte en fin de mois, vos deux premi√®res mensualit√©s seront pr√©lev√©es le mois suivant. 
La dur√©e minimale de votre adh√©sion √† N26 You est d'un an. L'adh√©sion est automatiquement renouvel√©e pour une ann√©e suppl√©mentaire √† moins que vous n‚Äôannuliez votre adh√©sion¬†√† N26 You au moins un mois avant la fin de la p√©riode de cotisation.
Pour retrouver plus d'informations sur N26 You, nous vous invitons √† lire nos¬†Conditions G√©n√©rales d‚ÄôUtilisation(nouvel onglet).

title: Can N26 close my account?
content:
In short: yes.
We can close your account in 3 ways (with 2 months notice, 14 days notice, or immediately). These cancellations are final: our Customer Support can‚Äôt provide any information about the background of individual cancellations nor can they reverse the decision. You‚Äôre also able to terminate your business relationship with us at any time, immediately, and without a reason. Any outstanding contract fees must be paid before the termination date.
2 months notice:
We have the right to terminate any business relationship with 2 months notice without a cause (see section 19 (1) of our¬†T&Cs(new tab)¬†or ¬ß 675h of the German Civil Code).
14 days notice:
We can also terminate any business relationship with 14 days notice (see section 19 (3) of our¬†T&Cs(new tab)) if reasonable cause is given due to the breach of contractual duties. These include:
Using a personal account for business purposes.¬†According to our T&Cs, a private account may only be used for personal use. Any credit transfers that relate to professional fees for provided services and/or sold products are considered business transactions. If you‚Äôd like to use your account for this purpose, please sign up for an N26 Business or N26 Business You account.
Providing incorrect or insufficient information for a routine background check. We‚Äôre a bank so we sometimes run checks on transactions. If you don‚Äôt provide correct and/or sufficient information about the transaction in question, we have the right to terminate the business relationship in order to be compliant with German financial regulations.
Displaying abusive behaviour towards N26 employees. We don‚Äôt tolerate abusive behaviour towards our employees. The threat of physical harm or general abusive behaviour may be considered a criminal offense according to German law and will be reported to the respective authority without exception.
Immediate cancellation
We may also terminate any business relationship on an extraordinary basis (see section 19 (3) of our¬†T&Cs(new tab)). That means: at any time, without prior notice, and without a cancellation period when there is reasonable cause for such termination. These include:
Providing incorrect statements to N26 about your financial situation, especially when you apply for a credit.
Failure to repay your loan or any debt toward N26.
Failure to comply with N26's requests about your loan (see provision or increase of security, section 13 (2) of our T&C's(new tab)).

title: PSD2 - sicheres Open Banking
content:
Die Zweite Zahlungsdiensterichtlinie (‚ÄúPSD2‚Äù) ist eine √ºberarbeitete europ√§ische Richtlinie und erm√∂glicht dir, √ºber regulierte Drittanbieter sicher auf deine Kontodaten zuzugreifen und Zahlungen √ºber regulierte Drittanbieter sicher durchzuf√ºhren.
Das bedeutet, dass du regulierten Drittanbietern √ºber eine dedizierte Schnittstelle Zugang zu deinem Konto erlauben kannst:
Du kannst √ºber einen Kontoinformationsdienst (KID) Daten verschiedener Bankkonten an einem Ort zusammenf√ºhren und sie √ºber regulierte Drittanbieter verwalten;
Du kannst bei einem Einkauf auf einer Website einen Zahlungsausl√∂sedienst (ZAD) nutzen.
Der sichere Datenaustausch erfolgt im Hintergrund √ºber unseren Partner Token.io.
Nutzt Du einen regulierten Drittanbieter, wie einen Kontoinformationsdienst oder einen Zahlungausl√∂sedienst, wirst Du √ºber Token.io zur N26 App weitergeleitet, um die jeweilige Zugriffsanfrage zu best√§tigen.¬†
In unserer Datenschutzerkl√§rung(neuen Tab) informieren wir Dich √ºber die Zwecke, die involvierten Parteien und die rechtlichen Grundlagen f√ºr die notwendige Datenverarbeitung, um unsere Verpflichtungen im Rahmen der √ºberarbeiteten Zweiten Zahlungsdiensterichtlinie zu erf√ºllen.
Warum kann ich keinen Drittanbieter mit meinem Konto verlinken?
Wenn der Drittanbieter keine Integration mit unserer dedizierten Schnittstelle vorgenommen hat, muss er zun√§chst √ºber unseren Partner Token.io die Integration mit unserer dedizierten Schnittstelle vornehmen.
Wie kann ich eine Zugriffsbest√§tigung, die ich einem regulierten Drittanbieter gew√§hrt habe, widerrufen?
Um eine Zugangsbest√§tigung zu widerrufen, die Du einem regulierten Drittanbieter gew√§hrt hast, musst Du Dich direkt an den regulierten Drittanbieter wenden.
*gilt f√ºr alle L√§nder im EWR.

title: Why didn't I receive my pairing code via SMS?
content:
A pairing code is required to connect your smartphone(new tab) to your account. If you didn‚Äôt receive this code via SMS for whatever reason, you can request a new one up to five times in the mobile app. Please wait 30 seconds before requesting a new one.
If all five codes are requested and pairing is still unsuccessful, for security reasons you‚Äôll be blocked from making further requests for 24 hours. If this happens, you can either wait or contact our Customer Support via phone at 1-888-N26-0-N26 (1-888-626-0626) or chat - and we would be happy to help you.

title: Warum ist meine SEPA √úberweisung fehlgeschlagen?
content:
Wir akzeptieren √úberweisungen in EUR √ºber SEPA. Wir arbeiten nicht mit SWIFT, falls du also eine √úberweisung in einer Fremdw√§hrung machen m√∂chtest, bitte verwende TransferWise (in der App oder auf der Website).
Um eine √úberweisung zu erhalten, musst du dem Absender nur deinen vollst√§ndigen Namen (so wie er auf dem Ausweisdokument steht, mit dem du dich bei uns verifiziert hast) und deine IBAN angeben.
Du findest deine IBAN auf deinen Kontoausz√ºgen und unter üë§ Mein Konto (in der App oder WebApp).
H√§ufige Gr√ºnde f√ºr fehlgeschlagene √úberweisungen:
Der Empf√§ngername auf dem √úberweisungsauftrag unterscheidet sich vom Namen des  Kontoinhabers (so wie er auf dessen Ausweis steht). 
Als Empf√§nger wird der Name einer Firma anstatt eines pers√∂nlichen Namens/Kontos angegeben (gilt auch f√ºr N26 Business).
Die IBAN ist falsch. 
Du erh√§ltst keine Push-Nachricht um die √úberweisung zu best√§tigen.
Eine unsachgem√§√üe Verwendung wurde festgestellt. N26 ist in der Verantwortung, Routinepr√ºfungen von Transaktionen durchzuf√ºhren (siehe GwG ¬ß 10(neuen Tab)). Deshalb kann es vorkommen, dass wir Unterlagen anfordern, um den Hintergrund oder die Herkunft einer Transaktion zu √ºberpr√ºfen. Dies kann dazu f√ºhren, dass eine Gutschrift verz√∂gert oder nicht vorgenommen wird.

title: Wann kommt meine Karte?
content:
Je nach Bestimmungsort betr√§gt die¬†Lieferdauer bis zu 10 Werktage. In bestimmten Gebieten einiger L√§nder (Estland, Griechenland, Italien, Niederlande, Portugal, Slowakei und Spanien) kann die Lieferung etwas l√§nger dauern. Bevor du erw√§gst, eine neue Karte zu bestellen, denke daran:  
Falls die Karte nicht zugestellt werden kann und an uns zur√ºckgeschickt wird, informieren wir dich per E-Mail.

Wenn du vor weniger als 10 Tagen deine Karte bestellt hast, bitten wir dich, noch etwas abzuwarten, bevor du dich bei uns meldest.

Wenn du deine Karte nicht innerhalb des √ºblichen Lieferzeitraums ankommt, √ºberpr√ºfe bitte deine Lieferanschrift und korrigiere sie, wenn n√∂tig. Das kannst du in der N26 App tun, unter üë§Mein Konto > Einstellungen > Pers√∂nliche Einstellungen > Lieferanschrift.
Wenn deine Lieferanschrift nicht richtig war und es deine erste N26 Karte ist, kontaktiere uns bitte im Live Chat. Wir helfen dir gerne bei der Kartenbestellung.

Wenn deine Lieferanschrift nicht richtig war und du bereits eine aktive Karte hattest, bestelle dir bitte eine neue Karte in der App.

Wenn deine Lieferanschrift richtig war, aber du die Karte dennoch nicht erhalten hast, liegt das daran, dass es beim Versand zu Schwierigkeiten gekommen ist.  Bitte kontaktiere uns dann im Live Chat und wir helfen dir gerne, eine neue Karte zu bestellen. 

Falls du deine Karte schnell brauchst, kannst du sie gegen eine Geb√ºhr per Express-Lieferung bestellen, wodurch die Karte binnen 3 Tagen bei dir ankommt. Bitte beachte, dass die Express-Lieferung f√ºr Metal-Karten nicht zur Verf√ºgung steht.

Deine erste Karte wird umgehend produziert und versendet, sobald du deine Verifizierung abgeschlossen hast. Wenn du ein N26 Metal Konto er√∂ffnet hast, zahle bitte genug Guthaben auf dein Konto ein, damit die erste monatliche Geb√ºhr abgedeckt ist, um deine Karte zu erhalten.

Falls deine Adresse Sonderzeichen enth√§lt, kontaktiere uns bitte √ºber den Live Chat.
Wir verschicken unsere Karten nur an private Anschriften (gesch√§ftliche Adressen werden nicht akzeptiert).
Gib deine Postleitzahl ohne Leerzeichen ein.
Stelle sicher, dass keine wichtigen Informationen fehlen (wie z.B. der Name auf deinem Briefkasten, eine Wohnungs- oder Treppenhausnummer). Wenn du nur vor√ºbergehend dort bist (z.B. bei einem Freund oder einem Airbnb), gib den Namen des Hauptmieters an, der auf dem Briefkasten steht.
Wenn du bald umziehst und es deine erste Karte ist, stelle sicher, dass du die Adresse und das Land angibst, wohin du deine erste N26 Karte erhalten m√∂chtest.

title: Why can‚Äôt I see other N26 users on MoneyBeam?
content:
To carry out real-time transactions such as¬†MoneyBeams, N26 checks your smartphone‚Äôs contact list and finds other N26 users based on saved phone numbers or emails. You can also enter someone‚Äôs contact details manually to send them a MoneyBeam.
If you don‚Äôt see your friend‚Äôs name on MoneyBeam but you know they‚Äôre an N26 user, they most likely haven‚Äôt made themselves visible. Indeed you can manage your visibility as an N26 user.
Most MoneyBeam transfers that fail between N26 users happen because there are multiple phone numbers or emails listed in the contact entry of a phone's address book. To avoid this, make sure you have the email and phone number your friend uses in your phone book in order to send them MoneyBeams. If the contact details you have stored don‚Äôt match, you cannot send a MoneyBeam to your friend.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: Why was I charged twice?
content:
We offer you banking in real-time. This means you‚Äôre able to see the processes going on behind your account that you otherwise wouldn‚Äôt see. There are two main transaction types that take place during an in-store or online purchase:
Authorizations.¬†A block or reserved amount made by a retailer or merchant. This includes anything from your morning cup of coffee to hotel or car rental bookings (including security deposits).
Presentments.¬†The actual amount that is deducted from your account. Again, that cup of coffee is finally cleared from your account or you can get your security deposit back once that hotel room or car is returned safe and sound.
Once an authorization has been confirmed, we can‚Äôt cancel or reverse it. At that point, a few things can happen to¬†your authorization: it turns into a presentment, it's rejected, or it expires¬†(and automatically returns to your account up to 12 days at the latest). Keep in mind:
Sometimes you‚Äôll see both the authorization and the presentment if they become disconnected or due to technical issues at the payment terminal. Eventually the authorization will expire. If it doesn‚Äôt, we can help get your money back.
Verification authorizations (usually very small amounts) are used to check whether your card is active. This money will return to your account.
The amount of an authorization can differ from the final presentment for a variety of reasons.

title: Custom Audiences
content:
Data Processing in the framework of Facebook Custom Audiences
Custom Audiences allows us to exclude you, as an existing N26 customer, from our advertisements. We do not want to display irrelevant ads to you. Furthermore, it allows us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other Facebook users. These so called ‚ÄúLookalike-Audiences‚Äù are more similar to our customers than the average Facebook user.¬†
In order to profit from the benefits as described above we provide a hashed version of your N26 email address to Facebook. The so-called ‚Äúhashing‚Äù is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. Facebook then matches this email address against your potential Facebook email address. After the matching, regardless of whether it was successful or not, any hashed email addresses are deleted within 6-8 hours by Facebook. Facebook does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. You can find this and further information in the terms of Facebook Custom Audiences(new tab).
You can revoke your consent according to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR to this data processing in the N26 web app at any time.

title: How to save the details of a transfer recipient?
content:
Every time you make a transfer to a new recipient in the app (tap + then¬†Transfer¬†and¬†Add new recipient), some details like the recipient‚Äôs name and IBAN are automatically saved in your transfer contact list for future transfers. You can also delete contacts or view your transaction history with them:
iOS: swipe a contact entry to the left in order to show the transaction history or delete the entry.
Android: tap and hold on a contact entry in order to show the transaction history or delete the entry.
Keep in mind that deleting a contact entry doesn‚Äôt delete your transaction history with them.

title: Why does N26 do checks on transactions?
content:
We have the responsibility to run routine checks on accounts and transactions in order to ensure your account‚Äôs security (see GwG ¬ß 10(new tab)). These checks are automatically initiated by our systems.¬†
As a result, we may ask you to provide some documents. If you receive such a request, please send the requested documents via Messages from N26. There are no exceptions or evasion for such checks.¬†
This practice is a standard banking procedure and ensures the safety of our customers. Both the process and the result are confidential and handled internally. Here are some tips to speed up the process:
The document that we need you to provide will be exactly named in the message you‚Äôll receive from N26. You can send us scanned documents, pictures, or screenshots, as long as the original content of the document is easily readable. Please make sure to also provide a detailed description.¬†
Be precise in your answers, details, and documents. After we receive your required proof and description, we will let you know if your reply fulfills our check. In a few cases, we might ask for further clarification which could prolong the process.
Reply as soon as possible, always before the deadline stated in the message you received from N26. Use that email to reply and send attachments.¬†
Our Customer Support doesn‚Äôt have any additional information on this subject.
You must provide valid documentation depending on your situation.

 Find here some examples:
You've received financial help from your family to complete projects or have inherited land or money from deceased relatives.
A granting/loan contract, an official document of inheritance, or an official document of the source of the loan (such as the sales documents of a sold property to finance the loan or bank statements of granting relatives).
You've sold a property or your shares on the stock market.
The contract showing the agreed transactions or the official notarial documentation of the transfer of property.
You've received or sent money to pay bills or buy a product.
Documents showing the balance statements confirming the source of this money or documents showing the use of the money and its purpose.
You've received a final payout from your previous employer.
Documents proving the end of your employment, detailing the payment and/or a bank statement from your previous employer.

title: ¬øQu√© pasa si tengo un saldo negativo?
content:
El balance de tu cuenta puede ser negativo siempre y cuando est√©s dentro de tu l√≠mite de descubierto (disponible solo en Alemania y Austria).
Si no, recibir√°s un email para notificarte que has sobrepasado tu l√≠mite de descubierto autorizado, lo que significa que no tienes fondos suficientes en tu cuenta N26 para hacer frente a futuros cargos.
Incluso si no has usado tu cuenta N26 desde que la abriste, hay algunos cargos que podr√≠an aplicar (como la cuota mensual de N26 You o N26 Metal, o los costes del env√≠o expr√©s) y dejar√≠an como resultado un saldo negativo. En el caso de quedarte con saldo negativo, se cargar√° a tu cuenta un inter√©s del 7,5% de forma cuatrimestral.
En ese caso, tendr√≠as que¬†ingresar dinero en tu cuenta N26¬†desde otra cuenta bancaria mediante una transferencia SEPA. Para hacer una transferencia puedes encontrar tu IBAN en la app de N26. Recuerda que si la haces desde una cuenta de otro pa√≠s, tendr√°s que hacerla como una transferencia internacional, ya que somos un banco alem√°n.
Tu cuenta seguir√° estando activa durante los pr√≥ximos 60 d√≠as sin pagar. A partir de ah√≠:
Recibir√°s dos recordatorios m√°s, que costar√°n 3‚Ç¨ cada uno.
Si tienes una cuenta premium, las ventajas se cancelar√°n tras 60 d√≠as y tu cuenta se convertir√° en cuenta est√°ndar.
Si no haces nada al respecto, podremos cerrar tu cuenta tras 60 d√≠as.
