title: Where does N26 invest my money?
content:
We strive to provide our clients' deposits for loans to our customers (provided that they have the appropriate credit rating). For the liquidity not required in the customer business, our investment strategy is low in risk.
We invest our customers' money at short notice with the Deutsche Bundesbank and other European banks in the eurozone with only good risk classes. And we refinance public-law customers mainly in Germany (cities and municipalities) and invest in euro government bonds
We're not a trading book institute. That is: we do not trade for short-term profit.
And we don't engage in speculation, whether on food, foreign exchange, bitcoins or other asset classes.

title: Devo dichiarare il mio conto N26?
content:
N26 √® una banca tedesca che a partire dal 26 marzo 2020 opera in Italia attraverso una succursale italiana al fine di offrire ai propri clienti un conto corrente con IBAN italiano.
Di conseguenza, se hai aperto un conto con noi dopo il 26 marzo 2020 e risiedi in Italia, il tuo conto N26 √® a tutti gli effetti un conto corrente italiano e non devi effettuare dichiarazioni particolari.¬†
Potrebbe essere di tuo interesse sapere che:
con una giacenza media sul conto pari o superiore a 5.000 ‚Ç¨, sarai soggetto all‚Äôordinaria imposta di bollo sugli estratti conto. In tal caso provvederemo ad addebitarla automaticamente nella misura prevista dalla legge e fatte salve eventuali promozioni che prevedono l‚Äôimposta di bollo sugli estratti conto a nostro carico.¬†
se mantieni un saldo fino a 100.000 ‚Ç¨, il tuo conto rimane protetto dal Fondo tedesco di tutela dei depositi.¬†
Se hai aperto un conto con noi prima del 26 marzo 2020 con indirizzo di residenza in Italia, il tuo conto √® considerato un conto estero. L‚Äôapertura di un conto all‚Äôestero √® un‚Äôoperazione legale e consentita: dovrai semplicemente rispettare la normativa del paese di residenza e del paese in cui il conto viene aperto.
Per quanto riguarda le persone fisiche residenti in Italia, i conti esteri con una giacenza media annua superiore a ‚Ç¨5.000 devono essere dichiarati al Fisco italiano. Bisogner√† compilare il quadro Rw della dichiarazione dei redditi e versare l‚ÄôIvafe, un‚Äôimposta di importo fisso pari a ‚Ç¨34,20.¬†
Se il valore massimo sul conto, invece, supera i ‚Ç¨15.000 anche per un solo giorno nel corso dell‚Äôanno, oltre a versare l‚ÄôIvafe, bisogner√† compilare il quadro Rw della dichiarazione dei redditi ai fini del monitoraggio fiscale cos√¨ come previsto dalla legge n.186/2014.¬†
Per informazioni pi√π dettagliate e personalizzate ti suggeriamo di consultare un esperto in materia fiscale.
Ti informiamo, inoltre, che le autorit√† fiscali italiane hanno la possibilit√† di individuare conti correnti esteri non dichiarati e di ricondurre le relative operazioni al titolare (Direttiva 2011/16/UE).

title: Wie √§ndere ich meine Best√§tigungs-PIN?
content:
Du kannst deine Best√§tigungs-PIN jederzeit in der App √§ndern:
Gehe in der App zu üë§ Mein Konto, dann Einstellungen und Sicherheit oder Sicherheitseinstellungen in der WebApp(neuen Tab)
W√§hle Best√§tigungs-PIN √§ndern aus
Gib die 10-stellige Token-Nummer auf deiner Mastercard ein
W√§hle und best√§tige eine neue Best√§tigungs-PIN
Wenn du deine Best√§tigungs-PIN 6 Mal falsch eingibst, musst du sie zur√ºcksetzen, bevor du es erneut versuchen kannst.
Aus Sicherheitsgr√ºnden die Best√§tigungs-PIN keine Teile deines Geburtsdatums oder deiner Adresse, wiederholte Ziffern (z. B. 1111, 111 oder 11) oder Sequenzen (z. B. 1234 oder 4321) enthalten. Wenn die von dir gew√§hlte PIN nicht akzeptiert wird, versuche es bitte mit einer anderen Kombination.
Lieber Videos statt Text? Sieh dir das Tutorial(neuen Tab) auf unserem N26 Support YouTube Kanal(neuen Tab) an.

title: Why didn't I receive my pairing code via SMS?
content:
A pairing code is required to¬†connect your smartphone¬†to your account. If you didn‚Äôt receive this code via SMS for whatever reason, you can request a new one up to five times in the mobile app. Please wait 30 seconds before requesting a new one. 
If all five codes are requested and pairing is still unsuccessful, then for security reasons you‚Äôll be blocked from making further requests for 24 hours. If this happens, you can either wait or contact our Customer Support via chat - who would be happy to help you.
If your country code is outside of the EU, it‚Äôs likely that you‚Äôll need to contact us to receive a pairing code.

title: How to do contactless payments work?
content:
It‚Äôs not possible to deactivate contactless payments. If you‚Äôre experiencing issues with your contactless payments, keep in mind that:¬†¬†
To activate contactless payments, you must first use your card at an ATM or payment terminal.¬†

Transactions up to ‚Ç¨50 don‚Äôt require a card PIN*. For amounts over ‚Ç¨50, you‚Äôll need to enter your card PIN.¬†
*If the merchant's payment system supports this option.
Make sure your card is held directly onto an NFC-compatible payment terminal. If you remove your card too fast or didn‚Äôt hold it close enough, just try again.¬†

N26 Metal cards only have NFC on the backside of the card. Make sure to hold the backside of the card against the terminal to use NFC (using the front won‚Äôt work).

title: Da sapere sull‚ÄôIBAN italiano
content:
IMPORTANTE - Tutti coloro che aprono un conto a partire dal 26 marzo 2020 riceveranno automaticamente un IBAN italiano.¬†I clienti che hanno aperto il conto prima di questa data e sono in possesso di un IBAN tedesco verranno contattati una volta che il servizio sar√† disponibile.¬†

Perch√© non √® stato offerto un IBAN italiano fin dall‚Äôinizio?
Secondo la normativa UE, tutti gli Stati membri devono garantire che i titolari di conti bancari non subiscano discriminazioni per ragioni di natura geografica. Questo significa che i gestori delle utenze, ad esempio, oppure i datori di lavoro sono tenuti ad accettare codici IBAN di conti aperti presso banche con sede in qualunque Paese membro dell‚ÄôUE.¬†Tuttavia, abbiamo ascoltato i nostri clienti e sappiamo che questo non sempre accade: le normative vengono spesso ignorate.¬†Per questo motivo abbiamo deciso di offrire ai nostri clienti italiani un IBAN locale.
Posso ricevere l'accredito del mio stipendio, della mia pensione o del mio sussidio?
Certo! Puoi far ricevere accrediti in Euro fornendo l'IBAN del tuo conto N26 al mandante.
Posso ricevere addebiti diretti?
Certo! Baster√† fornire l'IBAN del tuo conto N26 al beneficiario.

Posso impostare ordini permanenti?
Certo! Puoi creare ordini permanenti tramite l'app di N26, nella sezione Bonifico bancario.

Nell‚Äôeffettuare un bonifico verso il mio conto N26, la banca ricevente non riconosce i dettagli bancari. Perch√© succede questo?
Molto probabilmente la banca emittente non ha ancora integrato il nostro BIC italiano nel loro sistema. Contatta la banca in questione in modo che possano aggiornare i dati in loro possesso ed elaborare il tuo bonifico.
Posso depositare contanti sul mio conto N26 con IBAN italiano?
I nostri clienti residenti in Italia possono usare CASH26 per prelevare e depositare contanti tramite i negozi convenzionati. 
Ci saranno variazioni relativi ai costi del conto?
Avere un IBAN italiano non comporter√† particolari variazioni dei costi associati al conto. Puoi controllare i nostri fogli informativi qui.(nuova tabella) 
√â  vero che se apro un conto adesso, non pago il bollo?
L' imposta di bollo sull‚Äôestratto conto √® dovuta in caso di giacenza media superiore a 5.000‚Ç¨ (su base annua e salvo successive modifiche di legge) in misura pari a 34,20‚Ç¨.
L‚Äô imposta √© a carico della Banca sugli estratti conto fino al 30/09/2020. Salvo estensione della promozione, sar√† a carico del cliente dopo il 30/09/2020. In tal caso l'imposta verr√† addebitata sul conto del cliente tramite addebito diretto (il cliente non dovr√† fornire dichiarazioni specifiche).

title: What does N26 do with my tax information?
content:
The OECD requires certain tax information to be shared by means of the Common Reporting Standard(new tab) (ECR). To carry out our obligations, we must establish which country you‚Äôre taxable in. We do this through your tax identification or National Insurance number. 
We forward this information via the German Federal Tax Office to tax authorities in other countries if: 
You live in a ECR participating country.
You have a postbox or a second registered address in another ECR participating country.
When registering you gave a telephone number belonging to another ECR participating country.
You have a standing order, or make regular payments, to an account located in another ECR participating country.
We also forward data to the U.S. Internal Revenue Service(new tab) (IRS) according to the Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act(new tab) (FATCA). We may request your Social Security Number (SSN) in order to check your tax status in the U.S. because:
You are a citizen of the U.S (including dual citizenship).
When registering you gave a telephone number belonging to the U.S.
You were born in the U.S. (or in a U.S. embassy located abroad).
You‚Äôre married to a U.S. national.
You gave us an address in the U.S.
You make regular payment transfers to the U.S.
To update your tax identification or social security number in the N26 app:
Go to  My Account and tap on Settings and Account settings
Select Personal settings then Tax information
Select the country in which you‚Äôre tax-liable
Enter either your tax identification number or your social security number
Important information
In Germany, we need your Steueridentifikationsnummer (11 digits) not your Steuernummer (9 digits).
If you‚Äôre not tax-liable in another country, contact us so we can confirm your tax status.
In each and every case your personal data will be securely stored and only used for the fulfillment of ECR and FATCA requirements.
We‚Äôre unable to advise you on your tax status. If you‚Äôre unsure of your status please discuss the matter with a tax advisor.
If you‚Äôve entered the country in which you are liable for tax but not your tax identification number, please remove the country from the list shown to you in the app, reenter the country, and enter your tax identification number again.

title: How to use Moneybeam?
content:
MoneyBeam allows you to send money to your smartphone‚Äôs contacts without knowing their bank account details. In order to send a MoneyBeam, log into the app:
From the Home screen choose the Actions tab,

Tap Send Money followed by the MoneyBeam option,

Either select a contact from your phone‚Äôs contact list or add a recipient manually, using their phone number or email address. For this to work, the recipient has to be visible as an N26 customer,

Enter the amount and a reference text,

Confirm with your Confirmation PIN and the push message you receive.
N26 customers will receive the transfer instantly. You can send up to ‚Ç¨1.000 to other N26 customers within a 24-hour period.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

content:
Jedes Mal, wenn du eine √úberweisung an einen neuen Empf√§nger in der App erstellst (tippe auf +, dann auf¬†√úberweisung¬†und¬†Neuen Empf√§nger hinzuf√ºgen), werden einige Daten wie der Name des Empf√§ngers und die IBAN automatisch in deiner Kontaktliste f√ºr zuk√ºnftige √úberweisungen gespeichert. title: What is the maximum I can spend?
content:
The maximum¬†daily¬†limits (total sum within 24 hours) for card payments are:
ATM withdrawals: ‚Ç¨2.500 (or ‚Ç¨400 in Togo, Congo, Benin, Ivory Coast, Kenya, Cameroon, Nigeria, Senegal and Algeria)
In-store or online payments: ‚Ç¨5.000
You can¬†set your own¬†daily ATM withdrawal and payment limits within our limits directly in the app by tapping¬†üë§ My Account¬†then¬†Card settings.
The maximum¬†daily¬†limits (rolling 24 hours) for bank transfers are:
MoneyBeam to N26 customers (the recipient must be visible): ‚Ç¨1.000
Outgoing transfers: ‚Ç¨50.000
Incoming transfers: No limit
The maximum¬†monthly¬†limit (total sum) for card transactions is ‚Ç¨20.000*. 
*a monthly limit of ‚Ç¨10.000 applies to ATM withdrawals for customers who opened their account in France. 
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: How to create a password?
content:
If you forgot your password or want to change it, select¬†Forgot?¬†in the app or¬†Forgot your password?(new tab)¬†in the¬†WebApp(new tab)¬†during login. We‚Äôll send a link to your registered email address so you can create a new password. Make sure your new password meets our requirements:
We do not have a specific set of requirements for our passwords. We measure their strength on the fly and only accept passwords that are considered robust by our underlying algorithm.
We tend to recommend to go with a ‚Äúpassphrase‚Äù rather than a password, and thus go by the common phrase ‚Äúhard to guess, easy to remember‚Äù. 
If your password is not accepted by our system, try to add more special characters, numbers, and vary between upper- and lowercase letters.
If you enter your password incorrectly six times in a row, you‚Äôll be temporarily blocked from your account. If this happens, try logging in again after 30 minutes.
Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

title: F√ºhre dein bestehendes Portfolio √ºber die FIL Fondsbank GmbH (FFB) fort
content:
Falls du nichts tust, bleibt dein bestehendes Invest-Depot automatisch weiter bestehen bei FIL Fondsbank GmbH (FFB), die das jeweilige Invest-Depot aller N26 Invest-Kunden h√§lt.
Die Details deines monatlichen N26 Invest-Sparplans erh√§lt die FFB nicht automatisch - du musst diese also erneut einstellen. Bitte ber√ºcksichtige, dass die Geb√ºhren der FFB f√ºr dein N26 Invest-Portfolio gelten werden, au√üer du schlie√üt deinen N26 Invest-Plan in deiner N26 App und l√§sst dir dein Depot auszahlen oder du hast dich bei Moneyfarm angemeldet, um den Gegenwert deines N26 Invest-Plans zu reinvestieren.
Vor dem 17.09.2019 erh√§ltst du von FFB postalisch deine Login-Daten, mit denen du √ºber FFBs Website(neuen Tab) auf dein bestehendes Depot zugreifen kannst. Falls sich deine Anschrift seit der Schlie√üung deines N26 Invest-Portfolios ge√§ndert hat, teile sie bitte der FFB mit.

title: How to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?
content:
It‚Äôs important to keep your personal data up to date (for example, your phone number is necessary to¬†connect your smartphone¬†or to send and receive¬†MoneyBeams). Here's how you can change your information:
Delivery address,¬†password, or¬†tax information: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app. Just go to¬†üë§ My Account¬†and select¬†Settings¬†then¬†Personal Settings.
Name¬†and¬†sex: Chat with us and send two forms of ID: a copy of your new ID card or passport as well as an official document of the change (a marriage licence or updated birth certificate).  We can also re-order a card with your new name once your account has been updated.
Nationality: Chat with us and send a copy of your new ID card or passport.
Phone number or¬†email address: You‚Äôll need to contact us via chat for this. We need to verify it‚Äôs really you changing your information so we can‚Äôt change any personal data over email.

title: Wie funktioniert 3D Secure?
content:
3D Secure sch√ºtzt dich vor Online-Kartenbetrug. Die Funktion wird automatisch aktiviert, wenn du deine Karte in der App aktivierst. Du brauchst keine zus√§tzlichen Passw√∂rter.
Wenn du eine¬†Online-Zahlung¬†mit deiner Mastercard vornimmst, best√§tigt 3D Secure die Transaktion innerhalb von 5 Minuten durch eine Push-Nachricht. Wenn du die Transaktion nicht siehst, versuche es mit unseren¬†Tipps zur Fehlerbehebung.
Wenn du einen Kauf √ºber dein Smartphone t√§tigst, siehst du die ausstehende Transaktion in der App. Tippe auf das Glockensymbol, dann wird eine Push-Meldung angezeigt, mit der du deinen Kauf best√§tigen und abschlie√üen kannst. Danach gehst du zur√ºck zur Website des H√§ndlers. Du solltest innerhalb weniger Augenblicke eine Best√§tigung f√ºr deinen erfolgreichen Einkauf sehen.
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erhalte 15‚Ç¨ f√ºr jeden Freund, dem du N26 erfolgreich empfiehlst. Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: Quelle est la fr√©quence des retraits gratuits ?
content:
Les retraits d‚Äôesp√®ces avec votre Mastercard sont r√©gis par les Conditions G√©n√©rales d‚ÄôUtilisation qui s‚Äôappliquent √† votre pays (celui o√π votre carte a √©t√© livr√©e) :
Allemagne : 3 √† 5* retraits gratuits par mois dans les distributeurs en Allemagne 
et retraits illimit√©s et gratuits en dehors de l'Allemagne dans la zone euro (ou en utilisant¬†CASH26(nouvel onglet))
Autriche et Italie : Retraits gratuits et illimit√©s (CASH26(nouvel onglet)¬†inclus)
France, Espagne, Pays-Bas et le reste de l‚ÄôEurope : 5 retraits gratuits par mois dans les distributeurs de votre pays et dans les autres pays de la zone Euro
Royaume-Uni : Retraits gratuits et illimit√©s
Si vous utilisez une carte¬†Maestro(nouvel onglet), des frais de 2 ‚Ç¨ s‚Äôappliquent √† tous les retraits d‚Äôesp√®ces. Cette carte est uniquement disponible en Allemagne, en Autriche et aux Pays-Bas.
Pour plus de d√©tails concernant les¬†frais appliqu√©s aux retraits, veuillez consulter nos¬†Tarifs.

Vous pouvez √† tout moment nous faire des retours et des suggestions en envoyant un email √†¬†ideas@n26.com(nouvel onglet). C‚Äôest gr√¢ce √† vous que nous nous am√©liorons. title: Can N26 close my account?
content:
In short: yes.
We can close your account in 2 ways (with 2 months notice or immediately). These cancellations are final: our Customer Support can‚Äôt provide any information about the background of individual cancellations nor can they reverse the decision. You‚Äôre also able to terminate your business relationship with us at any time, immediately, and without a reason. Any outstanding contract fees must be paid before the termination date.
2 months notice:
We have the right to terminate any business relationship with 2 months notice without a cause (see section A14.1 of our¬†T&Cs(new tab)).
Immediate cancellation:
We may also terminate any business relationship on an extraordinary basis (see section A14.2¬†T&Cs(new tab)). That means: at any time, without prior notice, and without a cancellation period when there is reasonable cause for such termination. These include:
Providing incorrect statements to N26 about your financial situation, especially when you apply for a credit.
Failure to repay your loan or any debt toward N26.
Failure to comply with N26's requests about your loan.

title: Cashback Perks
content:
Partners this applies to: TIDAL, Luminary, Aaptiv, Blinkist, Babbel, Headspace, and Curology

"How do I sign up for Cashback on Subscriptions?"
Signing up for Cashback Perks is simple and is accomplished via the mobile app.
On launching the app, tap on the "Explore" tab.
Once in the Explore page, tap on the "Manage" button, this will take you to the Cashback on subscriptions page.
Once in the Cashback Subscriptions page you can select your Cashback Perk by tapping on the appropriate partner.¬†

"The Cashback Perk that I previously subscribed to is no longer applicable to me, how do I unsubscribe from that Perk?"
When a Cashback Perk is no longer applicable to your lifestyle, you can easily unsubscribe from it via the mobile or web app.
On launching the app, tap on the "Explore" tab.
Once in the Explore page, tap on the "Manage" button, this will take you to the Cashback on subscriptions page
Once in the Cashback Subscriptions page you can select your Cashback Perk to unsubscribe from by tapping on the appropriate partner.¬†

"How many Cashback Perks can I subscribe to?"
You can only subscribe to one Cashback Perk at a time. Your lifestyle and situation will be your guide as to which one to subscribe to.

"Is there a cost to subscribing?"
No, there is no cost to subscribing to a Perk. In fact, these Perks are here to save you money.¬†

"Does this work for any subscription, i.e. family plans?"
No, only monthly plans for one user are eligible for Monthly Cashback Perks.

"What payment method do I have to use in order to get a Cashback or a Discount Perk?"
You must pay for your purchase directly with your N26 Visa debit card, if another form of payment is used, the Cashback or Discount will not be applied.¬† To ensure that you get the benefit you deserve, you may have to go into your account and verify that the card on file, and being charged, is your N26 Visa debit card. Transactions made through third parties or with electronic wallets such as Apple Pay and Google Pay are not eligible for discounts or cashback under our Perks program.¬†

"How many days after making a qualifying payment would I receive Cashback for a Monthly Cashback Perk?"
Approximately two business days. 

"Will the Cashback appear as a statement credit?¬† If so, when?"
Yes, if applicable, the Cashback will appear on your transaction list as ‚ÄòMonthly Perk'.¬† The Cashback benefit is applied as soon as your payment for the monthly subscription comes through, which is typically the billing date of the subscription.

"Who are your current Perks partners?"
To further enhance your N26 experience, we are constantly adding new partners, To see the current list of Perks partners, please go to your N26 app.

"How much cash back does the customer receive on a subscription per month for Cashback on Subscriptions Perks?¬† Is it a specific dollar amount, or a percentage of the subscription charge?  Please list subscriptions and specific percentages of Cashback."
In order to see exactly how much Cashback you can get on your subscription, please go to your N26 app. The percentage of cash back varies depending on the partner.

"Is there a date by which I must enroll in Perks in order to receive cash back?"
No. you can enroll in Perks whenever you want.

"Does the Cashback offer have a termination period?"
Cashback Perk offers do not have a termination period.¬† Unless there is a specific ‚Äúvalid until‚Äù date is shown, N26 can terminate the offer at any time.
The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: How to change my confirmation PIN?
content:
You can change your¬†Confirmation PIN¬†at any time in the app:
Go to üë§ My Account then: Settings and Security (mobile app) or Security Settings (WebApp(new tab))
Select Change Confirmation PIN
Enter the 10-digit token number on your Mastercard
Create and confirm your new Confirmation PIN
If you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times, you'll need to reset it before trying again.
For security reasons, your PIN can‚Äôt contain parts of your date of birth or your address, repeated numbers (such as 1111, 111, or 11), or sequences (such as 1234 or 4321). If the PIN you‚Äôve chosen is not accepted, please try again using a different one.
Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial(new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube(new tab) channel.

title: Continue with your existing portfolio via FIL Fondsbank GmbH (FFB)
content:
If you decide to take no action your existing investment portfolio will automatically continue through FIL Fondsbank GmbH (FFB). FFB is the bank that holds the invest depot for each N26 Invest customer. 
The existing monthly settings of your N26 investment are not automatically retrieved by FFB - they must be set again individually. Please note that the fees according to FFB's schedule of fees and services would apply to your N26 Investment portfolio unless you decide to cancel your N26 Invest plan and withdraw the funds from your investment portfolio or instruct Moneyfarm to transfer your N26 Invest portfolio to a new Moneyfarm investment plan
Before the aforementioned date you‚Äôll automatically receive a letter via post containing your login details for FFB's website(new tab), allowing you to access your existing investment portfolio via their website. In the event that you‚Äôve changed address since you‚Äôve opened your N26 Invest portfolio, you‚Äôll need to contact FFB to inform them of your new address.¬†
Contact details for FIL Fondsbank GmbH (FFB):
Monday to Friday from 8am to 6pm
Telephone: +49 (0) 69 770 60 - 200
Fax: +49 (0) 69 770 60 - 555
Please note: FFB‚Äôs website is only available in German.

title: How to top up my account?
content:
Once you are successfully verified, you'll be able to top up your account in several ways:
CASH26 (in Germany, Austria, and Italy). Deposit cash through our partner stores;
MoneyBeam. Instantly receive money from other N26 users;
Debit card. You can add money to your account by entering the card details from your other account within the N26 app. You can choose to deposit between 20‚Ç¨ and 150‚Ç¨. Please note that prepaid cards are not accepted. Likewise, we don‚Äôt support American Express credit cards.
Apple Pay or Google Pay(new tab). You can add money to your account by using Apple Pay (for iOS devices) or GPay (for Android devices).You can choose to deposit between 20‚Ç¨ and 150‚Ç¨. Please note that prepaid cards are not accepted. Likewise, we don‚Äôt support American Express credit cards.
SEPA transfer. The transfer must be in EUR and within SEPA. You‚Äôll just need to provide your IBAN and your name as it‚Äôs written on the ID you used to create your account. You should also know that: 
For the transfer details, make sure the recipient‚Äôs name is your name as it‚Äôs written on the identity document you used to prove your identity (especially if you have an N26 Business account ‚Äì we don‚Äôt accept company names). 
The transfer will be instant if the sending bank support SEPA instant outgoing transfers, if not, it will completed within one banking day. Due to the opening times of the participating banks, one banking day may stretch to two working days.
In France, your first transfer can only be sent from another one of your accounts. For all other regions, you can use any other bank account to make the transfer (it doesn‚Äôt have to be under your name). 
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: How does N26 protect my money?
content: German deposit protection(new tab)¬†insures all deposits¬†up to ‚Ç¨100.000¬†held in the member states of the European Union. Customers with an account in the UK are protected up to the equivalent amount in GBP based on the exchange rate of the respective day. As the holder of a banking license, N26 Bank must comply with the rules of the German financial regulatory authority.

title: Wie kann ich im Betrugsfall mein Geld zur√ºckerhalten?
content:
Wenn du eine Transaktion nicht anerkennst oder sicher bist, dass du sie nicht autorisiert hast, reicht es nicht aus, deine Karte sperren zu lassen. In diesem Fall solltest du sofort:
Eine neue Karte bestellen und deine aktuelle als gestohlen markieren. Zerst√∂re die Karte mit einer Schere oder einem Aktenvernichter. Der Chip, die NFC-Antenne und der Magnetstreifen m√ºssen in St√ºcke geschnitten und getrennt entsorgt werden.
Ein Formular f√ºr Umsatzreklamationen ausf√ºllen. Danach tun wir unser Bestes, um dein Geld f√ºr dich zur√ºckzubekommen.
Du kannst dein Konto weiter f√ºr √úberweisungen verwenden, bis deine neue Karte eintrifft. Wenn du in Deutschland oder √ñsterreich bist, kannst du auch CASH26 f√ºr Bargeldabhebungen nutzen.
Manchmal kann es √ºbrigens vorkommen, dass der von deinem Konto abgebuchte Betrag von dem urspr√ºnglich autorisierten Zahlungsbetrag abweicht, etwa bei Zahlungen in Fremdw√§hrungen. Das deutet nicht unbedingt auf Betrug hin.

title: Wie viel kostet ein N26 Konto?
content:
Ein N26 Bankkonto ist kostenlos.* 
Je nach Region k√∂nnen zus√§tzliche Geb√ºhren anfallen:

title: How to find my IBAN or account number?
content:
You can find your IBAN and our BIC number on your balance statements or in¬†üë§ My Account¬†from the mobile app or¬†WebApp(new tab)¬†(if you haven‚Äôt activated your card and need to¬†top up your account).
All our IBANs start with DE followed by the¬†check digits¬†(two numbers), then our¬†bank code¬†10011001, and end with your 10-digit¬†account number¬†(start at 26).
If you open your account in the UK, you won't have an IBAN, but you will find your account number and our sort code 04-00-26 in the same section.
You can easily share your information through the share button in¬†üë§ My Account. Or you can download your bank account information as a PDF by logging into the¬†WebApp(new tab)¬†and selecting the cloud icon on the top-right corner of¬†Transactions.
Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial(new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube(new tab) channel.

title: Can I open an account if I live outside the eurozone?
content:
If you live in Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Liechtenstein, Switzerland or Iceland you may¬†open an account with us. We offer:
The choice between a standard bank account or N26 Business.
Accounts in ‚Ç¨, a German IBAN, and transfers with SEPA or Moneybeam.
Good currency conversion with your Mastercard debit card.
Free shipping of your Mastercard or ‚Ç¨25 for express.
Foreign currency transfers with TransferWise (with the standard account).
5 free ATM withdrawals in ‚Ç¨ in the EU (1.7% markup on foreign currencies withdrawals).
0.1% cashback on all card payments (for Business accounts).
2 Spaces in addition to the main account.
A bonus for every friend you successfully invite to N26 with our Refer a Friend Program.
Contactless payment with Google Pay and Apple Pay.
Tips for incoming and outgoing transfers:
We recommend choosing your local currency to get the best exchange rate when using your Mastercard for purchases or to withdraw cash (if not, additional fees may apply).
To top up your account using your local currency, we recommend converting your currency via SEPA transfer either using TransferWise (on their website(new tab)) or using your local bank.
For outgoing transfers to ‚Ç¨ accounts, simply use the app's internal SEPA transfer. For outgoing transfers to non-‚Ç¨ accounts, use TransferWise in the app.*
*Please note: TransferWise is unavailable for N26 Business accounts (only SEPA transfers in EUR).

title: Pubblico personalizzato
content:
Pubblico personalizzato - Trattamento dei dati nell'ambito di Facebook, Google e Zeotap.¬†

Pubblico personalizzato √® uno strumento online, che offre la possibilit√† di trovare corrispondenze di vario tipo tra gli utenti con lo scopo di creare un pubblico per il quale la visualizzazione di determinati annunci pubblicitari possa essere gradita.¬†
Nell‚Äôambito di N26, questo strumento permette ai nostri attuali clienti di visualizzare offerte promozionali o aggiornamenti di prodotti ma non, ad esempio, annunci pubblicitari relativi all‚Äôapertura di un conto N26.
Per poter creare Lookalike Audiences mettiamo a disposizione di Facebook, Google e Zeotap una versione hashed dell‚Äôindirizzo e-mail dei nostri utenti oppure dell'ID della loro applicazione mobile.¬†
Il cosiddetto "hashing" permette di criptare l'indirizzo e-mail o l'ID dell'applicazione mobile dell‚Äôutente in modo che quest‚Äôultimo non possa pi√π essere identificato.¬†La versione criptata dell‚Äôindirizzo e-mail o dell'ID dell'applicazione mobile viene associata all'indirizzo e-mail o all'ID dell'applicazione mobile gi√† in possesso di Facebook, Google e Zeotap. La versione hashed viene cancellata entro le successive 48 ore.
Condividere i dati con terzi oppure fornire a terzi l‚Äôaccesso ai dati degli utenti non √® consentito. Puoi trovare maggiori informazioni informazioni in merito nel sito di Facebook(nuova tabella),  di Google(nuova tabella) ¬†e¬† di Zeotap(nuova tabella).
Ai sensi dell'Art. 6 comma. 1 lit. a GDPR, puoi revocare il tuo consenso a questo trattamento dei dati tramite la webapp di N26 in qualsiasi momento.

title: How to open my N26 account?
content:
You can open an account in the app (on your smartphone) or in N26 for Web(new tab) if you:
are at least 18 years old
are a resident of a supported country
own a compatible smartphone
hold a supported ID (eligibility depends on whether you live in Germany(new tab) or outside of Germany(new tab))
don't already have an account with us
are able to verify yourself in one of our supported languages: English, German, Spanish, Italian, or French. Please note that only English is supported in the UK. 
This is how the sign-up process for an N26 bank account works:
After confirming your email, personal details, and shipping address, select the type of account you want. *
Prove your identity and connect your smartphone to your new account.
As a new signup, you'll be able to top up your account via Bank Transfer or CASH26 deposit (if you are in Germany, Austria or Italy). 
After a few days, you‚Äôll receive your N26 Mastercard by post.
If you'd like more information, here's how you can get in touch with us.
*If you meet our minimum creditworthiness criteria, you can open an N26 account. If you don‚Äôt, we may offer you an N26 Flex account (Germany only). This decision is calculated through an automated process.
We are available from 7:00 to 23:00 everyday, including Sundays and public holidays.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our Refer a Friend Program.

title: How does N26 Business You work?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Sweden.
It‚Äôs not yet possible to switch between private and business accounts so it‚Äôs important to know if N26 Business You is right for you:
The N26 Business You account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can‚Äôt have your company‚Äôs name on the account or card. 
The account is ‚Ç¨9,90 per month. The minimum membership is one year. Your contract automatically renews if you do not cancel your membership(new tab) at least 4 weeks before the contract expires.  
The premium account includes: Allianz Insurance Package including coverage for business purposes and fee-free foreign currency ATM withdrawals, 
The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. It‚Äôs currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (it‚Äôs available in Germany and Austria, and the Netherlands).
Transfers in foreign currencies aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business You.
You can sign-up during registration or if you‚Äôre already an N26 Business user.
You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 14‚Ç¨ through your N26 app. 
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: What to do if my account was hacked?
content:
If you suspect possible fraudulent activity on your account, please contact us as soon as possible. Our chat function is available in the app, on the N26 website(new tab), and at the end of some of our Support Center articles, such as this one. Just click on Start a chat. 
If you‚Äôd rather speak on the phone, you can request this during the chat. We‚Äôll arrange a callback within the hour so we can discuss the matter further with you. Once in contact with one of our agents, please thoroughly explain the situation to us.  Every detail here is important. 

Please be assured that we‚Äôll take all necessary measures to assist you in this situation. 
In addition to our legal obligations for fraud prevention, and in order to continually improve our security safeguards, we have a dedicated team who analyzes each fraud case individually. The fraud cases themselves are often relatively complicated and have to be dealt with in detail. Depending on the complexity, this can take a few days, but in some cases it can take several weeks.
Finally, if you have evidence or strong feelings that the account might have been hacked, we recommend that you file a police report as well.
To learn more about how we protect your account in case of fraud, visit our blog article(new tab). Visit our page about Security at N26(new tab) to discover our commitment to protect your funds and your account.
Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.
If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126.

title: How can I credit my salary on my N26 account?
content:
Having your salary credited to your N26 account is easy, simply provide your N26 IBAN to your employer, who‚Äôll transfer the amount to your account via SEPA transfer.
SEPA transfers are the official payment method of the SEPA area, which includes most of the European countries. In case your employer refuses to credit your salary through SEPA transfer because you have a German IBAN and not an Italian one, please check the "What to do if my N26 IBAN is not accepted" article on our Support Center.

title: Kann ich ein Konto er√∂ffnen, wenn ich au√üerhalb der Eurozone wohne?
content:
Wenn du in Polen, Schweden, D√§nemark, Norwegen, Liechtenstein, Island oder der Schweiz lebst, kannst du ein N26 Konto er√∂ffnen. Wir bieten dir:
Die Wahl zwischen einem Standard-Konto oder N26 Business.

√úberweisungen in Fremdw√§hrungen mit TransferWise (mit dem Standard-Konto).

0.1% Cashback auf alle Kartenzahlungen ( bei N26 Business).
2 zus√§tzliche Spaces zu deinem Hauptkonto

Tipps f√ºr ein- und ausgehende Zahlungen:
Damit du stets den g√ºnstigsten Wechselkurs erh√§ltst, empfehlen wir dir, bei Eink√§ufen und Bargeldabhebungen mit deiner Mastercard stets deine Landesw√§hrung auszuw√§hlen (andernfalls k√∂nnen zus√§tzliche Geb√ºhren anfallen).
Um Geld in deiner Landesw√§hrung auf dein Euro-Konto einzuzahlen, empfehlen wir dir eine SEPA-√úberweisung √ºber die TransferWise-Website(neuen Tab), unser Partner f√ºr Geldtransfers in Fremdw√§hrungen. Alternativ kannst du auch √ºber deine √∂rtliche Bank Geld √ºberweisen.
Ausgehende √úberweisungen auf Euro-Konten kannst du ganz einfach √ºber die Standardfunktion in der N26 App t√§tigen. √úberweisungen auf Konten in Fremdw√§hrungen kannst du √ºber TransferWise auch in der App t√§tigen.*

*Bitte beachte: TransferWise ist nicht f√ºr N26 Business verf√ºgbar (nur SEPA-√úberweisungen in Euro).

title: Come posso tenere traccia delle mie spese quotidiane?
content:
Le¬†transazioni¬†vengono ordinate automaticamente e i risultati visualizzati in Statistiche (angolo in alto a destra dell'app mobile) in ordine di:
Categorie: Raccogliamo informazioni sui rivenditori e sulle causali di pagamento al fine di migliorare la categorizzazione (come ad es. bancomat, cibo e generi alimentari, shopping). Se, ad esempio, mandi un Moneybeam con il testo di riferimento Pranzo
, verr√† inserito nella categoria Bar e ristoranti. Se secondo te una categoria non √® adatta, puoi modificarla semplicemente selezionando la transazione e scegliendo una categoria dall'elenco a discesa.
Hashtag: Abbiamo anche aggiunto degli hashtag standard per gli orari delle transazioni (#weekend), i tipi di transazioni (#libri), o i luoghi degli acquisti (#berlino). Puoi ordinare ulteriormente le transazioni aggiungendo degli hashtag personali: tocca una transazione e poi l'icona della matita per aggiungere un tag (ad esempio #viaggio_portogallo #ognimese) o rimuoverne uno.
Vuoi parlare di noi ai tuoi amici e guadagnarci? Ottieni ‚Ç¨15 per ogni amico che inviti con successo ad iscriversi ad N26. Scopri di pi√π sul nostro¬†programma Invita un amico.

title: How to reverse and block a direct debit?
content:
You have the ability to reverse a direct debit in the app yourself up to 8 weeks after it has been debited.
Open your transaction list and select the direct debit in question. 
Choose¬†Refund. 
The amount will then be credited to your account within 2 banking days.
*For Poland, Sweden, Denmark, and Norway only: if you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and ultimate amount that is collected from us.

title: How to protect my identity?
content:
To protect and help avoid the misuse of your personal data, please keep in mind that:
We will never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. This includes verifications for apartment rental contracts, lines of credit, or job offers (including jobs with N26). Only complete the verification process if you want to open an N26 bank account for yourself.
As the account owner, only you should create and have access to your login details. Never create an N26 bank account with a predefined email address and password. If you use login credentials that were given to you, these credentials may be used to reach your personal and legal information. Also, never log into an N26 account that is not yours.
Do not send your ID or passport to unknown or unverified recipients.
We may ask for certain documents when your transaction is subject to a routine check. Only send valid documentation to verified N26 email accounts.
We will never ask for your username, password, or PIN codes outside the N26 app. Never provide this information in an external website or app, even if it looks N26-related.
If you ever feel in doubt, have received a suspicious request from a third party, or think your N26 login may be compromised, please do not hesitate to contact us.

title: Why are some products and services unavailable to me?
content:
We collaborate with many partners. That‚Äôs why certain products and services require that you meet their requirements as well. The most common reasons why you wouldn‚Äôt be eligible for certain products:
Expired or unsupported identity documents (for example, certain passports due to a lack of security features).
You‚Äôre taxable in the United States. If so, you won‚Äôt be able to use certain invest or savings products. If this is not the case, contact our Customer Support via chat so we can look into your account details. You may need to switch your telephone number if it starts with a North American area code (+1).
You proved your identity using PostIdent (in Germany). We‚Äôll have to reset your account and you‚Äôll have to prove your identity again in order to use certain products and services. If this is the case, we‚Äôll email you about it and find a convenient time for you to do so.
The product or service is not yet available in your country.

title: Comment puis-je changer mon code de validation ?
content:
Votre¬†Code de validation¬†peut √™tre modifi√© √† tout moment.
Depuis la rubrique üë§ Mon compte, s√©lectionnez Param√®tres et S√©curit√© (ou simplement Param√®tres de s√©curit√© depuis la version web(nouvel onglet))
S√©lectionnez Changer le Code de validation
Saisissez le num√©ro Token √† 10 chiffres de votre Mastercard. Il se trouve sous votre nom ou au dos de votre carte si vous avez une carte N26 You.
Saisissez puis validez le nouveau Code de validation.
Si vous entrez un code de validation erron√© √† 6 reprises, il sera bloqu√© pour des raisons de s√©curit√©. Vous pouvez le restaurer en le changeant depuis votre application mobile en cliquant sur : üë§Mon compte > Param√®tres > S√©curit√© > Changer le code de validation.
Pour des raisons de s√©curit√©, les Codes de validation compos√©s des √©l√©ments de votre date de naissance ou de votre adresse, de r√©p√©titions de chiffres (par ex. 1111, 111 ou simplement 11) ou de suites de chiffres (par ex. 1234 ou 4321) ne sont pas accept√©s. Si le code que vous avez choisi est refus√©, nous vous invitons √† essayer une autre combinaison de chiffres.
Vous pr√©f√©rez une vid√©o plut√¥t qu'un texte? Regardez le tutoriel(nouvel onglet) sur notre cha√Æne YouTube N26 Support(nouvel onglet).

title: ¬øC√≥mo vincular o desvincular mi smartphone a mi cuenta?
content:
Para utilizar N26 necesitas un smartphone: ya sea un iPhone (5s en adelante, que tenga al menos iOS 11) o un Android (6.0 en adelante, no aceptamos versiones de Amazon Fire y Oxygen OS). Solo puedes vincular un m√≥vil por cuenta.
Necesitar√°s vincular y/o desvincular tu tel√©fono m√≥vil cuando crees una cuenta por primera vez o cuando tengas un nuevo dispositivo o n√∫mero de tel√©fono.
Para vincular tu cuenta a tu smartphone, entra en la app del m√≥vil y esta te pedir√° autom√°ticamente que¬†confirmes tu n√∫mero de tel√©fono.
Introduce el¬†c√≥digo de 4 d√≠gitos que te enviaremos por SMS¬†y tu tel√©fono se conectar√°.
Si quieres vincular un nuevo dispositivo, primero debes desvincular tu antiguo m√≥vil por¬†motivos de seguridad. Puedes hacer esto desde üë§ Mi Cuenta (en la app del m√≥vil) o desde la¬†Web App(pesta√±a nueva), en caso de no tener acceso a tu antiguo smartphone. Entra en¬†üë§ Mi Cuenta, luego en¬†Configuraci√≥n¬†y despu√©s en¬†Seguridad. Al hacerlo, recibir√°s un email con m√°s informaci√≥n.
Si inicias sesi√≥n en la cuenta con un dispositivo nuevo, vas a recibir dos c√≥digos por SMS: el c√≥digo de 6 d√≠gitos para iniciar sesi√≥n y el c√≥digo de 4 d√≠gitos para vincular el smartphone a la cuenta. Necesitar√°s el c√≥digo de inicio de sesi√≥n para entrar en tu cuenta y vincular tu dispositivo.

title: How to file a complaint?
content:
If you have any questions about our products or need help with your account, we‚Äôre happy to assist. Just open a chat with us directly within the mobile app or WebApp, that's the fastest and simplest way to get in touch.
If you ever feel dissatisfied with one of our products or services, you can also send (new tab)us an email from your registered address or send your feedback by post.
If you're in the UK, you can send the email to complaints.uk@n26.com (new tab)(new tab). For the rest of Europe please use¬†complaints@n26.com(new tab).
To file a complaint, please include:
your full name and address
the product or service you're not happy with
a description of your concern
the date in which the problem first appeared
We‚Äôll contact you via email to confirm that we‚Äôve received your complaint and then begin an investigation to find a solution you‚Äôre happy with. In case we need more information from you or we can provide you with an immediate solution, we‚Äôll let you know via email as well.
In case we‚Äôre not able to find a solution you‚Äôre happy with, you can escalate your complaint to an independent third party. You have a few options:
You could file a complaint with the Arbitro Bancario Finanziario(new tab)
You could seek to reach an amicable dispute settlement with the assistance of Conciliatore Bancario Finanziario(new tab)
You can also go before another entity specialised in amicable settlement of disputes on banking and financial services, as long as this entity is enrolled in the appropriate register kept by the Italian Ministry of Justice.
Also, the European Commission has set up the Online Dispute Resolution (ODR(new tab)) platform to help consumers dispute online contracts out of court.
We are committed to constantly improving our products and services. Your feedback makes this possible.

title: Puis-je t√©l√©charger l‚Äôapplication N26 sur mon t√©l√©phone ?
content:
Vous pouvez v√©rifier et t√©l√©charger la derni√®re version de l'application N26 depuis l'App Store(nouvel onglet)¬†d‚ÄôApple ou depuis le¬†Google Play Store(nouvel onglet).
Les conditions n√©cessaires pour les t√©l√©phones iPhone sont (pour conna√Ætre votre version d'iOS : Param√®tres > G√©n√©ralit√©s > Informations) :
Un iPhone 5s ou plus r√©cent
iOS 11 ou plus r√©cent
Les conditions n√©cessaires pour les t√©l√©phones Android sont (pour conna√Ætre votre version d'Android : Param√®tres > √Ä propos de votre appareil) :
Android 6.0 ou plus r√©cent
Vous souhaitez parler de nous √† vos amis ? Recevez 15 ‚Ç¨ √† chaque fois que l‚Äôun d‚Äôentre eux nous rejoint. D√©couvrez notre¬†programme de parrainage.

title: How does N26 Business work?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, and Switzerland.
It‚Äôs not yet possible to switch between accounts so it‚Äôs important to know if N26 Business is right for you:
The N26 Business account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can‚Äôt have your company‚Äôs name on the account or card.
The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. It‚Äôs currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (it‚Äôs available in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands).
As with the N26 bank account, the account is free and we cover certain cash withdrawals as part of our Fair Use Policy. Unlike other accounts, transfers in foreign currencies aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business within the app. You can visit Transferwise(new tab) for this.
Business to business (B2B) payments are not supported with a N26 Business account. 
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: Can I open an N26 account in my country?
content:
We offer our accounts in the following countries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, and the US.
You can open your account if you live in one of these countries and meet our¬†requirements. Our products and services vary by country. Should you have an existing account with us and move to a country where N26 is not yet available for 18 months or more please get in touch with our Customer Support.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: How to close my account?
content:
To cancel your N26 account, please send your request through live chat or via email to support@n26.com from your registered email address including the following information:
A statement requesting the closure of your account on a specific date or ASAP
Your name
Your N26 IBAN 
If you have a positive balance in your main account or your Spaces, we also need an IBAN within SEPA  to transfer your remaining balance.
A statement with your consent to send your account closure confirmation to your registered email address: ‚ÄúI hereby agree that N26 Bank is allowed to exchange personal data with me via email.‚Äú (Otherwise, the confirmation of account closure can be sent via post, but keep in mind that this solution will slow the process.)
Or you can reply using our¬†cancellation form(new tab).
A few things to consider when closing your account:
For a quick account closure: if you have a positive balance, please transfer your remaining balance yourself. If you have a negative balance, top up your account.
All outstanding fees are due immediately. This includes fees related to express delivery, and N26 You or N26 Metal (if applicable).
Destroy your cards by cutting them with scissors or a shredder. The chip, NFC antenna, and the magnetic strip should all be cut into pieces and disposed of separately.

title: How to open my N26 account?
content:
You can open an account in the app (on your smartphone) or in N26 for Web(new tab) if you:
are at least 18 years old
are a resident of a supported country
own a compatible smartphone
hold a supported ID (eligibility depends on whether you live in Germany(new tab) or outside of Germany(new tab))
don't already have an account with us
are able to verify yourself in one of our supported languages: English, German, Spanish, Italian, or French. Please note that only English is supported in the UK. 
This is how the sign-up process for an N26 bank account works:
After confirming your email, personal details, and shipping address, select the type of account you want. *
Prove your identity and connect your smartphone to your new account.
As a new signup, you'll be able to top up your account via Bank Transfer or CASH26 deposit (if you are in Germany, Austria or Italy). 
After a few days, you‚Äôll receive your N26 Mastercard by post.
If you'd like more information, here's how you can get in touch with us.
*If you meet our minimum creditworthiness criteria, you can open an N26 account. If you don‚Äôt, we may offer you an N26 Flex account (Germany only). This decision is calculated through an automated process.
We are available from 7:00 to 23:00 everyday, including Sundays and public holidays.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our Refer a Friend Program.

Tap Tell a friend.

Find out how you can be rewarded for your referrals with our¬†Refer a Friend Program¬†(available in select countries).

title: Why didn't I receive my pairing code via SMS?
content:
A pairing code is required to¬†connect your smartphone¬†to your account. If you didn‚Äôt receive this code via SMS for whatever reason, you can request a new one up to five times in the mobile app. Please wait 30 seconds before requesting a new one. 
If all five codes are requested and pairing is still unsuccessful, then for security reasons you‚Äôll be blocked from making further requests for 24 hours. If this happens, you can either wait or contact our Customer Support via chat - who would be happy to help you.
If your country code is outside of the EU, it‚Äôs likely that you‚Äôll need to contact us to receive a pairing code.

title: Comment cr√©er et modifier un virement permanent ?
content:
Lorsque vous effectuez un virement sortant depuis l'application mobile N26 ou depuis votre espace client en ligne, vous avez la possibilit√© d'en faire un virement permanent.
Apr√®s avoir entr√© les informations n√©cessaires pour effectuer votre virement et avant de le valider, vous avez la possibilit√© de cocher la case "Virement permanent ?".
Vous pourrez alors choisir la fr√©quence ainsi que l‚Äôintervalle de temps pendant lequel vous souhaitez effectuer votre virement permanent.
Pour visualiser vos virements d√©j√† planifi√©s dans l'application mobile N26 :
Acc√©dez √† votre liste de transactions sur l'√©cran principal.
Cliquez sur les trois traits en haut √† droite de votre √©cran et s√©lectionnez Virements Permanents.
Vous aurez alors acc√®s √† tous les d√©tails de vos virements permanents.
Vous pouvez √©galement annuler et/ou modifier les d√©tails de vos virements permanents. Pour annuler un virement permanent, il vous suffit de cliquer sur le virement concern√© puis sur l‚Äôic√¥ne ‚Äòcorbeille‚Äô en haut √† droite de votre √©cran.
‚ÑπÔ∏è Veuillez noter qu'en cas d'√©chec d'un virement permanent en raison de fonds insuffisants, nous ne tenterons pas d‚Äôeffectuer √† nouveau le virement - vous devrez le faire¬† manuellement. Cependant, les prochains virements permanents pr√©vus seront trait√©s normalement.

title: What to do if I can't repay my overdraft or loan?
content:
We offer repayment plans if you can‚Äôt repay your¬†overdraft¬†or loan with¬†N26 Credit. This could happen because your overdraft was cancelled or you need more than two months to repay your negative amount.
Here‚Äôs how it works: chat with us and propose a detailed plan on how you‚Äôre going to pay back your overdraft or loan in instalments, such as a certain amount every month until your loan is paid off. We don‚Äôt accept offers of simply paying back the whole sum at a later date.
We will then either accept, reject, or propose an alternative plan. It‚Äôs then up to you to confirm it.
By the way: your account will be closed if it‚Äôs negative for an extended period of time. All closure dates are final unless you pay back your loan before this date. If not, your debt will go to a collection agency.

title: How to manage my visibility as an N26 user?
content:
To grant you access to all our in-app features, N26 matches your contact data with other N26 users.
In order to manage your consent to be seen as a N26 user, you can simply go to üë§ My Account in the app and selecting Settings then Personal Settings and Personal information. Then just check or uncheck the box ‚ÄúI agree to be identifiable for other users as N26 customer‚Äù.
All of your contacts who have an N26 account set to visible will show up in the in-app contact list. Similarly, you‚Äôll also appear in the list of other N26 customers who have your contact information. Your contact list is not permanently stored by N26 and is only used when accessing the respective N26 feature.
You can access to all our in-app features,¬†e.g.¬†MoneyBeam, which carries out real-time transactions without¬†typing in a 22-digit IBAN, but only by selecting a name from your contact list. Vice versa, you can also request money from people in your contact list who then only have to accept (or decline) your request. Also, being visible¬†enables you to use Shared Spaces, a sub-account, which you can share with other N26 users¬†selected from your contact list.

title: How to upgrade to N26 You?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Poland, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden.
You can upgrade to N26 You¬†during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you have a standard N26 bank account. 
To upgrade to N26 You in the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 You. You can choose between one of our five new colours when ordering a new card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.
Then choose your preferred delivery method, accept the N26 You T&C's(new tab) and your new card will be on the way. 
Standard deliveries take up to 10 business days whereas express deliveries take 3 business days. 
The membership fee of ‚Ç¨9,90 will be deducted directly from your account every month on the date of your upgrade.
The minimum contract period for the N26 You membership is one year. Your membership will automatically renew unless you cancel it up to four weeks before the contract ends. 
You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 14‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.

title: How does 3D Secure work?
content:
3D Secure protects you from online card fraud. It‚Äôs automatically activated when you activate your card in the app. No additional passwords are required.
Whenever you make an online payment using your Mastercard, 3D Secure confirms the transaction with you within 5 minutes via a¬†push message. If you don't see the transaction, try some of the¬†troubleshooting tips¬†we've collected.
If you make a purchase using your smartphone, you‚Äôll see a pending transaction in the app. Tap on the bell icon and the push message will appear for you to confirm and finalize your purchase. Then go back to the merchant‚Äôs website. You should see a confirmation of your successful purchase within a few moments.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: PSD2 - Strong Customer Authentication
content:
SCA acts as an additional layer of security for all N26 customers by providing Two-Factor Authentication (2FA). This is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. You‚Äôre probably familiar with using just your personal password to sign in to your account but with Two-Factor Authentication you‚Äôll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.
When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you‚Äôll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number to confirm your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log into your N26 account. 
When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. Therefore, the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.
SCA is being introduced as part of the revised European Payments Services Directive (PSD2) which applies to all European Banks. The objective of PSD2 is to enhance the security of the customers‚Äô data and account security. Find out more about PSD2 in our dedicated article about the PSD2. 
I cannot log into my account. How do I solve this?
First, try update your phone to the newest version. If you still cannot log into your account but still have access to your registered email address, please try to reset your password. If you don‚Äôt have access to your registered email address, please contact us via our live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out. 
I lost access to my paired device. How will I be able to log into my account again?
If you lost access to your paired device but you still have access to your registered phone number, please log into your N26 account and request an authentication code. To do this:
Login to the Webapp
When prompted to confirm your login on your paired device, select Help 
Choose Send SMS Code
Once you receive the SMS code, input it into the Webapp
As you confirm the authentication code you‚Äôve completed two-factor authentication and you‚Äôll be able to pair your new device with your account again.
If you don‚Äôt have access to your registered phone number - either because you have a new phone number or your phone was lost or stolen - please contact our customer service via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out. 
What if my phone doesn‚Äôt support the latest app version?
If you have an older smartphone device that doesn‚Äôt support the latest app version,  you won‚Äôt be able to access N26 via the mobile app anymore using your phone.¬†
You can still use our Webapp to view your account, to do this you'll need to confirm your login attempt via an SMS verification code which we‚Äôll send to your account's registered phone number. 
You‚Äôll still be able to complete card transactions and cash withdrawals as normal using your Mastercard but bear in mind that you won't be able to perform any bank transfers or payments until you can confirm the transfer within the N26 app.

3D Secure protects you from online card fraud. It‚Äôs automatically activated when you activate your card in the app. No additional passwords are required.
Whenever you make an online payment using your Mastercard, 3D Secure confirms the transaction with you within 5 minutes via a¬†push message. If you don't see the transaction, try some of the¬†troubleshooting tips¬†we've collected.

title: ¬øC√≥mo a√±adir y eliminar participantes en un espacio compartido?
content:
C√≥mo eliminar a un participante de un espacio compartido:
En la secci√≥n ''Espacios'', pulsa sobre el men√∫ en los tres puntos de la esquina superior derecha. 
iOS: desde la lista de participantes, pulsa sobre la flecha que est√° al lado del nombre que quieres eliminar. Android: Pincha en el nombre del participante.
Pulsa en ‚Äòrevocar poder notarial‚Äô.
Confirma la notificaci√≥n en la siguiente pantalla y pincha sobre ‚Äòrevocar poder notarial‚Äô.
Para unirte a un espacio compartido:
En la secci√≥n ''Espacios'', pulsa sobre el espacio ''Pendiente'' y el icono de compartir espacio. 
Lee el resumen del espacio compartido y despu√©s lee la pantalla del poder notarial. 
Cuando lo hayas le√≠do, marca la casilla verde y pulsa sobre ''Otorgar poder notarial''.
Introduce tu PIN de confirmation.
Confirma la notificaci√≥n ''Aceptar poder notarial'' que te llegar√° a tu dispositivo vinculado.
Necesitas tener alg√∫n espacio sin utilizar para aceptar la invitaci√≥n a un espacio compartido. En caso contrario, tendr√°s que eliminar alguno para liberar espacio. 
No debes tener ning√∫n espacio con el mismo nombre o imagen que el espacio compartido. Solo puedes aceptar la invitaci√≥n para unirte a un espacio compartido cuando hayas cambiado el nombre o al imagen del otro espacio. 
Para salirte de un espacio compartido:
En la secci√≥n ''Espacios'', pulsa sobre el men√∫ en los tres puntos de la esquina superior derecha. 
Dentro de la configuraci√≥n pulsa en ''Abandonar espacio compartido.''
Confirma la notificaci√≥n en la siguiente pantalla y pincha en ''Abandonar espacio compartido.''
Se puede crear y modificar un espacio compartido desde la app de N26 y la web app.

title: Get in touch with N26 customer support.
content:
Need some help? We're here for you. 
You can find answers to our most commonly asked questions by searching our Support Center.
The N26 customer support team is  available between 9:00am EST and 12:00am EST from Monday through Friday and from 9:00am EST till 9:00pm EST on Saturday and Sunday. In order to directly contact customer support, you may: 
Call us at 1-888-N26-0-N26 (1-888-626-0626) *
Chat directly from the N26 mobile app, web app(new tab) or from certain Support Center articles, such as this one. 
Email us at support-us@n26.com
During customer support‚Äôs off-hours, please email support-us@n26.com and we will get back to you as soon as we can.
* for US customers only.
The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Why did my online purchase fail?
content:
Some reasons why your online payment failed:
If you are unable to confirm the push message within 5 minutes, simply restart the payment process on the merchant's website.
If you do not receive a push message, please make sure that your smartphone is connected and that push messages are enabled on your smartphone.
Ensure that online payments and payments abroad are enabled in your card settings.
A stable internet connection is required.
If you are using an iOS device, make sure you turn off the Do Not Disturb mode.
If the amount on the merchant's site is different from the one stated in the push message, this may be due to the conversion of a foreign currency into euros.
Make sure that you disable any Adblockers running on your browser.
Your Maestro card can‚Äôt be used for online purchases.

title: PSD2 - Starke Kundenauthentifizierung
content:
SCA verbessert die Sicherheit aller N26 Kundenkonten, indem es Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung einf√ºhrt. Wenn du dich in dein N26 Konto in der WebApp oder einem nicht-verkn√ºpften Ger√§t einloggst, wirst du nach einer zus√§tzlichen Best√§tigung gefragt. Diese kannst du entweder via Push-Mitteilung von deinem verkn√ºpften Handy geben oder indem du einen Authentifizierungs-Code best√§tigst, den wir dir per SMS schicken. So wird die Sicherheit erh√∂ht, dass nur du dich in dein N26 Konto einloggen kannst.¬†
Wenn du dich vom verkn√ºpften Handy in deine N26 App einloggst, findet die Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung schon automatisch statt, sodass der Login Prozess von deinem verkn√ºpften Ger√§t unver√§ndert bleibt.
SCA wird im Rahmen der Zahlungsdiensterichtlinie PSD2 eingef√ºhrt, die f√ºr alle europ√§ischen Banken gilt. Das Ziel von PSD2 ist es, die Sicherheit der Daten und Bankkonten der Kunden zu verbessern. Erfahre mehr √ºber PSD2 in diesem Artikel in unserem Support Center.
Ich kann mich nicht in mein Konto einloggen. Was soll ich tun?
Bitte installiere die neueste App-Version auf deinem Smartphone. Wenn du dich nicht in dein Konto einloggen kannst, aber noch Zugriff auf deine hinterlegte E-Mail Adresse hast, versuche bitte, dein Passwort zur√ºckzusetzen. Falls du keinen Zugriff mehr auf deine hinterlegte E-Mail Adresse hast, kontaktieren uns bitte im Live Chat und wir helfen dir gerne weiter.
Ich habe keinen Zugriff mehr auf mein verkn√ºpftes Handy. Wie kann ich auf mein Konto zugreifen?
Wenn du auf dein verkn√ºpftes Smartphone keinen Zugriff mehr hast, aber deine registrierte Telefonnummer noch verwenden kannst, logge dich in dein N26 Konto ein und fordere einen Authentifizierungs-Code per SMS an. Das funktioniert so:
Logge dich in die WebApp ein.
Wenn du aufgefordert wirst, dich in dein verkn√ºpftes Smartphone einzuloggen, klicke auf Hilfe.
Klicke auf SMS-Code schicken.
Gib den Code in der WebApp ein.
Nun hast du die Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung abgeschlossen und kannst dein neues Smartphone mit deinem N26 Konto wieder wie gewohnt verkn√ºpfen.
Falls dir deine registrierte Telefonnummer nicht mehr zur Verf√ºgung steht - z.B. weil du eine neue Telefonnummer hast oder dein Handy verloren oder gestohlen wurde - kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice im Live-Chat und wir helfen dir gerne weiter.
Was passiert, wenn mein Smartphone die neueste App-Version nicht mehr unterst√ºtzt?
In dem Fall kannst du mit diesem Ger√§t nicht mehr auf die mobile N26 App zugreifen.¬†
Deine Mastercard kannst du aber nach wie vor verwenden und dich auch √ºber den Browser in die N26 WebApp einloggen. 
Es ist nicht m√∂glich, √ºber die WebApp √úberweisungen durchzuf√ºhren, es sei denn, du kannst deinen Login-Versuch mit einem Verifizierungscode best√§tigen. Diesen werden wir dir per SMS an die Telefonnummer schicken, die in deinem N26 Konto hinterlegt ist.
