title: What is CASH26?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Applies to German, Austrian and Italian T&C
CASH26 allows you to withdraw or deposit cash by creating and showing a barcode at our participating stores. 
CASH26 is available in:
11.918 REWE, Penny, dm, real, Budni, Ludwig, Eckert, ON, Adam‚Äôs, OMV, Barbarino or Rossmann locations in Germany,¬†
2.019 participating dm, Billa, Merkur, and PENNY Austria locations in Austria¬†
202 PAM & Panorama and 386 PENNY stores in Italy.
You can find your nearest location, including opening times and directions, on the CASH26 map in the app‚Äîtap on the Actions tab in the bottom right hand corner of your mobile app and select CASH26.
Withdrawals:
As soon as you create a withdrawal barcode, the amount will be deducted from your balance. If you change your mind, you can delete the code and the amount will instantly return to your account.
If a barcode remains unused, the amount will be returned to your account after 10 minutes.
You can withdraw up to ‚Ç¨900 (‚Ç¨200 per transaction) within 24 hours.
Withdrawals are always free.
Deposits:
Deposits made with CASH26 are available on your account right away.
You can deposit up to ‚Ç¨999 (minimum ‚Ç¨50 per deposit) within 24 hours.
You can deposit up to ‚Ç¨100 a month for free. Extra deposits are charged a fee of 1,5% of the deposit amount.
You don't need to buy anything in the store to make a withdrawal or deposit cash.
Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial(new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube(new tab) channel.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: Wie k√ºndige ich meine N26 You oder N26 Metal Mitgliedschaft?
content:
N26 You(neuen Tab) oder¬†N26 Metal(neuen Tab)¬†Mitgliedschaften haben eine Laufzeit von einem Jahr. Die Mitgliedschaft verl√§ngert sich automatisch um ein weiteres Jahr, wenn du sie nicht k√ºndigst. 
In diesem Artikel erkl√§ren wir dir den Unterschied zwischen Widerruf, K√ºndigung der Mitgliedschaft und K√ºndigung der Erneuerung. Du kannst:
Deine Mitgliedschaft innerhalb der 14-t√§gigen Widerrufsfrist vollst√§ndig widerrufen
Deine Mitgliedschaft zu einem beliebigen Zeitpunkt bis einen Monat vor Laufzeitende k√ºndigen
Die automatische Erneuerung deiner Mitgliedschaft bis einen Monat vor Laufzeitende k√ºndigen
So funktioniert‚Äôs im Detail:
Du kannst deine Mitgliedschaft innerhalb der 14-t√§gigen Widerrufsfrist stornieren. Er√∂ffne dazu einfach einen Live-Chat aus der App oder WebApp und wir helfen dir gerne weiter.
Beachte, dass du dich nach einer vorzeitigen Beendigung nicht mehr f√ºr die gleiche Mitgliedschaft anmelden kannst.
Wenn du deine Mitgliedschaft sofort oder zu einem bestimmten Zeitpunkt k√ºndigen m√∂chtest, der *einen Monat vor der Erneuerung und nach der zweiw√∂chigen Widerrufsfrist liegt, kontaktiere uns bitte.
Wenn du diese Option w√§hlst, enden auch alle Vorteile von N26 You oder N26 Metal vorzeitig, wie z. B. deinen Versicherungsschutz.
Du kannst die automatische Erneuerung bis zu 4 Wochen vor Ablauf deiner N26 You oder N26 Metal Mitgliedschaft k√ºndigen. So funktioniert‚Äôs:
Logge dich in die mobile App ein und gehe zu üë§ Mein Konto
W√§hle N26 You/Metal aus
Tippe auf Details der Mitgliedschaft und dann auf Mitgliedschaft k√ºndigen
(hier siehst du auch das Ende der Vertragslaufzeit)
Best√§tige die Stornierung √ºber die Push-Mitteilung, die wir dir senden
Du kannst deine N26 You oder N26 Metal Mastercard bis zum Ablauf deiner Mitgliedschaft voll nutzen. Das bedeutet, dass du deinen Versicherungsschutz so lange beh√§ltst, wie du deinen Mitgliedsbeitrag bezahlen musst. Danach funktioniert deine Mastercard genauso wie die Standardkarte, jedoch ohne die Vorteile. Wir schicken dir automatisch eine Standardkarte, bevor dein Vertrag endet. Dazu brauchst du uns nicht zu kontaktieren.
8 Wochen vor der Erneuerung erinnern wir dich noch einmal per Push-Nachricht.
Wenn du dein Konto endg√ºltig schlie√üen m√∂chtest, sieh dir unseren Artikel Wie kann ich mein Konto schlie√üen? an.

title: How to get my money back in case of fraud?
content:
If you don‚Äôt recognize a transaction or you‚Äôre sure you didn‚Äôt authorize it,¬†blocking your card¬†won‚Äôt be enough. In these cases you should immediately:
Request new card(new tab) and indicate that the old one has been stolen. Please tear up the card by cutting it with scissors, for example. Both the chip, the NFC antenna and the magnetic stripe must be cut into pieces.
Then fill out the dispute form(new tab). From there we will do everything we can to get your money back.
You can continue using your account for bank transfers until your new card arrives. If you're in Germany or Austria, you can also use¬†CASH26¬†for cash withdrawals.
You should keep in mind that changes in the¬†final amount debited¬†from your account don't necessarily indicate fraud.

title: How to connect or disconnect my smartphone to my account?
content:
In order to use your N26 account, you need a smartphone : either an iPhone (5s or newer, at least iOS 11) or an Android (6.0 or newer - we do not support the customized versions of Amazon Fire and Oxygen OS). Only one device can be paired per account.
You'll need to pair and/or unpair your smartphone when you first create an account or if you get a new phone number or device.
To pair your smartphone with your account, simply open the app on your smartphone. You will be asked to¬†confirm your mobile phone number.
Enter the¬†4-digit code we send you via SMS¬†and your phone is paired. 
If you want to pair a new device, you must unpair your old device for¬†security reasons. You can do this in¬†üë§ My Account¬†(mobile app) or in the¬†Web app(new tab)¬†under¬†üë§ My Account¬†then¬†Security Settings if you don‚Äôt have access to your smartphone anymore. You‚Äôll receive an email from us with further instructions.
If you log into your N26 account with a new device, you'll receive two codes ‚Äì a Login SMS code with 6 digits and Pairing SMS code with 4 digits. You'll need the Login code to access your account and the Pairing code for pairing your device.

title: Why hasn't my referral bonus arrived?
content:
Once your friend has completed all the eligibility criteria of our¬†Refer a Friend Program, we'll verify your reward. You can always sign in to your account in the app or¬†WebApp(new tab)¬†to check your reward status.
In most cases the referral bonus isn‚Äôt rewarded because the invited friend hasn‚Äôt made a first Mastercard transaction of 15 EUR. Please make sure to inform your friend of these requirements.
Keep in mind that the reward process could take up to 60 days.
N26 retains the right to withhold a reward in case of suspicious activity that violates the¬†Terms and Conditions(new tab).
Currently, Friend referral rewards are only available for customers in Germany, Austria, Italy, France, Spain, Belgium, Luxembourg, Greece, Portugal, Ireland, the Netherlands, Finland, Estonia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden, Switzerland, Norway, Denmark, Poland, Iceland and Liechtenstein.

title: How do I reorder a card?
content:
If you have a previously activated card and need to order a new one for whatever reason, you can easily reorder a card directly from within our mobile application. To order a new card:
1. Log in and tap on ‚ÄúActions".
2. Tap on "Card Settings", then "Reorder". 
3. If you've never activated your card, please contact us so that we can order a card for you. You can reach us by phone at 1-888-N26-0-N26 (1-888-626-0626) or chat in our mobile application or via the WebApp. (new tab)
Once your new card arrives, you‚Äôll need to activate it in the mobile application.
The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Taking steps to keep you and your family safe
content:
In light of recent global developments surrounding coronavirus (COVID-19), we‚Äôd like to take a moment to let you know that we‚Äôre taking all the necessary steps to make sure our banking and customer service capabilities remain uninterrupted and ready to support you in these uncertain times. Please rest assured that your N26 account ‚Äî along with all of our products and features ‚Äî will continue to function normally, and we‚Äôre working with our Customer Support teams to make sure we have coverage to answer your questions.
We are closely following guidance from the CDC, the World Health Organization (WHO), and local health authorities to prioritize our teams‚Äô safety and to find ways to best keep supporting you.
We recommend you take this opportunity to make sure you have the latest version of the N26 app so you have access to our latest tools and services. With N26, you can:
Add money to your account without leaving home.
Shop online anywhere debit cards are accepted.
Transfer funds instantly to other N26 users with MoneyBeam.
View balances, transactions, and statements from the N26 app.
Should you need to access cash, our ATM map in the ‚ÄúActions‚Äù tab of the N26 app can help you find the most convenient location out of over 55,000 fee-free AllPoint ATMs, plus you have 2 additional free out-of-network withdrawals per month from anywhere in the US.
Contact our customer support team(new tab)
Learn more about adding money to your N26 account directly from the app or online¬†here(new tab), and check out¬†our blog(new tab)¬†for more updates.
In the meantime, we‚Äôre working hard to make sure we support you as the situation develops. Please take time to focus on yourself and your family‚Äôs health and wellbeing.
We‚Äôre wishing you all the best. Stay safe out there.
Your Friends at N26
The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: What are Shared Spaces?
content:
Shared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 users to share money together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.
Shared Spaces are available to N26 premium users (You / Business You / Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their Space. 
Participants can be any N26 account holder regardless of their account type.
The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.
The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants for their space.
Similar to regular Spaces, Shared Spaces have neither an IBAN nor a card attached to them.

title: PSD2 - Secure Open Banking
content:
Payment Services Directive 2 (‚ÄúPSD2‚Äù) is a revised European directive allowing you to access your account information and initiate payments through regulated third-party providers in a safe and secure manner. 
 
This means that you can permit regulated Third Party Providers to access your account information through a dedicated interface: 
You can enable an Account Information Service (AIS) to pull together data from different bank accounts you may have, and then aggregate and manage their details in the same place through certified third-party providers.
You can securely pay at the checkout of any website that offers Payment Initiation Services (PIS). 
The data exchange is handled in the background via our partner - Token.io.
If you begin using a third-party payment service like an Account Information Service or a Payment Initiation Service, you‚Äôll be redirected to your N26 app via Token.io to confirm the access request.
In our Privacy Policy(new tab) we inform you about the purposes, involved parties and legal bases of the necessary data processing involved to fulfil our obligations as part of the revised European Payment Services Directive.
Why can't I link any Third Party Provider to my account?
If a third party provider has not integrated with our dedicated interface, the third party provider will need to integrate with our dedicated interface via our partner Token.io.
How can I revoke an individual access permission I have granted to a third party provider?
You need to contact the respective Third Party Provider and revoke the access permission directly with them.¬†
*applies to all countries in the EEA.

title: How to top up my account?
content:
Once you are successfully verified, you'll be able to top up your account in several ways:
CASH26 (in Germany, Austria, and Italy). Deposit cash through our partner stores;
MoneyBeam. Instantly receive money from other N26 users;
Debit card. You can add money to your account by entering the card details from your other account within the N26 app. You can choose to deposit between 20‚Ç¨ and 150‚Ç¨. Please note that prepaid cards are not accepted. Likewise, we don‚Äôt support American Express credit cards.
Apple Pay or Google Pay(new tab). You can add money to your account by using Apple Pay (for iOS devices) or GPay (for Android devices).You can choose to deposit between 20‚Ç¨ and 150‚Ç¨. Please note that prepaid cards are not accepted. Likewise, we don‚Äôt support American Express credit cards.
SEPA transfer. The transfer must be in EUR and within SEPA. You‚Äôll just need to provide your IBAN and your name as it‚Äôs written on the ID you used to create your account. You should also know that: 
For the transfer details, make sure the recipient‚Äôs name is your name as it‚Äôs written on the identity document you used to prove your identity (especially if you have an N26 Business account ‚Äì we don‚Äôt accept company names). 
The transfer will be instant if the sending bank support SEPA instant outgoing transfers, if not, it will completed within one banking day. Due to the opening times of the participating banks, one banking day may stretch to two working days.
In France, your first transfer can only be sent from another one of your accounts. For all other regions, you can use any other bank account to make the transfer (it doesn‚Äôt have to be under your name). 
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: How to change my card limits?
content:
You can change your¬†card PIN, define your daily withdrawal or payment limits, and enable or disable your ATM withdrawals, online or payments abroad in¬†üë§ My Account¬†by selecting¬†Card Settings¬†in the mobile app or¬†WebApp(new tab).
Each change you make is applied instantly to all of your cards.
You can also¬†block your card¬†or order a new one, in case it‚Äôs lost or stolen.
Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial(new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube(new tab) channel.

title: What are the benefits of N26 Metal?
content:
Upgrade to N26 Metal¬†and you‚Äôll receive 10 additional¬†Spaces, dedicated Customer Support, access to exclusive partner offerings(new tab), as well as the N26 Metal¬†insurance package, provided by Allianz Global Assistance*, which covers a broad range of personal and financial benefits:
Travel insurance. Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 4 hours, and medical repatriation expenses**.

Purchase protection. Reimbursement or repair costs for stolen or damaged qualifying items purchased with an N26 Metal Mastercard or N26 Metal account if the theft or accident is an insured event in your home country or abroad**.

Access to LoungeKey airport lounges.
Keep these in mind when considering¬†N26 Metal(new tab):
N26 Metal features an NFC-enabled Mastercard with a metal card in your choice of charcoal black, quartz rose, or slate grey.

If you upgrade to N26 Metal, the monthly fee of ¬£14.90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month. If you‚Äôre a new customer, the first fee will be deducted 15 days after you prove your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on your sign-up date.

Access to LoungeKey provides entry to over 1,000 airport lounges across the world. Access as part of Metal membership can include food, shopping and spa benefits. Entrance costs ¬£20 per visit.
The minimum membership is one year. Your contract automatically renews if you do not cancel your membership at least 4 weeks before the contract expires.
*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.
** Terms and conditions apply.

La carte Mastercard N26 Business
La carte N26 Business est une Mastercard con√ßue exclusivement pour une utilisation professionnelle. Elle poss√®de les m√™mes fonctionnalit√©s que la carte N26 Standard. title: How to use Apple Pay?
content:
(Applies to Germany, Austria, France, Italy, Spain, Finland, Ireland, Iceland, Greece, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Portugal, Slovakia, Estonia, Belgium, Poland, Norway, Netherlands, Sweden, Denmark, Switzerland and the UK)
Apple Pay allows you to make payments with your smartphone so you don‚Äôt have to carry your Mastercard everywhere.
We‚Äôve made a¬†video(new tab)¬†to help you set up your N26 Mastercard with Apple Pay.
Some tips to keep in mind:
Your iPhone region matches the country where your Mastercard was first shipped to (you can check your region by selecting Settings then General and Language & Region in your phone).

If you‚Äôve lost your iPhone and aren‚Äôt able to find it again using Find My iPhone, you can always access your iCloud and remove all Apple Pay devices via the web browser on a Mac or PC. In addition, you should turn on Lost Mode to block your Mastercard for Apple Pay. Payments with your physical card will still be possible.

If your N26 Mastercard is unexpectedly removed from Apple Wallet, it may be because you have logged out of your iCloud, turned off Passcode or Touch ID, reset your device to factory settings via iTunes, or deleted all the content and settings from your device. In all cases, you can simply add your card again. Keep in mind that the card won‚Äôt be removed if you update your operating system, reset your personal device settings, or turn off Find My iPhone.

For in-store or online purchases, you must authorize your payment via Touch ID or using your passcode. If you‚Äôre using Apple Watch, authorizations are done by double-clicking on the side button. And if you‚Äôre using your Mac, authorize your payment by using Touch ID via the Touch Bar in the top-right corner of your keyboard.

If you're an N26 Metal or N26 Business You customer, it may happen that the card image displayed in your Apple Wallet shows as an N26 You card (for Metal customers) or as an N26 Business card (for Business You customers). We're working now to resolve this. Rest assured that this does not affect the usability of Apple Pay or your premium membership.

Make sure your device meets the technical requirements by visiting Apple Support(new tab):
iPhone 6 or later, iPhone SE: available in apps, stores and web
Apple Watch paired with iPhone 5 or later: available in apps and stores
iPad Pro, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 3, iPad mini 4: available in apps and web
Macs introduced in 2012 or later (Macs other than the MacBook Pro with Touch Bar and Touch ID require an iPhone or Apple Watch: available in web

title: What to do if my N26 IBAN is not accepted?
content:
Your IBAN includes the DE country code, a two-digit check number, the eight-digit bank sort code, and your ten-digit account number. For example:¬†DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.
The participating countries of the SEPA area (Single Euro Payments Area) have agreed on the IBAN system in order to simplify national and international payments, and to reduce the risk of error in the communication and processing of transactions.
Merchants or employers who do not accept IBANs from other member states of the European Economic Area are violating European law as of 1 February 2016 (Article 9 of¬†Regulation No 260/2012(new tab)).
If you are ever affected by IBAN discrimination, please¬†contact your relevant national authority(new tab) directly and notify them. Provide your contact details, the name of the merchant or company that didn‚Äôt accept your IBAN, as well as a brief description of the incident (including a screenshot of the rejection or other documentation of your communication with them).

You will be asked to confirm your phone number.
We will send a 4-digit code via SMS to the phone number you provided.
Enter the 4-digit code to complete pairing.

title: How does N26 protect my money?
content: German deposit protection(new tab)¬†insures all deposits¬†up to ‚Ç¨100.000¬†held in the member states of the European Union. Customers with an account in the UK are protected up to the equivalent amount in GBP based on the exchange rate of the respective day. As the holder of a banking license, N26 Bank must comply with the rules of the German financial regulatory authority.

title: How to order my card with express delivery?
content:
Not available for Metal cards.
Express delivery is a good option if you need your card in a hurry or if postal deliveries have sometimes failed to reach you for whatever reason.
You‚Äôll be given the option to select express delivery when choosing a delivery method for your first card or if you¬†reorder a card. You‚Äôll then receive a tracking link by email. If you‚Äôre not home during the delivery and your mailbox can‚Äôt be accessed, the card will be left at a nearby access point (you can find it through the provided tracking link). The card only stays at the access point for a limited amount of time. After that, it‚Äôll be returned to us. We‚Äôll inform you by email if that happens.
If you order via express delivery, keep in mind that:
Your new Standard or N26 You Mastercard will be delivered within 2-3 working days. Express delivery is not available for Metal cards.
Deliveries take place between 08:00 and 12:00. 
Deliveries can be made by DHL express to all of our supported countries within Europe. It‚Äôs currently not possible to make deliveries to other countries.
It‚Äôs not possible to cancel or change an express delivery once it‚Äôs been selected as the delivery method.
To close an account, you must pay for the express delivery of your card.
If your card hasn‚Äôt arrived within 3-5 working days of placing your order, please check the tracking link for an update. You can also use the tracking link to inform DHL directly about the details of your delivery address or to redirect the shipment if you can‚Äôt be there at the time of delivery.
N26 Standard and N26 You cards have a fee of ‚Ç¨6 for standard shipping and ‚Ç¨25 for express shipping (which includes the ‚Ç¨6 card replacement fee).

title: How to activate my card?
content:
Once you receive your physical card, you‚Äôll need to activate it. You can do this in the app only after you connect your smartphone to your account. Or you can activate it directly from the web app(new tab). 
You‚Äôll need your 10-digit token number: it‚Äôs found below your name on the front of your card (or on the back if you have an N26 You, N26 Metal, or Maestro card). 
To activate your card on the N26 app, from the Home screen:
Go to the Actions tab,
Select Cards settings and swipe until you see the card you want to activate,
Tap Activate.

To activate your card on the web app, just select Activate card from the Home screen.

If you live in France, Spain, Ireland, Greece, Finland, Estonia or in the UK you must make a first ATM withdrawal to fully activate your card.
If you have multiple cards (for example, you ordered your card more than once or your delivery was delayed), you can only activate your most recent card. All other cards will be disabled.
You‚Äôll need to follow these activation steps every time you reorder a new card, like if your card is lost, stolen, broken, or you upgrade your account. ¬†¬†
After you activate your card, the next step is choosing a card PIN.

title: Wie kann ich mein Konto schlie√üen?
content:
Um dein Konto zu schlie√üen, schicke uns eine E-Mail an support@n26.com von deiner registrierten E-Mail-Adresse oder kontaktiere uns im Live Chat mit folgenden Informationen:
Eine Erkl√§rung, ob du dein Konto zu einem bestimmten Datum oder dem n√§chstm√∂glichen Zeitpunkt k√ºndigen m√∂chtest
Deinen vollst√§ndigen Namen
Deine N26 IBAN
Falls dein Kontostand positiv ist oder du noch Guthaben in deinen Spaces hast, brauchen wir zus√§tzlich eine SEPA IBAN auf die wir dein Restguthaben √ºberweisen k√∂nnen.
Die folgende Einverst√§ndniserkl√§rung, damit wir dir deine K√ºndigungsbest√§tigung an deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse schicken d√ºrfen: ‚ÄúHiermit best√§tige ich, dass N26 mir meine personenbezogenen Daten an meine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse schicken darf.‚Äù Alternativ k√∂nnen wir dir deine K√ºndigungsbest√§tigung per Post schicken, aber beachte bitte, dass es auf diesem Weg etwas l√§nger dauert.
Oder du kannst unser¬†K√ºndigungsformular(neuen Tab)¬†verwenden.
Ein paar Dinge, die du bei der Schlie√üung deines Kontos beachten solltest:
Am schnellsten kannst du dein Konto schlie√üen, indem du eventuelles Restguthaben selbst auf ein anderes Konto √ºberweist. Wenn dein Kontostand negativ ist, zahle Geld auf dein Konto ein.
Alle ausstehenden Geb√ºhren sind sofort f√§llig. Darin enthalten sind Geb√ºhren f√ºr Expresslieferungen und N26 You oder N26 Metal (falls zutreffend).
Zerst√∂re deine Karten mit einer Schere oder einem Aktenvernichter. Der Chip, die NFC-Antenne und der Magnetstreifen m√ºssen in St√ºcke geschnitten und separat entsorgt werden.

title: FATCA - Why we require certain information from our customers
content:
As a financial institution, N26 is required to report information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers or by foreign entities (in which U.S. taxpayers hold a substantial ownership interest according to FATCA) to the United States Department of Treasury and the Internal Revenue Service (‚ÄúIRS‚Äù).
FATCA is an acronym for Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act and is a legislation designed to prevent tax evasion. Another purpose of FATCA is to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets. You can find more information about FATCA on the IRS website(new tab).
The U.S. tax system includes U.S. citizens who are not presently residing in the U.S. In comparison. So in order for us to be able to accurately determine whether your account is to be reported to the IRS, we‚Äôll need to ask you:
Are you (also) a citizen or green card holder of the United States?¬†

Are you subject to tax in the U.S?

Being ‚Äúsubject to tax‚Äù in the U.S. does not necessarily mean that you‚Äôre also paying personal income tax in the U.S. It means that U.S. tax law requires you to file a tax return and declare your (worldwide) income to the IRS, even if you don‚Äôt end up paying any U.S. tax.

If so, what is your U.S. Taxpayer Identification Number?

As a U.S. TIN you can either use your U.S. Social Security Number (‚ÄúSSN‚Äù) or your U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN). You can find more information about TIN on the IRS' website(new tab).
Additionally, if your account shows:
A U.S. place of birth, 
A U.S. telephone number,
A standing order to the U.S.
then we are required by FATCA legislation to initially assume that you are subject to FATCA until you can specifically confirm to us otherwise.
In case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the N26 app. To do this, simply log in to the N26 app and go to:
My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Tax Information¬†

title: Welche Vorteile habe ich mit N26 Metal?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏èVerf√ºgbar in Deutschland, √ñsterreich, Frankreich, Spanien, Italien, Belgien, Estland, Finnland, Irland, Lettland, Litauen, Luxemburg, Niederlande, Portugal, Slowakei, Polen, Schweden, D√§nemark, Norwegen, Island und Liechtenstein.
Upgrade zu N26 Metal¬†und du erh√§ltst 10 zus√§tzliche¬†Spaces, bevorzugten Kundendienst, Zugang zu exklusiven Partnerangeboten(neuen Tab) sowie das¬†N26 Metal Versicherungspaket¬†der Allianz Global Assistance*, welches ein breites Spektrum an pers√∂nlichen und finanziellen Vorteilen abdeckt:
Reiseversicherung. Erstattung von Krankheitskosten im Ausland, bei Reiser√ºcktritt nach einem medizinischen Notfall, bei einer Flugversp√§tung von mehr als 4 Stunden, bei einer Versp√§tung aufgegebenen Gep√§cks von mehr als 6 Stunden und bei Kosten f√ºr R√ºckf√ºhrungen aus medizinischen Gr√ºnden.
Schnee- und Bergrettung. Versicherung bei Such- und Rettungsaktionen, ersten Transportkosten und medizinischen Kosten im Falle eines Unfalls in den Bergen
Handy-Diebstahlversicherung. Entsch√§digung bei Diebstahl deines Smartphones im In- und Ausland.

Zusatzkarte. Du kannst eine zus√§tzlich N26 You Karte f√ºr eine einmalige Geb√ºhr von 14‚Ç¨ in deiner N26 App bestellen.

Wenn du Neukunde bist, wird die erste Geb√ºhr 15 Tage nach deiner Identit√§tspr√ºfung berechnet. Danach wird dir deine monatliche Geb√ºhr ausgehend von deinem Anmeldedatum berechnet.

Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erhalte 15‚Ç¨ f√ºr jeden Freund, dem du N26 erfolgreich empfiehlst. Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: Wie verdiene ich Geld, indem ich Freunde zu N26 einlade?
content:
Du erh√§ltst jedes Mal 15 ‚Ç¨, wenn du N26 erfolgreich einem Freund/einer Freundin empfiehlst (max. 1500 ‚Ç¨). Du kannst Freunde einladen, sobald dein Konto vollst√§ndig er√∂ffnet ist.

Die Anmeldung √ºber deinen Empfehlungslink oder pers√∂nlichen Code abschlie√üen.
Die Mastercard aktivieren.
Eine Zahlung (in einem Gesch√§ft, online oder am Geldautomaten) mit der Mastercard im Wert von mindestens 15 ‚Ç¨ t√§tigen.
So l√§dst du Freunde ein:
Logge dich in die App ein
Auf deinem Hauptbildschirm, gehe zu ‚ÄúEntdecken‚Äù
W√§hle das Geschenksymbol aus

Tippe auf ‚ÄúSenden‚Äù!

Falls dein Werbebonus noch nicht ausgezahlt wurde, haben wir auch einige¬†Gr√ºnde¬†daf√ºr gesammelt.
*Der Link verf√§llt nicht und kann jederzeit verwendet werden. Pers√∂nliche Einladungscodes und Links sollten nur f√ºr pers√∂nliche und nichtkommerzielle Zwecke verwendet werden. Das bedeutet, dass du deinen Einladungslink √ºber Social Media mit pers√∂nlichen Kontakten teilen kannst, solange du der Haupteigent√ºmer bist. N26 hat das Recht, das Empfehlungsprogramm jederzeit zu beenden.
Weitere Informationen findest du in den¬†AGB(neuen Tab)¬†des Freundschaftswerbungsprogramms.

title: Warum wurde meine √úberweisung in der N26 App noch nicht ausgef√ºhrt?
content:
Du brauchst deine Best√§tigungs-PIN f√ºr alle Transaktionen, egal ob¬†MoneyBeam, Dauerauftr√§ge oder¬†CASH26. Deine √úberweisung bleibt ausstehend, bis du sie per Push-Nachricht in der App best√§tigst oder abbrichst.
Deine Best√§tigungs-PIN unterscheidet sich von deiner¬†Karten-PIN, aber du kannst f√ºr beide die gleiche Zahlenkombination verwenden. Sobald du dein¬†Smartphone verkn√ºpft hast, wirst du aufgefordert, die Best√§tigungs-PIN zu erstellen (die Karten-PIN legst du erst bei der Aktivierung der Karte fest).
Wenn du deine Best√§tigungs-PIN sechsmal hintereinander falsch eingibst, wird sie aus Sicherheitsgr√ºnden gesperrt. Du kannst sie in der App¬†wiederherstellen¬†unter¬†üë§ Mein Konto¬†und¬†Einstellungen, dann¬†Sicherheit¬†und¬†Best√§tigungs-PIN √§ndern.

title: How to use Apple Pay?
content:
(Applies to Germany, Austria, France, Italy, Spain, Finland, Ireland, Iceland, Greece, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Portugal, Slovakia, Estonia, Belgium, Poland, Norway, Netherlands, Sweden, Denmark, Switzerland and the UK)
Apple Pay allows you to make payments with your smartphone so you don‚Äôt have to carry your Mastercard everywhere.
We‚Äôve made a¬†video(new tab)¬†to help you set up your N26 Mastercard with Apple Pay.
Some tips to keep in mind:
Your iPhone region matches the country where your Mastercard was first shipped to (you can check your region by selecting Settings then General and Language & Region in your phone).

If you‚Äôve lost your iPhone and aren‚Äôt able to find it again using Find My iPhone, you can always access your iCloud and remove all Apple Pay devices via the web browser on a Mac or PC. In addition, you should turn on Lost Mode to block your Mastercard for Apple Pay. Payments with your physical card will still be possible.

If your N26 Mastercard is unexpectedly removed from Apple Wallet, it may be because you have logged out of your iCloud, turned off Passcode or Touch ID, reset your device to factory settings via iTunes, or deleted all the content and settings from your device. In all cases, you can simply add your card again. Keep in mind that the card won‚Äôt be removed if you update your operating system, reset your personal device settings, or turn off Find My iPhone.

For in-store or online purchases, you must authorize your payment via Touch ID or using your passcode. If you‚Äôre using Apple Watch, authorizations are done by double-clicking on the side button. And if you‚Äôre using your Mac, authorize your payment by using Touch ID via the Touch Bar in the top-right corner of your keyboard.

If you're an N26 Metal or N26 Business You customer, it may happen that the card image displayed in your Apple Wallet shows as an N26 You card (for Metal customers) or as an N26 Business card (for Business You customers). We're working now to resolve this. Rest assured that this does not affect the usability of Apple Pay or your premium membership.

Make sure your device meets the technical requirements by visiting Apple Support(new tab):
iPhone 6 or later, iPhone SE: available in apps, stores and web
Apple Watch paired with iPhone 5 or later: available in apps and stores
iPad Pro, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 3, iPad mini 4: available in apps and web
Macs introduced in 2012 or later (Macs other than the MacBook Pro with Touch Bar and Touch ID require an iPhone or Apple Watch: available in web

title: Warum bekomme ich kein Basiskonto?
content:
Unter bestimmten Umst√§nden kann N26 deinen Antrag auf ein¬†Basiskonto¬†ablehnen. Das ist der Fall, wenn:
du au√üerhalb eines von uns unterst√ºtzten Landes lebst.
du bereits ein N26 Bankkonto oder ein anderes Bankkonto in Deutschland hast und es in vollem Umfang nutzen kannst.
du innerhalb der letzten 3 Jahre wegen einer Straftat gegen die Bank, ihre Mitarbeiter oder ihre Kunden verurteilt wurdest.
du bereits in der Vergangenheit ein Basiskonto bei N26 unterhalten hast, das wegen √úberziehung oder unzul√§ssiger Nutzung geschlossen wurde.
du die Mindestanforderungen gem√§√ü des Geldw√§sche- und Kreditwesengesetzes nicht erf√ºllst.

title: Come aprire un conto N26?
content:
Puoi aprire un conto N26 nell'app (sul tuo smartphone) o nella WebApp(nuova tabella) se:
hai almeno 18 anni
sei residente in un paese supportato
possiedi uno smartphone compatibile
possiedi un documento supportato (l'ammissibilit√† varia se vivi in Germania(nuova tabella) o al di fuori della Germania(nuova tabella))
non sei gi√† titolare di un conto N26
sei in grado di verificare la tua identit√† in una delle seguenti lingue: inglese, tedesco, spagnolo, italiano o francese.
Ecco come funziona la procedura per l' apertura di un conto bancario N26:
Dopo aver confermato il tuo indirizzo e-mail, i tuoi dettagli personali e l'indirizzo di spedizione, seleziona il tipo di conto desiderato. *¬†
Dimostra la tua identit√†¬†e¬†collega lo smartphone¬†al tuo nuovo conto.¬†
Ricarica il conto(nuova tabella)¬†tramite bonifico bancario oppure tramite CASH26 (disponibile solo in Austria, Germania o Italia). 
Dopo alcuni giorni, riceverai la tua N26 Mastercard¬†per posta.
Per maggiori informazioni, ecco come puoi contattarci.
*¬†Se soddisfi i nostri¬†criteri minimi di solvibilit√†, puoi aprire un account N26. In caso contrario, potremmo offrirti un¬†conto N26 Flex (solo in Germania). La decisione viene calcolata attraverso un processo automatico.
Vuoi parlare di noi ai tuoi amici e guadagnarci? Ottieni ‚Ç¨15 per ogni amico che inviti con successo ad iscriversi ad N26. Scopri di pi√π sul nostro¬†programma Invita un amico(nuova tabella).
La chat √® disponibile da luned√¨ alla domenica dalle 07:00 alle 23:00.

title: How to get my money back in case of fraud?
content:
If you don‚Äôt recognize a transaction or you‚Äôre sure you didn‚Äôt authorize it,¬†blocking your card¬†won‚Äôt be enough. In these cases you should immediately:
Request new card(new tab) and indicate that the old one has been stolen. Please tear up the card by cutting it with scissors, for example. Both the chip, the NFC antenna and the magnetic stripe must be cut into pieces.
Then fill out the dispute form(new tab). From there we will do everything we can to get your money back.
You can continue using your account for bank transfers until your new card arrives. If you're in Germany or Austria, you can also use¬†CASH26¬†for cash withdrawals.
You should keep in mind that changes in the¬†final amount debited¬†from your account don't necessarily indicate fraud.

title: Wie erstelle ich ein Passwort?
content:
Wenn du dein Passwort vergessen hast oder es √§ndern m√∂chtest, w√§hle in der App beim Login¬†Vergessen?¬†oder¬†Passwort vergessen?(neuen Tab)¬†in der¬†WebApp(neuen Tab). Wir senden dir einen Link an deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse, damit du ein neues Passwort erstellen kannst. Stelle sicher, dass dein neues Passwort unseren Anforderungen entspricht:
Wir haben keine spezifischen Anforderungen f√ºr unsere Passw√∂rter. Wir berechnen die St√§rke in Echtzeit und akzeptieren nur Passw√∂rter, die unser Algorithmus als stabil erkennt.
Wir empfehlen, dass du anstatt eines Passworts eher eine Passphrase (einen Satz) verwendest, im Sinne von ‚Äúschwer zu erraten, einfach zu erinnern‚Äù.
Wenn unser System dein Passwort nicht akzeptiert, f√ºge weitere Buchstaben hinzu, verwende eine Kombination von Sonderzeichen und Zahlen und achte darauf, dass du zwischen Gro√ü- und Kleinschreibung variierst.
Wenn du dein Passwort sechsmal hintereinander falsch eingibst, wird dein Kontozugriff vor√ºbergehend gesperrt. Nach 30 Minuten kannst du es erneut versuchen.
Du erreichst uns im Chat t√§glich von 07:00 - 23:00 Uhr, auch an Sonn- und Feiertagen.

title: How to reorder a card?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Deliveries normally take up to 10 working days. Deliveries may take longer in some specific areas in the following countries: Estonia, Greece, Italy, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia and Spain.
If you‚Äôre waiting for your first card¬† and it has been more than 10 working days since you've successfully completed your identity verification, please contact us via live chat.
¬†For any other reason, please re-order your card via the N26 app.
First, check and update your shipping address
You can do this within the N26 app: üë§ My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Shipping Address.
To reorder your card go to Actions and tap Card Settings.¬†
From your list of cards, swipe until you see the card you wish to reorder and select Reorder.¬†¬†
Note that the Standard and the N26 You replacement cards have a fee of ‚Ç¨6 for standard shipping and ‚Ç¨25 for express shipping. For N26 Metal cards, the fee is ‚Ç¨45 for standard shipping. Express delivery for Metal cards is not available.
Once you‚Äôve ordered your new card, you can activate a digital version while your card is on its way. You can do this within the N26 app by scrolling to your card in Card Settings and adding it to the mobile wallet of choice. This feature is available for 30 days starting from the day your card has been ordered. After this you'll need to activate your physical card through the N26 app. Once the physical card is activated, your mobile wallet will continue working normally. If you don‚Äôt activate your physical card during this period, the digital version will expire until your card is activated.
This feature is not be enabled for customers who reorder their card or move to another account without blocking their current card. In these cases their current card will continue working with Apple Pay or Google Pay until the new one is activated.

title: Warum habe ich meinen Verkn√ºpfungscode nicht per SMS erhalten?
content:
Du brauchst einen Verkn√ºpfungscode, um dein Smartphone mit deinem Konto zu verkn√ºpfen. Falls du die SMS mit dem Code nicht erh√§ltst, kannst du einen neuen bis zu f√ºnf Mal in der App anfordern. Bitte warte 30 Sekunden, bevor du es nochmal versuchst. 
Wenn du bereits alle f√ºnf Codes angefordert hast und die Verkn√ºpfung noch immer nicht funktioniert, werden weitere Anfragen aus Sicherheitsgr√ºnden f√ºr 24 Stunden blockiert. Wenn das geschieht, kannst du entweder warten, oder unseren Customer Support per Chat kontaktieren - wir helfen dir gerne weiter. 
Wenn deine L√§ndervorwahl au√üerhalb der EU liegt, ist es wahrscheinlich dass du die SMS mit dem Code nicht bekommst und du uns kontaktieren musst.

title: Why does N26 do checks on transactions?
content:
We have the responsibility to run routine checks on accounts and transactions in order to ensure your account‚Äôs security (see GwG ¬ß 10(new tab)). These checks are automatically initiated by our systems.¬†
As a result, we may ask you to provide some documents. If you receive such a request, please send the requested documents via Messages from N26. There are no exceptions or evasion for such checks.¬†
This practice is a standard banking procedure and ensures the safety of our customers. Both the process and the result are confidential and handled internally. Here are some tips to speed up the process:
The document that we need you to provide will be exactly named in the message you‚Äôll receive from N26. You can send us scanned documents, pictures, or screenshots, as long as the original content of the document is easily readable. Please make sure to also provide a detailed description.¬†
Be precise in your answers, details, and documents. After we receive your required proof and description, we will let you know if your reply fulfills our check. In a few cases, we might ask for further clarification which could prolong the process.
Reply as soon as possible, always before the deadline stated in the message you received from N26. Use that email to reply and send attachments.¬†
Our Customer Support doesn‚Äôt have any additional information on this subject.
You must provide valid documentation depending on your situation.

 Find here some examples:
You've received financial help from your family to complete projects or have inherited land or money from deceased relatives.
A granting/loan contract, an official document of inheritance, or an official document of the source of the loan (such as the sales documents of a sold property to finance the loan or bank statements of granting relatives).
You've sold a property or your shares on the stock market.
The contract showing the agreed transactions or the official notarial documentation of the transfer of property.
You've received or sent money to pay bills or buy a product.
Documents showing the balance statements confirming the source of this money or documents showing the use of the money and its purpose.
You've received a final payout from your previous employer.
Documents proving the end of your employment, detailing the payment and/or a bank statement from your previous employer.

title: Wie bestelle ich eine Maestro Card?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†gilt f√ºr Deutschland, √ñsterreich und die Niederlande
Wenn du in Deutschland, √ñsterreich oder den Niederlanden lebst, kannst du zus√§tzlich zu deiner N26 Mastercard auch kostenfrei eine Maestro Karte bestellen.¬†
Die Option erscheint in der App, sobald du eine √úberweisung in H√∂he von mindestens 100 ‚Ç¨ aus einem dieser drei L√§nder erhalten hast. Gehe zu üë§ Mein Konto, w√§hle Karteneinstellungen¬†aus und streiche auf der abgebildeten Mastercard nach links, bis du eine Maestro Karte siehst. Tippe dann auf¬†Bestellen.
Nachdem du die Karte bestellt hast, ist sie nach sp√§testens 10 Werktagen bei dir. Mehr zum Thema Lieferzeitr√§ume erf√§hrst du hier.
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Bekomme 15‚Ç¨ f√ºr jeden Freund, dem du N26 erfolgreich empfiehlst. Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: How to set my card PIN?
content:
We don‚Äôt send you a PIN via post; you set the PIN for your Mastercard or Maestro card¬†once you‚Äôve successfully connected your smartphone to your account and¬†activated¬†your card(s). To set or change your card PIN:
Go to üë§ My Account.
Select Card settings and swipe to choose a card.
Select Reset PIN on the mobile or WebApp(new tab).
Enter the 10-digit token number on your card.
Choose your new PIN and confirm it.
Keep in mind that:
If you live in France, Spain, Ireland, Greece, Finland, Estonia or the UK, you must make your first payment using Chip and PIN before you can use your card anywhere else. You can also first make a withdrawal or balance inquiry at ATM instead.
For security reasons we don‚Äôt accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences (such as 1111, 1234, or 4321). If the number you‚Äôve chosen is not accepted please try again using a different combination.
If a PIN is entered incorrectly three times in a row, the card will automatically be blocked for security reasons. If this happens, please contact our Customer Support via chat so we can unblock it for you.
Your card PIN is separate from your Confirmation PIN, however you can choose the same PIN for both.

title: How to get a Basiskonto?
content:
Download the request form(new tab) and complete it with a handwritten signature.
Take your signed form and the attached PostIdent coupon to your nearest branch of Deutsche Post to prove your identity.
Once we‚Äôve received your form and determined whether we can open a Basiskonto for you, we‚Äôll send you an email including the contract and the T&Cs(new tab).
Send your signed contract to us at Klosterstra√üe 62, 10179 Berlin.
Once we‚Äôve received your contract, we‚Äôll open your account within 10 business days.
You‚Äôll then receive a notification about your card delivery and accessing your account.

title: PSD2 - Open Banking f√ºr Drittanbieter
content:
Wir arbeiten mit Token.io(neuen Tab) zusammen, um Drittanbietern eine unterst√ºtzte Schnittstelle anzubieten, durch die sie ihre Dienstleistungen anbieten k√∂nnen. Eine vollst√§ndige √úbersicht √ºber die Dokumente sowie zugeh√∂rige Anleitungen findest im Portal f√ºr Entwickler(neuen Tab) von token.io.
Im Rahmen der Erf√ºllung regulatorischer Anforderungen unter PSD2 hat die N26 Bank ein Fallback-Interface implementiert. Dieses Interface gew√§hrleistet:
Zuverl√§ssige Identifizierung von Drittanbietern anhand eines Qualified Website Authentication Certificate‚Äôs (QWAC);
Sicheren und autorisierten Zugang zum Kundenkonto
Drittanbieter erhalten √ºber die folgende URL Zugang zu unserem Fallback-Interface.¬†
https://tpp.tech26.de
Der Zugang zur vorgenannten URL und die Einrichtung der TLS-Verbindung bedarf der Implementierung eines qualifizierten Zertifikats.
Im Folgenden findest du detaillierte technische Angaben f√ºr das Fallback-Interface:
ASIP Fallback technische Angaben(neuen Tab)
