title: Come funziona Spaces?
content:
Spaces ti permette di creare diversi spazi nel tuo conto principale, per mettere da parte del denaro. Puoi personalizzare ogni spazio a tuo piacimento e trasferire denaro dal tuo conto principale allo spazio, in tempo reale. Spaces √® disponibile via app e¬†webapp(nuova tabella)¬†in tutti i paesi.
Oltre al tuo conto corrente principale (o space principale), che possiamo anche definire spazio principale, puoi creare degli spazi aggiuntivi tutte le volte che vuoi, ma ricorda che il numero di spazi attivi che puoi avere, dipende dalla tipologia di conto che possiedi: 2 spazi oltre per il conto N26 standard e il conto N26 Business o 10 spazi oltre per dei conti Premium, N26 You, N26 Business You e N26 Metal.
Inoltre, l‚Äôestratto conto del tuo conto principale, includer√† anche le transazioni inviate a uno spazio specifico e quelle ricevute da esso.
Solo il tuo spazio principale (conto corrente principale) pu√≤ avere un saldo negativo, nel caso in cui lo scoperto di conto sia disponibile per te. Tutti gli altri spazi non possono avere un saldo negativo, puoi trasferire negli spazi soltanto un ammontare di denaro effettivamente disponibile.
Per effettuare una qualsiasi transazione con la tua Mastercard, potrai usare soltanto il saldo disponibile nel tuo conto principale. Ti suggeriamo quindi di trasferire nel tuo conto principale denaro sufficiente per effettuare la transazione, prima che questa avvenga.
Sposta denaro da uno space all'altro tenendo premuto sul tuo account principale e trascinandolo nel tuo space. Una volta confermato l‚Äôammontare, il tuo saldo attuale verr√† aggiornato subito dopo.
Puoi bloccare e sbloccare uno space in qualsiasi momento dal tuo dispositivo mobile e dalla tua app web. Dovrai solo confermare l'operazione con il tuo PIN di conferma. Se uno space √® bloccato, sarai comunque in grado di trasferire denaro verso di esso. Se devi prelevare denaro da uno space bloccato, dovrai prima sbloccarlo.
Puoi anche aprire i dettagli della transazione dalla lista movimenti Spaces, esattamente come nel tuo conto principale.
Puoi tenere nascosto il saldo presente in uno Space al saldo totale sul conto. Per fare questo, entra nello Space, seleziona i tre puntini in alto a destra e poi "nascondi il saldo dello spazio".
Spaces include una opzione chiamata Regole, con le quali potrai gestire il tuo tempo e il tuo denaro in maniera molto semplice.

Vuoi parlare di noi ai tuoi amici e guadagnarci? Ottieni ‚Ç¨15 per ogni amico che inviti con successo ad iscriversi ad N26. Scopri di pi√π sul nostro¬†programma Invita un amico.

title: Come chiudere il conto?
content:
Per cancellare il tuo account N26, ti preghiamo di inviarci la tua richiesta tramite Livechat oppure via e-mail all'indirizzo support@n26.com dal tuo indirizzo email registrato. La tua email dovr√† contenere le seguenti informazioni:
una dichiarazione con la richiesta di chiusura del conto in una data specifica oppure la dicitura "al pi√π presto".
il tuo nome.
il tuo IBAN N26 (o account number/sort code in UK).
un IBAN all'interno dell'area SEPA (o account number/sort code in UK) per trasferire il saldo residuo  o se hai degli Spaces aperti.
il tuo consenso esplicito a ricevere la conferma di chiusura conto all'indirizzo email registrato con N26, ad esempio "Acconsento che N26 invii informazioni sui miei dati personali via email". In alternativa, la conferma di chiusura conto potr√† essere inviata via posta cartacea. in questo caso, le tempistiche per la ricezione della conferma saranno pi√π lunghe. 
Oppure puoi usare il nostro modulo di cancellazione(nuova tabella) e allegarlo alla mail che ti invieremo.
Alcune cose da tenere presenti quando chiudi il conto:
Per una chiusura rapida dell'account: se disponi di un saldo positivo, ti preghiamo di trasferire il saldo residuo autonomamente. Se hai un saldo negativo, ricarica il tuo conto.
Tutti gli oneri dovuti sono immediatamente esigibili. Questo include le spese relative alla¬†consegna express, e¬†N26 You o N26 Metal. 
Distruggi le tue carte tagliandole con le forbici o una macchina tritadocumenti. Il chip, l'antenna NFC e la banda magnetica devono essere tagliati in pezzi e smaltiti separatamente.

title: Shared Spaces - Trusted Beneficiary
content:
A trusted beneficiary of a Shared Space can:
Transfer money from their own Spaces (including other Shared Spaces of which they are a participant) to a Shared Space. 
Access and freely transfer the funds of a Shared Space at any time.
Leave a Shared Space at any time.
Transfers between a trusted beneficiary and a Shared Space do not need to be authenticated via Pin and Push notification. This means that beneficiaries can seamlessly drag-and-drop money via the N26 app and Web app similarity to how normal Space transactions work.

Why do I need to classify an owner or member as a trusted beneficiary?
European banking law regulates how bank transfers must be authorised.¬†
In this law strong customer authentication (SCA) is a requirement to make online payments more secure.¬†
One exception to this is the classification of a person in a Shared Space as a ‚Äútrusted beneficiary‚Äù so that transfers to this person do not require SCA.
What are Shared Spaces?
How to add or remove Shared Space participants?

title: How to revoke my loan application?
content:
N26 Credit¬†revocations are free and are possible within 14 days of signing a loan agreement.
We‚Äôll need written confirmation of your withdrawal request so it‚Äôs best to chat with us about this. We‚Äôll take it from there and let you know via email when it‚Äôs done.
Please make sure that the full amount of your credit is available on your account until the revocation is complete.
If your credit is paid out by one of our partners, please contact them directly. We partner with auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) in Germany and Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99) in France.

title: Wie erstelle und verwalte ich Dauerauftr√§ge?
content:
Wenn du in der App oder im Online Banking eine √úberweisung einrichtest, hast du die Option, daraus einen Dauerauftrag zu machen.
Bevor du die √úberweisung fertig machst, kannst du ein H√§kchen bei einer Box setzen, um die √úberweisung als Dauerauftrag zu merken. Zun√§chst gibst du den Empf√§nger, den Betrag und den Verwendungszweck ein. Setze im n√§chsten Schritt das H√§kchen bei: ‚ÄúAls Dauerauftrag merken?‚Äù. Nun kannst du Start- und Enddatum und das Zahlungsintervall f√ºr deinen Dauerauftrag festlegen.
So kannst du deine bestehenden Dauerauftr√§ge in der App sehen und verwalten:
Gehe zur Umsatzliste (Startbildschirm).
Wenn du ein iPhone benutzt, tippe auf die drei Punkte √ºber deiner Umsatzliste. Wenn du Android verwendest, tippe auf die drei Punkte am oberen rechten Bildschirmrand.
Ein blaues Fenster √∂ffnet sich, in dem du "Dauerauftr√§ge" ausw√§hlen kannst.
Hier kannst du deine Dauerauftr√§ge l√∂schen oder ver√§ndern. Um einen Dauerauftrag zu l√∂schen, tippe auf den gew√ºnschten Dauerauftrag und dann oben rechts auf das Papierkorb-Icon.
‚ÑπÔ∏è  Hinweis: Wenn ein Dauerauftrag aufgrund mangelnder Kontodeckung nicht ausgef√ºhrt werden konnte, versuchen wir nicht, ihn erneut auszuf√ºhren. Du kannst die √úberweisung dann manuell wiederholen. Der n√§chste Termin des Dauerauftrags bleibt aber bestehen.

title: ¬øPor qu√© es seguro N26?
content:
Para proteger tu cuenta utilizamos una arquitectura de seguridad de 3 capas:
Inicio de sesi√≥n seguro.¬†Al iniciar sesi√≥n con la aplicaci√≥n o con la¬†Web App(pesta√±a nueva), se requiere introducir el usuario y la contrase√±a o reconocimiento dactilar o facial (dependiendo de tu smartphone). Por favor, elige una¬†contrase√±a segura¬†y no reveles tus datos a nadie.
PIN de confirmaci√≥n.¬†Se trata de un¬†c√≥digo de 4 d√≠gitos¬†que necesitar√°s cada vez que hagas una transferencia o quieras vincular o desvincular tu m√≥vil. Este lo estableces cuando hayas conectado tu smartphone a tu cuenta por primera vez. Podr√°s¬†modificarlo¬†t√∫ mismo desde la app cuando quieras.
Mensajes push.¬†Para cualquier pago entrante o saliente, un mensaje push aparecer√° en el¬†smartphone que est√© vinculado, al igual que para confirmar y finalizar una transacci√≥n. Tambi√©n implementamos¬†3D Secure¬†para protegerte contra el fraude en compras online.
Cada vez que contactes con nosotros te haremos una serie de preguntas de seguridad para asegurarnos de que eres t√∫. Pero, por supuesto, nunca te preguntaremos el n√∫mero de tu tarjeta, el c√≥digo de verificaci√≥n (CVV), la contrase√±a ni los PIN de confirmaci√≥n o de la tarjeta.
Tambi√©n hemos tomado medidas para proteger tu informaci√≥n: almacenamos¬†la m√≠nima informaci√≥n imprescindible sobre ti, solo durante el tiempo m√≠nimo al que estamos obligados por ley, y la borramos cuando deja de ser necesaria para nuestros productos o servicios. Puedes¬†descargar tu informaci√≥n personal¬†hasta 6 meses despu√©s del cierre de tu cuenta. Encontrar√°s m√°s informaci√≥n en nuestra¬†Pol√≠tica de Privacidad(pesta√±a nueva).

title: PSD2 - Secure Open Banking
content:
Payment Services Directive 2 (‚ÄúPSD2‚Äù) is a revised European directive allowing you to access your account information and initiate payments through regulated third-party providers in a safe and secure manner. 
 
This means that you can permit regulated Third Party Providers to access your account information through a dedicated interface: 
You can enable an Account Information Service (AIS) to pull together data from different bank accounts you may have, and then aggregate and manage their details in the same place through certified third-party providers.
You can securely pay at the checkout of any website that offers Payment Initiation Services (PIS). 
The data exchange is handled in the background via our partner - Token.io.
If you begin using a third-party payment service like an Account Information Service or a Payment Initiation Service, you‚Äôll be redirected to your N26 app via Token.io to confirm the access request.
In our Privacy Policy(new tab) we inform you about the purposes, involved parties and legal bases of the necessary data processing involved to fulfil our obligations as part of the revised European Payment Services Directive.
Why can't I link any Third Party Provider to my account?
If a third party provider has not integrated with our dedicated interface, the third party provider will need to integrate with our dedicated interface via our partner Token.io.
How can I revoke an individual access permission I have granted to a third party provider?
You need to contact the respective Third Party Provider and revoke the access permission directly with them.¬†
*applies to all countries in the EEA.

title: Come annullare un addebito diretto?
content:
Puoi annullare un addebito diretto tramite app entro 8 settimane dall‚Äôaddebito. 
1. Seleziona l‚Äôaddebito diretto in questione nella tua lista transazioni.
2. Scegli¬†Rimborso. 
3. L‚Äôimporto verr√† poi accreditato sul tuo conto entro 2 giorni bancari. 
*Solo per Polonia, Svezia, Danimarca, e Norvegia: se stai autorizzando un addebito diretto con un esercente nella valuta del tuo Paese, √® la banca beneficiaria che stabilisce il tasso di cambio e la somma finale raccolta da noi.

title: CRS - Perch√© richiediamo alcune informazioni da te?
content:
Secondo il Common Reporting Standard (CRS),¬† N26, in quanto istituto finanziario, √® obbligato a fornire informazioni alle autorit√† fiscali dell‚ÄôUnione Europea sui conti di utenti che hanno la residenza fiscale in altro paese.
Il CRS √® stato implementato dall‚ÄôOCSE e disciplina le modalit√† attraverso le quali deve avvenire la scambio automatico delle informazioni fiscali (AEOI). Lo scopo del CRS √® quello di permettere alle autorit√† fiscali di avere una chiara comprensione delle risorse finanziarie dei residenti depositate all‚Äôestero in modo da poter combattere l‚Äôevasione fiscale. Oltre 90 paesi hanno aderito all‚Äôiniziativa di condividere informazioni sulle risorse finanziarie e sulle entrate dei residenti in conformit√† con il CRS.
¬†Per determinare se un conto debba essere riportato alle autorit√† fiscali per adempiere alle finalit√† del CRS, abbiamo bisogno delle seguenti informazioni:¬†¬†
Residenza fiscale:
Di norma, si √® soggetti a tasse nel paese in cui si ha la residenza e le tasse vengono calcolate su tutte le entrate percepite. Se hai la residenza in pi√π di un paese, normalmente esistono degli accordi bilaterali tra i paesi che aiutano a determinare in quale paese √® necessario pagare le tasse. Pu√≤ succedere di essere soggetti a tasse in pi√π di un paese nell‚Äôarco dell‚Äôanno. In tal caso, √® necessario fornire tutte le informazioni rilevanti (residenze fiscali e relativo numero di identificazione fiscale) alle autorit√† fiscali.¬†¬†
Numero di identificazione fiscale (TIN)¬†
L‚Äôemissione e il formato del numero di identificazione fiscale (TIN) differisce a seconda del paese. La Commissione Europea offre indicazioni chiare sul TIN da riportare.¬†
Nel caso si presentassero variazioni della tua situazione personale, potrai aggiornare le tue informazioni fiscali in qualunque momento tramite la app di N26. Baster√† eseguire l‚Äôaccesso > Il mio conto > Impostazioni > Impostazioni personali > Informazioni fiscali.¬†

title: What if my balance is negative?
content:
Your balance can be negative as long as you‚Äôre within your¬†Overdraft¬†limit. 
If you have a negative account balance, you'll be charged an overdraft interest rate of 8.9%.
Otherwise, you‚Äôll receive an email to notify you that the authorized limit of your account has been exceeded. This means you don‚Äôt have enough funds on your account to cover future charges.
Even if you haven‚Äôt used your account since you opened it, certain charges still apply (such as N26 You or N26 Metal monthly fees or express delivery costs) and have resulted in a negative balance.
So you‚Äôll need to¬†top up your account¬†via SEPA transfer (choose international transfer if you‚Äôre making the transfer outside of Germany) or¬†CASH26¬†(if you‚Äôre in Germany or Austria). Your account will remain active for the next 60 days without doing so. At that point:
You‚Äôll receive two additional reminders (each cost ‚Ç¨3).
If you have an Overdraft: it‚Äôll be cancelled after the second reminder and you‚Äôll have to repay that amount immediately (or you can set up a repayment plan).
If you have an N26 You, N26 Metal, or N26 Business You account: all benefits will be cancelled after 60 days and your account will turn into a standard one.
If you don‚Äôt respond after 60 days, we may close your account.

title: So l√§dst Du Geld auf dein Konto per Karte, Apple Pay und Google Pay
content:
Du kannst jetzt Geld auf dein N26 Konto laden, indem du eine Debitkarte, Kreditkarte, Apple Pay oder Google Pay verwendest. So kannst du schnell und einfach √úberweisungen auf dein N26 Konto t√§tigen:

Geld mit einer Debit- oder Kreditkarte hinzuf√ºgen
√ñffne deine N26 App und gehe zum ‚ÄúAktionen‚Äù-Tab
Tippe auf ‚ÄúGeld erhalten‚Äù und dann ‚ÄúAufladen‚Äù
W√§hle einen Betrag und gib deine Karteninformationen ein (Name auf der Karte, Kartennummer, Ablaufdatum und CVV-Code). Wir speichern deine Karteninformationen nie
Folge den n√§chsten Schritten, um die √úberweisung zu best√§tigen
Das Geld ist sofort auf deinem N26 Konto verf√ºgbar

Geld mit Apple Pay oder Google Pay hinzuf√ºgen
√ñffne deine N26 App und gehe zum ‚ÄúAktionen‚Äù-Tab
Tippe auf ‚ÄúGeld erhalten‚Äù und dann ‚ÄúApple Pay‚Äù bzw. ‚ÄúGoogle Pay‚Äù
Gib einen Betrag an
Folge den n√§chsten Schritten, um die √úberweisung zu best√§tigen
Das Geld ist sofort auf deinem N26 Konto verf√ºgbar

Akzeptierte Karten: 
Visa und Mastercard-Karten, die eine 16-stellige Kartennummer haben. 
Prepaid-Karten werden nicht akzeptiert. 
In diesem Blog Post (neuen Tab)(Englisch) erf√§hrst du mehr √ºber den Unterschied zwischen Debit-, Kredit- und Prepaidkarten.

Kosten:¬†
Diese Methode ist zwar die schnellste und einfachste, um Geld auf dein N26 Konto zu laden ‚Äì f√ºr uns ist es allerdings teurer, Geld sofort auf deinem Konto verf√ºgbar zu machen. Andere Methoden f√ºr das Aufladen deines Kontos sind g√ºnstiger.¬†
Das erste Mal Aufladen ist immer kostenlos. Danach berechnen wir jedes Mal eine Geb√ºhr von 3 %. Denn wenn du Geld von einer anderen Bankkarte oder dem Wallet auf dein Konto l√§dst, wird es nicht direkt auf dein N26 Konto √ºbertragen ‚Äì die Geb√ºhr deckt die Kosten ab, die aufkommen, weil wir das Geld trotzdem sofort auf deinem N26 Konto verf√ºgbar machen.

title: Was ist CASH26?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†gilt f√ºr deutsche, √∂sterreichische und italienische AGB

Mit CASH26 kannst du Bargeld abheben oder einzahlen, indem du einen Strichcode erstellst und vorzeigst in einer der 11.918 teilnehmenden Filialen von REWE, Penny, dm, Rossmann, real, Bundi, Ludwig, Eckert, ON, Adam's, OMV oder Barbarino in Deutschland, 2.019 dm, Billa, Merkur und Penny Filialen in √ñsterreich und 202 PAM & Panorama und 386 PENNY Gesch√§ften in Italien. Die n√§chstgelegene Filiale einschlie√ülich √ñffnungszeiten und Anfahrtsweg findest du auf der CASH26-Karte in der App (tippe auf "Aktionen" und w√§hle dann CASH26 auf deinem Hauptbildschirm).
Abhebungen:
Sobald du einen Auszahlungs-Strichcode erstellst, wird der Betrag von deinem Guthaben abgezogen. Solltest du es dir anders √ºberlegen, kannst du den Code l√∂schen, und der Betrag wird sofort auf dein Konto zur√ºckerstattet.
Bleibt ein Strichcode ungenutzt, wird der Betrag nach 10 Minuten auf dein Konto zur√ºckgebucht.
Du kannst innerhalb von 24 Stunden bis zu 900 ‚Ç¨ (200 ‚Ç¨ pro Transaktion) abheben.
Abhebungen sind immer kostenlos.
Einzahlungen:
Einzahlungen √ºber CASH26 sind sofort auf deinem Konto verf√ºgbar.
Du kannst innerhalb von 24 Stunden bis zu 999 ‚Ç¨ einzahlen (mindestens 50 ‚Ç¨ pro Einzahlung).
Du kannst bis zu 100 ‚Ç¨ pro Monat kostenlos einzahlen. F√ºr zus√§tzliche Einzahlungen wird eine Geb√ºhr von 1,5% des eingezahlten Betrages erhoben.
Du musst in dem Gesch√§ft nichts kaufen, um Geld abzuheben oder einzuzahlen.
Lieber Videos statt Text? Sieh dir das Tutorial (neuen Tab)auf unserem N26 Support YouTube Kanal(neuen Tab) an.
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Bekomme 15‚Ç¨ f√ºr jeden Freund, dem du N26 erfolgreich empfiehlst. Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: Neuigkeiten zu N26 Invest
content:
Wir haben uns daf√ºr entschieden, unsere Partnerschaft mit Moneyfarm (ehemals Vaamo) zu beenden. Mithilfe von Moneyfarm haben wir unser N26 Invest Produkt angeboten. Ab dem 17.09.2019 wird N26 Invest in der N26 App nicht mehr verf√ºgbar sein. Diese Entscheidung haben wir getroffen, weil das Produkt mittlerweile nicht mehr zu den Bed√ºrfnissen der Mehrheit unserer Kunden passt.
Allen N26 Invest Kunden haben wir darum eine E-Mail geschickt. Der folgende Artikel enth√§lt zus√§tzliche Informationen √ºber die drei verschiedenen Optionen f√ºr unsere N26 Invest Kunden.

Wenn du diese Option w√§hlst, kannst du bis zum 16.09.2019 deinen N26 Invest-Plan in der N26 App schlie√üen und dir den aktuellen Gegenwert deines N26 Invest-Portfolios auszahlen lassen. Die genaue Anleitung f√ºr diese Option findest du hier.

Du kannst dich bei Moneyfarm anmelden und den Gegenwert deines N26 Invest-Portfolios bei Moneyfarm (ehemals Vaamo) reinvestieren.

Hinweis: Im April 2019 wurde Vaamo von Moneyfarm, einem europ√§ischen digitalen Verm√∂gensverwalter √ºbernommen. N√§heres √ºber Moneyfarm erf√§hrst du hier(neuen Tab).
Wenn du dich f√ºr diese Option entscheidest, wird dein N26 Invest-Portfolio geschlossen und der Gegenwert in einem neuen Investment-Plan von Moneyfarm reinvestiert.
Die genaue Anleitung f√ºr diese Option findest du hier.

Das jeweilige Invest-Depot aller N26 Invest-Kunden h√§lt die FFB. Falls du dich als N26 Invest-Kunde bis zum 02.09.2019 nicht f√ºr die 1. Option oder die 2. Option entscheidest, erh√§ltst du automatisch von der FFB postalisch deine Login-Daten, mit denen du √ºber die FFB Website auf dein bestehendes Depot zugreifen kannst.
Hinweis: Falls sich deine Anschrift seit der Er√∂ffnung deines N26 Invest-Plans ge√§ndert hat, informiere bitte die FFB dar√ºber, damit sie dir die Dokumente an die richtige Adresse schickt.
Auf dein bestehendes Invest-Depot wirst du √ºber die Website der FFB zugreifen k√∂nnen, sobald du die Login-Daten von der FFB erhalten hast. Klicke hier, um mehr √ºber diese Option zu erfahren.
Zwar beenden wir unsere Partnerschaft mit Moneyfarm (ehemals Vaamo) sowie die Gesch√§ftsbeziehung mit unseren N26 Invest-Kunden bez√ºglich des N26 Invest Produkts. Aber dies hat keinen Einfluss auf irgendeinen anderen Aspekt deines N26 Bankkontos, deiner Premium-Mitgliedschaften oder anderer Produkte, die du mit uns hast.

Seit unserem erstmaligen Angebot von N26 Invest im Jahr 2016, haben wir stetig mehr Produkte & Services entwickelt, die unsere wachsende und zunehmend globale Kundschaft reflektieren. Wir bleiben nach wie vor bem√ºht, dir auch in Zukunft innovative Produkte anzubieten und die Organisation deiner Finanzen zu vereinfachen. 

Die gute Nachricht ist: Du hast die Option, dein bestehendes Invest-Depot bei FIL Fondsbank (FFB) weiterzuf√ºhren. Die E-Mail, die du von uns erhalten hast, fasst diese Option zusammen und du kannst mehr dazu in unserem Support Center erfahren. Falls du nichts tust, schickt dir die FFB noch vor dem 17.09.2019 postalisch automatisch deine Login-Daten zu, mit denen du √ºber die Website von FFB auf dein bestehendes Depot dann zugreifen kannst.¬†

Im April dieses Jahres hat Moneyfarm, ein europ√§ischer digitaler Verm√∂gensverwalter, Vaamo √ºbernommen. N√§heres zu Moneyfarm erf√§hrst du auf ihrer Website(neuen Tab).

In Absatz 11.3. unserer AGB f√ºr N26 Invest ist dargelegt, dass wir das Recht haben, dieses Produkt zu k√ºndigen. Wir entschuldigen uns daf√ºr, wenn dies f√ºr dich eine Entt√§uschung ist. Beachte, dass du noch die M√∂glichkeit hast, den Gegenwert deines N26 Invest-Portfolios bei Moneyfarm zu reinvestieren, wie wir in unserer E-Mail und in unserem Artikel im Support Center beschrieben haben. Bei dieser Option wird dein bestehendes Invest-Portfolio geschlossen und der Gegenwert in einen neuen Investment-Plan von Moneyfarm reinvestiert. Alternativ kannst du dein bestehendes Depot bei der FIL Fondsbank GmbH (FFB) weiterf√ºhren.

Nein, die Schlie√üung deines N26 Invest-Plans hat keine Auswirkungen auf dein N26 Bankkonto, deine Premium-Mitgliedschaften oder andere Produkte, die du mit uns hast.

Die Kapitalertragsteuer wird automatisch seitens der FFB einbehalten und abgef√ºhrt, sofern kein Freistellungsauftrag vorliegt. Der Differenzbetrag wird dann auf dein Referenzkonto ausgezahlt, welches dein N26 Bankkonto ist.

Nach der Schlie√üung deines N26 Invest-Plans, schickt dir die FIL Fondsbank GmbH (FFB) postalisch deine Steuerbescheinigung zu, sofern Steuern einbehalten oder Freibetr√§ge genutzt wurden. Falls sich deine Anschrift nach Schlie√üung deines N26 Invest-Plans √§ndert, informiere bitte FFB unter den folgenden Kontaktdaten dar√ºber:
Montag bis Freitag
Tel: +49 (0) 69 770 60 - 200
Fax: +49 (0) 69 770 60 - 555

title: How to use Apple Pay?
content:
(Applies to Germany, Austria, France, Italy, Spain, Finland, Ireland, Iceland, Greece, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Portugal, Slovakia, Estonia, Belgium, Poland, Norway, Netherlands, Sweden, Denmark, Switzerland and the UK)
Apple Pay allows you to make payments with your smartphone so you don‚Äôt have to carry your Mastercard everywhere.
We‚Äôve made a¬†video(new tab)¬†to help you set up your N26 Mastercard with Apple Pay.
Some tips to keep in mind:
Your iPhone region matches the country where your Mastercard was first shipped to (you can check your region by selecting Settings then General and Language & Region in your phone).

If you‚Äôve lost your iPhone and aren‚Äôt able to find it again using Find My iPhone, you can always access your iCloud and remove all Apple Pay devices via the web browser on a Mac or PC. In addition, you should turn on Lost Mode to block your Mastercard for Apple Pay. Payments with your physical card will still be possible.

If your N26 Mastercard is unexpectedly removed from Apple Wallet, it may be because you have logged out of your iCloud, turned off Passcode or Touch ID, reset your device to factory settings via iTunes, or deleted all the content and settings from your device. In all cases, you can simply add your card again. Keep in mind that the card won‚Äôt be removed if you update your operating system, reset your personal device settings, or turn off Find My iPhone.

For in-store or online purchases, you must authorize your payment via Touch ID or using your passcode. If you‚Äôre using Apple Watch, authorizations are done by double-clicking on the side button. And if you‚Äôre using your Mac, authorize your payment by using Touch ID via the Touch Bar in the top-right corner of your keyboard.

If you're an N26 Metal or N26 Business You customer, it may happen that the card image displayed in your Apple Wallet shows as an N26 You card (for Metal customers) or as an N26 Business card (for Business You customers). We're working now to resolve this. Rest assured that this does not affect the usability of Apple Pay or your premium membership.

Make sure your device meets the technical requirements by visiting Apple Support(new tab):
iPhone 6 or later, iPhone SE: available in apps, stores and web
Apple Watch paired with iPhone 5 or later: available in apps and stores
iPad Pro, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 3, iPad mini 4: available in apps and web
Macs introduced in 2012 or later (Macs other than the MacBook Pro with Touch Bar and Touch ID require an iPhone or Apple Watch: available in web

title: Where is my refund?
content:
Your refund will be visible in the app on the day of the original transaction, not the refund date. Scroll down your transaction list or download your previous balance statements to find it.
To view and download PDFs of your (preliminary and previous) monthly balance statements:
On the WebApp(new tab): From Transactions, click on the cloud icon in the upper-right corner to reach Downloads then select Bank statements.

On the mobile app: 
If you're using an iPhone, tap on the three dots to the right of your current balance from the main screen. A menu will pop up and will give you the option to access your balance statement.¬†
For Androids, you'll find the option under Statistics (just tap the 3 dots in the top right-hand corner).

title: Comment t√©l√©charger des donn√©es personnelles ?
content:
Le R√®glement G√©n√©ral sur la Protection des Donn√©es (RGPD) est un r√®glement europ√©en sur la protection et la confidentialit√© des donn√©es, entr√© en vigueur le 25 mai 2018. Pour r√©pondre √† ces nouvelles exigences, nous vous offrons d√©sormais la possibilit√© de t√©l√©charger vos donn√©es personnelles depuis notre¬†application web(nouvel onglet), rubrique¬†üë§ Mon compte¬†puis¬†Informations personnelles.
En tant que banque mobile, nous mesurons toute l‚Äôimportance de la s√©curit√© des donn√©es. Nous conservons un minimum de donn√©es vous concernant et seulement pendant la dur√©e qui nous est impos√©e par la loi. Nous supprimons toutes vos donn√©es d√®s lors qu‚Äôelles ne sont plus n√©cessaires pour les produits ou services que nous vous offrons.
L‚Äôarticle 20 du RGPD vous octroie le droit √† la portabilit√© des donn√©es. Comme tout ce que nous proposons, le t√©l√©chargement de vos donn√©es personnelles est simple et transparent, vous avez le contr√¥le.
Le fichier que vous obtenez est uniquement destin√© √† la portabilit√© de vos donn√©es et, dans une majorit√© des cas, ne sera pas lisible par votre ordinateur compte tenu de son format JSON. Ce format √©tant cr√©√© pour √™tre lu par une machine et non par un humain, vous ne serez pas en mesure d‚Äôen d√©chiffrer les informations. Ce fichier JSON est uniquement destin√© √† √™tre transmis √† une autre institution.
Vous pouvez demander √† t√©l√©charger les donn√©es personnelles que vous avez fournies pour votre compte actuel ou un ancien compte jusqu‚Äô√† 6 mois apr√®s sa date de cl√¥ture. Ces donn√©es vous seront transmises dans un format √©lectronique que vous pourrez partager avec une tierce partie si vous le souhaitez.
Veuillez faire une¬†demande en ligne(nouvel onglet)¬†pour t√©l√©charger vos donn√©es personnelles.Il vous sera demand√© de cr√©er un mot de passe temporaire pour utiliser le lien qui vous sera envoy√© √† l‚Äôadresse email associ√©e √† votre compte. Ce lien est seulement valide pour une dur√©e de 24 heures. Ce lien est valide pour seulement 24 heures √† partir du moment o√π vous recevez l‚Äôemail en question. Veuillez noter que si vous entrez un mot de passe erron√© √† 5 reprises, le lien sera d√©sactiv√© et vous devrez faire une nouvelle demande de t√©l√©chargement de vos donn√©es.
Vous pouvez consulter vos donn√©es jusqu‚Äô√† 6 mois apr√®s la fermeture de votre compte. Pour t√©l√©charger vos donn√©es, veuillez compl√©ter le¬†formulaire(nouvel onglet)¬†en ligne de demande de donn√©es et vous assurer que les informations renseign√©es correspondent bien √† celles que vous aviez donn√©es pour votre ancien compte. Voici ce que vous devez renseigner :
votre nom et pr√©nom, le num√©ro et la date d‚Äôexpiration de la pi√®ce d'identit√© que vous aviez utilis√© pour ouvrir votre compte (Carte d‚ÄôIdentit√© ou Passeport),
l'adresse email associ√©e √† ce compte
les dates (mois et ann√©e) auxquelles vous avez ouvert et cl√¥tur√© votre compte (pour retrouver la date d'ouverture de votre compte, r√©f√©rez-vous √† la date de r√©ception de l'email de confirmation de votre adresse email).
Pour des raisons de s√©curit√©, nous devons nous assurer que vous √™tes bien la personne qui t√©l√©charge vos donn√©es : si l‚Äôun des champs mentionn√©s ci-dessus est erron√© ou manquant, nous ne pourrons satisfaire votre demande.
Il vous sera demand√© de cr√©er un mot de passe temporaire pour utiliser le lien qui vous sera envoy√© par email. Ce lien est valide pour seulement 24 heures √† partir du moment o√π vous recevez l‚Äôemail en question. Ce lien est seulement valide pour une dur√©e de 24 heures. Veuillez noter que si vous entrez un mot de passe erron√© √† 5 reprises, le lien sera d√©sactiv√© et vous devrez faire une nouvelle demande de t√©l√©chargement de vos donn√©es.
Si vous souhaitez plus d‚Äôinformations √† propos du recueil, de l‚Äôusage et du traitement de vos donn√©es personnelles, veuillez consulter la derni√®re version de notre¬†Politique de Confidentialit√©(nouvel onglet).

title: Come ricevere i messaggi push?
content:
Ti inviamo messaggi push per finalizzare i trasferimenti (come¬†MoneyBeam) o per confermare un servizio (come nel caso di¬†CASH26). Se non ricevi questi messaggi, verifica innanzitutto che le notifiche siano abilitate sia per il telefono che per l'app. Quindi prova alcuni dei nostri suggerimenti per la risoluzione dei problemi, a seconda dello smartphone:
Elimina l'app N26 e riavvia lo smartphone. Scarica e installa l'ultima versione dell'app dall'App Store Apple e riassocia lo smartphone.
Controlla di aver effettuato l‚Äôaccesso all‚Äôapp N26.
Assicurati che la messaggistica per l'app sia stata attivata nelle impostazioni generali dello smartphone.
Elimina l'app N26 e riavvia lo smartphone. Scarica e installa l'ultima versione dell'app dal Google Play Store Google e riassocia lo smartphone.
Vai nelle Impostazioni conto e attiva le notifiche cliccando su Impostazioni App e poi Notifiche.
Huawei e Xiaomi: vai in Impostazioni, Impostazioni avanzate e Impostazioni batteria. Imposta N26 come app protetta.
OnePlus: seleziona l‚Äôottimizzazione della batteria, poi l'app N26 e Non ottimizzare.
Oppo: disattiva l'ottimizzazione della batteria per l'app e bloccala in Panoramica app recenti.

title: Warum bekomme ich keinen Dispokredit?
content:
In Bezug auf deine Kreditw√ºrdigkeit spielen viele Faktoren eine Rolle, darunter deine SCHUFA- oder CRIF-Eintr√§ge (und wir informieren diese Institute √ºber eventuelle Anfragen nach Dispokrediten). Wenn du schon lange Kunde bist oder dein N26 Konto zu deinem Hauptkonto machst, wird sich das positiv auswirken. 
Das Ergebnis wird automatisch berechnet, wir k√∂nnen es nicht beeinflussen oder √§ndern. Wenn du aktuell die Bedingungen f√ºr einen Dispokredit nicht erf√ºllst, kannst du es einfach zu einem sp√§teren Zeitpunkt noch einmal versuchen.
Falls du mehr Informationen m√∂chtest, kontaktiere uns gerne.

title: How to top up my account?
content:
Once you are successfully verified, you'll be able to top up your account in several ways:
CASH26 (in Germany, Austria, and Italy). Deposit cash through our partner stores;
MoneyBeam. Instantly receive money from other N26 users;
Debit card. You can add money to your account by entering the card details from your other account within the N26 app. You can choose to deposit between 20‚Ç¨ and 150‚Ç¨. Please note that prepaid cards are not accepted. Likewise, we don‚Äôt support American Express credit cards.
Apple Pay or Google Pay(new tab). You can add money to your account by using Apple Pay (for iOS devices) or GPay (for Android devices).You can choose to deposit between 20‚Ç¨ and 150‚Ç¨. Please note that prepaid cards are not accepted. Likewise, we don‚Äôt support American Express credit cards.
SEPA transfer. The transfer must be in EUR and within SEPA. You‚Äôll just need to provide your IBAN and your name as it‚Äôs written on the ID you used to create your account. You should also know that: 
For the transfer details, make sure the recipient‚Äôs name is your name as it‚Äôs written on the identity document you used to prove your identity (especially if you have an N26 Business account ‚Äì we don‚Äôt accept company names). 
The transfer will be instant if the sending bank support SEPA instant outgoing transfers, if not, it will completed within one banking day. Due to the opening times of the participating banks, one banking day may stretch to two working days.
In France, your first transfer can only be sent from another one of your accounts. For all other regions, you can use any other bank account to make the transfer (it doesn‚Äôt have to be under your name). 
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: Wie lange dauert eine √úberweisung mit TransferWise?
content:
Wenn du eine √úberweisung mit TransferWise machst, wird dir ein gesch√§tztes Eingangsdatum angezeigt.
Falls eine TransferWise-√úberweisung fehlschl√§gt, benachrichtigen wir dich mit einer Push-Mitteilung. Der Betrag wird einige Tage sp√§ter automatisch auf dein Konto zur√ºckgebucht.
Weder wir noch TransferWise berechnen zus√§tzliche Geb√ºhren f√ºr eine R√ºckzahlung. Einige teilnehmende Banken erheben jedoch Geb√ºhren; in diesem Fall zieht TransferWise gem√§√ü seinen¬†Nutzungsbedingungen(neuen Tab)¬†diese Betr√§ge von dem zur√ºckgezahlten Geld ab.
H√§ufige Gr√ºnde f√ºr eine fehlgeschlagene √úberweisung:
Fehler in den √úberweisungsangaben (z. B. bei der Eingabe des Empf√§ngernamens oder der Kontoinformationen).
Sonderzeichen oder zu viele Zeichen im Namen des Empf√§ngers oder im Feld f√ºr den Zahlungszweck.
Limits wurden erreicht oder Online-Zahlungen sind in den Karteneinstellungen nicht aktiv.
√úberweisungen in Fremdw√§hrungen sind mit dem N26 Business oder N26 Business You Konto nicht m√∂glich; zudem darf das Empf√§ngerkonto kein Gesch√§ftskonto sein.

title: Shared Spaces - What is a power of attorney?
content:
The legal model behind Shared Spaces is called Power of Attorney (Kontovollmacht in German).¬†
Participants of a Shared Space do not have equal ownership of the account like a joint account in the traditional banking sense. After receiving Power of Attorney the participants obtain the right to act on behalf of the Owner regarding any transfer of funds within the Shared Space.
The person authorizing the other to act on his behalf is called the ‚ÄúOwner‚Äù, this person is the only account holder. The owner must be a N26 premium account holder e.g. N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business You.
This means that whoever created the Shared Space is its legal owner. The owner of a Shared Space:¬†
Owns all the funds within a Shared Space.¬†
Can transfer funds freely in and out of the account anytime.¬†
Can invite people to the Shared Space by granting others Power of Attorney.
Can revoke the Power of Attorney of a participant at any time.
Can also close a Shared Space after removing a participant. (all funds in the Shared Space will be transferred to the Owner‚Äôs Main Account)
By granting a person Power of Attorney, they‚Äôll have full access to all the money held within a Shared Space. This means that each participant can also transfer funds freely in and out of the Shared Space.¬†

N26 Bank GmbH cannot be held liable for payments covered by the Power of Attorney.

How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?

title: Why was I charged an ATM fee?
content:
ATM fees could happen for a few reasons: 
A ‚Ç¨2 fee applies to any additional withdrawal beyond our Fair Use Policy. We‚Äôll remind you via push message when you‚Äôre running low on free withdrawals. 
Some ATMs may come with their own fees. We have no control over these fees and can‚Äôt reject or reverse them. You‚Äôll be informed before the end of a withdrawal if additional fees apply and will have the possibility of cancelling it.
Foreign currency ATM withdrawals sometimes include fees. With the N26 account, there‚Äôs a fee of 1.7% of the withdrawal amount. This fee is waived for N26 You or N26 Metal members. 
Using your Maestro for ATM withdrawals. A ‚Ç¨2 fee applies to both domestic or international withdrawals. Maestro is only available in Germany, Austria, or the Netherlands. 

To avoid certain fees, especially when travelling, you can use the Mastercard ATM Locator(new tab) to find free ATMs nearby by selecting no access fee. 
You can find an overview of our plans and fees on our website(new tab).

title: How to do contactless payments work?
content:
It‚Äôs not possible to deactivate contactless payments. If you‚Äôre experiencing issues with your contactless payments, keep in mind that:¬†¬†
To activate contactless payments, you must first use your card at an ATM or payment terminal.¬†

Transactions up to ‚Ç¨50 don‚Äôt require a card PIN*. For amounts over ‚Ç¨50, you‚Äôll need to enter your card PIN.¬†
*If the merchant's payment system supports this option.
Make sure your card is held directly onto an NFC-compatible payment terminal. If you remove your card too fast or didn‚Äôt hold it close enough, just try again.¬†

N26 Metal cards only have NFC on the backside of the card. Make sure to hold the backside of the card against the terminal to use NFC (using the front won‚Äôt work).

title: How to protect my identity?
content:
To protect and help avoid the misuse of your personal data, please keep in mind that:
We will never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. This includes verifications for apartment rental contracts, lines of credit, or job offers (including jobs with N26). Only complete the verification process if you want to open an N26 bank account for yourself.
As the account owner, only you should create and have access to your login details. Never create an N26 bank account with a predefined email address and password. If you use login credentials that were given to you, these credentials may be used to reach your personal and legal information. Also, never log into an N26 account that is not yours.
Do not send your ID or passport to unknown or unverified recipients.
We may ask for certain documents when your transaction is subject to a routine check. Only send valid documentation to verified N26 email accounts.
We will never ask for your username, password, or PIN codes outside the N26 app. Never provide this information in an external website or app, even if it looks N26-related.
If you ever feel in doubt, have received a suspicious request from a third party, or think your N26 login may be compromised, please do not hesitate to contact us.

title: Why was I charged twice?
content:
We offer you banking in real-time. This means you‚Äôre able to see the processes going on behind your account that you otherwise wouldn‚Äôt see. There are two main transaction types that take place during an in-store or online purchase:
Authorizations.¬†A block or reserved amount made by a retailer or merchant. This includes anything from your morning cup of coffee to hotel or car rental bookings (including security deposits).
Presentments.¬†The actual amount that is deducted from your account. Again, that cup of coffee is finally cleared from your account or you can get your security deposit back once that hotel room or car is returned safe and sound.
Once an authorization has been confirmed, we can‚Äôt cancel or reverse it. At that point, a few things can happen to¬†your authorization: it turns into a presentment, it's rejected, or it expires¬†(and automatically returns to your account up to 12 days at the latest). Keep in mind:
Sometimes you‚Äôll see both the authorization and the presentment if they become disconnected or due to technical issues at the payment terminal. Eventually the authorization will expire. If it doesn‚Äôt, we can help get your money back.
Verification authorizations (usually very small amounts) are used to check whether your card is active. This money will return to your account.
The amount of an authorization can differ from the final presentment for a variety of reasons.

title: Wie melde ich einen Versicherungsfall?
content:
Deine¬†N26 You(neuen Tab)- und¬†N26 Metal(neuen Tab)-Mitgliedschaft umfasst eine Vielzahl von Versicherungsleistungen, die von unserem Partner Allianz Global Assistance Europe abgedeckt werden.*
Um einen Versicherungsfall zu melden, logge dich in deine App ein, gehe zu üë§ Mein Konto und w√§hle N26 You/Metal und Schaden melden.
Dort findest du:
Einen Leitfaden, wie du einen Versicherungsfall einreichen kannst (z. B. Flug- oder Gep√§ckversp√§tung, Handydiebstahl, Garantieverl√§ngerung oder Reisestornierung)
Deine Konto- und Vertragsinformationen, einschlie√ülich deiner N26 You- oder Metal-ID
Die M√∂glichkeit, dich bei einem medizinischen Notfall direkt an die Allianz zu wenden
Halte im Notfall bitte folgende Informationen bereit:
Die vollst√§ndige Adresse und Telefonnummer deines aktuellen Aufenthaltsortes
Namen aller offiziellen Ansprechpartner (√Ñrzte, Krankenh√§user und/oder Polizei)
Eine genaue Beschreibung der Situation
*Allianz Global Assistance Europe ist ein Markenname von AWP P&C S.A. - Zweigniederlassung Niederlande und geh√∂rt zur Allianz Group.

title: Quand est-ce que je recevrai ma carte ?
content:
Votre carte est fabriqu√©e et envoy√©e d√®s que la v√©rification de votre identit√© est valid√©e.
Suivant le pays de destination, la livraison peut prendre jusqu‚Äô√† 10 jours ouvr√©s. Les d√©lais de livraison vers les pays suivants peuvent varier : Espagne, Estonie, Gr√®ce, Italie, Pays-Bas, Portugal, Slovaquie et Gr√®ce.¬†
Avant de proc√©der √† la commande d‚Äôune nouvelle carte, veuillez consid√©rer les points suivants :
Si la livraison √©choue et que votre carte nous est retourn√©e, nous vous le ferons savoir par email.
Si vous avez command√© votre carte il y a moins de 10 jours ouvr√©s, nous vous invitons √† attendre avant de nous contacter.
Si vous avez command√© une carte N26 Metal, nous vous l‚Äôenverrons automatiquement d√®s que le solde de votre compte vous permettra de r√©gler la premi√®re¬†mensualit√© de 16,90 ‚Ç¨. Nous vous invitons donc √† alimenter votre compte si cela est n√©cessaire.
Si le d√©lai de livraison estim√© est d√©pass√©, veuillez v√©rifier que votre adresse de livraison est √† jour. Rendez-vous depuis votre application N26 dans la section Mon Compte üë§  > Param√®tres > Param√®tres personnels > Adresse de livraison.
Si votre adresse de livraison √©tait incorrecte et qu'il s'agit de votre premi√®re carte N26, veuillez-nous contacter sur le Livechat pour que nous puissions proc√©der √† la commande d'une nouvelle carte.
Si votre adresse de livraison √©tait incorrecte et que vous poss√©diez d√©j√† une carte N26 active, vous devez commander une nouvelle carte depuis votre application.
Si votre adresse de livraison √©tait correcte, il y a sans doute eu un incident avec la livraison. Veuillez-nous contacter sur le Livechat pour que nous puissions proc√©der √† la commande d'une nouvelle carte.

Si votre carte n'arrive pas √† destination ou si vous avez besoin de votre carte rapidement, vous pouvez la commander en livraison Express (avec des frais suppl√©mentaires). La livraison peut prendre jusqu'√† 3 jours ouvr√©s.
Nous ne proposons que la livraison Standard pour la carte N26 Metal. Les cartes de couleur Noir carbone et Gris perle seront livr√©es sous 10 jours ouvr√©s et les cartes de couleur Sable corail sous 3 semaines.
Si votre adresse contient des caract√®res sp√©ciaux, veuillez nous contacter sur le Livechat.
Nous envoyons les cartes uniquement √† des adresses r√©sidentielles (les entreprises ne sont pas accept√©es).
N'entrez pas d'espace lorsque vous entrez le code postal de votre adresse de livraison.
Assurez-vous qu'il ne manque pas d'informations importantes pour la livraison (par exemple, le nom sur votre bo√Æte aux lettres si vous habitez en Allemagne ou votre num√©ro de b√¢timent, num√©ro de cage d'escalier et digicode le cas √©ch√©ant). Si vous s√©journez temporairement quelque part (chez un ami ou dans un Airbnb), assurez-vous d'inclure le nom sur la bo√Æte aux lettres qui appartient au r√©sident principal de l'appartement.
Si vous d√©m√©nagez et qu'il s'agit de votre premi√®re carte, assurez-vous de s√©lectionner le pays et l'adresse o√π vous allez d√©m√©nager et souhaitez recevoir votre carte N26.
Si vous attendez la livraison de votre premi√®re carte, assurez-vous que votre adresse de livraison soit bien dans le pays o√π vous avez ouvert votre compte.

title: Where can I use my Maestro card?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Applies to Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands
Let‚Äôs get a couple of things out of the way: your Maestro can‚Äôt be used for online purchases and it‚Äôs not an EC or Girocard (in Germany).
But you can use your card in ATMs or shops where the Maestro symbol is displayed. Each¬†ATM transaction¬†using your Maestro is ‚Ç¨2 (plus a fee of 1,7% of the amount for foreign currency withdrawals).
You can¬†order your Maestro¬†card directly in the app only if you live in Germany, Austria or the Netherlands and have received a transfer of at least 100 ‚Ç¨ from one of these 3 countries.
If you‚Äôre having issues using your Maestro, first check that your¬†card settings¬†are activated. If nothing is blocked, contact Customer Support via chat and we‚Äôll look into it for you.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: How do I change my card limits?
content:
Debit card limits are used to protect an account from fraud and are typically withdrawal or payment limits.  The overall maximum debit card limits are shown below and are set by N26 .  Lower debit card limit amounts can be set by you, the account holder.
Point of Sale (POS) Daily:  $5,000;  Monthly:  $30,000
ATM Daily:  $1,500;  Monthly:  $10,000
Please note that:  Limits can‚Äôt be raised above the maximum.¬†
To set or change your daily withdrawal or payment limits simply:
Log into the mobile application.
Tap on "Actions".
Tap on "Card Settings".
Tap on "Limits".
Use the sliders to set your desired daily withdrawal and payment limits.
These limits will then be applied instantly to your N26 debit card.


The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Wie bekomme ich einen Dispokredit?
content:
Einen Dispo kannst du direkt in der App beantragen. Du erf√§hrst in Echtzeit, ob er dir zur Verf√ºgung steht. Ganz ohne Papierkram.
Gehe zum Bereich Entdecken und dann zu N26 Finanzprodukte, um einen Dispokredit  anzufragen. Du kannst ihn dort auch jederzeit k√ºndigen, deine √úberziehungslimits √§ndern oder die angefallenen Zinsen einsehen.
Wir bieten einen Zinssatz von 8,9% an. Am Ende jedes Quartals ziehen wir die Zinsen von deinem Konto ein.

title: COVID-19: Latest updates on our customer service availability
content:
In light of recent global developments due to COVID-19, we are constantly taking measures to ensure the safety of our staff, while continuing to deliver the best possible customer service experience for you.
Our mission to support you and deliver our banking and customer services as per usual remain unchanged. That said, we want to be able to update you should the situation evolve.
We are reachable at our normal opening hours, from 07:00 - 23:00 hrs daily, including Sundays and public holidays.
If you need to block your card in an emergency, you will be able to do so in your N26 app, or by calling our automated emergency hotline at +44 2035 107126.
Any further updates to availability and waiting times will be published on this page.

title: How to set Rules for Spaces?
content:
Within your Spaces, you can set your own Rules! Rules allow you to easily create automated transactions and standing orders to your Spaces to save money and organise your finances.
¬†If you want to set a Rule through the Web App, here‚Äôs what you need to know:
Process a Spaces transfer and then enable the option to repeat the transfer.
To delete a Rule, click on the 3 dots indicating the settings. You‚Äôll see all the active rules. Clicking on the trashcan icon will delete the rule.
If you need to change a rule, delete it from the settings of the Space you created the rule in, and then create a new one.
If you want to set a Rule through an Android device, you have two options:
From Spaces > click on the three dots > create rule > enter amount > select space > choose frequency and date > confirm
 2. After setting a Space Transfer > select Repeat > choose frequency and date > confirm
¬†If you want to set a Rule through an iOS device, this is what you need to do:
¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†From Spaces > create a new rule > choose frequency and date > confirm¬†
¬†Please be aware that both Spaces Rules and Standing Orders are processed at the same time of day (0100 UTC). This means if you have a Rule and Standing order set up for the same date, you will need enough funds on that day to cover both.
If you have Standing Orders that are dependent on your Rules having happened first, you will need to make sure the Standing Order is set for the day after the Rule. This also means that if you want to prioritise your Standing Orders they need to be set for the day before your Rules.
Please note that, if you have an activated Overdraft, a Rule will still be processed automatically even if your balance is negative.

title: How to set my card PIN?
content:
We don‚Äôt send you a PIN via post; you set the PIN for your Mastercard or Maestro card¬†once you‚Äôve successfully connected your smartphone to your account and¬†activated¬†your card(s). To set or change your card PIN:
Go to üë§ My Account.
Select Card settings and swipe to choose a card.
Select Reset PIN on the mobile or WebApp(new tab).
Enter the 10-digit token number on your card.
Choose your new PIN and confirm it.
Keep in mind that:
If you live in France, Spain, Ireland, Greece, Finland, Estonia or the UK, you must make your first payment using Chip and PIN before you can use your card anywhere else. You can also first make a withdrawal or balance inquiry at ATM instead.
For security reasons we don‚Äôt accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences (such as 1111, 1234, or 4321). If the number you‚Äôve chosen is not accepted please try again using a different combination.
If a PIN is entered incorrectly three times in a row, the card will automatically be blocked for security reasons. If this happens, please contact our Customer Support via chat so we can unblock it for you.
Your card PIN is separate from your Confirmation PIN, however you can choose the same PIN for both.

title: Am I liable to tax in the United States?
content:
As a licensed bank we're required to report directly to the IRS information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers according to FATCA, a legislation designed by the US Department of Treasury and the U.S. Internal Revenue Service to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets.
You can find more information about FATCA here(new tab).¬†
In the context of FATCA, a U.S. Person is defined as, among other things:
A citizen of the United States (including dual citizens)
A resident in the United States, for example as a holder of a valid U.S. Green Card or as a person who passes the ‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù (see below).
If you're unsure as to how to determine whether you're a U.S. Person, please consult a tax advisor.
‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù means:
That you've been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more in the current calendar year
OR
That you have been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more over the last three calendar years, to be calculated as follows: 


(31 days or more in the current calendar year) + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. last year) divided by 3 + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. the year before last) divided by 6.
¬†In addition, if your account shows any of the following:
U.S. citizenship or U.S. residence
U.S. place of birth
U.S. mailing or residence address, including U.S. PO boxes
U.S. telephone number
Standing instructions to a U.S. address or an account maintained in the US
we're still obliged to treat you as a U.S. Person, unless we receive the following from you:¬†
A W-8BEN or similar agreed self-certification form and
A non-U.S. passport or other government-issued identification evidencing your citizenship or nationality in a country other than the U.S.
In case you were born in the US, a copy of your Certificate of Loss of Nationality of the US.

title: How to protect my identity?
content:
To protect and help avoid the misuse of your personal data, please keep in mind that:
We will never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. This includes verifications for apartment rental contracts, lines of credit, or job offers (including jobs with N26). Only complete the verification process if you want to open an N26 bank account for yourself.
As the account owner, only you should create and have access to your login details. Never create an N26 bank account with a predefined email address and password. If you use login credentials that were given to you, these credentials may be used to reach your personal and legal information. Also, never log into an N26 account that is not yours.
Do not send your ID or passport to unknown or unverified recipients.
We may ask for certain documents when your transaction is subject to a routine check. Only send valid documentation to verified N26 email accounts.
We will never ask for your username, password, or PIN codes outside the N26 app. Never provide this information in an external website or app, even if it looks N26-related.
If you ever feel in doubt, have received a suspicious request from a third party, or think your N26 login may be compromised, please do not hesitate to contact us.

content:
Cash withdrawals using your Mastercard depend on your T&C country (the address you originally shipped your first card to):
Germany: 3 to 5* free ATM withdrawals per month in Germany and unlimited free withdrawals in the eurozone or by using¬†CASH26
Austria and Italy: unlimited free withdrawals (including¬†CASH26)
France, Spain, the Netherlands, and the Rest of Europe: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in your country of residence and the eurozone
Switzerland: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in the eurozone and a 1.7% markup on local withdrawals
UK: unlimited free withdrawals
There‚Äôs always a ‚Ç¨2 fee if you use your¬†Maestro¬†card to withdraw cash (only available in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands).
Check our¬†pricing lists¬†if you‚Äôve been¬†charged an ATM fee.
*Germany only: You receive 5 free withdrawals during the first three months. After that you'll receive 3 free withdrawals but you can keep receiving 5 if:
You are younger than 26 years old.
You receive your salary, pension, student allowance, or government benefits for at least two consecutive months (your additional free withdrawals start the following month).
You receive payments of at least ‚Ç¨1.000 per month for at least two months (your additional free withdrawals start the following month).

Once your friend has fulfilled the requirements, you'll receive the bonus within 60 days.¬†You can check the status of your referral bonus in the mobile app or N26 Web.

This means you can share your invite link with your personal connections via social media as long as you are the primary content owner. N26 has the right to cancel the referral program at any time.
Currently,¬†Friend referral¬†rewards are only available for customers in Germany, Austria, Italy, France, Spain, Belgium, Luxembourg, Greece, Portugal, Ireland, the Netherlands, Finland, Estonia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden, Switzerland, Norway, Denmark, Poland, Iceland and Liechtenstein.

title: What to do if my N26 IBAN is not accepted?
content:
Your IBAN includes the DE country code, a two-digit check number, the eight-digit bank sort code, and your ten-digit account number. For example:¬†DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.
The participating countries of the SEPA area (Single Euro Payments Area) have agreed on the IBAN system in order to simplify national and international payments, and to reduce the risk of error in the communication and processing of transactions.
Merchants or employers who do not accept IBANs from other member states of the European Economic Area are violating European law as of 1 February 2016 (Article 9 of¬†Regulation No 260/2012(new tab)).
If you are ever affected by IBAN discrimination, please¬†contact your relevant national authority(new tab) directly and notify them. Provide your contact details, the name of the merchant or company that didn‚Äôt accept your IBAN, as well as a brief description of the incident (including a screenshot of the rejection or other documentation of your communication with them).

content:

title: CRS - Why we require certain information from our customers
content:
N26 as a financial institution is (according to CRS) required to report information directly to tax authorities in the European Union concerning financial accounts held by customers who are tax resident in another country.
CRS stands for Common Reporting Standard. The CRS has been developed by the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD) and is a global reporting standard for the automatic exchange of information (AEOI). The goal of CRS is to allow tax authorities to obtain a clearer understanding of financial assets held abroad by their residents for tax purposes in order to fight tax evasion. More than 90 countries have agreed to share information on residents' assets and incomes in conformation with CRS.
In order for us to be able to accurately determine whether an account is to be reported to the tax authorities for CRS purposes, we need to ask you:
In which country(ies) are you a tax resident?¬†

You are normally a ‚Äútax resident‚Äù and therefore subject to tax on your worldwide income in the country where you have a residential address. If you have a place to live in more than one country, then there are normally ‚Äútie-breaker rules‚Äù included in double tax treaties and tax laws of the relevant countries that help determine where you are a tax resident. It may be that you are tax resident in more than one country during a year and, if so, we'd need to know both the country and your taxpayer identification number for each of them in order to accurately report the information to the relevant tax authorities.¬†

What is your taxpayer identification number (‚ÄúTIN‚Äù) for each country?

The issuance and format of a TIN differs by country. For EU countries, the European Commission has published guidance on TINs in each EU country(new tab), which may help you in identifying your individual TIN(s) in these countries.¬†
In case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the N26 app. To do this, simply log in to the N26 app and go to:
My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Tax Information¬†

content:

Categor√≠as.¬†Recopilamos informaci√≥n sobre comercios y pagos para mejorar nuestra categorizaci√≥n (cajeros autom√°ticos, alimentos y comestibles o compras, por ejemplo). Si env√≠as un¬†MoneyBeam¬†con una etiqueta de referencia que ponga¬†Comida, autom√°ticamente pasar√° a ser un gasto en Bares y Restaurantes. Si ves que un gasto no concuerda con una categor√≠a, puedes cambiarla seleccionando dicha transacci√≥n y eligiendo otra categor√≠a de la lista desplegable.
Hashtags.¬†Tambi√©n hemos a√±adido hashtags predeterminados relacionados con el tiempo (#weekend), tipo de transacci√≥n (#libros) o incluso ubicaciones donde se ha realizado la compra (#Berl√≠n). Adem√°s, puedes ordenar tus transacciones creando tus propios hashtags: pulsa en una transacci√≥n, haz clic en el icono del l√°piz para agregar una etiqueta (como #viaje_portugal o #mensualidad, por ejemplo) o bien elimina las etiquetas no deseadas.

title: Shared Spaces - Vertrauensw√ºrdiger Empf√§nger
content:
Vertrauensw√ºrdige Empf√§nger eines Shared Spaces k√∂nnen:
Geld von ihren eigenen Spaces (inklusive anderer Shared Spaces, in denen sie Teilnehmer sind) zu einem Shared Space √ºberweisen.
Jederzeit frei auf das Guthaben eines Shared Spaces zugreifen.
Einen Shared Space jederzeit verlassen.
√úberweisungen zwischen vertrauensw√ºrdigen Empf√§ngern und einem Shared Space m√ºssen nicht mit einer PIN und Push-Nachricht autorisiert werden. Das bedeutet, dass die Empf√§nger per Drag-and-Drop Geld verschieben k√∂nnen, √§hnlich wie bei normalen Space-Transaktionen in der N26 App oder WebApp.
Warum muss ich einen Besitzer oder einen Teilnehmer als vertrauensw√ºrdigen Empf√§nger bestimmen?
Das europ√§ische Bankrecht regelt, wie Bank√ºberweisungen autorisiert werden m√ºssen. Hiernach ist die Anwendung einer starken Kundenauthentifizierung (SCA) eine Ma√ünahme, um Online-Zahlungen sicherer zu machen.¬†
Eine Ausnahme hiervon bildet die Klassifizierung einer Person in einem Shared Space als "vertrauensw√ºrdigen Empf√§nger". √úberweisungen an diese Person bed√ºrfen keiner starken Kundenauthentifizierung.

title: Pourquoi ne puis-je pas obtenir de cr√©dit ?
content:
Lors de votre demande de cr√©dit, nous vous posons une s√©rie de questions sur votre situation personnelle et financi√®re. Il vous sera probablement demand√© de vous connecter √† votre autre compte bancaire directement depuis l‚Äôapplication N26 pour continuer votre demande (obligatoire en Allemagne, si votre compte N26 n'est pas votre compte principal).
Cet autre compte doit exclusivement √™tre un compte que vous d√©tenez aupr√®s d‚Äôune banque du pays depuis lequel vous faites votre demande de cr√©dit. Si vous faites votre demande en France, le compte secondaire pris en compte dans l‚Äô√©valuation de votre demande de cr√©dit devra ainsi √™tre dans une banque fran√ßaise, en Allemagne le compte secondaire devra √™tre allemand.
(Pour l‚ÄôAllemagne) Nous contr√¥lons √©galement votre score de cr√©dit actuel aupr√®s de l'organisme Schufa, m√™me si nous poss√©dons d√©j√† des informations vous concernant qui nous ont d√©j√† √©t√© fournies par Schufa. Notre demande d‚Äôinformations aupr√®s de cet organisme n'exerce aucune influence sur votre score lui-m√™me. Votre score de cr√©dit n‚Äôest pas l‚Äôunique crit√®re de notre √©valuation, nous v√©rifions aussi vos revenus mensuels sans compter les aides sociales (ch√¥mage, allocations familiales, etc).
Une fois la demande de cr√©dit envoy√©e via l‚Äôapplication, vous ne pourrez pas modifier votre demande pendant 90 jours, et ce, m√™me si votre situation √©volue entre temps. Il vous faudra donc attendre la suppression de votre premi√®re requ√™te pour faire une nouvelle demande de cr√©dit.
Votre √©ligibilit√© √† l‚Äôobtention d‚Äôun cr√©dit est √©tudi√©e par un syst√®me automatique int√©gr√© √† notre application.

title: Why can‚Äôt I see other N26 users on MoneyBeam?
content:
To carry out real-time transactions such as MoneyBeams, N26 checks your smartphone‚Äôs contact list and finds other N26 users based on saved phone numbers and emails. 
If you don‚Äôt see your friend‚Äôs name on MoneyBeam but you know they‚Äôre an N26 user, they most likely haven‚Äôt made themselves visible. Indeed you can revoke your consent to be identifiable as an N26 user.
During your first MoneyBeam transaction (after importing your contacts) you‚Äôll receive a prompt to either change your visibility settings or be reminded of them later.
Most MoneyBeam transfers that fail between N26 users happen because there are multiple phone numbers or emails listed in the contact entry of a phone's address book. 
You‚Äôll know this is the case if your friend doesn‚Äôt immediately receive your transfer (by the way: this money will bounce back to your account within a week).
To avoid this, find out which email and phone number your friend uses for their N26 account and make sure to send the MoneyBeam to it.

title: ¬øC√≥mo cambiar mi direcci√≥n, n√∫mero de tel√©fono u otra informaci√≥n personal?
content:
Es esencial mantener tu informaci√≥n personal actualizada. Por ejemplo, tener tu n√∫mero de tel√©fono actualizado es necesario para¬†vincular tu m√≥vil(pesta√±a nueva)¬†o para enviar y recibir un¬†MoneyBeam(pesta√±a nueva). As√≠ es como se hace:
Direcci√≥n de env√≠o,¬†contrase√±a¬†e¬†informaci√≥n de impuestos: Puedes modificar esta informaci√≥n cuando quieras desde la aplicaci√≥n. Ve a¬†üë§ Mi Cuenta, selecciona¬†Configuraci√≥n y luego¬†Configuraci√≥n personal.
Nombre¬†y¬†sexo: Necesitamos que nos ense√±es 2 documentos nacionales de identidad: una copia de tu DNI o pasaporte junto con un documento oficial del cambio (licencia matrimonial o un certificado de nacimiento actualizado).
Nacionalidad: Cont√°ctanos por chat y env√≠anos una copia de tu DNI o pasaporte.

title: What are the benefits of N26 Metal?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Available in Germany, Austria, France, Spain, Italy, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Iceland, Greece, and Liechtenstein.
Upgrade to N26 Metal¬†and you‚Äôll receive 10 additional¬†Spaces, dedicated Customer Support, access to exclusive partner offerings, as well as the N26 Metal¬†insurance package, provided by Allianz Global Assistance*, which covers a broad range of personal and financial benefits:
Travel insurance. Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.
Extended warranty. Extension of an existing manufacturer's warranty by up to one year for insured equipment.
Cash protection. Compensation for a robbery up to 4 hours after withdrawing money from an ATM using your N26 Metal Mastercard.
Mobile phone theft insurance. Compensation if your smartphone is stolen in your home country or abroad.
Purchase protection. Reimbursement or repair costs for stolen or damaged items purchased with an N26 Metal Mastercard if the theft or accident is an insured event in your home country or abroad.
Keep these in mind when considering¬†N26 Metal(new tab):
N26 Metal features an NFC-enabled Mastercard with a metal core in your choice of charcoal black, quartz rose, or slate grey.
If you upgrade to N26 Metal, the monthly fee of ‚Ç¨16,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade. If you‚Äôre a new customer, the first fee will be deducted 15 days after you prove your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on your sign-up date.
If you were previously an N26 You member, all purchases and travel booked using your N26 You Mastercard will remain insured.
The minimum membership is one year. Your contract automatically renews if you do not cancel your membership at least 4 weeks before the contract expires.

title: How to cancel my N26 You or N26 Metal membership?
content:
N26 You(new tab) or¬†N26 Metal(new tab)¬†contracts have a term of one year. This contract automatically renews for another year unless you cancel it. 
In this article you will find the difference between revocation, cancellation of the membership and cancellation of the renewal of your membership. You have 3 options:
Revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period
Cancel your membership at any time up to 1 month before your contract ends
Stop your membership‚Äôs renewal up to 1 month before it expires
Find in details how to do so below. 
You can revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period. Simply open a chat with us and we'll assist you from there.
Keep in mind that if you cancel your contract before it ends, you won‚Äôt be able to sign up for the same membership plan in the future.
If you want to terminate your membership at any time up to *1 month before your contract ends and after the 14-day revocation period, please contact us.
If you choose this option all your N26 You or N26 Metal benefits will end, which includes your insurance coverage.
You have up to 4 weeks before your membership expires to cancel the renewal of your N26 You or N26 Metal membership. To do so:
Log into the mobile app and go to üë§ My Account
Select N26 You/Metal
Tap Membership details followed by Cancel Membership
 you can also see your membership expiration date here
Confirm the cancellation via the push message we send you
You can continue to use your N26 You or N26 Metal Mastercard fully until your membership expires. That means you‚Äôll keep your insurance coverage as long as you‚Äôre still required to pay your membership fee. After that, your Mastercard will work like a standard card without the benefits. We‚Äôll send you a standard card before your contract ends. No need to contact us about it.
We‚Äôll notify you of the renewal via email 8 weeks before your anniversary date.
If you want to definitely close your account, visit our article How to close my N26 account.

title: PSD2 - un Open Banking sicuro
content:
La Direttiva sui Servizi di Pagamento 2 (¬´PSD2¬ª) √® la nuova direttiva europea¬† che ti consente di accedere alle informazioni sul tuo conto e di effettuare la disposizione di ordini di pagamento tramite¬† terze parti autorizzate in modo sicuro e protetto.
Questo¬† significa che puoi autorizzare¬† terze parti ad  accedere alle informazioni del tuo conto tramite un‚Äôinterfaccia dedicata.
Puoi abilitare un servizio d‚Äôinformazioni sui conti t (AIS) per riunire i dati relativi ai¬† tuoi conti bancari che possiedi e gestirli  attraverso fornitori terzi certificati;
Puoi pagare in modo sicuro su¬† qualsiasi sito che offre servizi di pagamento (PIS).
Lo scambio di dati avviene tramite il¬† nostro partner - Token.io.
Se decidi di utilizzare¬† un servizio di pagamento come il servizio di informazione sui conti oppure il servizio di disposizione di ordini di pagamento, verrai reindirizzato all'app di N26 tramite Token.io per confermare la richiesta di accesso.
Nella nostra Informativa sulla privacy(nuova tabella) ti informiamo sulle finalit√†, le parti coinvolte e le basi giuridiche del trattamento dei dati necessari per adempiere ai nostri obblighi(nuova tabella) nel quadro della nuova direttiva europea sui servizi di pagamento.
Perch√© non riesco a collegare terze parti al mio conto?
Se una terza parte non ha effettuato l'integrazione con la nostra interfaccia dedicata, dovr√† farlo¬† attraverso il nostro partner Token.io.¬†
Come posso revocare il consenso conferito ad una singola terza parte?
Dovrai contattare la terza parte in questione direttamente e richiedere la revoca del consenso.
*si applica a tutti i paesi EEA.

title: How to log in with Two Factor Authentication?
content:
Two-Factor Authentication is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. You‚Äôre probably familiar with using only¬† your personal password to sign in to your account, but with Two-Factor Authentication you‚Äôll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.
Go here for more information on Two-Factor Authentication
When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you‚Äôll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or, if this isn't possible, you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number, confirming your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log in to your N26 account.
When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. This means the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.
First, you‚Äôll need to update your phone‚Äôs operating system and the N26 app to their latest versions. If you‚Äôre unable to login to your account, but still have access to your registered email address, try to reset your password. If you don‚Äôt have access to your registered email address, please contact us via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out.
Read more in our article on how to create a password.
If you‚Äôve lost access to your paired device, but you still have access to your registered phone number, you‚Äôll be able to log into your N26 account and request an authentication code. To do this:
Login to the Webapp
When prompted to confirm your login on your paired device, select Help
Choose Send SMS Code
Once you receive the SMS code, input it into the Webapp
As you've just confirmed the authentication code you‚Äôve successfully completed two-factor authentication, and can now pair your new device with your account.
If you don‚Äôt have access to your registered phone number ‚Äì either because you have a new phone number, or your phone was lost or stolen ‚Äì please contact our customer service via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out.
If you have an older smartphone that doesn‚Äôt support the latest app version, you won‚Äôt be able to access N26 via the mobile app anymore using that phone. 
However, you can still use our Webapp to view your account, to do this you'll need to confirm your login attempt via an SMS verification code which we‚Äôll send to your account's registered phone number.
You‚Äôll still be able to complete card transactions and cash withdrawals as normal using your Mastercard, but bear in mind that you won't be able to perform any bank transfers or payments until you can confirm the transfer within the N26 app.
Read more in our article on Strong Customer Authentification.

title: ¬øC√≥mo hacer una transferencia SEPA?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Puedes enviar transferencias a cualquier pa√≠s de la zona SEPA, siempre que acepten euros.
Para hacer una transferencia, puedes hacerlo desde la app o la web app de N26.

Puedes a√±adir un mensaje o pinchar en ''Continuar''.
Revisa el resumen de la transferencia que se muestra antes de confirmar. 
Puedes convertirla en una transferencia programada, seleccionando la fecha y el intervalo de repetici√≥n, as√≠ como el beneficiario.
Pulsa enviar y confirma la operaci√≥n con tu PIN de confirmaci√≥n desde el dispositivo vinculado. 
Es necesario confirmar o cancelar a trav√©s de la notificaci√≥n que te llagar√° al dispositivo vinculado. Una vez que la hayas confirmado no hay forma de revertirla o de cambiar los datos del destinatario. 
Si no puedes confirmar una transferencia desde la app te aconsejo que revises lo siguiente:
Aseg√∫rate de que tienes buena conexi√≥n a internet
Aseg√∫rate de que tu m√≥vil tiene las notificaciones activadas. Puedes comprobarlo desde la configuraci√≥n de tu tel√©fono, no de la app. 
Aseg√∫rate de que est√°s utilizando tu tel√©fono vinculado. 
Cada vez que env√≠as una transferencia, puedes descargarte el PDF de confirmaci√≥n. Para ello:
Sit√∫ate en la lista de transacciones.
Localiza la transferencia y pulsa sobre ella
Desliza hacia abajo la pantalla y pulsa sobre la ''Confirmaci√≥n de transferencia'' para que se abra el PDF.

title: How to make transfers in foreign currencies?
content:
We have partnered with TransferWise to make foreign currency transfers easy. TransferWise offers real-time exchange rates and no hidden fees.
To initiate a transfer in a foreign currency start by logging into the mobile app: 
From the Home screen choose the Actions tab,

Select Add Money followed by Foreign Currency Transfer,

Choose ‚Äúadd a new recipient‚Äù or select an existing payee. When adding a new recipient you'll be given the option to change the currency by tapping on the Euro flag in the top right corner of the screen,

Enter the amount you'd like to send and add any additional bank details,

Finalize the transfer with your Confirmation PIN.
If we don‚Äôt currently offer the¬†foreign currency(new tab)¬†you need, please visit¬†TransferWise(new tab)¬†for more currency options. You can log in by entering your N26 account email and selecting Forgot password? You‚Äôll receive an email from TransferWise to change your password and then you can use both log in details to perform the transfer from there.
Please note that foreign currency transfers in the app are not possible with the N26 Business or Business You account nor are transfers to businesses.
