title: Warum hat mir ein Geldautomat kein Bargeld ausgezahlt?
content:
Es kann vorkommen: Ein Geldautomat zahlt dir kein Bargeld aus und dein Konto wird trotzdem belastet.
Pr√ºfe zun√§chst deine¬†Kartenlimits¬†unter¬†üë§ Mein Konto¬†und¬†Karteneinstellungen¬†und gehe sicher dass Bargeldabhebungen aktiviert sind.
Wir k√∂nnen dir zwar nicht sicher sagen, weshalb dir kein Geld ausgezahlt wurde, aber wir k√∂nnen dir dabei helfen, es zur√ºckzubekommen.
Der Betrag, der von deinem Guthaben abgezogen wurde, ist zun√§chst einmal nur eine Autorisierung, d.h. eine Reservierung oder ein gesperrter Betrag. Da die Transaktion nicht erfolgreich war, verf√§llt dieser reservierte Betrag normalerweise nach wenigen Stunden - maximal 12 Werktagen - und wird deinem Konto wieder gutgeschrieben.
Falls der reservierte Betrag nach 12 Werktagen nicht verf√§llt, f√ºlle bitte ein¬†Formular f√ºr Umsatzreklamationen¬†aus. Wir tun unser Bestes, um das Geld f√ºr dich zur√ºckzubekommen.
Bis dahin empfehlen wir dir, es mit einem Geldautomaten eines anderen Geldinstituts zu versuchen. Es ist sehr selten, dass Auszahlungen zweimal hintereinander fehlschlagen.

title: Pourquoi ne puis-je pas b√©n√©ficier des services bancaires de base ?
content:
N26 est en mesure de refuser une demande d‚Äôobtention des¬†services bancaires de base¬†sous certaines conditions. C‚Äôest le cas par exemple si :
Vous vivez en dehors d'un pays o√π N26 est disponible.
Vous poss√©dez d√©j√† un compte bancaire dans une autre banque en Allemagne et √™tes en mesure de l‚Äôutiliser.
Vous avez √©t√© condamn√© dans les trois ann√©es pr√©c√©dant la demande d'ouverture du compte pour une infraction commise contre une banque, l'un de ses employ√©s ou l'un de ses clients.
Vous b√©n√©ficiez d√©j√† des services bancaires de base N26 et nous avons d√ª le cl√¥turer de fa√ßon l√©gitime en raison d'un retard de paiement ou de l'utilisation du service √† des fins ill√©gales.
Nous ne pouvons pas remplir nos obligations conform√©ment √† la Loi contre le blanchiment d‚Äôargent et/ou √† la Loi sur les services bancaires.

title: Why was I charged more than expected?
content:
All transactions take place in real-time. We'll alert you when any incoming or outgoing transaction happens via push message.
Sometimes a transaction could look suspicious because the final debited amount can differ from the original transaction amount for a few reasons:
A merchant blocks a higher amount for a deposit (for example, at a gas station, or a car rental or hotel booking), and the difference is credited to your account once the deposit is no longer required.
Changes in exchange rates may result in slight differences in the total for transactions made in foreign currencies.
In both cases, we don‚Äôt charge interest for the difference in amounts.
But if you‚Äôre certain that a transaction is unauthorized by you, we could help¬†get your money back.

title: Wie √ºberweise ich in Fremdw√§hrungen?
content:
Wir arbeiten mit TransferWise zusammen, um einfache √úberweisungen in Fremdw√§hrungen(neuen Tab) zu erm√∂glichen. TransferWise bietet Echtzeit-Wechselkurse ohne versteckte Geb√ºhren.
Um eine √úberweisung mit Transferwise durchzuf√ºhren, logge dich zun√§chst in deiner mobilen App ein:

2. W√§hle dann ‚ÄúBank√ºberweisung‚Äù f√ºge einen Kontoakt hinzu
3. Wenn du einen neuen Kontakt hinzuf√ºgst, kannst du die gew√ºnschte W√§hrung ausw√§hlen, indem du auf die Europa-Flagge in der oberen rechten Ecke des Bildschirms tippst. 
4. Gib dann den Betrag sowie die Bankverbindung des Empf√§ngers an

Wenn wir deine gew√ºnschte W√§hrung noch nicht anbieten, besuche bitte die TransferWise Website(neuen Tab) f√ºr eine noch gr√∂√üere Auswahl. Du kannst dich mit deiner N26 E-Mail-Adresse einloggen, indem du auf Forgot password? klickst. Du wirst eine E-Mail von TransferWise erhalten, mit der du dein Passwort erstellen kannst. Damit kannst du dich einloggen und die √úberweisung abschlie√üen.
Bitte beachte, dass mit dem N26 Business oder Business You Konto in der App weder √úberweisungen in Fremdw√§hrungen, noch √úberweisungen an Unternehmen m√∂glich sind.

title: Wie verwalte ich meine Sichtbarkeit als N26 Nutzer?
content:
Wenn du als N26 Nutzer sichtbar bist, kannst du alle Funktionen deiner App zu nutzen, wie z.B. Shared Spaces oder Echtzeit-Transaktionen mit MoneyBeam oder Geldanfragen. Dazu gleicht N26 deine Kontaktdaten mit denen anderer N26 Nutzer ab.
Hier erf√§hrst du, wie das funktioniert und wie du deine Sichtbarkeit als N26 Nutzer verwalten kannst. 
Alle deine Kontakte, die ein N26 Konto haben, kannst du in der in-App Kontaktliste einsehen. Ebenso wirst du in der Kontaktliste von anderen N26 Nutzern, die deine Kontaktdaten haben, angezeigt. Deine Kontaktliste wird von N26 nicht dauerhaft gespeichert und nur f√ºr Nutzung der entsprechenden Funktionen verwendet.
Deine Sichtbarkeit als N26 Nutzer kannst du in deiner App verwalten unter üë§ Mein Konto > Einstellungen > Pers√∂nliche Einstellungen > Pers√∂nliche Daten. Hier kannst du dein H√§kchen setzen bei "Allow my contacts who are also N26 users to find me easily for transfers".

title: Why did my online purchase fail?
content:
Some reasons why your online payment failed:
If you are unable to confirm the push message within 5 minutes, simply restart the payment process on the merchant's website.
If you do not receive a push message, please make sure that your smartphone is connected and that push messages are enabled on your smartphone.
Ensure that online payments and payments abroad are enabled in your card settings.
A stable internet connection is required.
If you are using an iOS device, make sure you turn off the Do Not Disturb mode.
If the amount on the merchant's site is different from the one stated in the push message, this may be due to the conversion of a foreign currency into euros.
Make sure that you disable any Adblockers running on your browser.
Your Maestro card can‚Äôt be used for online purchases.

title: FATCA - Why we require certain information from our customers
content:
As a financial institution, N26 is required to report information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers or by foreign entities (in which U.S. taxpayers hold a substantial ownership interest according to FATCA) to the United States Department of Treasury and the Internal Revenue Service (‚ÄúIRS‚Äù).
FATCA is an acronym for Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act and is a legislation designed to prevent tax evasion. Another purpose of FATCA is to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets. You can find more information about FATCA on the IRS website(new tab).
The U.S. tax system includes U.S. citizens who are not presently residing in the U.S. In comparison. So in order for us to be able to accurately determine whether your account is to be reported to the IRS, we‚Äôll need to ask you:
Are you (also) a citizen or green card holder of the United States?¬†

Are you subject to tax in the U.S?

Being ‚Äúsubject to tax‚Äù in the U.S. does not necessarily mean that you‚Äôre also paying personal income tax in the U.S. It means that U.S. tax law requires you to file a tax return and declare your (worldwide) income to the IRS, even if you don‚Äôt end up paying any U.S. tax.

If so, what is your U.S. Taxpayer Identification Number?

As a U.S. TIN you can either use your U.S. Social Security Number (‚ÄúSSN‚Äù) or your U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN). You can find more information about TIN on the IRS' website(new tab).
Additionally, if your account shows:
A U.S. place of birth, 
A U.S. telephone number,
A standing order to the U.S.
then we are required by FATCA legislation to initially assume that you are subject to FATCA until you can specifically confirm to us otherwise.
In case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the N26 app. To do this, simply log in to the N26 app and go to:
My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Tax Information¬†

title: How to get push messages?
content:
We send you push messages to finalize transfers (such as¬†MoneyBeam) or to confirm a service (as with¬†CASH26). If you aren‚Äôt receiving these messages, first check that notifications are enabled for both your phone and the app. Then try some of our troubleshooting suggestions, depending on your smartphone:
Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Apple App Store and connect your smartphone again.
Check whether you‚Äôre logged into your N26 app.
Make sure messaging for the app has been activated in the general settings of your smartphone.
Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Google Play Store and connect your smartphone again.
Go to your Account settings and activate notification by tapping App settings then Notifications.
Huawei and Xiaomi: go to Settings then Advanced settings and Battery settings. Then set N26 as a protected app.
OnePlus: select battery optimization then the N26 app and then don't optimize.
Oppo: disable battery optimization for the app and lock it in the Recent apps overview.

title: ¬øC√≥mo configurar el PIN de mi tarjeta?
content:
No te enviamos tu c√≥digo PIN por correo, sino que t√∫ creas el PIN de tu tarjeta Mastercard o Maestro.¬†Una vez que hayas vinculado con √©xito tu tel√©fono m√≥vil a tu cuenta y hayas activado tu tarjeta, se cambiar√≠a as√≠:
Entra en¬†Gestionar.
Selecciona Configuraci√≥n de tarjetas¬†y desliza para seleccionar una tarjeta.
Selecciona¬†Cambiar PIN.
Introduce el Token de 10 d√≠gitos que hay en tu tarjeta.
Elige el nuevo PIN y confirma.
Recuerda que:
Por motivos de seguridad no aceptamos ning√∫n PIN que contenga elementos de tu fecha de nacimiento, direcci√≥n u otra combinaci√≥n con d√≠gitos repetidos o secuencias (como por ejemplo 1111, 1234 o 4321). Si el n√∫mero que has elegido no es aceptado, por favor int√©ntalo otra vez utilizando una combinaci√≥n diferente.
Si vives en Espa√±a, Francia, Irlanda, Grecia, Finlandia, Estonia o el Reino Unido, deber√°s hacer un pago utilizando el pin y el chip antes de utilizar tu tarjeta en cualquier otra parte, tambi√©n puedes sacar dinero del cajero antes de utilizar tu tarjeta en cualquier otra parte.
Si el PIN es introducido de forma incorrecta tres veces seguidas, la tarjeta ser√° bloqueada de forma autom√°tica por motivos de seguridad. Si esto sucede, por favor contacta con nuestro servicio de Atenci√≥n al Cliente por chat para que la desbloqueemos.
Tu c√≥digo PIN no es el mismo que tu¬†PIN de confirmaci√≥n, sin embargo, puedes elegir el mismo PIN para ambos si lo deseas.

If you live in France, Spain, Ireland, Greece, Finland, Estonia or the UK, you must withdraw money at an ATM first before you can use your card anywhere else.

title: Why is N26 secure?
content:
To protect your account, we use a three-layered security architecture:
Secure login.¬†Your login details of both the mobile and¬†WebApp(new tab)¬†consist of a username and password or fingerprint/face recognition (depending on your smartphone). Please choose a¬†secure password¬†and don‚Äôt reveal your login details to anyone.
Confirmation PIN.¬†This¬†4-digit code¬†is required every time you make a transfer or connect/disconnect your phone. You first set it up once you have successfully connected your smartphone to your account. You can then¬†change it¬†in the app yourself after that.
Push messages.¬†For every incoming and outgoing payment, a push message will be sent to your¬†connected smartphone. It's also used to confirm and finalize your transactions. We've also added¬†3D Secure¬†to protect you from online card fraud.
Every time you contact us we‚Äôll ask you some security questions to make sure it's really you. But we‚Äôll never ask for your debit card number, card verification code (CVV), password, or your card or Confirmation PINs.
We‚Äôve also taken steps to protect your data: we store as little information about you as possible, only for as long as we are legally obligated to, and we delete data when it is no longer required for a product or service. You can¬†download your personal data¬†up to 6 months after you close your account. Find more information in our¬†Privacy Policy(new tab).

title: How to open my N26 account?
content:
You can open an account in the app (on your smartphone) or in N26 for Web(new tab) if you:
are at least 18 years old
are a resident of a supported country
own a compatible smartphone
hold a supported ID (eligibility depends on whether you live in Germany(new tab) or outside of Germany(new tab))
don't already have an account with us
are able to verify yourself in one of our supported languages: English, German, Spanish, Italian, or French. Please note that only English is supported in the UK. 
This is how the sign-up process for an N26 bank account works:
After confirming your email, personal details, and shipping address, select the type of account you want. *
Prove your identity and connect your smartphone to your new account.
As a new signup, you'll be able to top up your account via Bank Transfer or CASH26 deposit (if you are in Germany, Austria or Italy). 
After a few days, you‚Äôll receive your N26 Mastercard by post.
If you'd like more information, here's how you can get in touch with us.
*If you meet our minimum creditworthiness criteria, you can open an N26 account. If you don‚Äôt, we may offer you an N26 Flex account (Germany only). This decision is calculated through an automated process.
We are available from 7:00 to 23:00 everyday, including Sundays and public holidays.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our Refer a Friend Program.

title: Will my direct debit go through if I'm low on funds?
content:
If your balance can‚Äôt cover a direct debit* when it‚Äôs due, it‚Äôll bounce and you‚Äôll be charged a¬†‚Ç¨3 fee. And if you have a negative account balance, you'll be charged an overdraft interest of 8.9%. It‚Äôs not possible to delay a direct debit.
To avoid this fee in the future, you can instantly check whether you‚Äôre eligible for an¬†Overdraft¬†directly in the app (available in Germany and Austria).
*For Poland, Sweden, Denmark, and Norway only: if you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and ultimate amount that is collected from us.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: Wie finde ich meine IBAN oder Kontonummer?
content:
Du findest deine IBAN und unseren BIC  auf deinen Kontoausz√ºgen oder unter üë§ Mein Konto in der App oder WebApp(neuen Tab) (falls du deine Karte noch nicht aktiviert hast, aber Geld auf dein Konto einzahlen m√∂chtest.)

Du kannst deine Bankverbindung mit Anderen teilen, indem du auf das Teilen-Symbol unter üë§ Mein Konto tippst. Oder du kannst deine Bankverbindung als PDF herunterladen, indem du dich in die WebApp(neuen Tab) einloggst und auf die Wolke rechts neben Transaktionen klickst. 
Alle unsere IBANs beginnen mit DE, gefolgt von der zweistelligen Pr√ºfziffer und unserer Bankleitzahl 10011001 und enden mit deiner 10-stelligen Kontonummer (beginnend mit 26).

Lieber Videos statt Text? Sieh dir das Tutorial (neuen Tab)auf unserem N26 Support YouTube(neuen Tab) Kanal an.
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Bekomme 15‚Ç¨ f√ºr jeden Freund, dem du N26 erfolgreich empfiehlst. Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: How to report an insurance claim?
content:
Your¬†N26 You(new tab)¬†and¬†N26 Metal(new tab)¬†membership includes a wide range of insurance benefits, covered by our partner Allianz Global Assistance Europe.*
To report a claim, log into your app, go to üë§ My Account and select N26 You/Metal, then select Make a claim.
There you'll find:
A guide to submit your claim (for example, flight or luggage delay, extended warranty, or travel cancellation)
Your account and contract information, including your N26 You or N26 Metal ID
The option to contact Allianz directly in the case of a medical emergency
For emergencies, please have the following information ready:
The full address and telephone number of your current location
Names of all official contacts (doctors, hospitals, and/or police)
An exact description of the situation
*Allianz Global Assistance Europe is a trading name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and a member of the Allianz Group.

title: How to create a password?
content:
If you forgot your password or want to change it, select¬†Forgot?¬†in the app or¬†Forgot your password?(new tab)¬†in the¬†WebApp(new tab)¬†during login. We‚Äôll send a link to your registered email address so you can create a new password. Make sure your new password meets our requirements:
We do not have a specific set of requirements for our passwords. We measure their strength on the fly and only accept passwords that are considered robust by our underlying algorithm.
We tend to recommend to go with a ‚Äúpassphrase‚Äù rather than a password, and thus go by the common phrase ‚Äúhard to guess, easy to remember‚Äù. 
If your password is not accepted by our system, try to add more special characters, numbers, and vary between upper- and lowercase letters.
If you enter your password incorrectly six times in a row, you‚Äôll be temporarily blocked from your account. If this happens, try logging in again after 30 minutes.
Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

title: COVID-19: Latest updates on our customer service availability
content:
In light of recent global developments due to COVID-19, we are constantly taking measures to ensure the safety of our staff, while continuing to deliver the best possible customer service experience for you.
Our mission to support you and deliver our banking and customer services as per usual remain unchanged. That said, we want to be able to update you should the situation evolve.
We are reachable at our normal opening hours, from 07:00 - 23:00 hrs daily, including Sundays and public holidays.
If you need to block your card in an emergency, you will be able to do so in your N26 app, or by calling our automated emergency hotline at +44 2035 107126.
Any further updates to availability and waiting times will be published on this page.

title: How to set Rules for Spaces?
content:
Within your Spaces, you can set your own Rules! Rules allow you to easily create automated transactions and standing orders to your Spaces to save money and organise your finances.
¬†If you want to set a Rule through the Web App, here‚Äôs what you need to know:
Process a Spaces transfer and then enable the option to repeat the transfer.
To delete a Rule, click on the 3 dots indicating the settings. You‚Äôll see all the active rules. Clicking on the trashcan icon will delete the rule.
If you need to change a rule, delete it from the settings of the Space you created the rule in, and then create a new one.
If you want to set a Rule through an Android device, you have two options:
From Spaces > click on the three dots > create rule > enter amount > select space > choose frequency and date > confirm
 2. After setting a Space Transfer > select Repeat > choose frequency and date > confirm
¬†If you want to set a Rule through an iOS device, this is what you need to do:
¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†From Spaces > create a new rule > choose frequency and date > confirm¬†
¬†Please be aware that both Spaces Rules and Standing Orders are processed at the same time of day (0100 UTC). This means if you have a Rule and Standing order set up for the same date, you will need enough funds on that day to cover both.
If you have Standing Orders that are dependent on your Rules having happened first, you will need to make sure the Standing Order is set for the day after the Rule. This also means that if you want to prioritise your Standing Orders they need to be set for the day before your Rules.
Please note that, if you have an activated Overdraft, a Rule will still be processed automatically even if your balance is negative.

title: How long do transfers take?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Applies to all regions except the UK
All domestic and international incoming SEPA transfers are instant if they come from a bank that supports instant transfers and the sender selects this option. Banking regulation applies to SEPA instant transfers and may delay the transfer in case it needs additional monitoring.
In case the sender bank doesn‚Äôt offer instant transfers or the sender doesn‚Äôt choose this option, the transfer will be completed within one banking day. However, due to the opening times of the participating banks, one banking day may stretch to two working days. Please, note that outgoing SEPA transfers are completed within one banking day.
If the transfer is not instant, keep in mind that if a transfer has been made right before a weekend or bank holiday, the time frame will be extended. We send our SEPA payment orders through TARGET2(new tab). It‚Äôs open to process payments every working day from 07:00 to 18:00 CET. The system is closed on the following days:
1 January (New Year's Day), Good Friday, Easter Monday, 1 May (Labour Day), 25 December (Christmas Day), 26 December.
With¬†MoneyBeam, you can transfer money to other N26 customers instantly and you can also receive instant MoneyBeam requests from banks that supports instant transfers. Times vary for¬†foreign currency transfers¬†with TransferWise (but you‚Äôll see an estimated transfer time when you create the transfer).
You'll need to confirm each type of transfer via¬†push message¬†in the app before we send anything out.
Please note: we only accept transfers in EUR via SEPA (that means no SWIFT transfers).
If your incoming transfer is outside of these estimated time frames, please contact the sender (bank) for a payment investigation. We can't investigate incoming transfers. But we've collected a few reasons why your¬†SEPA¬†or¬†foreign currency¬†transfer could have failed.

title: PSD2 - Secure Open Banking
content:
Payment Services Directive 2 (‚ÄúPSD2‚Äù) is a revised European directive allowing you to access your account information and initiate payments through regulated third-party providers in a safe and secure manner. 
 
This means that you can permit regulated Third Party Providers to access your account information through a dedicated interface: 
You can enable an Account Information Service (AIS) to pull together data from different bank accounts you may have, and then aggregate and manage their details in the same place through certified third-party providers.
You can securely pay at the checkout of any website that offers Payment Initiation Services (PIS). 
The data exchange is handled in the background via our partner - Token.io.
If you begin using a third-party payment service like an Account Information Service or a Payment Initiation Service, you‚Äôll be redirected to your N26 app via Token.io to confirm the access request.
In our Privacy Policy(new tab) we inform you about the purposes, involved parties and legal bases of the necessary data processing involved to fulfil our obligations as part of the revised European Payment Services Directive.
Why can't I link any Third Party Provider to my account?
If a third party provider has not integrated with our dedicated interface, the third party provider will need to integrate with our dedicated interface via our partner Token.io.
How can I revoke an individual access permission I have granted to a third party provider?
You need to contact the respective Third Party Provider and revoke the access permission directly with them.¬†
*applies to all countries in the EEA.

title: How to order my card with express delivery?
content:
Not available for Metal cards.
Express delivery is a good option if you need your card in a hurry or if postal deliveries have sometimes failed to reach you for whatever reason.
You‚Äôll be given the option to select express delivery when choosing a delivery method for your first card or if you¬†reorder a card. You‚Äôll then receive a tracking link by email. If you‚Äôre not home during the delivery and your mailbox can‚Äôt be accessed, the card will be left at a nearby access point (you can find it through the provided tracking link). The card only stays at the access point for a limited amount of time. After that, it‚Äôll be returned to us. We‚Äôll inform you by email if that happens.
If you order via express delivery, keep in mind that:
Your new Standard or N26 You Mastercard will be delivered within 2-3 working days. Express delivery is not available for Metal cards.
Deliveries take place between 08:00 and 12:00. 
Deliveries can be made by DHL express to all of our supported countries within Europe. It‚Äôs currently not possible to make deliveries to other countries.
It‚Äôs not possible to cancel or change an express delivery once it‚Äôs been selected as the delivery method.
To close an account, you must pay for the express delivery of your card.
If your card hasn‚Äôt arrived within 3-5 working days of placing your order, please check the tracking link for an update. You can also use the tracking link to inform DHL directly about the details of your delivery address or to redirect the shipment if you can‚Äôt be there at the time of delivery.
N26 Standard and N26 You cards have a fee of ‚Ç¨6 for standard shipping and ‚Ç¨25 for express shipping (which includes the ‚Ç¨6 card replacement fee).

title: Warum hat mir ein Geldautomat kein Bargeld ausgezahlt?
content:
Es kann vorkommen: Ein Geldautomat zahlt dir kein Bargeld aus und dein Konto wird trotzdem belastet.
Pr√ºfe zun√§chst deine¬†Kartenlimits¬†unter¬†üë§ Mein Konto¬†und¬†Karteneinstellungen¬†und gehe sicher dass Bargeldabhebungen aktiviert sind.
Wir k√∂nnen dir zwar nicht sicher sagen, weshalb dir kein Geld ausgezahlt wurde, aber wir k√∂nnen dir dabei helfen, es zur√ºckzubekommen.
Der Betrag, der von deinem Guthaben abgezogen wurde, ist zun√§chst einmal nur eine Autorisierung, d.h. eine Reservierung oder ein gesperrter Betrag. Da die Transaktion nicht erfolgreich war, verf√§llt dieser reservierte Betrag normalerweise nach wenigen Stunden - maximal 12 Werktagen - und wird deinem Konto wieder gutgeschrieben.
Falls der reservierte Betrag nach 12 Werktagen nicht verf√§llt, f√ºlle bitte ein¬†Formular f√ºr Umsatzreklamationen¬†aus. Wir tun unser Bestes, um das Geld f√ºr dich zur√ºckzubekommen.
Bis dahin empfehlen wir dir, es mit einem Geldautomaten eines anderen Geldinstituts zu versuchen. Es ist sehr selten, dass Auszahlungen zweimal hintereinander fehlschlagen.

title: ¬øCu√°nto tiempo tarda una transferencia?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†V√°lido en todas las regiones excepto Reino Unido
Todas las transferencias SEPA a las cuentas de N26, nacionales o internacionales, son inmediatas si proceden de un banco que emite transferencias inmediatas. Debido a regulaci√≥n bancaria que se aplica a las transferencias SEPA esta se podr√≠a retrasar en caso de que sea necesario monitorizarla.¬†
En caso se que el banco emisor no ofrezca transferencias inmediatas o el remitente no escoja esta opci√≥n, la transferencia completar√° en un d√≠a bancario. Sin embargo, debido a los horarios de apertura de los bancos involucrados, un d√≠a bancario puede extenderse a dos d√≠as h√°biles.¬†
Las transferencias SEPA desde las cuentas de N26 tambi√©n se completan en un d√≠a bancario.
Ten en cuenta que, si se hace una transferencia justo antes de un fin de semana o un d√≠a festivo, el plazo obviamente se prolongar√°. El sistema con el que enviamos todas nuestras transferencias SEPA se llama TARGET2(pesta√±a nueva) y procesan los pagos todos los d√≠as laborables de 07:00 a 18:00 GMT. Cierran los siguientes d√≠as:
1 de enero (A√±o Nuevo), Viernes Santo, Lunes de Pascua, Primero de Mayo, 25 de diciembre (Navidad) y 26 de diciembre.
Gracias a¬†MoneyBeam¬†puedes transferir dinero a otros clientes de N26 al instante y puedes aceptar peticiones para recibir MoneyBeam instant√°neos desde otros bancos que emiten transferencias instant√°neas. Los tiempos var√≠an para las¬†transferencias en moneda extranjera¬†con TransferWise, pero podr√°s ver el tiempo estimado de la transferencia al momento de hacerla.
Pedimos que confirmes todas las transferencias mediante una¬†notificaci√≥n push¬†dentro de la aplicaci√≥n antes de sacar el dinero de tu cuenta.
Si la transferencia est√° fuera de estos plazos estimados, el banco emisor ha de iniciar una investigaci√≥n interna. Nosotros no podemos investigar transferencias entrantes, solo las salientes. Aun as√≠, hemos recopilado algunas razones por las cuales tu transferencia¬†SEPA¬†o en¬†moneda extranjera¬†ha fallado.

title: How to top up my account?
content:
Once you are successfully verified, you'll be able to top up your account in several ways:
CASH26 (in Germany, Austria, and Italy). Deposit cash through our partner stores;
MoneyBeam. Instantly receive money from other N26 users;
Debit card. You can add money to your account by entering the card details from your other account within the N26 app. You can choose to deposit between 20‚Ç¨ and 150‚Ç¨. Please note that prepaid cards are not accepted. Likewise, we don‚Äôt support American Express credit cards.
Apple Pay or Google Pay(new tab). You can add money to your account by using Apple Pay (for iOS devices) or GPay (for Android devices).You can choose to deposit between 20‚Ç¨ and 150‚Ç¨. Please note that prepaid cards are not accepted. Likewise, we don‚Äôt support American Express credit cards.
SEPA transfer. The transfer must be in EUR and within SEPA. You‚Äôll just need to provide your IBAN and your name as it‚Äôs written on the ID you used to create your account. You should also know that: 
For the transfer details, make sure the recipient‚Äôs name is your name as it‚Äôs written on the identity document you used to prove your identity (especially if you have an N26 Business account ‚Äì we don‚Äôt accept company names). 
The transfer will be instant if the sending bank support SEPA instant outgoing transfers, if not, it will completed within one banking day. Due to the opening times of the participating banks, one banking day may stretch to two working days.
In France, your first transfer can only be sent from another one of your accounts. For all other regions, you can use any other bank account to make the transfer (it doesn‚Äôt have to be under your name). 
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: How to get a loan?
content:
(Applies to Germany and France)
With N26 Credit, we‚Äôve partnered with auxmoney (in Germany) and Younited Credit (in France) to offer personal loans between ‚Ç¨1.000 to ‚Ç¨50.000 with repayment terms of 6 to 84 months.
Request a loan at any time directly in the app into the Explore section then N26 Financial Products: We‚Äôll ask you a few questions about the loan and your creditworthiness (you‚Äôll need to provide additional online banking information for your main account if you‚Äôve used N26 for less than 6 months).
Prove your identity: We‚Äôll need to see your ID card or passport in Germany and possibly your proof of residence (in the form of a utility bill or similar). And if you‚Äôre a non-EU citizen, you‚Äôll need to send us a photo of your residency permit.
Edit your answers during the application process: Once you‚Äôre happy with your loan application, send it to us in real-time and we‚Äôll make you a binding offer that you can delete or accept. Otherwise applications expire in 90 days and you won‚Äôt be able to request another loan during that time.
Confirm your loan: If you accept our offer, you‚Äôll either have to sign the contract electronically through a video call or confirm via SMS message.
Receive a push message as soon as the payment has been made: In Germany, the loan amount will be credited to your N26 account within 5-7 working days. In France, payouts take a week.
We offer interest rates between 1.99% and 19% p.a. Apart from the interest, there are no other charges. However, if you¬†change your plan¬†or are in default of your monthly payments, additional fees may apply.
For more information, see the N26 Credit¬†T&Cs(new tab).

title: How to change my card limits?
content:
You can change your¬†card PIN, define your daily withdrawal or payment limits, and enable or disable your ATM withdrawals, online or payments abroad in¬†üë§ My Account¬†by selecting¬†Card Settings¬†in the mobile app or¬†WebApp(new tab).
Each change you make is applied instantly to all of your cards.
You can also¬†block your card¬†or order a new one, in case it‚Äôs lost or stolen.
Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial(new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube(new tab) channel.

title: Comment puis-je renvoyer un virement SEPA √† son exp√©diteur ?
content:
Depuis le 17 mars, les clients d‚Äôautres √©tablissements bancaires peuvent demander √† leur banque le retour d‚Äôun virement SEPA envoy√© sur un compte N26.
Dans ce cas, le client N26 re√ßoit une notification push sur son t√©l√©phone synchronis√© l‚Äôinformant de la demande de rappel de fonds. Tout comme lorsque vous effectuez un virement depuis l‚Äôapplication N26, vous aurez le choix entre accepter le renvoi du virement, ou le refuser.
Si vous acceptez le renvoi du virement, les fonds seront d√©bit√©s de votre compte et vous ne pourrez pas en demander le rappel ult√©rieurement.
Si vous ne disposez pas des fonds suffisants sur votre compte principal (hors espaces), vous ne pourrez pas confirmer le renvoi du virement.
Si la notification reste en attente, la demande sera automatiquement rejet√©e apr√®s 15 jours.

title: Warum ist N26 sicher?
content:
Zum Schutz deines Kontos verwenden wir eine dreistufige Sicherheitsarchitektur:
Sichere Anmeldung:¬†Die Zugangsdaten der mobilen App und der¬†WebApp(neuen Tab)¬†bestehen aus einem Benutzernamen und einem Passwort oder einer Fingerabdruck-/Gesichtserkennung (abh√§ngig von deinem Smartphone). Bitte w√§hle ein¬†sicheres Passwort¬†und gib deine Zugangsdaten nicht an Dritte weiter.
Best√§tigungs-PIN:¬†Dies ist ein¬†4-stelliger Code, den du jedes Mal ben√∂tigst, wenn du eine √úberweisung durchf√ºhrst oder dein Smartphone verkn√ºpfst/trennst. Du richtest diese PIN erstmalig ein, wenn du dein Smartphone erfolgreich mit deinem Konto verkn√ºpft hast. Danach kannst du sie in der App selbst √§ndern.
Push-Nachrichten:¬†F√ºr jede eingehende und ausgehende Zahlung wird eine Push-Nachricht an dein verkn√ºpftes Smartphone gesendet. Sie dient auch zur Best√§tigung und zum Abschluss deiner Transaktionen. Au√üerdem haben wir¬†3D Secure¬†eingerichtet, um dich vor Online-Kartenbetrug zu sch√ºtzen.
Jedes Mal, wenn du uns kontaktierst, werden wir dir einige Sicherheitsfragen stellen um sicherzugehen, dass wir wirklich mit dir sprechen. Aber wir werden dich nie nach deiner Kartennummer, deinem Card Verification Code (CVV), Passwort und deiner Karten- oder Best√§tigungs-PIN fragen.
Wir haben weitere Schritte eingef√ºhrt, um deine pers√∂nlichen Daten zu sch√ºtzen: Wir speichern so wenige Informationen √ºber dich wie m√∂glich; nur so lange wie wir rechtlich dazu verpflichtet sind und l√∂schen diese Daten, sobald sie f√ºr das Produkt oder die Dienstleistung nicht mehr ben√∂tigt werden. Du kannst deine¬†pers√∂nlichen Daten¬†bis zu 6 Monate nach deiner Kontoschlie√üung herunterladen. Mehr Informationen dazu findest du in unserer¬†Datenschutzerkl√§rung(neuen Tab).

title: How to contact N26?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏èFor UK customers, click here(new tab)
If you want to reach out, you can open a chat with us directly within the mobile or WebApp, or from certain Support Center(new tab) articles.¬†As an online bank we don't have branches.

Or from your paired smartphone, go to üë§ My Account then Support. Then scroll down and tap Support chat under Get in touch.¬†

You‚Äôll then see your place in the queue. Keep your Mastercard close by, it's optional but you'll get faster service.

title: How to create a Shared Space?
content:
To create a Shared Space:
Create a Space and tap it in the Spaces overview.

Tap the + icon in the top right-hand corner of the page.

Read the ‚ÄòLearn more‚Äô information and tap the ‚ÄòInvite new member‚Äô button.

Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you wish to invite. If the person you want to invite has an N26 account but doesn't show up in the contact list, we recommend that you ask them to check if they agreed to be visible to others N26 users via the app, in the My Account section > Settings > Personal Setting > Personal Information.

If needed, enter their full name as we have it listed.

Review the information on the Grant power of attorney page (the legal screen). Once you‚Äôve read and agreed to the T&Cs, tick the box and tap the ‚ÄòAccept power of attorney‚Äô button.

Enter your Confirmation PIN.

Tap on the relevant participant in the list of participants.

Confirm the ‚ÄòSend Invite‚Äô push notification on your paired mobile device.

What are Shared Spaces?
How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?

title: How to use MoneyBeam?
content:
MoneyBeam allows you to send money to your smartphone‚Äôs contacts without knowing their bank account details. For this to work, both users must have signed up to N26 in the UK and made themselves (new tab)visible in the app. 
In order to send a MoneyBeam, log into the app:
From the Home screen choose the Actions tab.
Tap the MoneyBeam option,
Choose a contact from your list or manually enter a contact‚Äôs details
Your recent contacts will be shown first, to find other contacts click on All Contacts in the top right corner
Enter the amount and a reference text
Confirm with your Confirmation PIN and the push message you receive
The recipients will receive the transfer instantly. If the recipient doesn‚Äôt collect the MoneyBeam within 7 days, it‚Äôll return to the sender‚Äôs account. You can send up to ¬£100 to other N26 customers per transaction and up to ¬£500 within a 24-hour period.       
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ¬£10 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: All About Allpoint.
content:
We have partnered with the Allpoint ATM Network to provide you with unlimited¬†free¬†ATM withdrawals at over 55,000 locations across the US, Canada, Puerto Rico, Australia, Mexico, and the UK.
With access to an expansive retail network including Target, Walgreens, CVS, Speedway, and Kroger, you'll never need to pay to withdraw cash again! 
You can quickly and easily find Allpoint ATMs via the ATM Map feature in our mobile application for iOS and Android (see Related Topics below for more information).
Not on your smartphone? No problem, you can also find nearby Allpoint ATMs using the¬†web application(new tab).
Can't find a convenient Allpoint ATM near you? No problem. Enjoy 2 free ATM withdrawals per month from any network, anytime, anywhere in the US.¬†
(NOTE: At this time, N26¬†customers¬†can only use ATMs to withdraw cash, not to make deposits. Check back here for updates.)
Related Topics
"Will there be an in-app Allpoint ATM locator?"
Yes! We are very excited to announce that we have an ATM Map
feature in our mobile application. This easy-to-use application will make
finding your nearest fee-free Allpoint ATM quick and convenient. Here's how to
use it:
1. On the home screen, tap on the "Actions" icon.
2. Tap on the "Find an ATM" button under the "ATM Map" menu.
3. If prompted, allow the application to access your location. Without access to your location, the application will not be able to show you the nearest ATMs.
4. Tapping on any of the nearby ATMs (indicated by green locator pins) will bring up more information about that ATM location, including the address. Tap on "Get Directions" and choose your favorite routing application to be given directions to the ATM location. 
5. Moving to another area of the map will bring up the "Search this area" button, which will allow you to see other nearby ATMs in the new location.
6. Tap on the information icon (the "i" in a circle at the top-right corner of the screen) to get more details about Allpoint ATMs, participating retail locations, and a reminder that you get two fee-free cash withdrawals per month from any out-of-network ATMs in the US. 
"Do ATM fees apply when withdrawing from an Allpoint ATM?"
Nope! ATM fees do not apply when withdrawing from an Allpoint ATM in the US, UK, Canada, Mexico, or Australia. Standard ATM fees apply when used¬†in other countries, however.
"What will the transaction look like in the app?"
Allpoint ATM transactions will look the same as any other ATM transaction in the N26 mobile app or website.
"When I withdraw money from an Allpoint ATM, does a fee display on the ATM screen during the transaction?"¬†
Yes, a fee will display on the ATM screen. You should accept the fee, BUT the fee will not be charged to your N26 account!
"Is Allpoint available outside of the US?"¬†
Yes! There are over 55,000 Allpoint¬†locations across the US, Canada, Puerto Rico, Australia, Mexico, and the UK.
"If I used an Allpoint ATM before Allpoint partnered with N26, will the ATM fees that I incurred be reimbursed?"
We regret that we cannot retroactively refund any ATM usage fees.
"Will the Allpoint transactions be included in the two free transactions per month?"
Nope! When an Allpoint ATM is accessed in the US, UK, Canada, Mexico, and Australia, you are not charged a fee. It is not counted as part of your two free ATM transactions per month!
"Can I check my balance at an Allpoint ATM?"
Yes! You can check your N26 account balance at an Allpoint ATM.
"Can I withdraw money from my Spaces account using an Allpoint ATM?"
Account withdrawals can only be made from your main N26 account. Spaces is a sub-account. If you want to withdraw money that you've set aside in Spaces, please move it into your main account first.
"Can I make a deposit to my N26 account at an Allpoint ATM?"
At this time, you can only withdraw cash from an Allpoint ATM. No cash or check deposits can be made.
The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: How to get push messages?
content:
We send you push messages to finalize transfers (such as¬†MoneyBeam) or to confirm a service (as with¬†CASH26). If you aren‚Äôt receiving these messages, first check that notifications are enabled for both your phone and the app. Then try some of our troubleshooting suggestions, depending on your smartphone:
Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Apple App Store and connect your smartphone again.
Check whether you‚Äôre logged into your N26 app.
Make sure messaging for the app has been activated in the general settings of your smartphone.
Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Google Play Store and connect your smartphone again.
Go to your Account settings and activate notification by tapping App settings then Notifications.
Huawei and Xiaomi: go to Settings then Advanced settings and Battery settings. Then set N26 as a protected app.
OnePlus: select battery optimization then the N26 app and then don't optimize.
Oppo: disable battery optimization for the app and lock it in the Recent apps overview.

title: How to give feedback or suggest a new product?
content:
We frequently send short surveys to review feedback but participation is voluntary and anonymous. For individual questions or suggestions, you can send us your feedback to¬†ideas@n26.com(new tab). We‚Äôre always grateful if you can take a minute or two to help us get even better.
And if you ever feel dissatisfied with one of our products or services, you can also¬†file a complaint.

title: What are the benefits of N26 You?
content:
Once you upgrade to N26 You, you‚Äôll receive 10 additional¬†Spaces¬†and the option to choose one of our five new card colours: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate. 
N26 You customers are also covered under the premium account's¬†insurance package provided by Allianz Global Assistance*, which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:
Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.

Snow and mountain rescue.¬†Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.
Car, bike and scooter sharing. Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.
Extra card. You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 14‚Ç¨ through your N26 app. 
If you‚Äôre an N26 You customer, or if you want to upgrade to N26 You, you‚Äôll have the possibility to choose one of our five new colors when ordering a new card: 
Keep these in mind when considering¬†N26 You(new tab):
The N26 You Mastercard has no embossing: the card details, including the number, CVV code, and 10-digit token are printed on the back.
If you upgrade to N26 You, the monthly fee of ‚Ç¨9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade. If you‚Äôre a new customer, the first fee will be deducted 15 days after you prove your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on your sign-up date. Meaning that, if you opened your account at the end of the month, the first two  monthly fees will be charged the following month.
The minimum membership is one year. Your contract automatically renews if you don‚Äôt cancel your membership at least 4 weeks before the contract expires.
You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 14‚Ç¨ through your N26 app. 

*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: Wie aktiviere ich meine Karte?
content:
Um deine Karte verwenden zu k√∂nnen, musst du sie zuerst aktivieren. Das kannst du nur in der App tun, nachdem du dein¬†Smartphone mit deinem Konto verkn√ºpft¬†hast. Oder du kannst sie direkt in der WebApp(neuen Tab) aktivieren.
Zum Aktivieren brauchst du deine 10-stellige¬†Token-Nummer: Sie befindet sich unter deinem Namen auf der Vorderseite deiner Karte (oder auf der R√ºckseite, wenn du eine N26 You-, N26 Metal- oder Maestro-Karte hast). 
Um deine Karte in der App zu aktivieren:
Tippe im Hauptbildschirm auf Aktionen
W√§hle Karteneinstellungen und swipe ggf. zur Seite, bis du die richtige Karte ausgew√§hlt hast
Tippe auf Aktivieren
Um deine Karte im Online Banking zu aktivieren, w√§hle im Hauptbildschirm
 einfach Karte aktivieren.
Wenn du in Italien, Frankreich, Spanien, Irland, Griechenland, Finnland, Estland oder dem Vereinigten K√∂nigreich wohnst, musst du zuerst Geld an einem Geldautomaten abheben, bevor du deine Karte anderweitig verwenden kannst. 
Wenn du¬†mehrere Karten¬†hast (z. B. wenn du deine Karte mehrmals bestellt hast oder sich die Lieferung verz√∂gert hat), kannst du nur deine neueste Karte aktivieren. Alle fr√ºheren Karten werden dann deaktiviert.
Du musst diese Aktivierungsschritte jedes Mal ausf√ºhren, wenn du eine¬†neue Karte¬†bestellst, z. B. wenn deine Karte verloren geht, gestohlen wird, besch√§digt ist oder du dein Konto upgradest.
Nachdem du deine Karte aktiviert hast, ist der n√§chste Schritt die Auswahl einer¬†Karten-PIN.
Lieber Videos statt Text? Sieh dir das Tutorial(neuen Tab) auf unserem N26 Support YouTube(neuen Tab) Kanal an.

title: What steps should I take if I notice a fraudulent transaction on my account?
content:
If you don‚Äôt recognize a transaction or you‚Äôre sure you didn‚Äôt authorize it, blocking your debit card won‚Äôt be enough. In these cases you should immediately:
Order a new debit card and mark your current one as stolen. Destroy your existing debit card by cutting it with scissors or a shredder. The chip, NFC antenna, and the magnetic strip should all be cut into pieces and disposed of separately.
Either¬†call¬†us at 1-888-N26-0-N26 (1-888-626-0626) or chat with us through the N26 app.  We‚Äôll help you from there and we‚Äôll do our best to get your money back.
You can continue using your account for ACH payments until your new debit card arrives.  You should keep in mind that changes in the final amount debited from your account don't necessarily indicate fraud.
Please note that in cases of fraud you have up to 60 days to open a dispute with us.

content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Poland, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden.

title: Espaces partag√©s - B√©n√©ficiaire de confiance
content:
Un b√©n√©ficiaire de confiance peut effectuer les actions suivantes dans un espace partag√© :
effectuer un virement depuis son compte courant ou l‚Äôun de ses propres espaces (y compris d'autres espaces partag√©s auxquels il participe) vers un espace partag√©¬†
acc√©der aux fonds d'un espace partag√© et les transf√©rer librement √† tout moment
quitter un espace partag√© lorsqu‚Äôil le souhaite
Les virements entre le compte courant (ou un espace) du b√©n√©ficiaire de confiance et un espace partag√© auquel il participe n'ont pas besoin d'√™tre confirm√©s par le biais d'une notification. Cela signifie que les participants d‚Äôun espace partag√© peuvent glisser et d√©poser de l'argent instantan√©ment et de mani√®re transparente via l'application N26 web et mobile, comme c'est d√©j√† le cas pour leurs transactions habituelles dans Espaces.
Pourquoi dois-je d√©finir un administrateur ou un participant comme b√©n√©ficiaire de confiance ?
Le droit bancaire europ√©en r√©git les modalit√©s d'autorisation des virements bancaires.¬†
Dans cette loi, l'authentification forte du client (AFC) est une exigence pour rendre les paiements en ligne plus s√ªrs.¬†
Une exception √† cette r√®gle est la classification d'une personne dans un espace partag√© en tant que "b√©n√©ficiaire de confiance", de sorte que les virements effectu√©s par ou √† cette personne ne n√©cessitent pas d'AFC.
Pour en savoir plus sur les Espaces partag√©s, visitez notre article Que sont les Espaces Partag√©s ?.
D√©couvrez √©galement comment ajouter/supprimer des participants dans un espace partag√©.

title: Warum wurde meine √úberweisung in der N26 App noch nicht ausgef√ºhrt?
content:
Du brauchst deine Best√§tigungs-PIN f√ºr alle Transaktionen, egal ob¬†MoneyBeam, Dauerauftr√§ge oder¬†CASH26. Deine √úberweisung bleibt ausstehend, bis du sie per Push-Nachricht in der App best√§tigst oder abbrichst.
Deine Best√§tigungs-PIN unterscheidet sich von deiner¬†Karten-PIN, aber du kannst f√ºr beide die gleiche Zahlenkombination verwenden. Sobald du dein¬†Smartphone verkn√ºpft hast, wirst du aufgefordert, die Best√§tigungs-PIN zu erstellen (die Karten-PIN legst du erst bei der Aktivierung der Karte fest).
Wenn du deine Best√§tigungs-PIN sechsmal hintereinander falsch eingibst, wird sie aus Sicherheitsgr√ºnden gesperrt. Du kannst sie in der App¬†wiederherstellen¬†unter¬†üë§ Mein Konto¬†und¬†Einstellungen, dann¬†Sicherheit¬†und¬†Best√§tigungs-PIN √§ndern.

title: Wer kann ein Basiskonto bekommen?
content:
Du kannst ein kostenloses¬†N26 Bankkonto¬†√ºber unsere Website oder unsere¬†App er√∂ffnen.
Das Zahlungskontengesetz (ZKG) gibt auch allen Verbrauchern, die sich rechtm√§√üig in der Europ√§ischen Union aufhalten, das Recht, ein Basiszahlungskonto zu f√ºhren. Dies gilt f√ºr Personen, die in einem unterst√ºtzten Land leben.
Das N26 Basiskonto hat eine monatliche Geb√ºhr von 6 ‚Ç¨. Alle anderen Geb√ºhren findest du in unseren¬†Preislisten.
Wenn du noch kein Bankkonto bei N26 oder einem anderen Finanzinstitut in Deutschland hast, kannst du ein Basiskonto¬†beantragen. Unter bestimmten Umst√§nden kann N26 deine¬†Anfrage ablehnen.
Bitte beachte, einige Produkte und Dienstleistungen wie¬†N26 Dispo,¬†N26 Credit,¬†N26 You, oder¬†N26 Metal f√ºr das N26 Basiskonto nicht verf√ºgbar sind.

title: How to use Google Pay?
content:
Applies to Germany, Spain, Italy, Ireland, Belgium, Slovakia, France, Denmark, Finland, Sweden, Norway, Poland and Switzerland. 
Google Pay is a payment method that allows you to pay with your smartphone so you don‚Äôt have to carry your Mastercard with you all the time.
Google Pay is available in all shops supporting contactless (NFC) payments as well as online shops. Hold your smartphone near the contactless terminal and your payment will automatically process. When paying online, select Google Pay as the payment option. We‚Äôll ask you to confirm your payment via¬†push message¬†during checkout.
Some tips to keep in mind:
To add your N26 Mastercard, download the Google Pay app and select Get Started to enter your card details. You‚Äôll need Android 5.0 (Lollipop) or higher as well as an NFC-capable smartphone.
Google Pay requires a screen lock. If you didn‚Äôt set it up yet, you‚Äôll be asked to before adding your Mastercard to the Google Pay app.
If you‚Äôre protecting your smartphone with a case, you might have to remove it to pay. Some payment terminals don‚Äôt recognize your phone if the case is too big.
If the payment terminal asks you to present your card (again), you might have removed the smartphone too fast or didn‚Äôt hold it close enough. Just try again while keeping this in mind.

With access to an expansive retail network including Target, Walgreens, CVS, Speedway, and Kroger, you'll never need to pay to withdraw cash again!

title: Apple Pay
content:
What is the difference between Apple Cash and Apple Pay?
Apple Pay¬Æ is an easy, secure, and private way to pay on iPhone¬Æ, iPad¬Æ, Apple Watch¬Æ, and Mac¬Æ.
When you set up Apple Cash¬Æ, you can send and receive money in the messages app or make purchases using Apple Pay.
Learn more here(new tab).

Can I add my N26 Visa¬Ædebit card to Apple Pay?
Yes, you can add your N26 debit card to Apple Pay.

Can I add my N26 debit card to Apple Pay on more than one device?
Yes, you can add your N26 debit card to Apple Pay on multiple devices.¬† Please note that you need to add your N26 debit card to the Apple Wallet¬Æ for each device you want to use.

How do I add my N26 debit card to my iPhone?
Adding your N26 Visa¬Æ debit card to Apple Pay is simple.¬† Here‚Äôs how to get started.
Open the Wallet app.
Tap the ‚Äú+‚Äù sign in the upper-right corner.
Enter your card‚Äôs security code to add your credit or debit card¬† affiliated with your iTunes account. Or, select ‚ÄúAdd a different card,‚Äù and use your iPhone camera to scan the card information.¬†

How do I add my N26 debit card to my iPad?
To add your N26 debit card to your iPad:
¬†Go to Settings.
Tap ‚ÄúWallet & Apple Pay‚Äù and select ‚ÄúAdd Credit or Debit Card.‚Äù
Enter your card‚Äôs security code to add your credit or debit card affiliated with your iTunes account. Or, select ‚ÄúAdd a different card,‚Äù and use your iPad camera to scan the card information.¬†

How do I add my N26 debit card to my Apple Watch?
To add your N26 debit card to your Apple Watch:¬†
Open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone.
Tap ‚ÄúWallet & Apple Pay‚Äù and select ‚ÄúAdd Credit or Debit Card.‚Äù
Enter your card‚Äôs security code to add your credit or debit card¬† affiliated with your iTunes account. Or, select ‚ÄúAdd a different card,‚Äù and use your iPhone camera to scan the card information.¬†

How can I add my N26 debit card to my Mac?
To add your N26 debit card to your Mac:¬†
Make sure that the Mac that you are using is:
A model with Touch ID, or¬†
Go to System Preferences
Click Wallet & Apple Pay
Click Add Card
Follow the steps to add a new card.
Tap Next.¬†¬†Your account will now be verified.
Once verification is completed, tap Next.
Set your N26 debit card as your default card by touching and dragging it to the front of the stack.
You can now start using¬†your N26 debit card in Apple Pay
A Mac model introduced in 2012 or later with an Apple Pay-enabled iPhone or Apple Watch, where you can complete your purchase using Apple Pay on these devices.¬†
With these, you will have to go to your iPhone
Tap on Settings
Tap on Wallet & Apple Pay
Turn on Allow Payments on Mac.

How do I set up my N26 debit card as the default card in my Apple Wallet?
Setting your N26 debit card as the default card in your Apple Wallet is fairly simple.¬†¬†The first card you add to Wallet becomes your default card for payments.
To set a different card (in this case, your N26 card) all you have to do is¬†move it to the front of the stack.¬†
In Wallet, choose your default card.
Touch and hold the card.
Drag it to the front of the stack.

I'm unable to link my N26 debit card to Apple Pay, what am I doing wrong?
If you are experiencing a problem linking the N26 debit card to Apple Pay complete the following steps:
Check if Apple Pay is available on your device, or
You may have exceeded the maximum number of cards that can be registered with Apple Pay.
If your device is compatible with Apple Pay and you have not exceeded the maximum number of cards that can be registered with Apple Pay, then you should contact Apple Support.(new tab)

How do I use Apple Pay?
Payment in stores. 
The merchant needs to have contactless / Apple Pay as a payment option.
Rest your finger on Touch ID button or double tap the side button for Face ID.
Hold your iPhone to the contactless reader.
Online payments.
Choose Apple Pay¬†as a payment option on the online store.
Rest your finger on Touch ID button or double tap the side button for Face ID.
Confirm your payment (a pop-up will ask you to do so).

My debit card is suspended, according to an error message from Apple Wallet, what do I do now?
It is most likely because your card was inadvertently deactivated.¬† To reverse this, simply:¬†
Launch the N26 app. 
Tap Actions (on the lower right hand of the screen). 
Tap Card Settings. 
Tap Unlock card (under the Card image on the top half of the screen).

How do I set up my N26 debit card as the default card in my Apple Wallet?
Setting your N26 debit card as the default card in your Apple Wallet is fairly simple.
The first card you add to Wallet becomes your default card for payments.¬† To set a different card (in this case, your N26 card) all you have to do is move it to the front of the stack.
In Wallet, choose your default card. 
Touch and hold the card. 
Drag it to the front of the stack.
Can I transfer money from Apple Cash¬Æ to my N26 account?
Yes, you can transfer money from Apple Cash into your N26 account.
How can I link my N26 Visa¬Æ debit card to Apple Cash?
You can link your N26 card to Apple Cash by following these steps:
Open "Wallet" on your Apple device.
Select "Apple Cash".
Tap the three dots on the upper right hand corner.
Select "Add Money".
Select "Add Card".
Position your N26 card in the frame to scan.
Tap "next" when the scan is complete.
Enter your card's 3-digit security code.
Tap "Next".
Your card is now linked.
How can I transfer money to my N26 account from Apple Cash?
Transferring money to your N26 account from Apple Cash can be achieved by following these steps:
Select "Transfer to Bank".
Enter the amount you want to transfer.
Select how quickly you want the money transferred.
"Instant Transfer".  There is a fee associated with this option.
"1-3 Business Days".  There is no charge for this option.
Done.

The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Was kann ich tun, wenn mein Konto gehackt wurde?
content:
Wenn du verd√§chtige Aktivit√§ten auf deinem Konto bemerkst, kontaktiere uns bitte umgehend.
Am schnellsten erreichst du uns im Chat √ºber die App, auf der N26 Website und - wie hier - unter einigen Artikeln im Support Center. Klicke einfach auf Kundenservice-Chat.
Wenn du lieber telefonieren m√∂chtest, sage uns das einfach im Chat. Wir rufen dich innerhalb einer Stunde zur√ºck und besprechen die Situation mit dir. Bitte erkl√§re uns alles genau, jedes Detail kann wichtig sein.
Du kannst sicher sein, dass wir alles tun, um dir in dieser Situation zu helfen.
Um unsere Sicherheitsma√ünahmen auch √ºber unsere gesetzlichen Verpflichtungen hinaus zu verbessern, haben wir ein engagiertes Team, das jeden Betrugsfall genau analysiert.
Die einzelnen F√§lle sind oft sehr komplex, darum dauert eine Analyse oft einige Tage, manchmal mehrere Wochen.
Falls du sicher bist, dass dein Konto gehackt wurde, empfehlen wir dir au√üerdem, sofort eine Strafanzeige zu erstatten,
Mehr dar√ºber, wie wir dein Konto im Betrugsfall sch√ºtzen, erf√§hrst du in unserem Blog(neuen Tab) und in unserem Artikel √ºber Sicherheit bei N26(neuen Tab).

Du erreichst uns im Chat t√§glich von 07:00 - 23:00 Uhr , auch an Sonn- und Feiertagen.

Falls du keinen Zugriff auf deine N26 Smartphone-App oder die WebApp hast, kannst du deine Karte oder dein Konto auch sperren, indem du uns unter +49 (0) 307 675 8333 anrufst.

title: Close and liquidate (cash out) your N26 Invest portfolio
content:
On 17.09.2019 we‚Äôre removing N26 Invest from our app. After this date you won‚Äôt be able to either access or manage your investment plan through N26. This is why we‚Äôre offering N26 Invest customers the option to cancel their current investment plan and have the current value of their investment plan paid into their N26 main account.
Important risk notice:¬† Depending on the actual market value of your portfolio at the time of liquidation in comparison to the amount originally invested, this closure can result in a financial loss.
To close your Invest portfolio:
Go to Savings & Investment section within the N26 mobile app.¬† 
Tap on your current investment plan with Vaamo, scroll down to ‚ÄòDocuments‚Äô under your Invest plan and download your documents for your record keeping and taxes.

Select Close Investment Plan at the bottom of the menu.

Confirm that you‚Äôve downloaded your documents before proceeding to step 5.

Once your documents have been saved, select Deactivate and cash out plan.

Input your confirmation PIN.

Confirm the deletion of your N26 Invest plan. 
Your funds will be automatically paid into your N26 main account within a few days.

title: FATCA - Pourquoi avons-nous besoin de certaines informations de votre part ?
content:
En tant qu‚Äô√©tablissement de cr√©dit, N26 est tenue de communiquer directement au D√©partement du Tr√©sor des Etats-Unis et √† l‚ÄôInternal Revenue Service (IRS) des informations sur les comptes d√©tenus par les contribuables am√©ricains ou par des entit√©s √©trang√®res dans lesquelles les contribuables am√©ricains d√©tiennent une participation substantielle selon le FATCA.¬†
FATCA signifie Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act et est une l√©gislation con√ßue pour pr√©venir l'√©vasion fiscale. Introduit par l'IRS, l'objectif du FATCA est d'encourager une meilleure conformit√© fiscale en emp√™chant les personnes am√©ricaines d'utiliser des banques √©trang√®res et d'autres organisations financi√®res afin d'√©viter l'imposition am√©ricaine sur leurs revenus et leurs actifs. Vous pouvez trouver plus d'informations sur le FATCA sur le site Web de l'IRS : www.irs.gov(nouvel onglet)
En effet, contrairement √† la plupart des autres pays, le syst√®me fiscal am√©ricain pr√©l√®ve l'imp√¥t sur le revenu des personnes r√©sidentes sur le territoire national, mais √©galement des citoyens am√©ricains vivant √† l‚Äô√©tranger. √Ä l‚Äôinverse, dans une majorit√© de pays, seules les personnes r√©sidentes sur le territoire national sont soumis aux imp√¥ts du pays de r√©sidence. Les expatri√©s en sont donc exempt√©s.
Dans le cadre du FATCA, et pour que nous puissions d√©terminer avec pr√©cision si votre compte doit faire l‚Äôobjet d‚Äôune d√©claration aupr√®s du fisc am√©ricain, nous vous demanderons de nous communiquer les informations suivantes :
Si vous √™tes citoyen des √âtats-Unis (binationaux compris) ou si vous √™tes titulaire d‚Äôune carte verte en cours de validit√©

Si vous √™tes imposable aux √âtats-Unis
√ätre ¬´assujetti √† l'imp√¥t¬ª aux √âtats-Unis ne signifie pas n√©cessairement que vous payez l'imp√¥t sur le revenu des particuliers aux √âtats-Unis. Cela signifie que la loi fiscale am√©ricaine vous oblige √† produire une d√©claration de revenus et √† d√©clarer vos revenus (mondiaux) √† l'IRS, m√™me si vous ne payez aucun imp√¥t am√©ricain.

Votre num√©ro d‚Äôidentification fiscale am√©ricain(nouvel onglet) (si vous √™tes effectivement imposable aux √âtats-Unis)
Vous pouvez dans ce cas nous fournir votre num√©ro de s√©curit√© sociale am√©ricain (SSN en anglais) ou votre Num√©ro individuel de contribuable am√©ricain (ITIN en anglais).
De plus, si votre compte indique un lieu de naissance am√©ricain ou un num√©ro de t√©l√©phone am√©ricain ou si vous mettez en place un ordre de virement permanent aux √âtats-Unis, la l√©gislation FATCA nous oblige √† supposer que vous √™tes soumis au FATCA, jusqu'√† ce que vous nous prouviez le contraire.
Si votre situation fiscale vient √† changer, vous pourrez √† tout moment modifier les informations concern√©es depuis votre application mobile. Pour cela, allez dans la rubrique Mon Compte > Param√®tres > Param√®tres personnels > Informations fiscales.

title: Why did my SEPA transfer fail?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Applies to all regions except the UK
We accept¬†transfers¬†in EUR done via SEPA. We don't support SWIFT so if you need to make a¬†foreign currency transfer, please use TransferWise (in the app or from their¬†website(new tab)).
To get a transfer, you'll only need to provide the sender with your full name (as it's written on the ID you provided for verification) and your IBAN.
You can¬†find your IBAN¬†on your balance statements and in¬†üë§ My Account¬†(in the mobile app or¬†WebApp(new tab)).
Common reasons for failed transfers:
The recipient's name on the transfer order is different from the name on their account (must be their name as written on their ID).
The recipient's name is a company name instead of a personal/account name (applies to N26 Business).
The IBAN is incorrect.
You're not receiving the push message to confirm your transfer.
An inappropriate use was found. N26 has the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see¬†GwG ¬ß 10(new tab)). As a result, we may ask for documentation to verify the origin or source of these transactions. This can result in the credit being delayed or not taking place.

title: Where is my refund?
content:
Your refund will be visible in the app on the day of the original transaction, not the refund date. Scroll down your transaction list or download your previous balance statements to find it.
To view and download PDFs of your (preliminary and previous) monthly balance statements:
On the WebApp(new tab): From Transactions, click on the cloud icon in the upper-right corner to reach Downloads then select Bank statements.

On the mobile app: 
If you're using an iPhone, tap on the three dots to the right of your current balance from the main screen. A menu will pop up and will give you the option to access your balance statement.¬†
For Androids, you'll find the option under Statistics (just tap the 3 dots in the top right-hand corner).

title: ¬øC√≥mo presentar una reclamacion?
content:
Es muy importante que sepas que, si est√°s decepcionado con algo o si hay algo que no ha salido como esperabas, nosotros estamos aqu√≠ para ayudarte y nos gustar√≠a que nos lo contaras.
Puedes enviarnos un email a reclamaciones.es@n26.com desde tu direcci√≥n registrada en N26, o puedes enviarnos tu opini√≥n por correo.
Sin embargo, si abriste la cuenta antes del 17 de abril y por lo tanto tu IBAN empieza por DE, el email tendr√≠as que enviarlo a reclamaciones@n26.com.
Si quieres presentar una queja, tendr√≠as que incluir:
tu nombre completo y tu direcci√≥n
el producto o servicio con el que no est√°s satisfecho
una descripci√≥n detallada de lo que te preocupa o no te gusta
la fecha en la que tu problema apareci√≥ por primera vez
Te contactaremos por email para confirmar que hemos recibido tu reclamaci√≥n y, desde ese momento, comenzaremos a investigar el tema para encontrar una soluci√≥n que te satisfaga. En caso de que necesitemos m√°s informaci√≥n sobre ti o si no pudi√©semos darte una soluci√≥n al momento, tambi√©n te avisar√≠amos por email. Si nos toca esperar para recibir la informaci√≥n adicional, podr√≠a repercutir en la fecha en que resolvemos tu reclamaci√≥n.
En nuestra respuesta final te diremos si hemos ratificado o no tu reclamaci√≥n y explicaremos el porqu√©.
Dicha respuesta la damos en un plazo de 15 d√≠as laborables desde la fecha en que recibimos tu reclamaci√≥n. Si por alguna raz√≥n no pudi√©ramos darte una respuesta en ese tiempo, te avisar√≠amos por email explic√°ndote la raz√≥n del retraso y te comunicar√≠amos la nueva fecha para darte una respuesta. En cualquier caso, el plazo total en que te damos la respuesta final nunca pasar√° de los 35 d√≠as laborables desde la fecha en que recibimos tu reclamaci√≥n.
Si no logr√°ramos encontrar una soluci√≥n que te complazca, tienes derecho a acudir al Banco de Espa√±a poni√©ndote en contacto con el Departamento de Conducta de Mercado y Reclamaciones(pesta√±a nueva), situado en la calle Alcal√° 48, 28014 Madrid.
A continuaci√≥n, te dejamos las referencias legales pertinentes:
Resoluci√≥n de litigios en l√≠nea de la Uni√≥n Europea(pesta√±a nueva)
Normativa general de protecci√≥n del consumidor y condiciones de contrataci√≥n(pesta√±a nueva)
Nos hemos comprometido a seguir mejorando cada d√≠a nuestros productos y servicios, y tu opini√≥n hace que sea posible. ¬°Gracias!

title: Que faire face au rejet de votre IBAN N26 ?
content:
Votre IBAN N26 se compose du code du pays (DE), d'une cl√© de contr√¥le √† 2 chiffres, du code banque (8 chiffres) et de votre num√©ro de compte (10 chiffres). Il se pr√©sente ainsi : DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.
Les pays membres de l'espace SEPA (Single Euro Payments Area ou Espace unique de paiement en Euros) se sont mis d'accord pour utiliser un syst√®me bas√© sur l'IBAN afin de faciliter les paiements nationaux et internationaux et de limiter le risque d'erreurs dans la communication et le traitement des transactions.
Les commer√ßants et employeurs qui n'acceptent pas tous les IBAN des pays de l‚ÄôEspace √©conomique europ√©en violent en r√©alit√© la loi europ√©enne du 1er F√©vrier 2016 (art. 9 de¬†la directive europ√©enne n¬∞260/2012(nouvel onglet)).
Dans le cas o√π vous seriez victime de ce que l'on appelle une ¬´ discrimination √† l'IBAN ¬ª, nous vous prions de contacter votre autorit√© nationale comp√©tente(nouvel onglet)¬†en l'informant de la situation. Nous vous recommandons de toujours indiquer votre nom complet, vos coordonn√©es (email, num√©ro de t√©l√©phone, adresse‚Ä¶), le nom du commer√ßant ou de l‚Äôemployeur qui refuse votre IBAN, une br√®ve description du probl√®me et si possible, des captures d‚Äô√©crans prouvant que votre IBAN a bien √©t√© refus√©.

title: What is the maximum I can spend?
content:
The maximum¬†daily¬†limits (total sum within 24 hours) for card payments are:
ATM withdrawals: ‚Ç¨2.500 (or ‚Ç¨400 in Togo, Congo, Benin, Ivory Coast, Kenya, Cameroon, Nigeria, Senegal and Algeria)
In-store or online payments: ‚Ç¨5.000
You can¬†set your own¬†daily ATM withdrawal and payment limits within our limits directly in the app by tapping¬†üë§ My Account¬†then¬†Card settings.
The maximum¬†daily¬†limits (rolling 24 hours) for bank transfers are:
MoneyBeam to N26 customers (the recipient must be visible): ‚Ç¨1.000
Outgoing transfers: ‚Ç¨50.000
Incoming transfers: No limit
The maximum¬†monthly¬†limit (total sum) for card transactions is ‚Ç¨20.000*. 
*a monthly limit of ‚Ç¨10.000 applies to ATM withdrawals for customers who opened their account in France. 
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: How to block my N26 card?
content:
You can block and unblock your cards at any time in the app. Go to¬†üë§ My Account¬†and select¬†Card settings. There you can decide if you want to temporarily limit or disable your ATM withdrawals, online payments or payments abroad, or block your card entirely.
This way, you have full control of your card and can protect yourself against¬†unauthorized transactions. You should immediately block your card if anything looks suspicious. You can always unblock it later.

If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126.

title: Wie funktionieren kontaktlose Zahlungen?
content:
Es ist nicht m√∂glich, kontaktlose Zahlungen zu deaktivieren. Wenn du Probleme mit deinen kontaktlosen Zahlungen hast, bedenke Folgendes:
Um kontaktlose Zahlungen zu aktivieren, musst du deine Karte zun√§chst an einem Geldautomaten oder Zahlungsterminal verwenden.

F√ºr Zahlungen bis zu 50 ‚Ç¨ ist keine Karten-PIN erforderlich*. F√ºr Betr√§ge √ºber 50‚Ç¨ musst du deine Karten-PIN eingeben.
*Sofern der Anbieter kontaktlose Zahlungen unterst√ºtzt.
Du musst deine Karte direkt an ein NFC-kompatibles Zahlungsterminal halten. Wenn du deine Karte zu schnell entfernst oder sie nicht nah genug daran gehalten hast, versuche es einfach noch einmal.

Bei N26 Metal Karten ist die NFC Funktion auf der R√ºckseite. Stelle sicher, dass du die R√ºckseite der Karte an das Zahlungsterminal h√§ltst, wenn du kontaktlos zahlen m√∂chtest (mit der Vorderseite funktioniert es nicht).

title: Perch√© il mio acquisto online non √® riuscito?
content:
Consigli e suggerimenti per una transazione corretta:
Se non riesci a confermare il messaggio push entro 5 minuti, √® sufficiente riavviare il processo di pagamento sul sito web dell‚Äôesercente.
Se non ricevi alcun messaggio push, assicurati che lo smartphone sia connesso e che i messaggi push siano attivati.
Assicurati che i pagamenti online e quelli all‚Äôestero siano abilitati nelle impostazioni della tua carta.
√à necessaria una connessione Internet stabile.
Se utilizzi un dispositivo iOS, assicurati di disattivare la modalit√† Non disturbare.
Se l‚Äôimporto sul sito dell‚Äôesercente √® diverso da quello indicato nel messaggio push, ci√≤ pu√≤ essere dovuto alla conversione di una valuta estera in euro.
Assicurati di disabilitare tutti gli Adblocker in esecuzione sul tuo browser.
La tua carta Maestro non pu√≤ essere utilizzata per gli acquisti online.

title: How to contact N26?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏èFor UK customers, click here(new tab)
If you want to reach out, you can open a chat with us directly within the mobile or WebApp, or from certain Support Center(new tab) articles.¬†As an online bank we don't have branches.

When accessing your account from our WebApp(new tab), you can find the chat in the bottom right corner.¬†

Or from your paired smartphone, go to üë§ My Account then Support. Then scroll down and tap Support chat under Get in touch.¬†

You‚Äôll then see your place in the queue. Keep your Mastercard close by, it's optional but you'll get faster service.
