title: Wie er√∂ffne ich mein N26 Konto?
content:
Du kannst ein N26 Konto in der App (auf deinem Smartphone) oder in der¬†WebApp(neuen Tab)¬†er√∂ffnen, wenn du:
mindestens 18 Jahre alt bist
in einem unterst√ºtzten Land lebst
ein kompatibles Smartphone besitzt
ein unterst√ºtztes Ausweisdokument hast (die Eignung h√§ngt davon ab, ob du in Deutschland(neuen Tab) oder au√üerhalb von Deutschland(neuen Tab) wohnst) 
noch kein Konto bei uns hast
dich in einer unserer unterst√ºtzten Sprachen verifizieren kannst (Deutsch, Englisch, Spanisch, Franz√∂sisch, Italienisch).
So meldest du dich an:
Nachdem du deine Email, pers√∂nlichen Daten und die Lieferadresse best√§tigt hast, w√§hle deinen gew√ºnschten Kontotypen aus. *
Weise deine Identit√§t nach und verkn√ºpfe dein Smartphone mit deinem Konto.
Ab jetzt kannst du √ºber SEPA oder FPS √úberweisungen dein Konto aufladen oder √ºber CASH26 Bargeld auf dein Konto einzahlen (wenn du in Deutschland, √ñsterreich oder Italien bist).
Nach einigen Tagen erh√§ltst du deine Mastercard per Post.
Falls du noch mehr erfahren m√∂chtest, kontaktiere uns gerne.
*Wenn deine Bonit√§t die Mindestanforderungen erf√ºllt, kannst du ein N26 Konto er√∂ffnen. Falls nicht, k√∂nnen wir dir m√∂glicherweise ein N26 Flex Konto (nur in Deutschland) anbieten. Diese Entscheidung wird automatisch berechnet. 
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Bekomme 15‚Ç¨ f√ºr jeden Freund, dem du N26 erfolgreich empfiehlst. Erfahre mehr √ºber unser Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

Du erreichst uns im Chat t√§glich von 07:00 - 23:00 Uhr, auch an Sonn- und Feiertagen.

title: How often can I withdraw cash for free?
content:
Cash withdrawals using your Mastercard depend on your T&C country (the address you originally shipped your first card to):
Germany: 3 to 5* free ATM withdrawals per month in Germany and unlimited free withdrawals in the eurozone or by using¬†CASH26
Austria and Italy: unlimited free withdrawals (including¬†CASH26)
France, Spain, the Netherlands, and the Rest of Europe: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in your country of residence and the eurozone
Switzerland: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in the eurozone and a 1.7% markup on local withdrawals
UK: unlimited free withdrawals
There‚Äôs always a ‚Ç¨2 fee if you use your¬†Maestro¬†card to withdraw cash (only available in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands).
Check our¬†pricing lists¬†if you‚Äôve been¬†charged an ATM fee.
*Germany only: You receive 5 free withdrawals during the first three months. After that you'll receive 3 free withdrawals but you can keep receiving 5 if:
You are younger than 26 years old.
You receive your salary, pension, student allowance, or government benefits for at least two consecutive months (your additional free withdrawals start the following month).
You receive payments of at least ‚Ç¨1.000 per month for at least two months (your additional free withdrawals start the following month).

title: How to reverse and block a direct debit?
content:
You have the ability to reverse a direct debit in the app yourself up to 8 weeks after it has been debited.
Open your transaction list and select the direct debit in question. 
Choose¬†Refund. 
The amount will then be credited to your account within 2 banking days.
*For Poland, Sweden, Denmark, and Norway only: if you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and ultimate amount that is collected from us.

title: Wie zahle ich Geld auf mein Konto ein?
content:
Sobald du dich erfolgreich verifiziert hast, kannst du auf verschiedene Weisen Geld auf dein Konto einzahlen:
CASH26 (verf√ºgbar in Deutschland, √ñsterreich und Italien). Zahle Bargeld √ºber unsere Partnergesch√§fte direkt auf dein Konto ein. 
Moneybeam. Erhalte sofort Geld von anderen N26 Nutzern.
Debitkarte: Du kannst Geld von einem anderen Bankkonto auf dein N26 Konto laden, indem du die Karteninformationen in der App hinterlegst. Du kannst jeweils Betr√§ge zwischen 20 ‚Ç¨ und 150 ‚Ç¨ auf dein N26 Konto √ºberweisen. Bitte beachte, dass wir keine Prepaidkarten und American Express Kreditkarten akzeptieren k√∂nnen.
Apple Pay oder Google Pay(neuen Tab): Lade Geld auf dein N26 Konto, indem du Apple Pay (f√ºr iOS-Ger√§te) oder GPay (f√ºr Android-Ger√§te) verwendest. Du kannst jeweils Betr√§ge zwischen 20 ‚Ç¨ und 150 ‚Ç¨ auf dein N26 Konto √ºberweisen. Bitte beachte, dass wir keine Prepaidkarten und American Express Kreditkarten akzeptieren k√∂nnen.
Debitkarte. Wenn du noch keine Transaktionen auf deinem N26 Konto hast, kannst du in deiner App die Kartendetail von einer Debitkarte deines anderen Bankkontos eingeben und so zwischen 20‚Ç¨ und 150‚Ç¨ auf dein N26 Konto einzahlen. Bitte beachte, dass diese Funktion nur verf√ºgbar ist, um erstmalig Geld auf dein Konto einzuzahlen.
SEPA-√úberweisung. Die √úberweisung muss in Euro und innerhalb des SEPA-Raums erfolgen. Daf√ºr brauchst du nur deine IBAN und deinen Namen, wie er auf deinem registrierten Ausweisdokument eingetragen ist, eingeben. Bitte beachte auch dabei folgende Punkte:
Wenn du per SEPA-√úberweisung Geld auf dein N26 Konto einzahlst, stell sicher, dass der Empf√§ngername deinem Namen entspricht so wie er auf dem Ausweisdokument eingetragen ist, das du bei der Kontoer√∂ffnung f√ºr deine Verifizierung verwendet hast. (Insbesondere, wenn du ein N26 Business Konto hast - wir akzeptieren keine Firmennamen.)
Eine eingehende √úberweisung wird in Echtzeit gebucht, wenn sie als Echtzeit√ºberweisung get√§tigt wurde, andernfalls ben√∂tigt eine √úberweisung einen Bankarbeitstag bzw. zwei Werktage.
In Frankreich muss die erste Zahlung auf dein N26 Konto von einem Konto erfolgen, das dir geh√∂rt. (In allen anderen L√§ndern ist es nicht n√∂tig, dass das andere Bankkonto dir geh√∂rt.)
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erhalte 15 ‚Ç¨ f√ºr jeden Freund, dem du N26 erfolgreich empfiehlst. Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: Am I liable to tax in the United States?
content:
As a licensed bank we're required to report directly to the IRS information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers according to FATCA, a legislation designed by the US Department of Treasury and the U.S. Internal Revenue Service to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets.
You can find more information about FATCA here(new tab).¬†
In the context of FATCA, a U.S. Person is defined as, among other things:
A citizen of the United States (including dual citizens)
A resident in the United States, for example as a holder of a valid U.S. Green Card or as a person who passes the ‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù (see below).
If you're unsure as to how to determine whether you're a U.S. Person, please consult a tax advisor.
‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù means:
That you've been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more in the current calendar year
OR
That you have been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more over the last three calendar years, to be calculated as follows: 


(31 days or more in the current calendar year) + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. last year) divided by 3 + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. the year before last) divided by 6.
¬†In addition, if your account shows any of the following:
U.S. citizenship or U.S. residence
U.S. place of birth
U.S. mailing or residence address, including U.S. PO boxes
U.S. telephone number
Standing instructions to a U.S. address or an account maintained in the US
we're still obliged to treat you as a U.S. Person, unless we receive the following from you:¬†
A W-8BEN or similar agreed self-certification form and
A non-U.S. passport or other government-issued identification evidencing your citizenship or nationality in a country other than the U.S.
In case you were born in the US, a copy of your Certificate of Loss of Nationality of the US.

title: What to do if I can't repay my overdraft or loan?
content:
We offer repayment plans if you can‚Äôt repay your¬†overdraft¬†or loan with¬†N26 Credit. This could happen because your overdraft was cancelled or you need more than two months to repay your negative amount.
Here‚Äôs how it works: chat with us and propose a detailed plan on how you‚Äôre going to pay back your overdraft or loan in instalments, such as a certain amount every month until your loan is paid off. We don‚Äôt accept offers of simply paying back the whole sum at a later date.
We will then either accept, reject, or propose an alternative plan. It‚Äôs then up to you to confirm it.
By the way: your account will be closed if it‚Äôs negative for an extended period of time. All closure dates are final unless you pay back your loan before this date. If not, your debt will go to a collection agency.

title: Come ricaricare il mio conto?
content:
Dopo aver aperto il tuo conto N26, puoi ricevere accrediti fin da subito nei seguenti modi:
Bonifici SEPA.¬†Invia bonifici SEPA in EURO oppure imposta bonifici ricorrenti verso il tuo conto per essere sicuro che il tuo saldo sia sempre positivo oppure, in casi pi√π urgenti, puoi ricevere bonifici istantanei*.
Accredito stipendio o pensione. Fai trasferire le tue entrate fisse sul tuo conto N26 tramite bonifico SEPA. Ti baster√† fornire l'IBAN al mandante.¬†
Carta di debito. Puoi trasferire denaro sul tuo conto inserendo nell'app N26 i dettagli della carta associata ad un tuo altro conto. Puoi scegliere di depositare tra 20 ‚Ç¨ e 150 ‚Ç¨. Le carte prepagate cos√¨ come le carte di credito American Express non sono accettate.
Apple Pay o Google Pay(nuova tabella). Puoi trasferire denaro sul tuo conto utilizzando Apple Pay (per dispositivi iOS) o GPay (per dispositivi Android). Puoi scegliere di depositare tra 20 ‚Ç¨ e 150 ‚Ç¨. Le carte prepagate cos√¨ come le carte di credito American Express non sono accettate.
CASH26 (valido per Italia, Germania e Austria). Con CASH26 puoi versare contanti sul tuo conto N26 semplicemente recandoti presso i supermercati convenzionati.
MoneyBeam. Con MoneyBeam puoi ricevere denaro da altri utenti N26 in tempo reale.
*Per ricevere un bonifico istantaneo √® necessario che il mandante selezioni questa tipologia di bonifico e che la banca emittente la supporti. Altrimenti verr√† accreditato entro 2 giorni lavorativi.
Vuoi parlare di noi ai tuoi amici e guadagnarci? Ottieni 15‚Ç¨ per ogni amico che inviti con successo ad iscriversi ad N26. Scopri di pi√π sul nostro¬†programma Invita un amico.

title: Espaces Partag√©s - Qu‚Äôest-ce qu‚Äôune procuration ?
content:
Le fondement juridique d‚ÄôEspaces Partag√©s repose sur la procuration (Kontovollmacht en Allemand).¬†
Contrairement aux comptes joints classiques, les participants d‚Äôun espace partag√© n‚Äôont pas les m√™mes pouvoirs sur l‚Äôespace que son administrateur. Apr√®s avoir re√ßu une procuration, les participants obtiennent le droit d‚Äôagir au nom de l‚Äôadministrateur de l‚Äôespace pour effectuer des virements vers/depuis l‚Äôespace partag√© concern√©.
La personne qui autorise un participant d‚Äôagir en son nom est appel√© l‚Äô‚Äùadministrateur‚Äù de l‚Äôespace. Ce dernier est le seul propri√©taire de l‚Äôespace partag√©. L‚Äôadministrateur doit √™tre un client N26 Premium, et donc poss√©der un compte N26 You, N26 Metal ou N26 Business You.
Cela signifie que la personne ayant cr√©√© l‚Äôespace partag√© est son d√©tenteur l√©gal. L‚Äôadministrateur de l‚Äôespace partag√© :
poss√®de tous les fonds disponibles dans l‚Äôespace partag√©
peut effectuer des virements librement vers et depuis l‚Äôespace partag√©, √† tout moment
peut inviter des amis √† rejoindre un espace partag√© en leur donnant une procuration
peut r√©silier la procuration d‚Äôun participant √† tout moment
peut aussi cl√¥turer un espace partag√© apr√®s avoir retir√© un participant (tous les fonds de l‚Äôespace partag√© seront alors vir√©s vers le compte principal de l‚Äôadministrateur)
En obtenant une procuration, les participants qui acceptent l‚Äôinvitation de l‚Äôadministrateur auront acc√®s √† tous les fonds disponibles dans l‚Äôespace partag√©. Cela signifie que chaque b√©n√©ficiaire peut aussi effectuer des virements librement vers et en dehors de l‚Äôespace partag√©.
N26 Bank GmbH ne peut √™tre tenue responsable des paiements effectu√©s dans le cadre de la procuration.
Pour en savoir plus sur les Espaces partag√©s, visitez notre article Que sont les Espaces Partag√©s ?.
D√©couvrez √©galement comment ajouter/supprimer des participants dans un espace partag√©.

title: How to earn money by inviting friends to N26?
content:
You receive ‚Ç¨15 every time you successfully refer a friend to N26 (up to ‚Ç¨1500 maximum). 
You can start inviting friends as soon as you have access to your account (in the app or the¬†Web app(new tab)).
To receive your reward your friend must meet all our requirements:
Complete their sign up using your referral link or personal code.
Activate their Mastercard.
Complete 1 (in-store, online or ATM) transaction with their Mastercard worth a minimum of ‚Ç¨15.
To invite friends:
Log into the N26 app,
From the Home screen, go to the Explore tab,
Select Refer friends,
Tap on your Referral Code to copy it and select one of the options available for sharing,
Optionally, you can write a message to your friend or use the default,
Tap Send!
Once your friend has fulfilled the requirements, you'll receive the bonus within 60 days.¬†You can check the status of your referral bonus in the mobile app or N26 Web.
If your referral bonus hasn‚Äôt arrived yet, we‚Äôve also collected a¬†few reasons why.
*The link does not expire and it can be used at any time. Personal invite codes and links should only be used for personal and non-commercial purposes. This means you can share your invite link with your personal connections via social media as long as you are the primary content owner. N26 has the right to cancel the referral program at any time.
Currently,¬†Friend referral¬†rewards are only available for customers in Germany, Austria, Italy, France, Spain, Belgium, Luxembourg, Greece, Portugal, Ireland, the Netherlands, Finland, Estonia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden, Switzerland, Norway, Denmark, Poland, Iceland and Liechtenstein.
You can find more information in the Refer a Friend Program¬†T&Cs(new tab).

title: How to make a SEPA transfer?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è You can send debit transfers to any country within the SEPA zone (if the receiving bank accepts Euros).
Outgoing debit transfers can be made in either the N26 app or our Web app.
From the Home screen choose the Actions tab,

Select Send Money followed by Bank Transfer and then ‚Äúadd a new recipient‚Äù,

Enter the recipient's name and IBAN and select Continue,

Choose the amount and select Next,

Add a message if required or select Skip It,

Check the Transfer Review screen (which sums up the transfer),

Here you can also schedule the date of your transfer and save it as a standing order,

Press send and confirm with your confirmation PIN.
You‚Äôll then need to either Confirm or Cancel the transfer via push notification in the app from your paired device.
Once the transfer was confirmed in the mobile app, we can't reverse it or change the recipient's details.
If you cannot confirm your debit transfer within the app you need to:
Ensure that you have a stable internet connection.
Ensure that your mobile phone has push notifications enabled. This is done through the phone settings, not in our app.
Ensure that you use your paired device.
Once your debit transfer is sent you‚Äôll be able to download a PDF confirmation of it. To do so:
Go to your Transactions list.

Locate and select the specific debit transfer.

Scroll down to the Transaction Information and tap PDF by selecting Transfer Confirmation.

content:
You can check and download the last version of the N26 app from the Apple¬†App Store(new tab)¬†or the¬†Google Play Store(new tab).

Model 5s or newer
iOS 11 or above
The minimum requirements for Android (you can find your Android version under Settings > About your device):
Android 6.0. or above

title: What if my balance is negative?
content:
Your balance can be negative as long as you‚Äôre within your¬†Overdraft¬†limit. 
If you have a negative account balance, you'll be charged an overdraft interest rate of 8.9%.
Otherwise, you‚Äôll receive an email to notify you that the authorized limit of your account has been exceeded. This means you don‚Äôt have enough funds on your account to cover future charges.
Even if you haven‚Äôt used your account since you opened it, certain charges still apply (such as N26 You or N26 Metal monthly fees or express delivery costs) and have resulted in a negative balance.
So you‚Äôll need to¬†top up your account¬†via SEPA transfer (choose international transfer if you‚Äôre making the transfer outside of Germany) or¬†CASH26¬†(if you‚Äôre in Germany or Austria). Your account will remain active for the next 60 days without doing so. At that point:
You‚Äôll receive two additional reminders (each cost ‚Ç¨3).
If you have an Overdraft: it‚Äôll be cancelled after the second reminder and you‚Äôll have to repay that amount immediately (or you can set up a repayment plan).
If you have an N26 You, N26 Metal, or N26 Business You account: all benefits will be cancelled after 60 days and your account will turn into a standard one.
If you don‚Äôt respond after 60 days, we may close your account.

title: Wie kann ich Teilnehmer zu einem Shared Space hinzuf√ºgen oder davon entfernen?
content:
So entfernen Besitzer einen Teilnehmer aus einem Shared Space:
Tippe auf die 3 Punkte in der oberen rechten Ecke der Space-√úbersicht.
Tippe auf den Pfeil rechts neben des Namen des jeweiligen Teilnehmers in der Teilnehmerliste (iOS). Wenn du ein Android-Ger√§t verwendest, tippe einfach auf den Namen des Teilnehmers.
Tippe auf "Kontovollmacht widerrufen".
Best√§tige die Mitteilung auf dem n√§chsten Bildschirm und tippe auf "Kontovollmacht widerrufen".

So trittst du einem Shared Space bei:
Tippe in der Spaces-√úbersicht auf "ausstehend" und das Shared Spaces Symbol.
Lies dir die Aufkl√§rung zu Shared Spaces durch und gehe zur n√§chsten Seite √ºber Kontovollmachten.
Sieh dir die Informationen zur Kontovollmacht (die rechtliche √úbersicht) an. Sobald du die AGB durchgelesen und verstanden hast, tippe auf das K√§stchen "Kontovollmacht erteilen".
Gib deine Best√§tigungs-PIN ein.
Best√§tige auf deinem verkn√ºpften Smartphone die Push-Nachricht "Kontovollmacht akzeptieren".

Du brauchst gen√ºgend freie Spaces, um eine Einladung zu einem Shared Space annehmen zu k√∂nnen. Sonst kannst du nur weitermachen, wenn du einen anderen Space l√∂schst.
Es ist auch nicht m√∂glich, einen Space mit demselben Namen oder Bild wie dem des Shared Spaces zu verwenden. Du kannst Einladungen nur annehmen, wenn du den Namen oder das Bild des anderen Spaces √§nderst.

So verl√§sst du einen Space:
Tippe auf die 3 Punkte in der oberen rechten Ecke der Space-√úbersicht.
Tippe in den Einstellungen auf "Shared Space verlassen".
Best√§tige die Mitteilung auf der n√§chsten Seite und tippe auf "Space verlassen":
Shared Spaces lassen sich durch die N26 App oder WebApp erstellen und bearbeiten.
Was sind Shared Spaces?
Wie erstelle ich einen Shared Space?

title: How to order my card with express delivery?
content:
Not available for Metal cards.
Express delivery is a good option if you need your card in a hurry or if postal deliveries have sometimes failed to reach you for whatever reason.
You‚Äôll be given the option to select express delivery when choosing a delivery method for your first card or if you¬†reorder a card. You‚Äôll then receive a tracking link by email. If you‚Äôre not home during the delivery and your mailbox can‚Äôt be accessed, the card will be left at a nearby access point (you can find it through the provided tracking link). The card only stays at the access point for a limited amount of time. After that, it‚Äôll be returned to us. We‚Äôll inform you by email if that happens.
If you order via express delivery, keep in mind that:
Your new Standard or N26 You Mastercard will be delivered within 2-3 working days. Express delivery is not available for Metal cards.
Deliveries take place between 08:00 and 12:00. 
Deliveries can be made by DHL express to all of our supported countries within Europe. It‚Äôs currently not possible to make deliveries to other countries.
It‚Äôs not possible to cancel or change an express delivery once it‚Äôs been selected as the delivery method.
To close an account, you must pay for the express delivery of your card.
If your card hasn‚Äôt arrived within 3-5 working days of placing your order, please check the tracking link for an update. You can also use the tracking link to inform DHL directly about the details of your delivery address or to redirect the shipment if you can‚Äôt be there at the time of delivery.
N26 Standard and N26 You cards have a fee of ‚Ç¨6 for standard shipping and ‚Ç¨25 for express shipping (which includes the ‚Ç¨6 card replacement fee).

title: Comment fonctionne 3D Secure ?
content:
3D Secure est une technologie de s√©curisation des paiements en ligne visant √† limiter l‚Äôutilisation frauduleuse des cartes bancaires sur internet. Tous les e-commer√ßants qui utilisent cette technologie affichent le logo ¬´ Mastercard SecureCode ¬ª sur leurs sites.
Lorsque vous faites un paiement en ligne, depuis votre t√©l√©phone, une tablette ou un ordinateur, vous avez 5 minutes pour confirmer la transaction en cliquant sur la¬†notification¬†que vous recevez sur votre t√©l√©phone.
Si vous ne confirmez pas imm√©diatement cette transaction, vous pouvez √©galement la retrouver dans la liste de vos transactions. Elle appara√Ætra en attente sur votre application. Une petit cloche vous indique que vous devez la confirmer. Vous pourrez alors appuyer sur cette transaction et la valider.
Si vous ne voyez pas cette transaction dans votre liste, vous pouvez consulter l‚Äôarticle relatif aux raisons pour lesquelles¬†un paiement en ligne peut √©chouer.
Vous souhaitez parler de nous √† vos amis ? Recevez 15 ‚Ç¨ √† chaque fois que l‚Äôun d‚Äôentre eux nous rejoint. D√©couvrez notre¬†programme de parrainage.

title: Wie kann ich meine Identit√§t sch√ºtzen?
content:
Um deine pers√∂nlichen Daten zu sch√ºtzen und deren Missbrauch zu vermeiden, beachte bitte Folgendes:
Wir werden dich niemals danach fragen, deine Identit√§t im Namen anderer Personen oder Unternehmen zu √ºberpr√ºfen. Dazu geh√∂ren √úberpr√ºfungen f√ºr Wohnungsmietvertr√§ge, Kreditvergaben oder Stellenangebote (einschlie√ülich Stellen bei N26). F√ºhre den Verifizierungsprozess nur durch, wenn du ein N26 Bankkonto f√ºr dich selbst er√∂ffnen m√∂chtest.
Als Kontoinhaber solltest nur du allein deine Zugangsdaten anlegen und darauf zugreifen k√∂nnen.¬†Erstelle niemals ein N26 Bankkonto mit einer vordefinierten E-Mail-Adresse und einem vordefinierten Passwort. Wenn du von anderen Stellen erhaltene Anmeldedaten verwendest, k√∂nnen diese dazu verwendet werden, um an deine pers√∂nlichen und rechtlichen Informationen zu gelangen. Logge dich auch nie in ein N26 Konto ein, das nicht deines ist.
Sende deinen Ausweis oder Reisepass nicht an unbekannte oder nicht √ºberpr√ºfte Empf√§nger.
Es kann sein, dass wir dich nach bestimmten Dokumenten fragen, wenn deine Transaktion einer Routinepr√ºfung¬†unterzogen wird.¬†Sende nur g√ºltige Unterlagen an verifizierte N26 E-Mailadressen.
Wir werden dich au√üerhalb der N26 App niemals nach deinem Benutzernamen, Passwort oder PIN-Code fragen.¬†Stelle diese Informationen niemals auf einer externen Website oder App zur Verf√ºgung, auch wenn sie N26 √§hnelt.
Solltest du jemals Zweifel haben, eine verd√§chtige Anfrage von einem Dritten erhalten, oder vermuten, dass dein N26 Login missbraucht worden sein k√∂nnte, z√∂gere bitte nicht damit, uns zu kontaktieren.

title: How to upgrade to Metal?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Available in Germany, Austria, France, Spain, Italy, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Iceland, Liechtenstein.
N26 Metal is available during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you already have a N26 bank account or a N26 You membership. 
To upgrade to N26 Metal from the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 Metal. and choose between a Charcoal Black, Quartz Rose, or Slate Grey card.
Check the conditions of the¬†delivery and accept the N26 Metal¬†T&Cs(new tab). Once you confirm your request by entering your¬†Confirmation PIN, your new card will be on the way.
Standard deliveries take up to 10 business days.
The membership fee of ‚Ç¨16,90 (¬£14.90 in UK) will be deducted directly from your account every month on the date of your upgrade.
The minimum contract period for the N26 Metal membership is one year. Your membership will automatically renew unless you cancel it up to four weeks before the contract ends.
All purchases and travel booked using your N26 You Mastercard will remain insured.
If you‚Äôre already a N26 You member, you don‚Äôt have to pay the fees for the N26 You membership on top.
You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 14‚Ç¨ through your N26 app. 
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

content:

Du kannst deine Transaktionen auch nach¬†Kategorien und Hashtags¬†in der App sortieren.

In der¬†WebApp(neuen Tab): Vom Hauptmen√º¬†Transaktionen, klicke auf die Wolke in der oberen rechten Ecke, um zu¬†Downloads¬†zu kommen. Klicke dann auf¬†Kontoausz√ºge.

In der Smartphone-App: Tippe im Hauptbildschirm auf die drei Punkte am oberen rechten Bildschirmrand und w√§hle Kontoausz√ºge.

title: How to add or remove Shared Space participants?
content:
For an owner to remove a participant from a Shared Space:
In the Space overview, tap the menu indicated by the 3 dots in the top right.
From the ‚ÄòParticipants‚Äô list, tap on the arrow to the right of the relevant participant‚Äôs name (iOS). Android users can just simply tap on the participant's name.
Tap ‚Äòrevoke power of attorney‚Äô.
¬†Confirm the notification on the next screen and tap ‚Äòrevoke power of attorney‚Äô.¬†

Accept an invitation and join a Shared Space:
In the Spaces overview, tap the Space with ‚ÄòPending‚Äô and the Shared Space icon. 
Read the Shared Space summary and continue to the Power of Attorney screen.
Once you‚Äôve read and understood the information on the Power of Attorney page (the legal screen), tick the box and tap the ‚ÄòAccept power of attorney‚Äô button.
Enter your Confirmation PIN.
Confirm the ‚ÄòAccept Power of Attorney‚Äô push notification on your paired mobile device
You‚Äôll need to have enough free Space(s) to accept an invitation to a Shared Space. If not, you can only proceed if you delete other Space(s) to free up ‚Ä¶ Space.
You must also not have any open Space with the same name or image as the Shared Space. You can only accept the invitation to join a Shared Space once you change the name/image of the other Space(s).

To leave a Shared Space:
In the Space overview, tap the menu indicated by the 3 dots in the top right.
Inside the settings tap on ‚ÄòExit Shared Space‚Äô.
Confirm the notification on the next screen and tap ‚ÄòLeave the Space‚Äô.
A Shared Space can be created and modified within the N26 app or Webapp

title: Why didn't an ATM give me cash?
content:
It happens: you go to an ATM, the requested amount is deducted from your balance, but the machine doesn‚Äôt give you cash. 
First, check your card limits by going to üë§ My Account and selecting Card settings. Make sure ATM withdrawals are active. 
While we can‚Äôt say for sure why it happened, we can definitely help get your money back. The amount that was deducted from your balance is only an authorization (a reservation or blocked amount). Because the transaction wasn‚Äôt successful, this reserved amount will expire either in a few hours or a maximum of 12 working days and return to your balance. 
If the reserved amount doesn‚Äôt expire after 12 working days, please complete a dispute form. We‚Äôll do our best to get the money back for you. 
In the meantime, we suggest you try another ATM from a different operator. This rarely happens twice in a row.

title: How to cancel my N26 You or N26 Metal membership?
content:
N26 You¬†or¬†(new tab)N26 Metal(new tab) contracts have a minimum term of one year. This contract automatically renews for another year unless you cancel it. 
In this article you will find the difference between revocation, cancellation of the membership and cancellation of the renewal of your membership. You have 3 options:
Revoke your membership within the 30-day revocation period
Cancel your membership at any time up to 1 month before your contract ends
Stop your membership‚Äôs renewal up to 1 month before it expires
Find in details how to do so below. 
You can revoke your membership for free within the 30-day revocation period (or 30 days for UK customers). Simply open a chat with us and we'll assist you from there.
Keep in mind that if you cancel your contract before it ends, you won‚Äôt be able to sign up for the same membership plan in the future.
If you want to terminate your membership at any time up to *1 month before your contract ends and after the 30-day revocation period, please contact us.
If you choose this option all your N26 You or N26 Metal benefits will end, which includes your insurance coverage.
You have up to 4 weeks before your membership expires to cancel the renewal of your N26 You or N26 Metal membership. To do so:
Log into the mobile app and go to üë§ My Account
Select N26 You/Metal
Tap Cancel Membership (on Android) or N26 You/Metal ID (iOS) > Cancel Membership
 you can also see your membership expiration date here
Confirm the cancellation via the push message we send you
You can continue to use your N26 You or N26 Metal Mastercard fully until your membership expires. That means you‚Äôll keep your insurance coverage as long as you‚Äôre still required to pay your membership fee. After that, your Mastercard will work like a standard card without the benefits. We‚Äôll send you a standard card before your contract ends. No need to contact us about it.
We‚Äôll notify you of the renewal via email 8 weeks before your anniversary date.
If you want to definitely close your account, visit our article How to close my N26 account.

title: Can I open an account if I live outside the eurozone?
content:
If you live in Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Liechtenstein, Switzerland or Iceland you may¬†open an account with us. We offer:
The choice between a standard bank account or N26 Business.
Accounts in ‚Ç¨, a German IBAN, and transfers with SEPA or Moneybeam.
Good currency conversion with your Mastercard debit card.
Free shipping of your Mastercard or ‚Ç¨25 for express.
Foreign currency transfers with TransferWise (with the standard account).
5 free ATM withdrawals in ‚Ç¨ in the EU (1.7% markup on foreign currencies withdrawals).
0.1% cashback on all card payments (for Business accounts).
2 Spaces in addition to the main account.
A bonus for every friend you successfully invite to N26 with our Refer a Friend Program.
Contactless payment with Google Pay and Apple Pay.
Tips for incoming and outgoing transfers:
We recommend choosing your local currency to get the best exchange rate when using your Mastercard for purchases or to withdraw cash (if not, additional fees may apply).
To top up your account using your local currency, we recommend converting your currency via SEPA transfer either using TransferWise (on their website(new tab)) or using your local bank.
For outgoing transfers to ‚Ç¨ accounts, simply use the app's internal SEPA transfer. For outgoing transfers to non-‚Ç¨ accounts, use TransferWise in the app.*
*Please note: TransferWise is unavailable for N26 Business accounts (only SEPA transfers in EUR).

title: Comment ouvrir un compte N26 ?
content:
Ouvrir un compte N26 est simple et ne prend que quelques minutes. Pour √™tre √©ligible √† un compte N26, vous devez :
avoir au moins 18 ans
√™tre r√©sident permanent de l'un des pays o√π N26 est pr√©sent
avoir un¬†t√©l√©phone portable compatible
poss√©der un¬†document d‚Äôidentit√© accept√© par nos services pour la v√©rification de votre identit√© selon votre pays de r√©sidence, si vous¬†vivez en Allemagne(nouvel onglet)¬†ou en¬†dehors de l‚ÄôAllemagne(nouvel onglet)
ne pas avoir un compte N26
parler l'une des langues parl√©es par notre Service Client : fran√ßais, anglais, allemand, espagnol ou italien.
Voici comment se d√©roule l‚Äôouverture d‚Äôun compte N26 :

Apr√®s avoir valid√© votre adresse email, vous pourrez proc√©der √† la¬†v√©rification de votre identit√©¬†directement depuis votre application N26 et¬†synchroniser votre smartphone.
D√®s que la v√©rification de votre identit√© est valid√©e, vous pouvez alimenter votre compte N26 par virement SEPA, en utilisant CASH26 (si vous √™tes client en Allemagne, Autriche et en Italie) ou en demandant de l'argent √† un ami (par Moneybeam).
Si vous ouvrez un compte en France, votre premier virement pour alimenter votre compte doit √™tre effectu√© depuis un autre compte ouvert √† votre nom et domicili√© dans la zone SEPA.
Apr√®s quelques jours, selon le mode de livraison choisi, vous recevrez votre Mastercard N26¬†par courrier. 
Si vous souhaitez obtenir plus de renseignements, contactez-nous. Le Livechat est disponible du lundi au dimanche de 07:00 √† 23:00 h.
*Uniquement si vous remplissez toutes les¬†conditions d'√©ligibilit√© √† l'ouverture d'un compte(nouvel onglet). Si ce n'est pas le cas, nous ne pourrons pas vous offrir de compte pour le moment. La d√©cision est prise par un syst√®me automatique.

title: Devo pagare le tasse negli Stati Uniti?
content:
In quanto banca autorizzata, siamo obbligati a riportare all‚ÄôIRS informazioni sui conti tenuti dai contribuenti statunitensi secondo le disposizioni FATCA, una legislazione delineata dal US Department of Treasury e dal US Internal Revenue Service con lo scopo di incoraggiare l‚Äôadempimento fiscale ed di impedire che i soggetti statunitensi si rivolgano a banche estere o altri enti creditizi per evitare la tassazione statunitense sulle loro entrate e sul loro patrimonio.
Troverai maggiori informazioni sulla normativa FATCA (nuova tabella)qui(nuova tabella).
Nell‚Äôambito FATCA, vengono definiti soggetti statunitensi, ad esempio:
i cittadini degli Stati Uniti (inclusi i possessori di doppia cittadinanza)
i residenti negli Stati Uniti (ad es. i possessori di un valido permesso di soggiorno per gli USA oppure le persone che superano il ‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù - maggiori informazioni qui di seguito)
Se non sai se sei un soggetto statunitense, ti suggeriamo di rivolgerti ad un consulente fiscale.
Il ‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù prevede che:
tu sia stato fisicamente presente negli USA per almeno 183 giorni nell‚Äôanno solare in corso
OPPURE
tu sia stato fisicamente presente negli USA per almeno 183 giorni negli ultimi 3 anni solari, da calcolare nel seguente modo:
(almeno 31 giorni nell‚Äôanno solare in corso) + (il numero di giorni di presenza fisica negli USA l‚Äôanno scorso) diviso per 3 + (il numero di giorni di presenza fisica negli USA l‚Äôanno precedente) diviso per 6.

Inoltre, se il tuo conto presenta almeno uno dei seguenti dati:
cittadinanza statunitense o residenza statunitense
luogo di nascita statunitense
indirizzo postale o indirizzo di residenza statunitense, incluse le caselle postali
numero di telefono statunitense
bonifici ricorrenti verso un indirizzo o un conto statunitense
saremo obbligati a considerarti un soggetto statunitense a meno che non tu fornisca i seguenti documenti:
un modulo¬† W-8BEN o un'autocertificazione di simile valore 
     e
un passaporto non statunitense o un altro documento identificativo emesso da un altro governo, che riporti il possesso di una cittadinanza o nazionalit√† diversa da quella statunitense
nel caso fossi nato negli USA, una copia del tuo Certificate of Loss of Nationality of the US.

title: What is a N26 Flex account?
content:
We‚Äôll offer you an N26 Flex account if you don‚Äôt meet the minimum credit requirements to open an N26 bank account:
We charge a monthly account management fee of ‚Ç¨6. We debit this fee directly from the account. The first fee is deducted 10 days after the account is opened. After that we‚Äôll deduct the amount every month on sign-up date. Make sure you have sufficient funds in your account to cover these payments in order to avoid overdraft fees.
Cash withdrawals at ATMs or from one of our 9.000 CASH26 retailer partners are ‚Ç¨2 each. Both are debited immediately.
N26 Flex can‚Äôt be combined with N26 Business, N26 Business You, N26 You, or N26 Metal.

title: How to close my account?
content:
To cancel your N26 account, please send your request through live chat or via email to support@n26.com from your registered email address including the following information:
A statement requesting the closure of your account on a specific date or ASAP
Your name
Your N26 IBAN 
If you have a positive balance in your main account or your Spaces, we also need an IBAN within SEPA  to transfer your remaining balance.
A statement with your consent to send your account closure confirmation to your registered email address: ‚ÄúI hereby agree that N26 Bank is allowed to exchange personal data with me via email.‚Äú (Otherwise, the confirmation of account closure can be sent via post, but keep in mind that this solution will slow the process.)
Or you can reply using our¬†cancellation form(new tab).
A few things to consider when closing your account:
For a quick account closure: if you have a positive balance, please transfer your remaining balance yourself. If you have a negative balance, top up your account.
All outstanding fees are due immediately. This includes fees related to express delivery, and N26 You or N26 Metal (if applicable).
Destroy your cards by cutting them with scissors or a shredder. The chip, NFC antenna, and the magnetic strip should all be cut into pieces and disposed of separately.

title: How to reverse and block a direct debit?
content:
You have the ability to reverse a direct debit in the app yourself up to 8 weeks after it has been debited.
Open your transaction list and select the direct debit in question. 
Choose¬†Refund. 
The amount will then be credited to your account within 2 banking days.
*For Poland, Sweden, Denmark, and Norway only: if you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and ultimate amount that is collected from us.

title: Wie behalte ich meine t√§glichen Ausgaben im Blick?
content:
Wir sortieren deine¬†Transaktionen¬†automatisch und zeigen unsere Ergebnisse in der Statistik an (obere rechte Ecke der mobilen App), anhand folgender Kriterien:
Kategorien. Wir sammeln Informationen √ºber Einzelh√§ndler und Zahlungsgr√ºnde, um unsere Kategorisierung zu verbessern (z. B. Geldautomaten, Lebensmittel oder Bekleidung). Wenn du zum Beispiel einen Moneybeam mit dem Verwendungszweck Mittagessen versendest, werden wir ihn in die Kategorie Kneipen und Restaurants einordnen. Wenn du der Meinung bist, dass eine Kategorie nicht passt, kannst du sie einfach √§ndern, indem du die Transaktion ausw√§hlst und eine andere Kategorie aus der Dropdown-Liste ausw√§hlst.
Hashtags. Wir haben auch Standard-Hashtags f√ºr Transaktionszeiten (#Wochenende), Transaktionsarten (#B√ºcher) oder Kauforte (#Berlin) hinzugef√ºgt. Du kannst deine Transaktionen weiter sortieren, indem du deine eigenen Hashtags hinzuf√ºgst: Tippe auf eine Transaktion und dann auf das Bleistiftsymbol, um Tags hinzuzuf√ºgen (z. B. #Portugal_Trip oder #jeden_Monat) oder um unerw√ºnschte Tags zu entfernen.
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erhalte 15‚Ç¨ f√ºr jeden Freund, dem du N26 erfolgreich empfiehlst. Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

content:
I limiti massimi giornalieri (importo totale entro le 24 ore) per i pagamenti con carta sono:

Entro tali limiti, puoi¬†impostare i tuoi limiti¬†di prelievo bancomat e di pagamento direttamente nell'app selezionando üë§¬†Il mio conto¬†e poi¬†Carte.
I limiti massimi¬†giornalieri¬†(nell'arco di 24 ore) per i bonifici bancari sono:
