title: ¬øPor qu√© mi transferencia sigue pendiente en la app N26?
content:
Necesitar√°s tu PIN de confirmaci√≥n para completar cualquier transferencia, aunque sea con¬†MoneyBeam o transferencias programadas. Tu transferencia permanecer√° pendiente hasta que la confirmes o la canceles mediante una notificaci√≥n push en la app.
Tu PIN de confirmaci√≥n no es el mismo que el¬†PIN de tu tarjeta, aunque puedes poner el mismo n√∫mero en los dos. El primero lo creas una vez que¬†vincules tu smartphone, mientras que el PIN de la tarjeta lo eliges al momento de activarla.
Si introduces el PIN de confirmaci√≥n err√≥neamente 6 veces seguidas, el PIN se bloquear√° por motivos de seguridad. Podr√°s restaurar el PIN¬†cambi√°ndolo desde la app: ve a¬†üë§ Mi cuenta, selecciona¬†Configuraciones, luego¬†Seguridad¬†y pulsa en¬†Cambiar PIN de confirmaci√≥n.

title: How to pay taxes on N26 Savings and N26 Invest?
content:
With¬†N26 Savings¬†(Germany and Austria only) and¬†N26 Invest¬†(Germany only), our partner banks are legally required to pass on taxes to the relevant tax authorities.
We‚Äôll have annual tax certificates ready for you in the app every April. You can find it in the Savings & Investment tab. If you need further documents for your tax return, we can provide you with an exemption order form for N26 Invest or a loss certificate.
You can apply for exemptions from capital gains tax and church tax. For N26 Invest, the required documents are found in the Documents section of the Savings & Investment tab of the mobile app.
For N26 Savings, you can find the exemption form (new tab)here for Grenke Bank(new tab) and here for Greensill Bank(new tab). Chat with us and we'll ask you to send the completed document. We‚Äôll forward your request to our partner bank.
Income that is above the capital gains tax allowance is taxable in Germany. In addition to capital gains taxes, investments are subject to the solidarity surcharge and church tax.
The custodian bank automatically deducts all applicable taxes from your total deposits if you are taxable in Germany. This means that the potential returns on your investment always show the net amount after tax. If you‚Äôre not taxable in Germany, you‚Äôll receive the gross amount of your income. You‚Äôre then responsible for filing your capital gains tax in the country where you pay taxes.

title: Why isn't my video verification working?
content:
Tips for a successful video¬†verification:
Most video calls fail due to poor internet connection or bad picture quality (for example, too blurry or due to low lighting). Please complete the call in a bright environment, use a phone with a good camera, and make sure you have a fast internet connection.
Please make sure that you are the only person in the video.
You need to live in one of our¬†supported countries¬†to open an account with us.
We can only accept national IDs and passports (driver‚Äôs licenses or residence permits can‚Äôt be used). Also, the document shouldn‚Äôt be damaged.
As soon as your verification is complete, we‚Äôll send you your N26 Mastercard.¬†Deliveries¬†take up to 10 days.

Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

title: Wie kann ich meine Adresse, Telefonnummer oder andere pers√∂nliche Daten √§ndern?
content:
Es ist wichtig, dass deine pers√∂nlichen Daten auf dem neuesten Stand sind. Du brauchst z.B. deine Telefonnummer um dein Smartphone zu verkn√ºpfen oder um einen MoneyBeam zu versenden und empfangen. So √§nderst du deine Daten:
Lieferadresse,¬†Passwort¬†oder¬†Steuerinformationen: Du kannst diese Informationen jederzeit selbst in der App √§ndern. Gehe einfach zu üë§ Mein Konto, dann Einstellungen und w√§hle Pers√∂nliche Einstellungen aus.
Name¬†und¬†Geschlecht: Chatte mit uns und schicke uns zwei Dokumente: eine Kopie deines neuen Personalausweises oder Reisepasses sowie ein offizielles Dokument der √Ñnderung (z. B. eine Heirats- oder aktualisierte Geburtsurkunde).
Nationalit√§t: Chatte mit uns und schicke eine Kopie deines neuen Personalausweises oder Reisepasses.
Telefonnummer oder¬†E-Mail-Adresse: Hierzu musst du uns per Chat kontaktieren. Wir m√ºssen zuerst sicherstellen, dass wir wirklich mit dir sprechen, bevor wir deine Kontaktdaten √§ndern. Deshalb k√∂nnen wir das nicht per E-Mail tun.

title: How does N26 Business work?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, and Switzerland.
It‚Äôs not yet possible to switch between accounts so it‚Äôs important to know if N26 Business is right for you:
The N26 Business account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can‚Äôt have your company‚Äôs name on the account or card.
The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. It‚Äôs currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (it‚Äôs available in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands).
As with the N26 bank account, the account is free and we cover certain cash withdrawals as part of our Fair Use Policy. Unlike other accounts, transfers in foreign currencies aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business within the app. You can visit Transferwise(new tab) for this.
Business to business (B2B) payments are not supported with a N26 Business account. 
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: How to make transfers in foreign currencies?
content:
We have partnered with TransferWise to make foreign currency transfers easy. TransferWise offers real-time exchange rates and no hidden fees.
To initiate a transfer in a foreign currency start by logging into the mobile app: 
From the Home screen choose the Actions tab,

Select Add Money followed by Foreign Currency Transfer,

Choose ‚Äúadd a new recipient‚Äù or select an existing payee. When adding a new recipient you'll be given the option to change the currency by tapping on the Euro flag in the top right corner of the screen,

Enter the amount you'd like to send and add any additional bank details,

Finalize the transfer with your Confirmation PIN.
If we don‚Äôt currently offer the¬†foreign currency(new tab)¬†you need, please visit¬†TransferWise(new tab)¬†for more currency options. You can log in by entering your N26 account email and selecting Forgot password? You‚Äôll receive an email from TransferWise to change your password and then you can use both log in details to perform the transfer from there.
Please note that foreign currency transfers in the app are not possible with the N26 Business or Business You account nor are transfers to businesses.
TransferWise has its own transfer types and fees but this will all be indicated before you confirm the transfer.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: How to change my card limits?
content:
You can change your¬†card PIN, define your daily withdrawal or payment limits, and enable or disable your ATM withdrawals, online or payments abroad in¬†üë§ My Account¬†by selecting¬†Card Settings¬†in the mobile app or¬†WebApp(new tab).
Each change you make is applied instantly to all of your cards.
You can also¬†block your card¬†or order a new one, in case it‚Äôs lost or stolen.
Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial(new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube(new tab) channel.

title: ¬øC√≥mo revertir una domiciliaci√≥n?
content:
Tienes la posibilidad de revertir una domiciliaci√≥n t√∫ mismo utilizando la app, hasta 8 semanas despu√©s de realizarse. 
Abre tu lista de transacciones en la app y selecciona la domiciliaci√≥n en cuesti√≥n.
Elige la opci√≥n Reembolso.
La cantidad se devolver√° a tu saldo en 2 d√≠as h√°biles.
F√°cil, ¬øverdad?

title: Wie kann ich mich mit Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung einloggen?
content:
Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung bedeutet, dass der Login √ºber mindestens zwei verschiedene, sichere Elemente erfolgt. Zus√§tzlich zur Eingabe deines pers√∂nlichen Passworts musst du deinen Login-Versuch entweder durch dein verkn√ºpftes Ger√§t oder einen SMS-Code best√§tigen.
Mehr zu diesem Thema erf√§hrst du in unserem Artikel: PSD2 - Starke Kundenauthentifizierung
Wenn du dich von der WebApp oder von einem nicht verkn√ºpften Ger√§t einloggst, musst du deinen Login-Versuch zus√§tzlich best√§tigen. Das kannst du tun, indem du entweder eine Push-Mitteilung auf deinem verkn√ºpften Ger√§t best√§tigst oder indem du einen SMS-Code anforderst, der an deine registrierte Handynummer geschickt wird. So wird sichergestellt, dass nur du dich in dein N26 Konto einloggen kannst.
Wenn du dich von deinem verkn√ºpften Ger√§t in dein N26 Konto einloggst, liegt damit schon Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung vor. Das bedeutet, der Login-Prozess √§ndert sich bei deinem verkn√ºpften Ger√§t nicht.
Stell sicher, dass das Betriebssystem deines Handys auf dem neuesten Stand ist und die neueste Version der N26 App installiert ist. Falls du dich nicht mehr einloggen kannst, aber noch Zugang zu deiner registrierten E-Mail-Adresse hast, versuch bitte, dein Passwort zur√ºckzusetzen. Falls du keinen Zugang mehr zu deiner registrierten E-Mail-Adresse hast, kontaktiere uns bitte in unserem Live Chat und wir helfen dir gerne weiter.
Mehr Informationen dar√ºber findest du in unserem Artikel: Wie erstelle ich ein Passwort?
Wenn du keinen Zugang mehr zu deinem verkn√ºpften Ger√§t, aber noch Zugang zu deiner registrierten Handynummer hast, kannst du dich in dein N26 Konto einloggen und zur Authentifizierung einen SMS-Code anfordern:
Logge dich in die WebApp oder von einem nicht verkn√ºpften Ger√§t ein
Wenn du aufgefordert wirst, deinen Login-Versuch durch dein verkn√ºpftes Ger√§t zu best√§tigen, w√§hle Hilfe
W√§hle SMS-Code schicken
Nachdem du den SMS-Code erhalten hast, gib ihn in der WebApp ein.
Dadurch ist die Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung abgeschlossen und du kannst dein neues Ger√§t wieder mit deinem Konto verkn√ºpfen.
Falls dir deine registrierte Handynummer nicht mehr zur Verf√ºgung steht - z.B. weil du eine neue hast oder dein Handy verloren gegangen ist oder gestohlen wurde - kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice im Live-Chat und wir helfen dir gerne weiter.
Wenn du ein √§lteres Smartphone benutzt, das die neueste Version der App nicht mehr unterst√ºtzt, kannst du dich mit diesem nicht mehr in die N26 App einloggen.
Du kannst dennoch die WebApp benutzen, um Zugang zu deinem Konto zu erhalten. Daf√ºr musst du deinen Login-Versuch mit einem SMS-Code best√§tigen, den wir dir an deine registrierte Handynummer schicken.
Mit deiner Karte kannst du nach wie vor Geld abheben und Zahlungen t√§tigen. Bitte beachte aber, dass du keine √úberweisungen ausf√ºhren und kein CASH26 mehr benutzen kannst, solange du diese in der N26 App nicht best√§tigen kannst.

title: Come posso far accreditare lo stipendio sul mio conto N26?
content:
Far accreditare il tuo stipendio sul tuo conto N26 √® molto semplice: baster√† fornire l‚ÄôIBAN al tuo datore di lavoro, il quale provveder√† a trasferire l‚Äôimporto sul tuo conto tramite bonifico SEPA.
Nel caso in cui il tuo datore si rifiutasse di accreditare il tuo stipendio sul tuo conto N26 tramite bonifico SEPA perch√© l‚ÄôIBAN non ha caratteristiche italiane ma tedesche, sta violando una leggi l'articolo "cosa fare se il mio IBAN non viene accettato" del nostro Support Center per sapere cosa fare.

title: Wie erstelle ich eine SEPA-√úberweisung?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Ausgehende √úberweisungen kannst du in jedes Land innerhalb des SEPA Raums ausf√ºhren.¬†
Ausgehende √úberweisungen kannst du sowohl in der N26 App als auch in der WebApp erstellen:
W√§hle ‚ÄúAktionen‚Äù im Hauptbildschirm
W√§hle Bank√ºberweisungen und dann Neuer Kontakt
Gib den legalen Namen und die IBAN des Empf√§ngers ein und klicke Weiter
Gib den Betrag ein und klicke Weiter
Gib bei Bedarf einen Verwendungszweck ein und klicke Weiter
√úberpr√ºfe die Zusammenfassung deiner √úberweisung. Hier kannst du auch entscheiden, ob es eine Termin√ºberweisung werden soll oder ein Dauerauftrag
Klicke Absenden und best√§tige mit deiner Best√§tigungs-PIN.
Zum Schluss erh√§ltst du in deinem verkn√ºpften Handy eine Push-Mitteilung, um die √úberweisung zu best√§tigen.¬†
Sobald die √úberweisung best√§tigt wurde, k√∂nnen wir sie nicht r√ºckg√§ngig machen oder die Daten des √úberweisungsempf√§ngers √§ndern.
Falls du die √úberweisung nicht best√§tigen kannst, √ºberpr√ºfe bitte, dass:
Du eine stabile Internetverbindung hast.
In den Einstellungen deines Handys Push-Mitteilungen aktiviert sind.
Du dein verkn√ºpftes Handy verwendest.
Sobald deine √úberweisung gesendet wurde, kannst du in der App eine √úberweisungsbest√§tigung als PDF herunterladen:
Gehe in deine Umsatzliste.
Finde deine √úberweisung und tippe auf diese.
Scrolle nach unten zu den Informationen zur Transaktion tippe auf √úberweisungsbest√§tigung.

title: How to file a complaint?
content:
If you have any questions about our products or need help with your account, we‚Äôre happy to assist. Just open a chat with us directly within the mobile app or WebApp, that's the fastest and simplest way to get in touch.
If you ever feel dissatisfied with one of our products or services, you can also send (new tab)us an email from your registered address or send your feedback by post.
If you're in the UK, you can send the email to complaints.uk@n26.com (new tab)(new tab). For the rest of Europe please use¬†complaints@n26.com(new tab).
To file a complaint, please include:
your full name and address
the product or service you're not happy with
a description of your concern
the date in which the problem first appeared
We‚Äôll contact you via email to confirm that we‚Äôve received your complaint and then begin an investigation to find a solution you‚Äôre happy with. In case we need more information from you or we can provide you with an immediate solution, we‚Äôll let you know via email as well.
In case we‚Äôre not able to find a solution you‚Äôre happy with, you can escalate your complaint to an independent third party. You have a few options:
You could file a complaint with the Arbitro Bancario Finanziario(new tab)
You could seek to reach an amicable dispute settlement with the assistance of Conciliatore Bancario Finanziario(new tab)
You can also go before another entity specialised in amicable settlement of disputes on banking and financial services, as long as this entity is enrolled in the appropriate register kept by the Italian Ministry of Justice.
Also, the European Commission has set up the Online Dispute Resolution (ODR(new tab)) platform to help consumers dispute online contracts out of court.
We are committed to constantly improving our products and services. Your feedback makes this possible.

title: How to dispute a transaction?
content:
We understand that disputed charges (also called ‚Äòchargebacks‚Äô) can cost you time and money.
We can only dispute card transactions that are visible in your monthly balance statement and haven‚Äôt been made more than 120 days ago. Please complete the dispute form (EU(new tab)¬†or¬†UK(new tab)) and send it to us. Also, make sure that you:
Complete a separate form for each card payment and sign it
Select only one dispute reason
Attach all¬†additional documents(new tab)

title: Comment passer √† l‚Äôoffre N26 You?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Disponible en Allemagne, Autriche, France, Espagne, Italie, Belgique, Estonie, Finlande, Gr√®ce, Irlande, Lettonie, Lituanie, Luxembourg, Pays-Bas, Portugal, Slovaquie, Slov√©nie, Pologne, Su√®de, Danemark, Norv√®ge, Islande, Liechtenstein.
Si vous poss√©dez d√©j√† un compte N26 standard, vous avez la possibilit√© de passer au compte¬†N26 You, directement depuis votre application. Pour cela, rendez-vous dans la rubrique D√©couvrir en bas de l‚Äô√©cran d‚Äôaccueil. Dans la section Passer √† un compte premium, vous verrez une banni√®re N26 You. Appuyez sur En savoir plus, puis sur Choisir ce compte.
Vous avez la possibilit√© de choisir votre carte parmi les 5 nouvelles couleurs disponibles : Rhubarbe, Oc√©an, Sable, Menthe et Ardoise.
Une fois le¬†mode de livraison¬†de votre carte choisi et apr√®s avoir accept√© les¬†Conditions G√©n√©rales d‚ÄôUtilisation N26 You(nouvel onglet), vous devez confirmer votre commande √† l‚Äôaide de votre code de validation.
Le d√©lai de livraison standard peut prendre jusqu‚Äô√† 10 jours ouvr√©s. La¬†livraison express¬†se fait en 5 jours ouvr√©s maximum (ce d√©lai d√©pend de l‚Äôheure de votre commande et inclut le temps n√©cessaire √† la fabrication de votre carte).
Les frais d'adh√©sion de 9,90 ‚Ç¨ sont pr√©lev√©s directement de votre compte N26 chaque mois, en fonction de la date de votre souscription √† N26 You.
Le contrat d'adh√©sion √† N26 You est d‚Äôune dur√©e minimale d‚Äôun an. Vous pouvez annuler la reconduction de votre contrat jusqu‚Äô√† 4 semaines avant sa date de renouvellement automatique.
Vous souhaitez parler de nous √† vos amis ? Recevez 15 ‚Ç¨ √† chaque fois que l‚Äôun d‚Äôentre eux nous rejoint. D√©couvrez notre¬†programme de parrainage.

title: How to change my confirmation PIN?
content:
You can change your¬†Confirmation PIN¬†at any time in the app:
Go to üë§ My Account then: Settings and Security (mobile app) or Security Settings (WebApp(new tab))
Select Change Confirmation PIN
Enter the 10-digit token number on your Mastercard
Create and confirm your new Confirmation PIN
If you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times, you'll need to reset it before trying again.
For security reasons, your PIN can‚Äôt contain parts of your date of birth or your address, repeated numbers (such as 1111, 111, or 11), or sequences (such as 1234 or 4321). If the PIN you‚Äôve chosen is not accepted, please try again using a different one.
Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial(new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube(new tab) channel.

title: How do I add money to my N26 account?
content:
We make it easy to fund your N26 account. You can add money via several methods, including direct deposit, transfer from external bank, external bank account to N26 (ACH transfer) debit card transfer (non funded accounts only), and MoneyBeam, to name a few. Please look below for more information. 
Direct Deposit:  If you intend to fund your account via direct deposit, simply provide the sender (your employer, financial institution, Armed Forces, Social Security, etc.) with our ABA routing number (122287675) and your personal N26 account number.¬†
You can locate your account number by clicking on the ‚ÄúMy Account‚Äù option on the top right side of the website (and the mobile application) after logging into your N26 account.
In case your employer needs a direct deposit form, please click here(new tab).¬†

Transfer from external bank:  Transfer money from your external bank into your N26 account, conveniently, from within the N26 mobile application.
To transfer funds to your N26 account using the N26 mobile application, follow these steps:
Launch your N26 mobile application.
Tap the Actions button at the bottom right of your mobile's screen.
Tap on Add Money.
Tap External bank transfer
Select the account to use to transfer funds from.
Enter the amount you want to transfer.
Tap Continue.
Enter your 4 digit Confirmation PIN.
Tap Confirm transfer to initiate the transfer.
A message will be displayed in your Transaction List indicating that the transfer is scheduled.

External Bank Account to N26 (ACH transfer):  Transfer funds directly from your primary bank account into your N26 account with an ACH Transfer.
Log into your financial institution's online banking platform or mobile app (if applicable).
Locate the ‚ÄúExternal Transfers‚Äù or ‚ÄúTransfer Money‚Äù or ‚ÄúExternal Account‚Äù or similar option and add your N26 checking account as a new account.
The bank account originating the transfer does not have to be under your name. However, please make sure that the recipient‚Äôs name is your full name as entered during the account sign-up process.
Input our ABA routing number (122287675) and your personal checking account number.
You can locate your account number by clicking on the ‚ÄúMy Account‚Äù option on the top right side of the website or by clicking the icon in the mobile app, after logging into your N26 account.
Your financial institution may make a small test deposit(s) into your N26 account, within a few days, to verify your account. Typically, to complete the process, you may have to confirm the test deposit(s) with the originating financial institution.
Upon completing the initial process, you should be able to transfer funds in or out of your N26 account using the third party banks fund transfer feature.
¬†Note:¬†
Please be advised that these are general guidelines and your financial institution‚Äôs requirements may differ.
Some banks may experience issues processing money transfers to the routing number 122287675. At this time, ACH bank transfers from Capital One and from USAA are not available to fund your N26 account. If you encounter this issue, please use another bank account to transfer money into your N26 account.

Debit card transfer (Non Funded Accounts Only):  Use a debit card to instantly fund your account right from the app. This is the fastest and simplest way to add money to your N26 account with a free, one-time transaction. Just log into the iOS or Android app and follow the instructions on the main screen.
This option is available to customers who have not previously funded their N26 account. 
Find additional details in this document(new tab). 

MoneyBeam:  Instantly send money to (or receive money from) other N26 members. Find additional details in our "What is MoneyBeam?(new tab)" article. 

Third party payment processors
Put money into your account using these services:
Cash App(new tab)
PayPal(new tab)
Venmo(new tab)
Zelle¬Æ(new tab)
Ingo Money(new tab) (mobile check cashing service)
Apple Cash¬Æ:  You can transfer money from Apple Cash into your N26 account.
How can I link my N26 Visa¬Æ debit card to Apple Cash?
You can link your N26 card to Apple Cash by following these steps"
Open "Wallet" on your Apple device.
Select "Apple Cash".
Tap the three dots on the upper right hand corner.
Select "Add Money".
Select "Add Card".
Position your N26 card in the frame to scan.
Tap "next" when the scan is complete.
Enter your card's 3-digit security code.
Tap "Next".
Your card is now linked.
How can I transfer money to my N26 account from Apple Cash?
Transferring money to your N26 account from Apple Cash can be achieved by following these steps:
Select "Transfer to Bank".
Enter the amount you want to transfer.
Select how quickly you want the money transferred.
"Instant Transfer".  There is a fee associated with this option.
"1-3 Business Days".  There is no charge for this option.
Done.

The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Perch√© non posso accedere ad alcuni prodotti e servizi?
content:
Collaboriamo con molti partner, pertanto, per alcuni prodotti e servizi, devi soddisfare anche i loro requisiti. I motivi pi√π comuni per cui potresti non essere idoneo per determinati prodotti sono:
Documenti d'identit√† scaduti o non supportati (ad esempio certi passaporti per la mancanza delle caratteristiche di sicurezza).
Sei soggetto alle imposte negli Stati Uniti. In tal caso non potrai utilizzare determinati prodotti d‚Äôinvestimento o di risparmio. Se non √® il tuo caso, contatta la nostra Assistenza clienti tramite chat, che verificher√† i dettagli del tuo conto. Potresti dover cambiare il tuo numero di telefono se inizia con un prefisso del Nord America (+1).
Hai dimostrato la tua identit√† tramite PostIdent (in Germania). Dovremo resettare il tuo conto e dovrai dimostrare nuovamente la tua identit√† per poter utilizzare determinati prodotti e servizi. In tal caso, ti invieremo un'e-mail per sapere quando sei disponibile a farlo.
Il prodotto o il servizio non √® ancora disponibile nel tuo Paese.

title: How long do transfers take?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Applies to all regions except the UK
All domestic and international incoming SEPA transfers are instant if they come from a bank that supports instant transfers and the sender selects this option. Banking regulation applies to SEPA instant transfers and may delay the transfer in case it needs additional monitoring.
In case the sender bank doesn‚Äôt offer instant transfers or the sender doesn‚Äôt choose this option, the transfer will be completed within one banking day. However, due to the opening times of the participating banks, one banking day may stretch to two working days. Please, note that outgoing SEPA transfers are completed within one banking day.
If the transfer is not instant, keep in mind that if a transfer has been made right before a weekend or bank holiday, the time frame will be extended. We send our SEPA payment orders through TARGET2(new tab). It‚Äôs open to process payments every working day from 07:00 to 18:00 CET. The system is closed on the following days:
1 January (New Year's Day), Good Friday, Easter Monday, 1 May (Labour Day), 25 December (Christmas Day), 26 December.
With¬†MoneyBeam, you can transfer money to other N26 customers instantly and you can also receive instant MoneyBeam requests from banks that supports instant transfers. Times vary for¬†foreign currency transfers¬†with TransferWise (but you‚Äôll see an estimated transfer time when you create the transfer).
You'll need to confirm each type of transfer via¬†push message¬†in the app before we send anything out.
Please note: we only accept transfers in EUR via SEPA (that means no SWIFT transfers).
If your incoming transfer is outside of these estimated time frames, please contact the sender (bank) for a payment investigation. We can't investigate incoming transfers. But we've collected a few reasons why your¬†SEPA¬†or¬†foreign currency¬†transfer could have failed.

title: Why isn't my video verification working?
content:
Tips for a successful video¬†verification:
Most video calls fail due to poor internet connection or bad picture quality (for example, too blurry or due to low lighting). Please complete the call in a bright environment, use a phone with a good camera, and make sure you have a fast internet connection.
Please make sure that you are the only person in the video.
You need to live in one of our¬†supported countries¬†to open an account with us.
We can only accept national IDs and passports (driver‚Äôs licenses or residence permits can‚Äôt be used). Also, the document shouldn‚Äôt be damaged.
As soon as your verification is complete, we‚Äôll send you your N26 Mastercard.¬†Deliveries¬†take up to 10 days.

Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

title: ¬øC√≥mo pasar a N26 You?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Disponible en Espa√±a, Alemania, Austria, B√©lgica, Dinamarca, Eslovaquia, Eslovenia, Estonia, Finlandia, Francia, Irlanda, Islandia, Italia, Letonia, Liechtenstein, Lituania, Luxemburgo, Los Pa√≠ses Bajos, Noruega, Portugal, Polonia, Suecia. 
Si tienes una cuenta en N26, puedes pasarte a¬†N26 You¬†desde la aplicaci√≥n: desliza hacia la izquierda hasta llegar a la pesta√±a Explorar y despu√©s N26 You.
Hay 5 colores nuevos entre los que elegir para pedir tu tarjeta: aguamarina, pomelo, arena, grafito y oc√©ano.
Despu√©s de elegir tu¬†forma de env√≠o¬†y de aceptar los¬†T√©rminos y Condiciones(pesta√±a nueva) y una vez hecho esto, tu nueva tarjeta estar√° en camino.
El env√≠o est√°ndar tarda hasta 10 d√≠as h√°biles, mientras que el¬†env√≠o express¬†tarda 3 d√≠as h√°biles.
La cuota de la membres√≠a es de 9,90 ‚Ç¨ al mes y la cargaremos directamente a tu cuenta cada mes en el d√≠a que realizaste el cambio de cuenta.
El contrato m√≠nimo para N26 You es de un a√±o. Tu membres√≠a se renovar√° autom√°ticamente a menos que la canceles hasta 4 semanas antes de que acabe el contrato.
Puedes pedir una segunda tarjeta N26 You y asociarla a tu cuenta a trav√©s de la app de N26, pagando solo una cuota de 14‚Ç¨.

¬øQuieres ganar dinero hablando de nosotros a tus amigos? Consigue 15 ‚Ç¨ por cada amigo al que invites a unirse a N26. Inf√≥rmate m√°s sobre nuestro programa¬†Invita a un amigo.

title: ¬øC√≥mo pedir mi tarjeta con env√≠o express?
content:
No disponible para Metal.
El env√≠o express es una buena opci√≥n si necesitas la tarjeta con urgencia, o bien si el correo postal ha fallado por alguna raz√≥n.
Tendr√°s la opci√≥n de elegir env√≠o express al momento de seleccionar el m√©todo de env√≠o. Tambi√©n recibir√°s un enlace de seguimiento por correo electr√≥nico. Si no est√°s en casa durante la entrega y no te es posible acceder a tu buz√≥n, la tarjeta ser√° depositada en un punto de entrega cercano (podr√°s encontrarlo siguiendo el enlace que te proporcionaremos). La tarjeta permanecer√° en el nuevo punto de entrega durante un tiempo limitado y despu√©s ser√° devuelta a N26. Te informaremos v√≠a email si esto √∫ltimo ocurre.
Ten en cuenta que:
Tu nueva N26 Mastercard estar√° all√≠ en 3 d√≠as h√°biles.(El env√≠o expr√©s no est√° disponible para la tarjeta Metal)
Las entregas se hacen entre las 08:00 y las 12:00 de la ma√±ana. 
Los env√≠os pueden realizarse mediante DHL Express a todos los pa√≠ses en los que trabajamos dentro de Europa. No es posible realizar env√≠os a otros pa√≠ses.
No es posible cancelar o cambiar el env√≠o express una vez que ya lo has elegido como modo de env√≠o.
Para cerrar una cuenta, deber√°s pagar el env√≠o express de tu tarjeta en caso de que lo hayas solicitado.
Si tu tarjeta no ha llegado en un plazo de 3-5 d√≠as laborables tras realizar el pedido, por favor, revisa el enlace de seguimiento de tu pedido para estar al corriente. Tambi√©n puedes usar el enlace de seguimiento para informar a DHL directamente sobre los detalles de la direcci√≥n de entrega, o para cambiar la direcci√≥n si sabes que no vas a poder estar ah√≠ en el momento de la entrega.
El env√≠o de las tarjetas est√°ndar y N26 You tienen un precio de 6‚Ç¨ y 25‚Ç¨ el env√≠o expr√©s (que incluye los 6‚Ç¨ de la sustituci√≥n de la tarjeta.) Para N26 Metal, el precio es de 45‚Ç¨ (solo env√≠o est√°ndar).

title: Come ricevere la mia carta pi√π velocemente con la consegna express?
content:
Non disponibile per carte Metal.
La consegna express √® un'ottima soluzione se hai bisogno di ricevere la tua carta in tempi brevi o se per qualche motivo la prima consegna non √® andata a buon fine.
Ti verr√† data la possibilit√† di selezionare la consegna express quando scegli un metodo di consegna per la tua prima carta o se riordini una carta. Riceverai, quindi, un link di tracciamento via email. Se non sei a casa al momento della consegna e la cassetta della posta non √® accessibile, la carta verr√† lasciata presso un punto di ritiro nelle vicinanze (puoi trovarlo tramite il link di tracciabilit√†). La carta sar√† custodita nel punto di ritiro per un periodo di tempo limitato, dopodich√© verr√† restituita a N26. In tal caso, ti contatteremo via e-mail.
Se selezioni la spedizione Express, ricorda che:
La tua nuova Mastercard N26 ti arriver√† entro 2 - 3 giorni lavorativi. 
L'opzione non √® disponibile per la carta Metal.
Le consegne possono avvenire tramite DHL Express in tutti i paesi supportati in Europa. Al momento non si effettuano consegne in altri Paesi.
Non √® possibile annullare o modificare una consegna express dopo che √® stata selezionata come metodo di consegna.
Per chiudere un conto, si dovr√† pagare la consegna express della carta.
Se la carta non √® arrivata entro 3-5 giorni lavorativi dall'ordine, controlla il link di tracciabilit√† per aggiornamenti. Puoi utilizzare il link anche per informare direttamente DHL sui dettagli dell‚Äôindirizzo di consegna o per reindirizzare la spedizione se non puoi essere presente al momento della consegna.
Le carte standard e N26 You hanno un costo di ‚Ç¨6 per spedizione ordinaria e di ‚Ç¨25 per spedizione express.¬†Per le carte N26 Metal, il costo √® di ‚Ç¨45 per spedizione standard.

title: How to top up by card, Apple Pay, and Google Pay
content:
You can now add money by using a debit or credit card as well as Apple or Google Pay. This is the fastest and easiest way to fund your N26 account.¬†


Adding money with a Debit or Credit card
Open your N26 app and navigate to the Actions tab
Just tap ‚ÄúAdd money‚Äù and select ‚ÄúCard transfer‚Äù
Choose an amount and enter your name on card, card number, expiration date and CVC (we never store your card information)
Follow the steps to confirm the payment
The money is available on your account instantly 

Adding money with a Apple or Google Pay
Open your N26 app and navigate to the Actions tab
Just tap ‚ÄúAdd money‚Äù and select ‚ÄúApple Pay‚Äù or ‚ÄúGoogle Pay‚Äù
Choose an amount¬†
Follow the steps to confirm the payment
The money is available on your account instantly

Accepted cards: 
Visa and Mastercard cards that have a 16-digit card number. 
Prepaid cards are not accepted (ex: Brand A, Brand B etc.). 
To find out more about the difference between debit, credit and prepaid cards read this article(new tab).¬†

Cost:
Whilst this is the fastest and easiest way to instantly add funds in your N26 account, for us, processing these instant top-up transactions is more expensive than other account funding methods(new tab) we offer.

For both methods, the first deposit is always free but extra deposits are charged a fee of 3% of the deposit amount. By charging a card or digital wallet, your money is not sent to N26 instantly, and the fee covers additional costs associated with funding accounts before the money is received so that it is instantly available for your use.

title: How to get a Basiskonto?
content:
Download the request form(new tab) and complete it with a handwritten signature.
Take your signed form and the attached PostIdent coupon to your nearest branch of Deutsche Post to prove your identity.
Once we‚Äôve received your form and determined whether we can open a Basiskonto for you, we‚Äôll send you an email including the contract and the T&Cs(new tab).
Send your signed contract to us at Klosterstra√üe 62, 10179 Berlin.
Once we‚Äôve received your contract, we‚Äôll open your account within 10 business days.
You‚Äôll then receive a notification about your card delivery and accessing your account.

title: How do I open an N26 account?
content:
Opening an N26 account is easy and can be done in 5 minutes. Think banking can‚Äôt be fast, flexible, and transparent? Think again.
You can open an account using your compatible phone or from the N26 website.¬† In order to open an account, you must:
Be at least 18 years old
Be a US Citizen or a US permanent resident with a valid social security number
Own a compatible phone
Here is how the account sign-up process works:
1. We will first ask you to provide us with the following personal information:
First & Last Name
Date of Birth
Social Security Number
Physical Home Address
Mobile Phone Number
Email Address
2. We will then verify your information and eligibility to sign up for the account. This process only takes a few minutes.
3. Once your information has been verified, the next step for you is to add money to your account.
You can initiate an ACH payment transfer from another bank using your N26 account number and routing number.¬†
4. Next, we will ship out your N26 Visa¬Æ debit card by USPS.
Look out for delivery within 5-7 business days.
That‚Äôs all there is to it. If you would like more information, just reach out to our fantastic customer support team via phone, chat, or email. 
Have questions about opening an N26 account in another country? Click here(new tab) to be taken to our EU Support Center to learn more. 
The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: How to prove my identity?
content:
As a licensed bank, it‚Äôs important that we know who our customers are. That‚Äôs why we request our customers to prove their identity with a supported ID document when they open an account or use certain products.
We would never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. We‚Äôve gathered other tips to help you protect your identity.
There are two different ways you can show us your ID, and we've also collected some troubleshooting tips for each: photo and video. The method you can choose to show us your ID depends on your nationality, your country of residence, and the type of ID you use:
I live in Germany(new tab)
I live in Spain(new tab)
I live in a different country(new tab)
If your ID isn't on the list, it means we cannot offer you an account with us at the time. We take identity verification very seriously and our Customer Support will not be able to make an exception for you regarding the supported documents.
But we're always adding new documents to this list so it's worth checking back to see if yours has been added.
In case your residential address is in Germany and you're unable to complete your photo or video verification due to a disability, please start the registration process by entering your details and then contact our Customer Support. We're happy to assist you.
Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.¬†

title: What if my balance is negative?
content:
Your balance can be negative as long as you‚Äôre within your¬†Overdraft¬†limit. 
If you have a negative account balance, you'll be charged an overdraft interest rate of 8.9%.
Otherwise, you‚Äôll receive an email to notify you that the authorized limit of your account has been exceeded. This means you don‚Äôt have enough funds on your account to cover future charges.
Even if you haven‚Äôt used your account since you opened it, certain charges still apply (such as N26 You or N26 Metal monthly fees or express delivery costs) and have resulted in a negative balance.
So you‚Äôll need to¬†top up your account¬†via SEPA transfer (choose international transfer if you‚Äôre making the transfer outside of Germany) or¬†CASH26¬†(if you‚Äôre in Germany or Austria). Your account will remain active for the next 60 days without doing so. At that point:
You‚Äôll receive two additional reminders (each cost ‚Ç¨3).
If you have an Overdraft: it‚Äôll be cancelled after the second reminder and you‚Äôll have to repay that amount immediately (or you can set up a repayment plan).
If you have an N26 You, N26 Metal, or N26 Business You account: all benefits will be cancelled after 60 days and your account will turn into a standard one.
If you don‚Äôt respond after 60 days, we may close your account.

title: How to cancel my N26 You or N26 Metal membership?
content:
N26 You(new tab) or¬†N26 Metal(new tab)¬†contracts have a term of one year. This contract automatically renews for another year unless you cancel it. 
In this article you will find the difference between revocation, cancellation of the membership and cancellation of the renewal of your membership. You have 3 options:
Revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period
Cancel your membership at any time up to 1 month before your contract ends
Stop your membership‚Äôs renewal up to 1 month before it expires
Find in details how to do so below. 
You can revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period. Simply open a chat with us and we'll assist you from there.
Keep in mind that if you cancel your contract before it ends, you won‚Äôt be able to sign up for the same membership plan in the future.
If you want to terminate your membership at any time up to *1 month before your contract ends and after the 14-day revocation period, please contact us.
If you choose this option all your N26 You or N26 Metal benefits will end, which includes your insurance coverage.
You have up to 4 weeks before your membership expires to cancel the renewal of your N26 You or N26 Metal membership. To do so:
Log into the mobile app and go to üë§ My Account
Select N26 You/Metal
Tap Membership details followed by Cancel Membership
 you can also see your membership expiration date here
Confirm the cancellation via the push message we send you
You can continue to use your N26 You or N26 Metal Mastercard fully until your membership expires. That means you‚Äôll keep your insurance coverage as long as you‚Äôre still required to pay your membership fee. After that, your Mastercard will work like a standard card without the benefits. We‚Äôll send you a standard card before your contract ends. No need to contact us about it.
We‚Äôll notify you of the renewal via email 8 weeks before your anniversary date.
If you want to definitely close your account, visit our article How to close my N26 account.

title: What does N26 do with my tax information?
content:
The OECD requires certain tax information to be shared by means of the Common Reporting Standard(new tab) (ECR). To carry out our obligations, we must establish which country you‚Äôre taxable in. We do this through your tax identification or National Insurance number. 
We forward this information via the German Federal Tax Office to tax authorities in other countries if: 
You live in a ECR participating country.
You have a postbox or a second registered address in another ECR participating country.
When registering you gave a telephone number belonging to another ECR participating country.
You have a standing order, or make regular payments, to an account located in another ECR participating country.
We also forward data to the U.S. Internal Revenue Service(new tab) (IRS) according to the Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act(new tab) (FATCA). We may request your Social Security Number (SSN) in order to check your tax status in the U.S. because:
You are a citizen of the U.S (including dual citizenship).
When registering you gave a telephone number belonging to the U.S.
You were born in the U.S. (or in a U.S. embassy located abroad).
You‚Äôre married to a U.S. national.
You gave us an address in the U.S.
You make regular payment transfers to the U.S.
To update your tax identification or social security number in the N26 app:
Go to  My Account and tap on Settings and Account settings
Select Personal settings then Tax information
Select the country in which you‚Äôre tax-liable
Enter either your tax identification number or your social security number
Important information
In Germany, we need your Steueridentifikationsnummer (11 digits) not your Steuernummer (9 digits).
If you‚Äôre not tax-liable in another country, contact us so we can confirm your tax status.
In each and every case your personal data will be securely stored and only used for the fulfillment of ECR and FATCA requirements.
We‚Äôre unable to advise you on your tax status. If you‚Äôre unsure of your status please discuss the matter with a tax advisor.
If you‚Äôve entered the country in which you are liable for tax but not your tax identification number, please remove the country from the list shown to you in the app, reenter the country, and enter your tax identification number again.

title: How to manage my visibility as an N26 user?
content:
To grant you access to all our in-app features, N26 matches your contact data with other N26 users.
In order to manage your consent to be seen as a N26 user, you can simply go to üë§ My Account in the app and selecting Settings then Personal Settings and Personal information. Then just check or uncheck the box ‚ÄúI agree to be identifiable for other users as N26 customer‚Äù.
All of your contacts who have an N26 account set to visible will show up in the in-app contact list. Similarly, you‚Äôll also appear in the list of other N26 customers who have your contact information. Your contact list is not permanently stored by N26 and is only used when accessing the respective N26 feature.
You can access to all our in-app features,¬†e.g.¬†MoneyBeam, which carries out real-time transactions without¬†typing in a 22-digit IBAN, but only by selecting a name from your contact list. Vice versa, you can also request money from people in your contact list who then only have to accept (or decline) your request. Also, being visible¬†enables you to use Shared Spaces, a sub-account, which you can share with other N26 users¬†selected from your contact list.

title: Wie aktiviere ich meine Karte?
content:
Um deine Karte verwenden zu k√∂nnen, musst du sie zuerst aktivieren. Das kannst du nur in der App tun, nachdem du dein¬†Smartphone mit deinem Konto verkn√ºpft¬†hast. Oder du kannst sie direkt in der WebApp(neuen Tab) aktivieren.
Zum Aktivieren brauchst du deine 10-stellige¬†Token-Nummer: Sie befindet sich unter deinem Namen auf der Vorderseite deiner Karte (oder auf der R√ºckseite, wenn du eine N26 You-, N26 Metal- oder Maestro-Karte hast). 
Um deine Karte in der App zu aktivieren:
Tippe im Hauptbildschirm auf Aktionen
W√§hle Karteneinstellungen und swipe ggf. zur Seite, bis du die richtige Karte ausgew√§hlt hast
Tippe auf Aktivieren
Um deine Karte im Online Banking zu aktivieren, w√§hle im Hauptbildschirm
 einfach Karte aktivieren.
Wenn du in Italien, Frankreich, Spanien, Irland, Griechenland, Finnland, Estland oder dem Vereinigten K√∂nigreich wohnst, musst du zuerst Geld an einem Geldautomaten abheben, bevor du deine Karte anderweitig verwenden kannst. 
Wenn du¬†mehrere Karten¬†hast (z. B. wenn du deine Karte mehrmals bestellt hast oder sich die Lieferung verz√∂gert hat), kannst du nur deine neueste Karte aktivieren. Alle fr√ºheren Karten werden dann deaktiviert.
Du musst diese Aktivierungsschritte jedes Mal ausf√ºhren, wenn du eine¬†neue Karte¬†bestellst, z. B. wenn deine Karte verloren geht, gestohlen wird, besch√§digt ist oder du dein Konto upgradest.
Nachdem du deine Karte aktiviert hast, ist der n√§chste Schritt die Auswahl einer¬†Karten-PIN.
Lieber Videos statt Text? Sieh dir das Tutorial(neuen Tab) auf unserem N26 Support YouTube(neuen Tab) Kanal an.

title: Wie lade ich Freunde zu N26 ein?
content:
Du kannst Freunde einladen, sobald du dein Konto vollst√§ndig er√∂ffnet hast. So funktioniert's:
Logge dich in die App ein
Auf deinem Hauptbildschirm, gehe zu ‚ÄúMein Konto‚Äù, indem du auf das üë§- Symbol in der oberen rechten Ecke des Bildschirms tippst
W√§hle das Geschenksymbol aus

title: Wo bleibt meine R√ºckerstattung?
content:
Deine R√ºckerstattung wird in der App am Tag der urspr√ºnglichen Transaktion angezeigt, nicht am Tag der R√ºckerstattung. Scrolle in deiner Umsatzliste nach unten oder lade deine Kontoausz√ºge herunter, um sie zu finden.
So kannst du deine (vorl√§ufigen und vergangenen) Kontoausz√ºge einsehen und als PDF herunterladen:
In der WebApp:(neuen Tab) Vom Hauptmen√º Transaktionen, klicke auf die Wolke in der oberen rechten Ecke, um zu Downloads zu kommen. Klicke dann auf Kontoausz√ºge.
In der Smartphone-App: 
iPhone: Tippe auf deinen aktuellen Kontostand und w√§hle¬†Kontoausz√ºge.
Android: Gehe zu Statistiken und tippe auf die drei Punkte am oberen rechten Bildschirmrand.

title: CRS - Why we require certain information from our customers
content:
N26 as a financial institution is (according to CRS) required to report information directly to tax authorities in the European Union concerning financial accounts held by customers who are tax resident in another country.
CRS stands for Common Reporting Standard. The CRS has been developed by the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD) and is a global reporting standard for the automatic exchange of information (AEOI). The goal of CRS is to allow tax authorities to obtain a clearer understanding of financial assets held abroad by their residents for tax purposes in order to fight tax evasion. More than 90 countries have agreed to share information on residents' assets and incomes in conformation with CRS.
In order for us to be able to accurately determine whether an account is to be reported to the tax authorities for CRS purposes, we need to ask you:
In which country(ies) are you a tax resident?¬†

You are normally a ‚Äútax resident‚Äù and therefore subject to tax on your worldwide income in the country where you have a residential address. If you have a place to live in more than one country, then there are normally ‚Äútie-breaker rules‚Äù included in double tax treaties and tax laws of the relevant countries that help determine where you are a tax resident. It may be that you are tax resident in more than one country during a year and, if so, we'd need to know both the country and your taxpayer identification number for each of them in order to accurately report the information to the relevant tax authorities.¬†

What is your taxpayer identification number (‚ÄúTIN‚Äù) for each country?

The issuance and format of a TIN differs by country. For EU countries, the European Commission has published guidance on TINs in each EU country(new tab), which may help you in identifying your individual TIN(s) in these countries.¬†
In case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the N26 app. To do this, simply log in to the N26 app and go to:
My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Tax Information¬†

title: How does N26 Business You work?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Sweden.
It‚Äôs not yet possible to switch between private and business accounts so it‚Äôs important to know if N26 Business You is right for you:
The N26 Business You account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can‚Äôt have your company‚Äôs name on the account or card. 
The account is ‚Ç¨9,90 per month. The minimum membership is one year. Your contract automatically renews if you do not cancel your membership(new tab) at least 4 weeks before the contract expires.  
The premium account includes: Allianz Insurance Package including coverage for business purposes and fee-free foreign currency ATM withdrawals, 
The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. It‚Äôs currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (it‚Äôs available in Germany and Austria, and the Netherlands).
Transfers in foreign currencies aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business You.
You can sign-up during registration or if you‚Äôre already an N26 Business user.
You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 14‚Ç¨ through your N26 app. 
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: Wie zahle ich Steuern auf N26 Savings und N26 Invest?
content:
Mit¬†N26 Savings¬†(nur Deutschland und √ñsterreich) und¬†N26 Invest¬†(nur Deutschland) sind unsere Partnerbanken gesetzlich verpflichtet, Steuern an die zust√§ndigen Steuerbeh√∂rden weiterzugeben.
J√§hrliche Steuerbescheinigungen halten wir jedes Jahr im April in der App f√ºr dich bereit.¬†Du findest diese auf der Registerkarte¬†Sparen und Anlegen. Wenn du weitere Unterlagen f√ºr deine Steuererkl√§rung ben√∂tigst, k√∂nnen wir dir einen Freistellungsauftrag f√ºr¬†N26 Invest¬†oder einen Verlustschein ausstellen.
Du kannst Befreiungen von der Kapitalertragsteuer und der Kirchensteuer beantragen.¬†
F√ºr N26 Invest findest du die erforderlichen Formulare im Abschnitt¬†Dokumente¬†im¬†Sparen und Anlegen Tab in der App. 
F√ºr N26 Savings findest du den¬†Freistellungsauftrag f√ºr Grenke Bank hier(neuen Tab) und f√ºr Greensill Bank hier(neuen Tab). Chatte mit uns und sende uns das ausgef√ºllte Dokument zu. Wir leiten deine Anfrage an unsere Partnerbank weiter.
Eink√ºnfte, die √ºber dem Kapitalertragsteuer-Freibetrag liegen, sind in Deutschland steuerpflichtig.¬†Neben der Kapitalertragsteuer unterliegen Anlagen dem Solidarit√§tszuschlag und der¬†Kirchensteuer.
Die Depotbank zieht automatisch alle anfallenden Steuern von deinen gesamten Einlagen ab, wenn du in Deutschland steuerpflichtig bist.¬†Das bedeutet, dass die potenziellen Renditen deiner Anlagen immer den Nettobetrag nach Steuern darstellen. Wenn du in Deutschland nicht steuerpflichtig bist, erh√§ltst du den Bruttobetrag deiner Ertr√§ge. Du bist dann f√ºr die Einreichung deiner Kapitalertragsteuer in dem Land, in dem du Steuern zahlst, selbst verantwortlich.

title: Wie sch√ºtzt N26 mein Geld?
content: Die¬†deutsche Einlagensicherung(neuen Tab)¬†versichert alle Einlagen¬†bis zu 100.000 ‚Ç¨¬†in den Mitgliedsstaaten der Europ√§ischen Union. Als Inhaber einer Banklizenz muss die N26 Bank die Vorschriften der Bundesanstalt f√ºr Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht einhalten.

title: Wie kontaktiere ich N26?
content:
Wenn du uns erreichen m√∂chtest, kannst du einen Chat in deiner App, WebApp oder unter einige Support Center-Artikel starten. Da wir eine Online-Bank sind, haben wir keine Filialen.
Vergewissere dich zun√§chst,¬†dass du die neueste App-Version installiert hast. Falls nicht, lade dir das Update im¬†Apple App Store(neuen Tab)¬†oder¬†Google Play Store(neuen Tab)¬†herunter.
Wenn du √ºber die¬†WebApp(neuen Tab)¬†in dein Konto eingeloggt bist, findest du den Chat in der unteren rechten Ecke.
Um von deinem Smartphone zu chatten, gehe zu¬†üë§ Mein Konto¬†und¬†Support. Scrolle nach unten und w√§hle unter¬†Kontakt¬†den¬†Kundendienst-Chat.
Dort wird dir dein Platz in der Warteliste angezeigt. Halte deine Mastercard bereit; das ist zwar optional, aber du bekommst einen schnelleren Service.
Du erreichst uns t√§glich von 07:00 - 23:00 Uhr, auch an Sonn- und Feiertagen.
Bitte kontaktiere uns √ºber diesen Artikel wenn du eine Bank oder eine andere Beh√∂rde vertrittst(neuen Tab).

title: Come fare un reclamo?
content:
Per noi √® importante essere informati quando hai un problema con uno dei nostri prodotti o servizi. Se ti serve aiuto con il tuo conto, il nostro Servizio Clienti sar√† in grado di fornire un‚Äôadeguata soluzione alle tue richieste in modo rapido e veloce. Contattaci via chat direttamente dalla app o dalla WebApp. 
Qualora non riuscissimo a risolvere il problema in modo soddisfacente, mettiamo a disposizione dei nostri clienti un ufficio dedicato alla gestione dei reclami.
Un reclamo pu√≤ essere inviato per iscritto a:
N26 Bank GmbH - Ufficio Reclami Italia
Klosterstra√üe 62, 10179 Berlino, Germania
In alternativa, pu√≤ essere inviato via email a: reclami@n26.com oppure attraverso un messaggio di posta elettronica certificata (PEC) a: reclami@pec.n26.com
L‚Äôindicazione dei propri dati identificativi (nome, cognome, codice fiscale), del numero di conto corrente e dei motivi del reclamo rendono pi√π agevole l‚Äôelaborazione del reclamo da parte nostra. Se viene presentato per mezzo di un rappresentante, il reclamo deve anche essere accompagnato da apposita procura autenticata.
N26 si impegna a rispondere entro:
30 giorni solari per i reclami relativi a operazioni e servizi bancari e finanziari;
15 giorni lavorativi per i reclami relativi ai servizi di pagamento come bonifici, disposizioni permanenti di pagamenti, addebiti su carte di debito e altro. Nel caso in cui non sia possibile per noi rispettare il termine dei 15 giorni, N26 invier√† una risposta interlocutoria indicando le ragioni del ritardo e il termine entro il quale verr√† fornita la risposta definitiva, in ogni caso entro il termine massimo di 35 giorni lavorativi.
I reclami presentati con modalit√† diverse da quelle sopra esposte oppure inviati a indirizzi diversi da quelli indicati, si considereranno pervenuti nel momento in cui saranno recapitati all‚ÄôUfficio Reclami.¬†
Se il reclamo √® ritenuto fondato, N26 comunicher√† al cliente le iniziative che si impegna ad assumere ed i relativi tempi di realizzazione.
Se il reclamo √® ritenuto infondato, N26 provveder√† a fornire un‚Äôillustrazione chiara delle motivazioni del rigetto. Fornir√†, inoltre, indicazioni sulla possibilit√† di ricorrere a strumenti alternativi per la risoluzione della controversia.

Nel caso in cui non riuscissimo a trovare una soluzione soddisfacente per il cliente, √® possibile:
presentare un ricorso all‚ÄôArbitro Bancario Finanziario(nuova tabella)
rivolgersi al Conciliatore Bancario Finanziario(nuova tabella)
L‚Äô ABF e il CBF sono due sistemi di risoluzione alternativa delle controversie, che intervengono nel momento in cui il cliente non riceve risposta oppure se la risoluzione proposta √® ritenuta insoddisfacente.
In alternativa, si pu√≤ ricorrere ad un altro organismo specializzato iscritto nell‚Äôapposito registro tenuto dal Ministero della Giustizia. L‚Äôelenco degli organismi di mediazione √® disponibile sul sito www.giustizia.it.
Infine, la Commissione Europea ha messo a disposizione la Risoluzione delle Controversie Online (ODR(nuova tabella)), una piattaforma per aiutare i consumatori a contestare i contratti online in via stragiudiziale.

title: How to top up my account?
content:
Once you are successfully verified, you'll be able to top up your account in several ways:
CASH26 (in Germany, Austria, and Italy). Deposit cash through our partner stores;
MoneyBeam. Instantly receive money from other N26 users;
Debit card. You can add money to your account by entering the card details from your other account within the N26 app. You can choose to deposit between 20‚Ç¨ and 150‚Ç¨. Please note that prepaid cards are not accepted. Likewise, we don‚Äôt support American Express credit cards.
Apple Pay or Google Pay(new tab). You can add money to your account by using Apple Pay (for iOS devices) or GPay (for Android devices).You can choose to deposit between 20‚Ç¨ and 150‚Ç¨. Please note that prepaid cards are not accepted. Likewise, we don‚Äôt support American Express credit cards.
SEPA transfer. The transfer must be in EUR and within SEPA. You‚Äôll just need to provide your IBAN and your name as it‚Äôs written on the ID you used to create your account. You should also know that: 
For the transfer details, make sure the recipient‚Äôs name is your name as it‚Äôs written on the identity document you used to prove your identity (especially if you have an N26 Business account ‚Äì we don‚Äôt accept company names). 
The transfer will be instant if the sending bank support SEPA instant outgoing transfers, if not, it will completed within one banking day. Due to the opening times of the participating banks, one banking day may stretch to two working days.
In France, your first transfer can only be sent from another one of your accounts. For all other regions, you can use any other bank account to make the transfer (it doesn‚Äôt have to be under your name). 
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: How to use Moneybeam?
content:
MoneyBeam allows you to send money to your smartphone‚Äôs contacts without knowing their bank account details. In order to send a MoneyBeam, log into the app:
From the Home screen choose the Actions tab,

Tap Send Money followed by the MoneyBeam option,

Either select a contact from your phone‚Äôs contact list or add a recipient manually, using their phone number or email address. For this to work, the recipient has to be visible as an N26 customer,

Enter the amount and a reference text,

Confirm with your Confirmation PIN and the push message you receive.
N26 customers will receive the transfer instantly. You can send up to ‚Ç¨1.000 to other N26 customers within a 24-hour period.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: Warum ist mein Online-Einkauf fehlgeschlagen?
content:
Tipps und Tricks f√ºr eine erfolgreiche Online-Zahlung:
 Wenn du die Push-Nachricht nicht innerhalb von 5 Minuten best√§tigen kannst, starte einfach den Bezahlvorgang auf der Website des H√§ndlers neu.
Wenn du keine Push-Nachricht erh√§ltst, stelle bitte sicher, dass dein Smartphone verkn√ºpft ist und Push-Nachrichten auf deinem Smartphone aktiviert sind. 
Gehe sicher, dass Online- und Auslandszahlungen in deinen Karteneinstellungen aktiviert sind.
Du brauchst eine stabile Internetverbindung.
Wenn du ein iOS-Ger√§t verwendest, muss der Nicht St√∂ren-Modus deaktiviert sein.
Wenn der Betrag auf der Website des H√§ndlers von dem Betrag in der Push-Mitteilung abweicht, kann das an Kursschwankungen bei der Umrechnung einer Fremdw√§hrung in Euro liegen.
Alle Adblocker in deinem Browser m√ºssen deaktiviert sein.
Deine Maestro kann nicht f√ºr Online-Zahlungen verwendet werden.

title: FATCA - Why we require certain information from our customers
content:
As a financial institution, N26 is required to report information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers or by foreign entities (in which U.S. taxpayers hold a substantial ownership interest according to FATCA) to the United States Department of Treasury and the Internal Revenue Service (‚ÄúIRS‚Äù).
FATCA is an acronym for Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act and is a legislation designed to prevent tax evasion. Another purpose of FATCA is to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets. You can find more information about FATCA on the IRS website(new tab).
The U.S. tax system includes U.S. citizens who are not presently residing in the U.S. In comparison. So in order for us to be able to accurately determine whether your account is to be reported to the IRS, we‚Äôll need to ask you:
Are you (also) a citizen or green card holder of the United States?¬†

Are you subject to tax in the U.S?

Being ‚Äúsubject to tax‚Äù in the U.S. does not necessarily mean that you‚Äôre also paying personal income tax in the U.S. It means that U.S. tax law requires you to file a tax return and declare your (worldwide) income to the IRS, even if you don‚Äôt end up paying any U.S. tax.

If so, what is your U.S. Taxpayer Identification Number?

As a U.S. TIN you can either use your U.S. Social Security Number (‚ÄúSSN‚Äù) or your U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN). You can find more information about TIN on the IRS' website(new tab).
Additionally, if your account shows:
A U.S. place of birth, 
A U.S. telephone number,
A standing order to the U.S.
then we are required by FATCA legislation to initially assume that you are subject to FATCA until you can specifically confirm to us otherwise.
In case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the N26 app. To do this, simply log in to the N26 app and go to:
My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Tax Information¬†

title: What if I have a negative balance?
content:
You are not permitted to overdraw your N26 account. ¬†If the available balance in your account is not sufficient to cover a payment you have authorized, that payment will be rejected.  However, your account balance may go negative in cases of technical overdraft - this occurs when you don't have enough money in your account to cover certain N26 account fees, such as a card replacement fee.
If your account balance does become negative, you must immediately make a deposit to cover the negative balance.  For information on how to make a deposit to your account, please see ‚ÄúHow to Add Money to My N26 Account(new tab)‚Äù.


The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: How to export a list of my transactions?
content:
Our¬†web app(new tab)¬†allows you to search within your transactions. You can also download a history of your transactions in CSV format. To export your transaction list:

Under CSV you can select the Start Date and End Date and Download CSV
You can also sort your transactions using¬†categories and hashtags¬†in the app.
To view and download PDFs of your (preliminary and previous) monthly balance statements:

title: Where is my refund?
content:
Your refund will be visible in the app on the day of the original transaction, not the refund date. Scroll down your transaction list or download your previous balance statements to find it.
To view and download PDFs of your (preliminary and previous) monthly balance statements:
On the WebApp(new tab): From Transactions, click on the cloud icon in the upper-right corner to reach Downloads then select Bank statements.

On the mobile app:

For Androids, you'll find the option under Statistics (just tap the 3 dots in the top right-hand corner).

title: Perch√© ho un addebito doppio?
content:
Nel momento in cui effettui pagamenti con carta avvengono due principali tipologie di transazioni:
La pre-autorizzazione, che¬†√® una transazione che prevede il blocco di un certo importo da parte di un venditore di prodotti o servizi per verificare la validit√† della carta o la presenza di fondi sul conto dei clienti. Le pre-autorizzazioni sono molto frequenti per confermare prenotazioni alberghiere oppure il noleggio di auto.
L'addebito, che √® la transazione con la quale l'importo viene effettivamente detratto dal conto. 
Nel momento in cui viene effettuata una pre-autorizzazione, questa pu√≤ diventare un addebito sul conto, pu√≤ essere respinta oppure scadere. Nell'ultimo caso, l'importo ritorna automaticamente sul tuo conto entro i successivi 12 giorni. Gli importi preautorizzati nel caso di noleggio auto possono richiedere fino a 30 giorni prima di essere nuovamente disponibili sul conto. 
Potrebbe essere di tuo interesse sapere che:
Talvolta sul conto appaiono sia l'autorizzazione che l'addebito. Questo accade, ad esempio, nel caso di pagamento offline, quindi non in tempo reale, oppure a causa di problemi tecnici al terminale di pagamento. Anche in questi casi, l'autorizzazione scadr√† nei tempi indicati. Nel caso non dovesse succedere, contattaci via chat e ti aiuteremo a recuperare i tuoi soldi.
L'importo della pre-autorizzazione pu√≤ essere diverso da quello dell'addebito finale del conto per vari motivi.

Check your document.
We only accept photos of your original ID (photocopies or screenshots are not permitted).
Keep your document on a flat surface and make sure your document is fully visible and the information on it is readable.
We only accept national IDs and passports.
Make sure your document isn't damaged in any way.
If you take a picture of your ID and a selfie and the first attempt doesn‚Äôt go through, you can just start over again.
As soon as your verification is complete, we‚Äôll send you your N26 Mastercard.¬†Deliveries¬†take up to 10 days.

content:
‚ÑπÔ∏èDisponibile in Germania, Austria, Francia, Spagna, Italia, Belgio, Estonia, Finlandia, Grecia, Irlanda, Lettonia, Lituania, Lussemburgo, Olanda, Portogallo, Slovacchia, Polonia, Svezia, Danimarca, Norvegia, Islanda e Liechtenstein.

Assicurazione viaggio. Rimborso delle spese mediche all'estero in caso di annullamento del viaggio per un'emergenza medica, rimborso delle spese sostenute in caso di ritardo del volo superiore a 4 ore, rimborso delle spese sostenute in caso di ritardo del bagaglio imbarcato superiore a 6 ore e rimborso delle spese di rimpatrio per motivi sanitari.

Carta aggiuntiva. Puoi ordinare una seconda Mastercard N26 You direttamente tramite la app N26 per un costo di ‚Ç¨14, una tantum.

N26 Metal include una Mastercard abilitata NFC con un'anima in metallo in un colore a tua scelta fra nero carbone, rosa quarzo o grigio perla.
Se sei un nuovo cliente, il primo canone sar√† detratto 15 giorni dopo l‚Äôaccertamento dell'identit√†. Da quel momento in poi, il canone mensile verr√† addebitato alla data di iscrizione.
Per ricevere la carta, ricorda di effettuare una ricarica dopo aver completato l‚Äôapertura del conto. Il saldo dovr√† poter coprire il costo della prima mensilit√† del tuo conto Metal.
Se passi a N26 Metal, il canone mensile verr√† detratto direttamente dal tuo conto N26 ogni mese a partire dalla data dell'upgrade.
Se hai effettuato l'upgrade a N26 You, tutti gli acquisti e i viaggi prenotati con la Mastercard N26 You rimarranno assicurati.

title: Wie √§ndere ich meine Best√§tigungs-PIN?
content:

Gehe in der App zu üë§ Mein Konto, dann Einstellungen und Sicherheit oder Sicherheitseinstellungen in der WebApp(neuen Tab)

Aus Sicherheitsgr√ºnden die Best√§tigungs-PIN keine Teile deines Geburtsdatums oder deiner Adresse, wiederholte Ziffern (z. B. 1111, 111 oder 11) oder Sequenzen (z. B. 1234 oder 4321) enthalten. Wenn die von dir gew√§hlte PIN nicht akzeptiert wird, versuche es bitte mit einer anderen Kombination.

title: How to save the details of a transfer recipient?
content:
Every time you make a transfer to a new recipient in the app (tap + then¬†Transfer¬†and¬†Add new recipient), some details like the recipient‚Äôs name and IBAN are automatically saved in your transfer contact list for future transfers. You can also delete contacts or view your transaction history with them:
iOS: swipe a contact entry to the left in order to show the transaction history or delete the entry.
Android: tap and hold on a contact entry in order to show the transaction history or delete the entry.
Keep in mind that deleting a contact entry doesn‚Äôt delete your transaction history with them.

title: Why can‚Äôt I see other N26 users on MoneyBeam?
content:
To carry out real-time transactions such as MoneyBeams, N26 checks your smartphone‚Äôs contact list and finds other N26 users based on saved phone numbers and emails. 
If you don‚Äôt see your friend‚Äôs name on MoneyBeam but you know they‚Äôre an N26 user, they most likely haven‚Äôt made themselves visible. Indeed you can revoke your consent to be identifiable as an N26 user.
During your first MoneyBeam transaction (after importing your contacts) you‚Äôll receive a prompt to either change your visibility settings or be reminded of them later.
Most MoneyBeam transfers that fail between N26 users happen because there are multiple phone numbers or emails listed in the contact entry of a phone's address book. 
You‚Äôll know this is the case if your friend doesn‚Äôt immediately receive your transfer (by the way: this money will bounce back to your account within a week).
To avoid this, find out which email and phone number your friend uses for their N26 account and make sure to send the MoneyBeam to it.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ¬£10 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our Refer a Friend Program.

Despu√©s ver√°s tu posici√≥n en la cola hasta que te responda un agente. Ten tu Mastercard a mano, ¬°la vas a necesitar pronto!

title: How to order my card with express delivery?
content:
Not available for Metal cards.
Express delivery is a good option if you need your card in a hurry or if postal deliveries have sometimes failed to reach you for whatever reason.
You‚Äôll be given the option to select express delivery when choosing a delivery method for your first card or if you¬†reorder a card. You‚Äôll then receive a tracking link by email. If you‚Äôre not home during the delivery and your mailbox can‚Äôt be accessed, the card will be left at a nearby access point (you can find it through the provided tracking link). The card only stays at the access point for a limited amount of time. After that, it‚Äôll be returned to us. We‚Äôll inform you by email if that happens.
If you order via express delivery, keep in mind that:
Your new Standard or N26 You Mastercard will be delivered within 2-3 working days. Express delivery is not available for Metal cards.
Deliveries take place between 08:00 and 12:00. 
Deliveries can be made by DHL express to all of our supported countries within Europe. It‚Äôs currently not possible to make deliveries to other countries.
It‚Äôs not possible to cancel or change an express delivery once it‚Äôs been selected as the delivery method.
To close an account, you must pay for the express delivery of your card.
If your card hasn‚Äôt arrived within 3-5 working days of placing your order, please check the tracking link for an update. You can also use the tracking link to inform DHL directly about the details of your delivery address or to redirect the shipment if you can‚Äôt be there at the time of delivery.
N26 Standard and N26 You cards have a fee of ‚Ç¨6 for standard shipping and ‚Ç¨25 for express shipping (which includes the ‚Ç¨6 card replacement fee).

title: How does N26 protect my money?
content: German deposit protection(new tab)¬†insures all deposits¬†up to ‚Ç¨100.000¬†held in the member states of the European Union. Customers with an account in the UK are protected up to the equivalent amount in GBP based on the exchange rate of the respective day. As the holder of a banking license, N26 Bank must comply with the rules of the German financial regulatory authority.

title: What is the maximum I can spend?
content:
The maximum¬†daily¬†limits (total sum within 24 hours) for card payments are:
ATM withdrawals: ‚Ç¨2.500 (or ‚Ç¨400 in Togo, Congo, Benin, Ivory Coast, Kenya, Cameroon, Nigeria, Senegal and Algeria)
In-store or online payments: ‚Ç¨5.000
You can¬†set your own¬†daily ATM withdrawal and payment limits within our limits directly in the app by tapping¬†üë§ My Account¬†then¬†Card settings.
The maximum¬†daily¬†limits (rolling 24 hours) for bank transfers are:
MoneyBeam to N26 customers (the recipient must be visible): ‚Ç¨1.000
Outgoing transfers: ‚Ç¨50.000
Incoming transfers: No limit
The maximum¬†monthly¬†limit (total sum) for card transactions is ‚Ç¨20.000*. 
*a monthly limit of ‚Ç¨10.000 applies to ATM withdrawals for customers who opened their account in France. 
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: How to request the average annual balance
content:
The average annual balance is the mean balance of your bank account calculated over a timeframe of a year and based upon daily closing balances over that specific period of time.¬†
You can request it even if you‚Äôve opened your N26 bank account less than a year ago. 
The average balance is required in order to request your ISEE and receive social benefits.
To request the average annual balance related to your N26 account, you‚Äôll need to:
have opened an account with N26 within the reference year
have your legal address in Italy
If you need to know the average balance for last year, contact us via chat through the N26 app. You will receive the calculation of your average balance via email in about 3 working days.

title: How to connect or disconnect my smartphone to my account?
content:
In order to use your N26 account, you need a smartphone : either an iPhone (5s or newer, at least iOS 11) or an Android (6.0 or newer - we do not support the customized versions of Amazon Fire and Oxygen OS). Only one device can be paired per account.
You'll need to pair and/or unpair your smartphone when you first create an account or if you get a new phone number or device.
To pair your smartphone with your account, simply open the app on your smartphone. You will be asked to¬†confirm your mobile phone number.
Enter the¬†4-digit code we send you via SMS¬†and your phone is paired. 
If you want to pair a new device, you must unpair your old device for¬†security reasons. You can do this in¬†üë§ My Account¬†(mobile app) or in the¬†Web app(new tab)¬†under¬†üë§ My Account¬†then¬†Security Settings if you don‚Äôt have access to your smartphone anymore. You‚Äôll receive an email from us with further instructions.
If you log into your N26 account with a new device, you'll receive two codes ‚Äì a Login SMS code with 6 digits and Pairing SMS code with 4 digits. You'll need the Login code to access your account and the Pairing code for pairing your device.

title: Why can‚Äôt I get a Basiskonto?
content:
Under some circumstances, N26 is allowed to reject your Basiskonto request. That‚Äôs the case if you:
Live outside of a supported country.
Already have an N26 bank account or another bank account in Germany and can use it to its full extent. 
Were convicted of a crime against the bank, its employees, or its customers within the past 3 years. 
Have already maintained a Basiskonto at N26 in the past that was closed due to prohibited usage or a negative balance. 
You didn‚Äôt meet minimum requirements in accordance to the Money Laundering Act and the Credit Services Act.

title: Where does N26 invest my money?
content:
We strive to provide our clients' deposits for loans to our customers (provided that they have the appropriate credit rating). For the liquidity not required in the customer business, our investment strategy is low in risk.
We invest our customers' money at short notice with the Deutsche Bundesbank and other European banks in the eurozone with only good risk classes. And we refinance public-law customers mainly in Germany (cities and municipalities) and invest in euro government bonds
We're not a trading book institute. That is: we do not trade for short-term profit.
And we don't engage in speculation, whether on food, foreign exchange, bitcoins or other asset classes.

title: Perch√© il mio trasferimento √® ancora in sospeso nell'app di N26?
content:
Avrai bisogno del tuo PIN di conferma per finalizzare tutti i trasferimenti, sia¬†MoneyBeam¬†che bonifici periodici o¬†CASH26. Il trasferimento rimarr√† in sospeso fino a quando non lo confermerai o lo annullerai tramite un messaggio push nell‚Äôapp.
Il PIN di conferma √® diverso dal¬†PIN della carta, ma √® possibile utilizzare lo stesso numero per entrambi. Ti verr√† chiesto di scegliere un PIN di conferma appena¬†colleghi lo smartphone¬†(invece il PIN della carta potrai selezionarlo dopo aver attivato la carta)
Se si inserisce il PIN di conferma in modo errato per 6 volte di seguito, il PIN verr√† bloccato per motivi di sicurezza.
