title: Come guadagnare soldi invitando amici in N26?
content:
Ricevi 15‚Ç¨ ogni volta che un amico apre un conto N26 tramite il tuo invito (fino a un massimo di ‚Ç¨ 1500). 
Puoi iniziare a invitare amici tramite app oppure WebApp(nuova tabella) appena avrai accesso al tuo conto.
Per ricevere il bonus, il tuo amico dovr√†:
completare la registrazione utilizzando il tuo link di riferimento* o codice personale.
attivare la Mastercard N26.
completare una transazione (tramite POS, online o presso uno sportello ATM) con la Mastercard N26 dal valore minimo di 15‚Ç¨.
Per invitare i tuoi amici:
accedi all'app N26 e seleziona üë§ Il mio conto, in alto a destra nella schermata
seleziona Invita un amico e poi il tuo Codice di riferimento per copiarlo
scegli come condividere il tuo invito
aggiungi un messaggio per il tuo amico oppure inserisci un messaggio predefinito (opzionale) 
invia l'invito.
Una volta che il tuo amico avr√† soddisfatto i requisiti, riceverai il bonus entro 60 giorni. Puoi controllare lo stato del tuo bonus dalla app N26, sia mobile che web. Se il tuo bonus non √® stato ancora accreditato, leggi questo articolo per scoprire perch√©.
*¬†Il link non scade e pu√≤ essere utilizzato in qualsiasi momento. I codici e i link di invito personali devono essere utilizzati solo a scopo personale e non commerciale. Ci√≤ significa che puoi condividere il tuo link di invito con i tuoi contatti personali tramite i social media se sei il principale proprietario dei contenuti. N26 ha il diritto di annullare il programma Invita un amico in qualsiasi momento.
Al momento, il programma 'Invita un amico' √® presente nei seguenti paesi: Germania, Austria, Italia, Francia, Spagna, Belgio, Lussemburgo, Grecia, Portogallo, Irlanda, Olanda, Finlandia, Estonia, Svezia, Svizzera, Norvegia, Danimarca, Polonia, Islanda e Liechtenstein. 
Puoi trovare maggiori informazioni nei¬†Termini e condizioni del programma Invita un amico(nuova tabella).

title: How does 3D Secure work?
content:
3D Secure protects you from online card fraud. It‚Äôs automatically activated when you activate your card in the app. No additional passwords are required.
Whenever you make an online payment using your Mastercard, 3D Secure confirms the transaction with you within 5 minutes via a¬†push message. If you don't see the transaction, try some of the¬†troubleshooting tips¬†we've collected.
If you make a purchase using your smartphone, you‚Äôll see a pending transaction in the app. Tap on the bell icon and the push message will appear for you to confirm and finalize your purchase. Then go back to the merchant‚Äôs website. You should see a confirmation of your successful purchase within a few moments.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: Wie kann ich mich ausweisen?
content:
Als Bank m√ºssen wir wissen, wer du bist. Deshalb musst du uns ein zul√§ssiges Ausweisdokument vorzeigen, wenn du ein Konto er√∂ffnen oder bestimmte Produkte nutzen m√∂chtest.
Wir werden dich niemals danach fragen, deine Identit√§t √ºber andere Personen oder Unternehmen nachzuweisen. Wir haben einige Tipps gesammelt, um deine Identit√§t zu sch√ºtzen.
Du kannst uns deinen Ausweis mit zwei verschiedenen Methoden zeigen: Foto oder Video. Welches der beiden Verfahren gew√§hlt wird, h√§ngt von deiner Nationalit√§t, deinem Ausweisdokument und dem Land deines Wohnsitzes ab:
Ich lebe in Deutschland(neuen Tab)
Ich wohne au√üerhalb Deutschlands(neuen Tab)
Wenn dein Ausweisdokument nicht auf der Liste steht, k√∂nnen wir dir derzeit kein Konto anbieten. Wir nehmen die Identit√§tspr√ºfung sehr ernst und unser Kundenservice kann bez√ºglich der unterst√ºtzten Dokumente keine Ausnahme f√ºr dich machen.
Wir erweitern diese Liste aber st√§ndig; es lohnt sich also, sie im Auge zu behalten.
Falls dein Wohnsitz in Deutschland liegt und du die Foto- oder Videoverifizierung aufgrund einer Behinderung nicht abschlie√üen kannst, beginne bitte mit der Registrierung deiner Daten und kontaktiere dann unseren Kundensupport. Wir helfen dir gerne weiter.
Du erreichst uns im Chat t√§glich von 07:00 - 23:00 Uhr, auch an Sonn- und Feiertagen.

title: How to give feedback or suggest a new product?
content:
We frequently send short surveys to review feedback but participation is voluntary and anonymous. For individual questions or suggestions, you can send us your feedback to¬†ideas@n26.com(new tab). We‚Äôre always grateful if you can take a minute or two to help us get even better.
And if you ever feel dissatisfied with one of our products or services, you can also¬†file a complaint.

title: Come funziona N26 Business?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Vale per Austria, Belgio, Danimarca, Estonia, Finlandia, Francia, Germania, Grecia, Islanda, Irlanda, Italia, Liechtenstein, Lussemburgo, Paesi Bassi, Norvegia, Polonia, Portogallo, Slovacchia, Slovenia, Spagna, Svezia e Svizzera.
Al momento non √® possibile passare da un conto privato ad un conto business, quindi, √® importante capire se N26 Business sia la scelta giusta per te. Qui di seguito ne troverai le caratteristiche:
√à concepito per¬†lavoratori autonomi e liberi professionisti: non √® possibile intestare il conto n√© la carta a nome di un'azienda.
La Mastercard N26 Business √® destinata esclusivamente a un uso commerciale. Ogni mese ricevi lo 0,1% di cashback su tutti i pagamenti effettuati con la carta di debito. 
Non √® possibile avere contemporaneamente due conti N26 ma se hai bisogno di una carta per le spese personali e apri il tuo conto N26 Business You in Germania, Austria e Paesi Bassi, puoi ordinare una carta Maestro.

title: Les pr√©l√®vements automatiques SEPA peuvent-ils √™tre accept√©s si le solde de mon compte est insuffisant ?
content:
Si votre compte ne dispose pas des fonds suffisants lors d‚Äôun pr√©l√®vement automatique*, nous devons le refuser et nous vous facturons les frais de gestion engendr√©s, conform√©ment √† nos tarifs. Pour chaque pr√©l√®vement refus√©, nous vous facturons une somme forfaitaire de¬†3 ‚Ç¨. En outre, en cas de d√©couvert exceptionnel, nous appliquons un taux d'int√©r√™t sur le d√©couvert de 8,9 %.
Il n‚Äôest pas possible de retarder un pr√©l√®vement automatique.
√Ä l'avenir, vous pouvez v√©rifier si vous √™tes √©ligible √† un¬†d√©couvert autoris√©¬†sur votre application mobile (disponible uniquement en Allemagne et en Autriche).
*En Pologne, Su√®de, Danemark et en Norv√®ge, si vous mettez en place un pr√©l√®vement automatique avec un marchand et qu‚Äôil est factur√© dans la devise locale de votre pays, le taux de change appliqu√© (et donc le montant final d√©bit√© sur votre compte N26) est d√©fini par la banque qui re√ßoit votre paiement.
Vous souhaitez parler de nous √† vos amis ? Recevez 15 ‚Ç¨ √† chaque fois que l‚Äôun d‚Äôentre eux nous rejoint. D√©couvrez notre¬†programme de parrainage.

title: Who can get a Basiskonto?
content:
You can open a free N26 bank account through our website or by downloading our app. 
The German Payment Accounts Act (Zahlungskontengesetz or ZKG) also gives all consumers who legally reside in the European Union the right to hold a basic payment account. This applies to those who live in a supported country.
The N26 Basiskonto comes with a monthly 6‚Ç¨ account management fee. You can find all other fees in our pricing lists. 
If you don‚Äôt have a bank account at N26 or at any other financial institution in Germany yet, you can apply. Under some circumstances, N26 is allowed to reject your request. ¬†
Please note that some products and services such as N26 Overdraft, N26 Credit, N26 You, or N26 Metal are not accessible with an N26 Basiskonto.

title: ¬øC√≥mo cancelar la cuenta N26 You o N26 Metal?
content:
Los contratos de¬†N26 You(pesta√±a nueva)¬†o¬†N26 Metal(pesta√±a nueva)¬†tienen una duraci√≥n de un a√±o. Este contrato se renueva autom√°ticamente durante otro a√±o salvo que lo canceles. 
En este art√≠culo te explicamos la diferencia entre revocar la suscripci√≥n o cancelar la suscripci√≥n. Tienes varias opciones:
Revocar tu suscripci√≥n dentro del periodo de revocaci√≥n de 14 d√≠as.
Cancelar tu suscripci√≥n inmediatamente (despu√©s del periodo de revocaci√≥n de 14 d√≠as).
A continuaci√≥n te explicamos detalladamente c√≥mo hacerlo.
Si quieres revocar tu suscripci√≥n, puedes hacerlo dentro del periodo de revocaci√≥n de 14 d√≠as desde que firmas el contrato. Solo necesitamos que nos env√≠es un correo a support@n26.com desde tu direcci√≥n de email registrada o nos contactes por chat. Cuando nos escribas, especifica que quieres revocar tu suscripci√≥n y, si procede, a qu√© tipo de cuenta te gustar√≠a pasar despu√©s.
Por √∫ltimo, te informamos de que si cancelaras tu suscripci√≥n antes de que termine el contrato, no podr√≠as volver a registrarte para la misma suscripci√≥n en el futuro.
Si quieres¬†cancelar tu suscripci√≥n¬†antes de que termine el contrato (despu√©s del periodo de revocaci√≥n de 14 d√≠as), necesitamos que contactes con nosotros. 
Al elegir esta opci√≥n, perder√°s todos los beneficios de N26 You o Metal, entre ellos la cobertura del seguro.
Puedes cancelar la renovaci√≥n de tu suscripci√≥n N26 You¬†o¬†N26 Metal hasta 4 semanas antes de que termine el contrato y se renueve. Es muy f√°cil, solo tienes que entrar en la app y hacer lo siguiente:
Entra en üë§Mi cuenta.
Selecciona¬†N26 You o¬†N26 Metal.
Pulsa en Detalles de tu plan
Haz clic en¬†Cancelar plan (aqu√≠ tambi√©n puedes ver el d√≠a en que caduca tu contrato).
Confirma la cancelaci√≥n mediante la notificaci√≥n emergente que aparecer√°.
Puedes seguir utilizando la Mastercard N26 You o Metal hasta que tu contrato expire/caduque. Esto quiere decir que estar√°s cubierto y seguir√°s abonando la tarifa hasta entonces. Despu√©s, tu tarjeta Mastercard You o Metal pasar√° a funcionar como una tarjeta est√°ndar, sin los beneficios adicionales. Te enviaremos una tarjeta est√°ndar antes de que termine el contrato para sustituir a la N26 You o Metal. Para esto no hace falta que te pongas en contacto con nosotros, lo haremos de forma autom√°tica.
Te avisaremos por email de la renovaci√≥n de tu contrato 8 semanas antes de la fecha de renovaci√≥n.
Si quieres¬†cerrar tu cuenta completamente, visita este art√≠culo sobre c√≥mo cerrar la cuenta.

title: Que faire si je ne peux pas rembourser mon cr√©dit ou mon d√©couvert ?
content:
Si vous ne pouvez pas payer votre¬†cr√©dit N26¬†ou votre¬†d√©couvert¬†(uniquement disponible en Allemagne et en Autriche), nous pouvons vous proposer diff√©rents plans de remboursement. Cela peut arriver si votre autorisation de d√©couvert autoris√© a √©t√© annul√©e ou si vous avez besoin de plus de deux mois pour rembourser la somme que vous nous devez.
Voici la marche √† suivre : contactez-nous par Livechat avec une proposition pr√©cise de votre plan de remboursement. Cette proposition doit expliquer, clairement comment et en combien de temps vous pouvez rembourser votre cr√©dit ou votre d√©couvert en totalit√©. Sachez que nous refuserons toute proposition de payer la somme due ‚Äúult√©rieurement‚Äù sans autre d√©tail.
Ensuite, nous pourrons accepter, refuser ou vous proposer une solution alternative. Vous pourrez alors accepter ce plan de remboursement..
√Ä noter : Votre compte N26 sera ferm√© si votre solde reste n√©gatif pendant une longue p√©riode. Toute d√©cision de cl√¥ture de compte est d√©finitive, sauf si vous remboursez la somme due avant la date de fermeture annonc√©e. Si vous ne le faites pas, votre dette sera directement prise en charge par une agence de recouvrement.

title: Why didn't an ATM give me cash?
content:
It happens: you go to an ATM, the requested amount is deducted from your balance, but the machine doesn‚Äôt give you cash. 
First, check your card limits by going to üë§ My Account and selecting Card settings. Make sure ATM withdrawals are active. 
While we can‚Äôt say for sure why it happened, we can definitely help get your money back. The amount that was deducted from your balance is only an authorization (a reservation or blocked amount). Because the transaction wasn‚Äôt successful, this reserved amount will expire either in a few hours or a maximum of 12 working days and return to your balance. 
If the reserved amount doesn‚Äôt expire after 12 working days, please complete a dispute form. We‚Äôll do our best to get the money back for you. 
In the meantime, we suggest you try another ATM from a different operator. This rarely happens twice in a row.

title: How to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?
content:
It‚Äôs important to keep your personal data up to date (for example, your phone number is necessary to¬†connect your smartphone¬†or to send and receive¬†MoneyBeams). Here's how you can change your information:
Delivery address,¬†password, or¬†tax information: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app. Just go to¬†üë§ My Account¬†and select¬†Settings¬†then¬†Personal Settings.
Name¬†and¬†sex: Chat with us and send two forms of ID: a copy of your new ID card or passport as well as an official document of the change (a marriage licence or updated birth certificate).  We can also re-order a card with your new name once your account has been updated.
Nationality: Chat with us and send a copy of your new ID card or passport.
Phone number or¬†email address: You‚Äôll need to contact us via chat for this. We need to verify it‚Äôs really you changing your information so we can‚Äôt change any personal data over email.

title: Why was I charged a direct debit fee?
content:
Direct debits returned to your account due to¬†insufficient funds* are charged a ‚Ç¨3 fee in accordance with our¬†Terms & Conditions(new tab). If your balance becomes negative due to this fee,¬†overdraft¬†interest will also apply at a rate of 8.9%.
You can avoid these fees by making sure you have enough funds in your account to cover incoming direct debits by 18:00 on the same business day.
Since¬†SEPA transfers¬†could take more than one day to complete, we suggest you use¬†MoneyBeam (between N26 accounts) or¬†CASH26¬†(if you live in Germany, Austria or Italy) to transfer the amount due. With both methods, the amount will be credited to your account instantly.
And if you don‚Äôt recognize a direct debit, you can¬†reverse it¬†in the app.
*For Poland, Sweden, Denmark, and Norway: if you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and ultimate amount that is collected from us.

title: Schlie√üe dein N26 Invest Depot und verkaufe dein N26 Invest Portfolio
content:
Ab dem 17.09.2019 ist N26 Invest in der N26 App nicht mehr verf√ºgbar. Nach diesem Datum ist es nicht mehr m√∂glich, durch die N26 App auf deinen Investment-Plan zuzugreifen bzw. ihn durch die N26 App zu verwalten. Daher haben alle N26 Invest-Kunden die Option, ihren N26 Invest-Plan zu schlie√üen und den Gegenwert auf ihr N26 Bankkonto auszahlen zu lassen.
Wichtiger Risiko-Hinweis: Abh√§ngig vom aktuellen Marktwert des Invest-Portfolios zum Zeitpunkt seiner Schlie√üung, k√∂nnen finanzielle Verluste entstehen im Vergleich zum urspr√ºnglich investierten Betrag.
So schlie√üt du dein Invest Portfolio:
Gehe zum Bereich Anlegen in deiner N26 App.
Tippe auf deinen bestehenden Investment-Plan bei Vaamo, scrolle herunter zu Dokumente und lade deine Steuerbescheinigungen herunter.
Scrolle nach unten und w√§hle Investment-Plan schlie√üen.
Best√§tige, dass du deine Steuerbescheinigungen heruntergeladen hast, um sie f√ºr deine Unterlagen aufzubewahren, bevor du mit dem 5. Schritt weitermachst.
Nachdem du deine Dokumente abgespeichert hat, w√§hle Deaktivieren und auszahlen lassen.
Gib deine Best√§tigungs-PIN ein.
Best√§tige die L√∂schung deines N26 Invest-Plans.
Der Gegenwert deines N26 Invest-Portfolios wird binnen weniger Tage auf dein N26 Bankkonto ausgezahlt.

title: How to file a complaint?
content:
If you have any questions about our products or need help with your account, we‚Äôre happy to assist. Just open a chat with us directly within the mobile app or (new tab)Webapp(new tab) - that's the fastest and simplest way to get in touch.

If you ever feel dissatisfied with one of our products or services, you can also send us an email from your registered email address.
You can send an email to: complaints.uk@n26.com.
(If you've a registered N26 account from outside of the UK please go here(new tab)).
To file a complaint, please include:
your full name and address
the product or service you're not happy with
a description of your concern
the date in which the problem first appeared
We'll send you an email confirmation once we've received your complaint and have begun to investigate. Our aim is to find an agreeable solution and respond to your complaint as soon as possible. Some cases can take a bit longer, that's why the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) gives us up to 8 weeks to provide you with our final response. In case we need more information from you or we can provide you with an immediate solution, we‚Äôll let you know via email as well.
In case we‚Äôre not able to find a solution you‚Äôre happy with, you can refer your complaint to the Financial Ombudsman Service(new tab) (FOS).

title: How to get a N26 Overdraft?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Applies to Germany and Austria
You can apply for an overdraft directly in the app. You‚Äôll know whether you qualify in real-time. No paperwork needed.
Go to the¬†Explore section then¬†N26 Financial Products¬†and¬†you can apply for an overdraft from there. You can also cancel, change the limits of your overdraft, or view the interest you‚Äôve accumulated there at any time.
We offer an 8.9% interest rate. At the end of every quarter, we‚Äôll deduct the interest from your account.
You can find more information in our Overdraft¬†Terms & Conditions(new tab).
Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial(new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube(new tab) channel.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: How to report an insurance claim?
content:
Your¬†N26 You(new tab)¬†and¬†N26 Metal(new tab)¬†membership includes a wide range of insurance benefits, covered by our partner Allianz Global Assistance Europe.*
To report a claim, log into your app, go to üë§ My Account and select N26 You/Metal, then select Make a claim.
There you'll find:
A guide to submit your claim (for example, flight or luggage delay, extended warranty, or travel cancellation)
Your account and contract information, including your N26 You or N26 Metal ID
The option to contact Allianz directly in the case of a medical emergency
For emergencies, please have the following information ready:
The full address and telephone number of your current location
Names of all official contacts (doctors, hospitals, and/or police)
An exact description of the situation
*Allianz Global Assistance Europe is a trading name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and a member of the Allianz Group.

title: PSD2 - Open Banking for Third Party Providers
content:
We are partnering with Token.io(new tab) to provide and support a dedicated interface for third-party payment service providers (''TPPs''). The complete documentation and the on-boarding instructions can be found in the Token.io developer portal(new tab). 
As part of its legal obligations under PSD2, N26 has implemented a contingency mechanism, which provides the following: 
Reliable identification of a TPP via possession of a valid Qualified Website Authentication Certificate (QWAC);

Secure and authorised access to an account
TPPs may access our contingency mechanism via the following URLs:
https://aisp.tech26.de
https://pisp.tech26.de
Access to the above URL and establishing the TLS connection requires implementation of a qualified certificate.
Please find the detailed technical documentation for the fallback interface below:
AISP Fallback Documentation(new tab)
PISP Fallback Documentation(new tab)
TPPs may contact N26 via open.banking@n26.com to provide their QWAC certificates and get technical support.
The reports below compare the availability and performance of our PSD2 dedicated interface with the N26 user interface:
3rd quarter of 2019(new tab)
4th quarter of 2019(new tab)

title: How to connect or disconnect my smartphone to my account?
content:
In order to use your N26 account, you need a smartphone : either an iPhone (5s or newer, at least iOS 11) or an Android (6.0 or newer - we do not support the customized versions of Amazon Fire and Oxygen OS). Only one device can be paired per account.
You'll need to pair and/or unpair your smartphone when you first create an account or if you get a new phone number or device.
To pair your smartphone with your account, simply open the app on your smartphone. You will be asked to¬†confirm your mobile phone number.
Enter the¬†4-digit code we send you via SMS¬†and your phone is paired. 
If you want to pair a new device, you must unpair your old device for¬†security reasons. You can do this in¬†üë§ My Account¬†(mobile app) or in the¬†Web app(new tab)¬†under¬†üë§ My Account¬†then¬†Security Settings if you don‚Äôt have access to your smartphone anymore. You‚Äôll receive an email from us with further instructions.
If you log into your N26 account with a new device, you'll receive two codes ‚Äì a Login SMS code with 6 digits and Pairing SMS code with 4 digits. You'll need the Login code to access your account and the Pairing code for pairing your device.

title: Come riavere i miei soldi in caso di frode?
content:
Se non riconosci una transazione e sei sicuro di non averla autorizzata,¬†bloccare la tua carta¬†non sar√† sufficiente. In questi casi √® necessario immediatamente:
Contestare la transazione tramite l'app N26, mobile o web: clicca sulla transazione e seleziona "Chiedi aiuto per questa transazione". Prenderemo in carico la tua richiesta e faremo del nostro meglio per recuperare i tuoi soldi.
Puoi continuare a utilizzare tutte le altre funzionalit√† del tuo conto fino all‚Äôarrivo della tua nuova carta. Se sei in Italia, Germania o Austria, puoi usare¬†CASH26¬†per i prelievi e il deposito di contante.
Considera che eventuali variazioni nell‚Äôimporto finale addebitato¬†sul conto non indicano necessariamente una frode.

title: Cosa succede se il mio saldo √® negativo?
content:
Il tuo saldo pu√≤ essere negativo entro i limiti del tuo¬†Scoperto.
Se hai il saldo in negativo, ti verr√† accreditato un interesse di scoperto pari all' 8.9%.
In caso contrario, riceverai una email di notifica che il limite autorizzato sul tuo conto √® stato superato. Ci√≤ implica che non hai fondi sufficienti sul conto per coprire addebiti futuri.
Anche se non hai usato il tuo conto da quando l'hai aperto, alcuni addebiti possono ancora avvenire (tanto come le commissioni mensili di N26 You e N26 Metal, o i costi della consegna express) facendo risultare il tuo saldo negativo.
Avrai quindi bisogno di¬†caricare il tuo conto¬†tramite bonifico SEPA (scegli bonifico internazionale se stai effettuando il bonifico da fuori la Germania) o¬†CASH26¬†(se sei in Germania o Austria). Non facendolo, il tuo conto rimarr√† attivo per i 60 giorni successivi. A quel punto:
Riceverai due ulteriori solleciti (al costo di ‚Ç¨3 ciascuno).
Se hai uno Scoperto: sar√† cancellato dopo il secondo sollecito e dovrai ripagare quell'ammontare immediatamente (o puoi stabilire un piano di rimborso).

title: What are the benefits of N26 Metal?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Available in Germany, Austria, France, Spain, Italy, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Iceland, and Liechtenstein.

title: How to cancel my N26 You or N26 Metal membership?
content:
N26 You(new tab) or¬†N26 Metal(new tab)¬†contracts have a term of one year. This contract automatically renews for another year unless you cancel it. 
In this article you will find the difference between revocation, cancellation of the membership and cancellation of the renewal of your membership. You have 3 options:
Revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period
Cancel your membership at any time up to 1 month before your contract ends
Stop your membership‚Äôs renewal up to 1 month before it expires
Find in details how to do so below. 
You can revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period. Simply open a chat with us and we'll assist you from there.
Keep in mind that if you cancel your contract before it ends, you won‚Äôt be able to sign up for the same membership plan in the future.
If you want to terminate your membership at any time up to *1 month before your contract ends and after the 14-day revocation period, please contact us.
If you choose this option all your N26 You or N26 Metal benefits will end, which includes your insurance coverage.
You have up to 4 weeks before your membership expires to cancel the renewal of your N26 You or N26 Metal membership. To do so:
Log into the mobile app and go to üë§ My Account
Select N26 You/Metal
Tap Membership details followed by Cancel Membership
 you can also see your membership expiration date here
Confirm the cancellation via the push message we send you
You can continue to use your N26 You or N26 Metal Mastercard fully until your membership expires. That means you‚Äôll keep your insurance coverage as long as you‚Äôre still required to pay your membership fee. After that, your Mastercard will work like a standard card without the benefits. We‚Äôll send you a standard card before your contract ends. No need to contact us about it.
We‚Äôll notify you of the renewal via email 8 weeks before your anniversary date.
If you want to definitely close your account, visit our article How to close my N26 account.

title: Warum war eine Zahlung h√∂her als erwartet?
content:
Alle Transaktionen erfolgen in Echtzeit. Du bekommst eine Push-Nachricht, wenn eine Zahlung ein- oder ausgeht.
Manchmal kann eine Transaktion verd√§chtig aussehen, weil der belastete Endbetrag aus verschiedenen Gr√ºnden vom erwarteten Betrag abweichen kann:
Ein H√§ndler sperrt einen h√∂heren Betrag f√ºr eine Kaution (z. B. an einer Tankstelle, bei einer Autovermietung oder Hotelbuchung). Die Differenz wird deinem Konto gutgeschrieben, sobald die Kaution nicht mehr gebraucht wird.
Bei Transaktionen in Fremdw√§hrungen k√∂nnen Wechselkurs√§nderungen zu kleinen Abweichungen der Gesamtsumme f√ºhren.
In beiden F√§llen berechnen wir keine Zinsen f√ºr die Betragsdifferenz.
Wenn du aber sicher bist, dass eine Transaktion nicht von dir autorisiert wurde, k√∂nnen wir dir helfen, dein Geld zur√ºckzubekommen.

title: ¬øC√≥mo crear una contrase√±a?
content:
Si has olvidado tu contrase√±a o simplemente quieres cambiarla, pulsa¬†¬øLa has olvidado?¬†en la app o¬†¬øHas olvidado tu contrase√±a?(pesta√±a nueva)¬†en la¬†Web App(pesta√±a nueva)¬†al iniciar sesi√≥n. Te enviaremos un link al email que has registrado para que puedas crear una nueva contrase√±a. 
No tenemos un conjunto espec√≠fico de requisitos para la contrase√±a, sino que medimos su fortaleza sobre la marcha a trav√©s de un algoritmo que determina si la contrase√±a es lo bastante segura como para aceptarla.
Recomendamos tirar m√°s hacia lo que ser√≠a una "frase clave" en vez de una "palabra clave", con lo que nos regir√≠amos por el dicho ¬´dif√≠cil de adivinar pero f√°cil de recordar¬ª.
Si nuestro sistema no admite tu contrase√±a, a√±√°dele algunos caracteres m√°s y comb√≠nala con n√∫meros, caracteres especiales, may√∫sculas y min√∫sculas.
Si introduces una contrase√±a err√≥nea 6 veces seguidas, tu cuenta quedar√° bloqueada temporalmente. Si esto sucede, int√©ntalo de nuevo en 30 minutos.

title: Cos‚Äô√® CASH26?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Si applica per i conti aperti in Germania, Austria e Italia
CASH26 √® una funzionalit√† che ti permette di depositare o prelevare denaro contante presso i nostri negozi convenzionati. 
Attualmente CASH26 √® disponibile in:
202 punti PAM & Panorama e 386 negozi PENNY in Italia.¬†

2.019 punti dm, Billa, Merkur e PENNY Austria in Austria¬†¬†
Troverai un elenco dettagliato dei negozi convenzionati pi√π vicini a te, gli orari di apertura e le indicazioni per raggiungerli sulla mappa di CASH26 della nostra app (Schermata principale > Gestisci > CASH26).
Prelievo:
Appena crei un codice a barre per il prelievo, l'importo verr√† detratto dal tuo conto. Se non vuoi pi√π procedere col prelievo, puoi cancellare il codice a barre e l'importo ritorner√† immediatamente sul tuo conto.
Se un codice a barre rimane inutilizzato, l'importo ritorner√† automaticamente sul tuo conto dopo 10 minuti.
Puoi prelevare fino a 900 ‚Ç¨ (200 ‚Ç¨ per transazione) nell‚Äôarco di 24 ore.

Depositi:
I depositi tramite CASH26 sono immediatamente disponibili sul tuo conto.

Puoi depositare fino a 100 ‚Ç¨¬† al mese gratuitamente. Per i depositi oltre questo importo viene applicata una commissione dell'1,5% sul totale depositato.

title: Why was I charged twice?
content:
We offer you banking in real-time. This means you‚Äôre able to see the processes going on behind your account that you otherwise wouldn‚Äôt see. There are two main transaction types that take place during an in-store or online purchase:
Authorizations.¬†A block or reserved amount made by a retailer or merchant. This includes anything from your morning cup of coffee to hotel or car rental bookings (including security deposits).
Presentments.¬†The actual amount that is deducted from your account. Again, that cup of coffee is finally cleared from your account or you can get your security deposit back once that hotel room or car is returned safe and sound.
Once an authorization has been confirmed, we can‚Äôt cancel or reverse it. At that point, a few things can happen to¬†your authorization: it turns into a presentment, it's rejected, or it expires¬†(and automatically returns to your account up to 12 days at the latest). Keep in mind:
Sometimes you‚Äôll see both the authorization and the presentment if they become disconnected or due to technical issues at the payment terminal. Eventually the authorization will expire. If it doesn‚Äôt, we can help get your money back.
Verification authorizations (usually very small amounts) are used to check whether your card is active. This money will return to your account.
The amount of an authorization can differ from the final presentment for a variety of reasons.

title: Why can‚Äôt I get a Basiskonto?
content:
Under some circumstances, N26 is allowed to reject your Basiskonto request. That‚Äôs the case if you:
Live outside of a supported country.
Already have an N26 bank account or another bank account in Germany and can use it to its full extent. 
Were convicted of a crime against the bank, its employees, or its customers within the past 3 years. 
Have already maintained a Basiskonto at N26 in the past that was closed due to prohibited usage or a negative balance. 
You didn‚Äôt meet minimum requirements in accordance to the Money Laundering Act and the Credit Services Act.

title: Warum kann ich keine anderen N26 MoneyBeam Nutzer sehen?
content:
Um Echtzeit-Transaktionen wie¬†MoneyBeams¬†durchzuf√ºhren, √ºberpr√ºft N26 die Kontaktliste deines Smartphones und findet andere N26 Nutzer anhand der gespeicherten Telefonnummer oder E-Mail-Adresse. Wenn jemand erkannt wurde, siehst du das an dem blauen Punkt neben seinem Namen.
Wenn du die Namen deiner Freunde in der MoneyBeam-Liste nicht siehst, aber wei√üt, dass sie N26 Nutzer sind, haben sie  sich h√∂chstwahrscheinlich nicht sichtbar gemacht. Du kannst auch w√§hlen, ob du selbst dich f√ºr andere N26 Nutzer sichtbar oder unsichtbar machen m√∂chtest.
Wenn ein MoneyBeam zwischen N26 Nutzern scheitert, liegt es wahrscheinlich daran, dass bei einem oder beiden Nutzern mehrere Telefonnummern oder E-Mail-Adressen im Profil in der Kontaktliste gespeichert sind. Stelle sicher, dass du die aktuelle E-Mail-Adresse und Telefonnummer deiner Freunde in deinem Handy abgespeichert hast, um ihnen MoneyBeams zu senden. Wenn die in deinem Handy gespeicherten Kontaktdaten nicht stimmen, kannst du keinen MoneyBeam senden.
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erhalte 15‚Ç¨ f√ºr jeden Freund, dem du N26 erfolgreich empfiehlst. Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: What to do if I can't repay my overdraft or loan?
content:
We offer repayment plans if you can‚Äôt repay your¬†overdraft¬†or loan with¬†N26 Credit. This could happen because your overdraft was cancelled or you need more than two months to repay your negative amount.
Here‚Äôs how it works: chat with us and propose a detailed plan on how you‚Äôre going to pay back your overdraft or loan in instalments, such as a certain amount every month until your loan is paid off. We don‚Äôt accept offers of simply paying back the whole sum at a later date.
We will then either accept, reject, or propose an alternative plan. It‚Äôs then up to you to confirm it.
By the way: your account will be closed if it‚Äôs negative for an extended period of time. All closure dates are final unless you pay back your loan before this date. If not, your debt will go to a collection agency.

title: Come attivare la carta?
content:
Se stai attendendo la consegna della tua carta N26,¬† puoi usufruire della possibilit√† di attivarne la versione digitale ed aggiungerla al tuo Google Wallet o Apple Wallet. Questa opzione √® disponibile per 30 giorni a partire dal momento in cui la carta √® stata ordinata.¬†
In questo lasso di tempo riceverai la carta fisica e dovrai attivarla tramite l‚Äôapp di N26. L‚Äôattivazione della carta fisica ti permetter√† di continuare ad usare la tua carta N26 nel tuo portafoglio digitale e di usufruire di tutte le altre funzionalit√† della carta. Una volta ricevuta, potrai attivare la tua nuova carta dalla versione mobile oppure web(nuova tabella) dell'app N26.
In entrambi i casi, visualizzerai l'opzione per attivare la carta direttamente nella schermata principale dopo aver eseguito l'accesso al conto.  
In alternativa:
dalla schermata principale della versione mobile dell'app seleziona Gestisci > Carta > Impostazioni carta
dalla schermata principale della webapp seleziona Il mio conto > carte
Ricorda che:
Per attivare la carta ti verr√† richiesto di digitare il token di 10 cifre presente sulla carta sotto il tuo nome (oppure sul retro per le carte N26 You, N26 Metal e Maestro). Ti chiederemo questo numero ogni qualvolta ci contatterai per accertarci della tua identit√†.
Se hai pi√π carte (ad esempio, se hai ordinato la carta pi√π di una volta o la consegna √® avvenuta in ritardo), puoi attivare solo l‚Äôultima carta emessa. Tutte le altre carte saranno disattivate. 
Dovrai eseguire questi passaggi per l‚Äôattivazione ogni volta che riordini una carta,  nel caso in cui tu abbia perso la tua, ti sia stata rubata, si sia rotta oppure effettui un upgrade del conto.
Dopo aver attivato la carta, il passo successivo √®¬†scegliere il PIN(nuova tabella).
Se vivi in Francia, Spagna, Irlanda, Grecia, Finlandia, Estonia o Regno Unito dovrai effettuare un prelievo da sportello ATM prima di poter utilizzare la tua carta altrove.

title: Why did my SEPA transfer fail?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Applies to all regions except the UK
We accept¬†transfers¬†in EUR done via SEPA. We don't support SWIFT so if you need to make a¬†foreign currency transfer, please use TransferWise (in the app or from their¬†website(new tab)).
To get a transfer, you'll only need to provide the sender with your full name (as it's written on the ID you provided for verification) and your IBAN.
You can¬†find your IBAN¬†on your balance statements and in¬†üë§ My Account¬†(in the mobile app or¬†WebApp(new tab)).
Common reasons for failed transfers:
The recipient's name on the transfer order is different from the name on their account (must be their name as written on their ID).
The recipient's name is a company name instead of a personal/account name (applies to N26 Business).
The IBAN is incorrect.
You're not receiving the push message to confirm your transfer.
An inappropriate use was found. N26 has the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see¬†GwG ¬ß 10(new tab)). As a result, we may ask for documentation to verify the origin or source of these transactions. This can result in the credit being delayed or not taking place.

title: Wie erstelle und verwalte ich Dauerauftr√§ge?
content:
Wenn du in der App oder im Online Banking eine √úberweisung einrichtest, hast du die Option, daraus einen Dauerauftrag zu machen.
Bevor du die √úberweisung fertig machst, kannst du ein H√§kchen bei einer Box setzen, um die √úberweisung als Dauerauftrag zu merken. Zun√§chst gibst du den Empf√§nger, den Betrag und den Verwendungszweck ein. Setze im n√§chsten Schritt das H√§kchen bei: ‚ÄúAls Dauerauftrag merken?‚Äù. Nun kannst du Start- und Enddatum und das Zahlungsintervall f√ºr deinen Dauerauftrag festlegen.
So kannst du deine bestehenden Dauerauftr√§ge in der App sehen und verwalten:
Gehe zur Umsatzliste (Startbildschirm).
Wenn du ein iPhone benutzt, tippe auf die drei Punkte √ºber deiner Umsatzliste. Wenn du Android verwendest, tippe auf die drei Punkte am oberen rechten Bildschirmrand.
Ein blaues Fenster √∂ffnet sich, in dem du "Dauerauftr√§ge" ausw√§hlen kannst.
Hier kannst du deine Dauerauftr√§ge l√∂schen oder ver√§ndern. Um einen Dauerauftrag zu l√∂schen, tippe auf den gew√ºnschten Dauerauftrag und dann oben rechts auf das Papierkorb-Icon.
‚ÑπÔ∏è  Hinweis: Wenn ein Dauerauftrag aufgrund mangelnder Kontodeckung nicht ausgef√ºhrt werden konnte, versuchen wir nicht, ihn erneut auszuf√ºhren. Du kannst die √úberweisung dann manuell wiederholen. Der n√§chste Termin des Dauerauftrags bleibt aber bestehen.

title: How to report an insurance claim?
content:
Your¬†N26 You(new tab)¬†and¬†N26 Metal(new tab)¬†membership includes a wide range of insurance benefits, covered by our partner Allianz Global Assistance Europe.*
To report a claim, log into your app, go to üë§ My Account and select N26 You/Metal, then select Make a claim.
There you'll find:
A guide to submit your claim (for example, flight or luggage delay, extended warranty, or travel cancellation)
Your account and contract information, including your N26 You or N26 Metal ID
The option to contact Allianz directly in the case of a medical emergency
For emergencies, please have the following information ready:
The full address and telephone number of your current location
Names of all official contacts (doctors, hospitals, and/or police)
An exact description of the situation
*Allianz Global Assistance Europe is a trading name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and a member of the Allianz Group.

title: Why isn't my video verification working?
content:
Tips for a successful video¬†verification:
Most video calls fail due to poor internet connection or bad picture quality (for example, too blurry or due to low lighting). Please complete the call in a bright environment, use a phone with a good camera, and make sure you have a fast internet connection.
Please make sure that you are the only person in the video.
You need to live in one of our¬†supported countries¬†to open an account with us.
We can only accept national IDs and passports (driver‚Äôs licenses or residence permits can‚Äôt be used). Also, the document shouldn‚Äôt be damaged.
As soon as your verification is complete, we‚Äôll send you your N26 Mastercard.¬†Deliveries¬†take up to 10 days.

title: When linking my accounts, I noticed that the name ‚ÄúAxos Bank¬Æ‚Äù comes up for my N26 account.
content:
To issue your account, N26 partners with Axos Bank, a federally chartered savings bank and Member of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation. When the name ‚ÄúAxos Bank‚Äù appears in the external account linking process, rest assured you have entered the correct information.
The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: How to open my N26 account?
content:
You can open an account in the app (on your smartphone) or in N26 for Web(new tab) if you:
are at least 18 years old
are a resident of a supported country
own a compatible smartphone
hold a supported ID (eligibility depends on whether you live in Germany(new tab) or outside of Germany(new tab))
don't already have an account with us
are able to verify yourself in one of our supported languages: English, German, Spanish, Italian, or French. Please note that only English is supported in the UK. 
This is how the sign-up process for an N26 bank account works:
After confirming your email, personal details, and shipping address, select the type of account you want. *
Prove your identity and connect your smartphone to your new account.
As a new signup, you'll be able to top up your account via Bank Transfer or CASH26 deposit (if you are in Germany, Austria or Italy). 
After a few days, you‚Äôll receive your N26 Mastercard by post.
If you'd like more information, here's how you can get in touch with us.
*If you meet our minimum creditworthiness criteria, you can open an N26 account. If you don‚Äôt, we may offer you an N26 Flex account (Germany only). This decision is calculated through an automated process.
We are available from 7:00 to 23:00 everyday, including Sundays and public holidays.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our Refer a Friend Program.

title: How to export a list of my transactions?
content:
Our¬†web app(new tab)¬†allows you to search within your transactions. You can also download a history of your transactions in CSV format. To export your transaction list:
From Transactions, click on the cloud icon in the upper-right corner to reach Downloads

Under CSV you can select the Start Date and End Date and Download CSV
You can also sort your transactions using¬†categories and hashtags¬†in the app.
To view and download PDFs of your (preliminary and previous) monthly balance statements:
In the web app(new tab): From Transactions, click on the cloud icon in the upper-right corner to reach Downloads then select Bank statements.

In the mobile app: From the Home screen, tap on the three bullet points in the top-right corner of the screen and choose Balance statements.

title: Why isn't my video verification working?
content:
Tips for a successful video¬†verification:
Most video calls fail due to poor internet connection or bad picture quality (for example, too blurry or due to low lighting). Please complete the call in a bright environment, use a phone with a good camera, and make sure you have a fast internet connection.
Please make sure that you are the only person in the video.
You need to live in one of our¬†supported countries¬†to open an account with us.
We can only accept national IDs and passports (driver‚Äôs licenses or residence permits can‚Äôt be used). Also, the document shouldn‚Äôt be damaged.
As soon as your verification is complete, we‚Äôll send you your N26 Mastercard.¬†Deliveries¬†take up to 10 days.

Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

title: Why hasn't my referral bonus arrived?
content:
Once your friend has completed all the eligibility criteria of our¬†Refer a Friend Program, we'll verify your reward. You can always sign in to your account in the app or¬†WebApp(new tab)¬†to check your reward status.
In most cases the referral bonus isn‚Äôt rewarded because the invited friend hasn‚Äôt made a first Mastercard transaction of 15 EUR. Please make sure to inform your friend of these requirements.
Keep in mind that the reward process could take up to 60 days.
N26 retains the right to withhold a reward in case of suspicious activity that violates the¬†Terms and Conditions(new tab).
Currently, Friend referral rewards are only available for customers in Germany, Austria, Italy, France, Spain, Belgium, Luxembourg, Greece, Portugal, Ireland, the Netherlands, Finland, Estonia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden, Switzerland, Norway, Denmark, Poland, Iceland and Liechtenstein.

title: What to do if my account was hacked?
content:
If you suspect possible fraudulent activity on your account, please contact us as soon as possible. Our chat function is available in the app, on the N26 website(new tab), and at the end of some of our Support Center articles, such as this one. Just click on Start a chat. 
If you‚Äôd rather speak on the phone, you can request this during the chat. We‚Äôll arrange a callback within the hour so we can discuss the matter further with you. Once in contact with one of our agents, please thoroughly explain the situation to us.  Every detail here is important. 

Please be assured that we‚Äôll take all necessary measures to assist you in this situation. 
In addition to our legal obligations for fraud prevention, and in order to continually improve our security safeguards, we have a dedicated team who analyzes each fraud case individually. The fraud cases themselves are often relatively complicated and have to be dealt with in detail. Depending on the complexity, this can take a few days, but in some cases it can take several weeks.
Finally, if you have evidence or strong feelings that the account might have been hacked, we recommend that you file a police report as well.
To learn more about how we protect your account in case of fraud, visit our blog article(new tab). Visit our page about Security at N26(new tab) to discover our commitment to protect your funds and your account.
Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.
If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126.

title: How to make transfers in foreign currencies?
content:
We have partnered with TransferWise to make foreign currency transfers easy. TransferWise offers real-time exchange rates and no hidden fees.
To initiate a transfer in a foreign currency start by logging into the mobile app: 
From the Home screen choose the Actions tab,

Select Add Money followed by Foreign Currency Transfer,

Choose ‚Äúadd a new recipient‚Äù or select an existing payee. When adding a new recipient you'll be given the option to change the currency by tapping on the Euro flag in the top right corner of the screen,

Enter the amount you'd like to send and add any additional bank details,

Finalize the transfer with your Confirmation PIN.
If we don‚Äôt currently offer the¬†foreign currency(new tab)¬†you need, please visit¬†TransferWise(new tab)¬†for more currency options. You can log in by entering your N26 account email and selecting Forgot password? You‚Äôll receive an email from TransferWise to change your password and then you can use both log in details to perform the transfer from there.
Please note that foreign currency transfers in the app are not possible with the N26 Business or Business You account nor are transfers to businesses.
TransferWise has its own transfer types and fees but this will all be indicated before you confirm the transfer.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

content:
Consejos para que la verificaci√≥n por v√≠deo salga bien:
La mayor√≠a de las videollamadas fallan, o bien por mala conexi√≥n a internet, o bien por la mala calidad de la imagen (aparece una imagen borrosa o no hay demasiada luz, por ejemplo). Nuestras l√≠neas est√°n abiertas todos los d√≠as de 07:00 a 23:00, domingos y festivos incluidos.

title: CRS - Why we require certain information from our customers
content:
N26 as a financial institution is (according to CRS) required to report information directly to tax authorities in the European Union concerning financial accounts held by customers who are tax resident in another country.
CRS stands for Common Reporting Standard. The CRS has been developed by the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD) and is a global reporting standard for the automatic exchange of information (AEOI). The goal of CRS is to allow tax authorities to obtain a clearer understanding of financial assets held abroad by their residents for tax purposes in order to fight tax evasion. More than 90 countries have agreed to share information on residents' assets and incomes in conformation with CRS.
In order for us to be able to accurately determine whether an account is to be reported to the tax authorities for CRS purposes, we need to ask you:
In which country(ies) are you a tax resident?¬†

You are normally a ‚Äútax resident‚Äù and therefore subject to tax on your worldwide income in the country where you have a residential address. If you have a place to live in more than one country, then there are normally ‚Äútie-breaker rules‚Äù included in double tax treaties and tax laws of the relevant countries that help determine where you are a tax resident. It may be that you are tax resident in more than one country during a year and, if so, we'd need to know both the country and your taxpayer identification number for each of them in order to accurately report the information to the relevant tax authorities.¬†

What is your taxpayer identification number (‚ÄúTIN‚Äù) for each country?

The issuance and format of a TIN differs by country. For EU countries, the European Commission has published guidance on TINs in each EU country(new tab), which may help you in identifying your individual TIN(s) in these countries.¬†
In case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the N26 app. To do this, simply log in to the N26 app and go to:
My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Tax Information¬†

title: How to file a complaint?
content:
If you have any questions about our products or need help with your account, we‚Äôre happy to assist. Just open a chat with us directly within the mobile app or WebApp, that's the fastest and simplest way to get in touch.
If you ever feel dissatisfied with one of our products or services, you can also send (new tab)us an email from your registered address or send your feedback by post.
If you're in the UK, you can send the email to complaints.uk@n26.com(new tab). For the rest of Europe please use complaints@n26.com(new tab).¬†
To file a complaint, please include:
your full name and address
the product or service you're not happy with
a description of your concern
the date in which the problem first appeared
We‚Äôll contact you via email to confirm that we‚Äôve received your complaint and then begin an investigation to find a solution you‚Äôre happy with. In case we need more information from you or we can provide you with an immediate solution, we‚Äôll let you know via email as well.
In case we‚Äôre not able to find a solution you‚Äôre happy with, you can escalate your complaint to an independent third party. You have a few options:
An arbitration body is available to you at the German Federal Bank (Deutsche Bundesbank).
Or you could file a complaint with the German Federal Financial Supervisory Authority (Bundesanstalt f√ºr Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht).
Also, the European Commission has set up the Online Dispute Resolution (ODR(new tab)) platform to help consumers dispute online contracts out of court.
We are committed to constantly improving our products and services. Your feedback makes this possible.

title: How to reverse and block a direct debit?
content:
You have the ability to reverse a direct debit in the app yourself up to 8 weeks after it has been debited.
Open your transaction list and select the direct debit in question. 
Choose¬†Refund. 
The amount will then be credited to your account within 2 banking days.
*For Poland, Sweden, Denmark, and Norway only: if you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and ultimate amount that is collected from us.

title: How to set my card PIN?
content:
We don‚Äôt send you a PIN via post; you set the PIN for your Mastercard or Maestro card¬†once you‚Äôve successfully connected your smartphone to your account and¬†activated¬†your card(s). To set or change your card PIN:
Go to üë§ My Account.
Select Card settings and swipe to choose a card.
Select Reset PIN on the mobile or WebApp(new tab).
Enter the 10-digit token number on your card.
Choose your new PIN and confirm it.
Keep in mind that:
If you live in France, Spain, Ireland, Greece, Finland, Estonia or the UK, you must make your first payment using Chip and PIN before you can use your card anywhere else. You can also first make a withdrawal or balance inquiry at ATM instead.
For security reasons we don‚Äôt accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences (such as 1111, 1234, or 4321). If the number you‚Äôve chosen is not accepted please try again using a different combination.
If a PIN is entered incorrectly three times in a row, the card will automatically be blocked for security reasons. If this happens, please contact our Customer Support via chat so we can unblock it for you.
Your card PIN is separate from your Confirmation PIN, however you can choose the same PIN for both.

title: Ingresa mediante tarjeta, Apple Pay y Google Pay
content:
Ahora puedes ingresar dinero utilizando una tarjeta de d√©bito o cr√©dito, as√≠ como Apple o Google Pay. Esta es la forma m√°s r√°pida y f√°cil de ingresar dinero en tu cuenta N26.

Para ingresar dinero con una tarjeta de d√©bito o cr√©dito:
Abre tu app N26 y ve a la pesta√±a de ¬´Gestionar¬ª
Pulsa en ¬´Recibir dinero¬ª y selecciona ¬´Tarjeta de d√©bito¬ª
Elige una cantidad y rellena con los datos de la tarjeta como nombre, n√∫mero, fecha de vencimiento y CVC (no almacenamos la informaci√≥n de la tarjeta)
Sigue los pasos para confirmar el pago.
El dinero estar√° disponible en tu cuenta al instante

Para ingresar dinero mediante Google y Apple Pay:
Abre tu app de N26 y ve a la pesta√±a de¬† ¬´Gestionar¬ª
Simplemente pulsa ‚ÄúRecibir dinero‚Äù y selecciona ‚ÄúApple Pay‚Äù o ‚ÄúGoogle Pay‚Äù
Elige una cantidad
Sigue los pasos para confirmar el pago.
El dinero estar√° disponible en tu cuenta al instante

Tarjetas aceptadas: 
las tarjetas Visa y Mastercard que tengan 16 d√≠gitos de n√∫mero de tarjeta. 
No se aceptan tarjetas de prepago (por ejemplo, marca A, marca B, etc.). 
Para obtener m√°s informaci√≥n sobre la diferencia entre tarjetas de d√©bito, cr√©dito y prepago, lee este art√≠culo(pesta√±a nueva) (ingl√©s).

Coste:
Aunque esta es la forma m√°s r√°pida y f√°cil de ingresar dinero en tu cuenta N26, para nosotros, procesar este tipo de transacciones tiene un coste mayor que los m√©todos de ingreso que ya ofrecemos.¬†
Para ambos m√©todos, el primer ingreso es siempre gratuito,¬† para los ingresos¬† adicionales se¬† cobra una comisi√≥n del 3% de la cantidad ingresada. Al utilizar estos m√©todos,¬† mediante tarjeta o plataforma digital de pago, tu dinero no se env√≠a al instante a N26, por lo que la comisi√≥n cubre los costes reales asociados al servicio de ingreso autom√°tico ofrecido por N26.

title: Why do I pay the church tax?
content:
We‚Äôre legally required to request data relating to church tax deductions and to make the deductions where applicable. This happens every year from September 1st to October 31st.
You‚Äôre entitled to appeal against the passing of information about your religious affiliation through an¬†Erkl√§rung zum Sperrvermerk(new tab)¬†form. You can do this before June 30th each year. If you file an objection, your local tax office will request that you submit a church tax declaration yourself.
Further information is available on the website of the¬†German Federal Central Office for Taxation(new tab).

title: How to invite friends to join N26?
content:
You can start inviting friends as soon as you have access to your account, in the mobile app or¬†N26 WebApp.(new tab) To invite friends:
on iOS:
Log into the mobile app and tap on the Explore tab next to the + button.
Tap on Refer friends.
Tap on your Referral Code to copy it.
Select one of the options available for sharing. 
Write a message to your friend or use the default then tap Send.
on Android:
Log into the mobile app, then go to My Account üë§ and select the gift icon.
Tap on your Referral Code to copy it.
Tap Tell a friend.
Select one of the options available for sharing.
Write a message to your friend or use the default then tap Send.
Find out how you can be rewarded for your referrals with our¬†Refer a Friend Program¬†(available in select countries).

title: Can I have my pension credited to my N26 account?
content:
Having your pension credited to your N26 account is very simple.
This is what you need to do:
Contact and inform INPS about your decision;
Fill out and sign the form INPS will provide you with;
After filling out and signing the form, please send it to support@n26.com via email (please remember to use your registered email account to send the form).¬†
We will fill out the rest of the form and send it back to you in a few days.
Please note that you might find references to Citibank N.A in the form. Citibank N.A is an¬† intermediary bank that credits INPS pensions to bank accounts located abroad. While filling out the form, please replace references to Citibank N.A with your N26 bank account details.¬†

title: ¬øPor qu√© no puedo tener una Basiskonto?
content:
Bajo ciertas circunstancias, N26 puede rechazar tu solicitud de¬†Basiskonto. Este ser√° el caso si:
Vives fuera de Alemania.
Ya tienes una cuenta en N26 o en cualquier otro banco en Alemania que puedes utilizar en su totalidad.
Has sido condenado por un delito contra un banco, tanto sus empleados como sus clientes, en los √∫ltimos tres a√±os.
Ya has tenido una Basiskonto en N26 en el pasado que haya sido cerrada por tener saldo negativo o hacer uso indebido de la misma.
No cumples con los requerimientos m√≠nimos en concordancia con el acta de Blanqueo de Capitales y Servicios de Cr√©dito.

title: Wie kann ich im Betrugsfall mein Geld zur√ºckerhalten?
content:
Wenn du eine Transaktion nicht anerkennst oder sicher bist, dass du sie nicht autorisiert hast, reicht es nicht aus, deine Karte sperren zu lassen. In diesem Fall solltest du sofort:
Eine neue Karte bestellen und deine aktuelle als gestohlen markieren. Zerst√∂re die Karte mit einer Schere oder einem Aktenvernichter. Der Chip, die NFC-Antenne und der Magnetstreifen m√ºssen in St√ºcke geschnitten und getrennt entsorgt werden.
Ein Formular f√ºr Umsatzreklamationen ausf√ºllen. Danach tun wir unser Bestes, um dein Geld f√ºr dich zur√ºckzubekommen.
Du kannst dein Konto weiter f√ºr √úberweisungen verwenden, bis deine neue Karte eintrifft. Wenn du in Deutschland oder √ñsterreich bist, kannst du auch CASH26 f√ºr Bargeldabhebungen nutzen.
Manchmal kann es √ºbrigens vorkommen, dass der von deinem Konto abgebuchte Betrag von dem urspr√ºnglich autorisierten Zahlungsbetrag abweicht, etwa bei Zahlungen in Fremdw√§hrungen. Das deutet nicht unbedingt auf Betrug hin.

title: Why did my SEPA transfer fail?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Applies to all regions except the UK
We accept¬†transfers¬†in EUR done via SEPA. We don't support SWIFT so if you need to make a¬†foreign currency transfer, please use TransferWise (in the app or from their¬†website(new tab)).
To get a transfer, you'll only need to provide the sender with your full name (as it's written on the ID you provided for verification) and your IBAN.
You can¬†find your IBAN¬†on your balance statements and in¬†üë§ My Account¬†(in the mobile app or¬†WebApp(new tab)).
Common reasons for failed transfers:
The recipient's name on the transfer order is different from the name on their account (must be their name as written on their ID).
The recipient's name is a company name instead of a personal/account name (applies to N26 Business).
The IBAN is incorrect.
You're not receiving the push message to confirm your transfer.
An inappropriate use was found. N26 has the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see¬†GwG ¬ß 10(new tab)). As a result, we may ask for documentation to verify the origin or source of these transactions. This can result in the credit being delayed or not taking place.

title: How to connect or disconnect my smartphone to my account?
content:
In order to use your N26 account, you need a smartphone : either an iPhone (5s or newer, at least iOS 11) or an Android (6.0 or newer - we do not support the customized versions of Amazon Fire and Oxygen OS). Only one device can be paired per account.
You'll need to pair and/or unpair your smartphone when you first create an account or if you get a new phone number or device.
To pair your smartphone with your account, simply open the app on your smartphone. You will be asked to¬†confirm your mobile phone number.
Enter the¬†4-digit code we send you via SMS¬†and your phone is paired. 
If you want to pair a new device, you must unpair your old device for¬†security reasons. You can do this in¬†üë§ My Account¬†(mobile app) or in the¬†Web app(new tab)¬†under¬†üë§ My Account¬†then¬†Security Settings if you don‚Äôt have access to your smartphone anymore. You‚Äôll receive an email from us with further instructions.
If you log into your N26 account with a new device, you'll receive two codes ‚Äì a Login SMS code with 6 digits and Pairing SMS code with 4 digits. You'll need the Login code to access your account and the Pairing code for pairing your device.

title: Was ist MoneyBeam?
content:
MoneyBeam erm√∂glicht dir, deinen Kontakten in Echtzeit Geld zu schicken, ohne dass du dazu ihre Bankverbindung eingeben musst. Um einen MoneyBeam zu senden, logge dich in deine App ein:
Tippe auf "Aktionen" auf deinem Hauptbildschirm und w√§hle dann MoneyBeam.
W√§hle einen Kontakt aus der Liste aus oder f√ºge manuell einen Empf√§nger hinzu, indem du seine Telefonnummer und E-Mail Adresse angibst. Damit das klappt, muss der Empf√§nger ein N26 Nutzer sein und als solcher sichtbar sein.
Gib den Betrag sowie einen Verwendungszweck ein.
Best√§tige mit deiner Best√§tigungs-PIN und der Push-Mitteilung, die du erh√§ltst.
N26 Kunden werden den MoneyBeam sofort erhalten. Das Limit f√ºr MoneyBeams an andere N26 Nutzer liegt bei 1000‚Ç¨ pro 24 Stunden.
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erhalte 15‚Ç¨ f√ºr jeden Freund, dem du N26 erfolgreich empfiehlst. Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: Wie bekomme ich einen Kredit?
content:
Mit N26 Credit haben wir eine Partnerschaft mit auxmoney (in Deutschland) und Younited Credit (in Frankreich) geschlossen, um Privatkredite zwischen 1.000 und 50.000 ‚Ç¨ mit einer Laufzeit von 6 bis 84 Monaten anzubieten.
Beantrage jederzeit ein Darlehen direkt in der App im Bereich Entdecken und dann unter N26 Finanzprodukte.¬†Wir stellen dir einige Fragen zum Darlehen und zu deiner¬†Kreditw√ºrdigkeit¬†(du musst zus√§tzliche Onlinebanking-Informationen angeben, wenn du N26 weniger als 6 Monate genutzt hast).
Weise deine Identit√§t nach.¬†Wir ben√∂tigen deinen Personalausweis oder Reisepass in Deutschland und eventuell deinen Wohnsitznachweis (in Form einer Stromrechnung o. √§.). Als Nicht-EU-B√ºrger musst du uns ein Foto deiner Aufenthaltsgenehmigung schicken.
Bearbeite deine Antworten w√§hrend des Antragsprozesses.¬†Wenn du mit deinem Kreditantrag zufrieden bist, sende ihn in Echtzeit an uns und wir machen dir ein verbindliches Angebot, das du l√∂schen oder annehmen kannst. Andernfalls verfallen die Antr√§ge in 90 Tagen und du kannst w√§hrend dieser Zeit keinen weiteren Kredit beantragen.
Best√§tige deinen Kredit.¬†Wenn du unser Angebot annimmst, musst du den Vertrag entweder elektronisch per Videoanruf unterzeichnen oder per SMS best√§tigen.
Du erh√§ltst eine Push-Nachricht, sobald die Auszahlung erfolgt ist.¬†In Deutschland wird der Kreditbetrag in 5-7 Werktagen deinem N26 Konto gutgeschrieben. In Frankreich dauert die Auszahlung eine Woche.
Wir bieten Zinss√§tze zwischen 1,99% und 19% p. a. an. Au√üer den Zinsen fallen keine weiteren Kosten an. Wenn du jedoch¬†deinen Plan √§nderst¬†oder mit deinen monatlichen Zahlungen in Verzug bist, k√∂nnen zus√§tzliche Geb√ºhren anfallen.
Weitere Informationen findest du in den¬†AGB(neuen Tab)¬†zu N26 Credit.

title: How does N26 protect my money?
content: German deposit protection(new tab)¬†insures all deposits¬†up to ‚Ç¨100.000¬†held in the member states of the European Union. As the holder of a banking license, N26 Bank must comply with the rules of the German financial regulatory authority.

title: Bin ich in den USA steuerpflichtig?
content:
Als lizenzierte Bank sind wir gem√§√ü FATCA verpflichtet, dem ‚ÄúInternal Revenue Service‚Äù (IRS) alle Konten zu melden, die von Personen gef√ºhrt werden, die in den USA steuerpflichtig sind. Dieses Gesetz wurde vom amerikanischen Finanzministerium verabschiedet, um eine bessere Einhaltung von Steuervorschriften zu erreichen. So soll verhindert werden, dass amerikanische Staatsangeh√∂rige ausl√§ndische Banken und andere Finanzinstitute dazu verwenden, Steuern auf ihr Einkommen und Kapital zu vermeiden.¬†
Mehr Informationen zu FATCA findest du hier.(neuen Tab)
Laut FATCA ist ein amerikanischer Staatsangeh√∂riger unter anderem so definiert:
Staatsangeh√∂riger der USA (auch bei doppelter Staatsangeh√∂rigkeit)
Einwohner der USA, beispielsweise Inhaber einer g√ºltigen U.S. Greencard oder Person, die den ‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù erf√ºllt (siehe unten).
Falls du dir nicht sicher bist, ob du ein amerikanischer Staatsangeh√∂riger bist, wende dich bitte an einen Steuerberater.
‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù bedeutet:
Du warst im aktuellen Kalenderjahr 183 oder mehr Tage in den USA physisch anwesend.
ODER
Du warst innerhalb der letzten 3 Kalenderjahre 183 Tage in den USA physisch anwesend.
(31 Tage oder mehr im aktuellen Kalenderjahr) + (Anzahl der Tage, die du im letzten Jahr in den USA physisch anwesend warst) geteilt durch 3 + (Anzahl der Tage, die du im vorletzten Jahr in den USA physisch anwesend warst) geteilt durch 6.

Dar√ºber hinaus auch, wenn dein Konto die diese Angaben enth√§lt:
US-amerikanische Staatsangeh√∂rigkeit oder Wohnsitz in den USA
Geburtsort in den USA
Postanschrift oder Postfach in den USA
US-amerikanische Rufnummer
Dauerauftr√§ge an eine US-amerikanischen Adresse oder ein Konto, das in den USA verwaltet wird
F√ºr den Fall, dass wir folgende Dokumente nicht von dir erhalten, sind wir weiterhin dazu verpflichtet, dich als US Staatsangeh√∂rigen anzusehen:
Ein W-8BEN Formular oder eine √§hnliche Eigenerkl√§rung und
einen nicht US-amerikanischen Pass oder einen anderen regierungsamtlichen Ausweis, der deine Staatsangeh√∂rigkeit oder Nationalit√§t eines anderen Landes als den USA nachweist.
Falls du in den USA geboren bist, eine Kopie der Best√§tigung √ºber den Verlust deiner Staatsb√ºrgerschaft.

title: Wie melde ich mein N26 Konto f√ºr meine Steuerzahlungen in Frankreich an?
content:
(gilt f√ºr alle in Frankreich ans√§ssigen Kunden)
Nach dem allgemeinen Franz√∂sischen Steuergesetzbuch sind alle in Frankreich ans√§ssigen Personen verpflichtet, all ihre Bankkonten anzugeben, die sie innerhalb des Jahres der Einkommenserkl√§rung er√∂ffnet, genutzt oder geschlossen haben. Dazu geh√∂rt auch dein N26 Bankkonto. So funktioniert‚Äôs:
Markiere in deiner Steuererkl√§rung das K√§stchen Ausl√§ndisches Konto er√∂ffnet, genutzt oder geschlossen (8UU) (Compte √©tranger ouvert, utilis√© ou ferm√©).
F√ºlle das Cerfa n¬∞ 3917 Formular(neuen Tab) aus und f√ºge es deiner Steuererkl√§rung bei.

title: Shared Spaces - What is a power of attorney?
content:
The legal model behind Shared Spaces is called Power of Attorney (Kontovollmacht in German).¬†
Participants of a Shared Space do not have equal ownership of the account like a joint account in the traditional banking sense. After receiving Power of Attorney the participants obtain the right to act on behalf of the Owner regarding any transfer of funds within the Shared Space.
The person authorizing the other to act on his behalf is called the ‚ÄúOwner‚Äù, this person is the only account holder. The owner must be a N26 premium account holder e.g. N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business You.
This means that whoever created the Shared Space is its legal owner. The owner of a Shared Space:¬†
Owns all the funds within a Shared Space.¬†
Can transfer funds freely in and out of the account anytime.¬†
Can invite people to the Shared Space by granting others Power of Attorney.
Can revoke the Power of Attorney of a participant at any time.
Can also close a Shared Space after removing a participant. (all funds in the Shared Space will be transferred to the Owner‚Äôs Main Account)
By granting a person Power of Attorney, they‚Äôll have full access to all the money held within a Shared Space. This means that each participant can also transfer funds freely in and out of the Shared Space.¬†

N26 Bank GmbH cannot be held liable for payments covered by the Power of Attorney.
What are Shared Spaces?
How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?

content:

The money is available on your account instantly 

Adding money with a Apple or Google Pay

Cost:
Whilst this is the fastest and easiest way to instantly add funds in your N26 account, for us, processing these instant top-up transactions is more expensive than other account funding methods(new tab) we offer.

For both methods, the first deposit is always free but extra deposits are charged a fee of 3% of the deposit amount. By charging a card or digital wallet, your money is not sent to N26 instantly, and the fee covers additional costs associated with funding accounts before the money is received so that it is instantly available for your use.

title: Was kann ich tun, wenn ich meinen Dispo oder mein Darlehen nicht zur√ºckzahlen kann?
content:
Wir bieten R√ºckzahlungspl√§ne an, wenn du deinen¬†Dispo¬†oder dein Darlehen mit¬†N26 Credit¬†nicht zur√ºckzahlen kannst. Das kann passieren, wenn dein Dispo storniert wurde oder du mehr als zwei Monate gebraucht hast, um deinen negativen Saldo auszugleichen.
So geht es: Chatte mit uns und schlage einen detaillierten Plan vor, wie du deinen Dispokredit oder dein Darlehen in Raten zur√ºckzahlen willst, z. B. jeden Monat einen bestimmten Betrag, bis dein Darlehen abbezahlt ist. Es ist nicht m√∂glich, einfach den Gesamtbetrag zu einem sp√§teren Zeitpunkt zur√ºckzuzahlen.
Wir werden dann entweder akzeptieren, ablehnen oder einen alternativen Plan vorschlagen. Es liegt dann an dir, diesem zuzustimmen.
√úbrigens: Dein Konto wird geschlossen, wenn es √ºber einen l√§ngeren Zeitraum im Soll ist. Alle K√ºndigungsdaten sind endg√ºltig, es sei denn, du zahlst dein Darlehen vor diesem Datum zur√ºck. Wenn nicht, wird der Fall an ein Inkassob√ºro weitergeleitet.

title: CRS - Why we require certain information from our customers
content:
N26 as a financial institution is (according to CRS) required to report information directly to tax authorities in the European Union concerning financial accounts held by customers who are tax resident in another country.
CRS stands for Common Reporting Standard. The CRS has been developed by the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD) and is a global reporting standard for the automatic exchange of information (AEOI). The goal of CRS is to allow tax authorities to obtain a clearer understanding of financial assets held abroad by their residents for tax purposes in order to fight tax evasion. More than 90 countries have agreed to share information on residents' assets and incomes in conformation with CRS.
In order for us to be able to accurately determine whether an account is to be reported to the tax authorities for CRS purposes, we need to ask you:
In which country(ies) are you a tax resident?¬†

You are normally a ‚Äútax resident‚Äù and therefore subject to tax on your worldwide income in the country where you have a residential address. If you have a place to live in more than one country, then there are normally ‚Äútie-breaker rules‚Äù included in double tax treaties and tax laws of the relevant countries that help determine where you are a tax resident. It may be that you are tax resident in more than one country during a year and, if so, we'd need to know both the country and your taxpayer identification number for each of them in order to accurately report the information to the relevant tax authorities.¬†

What is your taxpayer identification number (‚ÄúTIN‚Äù) for each country?

The issuance and format of a TIN differs by country. For EU countries, the European Commission has published guidance on TINs in each EU country(new tab), which may help you in identifying your individual TIN(s) in these countries.¬†
In case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the N26 app. To do this, simply log in to the N26 app and go to:
My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Tax Information¬†

title: Que se passe-t-il si le solde de mon compte est n√©gatif ?
content:
Le solde de votre compte peut √™tre n√©gatif si vous disposez d‚Äôun¬†d√©couvert autoris√©(nouvel onglet)¬†uniquement disponible en Allemagne et en Autriche. Le taux d'int√©r√™t applicable au d√©couvert est de 8,9 %.
Si le solde de votre compte N26 est n√©gatif et que vous ne disposez pas d‚Äôautorisation de d√©couvert, vous recevrez un email de notre part, pour vous indiquer que vous devez r√©gulariser la situation de votre compte.
M√™me si vous n‚Äôavez pas utilis√© votre compte N26 depuis son ouverture, des frais ont pu √™tre pr√©lev√©s (comme la mensualit√© de votre compte N26 You ou N26 Metal ou les frais de livraison express de votre carte). M√™me si vous ne disposez pas de d√©couvert autoris√©, le solde de votre compte peut exceptionnellement √™tre n√©gatif.
Vous devrez dans ce cas¬†alimenter votre compte¬†en effectuant un virement SEPA depuis un autre compte bancaire (vous devrez indiquer √† la banque √©mettrice qu‚Äôil s‚Äôagit d‚Äôun virement international si vous r√©sidez hors d‚ÄôAllemagne). Pour cela, vous devez utiliser votre IBAN N26. Veuillez noter que si vous r√©sidez en Allemagne ou en Autriche, vous avez la possibilit√© de d√©poser des esp√®ces sur votre compte avec¬†CASH26. Si vous n‚Äôalimentez pas votre compte, il restera actif pendant 60 jours.
Voici ce qu‚Äôil se passera si vous ne d√©posez pas d‚Äôargent sur votre compte apr√®s avoir re√ßu un premier rappel de paiement de notre part :
Vous recevrez encore 2 rappels de paiement par email, vous demandant d‚Äôalimenter votre compte. Chaque rappel vous sera factur√© 3 ‚Ç¨.
Si vous √™tes en Allemagne ou en Autriche et que vous b√©n√©ficiez d‚Äôune autorisation de d√©couvert : celle-ci sera annul√©e apr√®s le second rappel de paiement et vous devrez rembourser l‚Äôensemble du montant d√ª (ou adh√©rer √† un plan de remboursement).
Si vous avez un compte N26 You, N26 Metal ou N26 Business You : tous les avantages de celui-ci seront annul√©s au bout de 60 jours. Ce compte premium sera ferm√© et vous aurez alors automatiquement un compte N26 Standard.
Si vous ne nous r√©pondez pas au bout de 60 jours, nous pourrons fermer votre compte N26.

title: How to set my card PIN?
content:
We don‚Äôt send you a PIN via post; you set the PIN for your Mastercard or Maestro card¬†once you‚Äôve successfully connected your smartphone to your account and¬†activated¬†your card(s). To set or change your card PIN:
Go to üë§ My Account.
Select Card settings and swipe to choose a card.
Select Reset PIN on the mobile or WebApp(new tab).
Enter the 10-digit token number on your card.
Choose your new PIN and confirm it.
Keep in mind that:
If you live in France, Spain, Ireland, Greece, Finland, Estonia or the UK, you must make your first payment using Chip and PIN before you can use your card anywhere else. You can also first make a withdrawal or balance inquiry at ATM instead.
For security reasons we don‚Äôt accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences (such as 1111, 1234, or 4321). If the number you‚Äôve chosen is not accepted please try again using a different combination.
If a PIN is entered incorrectly three times in a row, the card will automatically be blocked for security reasons. If this happens, please contact our Customer Support via chat so we can unblock it for you.
Your card PIN is separate from your Confirmation PIN, however you can choose the same PIN for both.

title: Why was I charged twice?
content:
We offer you banking in real-time. This means you‚Äôre able to see the processes going on behind your account that you otherwise wouldn‚Äôt see. There are two main transaction types that take place during an in-store or online purchase:
Authorizations.¬†A block or reserved amount made by a retailer or merchant. This includes anything from your morning cup of coffee to hotel or car rental bookings (including security deposits).
Presentments.¬†The actual amount that is deducted from your account. Again, that cup of coffee is finally cleared from your account or you can get your security deposit back once that hotel room or car is returned safe and sound.
Once an authorization has been confirmed, we can‚Äôt cancel or reverse it. At that point, a few things can happen to¬†your authorization: it turns into a presentment, it's rejected, or it expires¬†(and automatically returns to your account up to 12 days at the latest). Keep in mind:
Sometimes you‚Äôll see both the authorization and the presentment if they become disconnected or due to technical issues at the payment terminal. Eventually the authorization will expire. If it doesn‚Äôt, we can help get your money back.
Verification authorizations (usually very small amounts) are used to check whether your card is active. This money will return to your account.
The amount of an authorization can differ from the final presentment for a variety of reasons.

title: How does N26 Insurance work?
content:
N26 Insurance offers the ability to digitize your insurance and have all your existing insurance policies in one place.
How it works: our partner¬†Clark Germany GmbH(new tab)¬†becomes your insurance broker. They‚Äôll do the work of contacting your current insurance companies and asking for all the necessary information about your policies. Mandates from previous brokers will also be transferred for you. From then on you can easily report any claims directly in the app. To begin the process, log into your mobile app:
Swipe right until you reach the Insurance tab
Tap on Digitize your insurance or +
Choose the first policy you‚Äôd like to add and provide information about your insurer
Finalize your entry (you can delete the entry or re-enter it at this stage)
Once you have created up to 10 insurance policies tap Next
Read and accept the T&C's(new tab)
Confirm the broker mandate with your electronic signature
Once you‚Äôre done, you can direct any insurance questions to Clark at +49 69 153 229 339, Monday to Friday from 9am to 6pm.
