title: Wie lange dauern √úberweisungen?
content:
Alle eingehenden nationalen und internationalen SEPA-√úberweisungen werden in Echtzeit gebucht, wenn sie als Echtzeit√ºberweisungen get√§tigt werden. Echtzeit√ºberwiesungen unterliegen geltenden Bankregularien, wodurch ggf. Verz√∂gerungen auftreten k√∂nnen.
Falls die auftraggebende Bank keine Echtzeit√ºberweisungen unterst√ºtzt oder nicht diese Form der √úberweisung gew√§hlt hat, dauert die √úberweisung einen Bankarbeitstag, also bis zu zwei Werktage. Bitte beachte, dass eingehende √úberweisungen regul√§r einen Bankarbeitstag ben√∂tigen.
Wenn du also eine √úberweisung kurz vor dem Wochenende oder einem Bankfeiertag t√§tigst, dauert es etwas l√§nger, bis der Betrag dem Zahlungsempf√§nger gutgeschrieben wird. Wir wickeln unsere SEPA-√úberweisungen √ºber das europ√§ische Zahlungsverkehrssystem TARGET2(neuen Tab) ab, welches Zahlungen an Werktagen von 7:00 bis 18:00 CET verarbeitet. Abgesehen von Wochenenden arbeitet TARGET2 auch an folgenden Feiertagen nicht: 1. Januar (Neujahr), Karfreitag, Ostermontag, 1. Mai (Tag der Arbeit), 25. und 26. Dezember (Weihnachtsfeiertage).
Mit MoneyBeam kannst du Geld an andere N26-Nutzer in Echtzeit √ºberweisen. Bei √úberweisungen in Fremdw√§hrungen √ºber TransferWise variiert die Dauer (du bekommst aber eine gesch√§tztes Geldeingangsdatum angezeigt, wenn du die √úberweisung t√§tigst).
Jede √úberweisung musst du noch einmal √ºber eine Push-Nachricht in deiner App best√§tigen, bevor wir sie freigeben.
Bitte beachte: Wir akzeptieren nur Euro-√úberweisungen innerhalb des SEPA-Raums (also keine SWIFT-√úberweisungen).
Wenn deine eingehende √úberweisung au√üerhalb dieses Zeitrahmens liegt, kontaktiere bitte den Zahlungssender bzw. dessen Bank f√ºr einen Nachforschungsauftrag. Wir k√∂nnen eingehende √úberweisungen nicht √ºberpr√ºfen. Wir haben aber einige Gr√ºnde gesammelt, weshalb deine SEPA-√úberweisung oder √úberweisung in einer Fremdw√§hrung fehlgeschlagen sein k√∂nnte.

title: How to make transfers in foreign currencies?
content:
We have partnered with TransferWise to make foreign currency transfers easy. TransferWise offers real-time exchange rates and no hidden fees.
To initiate a transfer in a foreign currency start by logging into the mobile app: 
From the Home screen choose the Actions tab,

Select Add Money followed by Foreign Currency Transfer,

Choose ‚Äúadd a new recipient‚Äù or select an existing payee. When adding a new recipient you'll be given the option to change the currency by tapping on the Euro flag in the top right corner of the screen,

Enter the amount you'd like to send and add any additional bank details,

Finalize the transfer with your Confirmation PIN.
If we don‚Äôt currently offer the¬†foreign currency(new tab)¬†you need, please visit¬†TransferWise(new tab)¬†for more currency options. You can log in by entering your N26 account email and selecting Forgot password? You‚Äôll receive an email from TransferWise to change your password and then you can use both log in details to perform the transfer from there.
Please note that foreign currency transfers in the app are not possible with the N26 Business or Business You account nor are transfers to businesses.

title: Can N26 close my account?
content:
In short: yes.
We can close your account in 3 ways (with 2 months notice, 14 days notice, or immediately). These cancellations are final: our Customer Support can‚Äôt provide any information about the background of individual cancellations nor can they reverse the decision. You‚Äôre also able to terminate your business relationship with us at any time, immediately, and without a reason. Any outstanding contract fees must be paid before the termination date.
2 months notice:
We have the right to terminate any business relationship with 2 months notice without a cause (see section 19 (1) of our¬†T&Cs(new tab)¬†or ¬ß 675h of the German Civil Code).
14 days notice:
We can also terminate any business relationship with 14 days notice (see section 19 (3) of our¬†T&Cs(new tab)) if reasonable cause is given due to the breach of contractual duties. These include:
Using a personal account for business purposes.¬†According to our T&Cs, a private account may only be used for personal use. Any credit transfers that relate to professional fees for provided services and/or sold products are considered business transactions. If you‚Äôd like to use your account for this purpose, please sign up for an N26 Business or N26 Business You account.
Providing incorrect or insufficient information for a routine background check. We‚Äôre a bank so we sometimes run checks on transactions. If you don‚Äôt provide correct and/or sufficient information about the transaction in question, we have the right to terminate the business relationship in order to be compliant with German financial regulations.
Displaying abusive behaviour towards N26 employees. We don‚Äôt tolerate abusive behaviour towards our employees. The threat of physical harm or general abusive behaviour may be considered a criminal offense according to German law and will be reported to the respective authority without exception.
Immediate cancellation
We may also terminate any business relationship on an extraordinary basis (see section 19 (3) of our¬†T&Cs(new tab)). That means: at any time, without prior notice, and without a cancellation period when there is reasonable cause for such termination. These include:
Providing incorrect statements to N26 about your financial situation, especially when you apply for a credit.
Failure to repay your loan or any debt toward N26.
Failure to comply with N26's requests about your loan (see provision or increase of security, section 13 (2) of our T&C's(new tab)).

It‚Äôs not yet possible to switch between accounts so it‚Äôs important to know if N26 Business is right for you:
The N26 Business account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can‚Äôt have your company‚Äôs name on the account or card.
The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. It‚Äôs currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (it‚Äôs available in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands).
As with the N26 bank account, the account is free and we cover certain cash withdrawals as part of our Fair Use Policy. Unlike other accounts, transfers in foreign currencies aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business within the app. You can visit Transferwise(new tab) for this.

title: ¬øC√≥mo ingresar dinero en la cuenta?
content:
Puedes ingresar dinero en tu cuenta de varias formas, en cuanto hayas verificado tu identidad:
MoneyBeam: recibe dinero instant√°neo de otros usuarios de N26.
Tarjeta de d√©bito: Puedes ingresar dinero en tu cuenta introduciendo los detalles de tu tarjeta desde la app de N26. Puedes ingresar entre 20 y 150 ‚Ç¨. No podemos aceptar tarjetas de cr√©dito American Express.
Apple Pay o Google Pay(pesta√±a nueva):¬† Puedes ingresar dinero a tu cuenta utilizando Apple Pay (para dispositivos iOS) o Google Pay (para dispositivos Android). Puedes ingresar entre 20 y 150 ‚Ç¨. No podemos aceptar tarjetas de cr√©dito American Express o de prepago.
Transferencia SEPA: La transferencia tiene que ser en euros y desde uno de los pa√≠ses de la zona SEPA. Solo necesitas el IBAN de tu cuenta y tu nombre tal y como viene en el documento de identidad que utilizaste para abrir la cuenta. Ten en cuenta lo siguiente: 
A la hora de introducir los datos de destinatario, aseg√∫rate de que de que tu nombre est√° escrito como en el documento que utilizaste durante de la verificaci√≥n de identidad (especialmente si tienes una cuenta N26 Business, ya que no aceptamos nombres de empresas). 
La transferencia ser√° inmediata si el banco emisor acepta transferencias inmediatas, en caso contrario, se completar√° en un d√≠a laborable. Sin embargo, debido a los horarios de apertura de los bancos involucrados, un d√≠a bancario puede extenderse a dos d√≠as h√°biles.
En Francia tu primera transferencia debe ser desde otra cuenta que est√© a tu nombre. Para el resto de regiones, puedes utilizar cualquier cuenta (sin que sea necesario que seas el titular). 
CASH26: si tienes una cuenta en Alemania, Austria o Italia, utiliza este sistema para depositar efectivo en alguno de los comercios asociados.
Terceros: N26 es ¬´El Banco M√≥vil¬ª, por lo que nuestros productos est√°n totalmente orientados hacia el √°mbito tecnol√≥gico de los pagos m√≥viles y contactless. De todas formas, si necesitas ingresar dinero en efectivo y no vives en un pa√≠s donde est√© disponible CASH26, puedes hacerlo a trav√©s de terceros, como por ejemplo con el servicio de giros nacionales que ofrece Correos(pesta√±a nueva).

title: Custom Audiences
content:
Data Processing in the framework of Facebook Custom Audiences
Custom Audiences allows us to exclude you, as an existing N26 customer, from our advertisements. We do not want to display irrelevant ads to you. Furthermore, it allows us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other Facebook users. These so called ‚ÄúLookalike-Audiences‚Äù are more similar to our customers than the average Facebook user.¬†
In order to profit from the benefits as described above we provide a hashed version of your N26 email address to Facebook. The so-called ‚Äúhashing‚Äù is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. Facebook then matches this email address against your potential Facebook email address. After the matching, regardless of whether it was successful or not, any hashed email addresses are deleted within 6-8 hours by Facebook. Facebook does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. You can find this and further information in the terms of Facebook Custom Audiences(new tab).
You can revoke your consent according to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR to this data processing in the N26 web app at any time.

title: CRS - Warum wir bestimmte Informationen von dir ben√∂tigen
content:
N26 ist als reguliertes Finanzinstitut gem√§√ü des Common Reporting Standard (CRS) dazu verpflichtet, steuerlichen Beh√∂rden in der Europ√§ischen Union Informationen √ºber Kundenkonten zur Verf√ºgung zu stellen, deren Inhaber in anderen L√§ndern steuerpflichtig sind.
Der CRS wurde von der OECD (Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development) entwickelt und ist ein globaler Standard f√ºr den automatischen Austausch von Informationen (AEOI). Das Ziel des CRS ist es, zur Bek√§mpfung von Steuerhinterziehung beizutragen, indem er steuerlichen Beh√∂rden den Bestand im Ausland befindlicher Verm√∂genswerte tranparenter macht. Mehr als 90 L√§nder haben sich erkl√§rt, im Rahmen des CRS Informationen ihrer Einwohner √ºber ihre Verm√∂genswerte und Einkommen zu teilen.
Damit wir feststellen k√∂nnen, ob ein Konto den steuerlichen Beh√∂rden zwecks CRS mitzuteilen ist, m√ºssen wir dich fragen:
In welchem Land du als steuerpflichtige Person giltst:
Normalerweise giltst du als steuerpflichtige Person desjenigen Landes, in dem deine Wohnadresse liegt. Wenn du mehrere Wohnadressen in verschiedenen L√§ndern hast, greifen f√ºr gew√∂hnlich bestimmte Entscheidungsregeln, die in den Steuerabkommen und Steuergesetzen der betreffenden L√§nder festgehalten sind. Es kann vorkommen, dass du in mehreren L√§ndern steuerpflichtig bist. Wenn dieser Fall gegeben ist, m√ºssen wir wissen, um welche L√§nder es sich handelt und wie deine entsprechenden Identifikationsnummern als Steuerzahler lauten, damit wir den steuerlichen Beh√∂rden zuverl√§ssige Informationen zur Verf√ºgung stellen k√∂nnen.

Wie deine Steuer-Identifikationsnummer (‚ÄúTIN‚Äù) lautet:
Die Zuteilung und das Format der TIN variiert zwischen den L√§ndern. Die EU hat eine Anleitung(neuen Tab) zur Identifikation der TINs ihrer Mitgliedstaaten ver√∂ffentlicht, mit der du deine individuelle(n) TIN(s) in den verschiedenen L√§ndern identifizieren kannst.
Falls sich deine Lebenslage ver√§ndert, kannst deine Steuerinformationen in der N26 App jederzeit anpassen. Logge dich daf√ºr einfach in deine N26 App ein, und gehe zum Bereich: Mein Konto > Einstellungen > Pers√∂nliche Einstellungen > Steuerdaten, und aktualisiere dort deine Informationen.

title: Why can‚Äôt I get a Basiskonto?
content:
Under some circumstances, N26 is allowed to reject your Basiskonto request. That‚Äôs the case if you:
Live outside of a supported country.
Already have an N26 bank account or another bank account in Germany and can use it to its full extent. 
Were convicted of a crime against the bank, its employees, or its customers within the past 3 years. 
Have already maintained a Basiskonto at N26 in the past that was closed due to prohibited usage or a negative balance. 
You didn‚Äôt meet minimum requirements in accordance to the Money Laundering Act and the Credit Services Act.

title: How long does it take to send money with TransferWise?
content:
Once you've initiated your transfer via TransferWise you'll be given an estimated time frame.
If a TransferWise transfer fails, we‚Äôll notify you via push message. The amount will automatically be returned to your account a few days later.
TransferWise doesn‚Äôt charge extra fees for a returned payment and neither do we. However, some participating banks do charge fees, in which case TransferWise will deduct this amount from the money returned under their¬†Conditions of Use(new tab).
Common reasons for a failed transfer:
Error in the transfer details (for example, when entering the recipient‚Äôs name or account information).
Special characters or too many characters in the recipient‚Äôs name or reference field.
Limits have been reached or online payments aren‚Äôt active in card settings.
Foreign currency transfers aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business or N26 Business You or if the recipient is a business account.

title: Wie kann ich meine Karte sperren?
content:

Dort kannst du entscheiden, ob du deine Abhebungen am Geldautomaten, Online- und Auslandszahlungen vor√ºbergehend einschr√§nken, deaktivieren oder deine Karte komplett sperren m√∂chtest. 
So hast du die volle Kontrolle √ºber deine Karte und kannst dich vor unberechtigten Transaktionen sch√ºtzen. Du solltest deine Karte sofort sperren, wenn dir etwas verd√§chtig vorkommt. Du kannst sie sp√§ter jederzeit wieder entsperren. 

Falls du keinen Zugriff auf deine N26 Smartphone-App oder die WebApp hast, kannst du deine Karte oder dein Konto auch sperren, indem du uns unter +49 (0) 307 675 8333 anrufst.

title: Why did my SEPA transfer fail?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Applies to all regions except the UK
We accept¬†transfers¬†in EUR done via SEPA. We don't support SWIFT so if you need to make a¬†foreign currency transfer, please use TransferWise (in the app or from their¬†website(new tab)).
To get a transfer, you'll only need to provide the sender with your full name (as it's written on the ID you provided for verification) and your IBAN.
You can¬†find your IBAN¬†on your balance statements and in¬†üë§ My Account¬†(in the mobile app or¬†WebApp(new tab)).
Common reasons for failed transfers:
The recipient's name on the transfer order is different from the name on their account (must be their name as written on their ID).
The recipient's name is a company name instead of a personal/account name (applies to N26 Business).
The IBAN is incorrect.
You're not receiving the push message to confirm your transfer.
An inappropriate use was found. N26 has the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see¬†GwG ¬ß 10(new tab)). As a result, we may ask for documentation to verify the origin or source of these transactions. This can result in the credit being delayed or not taking place.

title: Will my direct debit go through if I am low on funds?
content:
If your account has insufficient funds when a direct debit is due, it will simply be declined. It is not possible to delay a direct debit. Please note, your account will not be charged an insufficient funds fee. 
The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Con quale frequenza posso prelevare contanti gratuitamente?
content:
I prelievi di contanti con la Mastercard dipendono dai Termini e condizioni del tuo Paese di riferimento (quello in cui √® stata originariamente spedita la carta):
Germania: Da 3 a 5* prelievi bancomat gratuiti al mese in Germania e prelievi illimitati nell'Eurozona (prelievi sempre gratuiti utilizzando¬†CASH26)
Austria e Italia: Prelievi gratuiti illimitati (compreso¬†CASH26)
Francia, Spagna, Paesi Bassi e resto d'Europa: 5 prelievi bancomat gratuiti al mese nel Paese di residenza e nell'Eurozona
Svizzera: 5 prelievi gratuiti al mese nella zona europea e 1,7% di ricarico sui prelievi locali
Regno Unito: Prelievi gratuiti illimitati
Si applica sempre una commissione di 2 ‚Ç¨ se si utilizza la carta¬†Maestro¬†¬†per prelevare contanti (disponibile solo in Germania, Austria e nei Paesi Bassi).
Controlla i nostri¬†listini prezzi¬†se ti √® stata addebitata una commissione per un¬†prelievo da uno sportello bancomat.
*Solo Germania: hai 5 prelievi gratuiti durante i primi tre mesi. Successivamente, riceverai 3 prelievi gratuiti al mese. Potrai effettuare 5 prelievi gratuiti invece di 3 se:
Hai meno di 26 anni
Ricevi lo stipendio, la pensione, la borsa di studio o i sussidi statali per almeno due mesi consecutivi (i prelievi gratuiti aggiuntivi iniziano il mese successivo)
Ricevi pagamenti per almeno 1.000 ‚Ç¨ al mese per almeno due mesi (i prelievi gratuiti aggiuntivi iniziano il mese successivo)

title: What are the benefits of N26 You?
content:
Upgrade to N26 You¬†and you‚Äôll receive 7 additional¬†Spaces¬†as well as free foreign ATM withdrawals worldwide. 
Keep these in mind when considering¬†N26 You(new tab):
The N26 You Mastercard has no embossing: the card details, including the number, CVV code, and 10-digit token are printed on the back.
If you upgrade to N26 You, the monthly fee of ¬£4.90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade. If you‚Äôre a new customer, the first fee will be deducted 15 days after you prove your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on your sign-up date. Meaning that, if you opened your account at the end of the month, the first two  monthly fees will be charged the following month.
The minimum membership is one year. Your contract automatically renews if you don‚Äôt cancel your membership at least 4 weeks before the contract expires.

title: How to give feedback or suggest a new product?
content:
We frequently send short surveys to review feedback but participation is voluntary and anonymous. For individual questions or suggestions, you can send us your feedback to¬†ideas@n26.com(new tab). We‚Äôre always grateful if you can take a minute or two to help us get even better.
And if you ever feel dissatisfied with one of our products or services, you can also¬†file a complaint.

title: Come dare il mio feedback o suggerire un nuovo prodotto?
content:
Inviamo spesso brevi sondaggi per richiedere feedback, ma la partecipazione √® volontaria e anonima. Per domande individuali o suggerimenti, puoi inviare i tuoi commenti a¬†ideas@n26.com(nuova tabella). Siamo sempre grati a chi dedica qualche minuto del suo tempo per aiutarci a migliorare.
E se dovessi essere insoddisfatto di uno dei nostri prodotti o servizi, puoi anche presentare un¬†reclamo.

title: How to log in with Two Factor Authentication?
content:
Two-Factor Authentication is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. You‚Äôre probably familiar with using only¬† your personal password to sign in to your account, but with Two-Factor Authentication you‚Äôll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.
Go here for more information on Two-Factor Authentication
When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you‚Äôll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or, if this isn't possible, you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number, confirming your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log in to your N26 account.
When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. This means the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.
First, you‚Äôll need to update your phone‚Äôs operating system and the N26 app to their latest versions. If you‚Äôre unable to login to your account, but still have access to your registered email address, try to reset your password. If you don‚Äôt have access to your registered email address, please contact us via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out.
Read more in our article on how to create a password.
If you‚Äôve lost access to your paired device, but you still have access to your registered phone number, you‚Äôll be able to log into your N26 account and request an authentication code. To do this:
Login to the Webapp
When prompted to confirm your login on your paired device, select Help
Choose Send SMS Code
Once you receive the SMS code, input it into the Webapp
As you've just confirmed the authentication code you‚Äôve successfully completed two-factor authentication, and can now pair your new device with your account.
If you don‚Äôt have access to your registered phone number ‚Äì either because you have a new phone number, or your phone was lost or stolen ‚Äì please contact our customer service via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out.
If you have an older smartphone that doesn‚Äôt support the latest app version, you won‚Äôt be able to access N26 via the mobile app anymore using that phone. 
However, you can still use our Webapp to view your account, to do this you'll need to confirm your login attempt via an SMS verification code which we‚Äôll send to your account's registered phone number.
You‚Äôll still be able to complete card transactions and cash withdrawals as normal using your Mastercard, but bear in mind that you won't be able to perform any bank transfers or payments until you can confirm the transfer within the N26 app.
Read more in our article on Strong Customer Authentification.

title: How to use N26 Savings?
content:
(Applies to Germany and Austria)
With N26 Savings, you can open a fixed savings account with a deposit between ‚Ç¨2.000 to ‚Ç¨100.000 for free. You can find it in the¬†Explore section then¬†N26 Financial Products. You won‚Äôt be able to access the deposited amount until the plan matures (from 3 to 60 months) but you‚Äôll earn up to 1.48% in interest during that time. After that, you‚Äôll receive the payout directly into your N26 account.
N26 Savings is possible through the close cooperation of three companies(new tab) with different partner banks. You‚Äôll have to accept the T&Cs of all four participating parties to open an account.
For regulatory reasons, we‚Äôll need information about your tax status. If you‚Äôre taxable in the United States, we‚Äôre currently unable to offer you our savings product.
You may be eligible for tax exemption. If so, complete our form(new tab) and open a chat with us. We'll forward your request to our partner bank.
As soon as you open your Savings account, the one-off amount will be debited from your current account. Please note that it can take up to 7 working days before your account is opened.
When the plan matures, you‚Äôll receive the deposited amount and the interest (minus any capital gains tax if applicable) into your N26 account within 2 days.
European law requires all member states to provide legal protection of up to ‚Ç¨100.000 per person per bank. We set an additional limit on Savings accounts in countries outside the eurozone so that this protection doesn‚Äôt fall below this limit in the event of exchange rate fluctuations.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: How do contactless payments work?
content:
It‚Äôs not possible to deactivate contactless payments. If you‚Äôre experiencing issues with your contactless payments, keep in mind that:¬†¬†
To activate contactless payments, you must first use your card at an ATM or payment terminal.¬†

Transactions up to ¬£40 don‚Äôt require a card PIN. For amounts over ¬£40, you‚Äôll need to enter your card PIN.¬†
Make sure your card is held directly onto an NFC-compatible payment terminal. If you remove your card too fast or didn‚Äôt hold it close enough, just try again.¬†

N26 Metal cards only have NFC on the backside of the card. Make sure to hold the backside of the card against the terminal to use NFC (using the front won‚Äôt work).

title: How to top up my account?
content:
Once you are successfully verified, you'll be able to top up your account in several ways:
CASH26 (in Germany, Austria, and Italy). Deposit cash through our partner stores;
MoneyBeam. Instantly receive money from other N26 users;
Debit card. You can add money to your account by entering the card details from your other account within the N26 app. You can choose to deposit between 20‚Ç¨ and 150‚Ç¨. Please note that prepaid cards are not accepted. Likewise, we don‚Äôt support American Express credit cards.
Apple Pay or Google Pay(new tab). You can add money to your account by using Apple Pay (for iOS devices) or GPay (for Android devices).You can choose to deposit between 20‚Ç¨ and 150‚Ç¨. Please note that prepaid cards are not accepted. Likewise, we don‚Äôt support American Express credit cards.
SEPA transfer. The transfer must be in EUR and within SEPA. You‚Äôll just need to provide your IBAN and your name as it‚Äôs written on the ID you used to create your account. You should also know that: 
For the transfer details, make sure the recipient‚Äôs name is your name as it‚Äôs written on the identity document you used to prove your identity (especially if you have an N26 Business account ‚Äì we don‚Äôt accept company names). 
The transfer will be instant if the sending bank support SEPA instant outgoing transfers, if not, it will completed within one banking day. Due to the opening times of the participating banks, one banking day may stretch to two working days.
In France, your first transfer can only be sent from another one of your accounts. For all other regions, you can use any other bank account to make the transfer (it doesn‚Äôt have to be under your name). 
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: Lege den Gegenwert deines N26 Invest Portfolios mit Moneyfarm (ehemals Vaamo) neu an
content:
Du kannst den Gegenwert deines N26 Invest-Portfolios reinvestieren in einen neuen Investment-Plan bei Moneyfarm.
Wichtiger Risiko-Hinweis: Bei dieser Option wird dein bestehendes Invest-Portfolio geschlossen. Das bedeutet: Abh√§ngig vom aktuellen Marktwert des Invest-Portfolios zum Zeitpunkt der Schlie√üung, k√∂nnen finanzielle Verluste entstehen im Vergleich zum urspr√ºnglich investierten Betrag.
So kannst du den Gegenwert deines N26 Invest-Portfolios bei Moneyfarm reinvestieren:
Erstelle ein Konto bei Moneyfarm(neuen Tab) und best√§tige deine E-Mail Adresse bei Moneyfarm. Benutze daf√ºr bitte den Link aus der E-Mail, die wir dir geschickt haben.
F√ºlle Moneyfarms Fragebogen zur Ermittlung deiner Risikopr√§ferenzen aus. Auf dieser Grundlage erh√§ltst du von Moneyfarm eine Empfehlung f√ºr ein/e Portfolio/Anlagestrategie, die zu dir passt.
Plane deine Investition, indem du ein/e Portfolio/Anlagestrategie w√§hlst und den anf√§nglichen Investitionsbetrag sowie deine monatlichen Einzahlungen festlegst. F√ºr N26 Invest-Kunden gibt es dabei keinen Mindestbetrag.
√ñffne dein Konto mithilfe deiner pers√∂nlichen Angaben (Name, Adresse, Geburtsort etc.).
Best√§tige als n√§chstes die AGB sowohl von Moneyfarm als auch von FIL Fondsbank GmbH.
Verifiziere dich mit der Video-Verifikation oder mit dem PostIdent-Verfahren.
Sobald deine Registrierung abgeschlossen ist, kannst du den Kundenservice(neuen Tab) von Moneyfarm kontaktieren. Moneyfarm leitet dann die Schlie√üung deines N26 Invest-Portfolios ein und die Reinvestition des Gegenwertes in deinen neuen Investment-Plan bei Moneyfarm.
Dann schickt Moneyfarms Kundenservice dir ein bereits ausgef√ºlltes Formular f√ºr das Portfolio zu. Dieses schickst du ihnen unterschrieben zur√ºck. (Elektronische Unterschriften werden akzeptiert.)
Moneyfarm erreichst du hier:
Tel: +49 (0) 69 3807 6632
E-Mail: (neuen Tab)service@moneyfarm.de(neuen Tab)

title: Wie kann ich Teilnehmer zu einem Shared Space hinzuf√ºgen oder davon entfernen?
content:
So entfernen Besitzer einen Teilnehmer aus einem Shared Space:
Tippe auf die 3 Punkte in der oberen rechten Ecke der Space-√úbersicht.
Tippe auf den Pfeil rechts neben des Namen des jeweiligen Teilnehmers in der Teilnehmerliste (iOS). Wenn du ein Android-Ger√§t verwendest, tippe einfach auf den Namen des Teilnehmers.
Tippe auf "Kontovollmacht widerrufen".
Best√§tige die Mitteilung auf dem n√§chsten Bildschirm und tippe auf "Kontovollmacht widerrufen".

So trittst du einem Shared Space bei:
Tippe in der Spaces-√úbersicht auf "ausstehend" und das Shared Spaces Symbol.
Lies dir die Aufkl√§rung zu Shared Spaces durch und gehe zur n√§chsten Seite √ºber Kontovollmachten.
Sieh dir die Informationen zur Kontovollmacht (die rechtliche √úbersicht) an. Sobald du die AGB durchgelesen und verstanden hast, tippe auf das K√§stchen "Kontovollmacht erteilen".
Gib deine Best√§tigungs-PIN ein.
Best√§tige auf deinem verkn√ºpften Smartphone die Push-Nachricht "Kontovollmacht akzeptieren".

Du brauchst gen√ºgend freie Spaces, um eine Einladung zu einem Shared Space annehmen zu k√∂nnen. Sonst kannst du nur weitermachen, wenn du einen anderen Space l√∂schst.
Es ist auch nicht m√∂glich, einen Space mit demselben Namen oder Bild wie dem des Shared Spaces zu verwenden. Du kannst Einladungen nur annehmen, wenn du den Namen oder das Bild des anderen Spaces √§nderst.

So verl√§sst du einen Space:
Tippe auf die 3 Punkte in der oberen rechten Ecke der Space-√úbersicht.
Tippe in den Einstellungen auf "Shared Space verlassen".
Best√§tige die Mitteilung auf der n√§chsten Seite und tippe auf "Space verlassen":
Shared Spaces lassen sich durch die N26 App oder WebApp erstellen und bearbeiten.

title: Wie finde ich meine IBAN oder Kontonummer?
content:
Du findest deine IBAN und unseren BIC  auf deinen Kontoausz√ºgen oder unter üë§ Mein Konto in der App oder WebApp(neuen Tab) (falls du deine Karte noch nicht aktiviert hast, aber Geld auf dein Konto einzahlen m√∂chtest.)

title: Come fare un reclamo?
content:
Per noi √® importante essere informati quando hai un problema con uno dei nostri prodotti o servizi. Se ti serve aiuto con il tuo conto, il nostro Servizio Clienti sar√† in grado di fornire un‚Äôadeguata soluzione alle tue richieste in modo rapido e veloce. Contattaci via chat direttamente dalla app o dalla WebApp. 
Qualora non riuscissimo a risolvere il problema in modo soddisfacente, mettiamo a disposizione dei nostri clienti un ufficio dedicato alla gestione dei reclami.
Un reclamo pu√≤ essere inviato per iscritto a:
N26 Bank GmbH - Ufficio Reclami Italia
Klosterstra√üe 62, 10179 Berlino, Germania
In alternativa, pu√≤ essere inviato via email a: reclami@n26.com oppure attraverso un messaggio di posta elettronica certificata (PEC) a: reclami@pec.n26.com
L‚Äôindicazione dei propri dati identificativi (nome, cognome, codice fiscale), del numero di conto corrente e dei motivi del reclamo rendono pi√π agevole l‚Äôelaborazione del reclamo da parte nostra. Se viene presentato per mezzo di un rappresentante, il reclamo deve anche essere accompagnato da apposita procura autenticata.
N26 si impegna a rispondere entro:
30 giorni solari per i reclami relativi a operazioni e servizi bancari e finanziari;
15 giorni lavorativi per i reclami relativi ai servizi di pagamento come bonifici, disposizioni permanenti di pagamenti, addebiti su carte di debito e altro. Nel caso in cui non sia possibile per noi rispettare il termine dei 15 giorni, N26 invier√† una risposta interlocutoria indicando le ragioni del ritardo e il termine entro il quale verr√† fornita la risposta definitiva, in ogni caso entro il termine massimo di 35 giorni lavorativi.
I reclami presentati con modalit√† diverse da quelle sopra esposte oppure inviati a indirizzi diversi da quelli indicati, si considereranno pervenuti nel momento in cui saranno recapitati all‚ÄôUfficio Reclami.¬†
Se il reclamo √® ritenuto fondato, N26 comunicher√† al cliente le iniziative che si impegna ad assumere ed i relativi tempi di realizzazione.
Se il reclamo √® ritenuto infondato, N26 provveder√† a fornire un‚Äôillustrazione chiara delle motivazioni del rigetto. Fornir√†, inoltre, indicazioni sulla possibilit√† di ricorrere a strumenti alternativi per la risoluzione della controversia.

Nel caso in cui non riuscissimo a trovare una soluzione soddisfacente per il cliente, √® possibile:
presentare un ricorso all‚ÄôArbitro Bancario Finanziario(nuova tabella)
rivolgersi al Conciliatore Bancario Finanziario(nuova tabella)
L‚Äô ABF e il CBF sono due sistemi di risoluzione alternativa delle controversie, che intervengono nel momento in cui il cliente non riceve risposta oppure se la risoluzione proposta √® ritenuta insoddisfacente.
In alternativa, si pu√≤ ricorrere ad un altro organismo specializzato iscritto nell‚Äôapposito registro tenuto dal Ministero della Giustizia. L‚Äôelenco degli organismi di mediazione √® disponibile sul sito www.giustizia.it.
Infine, la Commissione Europea ha messo a disposizione la Risoluzione delle Controversie Online (ODR(nuova tabella)), una piattaforma per aiutare i consumatori a contestare i contratti online in via stragiudiziale.

title: ¬øC√≥mo pedir una tarjeta?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Los env√≠os est√°ndar tardan hasta 10 d√≠as laborables. Los env√≠os en algunas zonas espec√≠ficas de los siguientes pa√≠ses pueden tardar m√°s: Eslovaquia, Espa√±a, Estonia, Grecia, Italia, los Pa√≠ses Bajos y Portugal.)
Puedes pedir una nueva tarjeta en caso de que la tuya se pierda, se rompa, te la roben, o si es que hay un problema con el¬†env√≠o¬†de tu primera tarjeta.
Si todav√≠a no has activado ninguna tarjeta y ya han pasado m√°s de 10 d√≠as laborables, necesitar√°s escribirnos por chat para que podamos pedirte una nueva.
Si ya has activado una tarjeta anteriormente: 
Primero, revisa tu direcci√≥n de env√≠o en la app: ve a¬†Gestionar,¬†Configuraciones¬†y luego¬†Configuraci√≥n personal. Aqu√≠ podr√°s ver y actualizar tu direcci√≥n de env√≠o. Despu√©s de eso:
Pide una nueva tarjeta en¬†Gestionar¬†y selecciona¬†Configuraci√≥n de tarjetas. Desliza la imagen de la tarjeta hasta que veas la que deseas pedir y selecciona¬†Volver a pedir.
La primera Mastercard que recibes es gratuita. Luego, el coste de reposici√≥n es de 6 ‚Ç¨ para la mayor√≠a de los casos (para N26 Metal es de 45 ‚Ç¨).
El¬†env√≠o express¬†tiene un coste de 25 ‚Ç¨ para N26 Standard (incluidos los 6 ‚Ç¨ en concepto de reposici√≥n de la tarjeta). El env√≠o expr√©s no est√° disponible para la tarjetas N26 You y Metal.
Los env√≠os de las tarjetas¬†N26 You¬†o¬†N26 Metal¬†(al pasarte a una de estas dos cuentas) ser√°n gratuitos. En caso de que una tarjeta se pierda de camino a tu direcci√≥n, tambi√©n te la repondremos de forma gratuita.
Si eres cliente de N26 You o est√°s pensando en pasarte a N26 You, tienes la posibilidad de elegir tu tarjeta en uno de los 5 nuevos colores. Desde la app, en Configuraci√≥n de tarjetas secciona Volver a pedir y podr√°s elegir entre: aguamarina, pomelo, arena, grafito y oc√©ano.
Una vez que recibas tu nueva tarjeta, tienes que¬†activarla.

title: ¬øC√≥mo ganar dinero al invitar a mis amigos a N26?
content:
Recibes 15‚Ç¨ cada vez que invitas exitosamente a un amigo a N26 (hasta un m√°ximo de 1.500‚Ç¨). 
Puedes empezar a invitar amigos en cuanto tienes acceso a tu cuenta (en la app o la¬†Web App(pesta√±a nueva)).
Para que t√∫ recibas la recompensa, tu amigo debe cumplir los siguientes requisitos:
Registrarse siguiendo tu enlace o c√≥digo de invitaci√≥n.
Activar la tarjeta Mastercard desde la app. (Si vives en Espa√±a, es necesario que realices una retirada en un cajero para activar completamente la tarjeta).
Hacer una transacci√≥n (en tienda, online o cajero) con la tarjeta Mastercard por un valor m√≠nimo de 15 ‚Ç¨.
Para invitar amigos:
Inicia sesi√≥n en la app del m√≥vil
Desde la pantalla principal, pulsa sobre el icono üë§situado en la esquina superior derecha y despu√©s en ''Mi Cuenta''.
Pulsa en¬†Invitar Amigos.
Pulsa en¬†C√≥digo de invitaci√≥n¬†para copiarlo y selecciona una de las opciones disponibles para compartirlo.
Escribe un mensaje a tu amigo o env√≠a el mensaje predeterminado.
Pulsa¬†''Enviar''.
Puedes consultar el estado de tu invitaci√≥n en la app o la Web App.
Si tu recompensa no te ha llegado todav√≠a, tambi√©n hemos recolectado las¬†posibles razones.
*El enlace no caduca y se puede usar infinitas veces. Los c√≥digos y enlaces de invitaci√≥n se deben utilizar solo para fines personales y no comerciales. Esto significa que puedes compartir tu enlace de invitaci√≥n con tus contactos personales a trav√©s de las redes sociales, siempre y cuando t√∫ seas el/la propietario/a principal del contenido. N26 tiene derecho a cancelar el programa de invitaci√≥n en cualquier momento.

title: How to connect or disconnect my smartphone to my account?
content:
In order to use your N26 account, you need a smartphone : either an iPhone (5s or newer, at least iOS 11) or an Android (6.0 or newer - we do not support the customized versions of Amazon Fire and Oxygen OS). Only one device can be paired per account.
You'll need to pair and/or unpair your smartphone when you first create an account or if you get a new phone number or device.
To pair your smartphone with your account, simply open the app on your smartphone. You will be asked to¬†confirm your mobile phone number.
Enter the¬†4-digit code we send you via SMS¬†and your phone is paired. 
If you want to pair a new device, you must unpair your old device for¬†security reasons. You can do this in¬†üë§ My Account¬†(mobile app) or in the¬†Web app(new tab)¬†under¬†üë§ My Account¬†then¬†Security Settings if you don‚Äôt have access to your smartphone anymore. You‚Äôll receive an email from us with further instructions.
If you log into your N26 account with a new device, you'll receive two codes ‚Äì a Login SMS code with 6 digits and Pairing SMS code with 4 digits. You'll need the Login code to access your account and the Pairing code for pairing your device.

title: Where can I use my Maestro card?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Applies to Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands
Let‚Äôs get a couple of things out of the way: your Maestro can‚Äôt be used for online purchases and it‚Äôs not an EC or Girocard (in Germany).
But you can use your card in ATMs or shops where the Maestro symbol is displayed. Each¬†ATM transaction¬†using your Maestro is ‚Ç¨2 (plus a fee of 1,7% of the amount for foreign currency withdrawals).
You can¬†order your Maestro¬†card directly in the app only if you live in Germany, Austria or the Netherlands and have received a transfer of at least 100 ‚Ç¨ from one of these 3 countries.
If you‚Äôre having issues using your Maestro, first check that your¬†card settings¬†are activated. If nothing is blocked, contact Customer Support via chat and we‚Äôll look into it for you.

title: What does N26 do with my tax information?
content:
The OECD requires certain tax information to be shared by means of the Common Reporting Standard(new tab) (ECR). To carry out our obligations, we must establish which country you‚Äôre taxable in. We do this through your tax identification or National Insurance number. 
We forward this information via the German Federal Tax Office to tax authorities in other countries if: 
You live in a ECR participating country.
You have a postbox or a second registered address in another ECR participating country.
When registering you gave a telephone number belonging to another ECR participating country.
You have a standing order, or make regular payments, to an account located in another ECR participating country.
We also forward data to the U.S. Internal Revenue Service(new tab) (IRS) according to the Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act(new tab) (FATCA). We may request your Social Security Number (SSN) in order to check your tax status in the U.S. because:
You are a citizen of the U.S (including dual citizenship).
When registering you gave a telephone number belonging to the U.S.
You were born in the U.S. (or in a U.S. embassy located abroad).
You‚Äôre married to a U.S. national.
You gave us an address in the U.S.
You make regular payment transfers to the U.S.
To update your tax identification or social security number in the N26 app:
Go to  My Account and tap on Settings and Account settings
Select Personal settings then Tax information
Select the country in which you‚Äôre tax-liable
Enter either your tax identification number or your social security number
Important information
In Germany, we need your Steueridentifikationsnummer (11 digits) not your Steuernummer (9 digits).
If you‚Äôre not tax-liable in another country, contact us so we can confirm your tax status.
In each and every case your personal data will be securely stored and only used for the fulfillment of ECR and FATCA requirements.
We‚Äôre unable to advise you on your tax status. If you‚Äôre unsure of your status please discuss the matter with a tax advisor.
If you‚Äôve entered the country in which you are liable for tax but not your tax identification number, please remove the country from the list shown to you in the app, reenter the country, and enter your tax identification number again.

title: Why is N26 secure?
content:
To protect your account, we use a two-layer security architecture:
Secure login. Your login, on both the mobile app and web app(new tab), consists of a username and password or fingerprint/face recognition (depending on your smartphone). Please choose a secure password and do not reveal your login details to anyone.
Confirmation PIN. This 4-digit code is required every time you make a transfer or connect/disconnect your phone. It is first set up when you have successfully connected your smartphone to your account, and can then be changed in the application after that. (Note: a Confirmation PIN is not the same as a Card PIN, which is the code you use when you withdraw cash from an ATM with your N26 card.)
Every time you contact us, we‚Äôll ask you some security questions to make sure it's really you. But we‚Äôll never ask for your debit card number, card verification code (CVV), password, or your card or Confirmation PIN(s).
The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: What if my balance is negative?
content:
Your balance can be negative as long as you‚Äôre within your¬†Overdraft¬†limit. 
If you have a negative account balance, you'll be charged an overdraft interest rate of 8.9%.
Otherwise, you‚Äôll receive an email to notify you that the authorized limit of your account has been exceeded. This means you don‚Äôt have enough funds on your account to cover future charges.
Even if you haven‚Äôt used your account since you opened it, certain charges still apply (such as N26 You or N26 Metal monthly fees or express delivery costs) and have resulted in a negative balance.
So you‚Äôll need to¬†top up your account¬†via SEPA transfer (choose international transfer if you‚Äôre making the transfer outside of Germany) or¬†CASH26¬†(if you‚Äôre in Germany or Austria). Your account will remain active for the next 60 days without doing so. At that point:
You‚Äôll receive two additional reminders (each cost ‚Ç¨3).
If you have an Overdraft: it‚Äôll be cancelled after the second reminder and you‚Äôll have to repay that amount immediately (or you can set up a repayment plan).
If you have an N26 You, N26 Metal, or N26 Business You account: all benefits will be cancelled after 60 days and your account will turn into a standard one.
If you don‚Äôt respond after 60 days, we may close your account.

title: Come creare una password?
content:
Se hai dimenticato la password oppure vuoi cambiarla, seleziona Dimenticata? nella versione mobile dell'app o Password dimenticata? nella¬†WebApp(nuova tabella)¬†nella fase di accesso. Ti invieremo un link all‚Äôindirizzo e-mail registrato per creare una nuova password. 
La password non deve rispondere a requisiti specifici ma ne verr√† valutata la sicurezza nel momento in cui viene creata: verranno accettate le password considerate sicure dal nostro algoritmo.
Raccomandiamo l'utilizzo di una combinazione di parole piuttosto che l'uso di un'unica parola: segui la logica del "difficile da indovinare ma facile da ricordare".
Se la tua password non viene accettata dal nostro sistema, puoi inserire caratteri speciali, numeri oppure una combinazione di lettere maiuscole e minuscole.
Se inserisci una password errata per sei volte consecutive, l'accesso al conto verr√† temporaneamente bloccato. In tal caso, prova a collegarti nuovamente dopo 30 minuti.
La chat √® disponibile da luned√¨ a domenica dalle 07:00 alle 23:00.

title: When will my card arrive?
content:
The estimated delivery timeline for card deliveries is 10 working days. Deliveries may take longer in some specific areas in the following countries: Estonia, Greece, Italy, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia and Spain. 
Please consider this before taking any action regarding a card re-order:
If the delivery fails and your card is returned to us, we‚Äôll let you know via email.
If it's been less than 10 working days since you ordered your card, we encourage you to wait before reaching out to us. 
If you've waited longer than the expected timeline, please check and if necessary update your shipping address, you can do this within the N26 app: üë§ My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Shipping Address.
If your shipping address was incorrect and this is your first N26 card, please¬†contact us via live chat(new tab) and we‚Äôll help you order a new one.
If your shipping address was incorrect and you‚Äôve had an active card before, you'll need to reorder the card via the App.
If your shipping address was correct, there might have been an issue with your card's delivery. Please contact us via live chat and we‚Äôll help you order a new one.
If your card fails to arrive or you need your card quickly, you may consider ordering it via¬†express delivery (with an additional fee) which takes up to 3 working days. Please note that express delivery is not available for Metal cards.
Your first card is immediately produced and mailed out once you‚Äôre done¬†proving your identity. If you opened a Metal account, please to top up your account after completing the sign up with at least the amount of the monthly Metal fee in order to receive the card.
Tips for a successful delivery:
If your address contains special characters, please contact us via the live chat.
We only send cards to residential addresses (businesses are not accepted).
Don‚Äôt enter any spaces when entering the postal code for your delivery address.
Ensure that important delivery information isn‚Äôt missing (for example, the name on your mailbox if you live in Germany or your building number, stairwell number, and door code if applicable). If you‚Äôre staying somewhere temporarily (with a friend or in an Airbnb), make sure to include the name on the mailbox that belongs to the main tenant of the apartment.
If you‚Äôre moving somewhere and this is your first card, make sure to select the country and address where you‚Äôll move to and wish to receive your N26 card.

title: Why can‚Äôt I see other N26 users on MoneyBeam?
content:
To carry out real-time transactions such as¬†MoneyBeams, N26 checks your smartphone‚Äôs contact list and finds other N26 users based on saved phone numbers or emails. You can also enter someone‚Äôs contact details manually to send them a MoneyBeam.
If you don‚Äôt see your friend‚Äôs name on MoneyBeam but you know they‚Äôre an N26 user, they most likely haven‚Äôt made themselves visible. Indeed you can manage your visibility as an N26 user.
Most MoneyBeam transfers that fail between N26 users happen because there are multiple phone numbers or emails listed in the contact entry of a phone's address book. To avoid this, make sure you have the email and phone number your friend uses in your phone book in order to send them MoneyBeams. If the contact details you have stored don‚Äôt match, you cannot send a MoneyBeam to your friend.

title: Perch√© non ho ricevuto il mio codice di associazione?
content:
Il codice di associazione √® richiesto per¬†collegare il tuo smartphone. Se per qualsiasi motivo non hai ricevuto il tuo codice di associazione tramite SMS, puoi richiederlo fino a cinque volte tramite l'app. Aspetta gentilmente 30 secondi prima di richiederne uno nuovo.
Se hai gi√† richiesto tutti e cinque i codici e l'operazione non √® ancora riuscita, i tuoi tentativi verranno bloccati, per ragioni di sicurezza, per le successive 24 ore. Se ci√≤ accade, puoi decidere di aspettare, oppure contattare il nostro servizio clienti che sar√† felice di aiutarti. 
Se il tuo codice postale √® al di fuori dell'UE, √® probabile che dovrai contattarci per ricevere un codice di associazione.

title: Can N26 close my account?
content:
In short: yes.
We can close your account in 3 ways (with 2 months notice, 14 days notice, or immediately). These cancellations are final: our Customer Support can‚Äôt provide any information about the background of individual cancellations nor can they reverse the decision. You‚Äôre also able to terminate your business relationship with us at any time, immediately, and without a reason. Any outstanding contract fees must be paid before the termination date.
2 months notice:
We have the right to terminate any business relationship with 2 months notice without a cause (see section 19 (1) of our¬†T&Cs(new tab)¬†or ¬ß 675h of the German Civil Code).
14 days notice:
We can also terminate any business relationship with 14 days notice (see section 19 (3) of our¬†T&Cs(new tab)) if reasonable cause is given due to the breach of contractual duties. These include:
Using a personal account for business purposes.¬†According to our T&Cs, a private account may only be used for personal use. Any credit transfers that relate to professional fees for provided services and/or sold products are considered business transactions. If you‚Äôd like to use your account for this purpose, please sign up for an N26 Business or N26 Business You account.
Providing incorrect or insufficient information for a routine background check. We‚Äôre a bank so we sometimes run checks on transactions. If you don‚Äôt provide correct and/or sufficient information about the transaction in question, we have the right to terminate the business relationship in order to be compliant with German financial regulations.
Displaying abusive behaviour towards N26 employees. We don‚Äôt tolerate abusive behaviour towards our employees. The threat of physical harm or general abusive behaviour may be considered a criminal offense according to German law and will be reported to the respective authority without exception.
Immediate cancellation
We may also terminate any business relationship on an extraordinary basis (see section 19 (3) of our¬†T&Cs(new tab)). That means: at any time, without prior notice, and without a cancellation period when there is reasonable cause for such termination. These include:
Providing incorrect statements to N26 about your financial situation, especially when you apply for a credit.
Failure to repay your loan or any debt toward N26.
Failure to comply with N26's requests about your loan (see provision or increase of security, section 13 (2) of our T&C's(new tab)).

title: How to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?
content:
It‚Äôs important to keep your personal data up to date (for example, your phone number is necessary to¬†connect your smartphone¬†or to send and receive¬†MoneyBeams). Here's how you can change your information:
Delivery address,¬†password, or¬†tax information: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app. Just go to¬†üë§ My Account¬†and select¬†Settings¬†then¬†Personal Settings.
Name¬†and¬†sex: Chat with us and send two forms of ID: a copy of your new ID card or passport as well as an official document of the change (a marriage licence or updated birth certificate).  We can also re-order a card with your new name once your account has been updated.
Nationality: Chat with us and send a copy of your new ID card or passport.
Phone number or¬†email address: You‚Äôll need to contact us via chat for this. We need to verify it‚Äôs really you changing your information so we can‚Äôt change any personal data over email.

title: Why isn‚Äôt my photo verification working?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Applies to all regions except Germany
First, geolocation must be enabled. Then review the¬†guide(new tab)¬†we‚Äôve created to help you take the best pictures.
Most photo¬†verifications¬†fail due to bad picture quality.
Complete the process in a bright environment and use a phone with a good camera.
If you're using an Android, ensure a proper auto focus.
Enable or disable your flash according to the surrounding light (only with Android)
Take your selfie with your id document at eye level (the camera and your document should be at the same height as your eyes).
Make sure you‚Äôre the only person in the photo.
Check your document.
We only accept photos of your original ID (photocopies or screenshots are not permitted).
Keep your document on a flat surface and make sure your document is fully visible and the information on it is readable.
We only accept national IDs and passports.
Make sure your document isn't damaged in any way.
If you take a picture of your ID and a selfie and the first attempt doesn‚Äôt go through, you can just start over again.
As soon as your verification is complete, we‚Äôll send you your N26 Mastercard.¬†Deliveries¬†take up to 10 days.
Chat is available Monday to Sunday from 07:00-23:00.¬†

title: How to set my card PIN?
content:
We don‚Äôt send you a PIN via post; you set the PIN for your Mastercard or Maestro card¬†once you‚Äôve successfully connected your smartphone to your account and¬†activated¬†your card(s). To set or change your card PIN:
Go to üë§ My Account.
Select Card settings and swipe to choose a card.
Select Reset PIN on the mobile or WebApp(new tab).
Enter the 10-digit token number on your card.
Choose your new PIN and confirm it.
Keep in mind that:
If you live in France, Spain, Ireland, Greece, Finland, Estonia or the UK, you must make your first payment using Chip and PIN before you can use your card anywhere else. You can also first make a withdrawal or balance inquiry at ATM instead.
For security reasons we don‚Äôt accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences (such as 1111, 1234, or 4321). If the number you‚Äôve chosen is not accepted please try again using a different combination.
If a PIN is entered incorrectly three times in a row, the card will automatically be blocked for security reasons. If this happens, please contact our Customer Support via chat so we can unblock it for you.
Your card PIN is separate from your Confirmation PIN, however you can choose the same PIN for both.

title: Shared Spaces - What is a power of attorney?
content:
The legal model behind Shared Spaces is called Power of Attorney (Kontovollmacht in German).¬†
Participants of a Shared Space do not have equal ownership of the account like a joint account in the traditional banking sense. After receiving Power of Attorney the participants obtain the right to act on behalf of the Owner regarding any transfer of funds within the Shared Space.
The person authorizing the other to act on his behalf is called the ‚ÄúOwner‚Äù, this person is the only account holder. The owner must be a N26 premium account holder e.g. N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business You.
This means that whoever created the Shared Space is its legal owner. The owner of a Shared Space:¬†
Owns all the funds within a Shared Space.¬†
Can transfer funds freely in and out of the account anytime.¬†
Can invite people to the Shared Space by granting others Power of Attorney.
Can revoke the Power of Attorney of a participant at any time.
Can also close a Shared Space after removing a participant. (all funds in the Shared Space will be transferred to the Owner‚Äôs Main Account)
By granting a person Power of Attorney, they‚Äôll have full access to all the money held within a Shared Space. This means that each participant can also transfer funds freely in and out of the Shared Space.¬†

N26 Bank GmbH cannot be held liable for payments covered by the Power of Attorney.
What are Shared Spaces?
How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?

title: How to contact N26?
content:
If you want to reach our customer service team, you can open a chat with us directly by clicking the Open a chat button at the bottom of this page.¬†
Chat is available Monday to Sunday from 7am to 10pm UK time.¬†
Alternatively you can reach us via email at support@n26.com(new tab).
If you represent a bank or authority, please get in touch through our article I represent a bank or an authority and need to contact N26 (new tab).(new tab)

title: How to download my personal data?
content:
The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a European regulation on data protection and privacy that went into effect on May 25th, 2018. We‚Äôve added a data export option to the WebApp(new tab) as a response to Art. 20 GDPR. And, as with everything we do, getting your personal data you provided to us is transparent and simple, and you‚Äôre in complete control: go to üë§ My Account then Personal settings and Your personal data.
The right to data portability under Art. 20 GDPR covers personal data you provided to us. Art. 20 GDPR shall enable you to easily switch the service provider in case you want to use these data to open a bank account at another bank. This is why Art. 20 GDPR requires to provide these data in a machine-readable format to you. ¬†It's important to keep in mind that the file is to be used for data portability purposes only and your computer might not be able to read a JSON file. Also, if you can open the JSON file the data might be difficult to understand as it is not intended to be human-readable, but machine-readable. The file we provide has the only purpose of being transmitted to another bank.¬†
As a mobile bank, we know the importance of data security. For this reason we take additional security measures before you can download your data, which are described below. We do so in order to make sure that you, the account holder, is in fact the person who downloads the data.¬†¬†
You can request to download the personal data you provided for a current or previous account with us up to 6 months after account closure date. It will come in a machine-readable format so you can share it with a third party if you choose to.
Please request your data through our web form(new tab).
You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.
You can download personal data you provided up to 6 months after account closure date. To request this information, complete a data request form(new tab) and make sure that the information you provide correctly matches all your previous account information. You‚Äôll need to know:
the first and last name, personal ID number, and expiration date of the identification document (national ID card or passport) you used to verify the account,
the registered email address of the account,
the date (month and year) you created and closed your account (check your verification email).
For security reasons, we have to make sure it‚Äôs really you downloading the data: if any field is inaccurate or missing, your request will not be successful.
You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.
If you want more information about the collection, use, and processing of your personal data, please visit our updated Privacy Policy (DEU(new tab)) (EU(new tab)).

title: Will my direct debit go through if I'm low on funds?
content:
If your balance can‚Äôt cover a direct debit* when it‚Äôs due, it‚Äôll bounce and you‚Äôll be charged a¬†‚Ç¨3 fee. And if you have a negative account balance, you'll be charged an overdraft interest of 8.9%. It‚Äôs not possible to delay a direct debit.
To avoid this fee in the future, you can instantly check whether you‚Äôre eligible for an¬†Overdraft¬†directly in the app (available in Germany and Austria).
*For Poland, Sweden, Denmark, and Norway only: if you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and ultimate amount that is collected from us.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: How often can I withdraw cash for free?
content:
Cash withdrawals using your Mastercard depend on your T&C country (the address you originally shipped your first card to):
Germany: 3 to 5* free ATM withdrawals per month in Germany and unlimited free withdrawals in the eurozone or by using¬†CASH26
Austria and Italy: unlimited free withdrawals (including¬†CASH26)
France, Spain, the Netherlands, and the Rest of Europe: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in your country of residence and the eurozone
Switzerland: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in the eurozone and a 1.7% markup on local withdrawals
UK: unlimited free withdrawals
There‚Äôs always a ‚Ç¨2 fee if you use your¬†Maestro¬†card to withdraw cash (only available in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands).
Check our¬†pricing lists¬†if you‚Äôve been¬†charged an ATM fee.
*Germany only: You receive 5 free withdrawals during the first three months. After that you'll receive 3 free withdrawals but you can keep receiving 5 if:
You are younger than 26 years old.
You receive your salary, pension, student allowance, or government benefits for at least two consecutive months (your additional free withdrawals start the following month).
You receive payments of at least ‚Ç¨1.000 per month for at least two months (your additional free withdrawals start the following month).

title: How to protect my account?
content:
The security of your account and your personal data is our top priority.
If you ever feel that your N26 login may be compromised or that someone is trying to initiate a chat on your behalf, it‚Äôs crucial to immediately change your N26 account password.
To do so, log into the app and go to My Account > Settings > Security. Please choose a secure password(new tab) and don‚Äôt reveal your login details to anyone.
As the account holder, you and only you should create and have access to your login details. For further advice on identity protection, we encourage you to visit our article How to protect my identity?
If you believe that your account has been compromised or tampered in any way then please get in touch with us immediately.

If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126.
