title: PSD2 - Secure Open Banking
content:
Payment Services Directive 2 (‚ÄúPSD2‚Äù) is a revised European directive allowing you to access your account information and initiate payments through regulated third-party providers in a safe and secure manner. 
 
This means that you can permit regulated Third Party Providers to access your account information through a dedicated interface: 
You can enable an Account Information Service (AIS) to pull together data from different bank accounts you may have, and then aggregate and manage their details in the same place through certified third-party providers.
You can securely pay at the checkout of any website that offers Payment Initiation Services (PIS). 
The data exchange is handled in the background via our partner - Token.io.
If you begin using a third-party payment service like an Account Information Service or a Payment Initiation Service, you‚Äôll be redirected to your N26 app via Token.io to confirm the access request.
In our Privacy Policy(new tab) we inform you about the purposes, involved parties and legal bases of the necessary data processing involved to fulfil our obligations as part of the revised European Payment Services Directive.
Why can't I link any Third Party Provider to my account?
If a third party provider has not integrated with our dedicated interface, the third party provider will need to integrate with our dedicated interface via our partner Token.io.
How can I revoke an individual access permission I have granted to a third party provider?
You need to contact the respective Third Party Provider and revoke the access permission directly with them.¬†
*applies to all countries in the EEA.

title: How to change my card limits?
content:
You can change your¬†card PIN, define your daily withdrawal or payment limits, and enable or disable your ATM withdrawals, online or payments abroad in¬†üë§ My Account¬†by selecting¬†Card Settings¬†in the mobile app or¬†WebApp(new tab).
Each change you make is applied instantly to all of your cards.
You can also¬†block your card¬†or order a new one, in case it‚Äôs lost or stolen.
Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial(new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube(new tab) channel.

title: How to manage my visibility as an N26 user?
content:
To grant you access to all our in-app features, N26 matches your contact data with other N26 users.
In order to manage your consent to be seen as a N26 user, you can simply go to üë§ My Account in the app and selecting Settings then Personal Settings and Personal information. Then just check or uncheck the box ‚ÄúI agree to be identifiable for other users as N26 customer‚Äù.
All of your contacts who have an N26 account set to visible will show up in the in-app contact list. Similarly, you‚Äôll also appear in the list of other N26 customers who have your contact information. Your contact list is not permanently stored by N26 and is only used when accessing the respective N26 feature.
You can access to all our in-app features,¬†e.g.¬†MoneyBeam, which carries out real-time transactions without¬†typing in a 22-digit IBAN, but only by selecting a name from your contact list. Vice versa, you can also request money from people in your contact list who then only have to accept (or decline) your request. Also, being visible¬†enables you to use Shared Spaces, a sub-account, which you can share with other N26 users¬†selected from your contact list.

title: How to file a complaint?
content:
If you have any questions about our products or need help with your account, we‚Äôre happy to assist. Just open a chat with us directly within the mobile app or WebApp, that's the fastest and simplest way to get in touch.
If you ever feel dissatisfied with one of our products or services, you can also send (new tab)us an email from your registered address or send your feedback by post.
If you're in the UK, you can send the email to complaints.uk@n26.com(new tab). For the rest of Europe please use complaints@n26.com(new tab).¬†
To file a complaint, please include:
your full name and address
the product or service you're not happy with
a description of your concern
the date in which the problem first appeared
We‚Äôll contact you via email to confirm that we‚Äôve received your complaint and then begin an investigation to find a solution you‚Äôre happy with. In case we need more information from you or we can provide you with an immediate solution, we‚Äôll let you know via email as well.
In case we‚Äôre not able to find a solution you‚Äôre happy with, you can escalate your complaint to an independent third party. You have a few options:
An arbitration body is available to you at the German Federal Bank (Deutsche Bundesbank).
Or you could file a complaint with the German Federal Financial Supervisory Authority (Bundesanstalt f√ºr Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht).
Also, the European Commission has set up the Online Dispute Resolution (ODR(new tab)) platform to help consumers dispute online contracts out of court.
We are committed to constantly improving our products and services. Your feedback makes this possible.

title: ¬øC√≥mo revocar mi consentimiento para aparecer visible como usuario de N26?
content:
Para procesar las transferencias instant√°neas a trav√©s de MoneyBeam o utilizar los Espacios Compartidos, N26 asocia tu informaci√≥n de contacto con otros usuarios de N26.
Ser visible para los dem√°s usuarios de N26 te permite utilizar todas las funciones de la cuenta, como por ejemplo MoneyBeam, con la que puedes enviar dinero a tiempo real sin necesidad de introducir un IBAN y solo seleccionando un contacto de tu lista. Adem√°s, tambi√©n puedes solicitar a un contacto que te env√≠e dinero y este puede aceptar o rechazar tu petici√≥n. Tener la visibilidad activa, tambi√©n te permite utilizar los Espacios Compartidos con alguien que elijas de tu lista.
En este art√≠culo te explicamos como aparecer visible para otros usuarios de N26. 
Si aceptas aparecer visible como usuario de N26, todos los contactos guardados en tu m√≥vil que tengan una cuenta N26, aparecer√°n en la lista de contactos de la app N26. De igual modo, t√∫ aparecer√°s junto a tu nombre en la lista de otros usuarios de N26 que tengan tu contacto guardado. N26 no almacena tu lista de contactos permanentemente y solo accede a ella cuando utilizas la funci√≥n MoneyBeam. 
Cuando se hace un MoneyBeam, solo el emisor y el destinatario pueden ver los detalles de la otra persona (nombre, email o tel√©fono, concepto e importe de la transferencia). Al emisor, el nombre del destinatario le aparecer√° tal y como lo tenga guardado en su m√≥vil. Al destinatario, el nombre del emisor le aparecer√° tal y como est√° registrado en N26. 
 
Para aparecer visible como usuario de N26 ante otros usuarios, puedes hacerlo f√°cilmente yendo a üë§ Mi cuenta dentro de la app del m√≥vil y luego Configuraciones > Configuraci√≥n personal > Informaci√≥n personal. Una vez ah√≠, marca la casilla que dice: ‚ÄúComo cliente de N26, estoy de acuerdo con ser visible ante otros clientes de N26‚Äù. ¬°Y ya est√°!

title: How to save the details of a transfer recipient?
content:
Every time you make a transfer to a new recipient in the app (tap + then¬†Transfer¬†and¬†Add new recipient), some details like the recipient‚Äôs name and IBAN are automatically saved in your transfer contact list for future transfers. You can also delete contacts or view your transaction history with them:
iOS: swipe a contact entry to the left in order to show the transaction history or delete the entry.
Android: tap and hold on a contact entry in order to show the transaction history or delete the entry.
Keep in mind that deleting a contact entry doesn‚Äôt delete your transaction history with them.

title: Custom Audiences
content:
Datenverarbeitung im Rahmen von Facebook Custom Audiences
Custom Audiences erm√∂glicht uns, dich als bestehenden N26 Kunden von unseren Werbema√ünahmen auszuschlie√üen. Wir m√∂chten dir keine irrelevante Werbung anzeigen. Dar√ºber k√∂nnen wir eine relevante Zielgruppe definieren, f√ºr welche die angezeigte Werbung relevanter ist als f√ºr andere Facebook-Nutzer. Diese sog. ‚ÄúLookalike-Audiences‚Äù sind unseren eigenen Kunden √§hnlicher als der durchschnittliche Facebook-Nutzer.¬†
Um die oben beschrieben Vorteile nutzen zu k√∂nnen, stellen wir Facebook eine ‚Äúgehashte‚Äù Version deiner N26 E-Mail-Adresse zur Verf√ºgung. Das sog. ‚ÄúHashing‚Äù ist eine Form der Pseudonymisierung durch die deine Email-Adresse verschl√ºsselt wird, sodass du anhand dieser gehashten E-Mail-Adresse nicht mehr identifiziert werden kannst. Deine gehashte E-Mail-Adresse wird von Facebook dahingehend abgeglichen, ob diese auch bei Facebook hinterlegt ist. Nach dem Abgleich, unabh√§ngig davon ob dieser erfolgreich war oder nicht, werden s√§mtliche gehashte E-Mail-Adressen innerhalb von 6-8 Stunden gel√∂scht. Facebook teilt diese Daten nicht mit Dritten oder anderen Werbetreibenden oder gew√§hrt diesen Zugang zu deinen Daten. Diese und weitere Informationen kannst du den AGB von Facebook Custom Audiences(neuen Tab) entnehmen.
Du kannst deine Einwilligung zu dieser Verarbeitung deiner Daten gem√§√ü Art. 6 Abs. 1 Bst. a DSGVO jederzeit in der N26 Web App widerrufen.

title: How to declare my N26 account for my taxes in France?
content:
(Applies to all French residents)
According to the French General Tax Code, all French residents are required to declare any bank accounts they have opened, used, or closed within the year of declaring an income. This includes your N26 bank account. To do this:
In your tax return, check the box Foreign account opened, used or closed (8UU) (Compte √©tranger ouvert, utilis√© ou ferm√©).
Complete the Cerfa n¬∞ 3916(new tab) form and attach it to your tax return.

title: How long do transfers take?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Applies to all regions except the UK
All domestic and international incoming SEPA transfers are instant if they come from a bank that supports instant transfers and the sender selects this option. Banking regulation applies to SEPA instant transfers and may delay the transfer in case it needs additional monitoring.
In case the sender bank doesn‚Äôt offer instant transfers or the sender doesn‚Äôt choose this option, the transfer will be completed within one banking day. However, due to the opening times of the participating banks, one banking day may stretch to two working days. Please, note that outgoing SEPA transfers are completed within one banking day.
If the transfer is not instant, keep in mind that if a transfer has been made right before a weekend or bank holiday, the time frame will be extended. We send our SEPA payment orders through TARGET2(new tab). It‚Äôs open to process payments every working day from 07:00 to 18:00 CET. The system is closed on the following days:
1 January (New Year's Day), Good Friday, Easter Monday, 1 May (Labour Day), 25 December (Christmas Day), 26 December.
With¬†MoneyBeam, you can transfer money to other N26 customers instantly and you can also receive instant MoneyBeam requests from banks that supports instant transfers. Times vary for¬†foreign currency transfers¬†with TransferWise (but you‚Äôll see an estimated transfer time when you create the transfer).
You'll need to confirm each type of transfer via¬†push message¬†in the app before we send anything out.
Please note: we only accept transfers in EUR via SEPA (that means no SWIFT transfers).
If your incoming transfer is outside of these estimated time frames, please contact the sender (bank) for a payment investigation. We can't investigate incoming transfers. But we've collected a few reasons why your¬†SEPA¬†or¬†foreign currency¬†transfer could have failed.

title: COVID-19: Neueste Informationen zur Erreichbarkeit unseres Kundenservice
content:
Vor dem Hintergrund des COVID-19 ergreifen wir kontinuierliche Ma√ünahmen, um die Sicherheit unserer Mitarbeiter zu sch√ºtzen, w√§hrend wir unseren Kunden weiterhin den bestm√∂glichen Service und Komfort bieten wollen.
Unser Ziel bleibt es, dich zu unterst√ºtzen und dir unser Banking und unseren Kundenservice unver√§ndert zur Verf√ºgung zu stellen. Falls sich die Lage ver√§ndert, wollen wir dich dar√ºber informieren.
Wir sind t√§glich zu unseren √ºblichen Servicezeiten erreichbar von 7:00 - 23:00 Uhr auch an Sonntagen und gesetzlichen Feiertagen.
Falls du aufgrund eines Notfalls deine Karte sperren willst, kannst du das direkt in deiner N26 App tun oder indem du unsere Notfall-Hotline anrufst: +49 (0) 307 675 8333.
Weitere updates zu Servicezeiten und Wartezeiten werden wir auf dieser Seite zur Verf√ºgung stellen.¬†

title: All About Allpoint.
content:
We have partnered with the Allpoint ATM Network to provide you with unlimited¬†free¬†ATM withdrawals at over 55,000 locations across the US, Canada, Puerto Rico, Australia, Mexico, and the UK.
With access to an expansive retail network including Target, Walgreens, CVS, Speedway, and Kroger, you'll never need to pay to withdraw cash again! 
You can quickly and easily find Allpoint ATMs via the ATM Map feature in our mobile application for iOS and Android (see Related Topics below for more information).
Not on your smartphone? No problem, you can also find nearby Allpoint ATMs using the¬†web application(new tab).
Can't find a convenient Allpoint ATM near you? No problem. Enjoy 2 free ATM withdrawals per month from any network, anytime, anywhere in the US.¬†
(NOTE: At this time, N26¬†customers¬†can only use ATMs to withdraw cash, not to make deposits. Check back here for updates.)
Related Topics
"Will there be an in-app Allpoint ATM locator?"
Yes! We are very excited to announce that we have an ATM Map
feature in our mobile application. This easy-to-use application will make
finding your nearest fee-free Allpoint ATM quick and convenient. Here's how to
use it:
1. On the home screen, tap on the "Actions" icon.
2. Tap on the "Find an ATM" button under the "ATM Map" menu.
3. If prompted, allow the application to access your location. Without access to your location, the application will not be able to show you the nearest ATMs.
4. Tapping on any of the nearby ATMs (indicated by green locator pins) will bring up more information about that ATM location, including the address. Tap on "Get Directions" and choose your favorite routing application to be given directions to the ATM location. 
5. Moving to another area of the map will bring up the "Search this area" button, which will allow you to see other nearby ATMs in the new location.
6. Tap on the information icon (the "i" in a circle at the top-right corner of the screen) to get more details about Allpoint ATMs, participating retail locations, and a reminder that you get two fee-free cash withdrawals per month from any out-of-network ATMs in the US. 
"Do ATM fees apply when withdrawing from an Allpoint ATM?"
Nope! ATM fees do not apply when withdrawing from an Allpoint ATM in the US, UK, Canada, Mexico, or Australia. Standard ATM fees apply when used¬†in other countries, however.
"What will the transaction look like in the app?"
Allpoint ATM transactions will look the same as any other ATM transaction in the N26 mobile app or website.
"When I withdraw money from an Allpoint ATM, does a fee display on the ATM screen during the transaction?"¬†
Yes, a fee will display on the ATM screen. You should accept the fee, BUT the fee will not be charged to your N26 account!
"Is Allpoint available outside of the US?"¬†
Yes! There are over 55,000 Allpoint¬†locations across the US, Canada, Puerto Rico, Australia, Mexico, and the UK.
"If I used an Allpoint ATM before Allpoint partnered with N26, will the ATM fees that I incurred be reimbursed?"
We regret that we cannot retroactively refund any ATM usage fees.
"Will the Allpoint transactions be included in the two free transactions per month?"
Nope! When an Allpoint ATM is accessed in the US, UK, Canada, Mexico, and Australia, you are not charged a fee. It is not counted as part of your two free ATM transactions per month!
"Can I check my balance at an Allpoint ATM?"
Yes! You can check your N26 account balance at an Allpoint ATM.
"Can I withdraw money from my Spaces account using an Allpoint ATM?"
Account withdrawals can only be made from your main N26 account. Spaces is a sub-account. If you want to withdraw money that you've set aside in Spaces, please move it into your main account first.
"Can I make a deposit to my N26 account at an Allpoint ATM?"
At this time, you can only withdraw cash from an Allpoint ATM. No cash or check deposits can be made.
The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Why isn‚Äôt my photo verification working?

‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Applies to all regions except Germany

title: Why can‚Äôt I see other N26 users on MoneyBeam?
content:
To carry out real-time transactions such as¬†MoneyBeams, N26 checks your smartphone‚Äôs contact list and finds other N26 users based on saved phone numbers or emails. You can also enter someone‚Äôs contact details manually to send them a MoneyBeam.
If you don‚Äôt see your friend‚Äôs name on MoneyBeam but you know they‚Äôre an N26 user, they most likely haven‚Äôt made themselves visible. Indeed you can manage your visibility as an N26 user.
Most MoneyBeam transfers that fail between N26 users happen because there are multiple phone numbers or emails listed in the contact entry of a phone's address book. To avoid this, make sure you have the email and phone number your friend uses in your phone book in order to send them MoneyBeams. If the contact details you have stored don‚Äôt match, you cannot send a MoneyBeam to your friend.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: Come noleggiare un‚Äôauto con la tua carta N26
content:
Dal 25 febbraio al 25 maggio 2020 puoi usufruire della collaborazione tra N26 e Rentalcars.com: otterrai uno sconto del 15% prenotando un veicolo tramite questo link(nuova tabella). 

Generalmente, per poter noleggiare un‚Äôauto √® obbligatorio che il guidatore principale sia in possesso di una carta di credito. Tuttavia, considerato il crescente utilizzo di altre tipologie di carte da parte dei consumatori, alcune compagnie di autonoleggio hanno introdotto la possibilit√† di noleggiare auto anche con le carte di debito.

Con la tua carta Mastercard N26, quindi, sarai in grado di noleggiare auto presso un numero sempre crescente di compagnie. Qui di seguito troverai i nomi di alcune delle agenzie alle quali potrai rivolgerti:
Alamo
Avis
Centauro
Enterprise
Europecar
Firefly
Joy rent
Locauto
Maggiore
SicilyByCar
Thrifty car rental
Prima di noleggiare un veicolo, ti suggeriamo di contattare la compagnia di tuo interesse: le condizioni per il noleggio sono a discrezione delle singole agenzie, quindi i requisiti possono variare a livello locale e nazionale.
Ricorda, inoltre, di verificare se l‚Äôagenzia accetta carte di debito non solo al momento della prenotazione, ma anche al momento del ritiro del veicolo. In aggiunta, a volte pu√≤ essere richiesto che la carta abbia i dati in rilievo.

Potrebbe essere di tuo interesse sapere che:
nel caso in cui venga addebitato un importo imprevisto o ingiustificato, sar√† necessario contattare ed, eventualmente, avviare una contestazione direttamente con l‚Äôagenzia in questione. Nel caso la contestazione abbia un esito negativo, possiamo offrire la nostra assistenza per avviare una nuova contestazione tramite Mastercard.
sulla carta di debito verr√† addebitato (e non autorizzato, come avviene per le carte di credito) il deposito cauzionale, il cui importo varia a seconda delle tipologia di auto e dall‚Äôagenzia. La cauzione sar√†, poi, riaccreditato sul tuo conto dopo la restituzione dell‚Äôauto e la verifica delle sue condizioni.

title: Come posso restituire un bonifico SEPA al mandante?
content:
A partire dal 17 marzo 2020, i clienti di altre banche potrebbero richiedere il riaccredito di bonifici SEPA inviati ai conti di clienti N26.
Tramite la propria banca, il mandante di un bonifico SEPA pu√≤, quindi, richiedere al beneficiario la restituzione dell‚Äôimporto inviato. Questa richiesta apparir√† sotto forma di notifica push sul dispositivo associato del cliente N26.¬†
Cos√¨ come avviene con la conferma di un bonifico in uscita tramite l‚Äôapp di N26, visualizzerai l‚Äôopzione di rifiutare oppure accettare di restituire l‚Äôimporto. La richiesta verr√† automaticamente rifiutata se ignorata per 15 giorni.
Se, invece, la richiesta viene accettata, l‚Äôimporto verr√† inviato al mandante. Considera, inoltre, che una volta accettata la richiesta, non sar√† possibile modificare la propria scelta. Se sul conto principale non √® presente un saldo sufficiente, non si potr√† accettare la richiesta.¬†

title: How to close my account?
content:
To cancel your N26 account, please send your request through live chat or via email to support@n26.com from your registered email address including the following information:
A statement requesting the closure of your account on a specific date or ASAP
Your name
Your N26 IBAN 
If you have a positive balance in your main account or your Spaces, we also need an IBAN within SEPA  to transfer your remaining balance.
A statement with your consent to send your account closure confirmation to your registered email address: ‚ÄúI hereby agree that N26 Bank is allowed to exchange personal data with me via email.‚Äú (Otherwise, the confirmation of account closure can be sent via post, but keep in mind that this solution will slow the process.)
Or you can reply using our¬†cancellation form(new tab).
A few things to consider when closing your account:
For a quick account closure: if you have a positive balance, please transfer your remaining balance yourself. If you have a negative balance, top up your account.

Destroy your cards by cutting them with scissors or a shredder. The chip, NFC antenna, and the magnetic strip should all be cut into pieces and disposed of separately.

title: Wie lege ich eine Beschwerde ein?
content:
Deine Zufriedenheit hat f√ºr uns oberste Priorit√§t. Wir m√∂chten unsere Dienstleistungen kontinuierlich verbessern und Probleme umgehend beheben. Dazu brauchen wir deine Unterst√ºtzung.
So erreichst du uns:
Am besten kontaktierst du uns per Chat direkt aus deiner App. So k√∂nnen wir die meisten Anliegen schnell und unkompliziert l√∂sen. 
Ansonsten sende uns dein Feedback gerne von deiner registrierten E-Mail-Adresse an beschwerden@n26.com oder per Post an:
N26 Bank GmbH
Beschwerdemanagement
Klosterstra√üe 62
10179 Berlin
Je ausf√ºhrlicher du uns den Sachverhalt schilderst, desto schneller k√∂nnen wir dein Anliegen pr√ºfen und beantworten.
Daf√ºr ben√∂tigen wir von dir folgende Informationen:
deinen vollst√§ndigen Namen und deine Adresse, sowie deine IBAN (sofern du ein Konto bei uns hast) 
den Service, mit dem du nicht zufrieden bist
eine umfassende Beschreibung deines Anliegens
das Datum, an dem das Problem zum ersten Mal aufgetreten ist
Was machen wir mit deiner Beschwerde?
Unser Ziel ist es, deine Anfrage baldm√∂glichst zu bearbeiten und gemeinsam eine L√∂sung zu finden. 
Wir informieren dich direkt nach Eingang deiner Beschwerde per E-Mail √ºber die voraussichtliche Bearbeitungszeit und den weiteren Prozess. 
Innerhalb der n√§chsten 15 Arbeitstage nach Eingang deiner Beschwerde kommen wir mit einem L√∂sungsvorschlag auf dich zu. Sollten wir die Pr√ºfung bis dahin noch nicht abgeschlossen haben, melden wir uns ebenfalls bei dir per E-Mail und informieren dich √ºber die voraussichtliche Bearbeitungszeit sowie √ºber die Gr√ºnde der Verz√∂gerung. 
Solltest du w√§hrend dem Bearbeitungszeitraum weitere Fragen haben, kannst du uns gerne jederzeit per E-Mail kontaktieren. 
Alternative Wege zur Einreichung deiner Beschwerde
Solltest du mit unserer angebotenen L√∂sung unzufrieden sein, hast du die M√∂glichkeit, dich an eine unabh√§ngige dritte Person zu wenden. 
Neben einer Beschwerde in unserem Hause, kannst du dich auch an diese Schlichtungsstellen wenden:
die Schlichtungsstelle der Deutschen Bundesbank 
die Bundesanstalt f√ºr Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht (BaFin) 
die Europ√§ischen Kommission mittels der Europ√§ischen Online-Streitbeilegungsplattform (ODR).
Wir setzen alles daran, dein Anliegen schnellstm√∂glich zu deiner Zufriedenheit zu beantworten. 
Hinweis: Die Bearbeitung von Beschwerden erfolgt kostenfrei.

title: Shared Spaces - Trusted Beneficiary
content:
A trusted beneficiary of a Shared Space can:
Transfer money from their own Spaces (including other Shared Spaces of which they are a participant) to a Shared Space. 
Access and freely transfer the funds of a Shared Space at any time.
Leave a Shared Space at any time.
Transfers between a trusted beneficiary and a Shared Space do not need to be authenticated via Pin and Push notification. This means that beneficiaries can seamlessly drag-and-drop money via the N26 app and Web app similarity to how normal Space transactions work.

Why do I need to classify an owner or member as a trusted beneficiary?
European banking law regulates how bank transfers must be authorised.¬†
In this law strong customer authentication (SCA) is a requirement to make online payments more secure.¬†
One exception to this is the classification of a person in a Shared Space as a ‚Äútrusted beneficiary‚Äù so that transfers to this person do not require SCA.
What are Shared Spaces?
How to add or remove Shared Space participants?

title: PSD2 - Secure Open Banking
content:
Payment Services Directive 2 (‚ÄúPSD2‚Äù) is a revised European directive allowing you to access your account information and initiate payments through regulated third-party providers in a safe and secure manner. 
 
This means that you can permit regulated Third Party Providers to access your account information through a dedicated interface: 
You can enable an Account Information Service (AIS) to pull together data from different bank accounts you may have, and then aggregate and manage their details in the same place through certified third-party providers.
You can securely pay at the checkout of any website that offers Payment Initiation Services (PIS). 
The data exchange is handled in the background via our partner - Token.io.
If you begin using a third-party payment service like an Account Information Service or a Payment Initiation Service, you‚Äôll be redirected to your N26 app via Token.io to confirm the access request.
In our Privacy Policy(new tab) we inform you about the purposes, involved parties and legal bases of the necessary data processing involved to fulfil our obligations as part of the revised European Payment Services Directive.
Why can't I link any Third Party Provider to my account?
If a third party provider has not integrated with our dedicated interface, the third party provider will need to integrate with our dedicated interface via our partner Token.io.
How can I revoke an individual access permission I have granted to a third party provider?
You need to contact the respective Third Party Provider and revoke the access permission directly with them.¬†
*applies to all countries in the EEA.

title: P√∫blicos personalizados
content:
El procesamiento de datos para la p√∫blicos personalizados de Facebook, Google y Zeotap.
Los p√∫blicos personalizados nos permite excluirte, como cliente de N26, del p√∫blico al que van dirigido nuestros anuncios. No queremos mostrarte publicidad irrelevante. Adem√°s, nos permite definir para que grupo de personas pueden resultar m√°s interesantes estos anuncios. Los usuarios de este grupo llamado ‚ÄúAudiencias parecidas‚Äù son m√°s similares a nuestros clientes que el resto de usuarios de Facebook, Google y Zeotap.
Para que te puedas beneficiar de lo que te mencion√°bamos en el p√°rrafo anterior, tenemos que facilitar a Facebook, Google o Zeotap tu direcci√≥n de correo de N26 encriptada. Como te comentamos, se hace de manera encriptada de manera que no puede ser identificado como tu direcci√≥n ya que es solo un c√≥digo irreconocible. Tras la revisi√≥n para buscar si el correo coincide o no e independientemente si lo hace, Facebook, Google o Zeotap eliminar√° todos los correos en un plazo de 48 horas. Estas compa√±√≠as no comparten esta informaci√≥n con terceros y no le dan acceso a otros anunciantes. Puedes encontrar m√°s informaci√≥n en los t√©rminos y condiciones de Facebook, Google y Zeotap
Puedes revocar el consentimiento en cualquier momento de acuerdo al Art. 6 p√°rrafo 1 lit. del RGPD a trav√©s de la web app.

title: Why did my SEPA transfer fail?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Applies to all regions except the UK
We accept¬†transfers¬†in EUR done via SEPA. We don't support SWIFT so if you need to make a¬†foreign currency transfer, please use TransferWise (in the app or from their¬†website(new tab)).
To get a transfer, you'll only need to provide the sender with your full name (as it's written on the ID you provided for verification) and your IBAN.
You can¬†find your IBAN¬†on your balance statements and in¬†üë§ My Account¬†(in the mobile app or¬†WebApp(new tab)).
Common reasons for failed transfers:
The recipient's name on the transfer order is different from the name on their account (must be their name as written on their ID).
The recipient's name is a company name instead of a personal/account name (applies to N26 Business).
The IBAN is incorrect.
You're not receiving the push message to confirm your transfer.
An inappropriate use was found. N26 has the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see¬†GwG ¬ß 10(new tab)). As a result, we may ask for documentation to verify the origin or source of these transactions. This can result in the credit being delayed or not taking place.

title: Pourquoi mon virement a √©chou√© ?
content:
Nous acceptons les¬†virements¬†en euros r√©gis par le r√©seau de paiement europ√©en SEPA. Nous ne proc√©dons pas aux virements SWIFT, si vous avez besoin d‚Äôenvoyer un¬†virement en devise √©trang√®re, nous vous invitons √† utiliser notre partenaire Transferwise (directement depuis votre application ou depuis leur¬†site web(nouvel onglet)).
Vous¬†trouverez vos coordonn√©es bancaires¬†dans la section¬†üë§ Mon compte¬†de votre application N26 (mobile ou site web).
Vous pouvez √©galement t√©l√©charger une version imprimable de votre RIB depuis la version web de l‚Äôapplication N26 sur¬†app.n26.com(nouvel onglet). Sur la page¬†Transactions, cliquez sur l‚Äôic√¥ne nuage √† c√¥t√© du symbole ‚Äú+‚Äù, puis sur¬†T√©l√©chargez votre RIB.
Voici les raisons pour lesquelles un virement bancaire peut √©chouer :
Le nom du destinataire du virement ne correspond pas au nom de naissance du titulaire du compte.
Vous avez un compte¬†N26 Business¬†et le nom de votre activit√© a √©t√© indiqu√© au lieu de votre nom de naissance.
L‚ÄôIBAN est incorrect.
Vous ne recevez pas de notification push pour valider le virement.
Votre virement peut faire l‚Äôobjet d‚Äôun contr√¥le si une utilisation inappropri√©e de votre compte est suspect√©e. N26 est tenue d‚Äôeffectuer des contr√¥les de routine sur les transactions (voir ¬†GwG ¬ß 10(nouvel onglet)). Pour cette raison, nous pouvons vous demander des informations suppl√©mentaires quant √† l‚Äôorigine ou la provenance de ces transactions. La r√©ception du virement peut ainsi √™tre retard√©e ou annul√©e.

title: How does 3D Secure work?
content:
3D Secure protects you from online card fraud. It‚Äôs automatically activated when you activate your card in the app. No additional passwords are required.
Whenever you make an online payment using your Mastercard, 3D Secure confirms the transaction with you within 5 minutes via a¬†push message. If you don't see the transaction, try some of the¬†troubleshooting tips¬†we've collected.
If you make a purchase using your smartphone, you‚Äôll see a pending transaction in the app. Tap on the bell icon and the push message will appear for you to confirm and finalize your purchase. Then go back to the merchant‚Äôs website. You should see a confirmation of your successful purchase within a few moments.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: Wird meine Lastschrift abgebucht, wenn ich kein Geld auf dem Konto habe?
content:
Wenn dein Guthaben nicht ausreicht, um eine f√§llige Lastschrift zu decken*, wird sie zur√ºckgegeben und dir wird eine¬†Geb√ºhr von 3 ‚Ç¨¬†berechnet. Wenn dein Kontostand dadurch in's Minus ger√§t, werden √úberziehungszinsen in der H√∂he von 8.9% erhoben. Eine Lastschrift kann nicht verz√∂gert werden.
Um diese Geb√ºhr zu vermeiden, kannst du direkt in der App pr√ºfen, ob dir ein¬†Dispokredit¬†zur Verf√ºgung steht.
*In Polen, Schweden, D√§nemark und Norwegen: Wenn du eine Lastschrift in deiner Landesw√§hrung einrichtest, bestimmt die Bank des Zahlungsempf√§ngers die Geb√ºhren f√ºr den W√§hrungsumtausch sowie den endg√ºltigen Betrag, der bei uns abgebucht wird.
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Bekomme 15‚Ç¨ f√ºr jeden Freund, dem du N26 erfolgreich empfiehlst. Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: Can I open an N26 account in my country?
content:
We offer our accounts in the following countries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, and the US.
You can open your account if you live in one of these countries and meet our¬†requirements. Our products and services vary by country. Should you have an existing account with us and move to a country where N26 is not yet available for 18 months or more please get in touch with our Customer Support.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: Come modificare il mio indirizzo, il numero di telefono o altri dati personali?
content:
√à importante tenere i propri dati personali aggiornati (ad es., il tuo numero di telefono √® necessario per associare il tuo smartphone oppure per inviare e ricevere trasferimenti via MoneyBeam). Ecco come puoi modificare i tuoi dati:
Indirizzo di spedizione,¬†password¬†o¬†informazioni fiscali: Puoi modificare queste informazioni nell‚Äôapp in qualsiasi momento. Vai a üë§Il mio Conto e seleziona Impostazioni e poi Impostazioni Personali.
Nome¬†e¬†sesso: Chatta con noi e invia due documenti identificativi: una copia della tua nuova carta d'identit√† o passaporto e un documento ufficiale che attesti il cambiamento (un certificato di matrimonio o certificato di nascita aggiornato). Possiamo anche riordinare una carta per te con il tuo nuovo nome una volta che il tuo conto √® stato aggiornato.
Nazionalit√†: Chatta con noi e invia una copia della tua nuova carta d'identit√† o passaporto.
Numero di telefono o indirizzo e-mail: Chatta con noi per avere maggiori informazioni su come procedere.

title: Where does N26 invest my money?
content:
We strive to provide our clients' deposits for loans to our customers (provided that they have the appropriate credit rating). For the liquidity not required in the customer business, our investment strategy is low in risk.
We invest our customers' money at short notice with the Deutsche Bundesbank and other European banks in the eurozone with only good risk classes. And we refinance public-law customers mainly in Germany (cities and municipalities) and invest in euro government bonds
We're not a trading book institute. That is: we do not trade for short-term profit.
And we don't engage in speculation, whether on food, foreign exchange, bitcoins or other asset classes.

title: How to make N26 my main account?
content:
We can help make N26 your main account by moving your daily banking from another account: we‚Äôll inform any payment partners who charge recurring direct debits (like for your monthly subscriptions or bills) or who transfer money to your account (such as your employer), and we‚Äôll explain how to set up standing orders or transfer any remaining funds over.
This is how you can make N26 your main account:
Together with our partner finleap we‚Äôre offering you a platform to easily switch your bank accounts online. It‚Äôs an automated process and completely free.
To begin, use our¬†form(new tab)¬†and log in with your previous bank account details. Once you‚Äôve filled in all required information, it‚Äôll take 5 to 7 business days for us to send out all notification letters. Your payment partners may need additional time to change your bank details for future transactions.

Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: Was sind Shared Spaces?
content:
Mit Shared Spaces kannst du ganz einfach Geld mit anderen N26 Nutzern teilen und es gemeinsam nutzen. Ob ihr einen gemeinsamen Urlaub plant, Rechnungen teilen wollt oder ein Geburtstagsgeschenk f√ºr eure Liebsten organisieren m√∂chtet - mit diesen Unterkonten ist es m√∂glich.
Premium-Kunden (N26 You, Business You oder Metal) k√∂nnen einen Shared Space erstellen und andere Teilnehmer dazu einladen.
Alle N26 Nutzer k√∂nnen teilnehmen, unabh√§ngig von ihren Kontotypen.
Dem Besitzer geh√∂ren alle Gelder innerhalb des Shared Space.
Der Besitzer kann bis zu 10 Teilnehmer zu einem Space einladen und entfernen.
Wie auch bei unseren anderen Spaces, haben Shared Spaces keine eigene IBAN oder Bankkarte.

title: How to give feedback or suggest a new product?
content:
We frequently send short surveys to review feedback but participation is voluntary and anonymous. For individual questions or suggestions, you can send us your feedback to¬†ideas@n26.com(new tab). We‚Äôre always grateful if you can take a minute or two to help us get even better.
And if you ever feel dissatisfied with one of our products or services, you can also¬†file a complaint.

title: PSD2 - Open Banking for Third Party Providers
content:
We are partnering with Token.io(new tab) to provide and support a dedicated interface for third-party payment service providers (''TPPs''). The complete documentation and the on-boarding instructions can be found in the Token.io developer portal(new tab). 
As part of its legal obligations under PSD2, N26 has implemented a contingency mechanism, which provides the following: 
Reliable identification of a TPP via possession of a valid Qualified Website Authentication Certificate (QWAC);

Secure and authorised access to an account
TPPs may access our contingency mechanism via the following URLs:
https://aisp.tech26.de
https://pisp.tech26.de
Access to the above URL and establishing the TLS connection requires implementation of a qualified certificate.
Please find the detailed technical documentation for the fallback interface below:
AISP Fallback Documentation(new tab)
PISP Fallback Documentation(new tab)
TPPs may contact N26 via open.banking@n26.com to provide their QWAC certificates and get technical support.
The reports below compare the availability and performance of our PSD2 dedicated interface with the N26 user interface:
3rd quarter of 2019(new tab)
4th quarter of 2019(new tab)

title: How to activate my card?
content:
Once you receive your physical card, you‚Äôll need to activate it. You can do this in the app only after you connect your smartphone to your account. Or you can activate it directly from the web app(new tab). 
You‚Äôll need your 10-digit token number: it‚Äôs found below your name on the front of your card (or on the back if you have an N26 You, N26 Metal, or Maestro card). 
To activate your card on the N26 app, from the Home screen:
Go to the Actions tab,
Select Cards settings and swipe until you see the card you want to activate,
Tap Activate.

To activate your card on the web app, just select Activate card from the Home screen.

If you live in France, Spain, Ireland, Greece, Finland, Estonia or in the UK you must make a first ATM withdrawal to fully activate your card.
If you have multiple cards (for example, you ordered your card more than once or your delivery was delayed), you can only activate your most recent card. All other cards will be disabled.
You‚Äôll need to follow these activation steps every time you reorder a new card, like if your card is lost, stolen, broken, or you upgrade your account. ¬†¬†
After you activate your card, the next step is choosing a card PIN.

title: How much does an N26 account cost?
content:
An N26 bank account is free.*
Additional charges may apply, depending on your region:
Pricing in Germany(new tab)

Pricing in Spain(new tab)
