*If we‚Äôre not able to offer you an N26 account based on our¬†minimum requirements(new tab), you may be able to open an¬†N26 Flex account.

title: Comment puis-je prot√©ger mon identit√© ?
content:
Pour vous prot√©ger et pr√©venir l‚Äôusurpation de votre identit√©, veuillez noter que :
N26 ne vous contactera jamais pour obtenir des informations¬†relatives √† votre identit√©¬†pour une tierce partie, un individu ou une entreprise. Nous ne vous contacterons donc pas pour obtenir des informations pour v√©rifier un contrat de location, des lignes de cr√©dit ou une offre d‚Äôemploi (y compris pour une offre d‚Äôemploi chez N26). Proc√©dez seulement √† la v√©rification de votre identit√© si vous souhaitez ouvrir un compte courant N26 √† votre nom.
En tant que d√©tenteur du compte, vous devez √™tre la seule personne √† cr√©er et conna√Ætre vos identifiants de connexion. Ne cr√©ez jamais un compte N26 avec des identifiants qui vous ont √©t√© communiqu√©s. Si vous utilisez des identifiants qui vous ont √©t√© donn√©s par une tierce partie, ils peuvent √™tre utilis√©s pour acc√©der √† vos informations personnelles et l√©gales. Par ailleurs, ne vous connectez jamais √† un compte N26 qui n‚Äôest pas le v√¥tre.
N‚Äôenvoyez jamais votre pi√®ce d‚Äôidentit√© ou votre passeport √† des inconnus ou √† des destinataires non v√©rifi√©s.
N26 peut vous demander certains documents lorsqu‚Äôune de vos transactions fait l‚Äôobjet d‚Äôun contr√¥le de routine. Veuillez seulement nous faire parvenir des documents valides aux adresses email officielles de N26.
N26 ne vous demandera jamais votre nom d‚Äôutilisateur, votre mot de passe, votre code PIN ou votre code de virement en dehors de l‚Äôapplication N26. Ne partagez ces informations avec aucun site tiers ou application tierce, m√™me si elles ont l‚Äôair d‚Äô√™tre li√©es √† N26.
Si vous avez le moindre doute, si vous recevez une demande suspicieuse d‚Äôune tierce partie ou pensez que vos identifiants N26 aient pu √™tre compromis, n‚Äôh√©sitez pas √† nous contacter.

title: What if my balance is negative?
content:
Your balance can be negative as long as you‚Äôre within your¬†Overdraft¬†limit. 
If you have a negative account balance, you'll be charged an overdraft interest rate of 8.9%.
Otherwise, you‚Äôll receive an email to notify you that the authorized limit of your account has been exceeded. This means you don‚Äôt have enough funds on your account to cover future charges.
Even if you haven‚Äôt used your account since you opened it, certain charges still apply (such as N26 You or N26 Metal monthly fees or express delivery costs) and have resulted in a negative balance.
So you‚Äôll need to¬†top up your account¬†via SEPA transfer (choose international transfer if you‚Äôre making the transfer outside of Germany) or¬†CASH26¬†(if you‚Äôre in Germany or Austria). Your account will remain active for the next 60 days without doing so. At that point:
You‚Äôll receive two additional reminders (each cost ‚Ç¨3).
If you have an Overdraft: it‚Äôll be cancelled after the second reminder and you‚Äôll have to repay that amount immediately (or you can set up a repayment plan).
If you have an N26 You, N26 Metal, or N26 Business You account: all benefits will be cancelled after 60 days and your account will turn into a standard one.
If you don‚Äôt respond after 60 days, we may close your account.

title: How to do contactless payments work?
content:
It‚Äôs not possible to deactivate contactless payments. If you‚Äôre experiencing issues with your contactless payments, keep in mind that:¬†¬†
To activate contactless payments, you must first use your card at an ATM or payment terminal.¬†

Transactions up to ‚Ç¨50 don‚Äôt require a card PIN*. For amounts over ‚Ç¨50, you‚Äôll need to enter your card PIN.¬†
*If the merchant's payment system supports this option.
Make sure your card is held directly onto an NFC-compatible payment terminal. If you remove your card too fast or didn‚Äôt hold it close enough, just try again.¬†

N26 Metal cards only have NFC on the backside of the card. Make sure to hold the backside of the card against the terminal to use NFC (using the front won‚Äôt work).

title: Who can get a Basiskonto?
content:
You can open a free N26 bank account through our website or by downloading our app. 
The German Payment Accounts Act (Zahlungskontengesetz or ZKG) also gives all consumers who legally reside in the European Union the right to hold a basic payment account. This applies to those who live in a supported country.
The N26 Basiskonto comes with a monthly 6‚Ç¨ account management fee. You can find all other fees in our pricing lists. 
If you don‚Äôt have a bank account at N26 or at any other financial institution in Germany yet, you can apply. Under some circumstances, N26 is allowed to reject your request. ¬†
Please note that some products and services such as N26 Overdraft, N26 Credit, N26 You, or N26 Metal are not accessible with an N26 Basiskonto.

title: Pourquoi ai-je √©t√© d√©bit√© d‚Äôun montant qui ne correspond pas √† ma transaction ?
content:
N26 fonctionne en temps r√©el. Nous vous informons gr√¢ce √† des notifications push d√®s qu‚Äôune transaction appara√Æt sur votre compte.
Il arrive parfois qu‚Äôune transaction semble suspicieuse car le montant d√©bit√© ne correspond pas au montant de la transaction. Voil√† les raisons pour lesquelles cela peut arriver :
Le marchand a √©mis une empreinte bancaire pour une caution (dans une station essence, pour une location de voiture ou un h√¥tel par exemple). Dans ce cas, le montant de cette caution sera recr√©dit√© sur votre compte d√®s qu‚Äôelle ne sera plus n√©cessaire.
L‚Äô√©volution du taux de change peut influencer l√©g√®rement le montant des transactions faites en monnaies √©trang√®res.
Dans les deux cas, aucun frais sur la diff√©rence entre ces deux montants ne seront pr√©lev√©s.
Si vous √™tes certain qu‚Äôil s‚Äôagit d‚Äôune¬†transaction frauduleuse, veuillez prendre contact avec le Service Client par Livechat pour obtenir de l‚Äôaide.

title: How to contact N26?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏èFor UK customers, click here(new tab)
If you want to reach out, you can open a chat with us directly within the mobile or WebApp, or from certain Support Center(new tab) articles.¬†As an online bank we don't have branches.
First of all, make sure you're up-to-date with the newest version of the app. If not, update your app in the Apple App Store(new tab) or the Google Play Store(new tab).
When accessing your account from our WebApp(new tab), you can find the chat in the bottom right corner.¬†

Or from your paired smartphone, go to üë§ My Account then Support. Then scroll down and tap Support chat under Get in touch.¬†

You‚Äôll then see your place in the queue. Keep your Mastercard close by, it's optional but you'll get faster service.
Our chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.
Please visit this article if you represent a bank or an authority and need to contact N26(new tab).

title: ¬øC√≥mo iniciar sesi√≥n en la cuenta con la autenticaci√≥n de dos factores?¬†
content:
Los dos factores de autenticaci√≥n es un proceso de autenticaci√≥n basado en el uso de dos o m√°s elementos de seguridad. Adem√°s de tu contrase√±a personal, para iniciar sesi√≥n en tu cuenta vas a necesitar la confirmaci√≥n desde el dispositivo vinculado o un c√≥digo por SMS.¬†
Lee m√°s informaci√≥n sobre la autenticaci√≥n de dos factores.
Cuando inicies sesi√≥n en tu cuenta de N26 desde la web app o un dispositivo no vinculado, recibir√°s un notificaci√≥n emergente en tu dispositivo vinculado o puedes solicitar un c√≥digo SMS a tu n√∫mero registrado. Esto asegurar√° que solo t√∫ puedes entrar en tu cuenta.
Cuando inicies sesi√≥n desde tu dispositivo vinculado, los dos factores de autenticaci√≥n ya est√°n funcionando, por lo tanto este proceso sigue siendo igual.
Necesitas actualizar el sistema operativo de tu tel√©fono y la app de N26 a la √∫ltima versi√≥n.¬†
Si no puedes iniciar sesi√≥n en la cuenta, pero a√∫n tienes acceso a tu email registrado, intenta restablecer la contrase√±a. Si no tienes acceso a tu email registrado, cont√°ctanos por chat y estaremos encantados de ayudarte.¬†
Lee en este art√≠culo como restablecer tu contrase√±a.
Si has perdido el acceso a tu dispositivo vinculado pero tienes acceso a tu n√∫mero de tel√©fono registrado, inicia sesi√≥n en tu cuenta de N26 y solicita un c√≥digo de vinculaci√≥n. Para ello haz lo siguiente:
Inicia sesi√≥n en la WebApp
Cuando vayas a confirmar el acceso en tu dispositivo vinculado selecciona ''Ayuda''.
Selecciona ''Enviar SMS''.
Cuando hayas recibido el c√≥digo por SMS, introd√∫celo en la WebApp.
Cuando confirmes el c√≥digo ya tendr√°s los dos factores de autenticaci√≥n autom√°ticamente y podr√°s vincular tu nuevo dispositivo con la cuenta.¬†
Si no puedes iniciar sesi√≥n en la cuenta, pero a√∫n tienes acceso a tu email registrado, intenta restablecer la contrase√±a. Si no tienes acceso a tu email registrado, cont√°ctanos por chat y estaremos encantados de ayudarte.¬†
Si tienes un tel√©fono que soporta la √∫ltima versi√≥n de la app, no podr√°s acceder a tu cuenta de N26 usando ese tel√©fono. Sin embargo, puedes utilizar la Web App para consultar tu tu cuenta. Para ello, tienes que confirmar el inicio de sesi√≥n con un c√≥digo que te enviamos por SMS a tu n√∫mero de tel√©fono registrado.¬†
Puedes seguir realizando pagos con tarjeta y retiradas en cajero utilizando tu Mastercard, pero debes tener en cuenta que no podr√°s enviar transferencias bancarias ni realizar pagos online hasta que no puedas confirmarlo por la app de N26.

title: Wie melde ich mein N26 Konto f√ºr meine Steuerzahlungen in Frankreich an?
content:
(gilt f√ºr alle in Frankreich ans√§ssigen Kunden)
Nach dem allgemeinen Franz√∂sischen Steuergesetzbuch sind alle in Frankreich ans√§ssigen Personen verpflichtet, all ihre Bankkonten anzugeben, die sie innerhalb des Jahres der Einkommenserkl√§rung er√∂ffnet, genutzt oder geschlossen haben. Dazu geh√∂rt auch dein N26 Bankkonto. So funktioniert‚Äôs:
Markiere in deiner Steuererkl√§rung das K√§stchen Ausl√§ndisches Konto er√∂ffnet, genutzt oder geschlossen (8UU) (Compte √©tranger ouvert, utilis√© ou ferm√©).
F√ºlle das Cerfa n¬∞ 3917 Formular(neuen Tab) aus und f√ºge es deiner Steuererkl√§rung bei.

title: How to dispute a transaction?
content:
We understand that disputed charges (also called ‚Äòchargebacks‚Äô) can cost you time and money.
We can only dispute card transactions that are visible in your monthly balance statement and haven‚Äôt been made more than 120 days ago. Please complete the dispute form (EU(new tab)¬†or¬†UK(new tab)) and send it to us. Also, make sure that you:
Complete a separate form for each card payment and sign it
Select only one dispute reason
Attach all¬†additional documents(new tab)

title: How to set my card PIN?
content:
We don‚Äôt send you a PIN via post; you set the PIN for your Mastercard or Maestro card¬†once you‚Äôve successfully connected your smartphone to your account and¬†activated¬†your card(s). To set or change your card PIN:
Go to üë§ My Account.
Select Card settings and swipe to choose a card.
Select Reset PIN on the mobile or WebApp(new tab).
Enter the 10-digit token number on your card.
Choose your new PIN and confirm it.
Keep in mind that:
If you live in France, Spain, Ireland, Greece, Finland, Estonia or the UK, you must make your first payment using Chip and PIN before you can use your card anywhere else. You can also first make a withdrawal or balance inquiry at ATM instead.
For security reasons we don‚Äôt accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences (such as 1111, 1234, or 4321). If the number you‚Äôve chosen is not accepted please try again using a different combination.
If a PIN is entered incorrectly three times in a row, the card will automatically be blocked for security reasons. If this happens, please contact our Customer Support via chat so we can unblock it for you.
Your card PIN is separate from your Confirmation PIN, however you can choose the same PIN for both.

title: ¬øC√≥mo crear un Espacio Compartido?
content:
Para crear un espacio compartido:
Crea un espacio en la secci√≥n Espacios. 

Pulsa sobre el icono de ''Espacio'' en la parte inferior de la pantalla.

Lee la informaci√≥n con detalle y pulsa en ''Invitar nuevo miembro''.

Selecciona el contacto de la lista de usuario de N26 que deseas a√±adir. Si esta persona tiene una cuenta de N26 pero no aparece en la lista, te recomendamos que le preguntes si tiene la opci√≥n de visibilidad para otros usuarios activada en la app. Puedes hacerlo desde Mi cuenta > Configuraciones > Configuraci√≥n personal > Informaci√≥n personal. 

Quiz√° sea necesario que introduzcas su nombre completo, tal y como lo tiene en la cuenta.

Revisa la informaci√≥n acerca del poder notarial (en la secci√≥n legal) y cuando lo hayas le√≠do, marca la casilla para indicar que est√°s de acuerdo con los t√©rminos y condiciones y para garantizar a esa persona el poder notarial.

Introduce tu PIN de confirmaci√≥n.

Pulsa sobre el participante que vas a a√±adir.

Confirma la notificaci√≥n ''Enviar invitaci√≥n'' que te llegar√° a tu dispositivo vinculado.
¬øQu√© son los Espacios Compartidos?
¬øC√≥mo a√±adir y eliminar participantes en un Espacio Compartido?

title: How to earn money by inviting friends to N26?
content:
You receive ‚Ç¨15 every time you successfully refer a friend to N26 (up to ‚Ç¨1500 maximum). 
You can start inviting friends as soon as you have access to your account (in the app or the¬†Web app(new tab)).
To receive your reward your friend must meet all our requirements:
Complete their sign up using your referral link or personal code.
Activate their Mastercard.
Complete 1 (in-store, online or ATM) transaction with their Mastercard worth a minimum of ‚Ç¨15.
To invite friends:
Log into the N26 app,
From the Home screen, go to the Explore tab,
Select Refer friends,
Tap on your Referral Code to copy it and select one of the options available for sharing,
Optionally, you can write a message to your friend or use the default,
Tap Send!
Once your friend has fulfilled the requirements, you'll receive the bonus within 60 days.¬†You can check the status of your referral bonus in the mobile app or N26 Web.
If your referral bonus hasn‚Äôt arrived yet, we‚Äôve also collected a¬†few reasons why.
*The link does not expire and it can be used at any time. Personal invite codes and links should only be used for personal and non-commercial purposes. This means you can share your invite link with your personal connections via social media as long as you are the primary content owner. N26 has the right to cancel the referral program at any time.
Currently,¬†Friend referral¬†rewards are only available for customers in Germany, Austria, Italy, France, Spain, Belgium, Luxembourg, Greece, Portugal, Ireland, the Netherlands, Finland, Estonia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden, Switzerland, Norway, Denmark, Poland, Iceland and Liechtenstein.
You can find more information in the Refer a Friend Program¬†T&Cs(new tab).

title: CRS - La raz√≥n por la que pedimos cierta informaci√≥n a nuestros clientes
content:
N26, al igual que toda instituci√≥n financiera, est√° obligado a remitir informaci√≥n a las Administraciones Tributarias sobre cualquier cuenta bancaria a nombre de los residentes fiscales en otro pa√≠s.
La¬†Normativa CRS¬†(Common Reporting Standard o Est√°ndar Com√∫n de Reporte) es un sistema de intercambio autom√°tico de informaci√≥n tributaria entre los pa√≠ses adheridos, elaborado por la OCDE (Organizaci√≥n para la Cooperaci√≥n y el Desarrollo Econ√≥micos).
Para determinar si tienes que declarar tu cuenta al IRS, tenemos que hacerte algunas preguntas adicionales:
¬øEn qu√© pa√≠s o pa√≠ses declaras impuestos?¬†¬†
Tienes tu residencia fiscal en un pa√≠s extranjero y por lo tanto declaras impuestos en este pa√≠s, donde tienes tu residencia personal. Si vives en m√°s de un pa√≠s, hay reglas para la determinaci√≥n de la residencia incluidas en los convenios fiscales y las leyes tributarias del pa√≠s relevante, que nos ayudar√°n a determinar tu residencia fiscal. Puede que hayas tenido tu residencia fiscal en m√°s de un pa√≠s a lo largo de un a√±o, en ese caso, vamos a necesitar conocer tu n√∫mero de identificaci√≥n fiscal de cada uno de estos pa√≠ses para poder enviar tu informaci√≥n a las autoridades correspondientes.¬†
2. ¬øCu√°l es tu n√∫mero de identificaci√≥n fiscal (TIN) de cada pa√≠s?
La emisi√≥n y el formato del N√∫mero de Identificaci√≥n Fiscal (TIN) depende cada pa√≠s. En los pa√≠ses de la Uni√≥n Europea, la Comisi√≥n Europea ha publicado una gu√≠a con los documentos de cada pa√≠s(pesta√±a nueva), lo que puede ayudarte a identificar cu√°l es el tuyo.¬†
En caso de que tus circunstancias cambien, siempre puedes actualizar tu informaci√≥n fiscal en la app de N26. Para esto, tras iniciar sesi√≥n ve a Mi cuenta > Configuraciones > Configuraci√≥n personal > Informaci√≥n de impuestos y actualiza tu informaci√≥n.¬†¬†

title: How to create and manage standing orders?
content:
When setting up an outgoing transfer in either the N26 app or Web app you‚Äôll have the option to make it a standing order.
Once you complete the outgoing transfer you'll then be prompted to tick a box which will create a standing order. After you've inputted the amount of the transfer and its recipient, under the reference text field select "Want to save this as a standing order?". From here you'll be able to set the start/end dates of the standing order and choose its payment intervals.
To view your scheduled transfers and standing orders directly in the mobile app:
Go to your transaction list (the main screen).
Then tap on the 3 dots located in the upper¬†right corner for Android and on the top of the transaction list for iOS. 
A small window will pop, where you will be able to select "Standing Orders".
Here you can cancel and/or modify the details of your standing order. To cancel it just tap the standing order you wish to delete and tap the trash icon in the top right-hand corner.
‚ÑπÔ∏è ¬†Please note, if a standing order fails due to insufficient funds we won't attempt the transfer again - you'll need to manually send the transfer, however the next scheduled transfers will proceed as normal.

title: How to make transfers in foreign currencies?
content:
We have partnered with TransferWise to make foreign currency transfers easy. TransferWise offers real-time exchange rates and no hidden fees.
To initiate a transfer in a foreign currency start by logging into the mobile app: 
From the Home screen choose the Actions tab,

Select Add Money followed by Foreign Currency Transfer,

Choose ‚Äúadd a new recipient‚Äù or select an existing payee. When adding a new recipient you'll be given the option to change the currency by tapping on the Euro flag in the top right corner of the screen,

Enter the amount you'd like to send and add any additional bank details,

Finalize the transfer with your Confirmation PIN.
If we don‚Äôt currently offer the¬†foreign currency(new tab)¬†you need, please visit¬†TransferWise(new tab)¬†for more currency options. You can log in by entering your N26 account email and selecting Forgot password? You‚Äôll receive an email from TransferWise to change your password and then you can use both log in details to perform the transfer from there.
Please note that foreign currency transfers in the app are not possible with the N26 Business or Business You account nor are transfers to businesses.
TransferWise has its own transfer types and fees but this will all be indicated before you confirm the transfer.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: Comment transf√©rer de l‚Äôargent vers des comptes en devises √©trang√®res ?
content:
Avec notre partenaire TransferWise, nous vous permettons d‚Äôeffectuer facilement et rapidement vos virements en devises √©trang√®res. TransferWise propose un cours de change en temps r√©el et des tarifs transparents.
Vous pouvez effectuer un virement en¬†devises √©trang√®res(nouvel onglet)¬†depuis l‚Äôapplication mobile N26, exactement de la m√™me fa√ßon qu‚Äôun virement traditionnel et sans documents ou formalit√©s administratives.
Pour effectuer un virement en devise √©trang√®re depuis votre application mobile, rendez-vous dans la rubrique G√©rer en bas √† droite de l‚Äô√©cran d‚Äôaccueil. Appuyez ensuite sur Envoyer, et s√©lectionnez Virement bancaire. Au moment de renseigner les coordonn√©es du destinataire, vous pourrez choisir la devise du virement en cliquant sur le drapeau europ√©en en haut √† droite de votre √©cran.
Si la devise que vous souhaitez n‚Äôest pas encore disponible sur votre application mobile N26, veuillez vous rendre sur le site internet de¬†TransferWise(nouvel onglet)¬†pour avoir acc√®s √† plus de devises. Vous pouvez utiliser votre email N26 pour acc√©der √† votre compte TransferWise et s√©lectionner¬†Mot de passe oubli√©. Vous recevrez alors un email de TransferWise vous permettant de modifier votre mot de passe. Vous pouvez alors d√©finir le m√™me mot de passe que celui de votre compte N26 pour effectuer votre virement bancaire depuis ce site.
Un virement en devise √©trang√®re ne peut ni √™tre effectu√© depuis un compte Business ou Business You, ni √† destination d'une entreprise.
TransferWise dispose de ses propres types de virement et de ses propres frais. Tout cela vous sera indiqu√© avant que vous ne confirmiez le virement.
Vous souhaitez parler de nous √† vos amis ? Recevez 15 ‚Ç¨ √† chaque fois que l‚Äôun d‚Äôentre eux nous rejoint. D√©couvrez notre¬†programme de parrainage.

title: Why does N26 do checks on transactions?
content:
We have the responsibility to run routine checks on accounts and transactions in order to ensure your account‚Äôs security (see GwG ¬ß 10(new tab)). These checks are automatically initiated by our systems.¬†
As a result, we may ask you to provide some documents. If you receive such a request, please send the requested documents via Messages from N26. There are no exceptions or evasion for such checks.¬†
This practice is a standard banking procedure and ensures the safety of our customers. Both the process and the result are confidential and handled internally. Here are some tips to speed up the process:
The document that we need you to provide will be exactly named in the message you‚Äôll receive from N26. You can send us scanned documents, pictures, or screenshots, as long as the original content of the document is easily readable. Please make sure to also provide a detailed description.¬†
Be precise in your answers, details, and documents. After we receive your required proof and description, we will let you know if your reply fulfills our check. In a few cases, we might ask for further clarification which could prolong the process.
Reply as soon as possible, always before the deadline stated in the message you received from N26. Use that email to reply and send attachments.¬†
Our Customer Support doesn‚Äôt have any additional information on this subject.
You must provide valid documentation depending on your situation.

 Find here some examples:
You've received financial help from your family to complete projects or have inherited land or money from deceased relatives.
A granting/loan contract, an official document of inheritance, or an official document of the source of the loan (such as the sales documents of a sold property to finance the loan or bank statements of granting relatives).
You've sold a property or your shares on the stock market.
The contract showing the agreed transactions or the official notarial documentation of the transfer of property.
You've received or sent money to pay bills or buy a product.
Documents showing the balance statements confirming the source of this money or documents showing the use of the money and its purpose.
You've received a final payout from your previous employer.
Documents proving the end of your employment, detailing the payment and/or a bank statement from your previous employer.

title: Wer kann ein Basiskonto bekommen?
content:
Du kannst ein kostenloses¬†N26 Bankkonto¬†√ºber unsere Website oder unsere¬†App er√∂ffnen.
Das Zahlungskontengesetz (ZKG) gibt auch allen Verbrauchern, die sich rechtm√§√üig in der Europ√§ischen Union aufhalten, das Recht, ein Basiszahlungskonto zu f√ºhren. Dies gilt f√ºr Personen, die in einem unterst√ºtzten Land leben.
Das N26 Basiskonto hat eine monatliche Geb√ºhr von 6 ‚Ç¨. Alle anderen Geb√ºhren findest du in unseren¬†Preislisten.
Wenn du noch kein Bankkonto bei N26 oder einem anderen Finanzinstitut in Deutschland hast, kannst du ein Basiskonto¬†beantragen. Unter bestimmten Umst√§nden kann N26 deine¬†Anfrage ablehnen.
Bitte beachte, einige Produkte und Dienstleistungen wie¬†N26 Dispo,¬†N26 Credit,¬†N26 You, oder¬†N26 Metal f√ºr das N26 Basiskonto nicht verf√ºgbar sind.

title: How to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?
content:
It‚Äôs important to keep your personal data up to date (for example, your phone number is necessary to¬†connect your smartphone¬†or to send and receive¬†MoneyBeams). Here's how you can change your information:
Delivery address,¬†password, or¬†tax information: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app. Just go to¬†üë§ My Account¬†and select¬†Settings¬†then¬†Personal Settings.
Name¬†and¬†sex: Chat with us and send two forms of ID: a copy of your new ID card or passport as well as an official document of the change (a marriage licence or updated birth certificate).  We can also re-order a card with your new name once your account has been updated.
Nationality: Chat with us and send a copy of your new ID card or passport.
Phone number or¬†email address: You‚Äôll need to contact us via chat for this. We need to verify it‚Äôs really you changing your information so we can‚Äôt change any personal data over email.

title: How to create a password?
content:
If you forgot your password or want to change it, select¬†Forgot?¬†in the app or¬†Forgot your password?(new tab)¬†in the¬†WebApp(new tab)¬†during login. We‚Äôll send a link to your registered email address so you can create a new password. Make sure your new password meets our requirements:
We do not have a specific set of requirements for our passwords. We measure their strength on the fly and only accept passwords that are considered robust by our underlying algorithm.
We tend to recommend to go with a ‚Äúpassphrase‚Äù rather than a password, and thus go by the common phrase ‚Äúhard to guess, easy to remember‚Äù. 
If your password is not accepted by our system, try to add more special characters, numbers, and vary between upper- and lowercase letters.
If you enter your password incorrectly six times in a row, you‚Äôll be temporarily blocked from your account. If this happens, try logging in again after 30 minutes.
Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

title: Cosa fare se il mio account viene hackerato?
content:
Se sospetti di attivit√† illecite sul tuo account,  per favore contattaci il prima possible. La nostra funzione chat √® disponibile nell'app, nel sito web(nuova tabella) di N26, e alla fine dio alcuni dei nostri articoli del Support Center, come questo. Clicca semplicemente su Inizia una chat. 
Se preferisci parlare al telefono, puoi richiederlo durante la chat. Organizzeremo un callback entro un'ora cos√¨ da poter discutere al meglio sul problema con te. Una volta in contatto con uno dei nostri agenti, per favore specifica la situazione al meglio. Ogni dettaglio √® importante. 

Ti assicuriamo che prenderemo tutte le misure necessarie per assisterti in questa situazione. 
Oltre ai nostri obblighi legali per la prevenzione delle frodi, e al fine di migliorare continuamente le nostre garanzie di sicurezza, abbiamo un team dedicato che analizza ogni caso di frode individualmente. I casi di frode sono relativamente complicati e devono essere trattati dettagliatamente. A seconda della complessit√†, questo processo pu√≤ richiedere alcuni giorni, ma alcuni altri possono richiedere alcune settimane.
Infine, se hai prove tangenti o sei sicuro che il tuo conto potrebbe essere stato violato, ti consigliamo di sporgere anche denuncia.
Per ulteriori informazioni su come proteggiamo il tuo conto in caso di frode, visita il nostro articolo blog(nuova tabella). Visita anche la nostra pagina sulla sicurezza in N26(nuova tabella) per scoprire il nostro impegno nel proteggere i tuoi fondi e il tuo conto.
La chat √® disponibile da Luned√¨ alla Domenica dalle 07:00 alle 23:00.
Se non hai accesso alla app del tuo telefono o alla WebApp, puoi anche chiedere di bloccare la tua carta o il tuo conto chiamandoci al +39 02 124 123 361.

title: ¬øC√≥mo funciona Espacios?
content:
Espacios te permite definir objetivos, crear y personalizar espacios y transferir dinero entre ellos al instante. Espacios est√° disponible en la app y en la¬†Web App(pesta√±a nueva).
Adem√°s de tu cuenta principal (o espacio principal), puedes crear y eliminar espacios tantas veces como quieras. Ten en cuenta que la cantidad de espacios activos al mismo tiempo depende del tipo de cuenta que tengas:¬†2 espacios adicionales¬†con N26 y N26 Business, o¬†10 espacios adicionales¬†con N26 You, N26 Business You y N26 Metal.

Los extractos bancarios de tu cuenta principal incluir√°n todas las transacciones enviadas a un espacio o recibidas del mismo. Puedes descargar dichos extractos desde la p√°gina de confirmaci√≥n.

√önicamente tu espacio principal podr√≠a tener un saldo negativo (si tienes disponibilidad de un¬†descubierto). Todos los dem√°s saldos de tus Espacios no pueden ser negativos, de modo que solo puedes transferir lo que est√° disponible en un espacio en particular.

Solo puedes usar el saldo de tu cuenta principal para las transacciones con tarjeta, por lo que deber√≠as transferir fondos hacia tu cuenta principal antes de realizar una compra, si fuera necesario.

Para mover el dinero entre espacios, mant√©n pulsado sobre un espacio, arr√°stralo y su√©ltalo sobre otro. Una vez elijas la cantidad y confirmes, el balance se actualizar√° inmediatamente.
Puedes bloquear y desbloquear los espacios siempre que quieras desde la app, para ello s√≥lo necesitas tu PIN de confirmaci√≥n. Aunque tengas un espacio bloqueado, seguir√°s teniendo la posibilidad de transferirle dinero. Si lo que necesitas es retirar dinero de ese espacio, primero tendr√°s que desbloquearlo. 
Si quieres, tambi√©n puedes ocultar del balance principal la cantidad que tienes en el espacio. Para ello, entra en el espacio, pincha en los 3 puntos de la esquina superior derecha y despu√©s sobre ''Ocultar el espacio del saldo''.
Hace poco hemos a√±adido una nueva funci√≥n para Espacios se llama Reglas.

¬øQuieres ganar dinero hablando de nosotros a tus amigos? Consigue 15 ‚Ç¨ por cada amigo al que invites a unirse a N26. Inf√≥rmate m√°s sobre nuestro programa¬†Invita a un amigo.

title: How to earn money by inviting friends to N26?
content:
You receive ¬£10 every time you successfully refer a friend to N26 (up to ¬£1500 maximum). You can start inviting friends as soon as you have access to your account (in the app or the¬†WebApp(new tab)).
To receive your reward your friend must meet all our requirements:
Complete their sign up using your referral link or personal code.
Activate their Mastercard.
Complete 1 (in-store, online or ATM) transaction with their Mastercard worth a minimum of ¬£10.
To invite friends on iOS:
Log into the mobile app and tap on the Explore tab next to the + button.
Tap on Refer friends.
Tap on your Referral Code to copy it.
Select one of the options available for sharing. 
Write a message to your friend or use the default then tap Send.

To invite friends on Android:
Log into the mobile app, then go to My Account üë§ and select the gift icon.
Tap on your Referral Code to copy it.
Tap Tell a friend.
Select one of the options available for sharing.
Write a message to your friend or use the default then tap Send.
Once your friend has fulfilled the requirements, you'll receive the bonus within 30 days.¬†You can check the status of your referral bonus in the mobile app or N26 Web.
If your referral bonus hasn‚Äôt arrived yet, we‚Äôve also collected a¬†few reasons why.
*The link does not expire and it can be used at any time. Personal invite codes and links should only be used for personal and non-commercial purposes. This means you can share your invite link with your personal connections via social media as long as you are the primary content owner. N26 has the right to cancel the referral program at any time.
You can find more information in the Refer a Friend Program¬†T&Cs(new tab).

title: How to get push messages?
content:
We send you push messages to finalize transfers (such as¬†MoneyBeam) or to confirm a service (as with¬†CASH26). If you aren‚Äôt receiving these messages, first check that notifications are enabled for both your phone and the app. Then try some of our troubleshooting suggestions, depending on your smartphone:
Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Apple App Store and connect your smartphone again.
Check whether you‚Äôre logged into your N26 app.
Make sure messaging for the app has been activated in the general settings of your smartphone.
Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Google Play Store and connect your smartphone again.
Go to your Account settings and activate notification by tapping App settings then Notifications.
Huawei and Xiaomi: go to Settings then Advanced settings and Battery settings. Then set N26 as a protected app.
OnePlus: select battery optimization then the N26 app and then don't optimize.
Oppo: disable battery optimization for the app and lock it in the Recent apps overview.

title: How to top up by card, Apple Pay, and Google Pay
content:
You can now add money by using a debit or credit card as well as Apple or Google Pay. This is the fastest and easiest way to fund your N26 account.¬†


Adding money with a Debit or Credit card
Open your N26 app and navigate to the Actions tab
Just tap ‚ÄúAdd money‚Äù and select ‚ÄúCard transfer‚Äù
Choose an amount and enter your name on card, card number, expiration date and CVC (we never store your card information)
Follow the steps to confirm the payment
The money is available on your account instantly 

Adding money with a Apple or Google Pay
Open your N26 app and navigate to the Actions tab
Just tap ‚ÄúAdd money‚Äù and select ‚ÄúApple Pay‚Äù or ‚ÄúGoogle Pay‚Äù
Choose an amount¬†
Follow the steps to confirm the payment
The money is available on your account instantly

Accepted cards: 
Visa and Mastercard cards that have a 16-digit card number. 
Prepaid cards are not accepted (ex: Brand A, Brand B etc.). 
To find out more about the difference between debit, credit and prepaid cards read this article(new tab).¬†

Cost:
Whilst this is the fastest and easiest way to instantly add funds in your N26 account, for us, processing these instant top-up transactions is more expensive than other account funding methods(new tab) we offer.

For both methods, the first deposit is always free but extra deposits are charged a fee of 3% of the deposit amount. By charging a card or digital wallet, your money is not sent to N26 instantly, and the fee covers additional costs associated with funding accounts before the money is received so that it is instantly available for your use.

title: Welche Vorteile habe ich mit N26 You?
content:
Wenn du zu N26 You upgradest, kannst du √ºber 10¬†Spaces¬†verf√ºgen und zwischen 5 verschiedenen Kartenfarben w√§hlen: Rhabarber, Ozean, Sand, Aqua und Schiefer.  
Zus√§tzlich profitierst du von einem¬†Versicherungspaket der Allianz Global Assistance*, das ein breites Spektrum an pers√∂nlichen und finanziellen Vorteilen abdeckt:
Reiseversicherung. Erstattung von Krankheitskosten im Ausland, bei Reiser√ºcktritt nach einem medizinischen Notfall, bei einer Flugversp√§tung von mehr als 4 Stunden, bei einer Versp√§tung aufgegebenen Gep√§cks von mehr als 6 Stunden und bei Kosten f√ºr R√ºckf√ºhrungen aus medizinischen Gr√ºnden.
Schnee und Bergrettung. Entsch√§digung bei Suche, Rettung, Transportkosten und medizinischen Kosten im Falle eines Unfalls in den Bergen.
Auto-, Fahrrad- und Roller-Sharing. Entsch√§digung bei Schaden und Diebstahl von gemieteten Fahrzeugen von Sharing-Unternehmen.
Zusatzkarte. Du kannst eine zus√§tzlich N26 You Karte f√ºr eine einmalige Geb√ºhr von 14‚Ç¨ in deiner N26 App bestellen.
Wenn du N26 You Nutzer bist oder zu N26 You upgraden m√∂chtest, hast du die M√∂glichkeit, zwischen 5 Farben f√ºr deine neue N26 You Karte zu w√§hlen.
Wenn du dich f√ºr¬†N26 You(neuen Tab) interessierst, denke daran:
Die N26 You Mastercard hat keine Pr√§gung: Die Kartendetails, einschlie√ülich der Nummer, des CVV Codes und des zehnstelligen Tokens sind auf der R√ºckseite aufgedruckt.
Wenn du auf N26 You upgradest, wird die monatliche Geb√ºhr von 9,90 ‚Ç¨ jeden Monat ab dem Datum deines Upgrades direkt von deinem N26 Konto eingezogen. Wenn du ein Neukunde bist, wird die erste Geb√ºhr 15 Tage nach deiner¬†Identit√§ts√ºberpr√ºfung¬†eingezogen. Danach wird die Mitgliedschaftsgeb√ºhr monatlich von deinem Konto abgebucht, gez√§hlt ab dem Tag deines Upgrades. Wenn du dein Konto also zum Monatsende er√∂ffnest, wird die Geb√ºhr im darauf folgenden Monat zwei Mal abgebucht. 
Die Mindestmitgliedschaft betr√§gt ein Jahr. Sie verl√§ngert sich automatisch, wenn du nicht mindestens 4 Wochen vor Ablauf des Vertrages¬†k√ºndigst.
Du kannst eine zus√§tzlich N26 You Karte f√ºr eine einmalige Geb√ºhr von 14‚Ç¨ in deiner N26 App bestellen.
*Allianz Global Assistance Europe ist der Markenname von AWP P&C S.A. - Zweigniederlassung Niederlande und geh√∂rt zur Allianz Group.
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erhalte 15‚Ç¨ f√ºr jeden Freund, dem du N26 erfolgreich empfiehlst. Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: How to block my N26 card?
content:
You can block and unblock your cards at any time in the app. Go to¬†üë§ My Account¬†and select¬†Card settings. There you can decide if you want to temporarily limit or disable your ATM withdrawals, online payments or payments abroad, or block your card entirely.
This way, you have full control of your card and can protect yourself against¬†unauthorized transactions. You should immediately block your card if anything looks suspicious. You can always unblock it later.

If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126.

title: How to connect or disconnect my smartphone to my account?
content:
In order to use your N26 account, you need a smartphone : either an iPhone (5s or newer, at least iOS 11) or an Android (6.0 or newer - we do not support the customized versions of Amazon Fire and Oxygen OS). Only one device can be paired per account.
You'll need to pair and/or unpair your smartphone when you first create an account or if you get a new phone number or device.
To pair your smartphone with your account, simply open the app on your smartphone. You will be asked to¬†confirm your mobile phone number.
Enter the¬†4-digit code we send you via SMS¬†and your phone is paired. 
If you want to pair a new device, you must unpair your old device for¬†security reasons. You can do this in¬†üë§ My Account¬†(mobile app) or in the¬†Web app(new tab)¬†under¬†üë§ My Account¬†then¬†Security Settings if you don‚Äôt have access to your smartphone anymore. You‚Äôll receive an email from us with further instructions.
If you log into your N26 account with a new device, you'll receive two codes ‚Äì a Login SMS code with 6 digits and Pairing SMS code with 4 digits. You'll need the Login code to access your account and the Pairing code for pairing your device.

If your referral bonus hasn‚Äôt arrived yet, we‚Äôve also collected a¬†few reasons why.

This means you can share your invite link with your personal connections via social media as long as you are the primary content owner. N26 has the right to cancel the referral program at any time.
Currently,¬†Friend referral¬†rewards are only available for customers in Germany, Austria, Italy, France, Spain, Belgium, Luxembourg, Greece, Portugal, Ireland, the Netherlands, Finland, Estonia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden, Switzerland, Norway, Denmark, Poland, Iceland and Liechtenstein.

title: What does N26 do with my tax information?
content:
The OECD requires certain tax information to be shared by means of the Common Reporting Standard(new tab) (ECR). To carry out our obligations, we must establish which country you‚Äôre taxable in. We do this through your tax identification or National Insurance number. 
We forward this information via the German Federal Tax Office to tax authorities in other countries if: 
You live in a ECR participating country.
You have a postbox or a second registered address in another ECR participating country.
When registering you gave a telephone number belonging to another ECR participating country.
You have a standing order, or make regular payments, to an account located in another ECR participating country.
We also forward data to the U.S. Internal Revenue Service(new tab) (IRS) according to the Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act(new tab) (FATCA). We may request your Social Security Number (SSN) in order to check your tax status in the U.S. because:
You are a citizen of the U.S (including dual citizenship).
When registering you gave a telephone number belonging to the U.S.
You were born in the U.S. (or in a U.S. embassy located abroad).
You‚Äôre married to a U.S. national.
You gave us an address in the U.S.
You make regular payment transfers to the U.S.
To update your tax identification or social security number in the N26 app:
Go to  My Account and tap on Settings and Account settings
Select Personal settings then Tax information
Select the country in which you‚Äôre tax-liable
Enter either your tax identification number or your social security number
Important information
In Germany, we need your Steueridentifikationsnummer (11 digits) not your Steuernummer (9 digits).
If you‚Äôre not tax-liable in another country, contact us so we can confirm your tax status.
In each and every case your personal data will be securely stored and only used for the fulfillment of ECR and FATCA requirements.
We‚Äôre unable to advise you on your tax status. If you‚Äôre unsure of your status please discuss the matter with a tax advisor.
If you‚Äôve entered the country in which you are liable for tax but not your tax identification number, please remove the country from the list shown to you in the app, reenter the country, and enter your tax identification number again.

title: Can I open an account if I live outside the eurozone?
content:
If you live in Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Liechtenstein, Switzerland or Iceland you may¬†open an account with us. We offer:
The choice between a standard bank account or N26 Business.
Accounts in ‚Ç¨, a German IBAN, and transfers with SEPA or Moneybeam.
Good currency conversion with your Mastercard debit card.
Free shipping of your Mastercard or ‚Ç¨25 for express.
Foreign currency transfers with TransferWise (with the standard account).
5 free ATM withdrawals in ‚Ç¨ in the EU (1.7% markup on foreign currencies withdrawals).
0.1% cashback on all card payments (for Business accounts).
2 Spaces in addition to the main account.
A bonus for every friend you successfully invite to N26 with our Refer a Friend Program.
Contactless payment with Google Pay and Apple Pay.
Tips for incoming and outgoing transfers:
We recommend choosing your local currency to get the best exchange rate when using your Mastercard for purchases or to withdraw cash (if not, additional fees may apply).
To top up your account using your local currency, we recommend converting your currency via SEPA transfer either using TransferWise (on their website(new tab)) or using your local bank.
For outgoing transfers to ‚Ç¨ accounts, simply use the app's internal SEPA transfer. For outgoing transfers to non-‚Ç¨ accounts, use TransferWise in the app.*
*Please note: TransferWise is unavailable for N26 Business accounts (only SEPA transfers in EUR).

title: How to top up my account?
content:
Once you are successfully verified, you'll be able to top up your account in several ways:
CASH26 (in Germany, Austria, and Italy). Deposit cash through our partner stores;
MoneyBeam. Instantly receive money from other N26 users;
Debit card. You can add money to your account by entering the card details from your other account within the N26 app. You can choose to deposit between 20‚Ç¨ and 150‚Ç¨. Please note that prepaid cards are not accepted. Likewise, we don‚Äôt support American Express credit cards.
Apple Pay or Google Pay(new tab). You can add money to your account by using Apple Pay (for iOS devices) or GPay (for Android devices).You can choose to deposit between 20‚Ç¨ and 150‚Ç¨. Please note that prepaid cards are not accepted. Likewise, we don‚Äôt support American Express credit cards.
SEPA transfer. The transfer must be in EUR and within SEPA. You‚Äôll just need to provide your IBAN and your name as it‚Äôs written on the ID you used to create your account. You should also know that: 
For the transfer details, make sure the recipient‚Äôs name is your name as it‚Äôs written on the identity document you used to prove your identity (especially if you have an N26 Business account ‚Äì we don‚Äôt accept company names). 
The transfer will be instant if the sending bank support SEPA instant outgoing transfers, if not, it will completed within one banking day. Due to the opening times of the participating banks, one banking day may stretch to two working days.
In France, your first transfer can only be sent from another one of your accounts. For all other regions, you can use any other bank account to make the transfer (it doesn‚Äôt have to be under your name). 
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: How to create a Shared Space?
content:
To create a Shared Space:
Create a Space and tap it in the Spaces overview.

Tap the + icon in the top right-hand corner of the page.

Read the ‚ÄòLearn more‚Äô information and tap the ‚ÄòInvite new member‚Äô button.

Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you wish to invite. If the person you want to invite has an N26 account but doesn't show up in the contact list, we recommend that you ask them to check if they agreed to be visible to others N26 users via the app, in the My Account section > Settings > Personal Setting > Personal Information.

If needed, enter their full name as we have it listed.

Review the information on the Grant power of attorney page (the legal screen). Once you‚Äôve read and agreed to the T&Cs, tick the box and tap the ‚ÄòAccept power of attorney‚Äô button.

Enter your Confirmation PIN.

Tap on the relevant participant in the list of participants.

Confirm the ‚ÄòSend Invite‚Äô push notification on your paired mobile device.

What are Shared Spaces?
How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?

title: How do I change my Confirmation PIN?
content:
You can change your Confirmation PIN at any time in the mobile application or WebApp.
In the mobile application:
Tap on the My Account icon (‚Äú üë§‚Äù)
Tap on ‚ÄúSettings‚Äù.
Select ‚ÄùSecurity‚Äù. 
Select ‚ÄúChange Confirmation PIN‚Äù.
Enter the 10-digit token number on your Visa debit card.
Create and confirm your new Confirmation PIN.
In the WebApp(new tab):
Click on ‚Äú üë§ My Account‚Äù.
Click on ‚ÄùSecurity Settings‚Äù. 
Select ‚ÄúChange Confirmation PIN‚Äù.
Enter the 10-digit token number on your Visa debit card.
Create and confirm your new Confirmation PIN.
If you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times, you'll need to wait 24 hours before trying again.
Please note that, for security reasons, your PIN cannot contain:
Parts of your date of birth or your address
Repeated numbers (such as 1111, 111, or 11), or sequences (such as 1234 or 4321). 
If the PIN you‚Äôve chosen is not accepted, please try again using a different one. 
If your card was stolen or lost, contact Customer Support immediately by phone at 1-888-N26-0-N26 (1-888-626-0626) or chat through the mobile app or WebApp(new tab).
The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: How do I set my card PIN?
content:
PINs are not sent via mail; you can set the PIN for your N26 Visa¬Æ¬†Debit Card once you‚Äôve successfully paired your smartphone to your account and activated your card. To create or change your card PIN:
In the mobile app:
Log in and tap on "Actions".
Tap on "Card Settings".
Tap on "Reset PIN".
On the web:
Go to üë§ "My Account".
Select "Cards".
Select "Reset PIN".
Keep in mind that:
For security reasons we don‚Äôt accept any PIN containing repeated digits or numerical sequences (such as 1111, 1234, or 4321). If the number you‚Äôve chosen is not accepted please try again using a different combination.
Your card PIN is separate from your Confirmation PIN, however you can choose the same PIN for both.

The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: How long do transfers take?
content:
All FPS (Faster Payments Service) transfers are processed immediately and credited to the other account within a few hours. If the other bank is not part of the FPS system the time to process the transfer will be the same as a regular bank transfer. BACS transfers are processed in 2 to 3 business days.
You'll need to confirm every outgoing transfer via push notification in the mobile app. If not, the transfer will remain as pending.
With¬†MoneyBeam, you can instantly transfer money to other N26 customers in the UK.¬†
Please note that we only accept transfers in GBP (no SWIFT transfers).
If your incoming transfer is outside of these estimated time frames, please contact the sending bank to initiate a payment investigation.

title: Comment obtenir un cr√©dit ?
content:
N26 Cr√©dit vous permet de souscrire √† un cr√©dit personnalis√© √† tout moment, directement depuis votre application N26. Selon votre pays de r√©sidence, vous pouvez demander de 1 000 ‚Ç¨ √† 50 000 ‚Ç¨ ; les remboursements peuvent s‚Äô√©chelonner sur une p√©riode de 6 √† 84 mois. Afin de vous proposer les meilleures offres de pr√™ts possibles, nous travaillons en collaboration avec des partenaires sp√©cialistes du cr√©dit. En Allemagne, il s‚Äôagit d'Auxmoney et en France, de Younited Credit.
Voici les √©tapes de l‚Äôobtention d‚Äôun cr√©dit :
Demandez un cr√©dit √† tout moment depuis votre application dans la section D√©couvrir puis Produits financiers N26. Nous vous demanderons alors de r√©pondre √† quelques questions √† propos de votre demande de cr√©dit mais aussi de votre solvabilit√©. Vous devrez peut-√™tre fournir les coordonn√©s d‚Äôun compte bancaire suppl√©mentaire.
V√©rifier votre identit√©. En Allemagne, nous avons besoin de v√©rifier votre identit√©, gr√¢ce √† votre carte d‚Äôidentit√© ou votre passeport. Nous pouvons aussi vous demander un justificatif de domicile (par exemple une facture d‚Äô√©lectricit√© de moins de 3 mois). Si vous √™tes un r√©sident non europ√©en, il faudra en plus nous envoyer une photo de votre permis de s√©jour. Ce n‚Äôest pas le cas si vous r√©sidez en France.
Modifiez votre demande selon les r√©sultats de l‚Äô√©tude de cr√©dit. Nous conservons vos r√©ponses pendant une p√©riode de 90 jours. Vous pouvez effectuer de nouvelles demandes de cr√©dit pour financer de nouveaux projets, √† tout moment. D√®s que vous avez finalis√© votre demande, vous pouvez nous la soumettre pour une √©tude imm√©diate. Nous vous adresserons ensuite une offre finale que vous pouvez accepter ou refuser et supprimer.
Acceptez la proposition. Si vous acceptez notre offre, vous devrez signer le contrat pendant un appel vid√©o r√©alis√© avec l‚Äôun de nos agents ou, en France uniquement, vous pouvez confirmer l'acceptation de votre contrat de cr√©dit directement dans votre application N26.
Vous serez averti par une notification d√®s lors que le montant de votre pr√™t sera disponible sur votre compte courant N26. En Allemagne, les fonds vous seront vers√©s en quelques minutes. En France, cela peut prendre jusqu‚Äô√† 7 jours.
Selon le plan de votre cr√©dit N26, les taux d'int√©r√™t annuels effectifs varient entre 1,99 % et 19 %. En plus des int√©r√™ts, des frais de dossier uniques seront directement d√©duits du montant vers√©. Si vous souhaitez¬†modifier le plan¬†de votre Cr√©dit N26, ou si des retards sont enregistr√©s dans le paiement de vos mensualit√©s, des frais suppl√©mentaires peuvent s'appliquer conform√©ment aux¬†Conditions d‚ÄôUtilisation G√©n√©rales de N26 Cr√©dit(nouvel onglet).

title: Shared Spaces - Trusted Beneficiary
content:
A trusted beneficiary of a Shared Space can:
Transfer money from their own Spaces (including other Shared Spaces of which they are a participant) to a Shared Space. 
Access and freely transfer the funds of a Shared Space at any time.
Leave a Shared Space at any time.
Transfers between a trusted beneficiary and a Shared Space do not need to be authenticated via Pin and Push notification. This means that beneficiaries can seamlessly drag-and-drop money via the N26 app and Web app similarity to how normal Space transactions work.

Why do I need to classify an owner or member as a trusted beneficiary?
European banking law regulates how bank transfers must be authorised.¬†
In this law strong customer authentication (SCA) is a requirement to make online payments more secure.¬†
One exception to this is the classification of a person in a Shared Space as a ‚Äútrusted beneficiary‚Äù so that transfers to this person do not require SCA.
What are Shared Spaces?
How to add or remove Shared Space participants?

title: Come utilizzare MoneyBeam?
content:
MoneyBeam consente di inviare denaro ai contatti sul tuo smartphone senza doverne conoscere le coordinate bancarie. Per inviare un MoneyBeam, accedi all'app:
Dalla schermata principale, vai nella sezione Gestisci.
Seleziona Dal mio conto e poi MoneyBeam.
Seleziona un contatto dalla tua rubrica oppure aggiungine uno tramite il indirizzo email o numero di telefono. √à necessario che il tuo contatto sia un utente N26.
Inserisci l'importo e un testo di riferimento
Conferma con il PIN di conferma e messaggio push.
Il denaro verr√† accreditato in tempo reale. Puoi inviare fino a ‚Ç¨1.000 ad altri clienti N26 nell'arco di 24 ore.
Vuoi parlare di noi ai tuoi amici e guadagnarci? Ottieni ‚Ç¨15 per ogni amico che inviti con successo ad iscriversi ad N26. Scopri di pi√π sul nostro programma Invita un amico.

title: Wie lege ich eine Beschwerde ein?
content:
Deine Zufriedenheit hat f√ºr uns oberste Priorit√§t. Wir m√∂chten unsere Dienstleistungen kontinuierlich verbessern und Probleme umgehend beheben. Dazu brauchen wir deine Unterst√ºtzung.
So erreichst du uns:
Am besten kontaktierst du uns per Chat direkt aus deiner App. So k√∂nnen wir die meisten Anliegen schnell und unkompliziert l√∂sen. 
Ansonsten sende uns dein Feedback gerne von deiner registrierten E-Mail-Adresse an beschwerden@n26.com oder per Post an:
N26 Bank GmbH
Beschwerdemanagement
Klosterstra√üe 62
10179 Berlin
Je ausf√ºhrlicher du uns den Sachverhalt schilderst, desto schneller k√∂nnen wir dein Anliegen pr√ºfen und beantworten.
Daf√ºr ben√∂tigen wir von dir folgende Informationen:
deinen vollst√§ndigen Namen und deine Adresse, sowie deine IBAN (sofern du ein Konto bei uns hast) 
den Service, mit dem du nicht zufrieden bist
eine umfassende Beschreibung deines Anliegens
das Datum, an dem das Problem zum ersten Mal aufgetreten ist
Was machen wir mit deiner Beschwerde?
Unser Ziel ist es, deine Anfrage baldm√∂glichst zu bearbeiten und gemeinsam eine L√∂sung zu finden. 
Wir informieren dich direkt nach Eingang deiner Beschwerde per E-Mail √ºber die voraussichtliche Bearbeitungszeit und den weiteren Prozess. 
Innerhalb der n√§chsten 15 Arbeitstage nach Eingang deiner Beschwerde kommen wir mit einem L√∂sungsvorschlag auf dich zu. Sollten wir die Pr√ºfung bis dahin noch nicht abgeschlossen haben, melden wir uns ebenfalls bei dir per E-Mail und informieren dich √ºber die voraussichtliche Bearbeitungszeit sowie √ºber die Gr√ºnde der Verz√∂gerung. 
Solltest du w√§hrend dem Bearbeitungszeitraum weitere Fragen haben, kannst du uns gerne jederzeit per E-Mail kontaktieren. 
Alternative Wege zur Einreichung deiner Beschwerde
Solltest du mit unserer angebotenen L√∂sung unzufrieden sein, hast du die M√∂glichkeit, dich an eine unabh√§ngige dritte Person zu wenden. 
Neben einer Beschwerde in unserem Hause, kannst du dich auch an diese Schlichtungsstellen wenden:
die Schlichtungsstelle der Deutschen Bundesbank 
die Bundesanstalt f√ºr Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht (BaFin) 
die Europ√§ischen Kommission mittels der Europ√§ischen Online-Streitbeilegungsplattform (ODR).
Wir setzen alles daran, dein Anliegen schnellstm√∂glich zu deiner Zufriedenheit zu beantworten. 
Hinweis: Die Bearbeitung von Beschwerden erfolgt kostenfrei.

title: Custom Audiences
content:
Data Processing in the framework of Facebook Custom Audiences
Custom Audiences allows us to exclude you, as an existing N26 customer, from our advertisements. We do not want to display irrelevant ads to you. Furthermore, it allows us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other Facebook users. These so called ‚ÄúLookalike-Audiences‚Äù are more similar to our customers than the average Facebook user.¬†
In order to profit from the benefits as described above we provide a hashed version of your N26 email address to Facebook. The so-called ‚Äúhashing‚Äù is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. Facebook then matches this email address against your potential Facebook email address. After the matching, regardless of whether it was successful or not, any hashed email addresses are deleted within 6-8 hours by Facebook. Facebook does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. You can find this and further information in the terms of Facebook Custom Audiences(new tab).
You can revoke your consent according to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR to this data processing in the N26 web app at any time.

title: How to save the details of a transfer recipient?
content:
Every time you make a transfer to a new recipient in the app (tap + then¬†Transfer¬†and¬†Add new recipient), some details like the recipient‚Äôs name and IBAN are automatically saved in your transfer contact list for future transfers. You can also delete contacts or view your transaction history with them:
iOS: swipe a contact entry to the left in order to show the transaction history or delete the entry.
Android: tap and hold on a contact entry in order to show the transaction history or delete the entry.
Keep in mind that deleting a contact entry doesn‚Äôt delete your transaction history with them.

title: PSD2 - Strong Customer Authentication
content:
SCA acts as an additional layer of security for all N26 customers by providing Two-Factor Authentication (2FA). This is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. You‚Äôre probably familiar with using just your personal password to sign in to your account but with Two-Factor Authentication you‚Äôll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.
When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you‚Äôll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number to confirm your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log into your N26 account. 
When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. Therefore, the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.
SCA is being introduced as part of the revised European Payments Services Directive (PSD2) which applies to all European Banks. The objective of PSD2 is to enhance the security of the customers‚Äô data and account security. Find out more about PSD2 in our dedicated article about the PSD2. 
I cannot log into my account. How do I solve this?
First, try update your phone to the newest version. If you still cannot log into your account but still have access to your registered email address, please try to reset your password. If you don‚Äôt have access to your registered email address, please contact us via our live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out. 
I lost access to my paired device. How will I be able to log into my account again?
If you lost access to your paired device but you still have access to your registered phone number, please log into your N26 account and request an authentication code. To do this:
Login to the Webapp
When prompted to confirm your login on your paired device, select Help 
Choose Send SMS Code
Once you receive the SMS code, input it into the Webapp
As you confirm the authentication code you‚Äôve completed two-factor authentication and you‚Äôll be able to pair your new device with your account again.
If you don‚Äôt have access to your registered phone number - either because you have a new phone number or your phone was lost or stolen - please contact our customer service via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out. 
What if my phone doesn‚Äôt support the latest app version?
If you have an older smartphone device that doesn‚Äôt support the latest app version,  you won‚Äôt be able to access N26 via the mobile app anymore using your phone.¬†
You can still use our Webapp to view your account, to do this you'll need to confirm your login attempt via an SMS verification code which we‚Äôll send to your account's registered phone number. 
You‚Äôll still be able to complete card transactions and cash withdrawals as normal using your Mastercard but bear in mind that you won't be able to perform any bank transfers or payments until you can confirm the transfer within the N26 app.

title: PSD2 - Starke Kundenauthentifizierung
content:
SCA verbessert die Sicherheit aller N26 Kundenkonten, indem es Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung einf√ºhrt. Wenn du dich in dein N26 Konto in der WebApp oder einem nicht-verkn√ºpften Ger√§t einloggst, wirst du nach einer zus√§tzlichen Best√§tigung gefragt. Diese kannst du entweder via Push-Mitteilung von deinem verkn√ºpften Handy geben oder indem du einen Authentifizierungs-Code best√§tigst, den wir dir per SMS schicken. So wird die Sicherheit erh√∂ht, dass nur du dich in dein N26 Konto einloggen kannst.¬†
Wenn du dich vom verkn√ºpften Handy in deine N26 App einloggst, findet die Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung schon automatisch statt, sodass der Login Prozess von deinem verkn√ºpften Ger√§t unver√§ndert bleibt.
SCA wird im Rahmen der Zahlungsdiensterichtlinie PSD2 eingef√ºhrt, die f√ºr alle europ√§ischen Banken gilt. Das Ziel von PSD2 ist es, die Sicherheit der Daten und Bankkonten der Kunden zu verbessern. Erfahre mehr √ºber PSD2 in diesem Artikel in unserem Support Center.
Ich kann mich nicht in mein Konto einloggen. Was soll ich tun?
Bitte installiere die neueste App-Version auf deinem Smartphone. Wenn du dich nicht in dein Konto einloggen kannst, aber noch Zugriff auf deine hinterlegte E-Mail Adresse hast, versuche bitte, dein Passwort zur√ºckzusetzen. Falls du keinen Zugriff mehr auf deine hinterlegte E-Mail Adresse hast, kontaktieren uns bitte im Live Chat und wir helfen dir gerne weiter.
Ich habe keinen Zugriff mehr auf mein verkn√ºpftes Handy. Wie kann ich auf mein Konto zugreifen?
Wenn du auf dein verkn√ºpftes Smartphone keinen Zugriff mehr hast, aber deine registrierte Telefonnummer noch verwenden kannst, logge dich in dein N26 Konto ein und fordere einen Authentifizierungs-Code per SMS an. Das funktioniert so:
Logge dich in die WebApp ein.
Wenn du aufgefordert wirst, dich in dein verkn√ºpftes Smartphone einzuloggen, klicke auf Hilfe.
Klicke auf SMS-Code schicken.
Gib den Code in der WebApp ein.
Nun hast du die Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung abgeschlossen und kannst dein neues Smartphone mit deinem N26 Konto wieder wie gewohnt verkn√ºpfen.
Falls dir deine registrierte Telefonnummer nicht mehr zur Verf√ºgung steht - z.B. weil du eine neue Telefonnummer hast oder dein Handy verloren oder gestohlen wurde - kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice im Live-Chat und wir helfen dir gerne weiter.
Was passiert, wenn mein Smartphone die neueste App-Version nicht mehr unterst√ºtzt?
In dem Fall kannst du mit diesem Ger√§t nicht mehr auf die mobile N26 App zugreifen.¬†
Deine Mastercard kannst du aber nach wie vor verwenden und dich auch √ºber den Browser in die N26 WebApp einloggen. 
Es ist nicht m√∂glich, √ºber die WebApp √úberweisungen durchzuf√ºhren, es sei denn, du kannst deinen Login-Versuch mit einem Verifizierungscode best√§tigen. Diesen werden wir dir per SMS an die Telefonnummer schicken, die in deinem N26 Konto hinterlegt ist.

title: How does Spaces work?
content:
Set goals, create and personalize Spaces, and transfer money between them instantly. Spaces is available in the mobile and¬†WebApp(new tab).
In addition to your main account (or primary space), you can create and delete additional Spaces as often as you‚Äôd like but the number of active Spaces at any one time depends on your account type: 2 additional Spaces with an N26 or N26 Business account or up to 10 additional Spaces with N26 You, N26 Business You and N26 Metal.
Your primary account statements will include all transactions sent to a space or received from one. You can download balance statements from the confirmation page.
Only your primary space can be negative (if you are eligible for an overdraft). All other balances in Spaces cannot be negative, meaning you can only transfer what is available in a particular space.
You can only use the balance from your primary space toward your Mastercard transactions. So consider transferring money before making a purchase if needed.
Move money from one space to another by holding down on your Main Account and dragging and dropping into your space. Once the amount is confirmed the balance is updated right away.
You can lock and unlock a space at anytime from your mobile and web app. You'll only need to confirm with your confirmation PIN. If a space is locked, you‚Äôll still be able to transfer money to it. If you need to withdraw money from a locked space, you need first to unlock it.
You'll be able to hide the amount within the Space from your account's total balance. Just go into your Space, tap the three dots in the top right corner and select ‚ÄòHide space balance‚Äô.
Spaces includes a feature called Rules which will help you manage your time and your finances effectively.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: Come impostare il PIN della carta?
content:
Non ti manderemo un PIN per posta: puoi impostare il PIN per la carta Mastercard o Maestro¬†dopo aver collegato correttamente il tuo smartphone al conto e aver¬†attivato¬†la carta/e. Per impostare o modificare il PIN della carta:
Vai a Gestisci.
Seleziona Impostazioni della carta per scegliere una carta.
Seleziona Reimposta.
Inserisci il numero a 10 cifre sulla tua carta.
Scegli il nuovo PIN e confermalo.
Ricordati che:
Per motivi di sicurezza, non accettiamo PIN contenenti parti della tua data di nascita, dell'indirizzo o combinazioni di cifre ripetute o sequenze numeriche (come 1111, 1234 o 4321). Se il numero scelto non viene accettato, riprova con una combinazione diversa.
Se vivi in Francia, Spagna, Irlanda, Grecia, Finlandia o Estonia devi effettuare il tuo primo pagamento utilizzando Chip e PIN prima di poter utilizzare la tua carta altrove. Puoi anche  fare un prelievo o una richiesta di saldo attuale presso un ATM.
Se si digita un PIN errato per tre volte consecutive, la carta viene automaticamente bloccata per motivi di sicurezza. In tal caso, contatta la nostra Assistenza clienti tramite chat per farla sbloccare.
Il PIN della carta √® distinto dal PIN di conferma, ma puoi scegliere lo stesso PIN per entrambi.

title: Come aprire un conto N26?
content:
Puoi aprire un conto N26 nell'app (sul tuo smartphone) o nella WebApp(nuova tabella) se:
hai almeno 18 anni
sei residente in un paese supportato
possiedi uno smartphone compatibile
possiedi un documento supportato (l'ammissibilit√† varia se vivi in Germania(nuova tabella) o al di fuori della Germania(nuova tabella))
non sei gi√† titolare di un conto N26
sei in grado di verificare la tua identit√† in una delle seguenti lingue: inglese, tedesco, spagnolo, italiano o francese.
Ecco come funziona la procedura per l' apertura di un conto bancario N26:
Dopo aver confermato il tuo indirizzo e-mail, i tuoi dettagli personali e l'indirizzo di spedizione, seleziona il tipo di conto desiderato. *¬†
Dimostra la tua identit√†¬†e¬†collega lo smartphone¬†al tuo nuovo conto.¬†
Ricarica il conto(nuova tabella)¬†tramite bonifico bancario oppure tramite CASH26 (disponibile solo in Austria, Germania o Italia). 
Dopo alcuni giorni, riceverai la tua N26 Mastercard¬†per posta.
Per maggiori informazioni, ecco come puoi contattarci.

title: How to prove my identity?
content:
As a licensed bank, it‚Äôs important that we know who our customers are. That‚Äôs why we request our customers to prove their identity with a supported ID document when they open an account or use certain products.
We would never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. We‚Äôve gathered other tips to help you protect your identity.
There are two different ways you can show us your ID, and we've also collected some troubleshooting tips for each: photo and video. The method you can choose to show us your ID depends on your nationality, your country of residence, and the type of ID you use:
I live in Germany(new tab)
I live in Spain(new tab)
I live in a different country(new tab)
If your ID isn't on the list, it means we cannot offer you an account with us at the time. We take identity verification very seriously and our Customer Support will not be able to make an exception for you regarding the supported documents.
But we're always adding new documents to this list so it's worth checking back to see if yours has been added.
In case your residential address is in Germany and you're unable to complete your photo or video verification due to a disability, please start the registration process by entering your details and then contact our Customer Support. We're happy to assist you.
Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.¬†

title: How does N26 Business work?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, and Switzerland.
It‚Äôs not yet possible to switch between accounts so it‚Äôs important to know if N26 Business is right for you:
The N26 Business account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can‚Äôt have your company‚Äôs name on the account or card.
The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. It‚Äôs currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (it‚Äôs available in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands).
As with the N26 bank account, the account is free and we cover certain cash withdrawals as part of our Fair Use Policy. Unlike other accounts, transfers in foreign currencies aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business within the app. You can visit Transferwise(new tab) for this.
Business to business (B2B) payments are not supported with a N26 Business account. 
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: App & Features
content: The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank.
