title: How to download my personal data?
content:
The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a European regulation on data protection and privacy that went into effect on May 25th, 2018. We‚Äôve added a data export option to the WebApp(new tab) as a response to Art. 20 GDPR. And, as with everything we do, getting your personal data you provided to us is transparent and simple, and you‚Äôre in complete control: go to üë§ My Account then Personal settings and Your personal data.
The right to data portability under Art. 20 GDPR covers personal data you provided to us. Art. 20 GDPR shall enable you to easily switch the service provider in case you want to use these data to open a bank account at another bank. This is why Art. 20 GDPR requires to provide these data in a machine-readable format to you. ¬†It's important to keep in mind that the file is to be used for data portability purposes only and your computer might not be able to read a JSON file. Also, if you can open the JSON file the data might be difficult to understand as it is not intended to be human-readable, but machine-readable. The file we provide has the only purpose of being transmitted to another bank.¬†
As a mobile bank, we know the importance of data security. For this reason we take additional security measures before you can download your data, which are described below. We do so in order to make sure that you, the account holder, is in fact the person who downloads the data.¬†¬†
You can request to download the personal data you provided for a current or previous account with us up to 6 months after account closure date. It will come in a machine-readable format so you can share it with a third party if you choose to.
Please request your data through our web form(new tab).
You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.
You can download personal data you provided up to 6 months after account closure date. To request this information, complete a data request form(new tab) and make sure that the information you provide correctly matches all your previous account information. You‚Äôll need to know:
the first and last name, personal ID number, and expiration date of the identification document (national ID card or passport) you used to verify the account,
the registered email address of the account,
the date (month and year) you created and closed your account (check your verification email).
For security reasons, we have to make sure it‚Äôs really you downloading the data: if any field is inaccurate or missing, your request will not be successful.
You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.
If you want more information about the collection, use, and processing of your personal data, please visit our updated Privacy Policy (DEU(new tab)) (EU(new tab)).

title: Was passiert, wenn mein Kontostand negativ ist?
content:
Dein Kontostand darf negativ sein, solange du innerhalb deines¬†Dispolimits¬†bleibst.
Andernfalls bekommst du eine E-Mail, um dich dar√ºber zu informieren dass das verf√ºgbare Limit deines Kontos √ºberschritten wurde. Das bedeutet, dass du nicht √ºber gen√ºgend Guthaben f√ºr zuk√ºnftige Zahlungen verf√ºgst.
Auch wenn du dein Konto seit der Er√∂ffnung noch nicht verwendet hast, fallen bestimmte Geb√ºhren an (wie z. B. deine monatlichen N26 You oder N26 Metal Geb√ºhren oder Kosten f√ºr die Expresslieferung), die zu einem negativen Kontostand f√ºhren k√∂nnen.
Du musst also √ºber eine SEPA-√úberweisung (w√§hle internationale √úberweisung aus, wenn du au√üerhalb Deutschlands bist) oder¬†CASH26¬†(falls du in Deutschland oder √ñsterreich bist)¬†Geld auf dein Konto einzahlen. Dein Konto bleibt weitere 60 Tage aktiv, wenn du das nicht tust. In diesem Zeitraum:
Bekommst du zwei Erinnerungen (jede kostet 3 ‚Ç¨).
Falls du einen Dispokredit hast, wird dieser nach der zweiten Erinnerung gek√ºndigt und du musst den Betrag sofort zur√ºckzahlen (oder du kannst einen R√ºckzahlungsplan beantragen).
Wenn du ein N26 You, N26 Metal oder N26 Business You Konto hast, werden alle Leistungen nach 60 Tagen gek√ºndigt und dein Konto in ein Standardkonto umgewandelt.
Wenn du nach diesen 60 Tagen nicht handelst, k√∂nnen wir dein Konto schlie√üen.

title: How to add or remove Shared Space participants?
content:
For an owner to remove a participant from a Shared Space:
In the Space overview, tap the menu indicated by the 3 dots in the top right.
From the ‚ÄòParticipants‚Äô list, tap on the arrow to the right of the relevant participant‚Äôs name (iOS). Android users can just simply tap on the participant's name.
Tap ‚Äòrevoke power of attorney‚Äô.
¬†Confirm the notification on the next screen and tap ‚Äòrevoke power of attorney‚Äô.¬†

Accept an invitation and join a Shared Space:
In the Spaces overview, tap the Space with ‚ÄòPending‚Äô and the Shared Space icon. 
Read the Shared Space summary and continue to the Power of Attorney screen.
Once you‚Äôve read and understood the information on the Power of Attorney page (the legal screen), tick the box and tap the ‚ÄòAccept power of attorney‚Äô button.
Enter your Confirmation PIN.
Confirm the ‚ÄòAccept Power of Attorney‚Äô push notification on your paired mobile device
You‚Äôll need to have enough free Space(s) to accept an invitation to a Shared Space. If not, you can only proceed if you delete other Space(s) to free up ‚Ä¶ Space.
You must also not have any open Space with the same name or image as the Shared Space. You can only accept the invitation to join a Shared Space once you change the name/image of the other Space(s).

To leave a Shared Space:
In the Space overview, tap the menu indicated by the 3 dots in the top right.
Inside the settings tap on ‚ÄòExit Shared Space‚Äô.
Confirm the notification on the next screen and tap ‚ÄòLeave the Space‚Äô.
A Shared Space can be created and modified within the N26 app or Webapp

title: How to create a barcode for CASH26?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Applies to German, Austrian and Italian T&C
To create a barcode for¬†CASH26:
From the Home screen, select the Actions tab,
Tap CASH26 and choose whether you want to Deposit cash or Withdraw cash,
Enter the amount and your Confirmation PIN,
Confirm the transaction via push message.
Simply show this barcode to a partner representative and you'll either be given cash on the spot or asked for the cash you wanted to deposit. It can take up to 10 minutes until this change is reflected on your bank balance. If you delete the barcode or don't use it within 10 minutes, it‚Äôll expire and be removed from your transaction list automatically.
Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial(new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube(new tab) channel.

title: Who can get a Basiskonto?
content:
You can open a free N26 bank account through our website or by downloading our app. 
The German Payment Accounts Act (Zahlungskontengesetz or ZKG) also gives all consumers who legally reside in the European Union the right to hold a basic payment account. This applies to those who live in a supported country.
The N26 Basiskonto comes with a monthly 6‚Ç¨ account management fee. You can find all other fees in our pricing lists. 
If you don‚Äôt have a bank account at N26 or at any other financial institution in Germany yet, you can apply. Under some circumstances, N26 is allowed to reject your request. ¬†
Please note that some products and services such as N26 Overdraft, N26 Credit, N26 You, or N26 Metal are not accessible with an N26 Basiskonto.

title: ¬øCu√°ntas veces puedo retirar efectivo gratis?
content:
La retirada gratuita en cajeros utilizando tu Mastercard depende de los T√©rminos y Condiciones de tu pa√≠s (la direcci√≥n a la que se envi√≥ tu tarjeta originalmente).

Para las retiradas en cajeros realizadas con¬†Maestro¬†siempre hay una tasa de 2‚Ç¨ (solo disponible en Alemania, Austria y Pa√≠ses Bajos).
Revisa nuestra¬†lista de precios¬†si te han¬†cobrado comisiones¬†en alg√∫n cajero autom√°tico.
*Solo en Alemania: dispones de 5 retiradas de efectivo gratuitas durante los primeros 3 meses. Despu√©s, pasar√°s a tener 3 retiradas gratuitas, aunque puedes seguir teniendo 5 si:

Recibes tu salario, pensi√≥n, ayuda de estudiantes o ayudas del gobierno al menos 2 meses consecutivos (tus retiradas gratuitas adicionales empezar√°n el mes siguiente).

title: Perch√© la verifica foto non funziona?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Valido per tutte le regioni eccetto Germania
Innanzitutto, assicurati di aver abilitato la geolocalizzazione. Quindi, esamina la guida(nuova tabella) che abbiamo creato per aiutarti a scattare le foto migliori.
La maggior parte delle foto verifiche non riesce a causa della cattiva qualit√† dell‚Äôimmagine.¬†Ecco alcuni suggerimenti:
Esegui il processo in un ambiente luminoso e utilizza un telefono cellulare con una buona fotocamera.
Se utilizzi un dispositivo Android, assicurati di avere una messa a fuoco automatica adeguata.
Scatta il selfie all'altezza degli occhi (la fotocamera dovrebbe essere alla stessa altezza dei tuoi occhi).
Assicurati di essere l‚Äôunica persona nella foto e che il documento sia ben visibile.
Controlla il tuo documento.
Accettiamo solo foto del documento originale (fotocopie o screenshots non vengono accettate).
Mantieni il tuo documento su una superficie piatta ed assicurati che sia completamente visibile.
Possiamo accettare solo carta d‚Äôidentit√† o passaporto (non sono accettati permessi di soggiorno). Dall'8 Luglio 2019 i clienti con nazionalit√† italiana residenti in Italia, potranno anche utilizzare la combinazione tessera sanitaria + patente di guida (emessa dal 2013)  durante il processo di verifica.
Assicurati che il documento non sia danneggiato.
Se scatti una foto del tuo documento d‚Äôidentit√† o di te stesso e il primo tentativo non va a buon fine, puoi riprovare.
Una volta completata la verifica, ti invieremo la tua Mastercard N26. La¬†consegna¬†richiede fino a 10 giorni.

title: Quanto tempo richiedono i trasferimenti?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Valido per tutti i paesi tranne Regno Unito
Tutti i¬†bonifici SEPA¬†nazionali e internazionali vengono eseguiti entro un giorno bancario. Tuttavia, a causa degli orari di apertura delle banche partecipanti, un giorno bancario pu√≤ durare fino a due giorni lavorativi. Bonifici SEPA in uscita vengono accreditati in un giorno bancario. 
Ricorda che se un bonifico √® stato inviato poco prima di un weekend o di un giorno festivo, il tempo di accredito sar√† prolungato. Mandiamo i nostri bonifici SEPA attraverso TARGET2(nuova tabella) che elabora i pagamenti dal luned√¨ al venerd√¨ dalle 07:00 alle 18:00 CET. Il sistema √® chiuso nei seguenti giorni:
1 gennaio (Capodanno), Venerd√¨ Santo, luned√¨ di Pasqua, 1 maggio (festa dei lavoratori), 25 dicembre (Natale), 26 dicembre.
Con¬†MoneyBeam, puoi trasferire denaro ad altri clienti N26 all'istante. Gli orari variano per i¬†trasferimenti in valuta estera¬†con TransferWise (ma apparir√† un tempo di trasferimento stimato quando si effettua il trasferimento).
Ti chiederemo di confermare ogni tipo di trasferimento tramite un¬†messaggio push¬†nell‚Äôapp prima di eseguire la transazione.
Nota: accettiamo solo bonifici in euro tramite SEPA (ci√≤ significa nessun trasferimento SWIFT).
Se il tuo trasferimento in entrata non avviene nei tempi previsti, contatta il mittente (banca) per un'indagine di pagamento. Non possiamo indagare sui trasferimenti in entrata. Ma abbiamo raccolto alcuni motivi per cui il tuo trasferimento¬†SEPA¬†o¬†valuta estera¬†potrebbe aver fallito

title: Why was I charged an ATM fee?
content:
ATM fees could happen for a few reasons: 
A ‚Ç¨2 fee applies to any additional withdrawal beyond our Fair Use Policy. We‚Äôll remind you via push message when you‚Äôre running low on free withdrawals. 
Some ATMs may come with their own fees. We have no control over these fees and can‚Äôt reject or reverse them. You‚Äôll be informed before the end of a withdrawal if additional fees apply and will have the possibility of cancelling it.
Foreign currency ATM withdrawals sometimes include fees. With the N26 account, there‚Äôs a fee of 1.7% of the withdrawal amount. This fee is waived for N26 You or N26 Metal members. 
Using your Maestro for ATM withdrawals. A ‚Ç¨2 fee applies to both domestic or international withdrawals. Maestro is only available in Germany, Austria, or the Netherlands. 

To avoid certain fees, especially when travelling, you can use the Mastercard ATM Locator(new tab) to find free ATMs nearby by selecting no access fee. 
You can find an overview of our plans and fees on our website(new tab).

title: Why was I charged a direct debit fee?
content:
Direct debits returned to your account due to¬†insufficient funds* are charged a ‚Ç¨3 fee in accordance with our¬†Terms & Conditions(new tab). If your balance becomes negative due to this fee,¬†overdraft¬†interest will also apply at a rate of 8.9%.
You can avoid these fees by making sure you have enough funds in your account to cover incoming direct debits by 18:00 on the same business day.
Since¬†SEPA transfers¬†could take more than one day to complete, we suggest you use¬†MoneyBeam (between N26 accounts) or¬†CASH26¬†(if you live in Germany, Austria or Italy) to transfer the amount due. With both methods, the amount will be credited to your account instantly.
And if you don‚Äôt recognize a direct debit, you can¬†reverse it¬†in the app.
*For Poland, Sweden, Denmark, and Norway: if you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and ultimate amount that is collected from us.

title: How to report an insurance claim?
content:
Your¬†N26 Metal(new tab)¬†membership includes a wide range of insurance benefits, covered by our partner Allianz Global Assistance Europe.*
To report a claim, log into your app, go to üë§ My Account and select N26 Metal, then select Make a claim.
There you'll find:
A guide to submit your claim (for example, flight or luggage delay, extended warranty, or travel cancellation)
Your account and contract information, including your N26 Metal ID
The option to contact Allianz directly in the case of a medical emergency
For emergencies, please have the following information ready:
The full address and telephone number of your current location
Names of all official contacts (doctors, hospitals, and/or police)
An exact description of the situation
*Allianz Global Assistance Europe is a trading name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and a member of the Allianz Group.

title: How do I return a SEPA transfer to its sender?
content:
From the 17th March, customers from other banks can request‚Äîat their bank institution‚Äîthe return of a SEPA transfer from an N26 customer.
The sender of a SEPA transfer can now request the recall of their funds from the receiving N26 account by reaching out to the sender bank. This request appears to N26 customers in the form of a push notification on their paired device. Similarly to confirming a debit transfer in the N26 app, you‚Äôll then have the option to reject or accept the credit transfer recall.
If you do not confirm or reject the transfer recall request after 15 days, the request is rejected automatically. Once the transfer recall is accepted, the funds will leave your account and you cannot request them back. If you don‚Äôt have sufficient funds in your Main Account, you‚Äôll not be able to confirm the transfer recall.

title: Wie verdiene ich Geld, indem ich Freunde zu N26 einlade?
content:
Du erh√§ltst jedes Mal 15 ‚Ç¨, wenn du N26 erfolgreich einem Freund/einer Freundin empfiehlst (max. 1500 ‚Ç¨). Du kannst Freunde einladen, sobald dein Konto vollst√§ndig er√∂ffnet ist.

Die Anmeldung √ºber deinen Empfehlungslink oder pers√∂nlichen Code abschlie√üen.
Die Mastercard aktivieren.

So l√§dst du Freunde ein:

W√§hle das Geschenksymbol aus

Tippe auf ‚ÄúSenden‚Äù!

*Der Link verf√§llt nicht und kann jederzeit verwendet werden. Pers√∂nliche Einladungscodes und Links sollten nur f√ºr pers√∂nliche und nichtkommerzielle Zwecke verwendet werden. title: How to get my money back in case of fraud?
content:
If you don‚Äôt recognize a transaction or you‚Äôre sure you didn‚Äôt authorize it,¬†blocking your card¬†won‚Äôt be enough. In these cases you should immediately:
Request new card(new tab) and indicate that the old one has been stolen. Please tear up the card by cutting it with scissors, for example. Both the chip, the NFC antenna and the magnetic stripe must be cut into pieces.
Then fill out the dispute form(new tab). From there we will do everything we can to get your money back.
You can continue using your account for bank transfers until your new card arrives. If you're in Germany or Austria, you can also use¬†CASH26¬†for cash withdrawals.
You should keep in mind that changes in the¬†final amount debited¬†from your account don't necessarily indicate fraud.

√ñffne deine Umsatzliste und w√§hle die entsprechende Lastschrift aus.
Tippe auf R√ºcklastschrift.
Der Betrag wird innerhalb von vier Bankarbeitstagen deinem Konto gutgeschrieben.
*In Polen, Schweden, D√§nemark und Norwegen: Wenn du eine Lastschrift in deiner Landesw√§hrung einrichtest, bestimmt die Bank des Zahlungsempf√§ngers die Geb√ºhren f√ºr den W√§hrungsumtausch sowie den endg√ºltigen Betrag, der bei uns abgebucht wird.

title: How to keep track of my daily spending?
content:
We automatically sort¬†your transactions¬†and display our findings in¬†Statistics¬†(top-right corner of the mobile app) by sorting your:
Categories: We collect information on retailers and payment reasons in order to improve our categorization (such as ATM, Food & Groceries, or Shopping). For example, if you send a MoneyBeam with the reference text Lunch, we‚Äôll put it in the Bars & Restaurants category. If you feel like a category doesn‚Äôt fit, you can just change it by selecting the transaction and choosing a category from the drop-down list.

Hashtags: We‚Äôve also added default hashtags for transaction times (#weekend), types of transactions (#books), or locations of purchases (#berlin). You can further sort your transactions by adding your own hashtags: tap on a transaction and then the pencil icon to add tags (such as #portugal_trip or #everymonth) or remove unwanted tags.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: How to cancel my N26 You or N26 Metal membership?
content:
N26 You(new tab) or¬†N26 Metal(new tab)¬†contracts have a term of one year. This contract automatically renews for another year unless you cancel it. 
In this article you will find the difference between revocation, cancellation of the membership and cancellation of the renewal of your membership. You have 3 options:
Revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period
Cancel your membership at any time up to 1 month before your contract ends
Stop your membership‚Äôs renewal up to 1 month before it expires
Find in details how to do so below. 
You can revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period. Simply open a chat with us and we'll assist you from there.
Keep in mind that if you cancel your contract before it ends, you won‚Äôt be able to sign up for the same membership plan in the future.
If you want to terminate your membership at any time up to *1 month before your contract ends and after the 14-day revocation period, please contact us.
If you choose this option all your N26 You or N26 Metal benefits will end, which includes your insurance coverage.
You have up to 4 weeks before your membership expires to cancel the renewal of your N26 You or N26 Metal membership. To do so:
Log into the mobile app and go to üë§ My Account
Select N26 You/Metal
Tap Membership details followed by Cancel Membership
 you can also see your membership expiration date here
Confirm the cancellation via the push message we send you
You can continue to use your N26 You or N26 Metal Mastercard fully until your membership expires. That means you‚Äôll keep your insurance coverage as long as you‚Äôre still required to pay your membership fee. After that, your Mastercard will work like a standard card without the benefits. We‚Äôll send you a standard card before your contract ends. No need to contact us about it.
We‚Äôll notify you of the renewal via email 8 weeks before your anniversary date.
If you want to definitely close your account, visit our article How to close my N26 account.

title: Shared Spaces - Trusted Beneficiary
content:
A trusted beneficiary of a Shared Space can:
Transfer money from their own Spaces (including other Shared Spaces of which they are a participant) to a Shared Space. 
Access and freely transfer the funds of a Shared Space at any time.
Leave a Shared Space at any time.
Transfers between a trusted beneficiary and a Shared Space do not need to be authenticated via Pin and Push notification. This means that beneficiaries can seamlessly drag-and-drop money via the N26 app and Web app similarity to how normal Space transactions work.

Why do I need to classify an owner or member as a trusted beneficiary?
European banking law regulates how bank transfers must be authorised.¬†
In this law strong customer authentication (SCA) is a requirement to make online payments more secure.¬†
One exception to this is the classification of a person in a Shared Space as a ‚Äútrusted beneficiary‚Äù so that transfers to this person do not require SCA.
What are Shared Spaces?
How to add or remove Shared Space participants?

title: How can I protect my identity?
content:
To protect and help avoid the misuse of your personal data, please keep in mind that:
We will never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. This includes verifications for apartment rental contracts, lines of credit, or job offers (including jobs with N26). Only complete the verification process if you want to open an N26 account for yourself.
As the account owner, only you should create and have access to your login credentials. Never create an N26 account with a predefined email address and password. If you use login credentials that were given to you, these credentials may be used to reach your personal and legal information. Also, never log into an N26 account that is not yours.
Do not send your Social Security Number to unknown or unverified recipients.
We may ask for certain documents when your transaction is subject to a routine check. Only send valid documentation to verified N26 email accounts.
We will never ask for your username, password, or PIN codes outside the N26 app. Never provide this information in an external website or app, even if it looks N26-related.
Mail is another easy target for thieves. If you are traveling out of town, it may be a good idea to have your mail held or to consider obtaining a U.S. Postal Service-approved lockable mailbox. All bank statements should be shredded, as well. 
Take care to monitor your financial statements. Make sure you recognize every transaction, no matter how small. 
If you received a suspicious request from a third party, or think your N26 login may be compromised, please do not hesitate to contact us(new tab).
The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: ¬øDebo declarar impuestos en Estados Unidos?
content:
Como banco con licencia legal, reportamos la informaci√≥n fiscal de las cuentas en Estados Unidos directamente al Internal Revenue Service, de acuerdo con FATCA, que es una legislaci√≥n dise√±ada por el departamento de tesorer√≠a y el IRS de EE.UU. para incentivar el cumplimiento total de la Ley de impuestos, previniendo que las personas de EE.UU. utilicen bancos extranjeros u otras organizaciones financieras con el objetivo de declarar sus bienes y ganancias.
Encuentra m√°s informaci√≥n sobre FATCA (pesta√±a nueva)aqu√≠(pesta√±a nueva).¬†
Dentro del contexto de FATCA, una persona de EE.UU. se define, entre otras cosas, como: 
un ciudadano de los EE.UU. (incluidos los de doble nacionalidad)
un residente en los EE.UU., por ejemplo el poseedor de la Tarjeta Verde, o alguien que cumple con el ‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù (consulta que es a continuaci√≥n).
Si no est√°s seguro de si eres una persona de los EE.UU. puedes consultar a un asesor fiscal.
‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù significa:
Que has estado f√≠sicamente en los EE.UU. 183 d√≠as o m√°s en el a√±o de calendario actual. 
√ì
Que has estado f√≠sicamente presente en los EE.UU. 183 d√≠as o m√°s en los tres √∫ltimos a√±os de calendario. Para calcularlo, se hace de la siguiente forma:

(31 d√≠as o m√°s en el a√±o de calendario actual) + (el n√∫mero de d√≠as con presencia f√≠sica en EE.UU. en el √∫ltimo a√±o) dividido entre 3 + ( el n√∫mero de d√≠as con presencia f√≠sica en EE.UU. en el pen√∫ltimo a√±o) dividido entre 6.
Adem√°s, si tu cuenta muestra algunos de los siguientes puntos:
Ciudadan√≠a o residencia en EE.UU.
Lugar de nacimiento en EE.UU. 
Direcci√≥n de residencia en EE.UU. 
N√∫mero de tel√©fono de EE.UU.
Ordenes de transferencias o pagos permanentes a direcciones de EE.UU.
Si se cumplen esos requisitos, estamos obligados a tratarte como una persona de los Estados Unidos, a no ser que presentes lo siguiente:
El formulario W-8BEN o un documento similar y
Un pasaporte de otro pa√≠s que no sea EE.UU. u otro documento certificado por otro gobierno que muestre que tu nacionalidad es otra.
Si has nacido en EE.UU., un documento que certifique la perdida de tu nacionalidad estadounidense.

title: Am I liable to tax in the United States?
content:
As a licensed bank we're required to report directly to the IRS information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers according to FATCA, a legislation designed by the US Department of Treasury and the U.S. Internal Revenue Service to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets.
You can find more information about FATCA here(new tab).¬†
In the context of FATCA, a U.S. Person is defined as, among other things:
A citizen of the United States (including dual citizens)
A resident in the United States, for example as a holder of a valid U.S. Green Card or as a person who passes the ‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù (see below).
If you're unsure as to how to determine whether you're a U.S. Person, please consult a tax advisor.
‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù means:
That you've been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more in the current calendar year
OR
That you have been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more over the last three calendar years, to be calculated as follows: 


(31 days or more in the current calendar year) + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. last year) divided by 3 + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. the year before last) divided by 6.
¬†In addition, if your account shows any of the following:
U.S. citizenship or U.S. residence
U.S. place of birth
U.S. mailing or residence address, including U.S. PO boxes
U.S. telephone number
Standing instructions to a U.S. address or an account maintained in the US
we're still obliged to treat you as a U.S. Person, unless we receive the following from you:¬†
A W-8BEN or similar agreed self-certification form and
A non-U.S. passport or other government-issued identification evidencing your citizenship or nationality in a country other than the U.S.
In case you were born in the US, a copy of your Certificate of Loss of Nationality of the US.

title: ¬øQu√© hacer si me hackean la cuenta?
content:
Si sospechas de alguna actividad fraudulenta en tu cuenta, ponte en contacto con nosotros lo antes posible. Puedes acceder al chat directamente desde la app del m√≥vil o la¬†Web App(pesta√±a nueva) y tambi√©n desde algunos art√≠culos del Support Center(pesta√±a nueva), como este mismo. Haz clic m√°s abajo en Abrir un chat.
Si prefieres hablar por tel√©fono, puedes ped√≠rnoslo en el chat. Organizaremos una llamada a tu n√∫mero con un margen de una hora para que podamos hablar detenidamente sobre el tema. Cuando ya est√©s en contacto con uno de nuestros agentes, expl√≠cale a fondo la situaci√≥n; cada detalle cuenta.

Te aseguramos que vamos a tomar todas las medidas necesarias para asistirte en esta situaci√≥n.
Adem√°s de nuestras obligaciones legales para la prevenci√≥n del fraude y con miras a mejorar continuamente nuestras defensas de seguridad, contamos con un equipo especializado que analiza cada caso de fraude individualmente. Los casos de fraude en s√≠ suelen ser relativamente complicados y requieren un trato detallado. Seg√∫n la complejidad del caso, puede tomar desde un par de d√≠as hasta varias semanas.
Por √∫ltimo, si tienes pruebas o fuertes sospechas de que han podido hackear tu cuenta, te recomendamos que tambi√©n pongas una denuncia en la polic√≠a.
Para m√°s informaci√≥n sobre c√≥mo protegemos tu cuenta en caso de fraude, visita nuestro art√≠culo del blog(pesta√±a nueva). Echa un vistazo tambi√©n a nuestra p√°gina sobre la Seguridad en N26(pesta√±a nueva) para ver nuestro compromiso por proteger tu dinero y tu cuenta.
Nuestras l√≠neas est√°n abiertas todos los d√≠as de 07:00 a 23:00, domingos y festivos incluidos.

Si no tienes acceso a la app de tu m√≥vil ni a la WebApp, tambi√©n puedes pedir que bloqueemos tu tarjeta o tu cuenta llamando al +34 910 480 660.

A ‚Ç¨2 fee applies to any additional withdrawal beyond our Fair Use Policy. We‚Äôll remind you via push message when you‚Äôre running low on free withdrawals. 
Some ATMs may come with their own fees. We have no control over these fees and can‚Äôt reject or reverse them. You‚Äôll be informed before the end of a withdrawal if additional fees apply and will have the possibility of cancelling it.
Foreign currency ATM withdrawals sometimes include fees. With the N26 account, there‚Äôs a fee of 1.7% of the withdrawal amount. This fee is waived for N26 You or N26 Metal members.

title: How to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?
content:
It‚Äôs important to keep your personal data up to date (for example, your phone number is necessary to¬†connect your smartphone¬†or to send and receive¬†MoneyBeams). Here's how you can change your information:
Delivery address,¬†password, or¬†tax information: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app. Just go to¬†üë§ My Account¬†and select¬†Settings¬†then¬†Personal Settings.
Name¬†and¬†sex: Chat with us and send two forms of ID: a copy of your new ID card or passport as well as an official document of the change (a marriage licence or updated birth certificate).  We can also re-order a card with your new name once your account has been updated.
Nationality: Chat with us and send a copy of your new ID card or passport.
Phone number or¬†email address: You‚Äôll need to contact us via chat for this. We need to verify it‚Äôs really you changing your information so we can‚Äôt change any personal data over email.
