title: How long do transfers take?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Applies to all regions except the UK
All domestic and international incoming SEPA transfers are instant if they come from a bank that supports instant transfers and the sender selects this option. Banking regulation applies to SEPA instant transfers and may delay the transfer in case it needs additional monitoring.
In case the sender bank doesn‚Äôt offer instant transfers or the sender doesn‚Äôt choose this option, the transfer will be completed within one banking day. However, due to the opening times of the participating banks, one banking day may stretch to two working days. Please, note that outgoing SEPA transfers are completed within one banking day.
If the transfer is not instant, keep in mind that if a transfer has been made right before a weekend or bank holiday, the time frame will be extended. We send our SEPA payment orders through TARGET2(new tab). It‚Äôs open to process payments every working day from 07:00 to 18:00 CET. The system is closed on the following days:
1 January (New Year's Day), Good Friday, Easter Monday, 1 May (Labour Day), 25 December (Christmas Day), 26 December.
With¬†MoneyBeam, you can transfer money to other N26 customers instantly and you can also receive instant MoneyBeam requests from banks that supports instant transfers. Times vary for¬†foreign currency transfers¬†with TransferWise (but you‚Äôll see an estimated transfer time when you create the transfer).
You'll need to confirm each type of transfer via¬†push message¬†in the app before we send anything out.
Please note: we only accept transfers in EUR via SEPA (that means no SWIFT transfers).
If your incoming transfer is outside of these estimated time frames, please contact the sender (bank) for a payment investigation. We can't investigate incoming transfers. But we've collected a few reasons why your¬†SEPA¬†or¬†foreign currency¬†transfer could have failed.

title: Pourquoi mon virement bancaire est toujours en attente dans mon application N26 ?
content:
Pour proc√©der √† des virements, utiliser les services¬†MoneyBeam,¬†CASH26¬†et effectuer des virements permanents, vous devez les confirmer avec votre Code de validation. Vos virements restent en attente jusqu‚Äô√† ce que vous les confirmiez ou annuliez depuis l‚Äôapplication.
Votre Code de validation est n√©cessaire pour confirmer vos transactions, il n‚Äôa donc pas la m√™me fonction que le code¬†PIN de votre carte(nouvel onglet). Vous choisissez votre Code de validation lors de la cr√©ation de votre compte, et le code PIN de la carte lors de son activation.
Si vous entrez un Code de validation erron√© √† 6 reprises, il sera bloqu√© pour des raisons de s√©curit√©. Vous pouvez le restaurer en le¬†changeant(nouvel onglet)¬†depuis votre application mobile en cliquant sur : üë§Mon compte > Param√®tres > S√©curit√© > Changer le Code de validation.

title: How long does it take to send money with TransferWise?
content:
Once you've initiated your transfer via TransferWise you'll be given an estimated time frame.
If a TransferWise transfer fails, we‚Äôll notify you via push message. The amount will automatically be returned to your account a few days later.
TransferWise doesn‚Äôt charge extra fees for a returned payment and neither do we. However, some participating banks do charge fees, in which case TransferWise will deduct this amount from the money returned under their¬†Conditions of Use(new tab).
Common reasons for a failed transfer:
Error in the transfer details (for example, when entering the recipient‚Äôs name or account information).
Special characters or too many characters in the recipient‚Äôs name or reference field.
Limits have been reached or online payments aren‚Äôt active in card settings.
Foreign currency transfers aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business or N26 Business You or if the recipient is a business account.

title: Comment rembourser mon cr√©dit avant la date pr√©vue ?
content:
Vous pouvez tout √† fait rembourser votre¬†cr√©dit¬†par anticipation, c‚Äôest √† dire avant la date initialement pr√©vue.
Nous vous rappelons que 1 % de frais s‚Äôapplique √† tout remboursement anticip√©. En revanche, si la p√©riode de remboursement restante est de moins de 12 mois, les frais de remboursement anticip√© seront de 0,5 %.
Pour demander un remboursement par anticipation, contactez-nous par Livechat et nous vous communiquerons le calcul pr√©cis de votre paiement anticipant incluant les frais mentionn√©s ci-dessus.
*Les informations ci-dessus sont uniquement valables pour les cr√©dits fournis par N26. Si votre cr√©dit est fourni par l‚Äôun de nos partenaires, veuillez les contacter directement : Auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) en Allemagne et Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99) en France.

title: Why is my transfer still pending in the N26 app?
content:
You‚Äôll need your Confirmation PIN to finalize all transfers whether¬†MoneyBeam, standing orders, or¬†CASH26. Your transfer will remain pending until you either¬†Confirm¬†or¬†Cancel¬†it via push message in the app.
Your Confirmation PIN differs from your¬†card PIN¬†but you can use the same number for both. You‚Äôll be asked to choose your Confirmation PIN after¬†connecting your smartphone¬†(whereas you select a card PIN after activating your card).
If you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, your PIN will be blocked for security reasons. You can restore your PIN by¬†changing it¬†in the app: go to¬†üë§ My Account¬†then tap¬†Settings¬†and¬†Security. Then tap¬†Change Confirmation PIN¬†(iPhone) or¬†Reset Confirmation PIN¬†(Android).

title: How to change my confirmation PIN?
content:
You can change your¬†Confirmation PIN¬†at any time in the app:
Go to üë§ My Account then: Settings and Security (mobile app) or Security Settings (WebApp(new tab))
Select Change Confirmation PIN
Enter the 10-digit token number on your Mastercard
Create and confirm your new Confirmation PIN
If you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times, you'll need to reset it before trying again.
For security reasons, your PIN can‚Äôt contain parts of your date of birth or your address, repeated numbers (such as 1111, 111, or 11), or sequences (such as 1234 or 4321). If the PIN you‚Äôve chosen is not accepted, please try again using a different one.
Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial(new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube(new tab) channel.

title: Perch√© N26 fa controlli sulle transazioni?
content:
N26 ha la responsabilit√† di effettuare controlli su conti e transazioni per garantire la sicurezza del tuo conto corrente (vedi¬†GwG ¬ß 10(nuova tabella)). Questi controlli vengono avviati automaticamente dal nostro sistema.
In seguito a questi controlli, potremmo chiederti di fornire alcuni documenti. In tal caso, sar√† sufficiente inviare quanto richiesto tramite Messaggi da N26. 
Non ci sono eccezioni o modi per evitare questi controlli. Si tratta di una procedura bancaria di routine ed √® finalizzata a garantire la sicurezza dei nostri clienti. Procedura ed esiti di questi controlli sono confidenziali e gestiti internamente. 
Qui di seguito troverai alcuni suggerimenti per velocizzare la procedura:
Nell'email che riceverai da N26 verr√† specificato quale documento occorre inviare. Accettiamo screenshot, fotografie o scansioni di documenti. Assicurati che il contenuto originale del documento sia leggibile e di allegare una descrizione dettagliata di quanto richiesto 
Sii preciso nelle tue risposte, nei dettagli e nei documenti. Se quanto inviato non dovesse rispondere ai nostri requisiti, potremmo richiedere ulteriori chiarimenti. In tal caso, la procedura avr√† una durata maggiore. 
Invia quanto richiesto in risposta alla nostra email il prima possibile o, comunque, entro la scadenza indicata. 
Il nostro servizio clienti non ha alcuna informazione aggiuntiva su questo argomento.
Fornisci documentazione in corso di validit√†.
Ecco alcuni esempi:
Hai ricevuto aiuto finanziario dalla tua famiglia per completare progetti o hai ereditato terreno o denaro da un familiare deceduto: puoi fornire un documento ufficiale che attesti un prestito, un finanziamento, un'eredit√† (es. documento di vendita di propriet√† per finanziare il prestito oppure l'estratto conto di un garante).
Hai venduto una propriet√† o le tue azioni in borsa: puoi fornire la documentazione attestante il trasferimento della propriet√† oppure la vendita delle azioni.
Hai inviato o ricevuto denaro per pagare utenze o comprare un prodotto: puoi fornire un estratto conto che attesti la provenienza del denaro oppure altra documentazione che attesti l'uso del denaro e la finalit√†.
Hai ricevuto un pagamento dal tuo precedente datore di lavoro: puoi fornire un documento che attesti la natura del pagamento e ulteriori prove sul rapporto terminato.

title: Why hasn't my referral bonus arrived?
content:
Once your friend has completed all the eligibility criteria of our¬†Refer a Friend Program, we'll verify your reward. You can always sign in to your account in the app or¬†WebApp(new tab)¬†to check your reward status.
In most cases the referral bonus isn‚Äôt rewarded because the invited friend hasn‚Äôt made a first Mastercard transaction of 15 EUR. Please make sure to inform your friend of these requirements.
Keep in mind that the reward process could take up to 60 days.
N26 retains the right to withhold a reward in case of suspicious activity that violates the¬†Terms and Conditions(new tab).
Currently, Friend referral rewards are only available for customers in Germany, Austria, Italy, France, Spain, Belgium, Luxembourg, Greece, Portugal, Ireland, the Netherlands, Finland, Estonia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden, Switzerland, Norway, Denmark, Poland, Iceland and Liechtenstein.

title: How do I activate my debit card?
content:
Please keep in mind that:
You need to physically have your debit card in order to activate it. You‚Äôll need your 10-digit token number for this: it‚Äôs found below your name on the front of your debit card. We‚Äôll ask you for this number every time you contact us to prove it‚Äôs really you.
If you have multiple debit cards (for example, you ordered your card more than once or your delivery was delayed), you can only activate your most recent debit card. All other debit cards will be disabled. This is because you can only have one card per account.
You‚Äôll need to follow the activation steps below every time you activate a new or replacement debit card.
Activate your debit card through the mobile app:
Log into your account.  
Then go to:  "Actions"‚Üí"Card Settings"‚Üí"Activate".
You will need to enter your token number (below your name). 
Activate your card through the web app:
Log into your account.  The option to activate the debit card will be seen as a banner on the home page.  
You will need to enter your token number (below your name).
After you‚Äôve activated your debit card, the next step is choosing a card PIN.
The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: How to dispute a transaction?
content:
We understand that disputed charges (also called ‚Äòchargebacks‚Äô) can cost you time and money.
We can only dispute card transactions that are visible in your monthly balance statement and haven‚Äôt been made more than 120 days ago. Please complete the dispute form (EU(new tab)¬†or¬†UK(new tab)) and send it to us. Also, make sure that you:
Complete a separate form for each card payment and sign it
Select only one dispute reason
Attach all¬†additional documents(new tab)

title: Cosa sono gli Spazi Condivisi?
content:
Gli Spazi Condivisi rappresentano un modo nuovo e facile per utenti N26 di condividere denaro. Questi Spazi possono essere utili per suddividere il costo delle utenze, per pianificare una vacanza oppure per organizzare l‚Äôacquisto di un regalo di compleanno per un amico o parente.
Spazi Condivisi √® un‚Äôopzione disponibile per gli utenti N26 premium (Business You, You e Metal), i quali possono creare uno Spazio e invitare altri utenti a prenderne parte.
Tutti gli utenti N26 possono essere invitati a partecipare ad uno Spazio.
Il proprietario dello Spazio diventa proprietario del denaro depositato.
Il proprietario dello Spazio pu√≤ invitare fino a 10 partecipanti oppure decidere di rimuoverli.
Gli Spazi Condivisi non hanno un codice IBAN o una carta associata.

title: Why was I charged more than expected?
content:
All debit card transactions take place in real-time. We'll alert you via push notification when any incoming or outgoing transaction happens .
Sometimes a transaction can look suspicious because the final debited amount can differ from the original transaction amount. This can be because:
A merchant blocks a higher amount for a deposit (for example, at a gas station, or a car rental or hotel booking), and the difference is credited to your account once the deposit is no longer required.
Changes in exchange rates may result in slight differences in the total for transactions made in foreign currencies.
If the transaction was not authorized by you, we're happy to help.  Either call us at 1-888-N26-0-N26 (1-888-626-0626) or chat with us and we‚Äôll be happy to help you.

The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Wie bestelle ich eine neue Karte?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏èDie Lieferung der Karte dauert normalerweise bis zu 10 Werktage. Bei einigen Regionen in bestimmten L√§ndern (Estland, Griechenland, Italien, Niederlande, Portugal, Slovenien, Spanien) kann die Lieferung etwas l√§nger dauern.
Wenn es sich um deine erste Karte handelt und es l√§nger als 10 Tage her ist, dass du deine Verifizierung abgeschlossen hast, kontaktiere uns bitte in unserem Live Chat.
Wenn du andere Gr√ºnde f√ºr eine neue Karte hast, bestelle sie bitte in der N26 App.
√úberpr√ºfe zun√§chst deine Lieferanschrift und aktualisiere diese wenn n√∂tig. Das kannst du in der App tun, unter: üë§Mein Konto > Einstellungen > Pers√∂nliche Einstellungen > Lieferanschrift.
Um anschlie√üend deine neue Karte zu bestellen, gehe zu: üë§Mein Konto > Karteneinstellungen.
Streiche in der √úbersicht zu derjenigen Karte, die du neu bestellen willst, und w√§hle Neu aus.
Bitte beachte: Bei N26 Standard und N26 You kostet eine neue Karte 6 ‚Ç¨ inklusive Standardversand oder 25 ‚Ç¨, wenn du dich f√ºr die Expresslieferung entscheidest. Eine neue N26 Metal Karte betr√§gt 45 ‚Ç¨ inklusive Standardversand, die Expresslieferung steht f√ºr Metal Karten nicht zur Verf√ºgung.
Sobald du eine neue Karte bestellt hast, kannst du eine digitale Version der Karte aktivieren, w√§hrend die physische Version der Karte noch zu dir unterwegs ist. Wenn du diese Funktion nutzen m√∂chtest, f√ºge die digitale Version deiner Karte dem digitalen Wallet deiner Wahl hinzu. Die Funktion ist nur f√ºr 14 Tage nach Bestellung der Karte verf√ºgbar. Innerhalb dieses Zeitraums kannst du die physische Version deiner Karte in deiner N26 App aktivieren. Sobald die physische Karte aktiviert ist, funktioniert dein digitales Wallet wieder wie gewohnt.
Bitte beachte, dass diese Funktion nicht f√ºr Nutzer zur Verf√ºgung steht, die sich f√ºr ein anderes Konto entscheiden oder eine neue Karte bestellen, ohne ihr bisherige Karte gesperrt zu haben. In diesen F√§llen kannst du deine bisherige Karte weiterhin mit Apple/ Google Pay nutzen, bis du die neue Karte aktiviert hast.

title: How to order my Maestro card?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Only applies to Germany, Austria and the Netherlands
You can order your first¬†Maestro(new tab) card free of charge directly in the app by tapping¬†üë§ My Account¬†then¬†Cards settings. Swipe left on your card until you see the Maestro card and tap¬†Order.
You'll only see the option if you live in Germany, Austria or the Netherlands and have received a transfer of at least 100 ‚Ç¨ from one of these 3 countries. 
Once ordered your card should arrive within 10 working days. For more information about the delivery timeline please go to our dedicated article.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: How to create a password?
content:
If you forgot your password or want to change it, select¬†Forgot?¬†in the app or¬†Forgot your password?(new tab)¬†in the¬†WebApp(new tab)¬†during login. We‚Äôll send a link to your registered email address so you can create a new password. Make sure your new password meets our requirements:
We do not have a specific set of requirements for our passwords. We measure their strength on the fly and only accept passwords that are considered robust by our underlying algorithm.
We tend to recommend to go with a ‚Äúpassphrase‚Äù rather than a password, and thus go by the common phrase ‚Äúhard to guess, easy to remember‚Äù. 
If your password is not accepted by our system, try to add more special characters, numbers, and vary between upper- and lowercase letters.
If you enter your password incorrectly six times in a row, you‚Äôll be temporarily blocked from your account. If this happens, try logging in again after 30 minutes.
Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

title: Why was I charged a direct debit fee?
content:
Direct debits returned to your account due to¬†insufficient funds* are charged a ‚Ç¨3 fee in accordance with our¬†Terms & Conditions(new tab). If your balance becomes negative due to this fee,¬†overdraft¬†interest will also apply at a rate of 8.9%.
You can avoid these fees by making sure you have enough funds in your account to cover incoming direct debits by 18:00 on the same business day.
Since¬†SEPA transfers¬†could take more than one day to complete, we suggest you use¬†MoneyBeam (between N26 accounts) or¬†CASH26¬†(if you live in Germany, Austria or Italy) to transfer the amount due. With both methods, the amount will be credited to your account instantly.
And if you don‚Äôt recognize a direct debit, you can¬†reverse it¬†in the app.
*For Poland, Sweden, Denmark, and Norway: if you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and ultimate amount that is collected from us.

title: Comment N26 g√®re mes informations fiscales ?
content:
Afin de pr√©server l'int√©grit√© des syst√®mes fiscaux, divers pays ont adopt√© une d√©claration commune sur les informations relatives aux imp√¥ts. Les √©tats membres de l'OCDE ont ratifi√© le¬†Common Standard Reporting(nouvel onglet)¬†(CRS), fournissant aux pays participants un cadre pour le partage d'informations en mati√®re fiscale.
N26 peut vous demander de soumettre votre num√©ro d'identification fiscale ou votre num√©ro d‚Äôassurance sur la base des crit√®res suivants, qui sont consid√©r√©s comme une indication que vous puissiez √™tre responsable fiscalement dans un pays participant au CRS :
Vous vivez dans un pays qui participe au CRS
Vous avez une bo√Æte postale ou adresse dans un pays qui participe au CRS
Le num√©ro de t√©l√©phone que vous avez enregistr√© sur votre compte N26 est originaire d'un pays o√π le CRS est en vigueur
Vous avez un virement automatique ou des virements r√©currents √† un compte qui est bas√© dans un pays en accord avec le CRS
De m√™me, N26 Bank est enregistr√©e aupr√®s du U.S.¬†Internal Revenue Service(nouvel onglet)¬†(IRS) et est donc l√©galement oblig√© de passer en revue les d√©tails personnels de nos clients en ce qui concerne l'obligation fiscale aux √âtats-Unis(nouvel onglet), et de les d√©clarer dans le cadre de la FATCA. N26 peut demander des documents suppl√©mentaires, tels que votre num√©ro de s√©curit√© sociale complet (SSN), afin d'√©valuer votre situation fiscale aux √âtats-Unis. Certains indicateurs selon lesquels vous pourriez √™tre imposable aux √âtats-Unis :
Vous √™tes un citoyen des √âtats-Unis (ou vous avez la double nationalit√©)
Le num√©ro de t√©l√©phone enregistr√© sur votre compte N26 est un num√©ro am√©ricain
Vous √™tes n√© aux √âtats-Unis (ou dans une ambassade am√©ricaine)
Vous avez fourni une adresse am√©ricaine
Vous avez mis en place des virements permanents vers les √âtats-Unis
Votre num√©ro d'identification fiscale pourra vous √™tre demand√© par N26 sur la base des crit√®res suivants, lesquels sont consid√©r√©s comme indiquant une potentielle responsabilit√© fiscale dans un pays participant au CRS :
Ouvrez üë§ Mon compte puis choisissez Param√®tres et Param√®tres personnels
Appuyez sur Informations fiscales
S√©lectionnez le pays dans lequel vous √™tes imposable.
Entrez votre num√©ro fiscal ou votre Social Security Number dans l'√©cran suivant.
Informations importantes
En Allemagne, nous avons besoin de votre Steueridentifikationsnummer (11 caract√®res) et non de votre steuernummer (9 caract√®res).
Dans tous les cas, vos informations personnelles seront stock√©es de fa√ßon s√©curis√©e et trait√©es uniquement en accord avec les besoins du CRS et FATCA.
Merci de noter que nous ne sommes pas autoris√©s √† vous conseiller sur votre statut d'imposition. Si vous n'√™tes pas s√ªr de votre statut fiscal, veuillez consulter un conseiller fiscal.
Si vous avez d√©j√† renseign√© votre pays de r√©sidence fiscale mais pas votre identifiant fiscal, il vous suffit de supprimer le pays actuellement renseign√© dans l'application et de l'ajouter √† nouveau. Vous pourrez alors renseigner votre identifiant fiscal.

title: ¬øPor qu√© no tengo disponibles todos los productos y servicios?
content:
Colaboramos con diferentes socios, lo que hace que algunos productos o servicios requieran que cumplas tambi√©n sus requisitos. Las razones m√°s comunes por las cuales no puedes utilizar ciertos productos son:
Documento de identidad caducado o no admitido (por ejemplo, algunos pasaportes por falta de elementos de seguridad).
Est√°s sujeto a impuestos en EE. UU. Si es as√≠, no podr√°s utilizar ciertos producto de inversi√≥n o ahorro. Si no es tu caso, ponte en contacto con Atenci√≥n al Cliente mediante el chat para que podamos echar un vistazo a tu cuenta. Es posible que tengas que cambiar tu n√∫mero de tel√©fono si este tiene un prefijo de Norteam√©rica (+1).
Verificaste tu identidad a trav√©s de PostIdent (en Alemania). Tendremos que reiniciar tu cuenta y tendr√°s que verificar tu identidad de nuevo para poder utilizar ciertos productos y servicios. Si este es tu caso, te mandaremos un email con la informaci√≥n y buscaremos un momento conveniente para que lo hagas.
El producto o servicio no est√° disponible en tu pa√≠s.

title: Shared Spaces - What is a power of attorney?
content:
The legal model behind Shared Spaces is called Power of Attorney (Kontovollmacht in German).¬†
Participants of a Shared Space do not have equal ownership of the account like a joint account in the traditional banking sense. After receiving Power of Attorney the participants obtain the right to act on behalf of the Owner regarding any transfer of funds within the Shared Space.
The person authorizing the other to act on his behalf is called the ‚ÄúOwner‚Äù, this person is the only account holder. The owner must be a N26 premium account holder e.g. N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business You.
This means that whoever created the Shared Space is its legal owner. The owner of a Shared Space:¬†
Owns all the funds within a Shared Space.¬†
Can transfer funds freely in and out of the account anytime.¬†
Can invite people to the Shared Space by granting others Power of Attorney.
Can revoke the Power of Attorney of a participant at any time.
Can also close a Shared Space after removing a participant. (all funds in the Shared Space will be transferred to the Owner‚Äôs Main Account)
By granting a person Power of Attorney, they‚Äôll have full access to all the money held within a Shared Space. This means that each participant can also transfer funds freely in and out of the Shared Space.¬†

N26 Bank GmbH cannot be held liable for payments covered by the Power of Attorney.
What are Shared Spaces?
How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?

title: ¬øPor qu√© no he recibido el c√≥digo de sincronizaci√≥n por SMS?
content:
Para vincular tu smartphone con tu cuenta se requiere un c√≥digo de sincronizaci√≥n. Si no has recibido el SMS con el c√≥digo de sincronizaci√≥n por alguna raz√≥n, puedes volver a solicitarlo desde la app hasta 5 veces (espera al menos 30 segundos entre una y otra).
Si ya lo has solicitado las 5 veces y sigues sin recibirlo, la app no te dejar√° solicitar otro en 24 horas por motivos de seguridad. Si eso pasa, puedes elegir entre esperar las 24 horas o contactar con nuestro servicio de Atenci√≥n al Cliente por chat para que te ayudemos.
Si tu prefijo internacional pertenece a un pa√≠s de fuera de la UE, es probable que necesites contactarnos para recibirlo.

title: Why didn't an ATM give me cash?
content:
It happens: you go to an ATM, the requested amount is deducted from your balance, but the machine doesn‚Äôt give you cash. 
First, check your card limits by going to üë§ My Account and selecting Card settings. Make sure ATM withdrawals are active. 
While we can‚Äôt say for sure why it happened, we can definitely help get your money back. The amount that was deducted from your balance is only an authorization (a reservation or blocked amount). Because the transaction wasn‚Äôt successful, this reserved amount will expire either in a few hours or a maximum of 12 working days and return to your balance. 
If the reserved amount doesn‚Äôt expire after 12 working days, please complete a dispute form. We‚Äôll do our best to get the money back for you. 
In the meantime, we suggest you try another ATM from a different operator. This rarely happens twice in a row.

title: How to protect my identity?
content:
To protect and help avoid the misuse of your personal data, please keep in mind that:
We will never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. This includes verifications for apartment rental contracts, lines of credit, or job offers (including jobs with N26). Only complete the verification process if you want to open an N26 bank account for yourself.
As the account owner, only you should create and have access to your login details. Never create an N26 bank account with a predefined email address and password. If you use login credentials that were given to you, these credentials may be used to reach your personal and legal information. Also, never log into an N26 account that is not yours.
Do not send your ID or passport to unknown or unverified recipients.
We may ask for certain documents when your transaction is subject to a routine check. Only send valid documentation to verified N26 email accounts.
We will never ask for your username, password, or PIN codes outside the N26 app. Never provide this information in an external website or app, even if it looks N26-related.
If you ever feel in doubt, have received a suspicious request from a third party, or think your N26 login may be compromised, please do not hesitate to contact us.

title: COVID-19: Latest updates on our customer service availability
content:
In light of recent global developments due to COVID-19, we are constantly taking measures to ensure the safety of our staff, while continuing to deliver the best possible customer service experience for you.
Our mission to support you and deliver our banking and customer services as per usual remain unchanged. That said, we want to be able to update you should the situation evolve.
We are reachable at our normal opening hours, from 07:00 - 23:00 hrs daily, including Sundays and public holidays.
If you need to block your card in an emergency, you will be able to do so in your N26 app, or by calling our automated emergency hotline at +44 2035 107126.
Any further updates to availability and waiting times will be published on this page.

title: Comment alimenter mon compte ?
content:
Vous pouvez alimenter votre compte N26 de cinq mani√®res, d√®s que la v√©rification de votre identit√© est valid√©e: avec CASH26 (uniquement en Allemagne, Autriche et en Italie), par virement SEPA (dans tous les pays o√π N26 est disponible), en demandant de l'argent √† un ami par le biais de Moneybeam, avec une carte de d√©bit mais aussi gr√¢ce √† Apple Pay ou Google Pay(nouvel onglet). 
Si vous n‚Äôavez pas encore effectu√© de transactions, vous pouvez alimenter votre compte avec une carte de d√©bit d‚Äôun autre compte en renseignant ses coordonn√©es depuis l‚Äôapplication N26. Vous pouvez choisir de d√©poser entre 20 ‚Ç¨ et 150 ‚Ç¨. Cette option est uniquement disponible quand vous alimentez votre compte pour la premi√®re fois. Les cartes de cr√©dit et les cartes pr√©pay√©es ne sont pas accept√©es, tout comme les cartes de cr√©dit American Express.
Pour alimenter votre compte N26 par virement bancaire (depuis un compte en euros et domicili√© au sein de l‚Äôespace SEPA uniquement) vous devrez simplement fournir votre num√©ro IBAN ainsi que votre nom complet (exactement comme il est mentionn√© sur la pi√®ce d'identit√© utilis√©e pour ouvrir votre compte).
Vous pouvez alimenter votre compte en utilisant Apple Pay (pour les smartphones dot√©s d‚ÄôiOS) ou GPay (pour les smartphones dot√©s d‚ÄôiAndroid). Vous pouvez choisir de d√©poser entre 20 ‚Ç¨ et 150 ‚Ç¨. Les cartes de cr√©dit et les cartes pr√©pay√©es ne sont pas accept√©es, tout comme les cartes de cr√©dit American Express.
√Ä noter :
Assurez-vous que l‚Äô√©metteur du virement inscrive correctement vos nom(s) et pr√©nom(s) en tant que destinataire du virement. Votre nom et votre pr√©nom doivent correspondre au nom indiqu√© sur le document d‚Äôidentit√© que vous avez fourni lors de la v√©rification de votre identit√© (nous rappelons que si vous avez un compte¬†N26 Business, nous n'acceptons pas de nom de soci√©t√©).
En France, le premier virement effectu√© pour alimenter votre compte doit provenir d‚Äôun autre compte bancaire √† votre nom. Pour les autres pays, vous pouvez recevoir votre premier virement depuis n‚Äôimporte quel compte en banque (m√™me si celui-ci n‚Äôest pas √† votre nom).
Vous souhaitez parler de nous √† vos amis ? Recevez 15 ‚Ç¨ √† chaque fois que l‚Äôun d‚Äôentre eux nous rejoint. D√©couvrez programme de parrainage.

title: Was kann ich tun, wenn meine IBAN nicht akzeptiert wird?
content:
Deine IBAN enth√§lt die DE-L√§nderkennzahl, eine zweistellige Pr√ºfnummer, die achtstellige Bankleitzahl und deine zehnstellige Kontonummer.  Zum Beispiel:¬†DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.
Die teilnehmenden L√§nder des SEPA-Raums (Single Euro Payments Area) haben sich auf das IBAN-System geeinigt, um nationale und internationale Zahlungen zu vereinfachen und das Fehlerrisiko bei der Kommunikation und Abwicklung von Transaktionen zu reduzieren.
H√§ndler oder Arbeitgeber, die IBANs aus anderen Mitgliedstaaten des Europ√§ischen Wirtschaftsraums nicht akzeptieren, versto√üen ab 1. Februar 2016 gegen europ√§isches Recht (Artikel 9 der¬†Verordnung Nr. 260/2012(neuen Tab)).
Wenn du jemals von einer IBAN-Diskriminierung betroffen bist, wende dich bitte direkt an deine¬†zust√§ndige nationale Beh√∂rde(neuen Tab)¬†und informiere diese √ºber den Vorfall. Gib deine Kontaktdaten sowie den Namen des H√§ndlers oder Unternehmens an, der deine IBAN nicht akzeptiert hat, und lege eine kurze Beschreibung des Vorfalls bei (einschlie√ülich eines Screenshot der Ablehnung oder einen anderen Kommunikationsbeleg).

title: Account & Personal Details
content: The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Wie lade ich meine pers√∂nlichen Daten herunter?
content:
Die Datenschutzgrundverordnung (DSGVO) ist eine europ√§ische Verordnung zum Schutz personenbezogener Daten, die am 25. Mai 2018 in Kraft getreten ist. Wir haben daraufhin eine Funktion zum Datenexport in der WebApp(neuen Tab) hinzugef√ºgt, um dein Recht auf Daten√ºbertragbarkeit gem√§√ü Art. 20 DSGVO zu gew√§hrleisten. Die Beschaffung der von dir bereitgestellten pers√∂nlichen Daten ist transparent und einfach und somit besitzt du die vollst√§ndige Kontrolle: Gehe zu üë§ Mein Konto und Pers√∂nliche Einstellungen und klicke auf Deine pers√∂nlichen Daten.
Das Recht auf Daten√ºbertragbarkeit gem√§√ü Art. 20 DSGVO umfasst personenbezogene Daten, die du uns bereitgestellt hast. Art. 20 DSGVO soll dir erm√∂glichen, ohne gro√üen Aufwand den Dienstleister zu wechseln f√ºr den Fall, dass du die von dir bereitgestellten Daten nutzen m√∂chtest, um ein Konto bei einer anderen Bank zu er√∂ffnen. Aus diesem Grund verpflichtet uns Art. 20 DSGVO dazu, dir diese Daten in einem maschinenlesbaren Format bereitzustellen. Dabei ist zu beachten, dass die Datei lediglich f√ºr Zwecke der Daten√ºbertragbarkeit zu nutzen ist und dein Computer die JSON Datei m√∂glicherweise nicht lesen kann. Falls du die JSON Datei √∂ffnen kannst, k√∂nnen ihre Inhalte dennoch schwierig zu verstehen sein, da die Datei f√ºr Maschinenlesbarkeit konzipiert ist und nicht f√ºr die unmittelbare Verarbeitung durch Menschen. Die Datei, die wir ausstellen, ist lediglich zur √úbertragung an andere Banken bestimmt.
Als mobile Bank sind wir uns der Wichtigkeit der Sicherheit deiner Daten bewusst. Daher haben wir zus√§tzliche Sicherheitsma√ünahmen installiert bevor du deine Daten herunterladen kannst. Diese Ma√ünahmen sind im folgenden Absatz beschrieben. Wir tun dies, um sicherzustellen, dass du, der Kontoinhaber, auch derjenige bist, der die Daten herunterl√§dt.¬†
Du kannst die von dir bereitgestellten personenbezogenen Daten, die du f√ºr ein laufendes oder vorheriges Konto angegeben hast, bis zu 6 Monate nach Kontoschlie√üung beantragen herunterzuladen. Du erh√§ltst das Dokument in einem maschinenlesbaren Format, sodass du es mit einem Dritten teilen kannst.
Bitte frage deine Daten √ºber unser Webformular(neuen Tab) an.
Du wirst aufgefordert, ein tempor√§res Passwort f√ºr den Link zu erstellen, den wir an deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse senden. Dieser Link ist nur f√ºr 24 Stunden g√ºltig, ab dem Zeitpunkt, an dem du die E-Mail erhalten hast. Wenn du das Passwort 5 Mal falsch eingibst, wird der Link ung√ºltig und du musst eine neue Exportanfrage stellen.
Du kannst von dir bereitgestellte personenbezogene Daten bis zu 6 Monate nach Kontoschlie√üung herunterladen. F√ºlle einfach das Datenanforderungsformular(neuen Tab) aus und vergewissere dich, dass deine angegebenen Informationen mit deinen vorherigen Kontoinformationen exakt √ºbereinstimmen. Welche pers√∂nlichen Informationen du ben√∂tigst:
Vor- und Nachname, Lichtbildausweis (Identifikationsnummer und Ablaufdatum des Dokuments mit dem du dein Konto best√§tigt hast (Personalausweis oder Reisepass)
Die registrierte E-Mail-Adresse des Kontos
Datum (Monat und Jahr) an dem du dein Konto erstellt und abgeschlossen hast (sieh in deiner Best√§tigungsemail nach).
Aus Sicherheitsgr√ºnden sind wir verpflichtet sicherzustellen, dass die Daten heruntergeladen wurden: Wenn du ein Feld leer l√§sst oder falsch ausgef√ºllt hast, kann deine Anfrage nicht abgeschlossen werden.
Du wirst aufgefordert, ein tempor√§res Passwort f√ºr den Link zu erstellen, den wir an deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse senden. Dieser Link ist aber nur f√ºr 24 Stunden g√ºltig. Wenn du das Passwort 5 Mal falsch eingibst, wird der Link ung√ºltig und du musst eine neue Exportanfrage stellen.
F√ºr weitere Informationen √ºber die Erfassung, Verwendung oder Verarbeitung deiner pers√∂nlichen Daten, schau dir bitte unsere Datenschutzerkl√§rung (neuen Tab)an.

title: How to use Moneybeam?
content:
MoneyBeam allows you to send money to your smartphone‚Äôs contacts without knowing their bank account details. In order to send a MoneyBeam, log into the app:
From the Home screen choose the Actions tab,

Tap Send Money followed by the MoneyBeam option,

Either select a contact from your phone‚Äôs contact list or add a recipient manually, using their phone number or email address. For this to work, the recipient has to be visible as an N26 customer,

Enter the amount and a reference text,

Confirm with your Confirmation PIN and the push message you receive.
N26 customers will receive the transfer instantly. You can send up to ‚Ç¨1.000 to other N26 customers within a 24-hour period.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: Am I liable to tax in the United States?
content:
As a licensed bank we're required to report directly to the IRS information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers according to FATCA, a legislation designed by the US Department of Treasury and the U.S. Internal Revenue Service to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets.
You can find more information about FATCA here(new tab).¬†
In the context of FATCA, a U.S. Person is defined as, among other things:
A citizen of the United States (including dual citizens)
A resident in the United States, for example as a holder of a valid U.S. Green Card or as a person who passes the ‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù (see below).
If you're unsure as to how to determine whether you're a U.S. Person, please consult a tax advisor.
‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù means:
That you've been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more in the current calendar year
OR
That you have been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more over the last three calendar years, to be calculated as follows: 


(31 days or more in the current calendar year) + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. last year) divided by 3 + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. the year before last) divided by 6.
¬†In addition, if your account shows any of the following:
U.S. citizenship or U.S. residence
U.S. place of birth
U.S. mailing or residence address, including U.S. PO boxes
U.S. telephone number
Standing instructions to a U.S. address or an account maintained in the US
we're still obliged to treat you as a U.S. Person, unless we receive the following from you:¬†
A W-8BEN or similar agreed self-certification form and
A non-U.S. passport or other government-issued identification evidencing your citizenship or nationality in a country other than the U.S.
In case you were born in the US, a copy of your Certificate of Loss of Nationality of the US.

title: How to log in with Two Factor Authentication?
content:
Two-Factor Authentication is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. You‚Äôre probably familiar with using only¬† your personal password to sign in to your account, but with Two-Factor Authentication you‚Äôll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.
Go here for more information on Two-Factor Authentication
When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you‚Äôll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or, if this isn't possible, you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number, confirming your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log in to your N26 account.
When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. This means the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.
First, you‚Äôll need to update your phone‚Äôs operating system and the N26 app to their latest versions. If you‚Äôre unable to login to your account, but still have access to your registered email address, try to reset your password. If you don‚Äôt have access to your registered email address, please contact us via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out.
Read more in our article on how to create a password.
If you‚Äôve lost access to your paired device, but you still have access to your registered phone number, you‚Äôll be able to log into your N26 account and request an authentication code. To do this:
Login to the Webapp
When prompted to confirm your login on your paired device, select Help
Choose Send SMS Code
Once you receive the SMS code, input it into the Webapp
As you've just confirmed the authentication code you‚Äôve successfully completed two-factor authentication, and can now pair your new device with your account.
If you don‚Äôt have access to your registered phone number ‚Äì either because you have a new phone number, or your phone was lost or stolen ‚Äì please contact our customer service via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out.
If you have an older smartphone that doesn‚Äôt support the latest app version, you won‚Äôt be able to access N26 via the mobile app anymore using that phone. 
However, you can still use our Webapp to view your account, to do this you'll need to confirm your login attempt via an SMS verification code which we‚Äôll send to your account's registered phone number.
You‚Äôll still be able to complete card transactions and cash withdrawals as normal using your Mastercard, but bear in mind that you won't be able to perform any bank transfers or payments until you can confirm the transfer within the N26 app.
Read more in our article on Strong Customer Authentification.

title: Wie funktioniert 3D Secure?
content:
3D Secure sch√ºtzt dich vor Online-Kartenbetrug. Die Funktion wird automatisch aktiviert, wenn du deine Karte in der App aktivierst. Du brauchst keine zus√§tzlichen Passw√∂rter.
Wenn du eine¬†Online-Zahlung¬†mit deiner Mastercard vornimmst, best√§tigt 3D Secure die Transaktion innerhalb von 5 Minuten durch eine Push-Nachricht. Wenn du die Transaktion nicht siehst, versuche es mit unseren¬†Tipps zur Fehlerbehebung.
Wenn du einen Kauf √ºber dein Smartphone t√§tigst, siehst du die ausstehende Transaktion in der App. Tippe auf das Glockensymbol, dann wird eine Push-Meldung angezeigt, mit der du deinen Kauf best√§tigen und abschlie√üen kannst. Danach gehst du zur√ºck zur Website des H√§ndlers. Du solltest innerhalb weniger Augenblicke eine Best√§tigung f√ºr deinen erfolgreichen Einkauf sehen.
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erhalte 15‚Ç¨ f√ºr jeden Freund, dem du N26 erfolgreich empfiehlst. Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: When will my card arrive?
content:
The estimated delivery timeline for card deliveries is 10 working days. Deliveries may take longer in some specific areas in the following countries: Estonia, Greece, Italy, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia and Spain. 
Please consider this before taking any action regarding a card re-order:
If the delivery fails and your card is returned to us, we‚Äôll let you know via email.
If it's been less than 10 working days since you ordered your card, we encourage you to wait before reaching out to us. 
If you've waited longer than the expected timeline, please check and if necessary update your shipping address, you can do this within the N26 app: üë§ My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Shipping Address.
If your shipping address was incorrect and this is your first N26 card, please¬†contact us via live chat(new tab) and we‚Äôll help you order a new one.
If your shipping address was incorrect and you‚Äôve had an active card before, you'll need to reorder the card via the App.
If your shipping address was correct, there might have been an issue with your card's delivery. Please contact us via live chat and we‚Äôll help you order a new one.
If your card fails to arrive or you need your card quickly, you may consider ordering it via¬†express delivery (with an additional fee) which takes up to 3 working days. Please note that express delivery is not available for Metal cards.
Your first card is immediately produced and mailed out once you‚Äôre done¬†proving your identity. If you opened a Metal account, please to top up your account after completing the sign up with at least the amount of the monthly Metal fee in order to receive the card.
Tips for a successful delivery:
If your address contains special characters, please contact us via the live chat.
We only send cards to residential addresses (businesses are not accepted).
Don‚Äôt enter any spaces when entering the postal code for your delivery address.
Ensure that important delivery information isn‚Äôt missing (for example, the name on your mailbox if you live in Germany or your building number, stairwell number, and door code if applicable). If you‚Äôre staying somewhere temporarily (with a friend or in an Airbnb), make sure to include the name on the mailbox that belongs to the main tenant of the apartment.
If you‚Äôre moving somewhere and this is your first card, make sure to select the country and address where you‚Äôll move to and wish to receive your N26 card.

title: Why are some products and services unavailable to me?
content:
We collaborate with many partners. That‚Äôs why certain products and services require that you meet their requirements as well. The most common reasons why you wouldn‚Äôt be eligible for certain products:
Expired or unsupported identity documents (for example, certain passports due to a lack of security features).
You‚Äôre taxable in the United States. If so, you won‚Äôt be able to use certain invest or savings products. If this is not the case, contact our Customer Support via chat so we can look into your account details. You may need to switch your telephone number if it starts with a North American area code (+1).
You proved your identity using PostIdent (in Germany). We‚Äôll have to reset your account and you‚Äôll have to prove your identity again in order to use certain products and services. If this is the case, we‚Äôll email you about it and find a convenient time for you to do so.
The product or service is not yet available in your country.

title: Shared Spaces - Trusted Beneficiary
content:
A trusted beneficiary of a Shared Space can:
Transfer money from their own Spaces (including other Shared Spaces of which they are a participant) to a Shared Space. 
Access and freely transfer the funds of a Shared Space at any time.
Leave a Shared Space at any time.
Transfers between a trusted beneficiary and a Shared Space do not need to be authenticated via Pin and Push notification. This means that beneficiaries can seamlessly drag-and-drop money via the N26 app and Web app similarity to how normal Space transactions work.

Why do I need to classify an owner or member as a trusted beneficiary?
European banking law regulates how bank transfers must be authorised.¬†
In this law strong customer authentication (SCA) is a requirement to make online payments more secure.¬†
One exception to this is the classification of a person in a Shared Space as a ‚Äútrusted beneficiary‚Äù so that transfers to this person do not require SCA.
What are Shared Spaces?
How to add or remove Shared Space participants?

title: Transfer from External Bank
content:
What is Transfer from an External Bank?
It is the ability to link your N26 account with external bank accounts and transfer money to your N26 account from within your N26 web application.
How long does it take to transfer funds?
If you are transferring money from your external account to your N26 account via the N26 application, the transfer will complete approximately 5 business days from the date you initiated the transaction.¬†


What if my bank is not shown as an option on the website, how do I link
to it?

If your bank is not shown on the list, you can do a manual search for it by simply entering your bank‚Äôs name, e.g. Bank of America, in the search field.


My bank still did not show up even after a manual search.¬† What do
I do next?

If your bank still does not show up even after a manual search, then your bank may not be supported currently.
What are the fees associated with transferring money through this method?
We do not charge a fee for this service.
Do I have to transfer in whole dollars?

No.¬† You can transfer in dollars and cents.
Does the account have to be in my name?

Yes.¬† All the accounts that you link must be owned by you and under the same name as your N26 account.
What accounts can I link?
You can link US checking and savings accounts (business accounts may not be linked) to your main N26 account (you cannot link to Spaces). The accounts must be US accounts owned by you and under the same name as your N26 account. In addition, you must be registered for online banking with the external bank.
How many accounts can I link?
There is no limit to the number of accounts that you can link, as long as the accounts are US checking and savings accounts (business accounts may not be linked) owned by you and under the same name as your N26 account. In addition, you must be registered for online banking with the external bank.
Can I cancel pending transfers?
Unfortunately, you cannot cancel pending transfers.¬† You can cancel a transfer at any time before you confirm the transaction.¬† Once the transfer is confirmed (for which you should receive a confirmation email), you can no longer cancel it.
Can I use this feature to send money to my external account?

No, you may only use this feature to transfer funds into your N26 account, not to transfer funds out of your N26 account.
My external account is owned by me, but I am still unable to link it to my N26 account.
Even though you own the external account, your attempt to link may have failed because the external account needs to be a US bank account and needs to be in your name (i.e. the same name you used to open your N26 account).
Where can I see the status of pending, successful, and failed transfers?¬†
Unfortunately, you will not be able to see pending transfers. It takes approximately 5 business days for a transfer to settle and for the transferred funds to be available in your N26 account. Once the transfer is successful, you will see it in your N26 transaction feed. You will also receive push notifications for successful or unsuccessful transfers.
It appears that my transfer has failed - what does that mean?¬†¬†
This means the funds did not successfully transfer.  You should check your email for the failure reason and reattempt the transfer.¬†
Do I need to link my external account every time I make a transfer?
You do not have to link to your external bank account more than once.¬† You may, however, need to re-enter your external account credentials occasionally due to either a change in those credentials or for security reasons.
How to link your external bank account to your N26 account via the N26 mobile application.
1.¬†¬†¬†¬† Launch your N26 mobile application.
2.¬†¬†¬†¬† Tap the¬†Actions¬†button at the bottom right of your mobile's screen.
3.¬†¬†¬†¬† Tap on¬†Add Money.
4.¬†¬†¬†¬† Tap¬†External bank transfer.
5.¬†¬†¬†¬† Tap¬†Link an account.
6.¬†    A Plaid disclaimer page will be displayed. Tap¬†Continue¬†after reading.
7.¬†¬†¬†¬† A second Plaid disclaimer screen will be displayed.¬† Tap¬†Continue¬†after reading.
8.¬†¬†¬†¬† Tap to select your bank.
9.¬†¬†¬†¬† Enter your Online credentials.
10.¬†¬† Tap¬†Continue.
11.¬†¬† Tap on the account you want to link.
12.¬†¬† Tap¬†Select.
13.¬†¬† Your account is now linked.

How do I transfer money to my N26 account using the N26 mobile application?
To transfer funds to your N26 account using the N26 mobile application, follow these steps:
Launch your N26 mobile application.
Tap the Actions button at the bottom right of your mobile's screen.
Tap on Add Money.
Tap External bank transfer.
Select the account to use to transfer funds from.
Enter the amount you want to transfer.
Tap Continue.
Enter your 4 digit Confirmation PIN.
Tap Confirm Transfer to initiate the transfer.
A message will be displayed in your Transactions List indicating that the transfer is scheduled.


The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Wie sch√ºtzt N26 mein Geld?
content: Die¬†deutsche Einlagensicherung(neuen Tab)¬†versichert alle Einlagen¬†bis zu 100.000 ‚Ç¨¬†in den Mitgliedsstaaten der Europ√§ischen Union. Als Inhaber einer Banklizenz muss die N26 Bank die Vorschriften der Bundesanstalt f√ºr Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht einhalten.

title: Why was I charged twice?
content:
We offer you banking in real-time. This means you‚Äôre able to see the processes going on behind your account that you otherwise wouldn‚Äôt see. There are two main transaction types that take place during an in-store or online purchase:
Authorizations.¬†A block or reserved amount made by a retailer or merchant. This includes anything from your morning cup of coffee to hotel or car rental bookings (including security deposits).
Presentments.¬†The actual amount that is deducted from your account. Again, that cup of coffee is finally cleared from your account or you can get your security deposit back once that hotel room or car is returned safe and sound.
Once an authorization has been confirmed, we can‚Äôt cancel or reverse it. At that point, a few things can happen to¬†your authorization: it turns into a presentment, it's rejected, or it expires¬†(and automatically returns to your account up to 12 days at the latest). Keep in mind:
Sometimes you‚Äôll see both the authorization and the presentment if they become disconnected or due to technical issues at the payment terminal. Eventually the authorization will expire. If it doesn‚Äôt, we can help get your money back.
Verification authorizations (usually very small amounts) are used to check whether your card is active. This money will return to your account.
The amount of an authorization can differ from the final presentment for a variety of reasons.

title: Come creare e modificare ordini permanenti?
content:
Quando effettui un bonifico dalla app di N26 o dalla Webapp, hai la possibilit√† di creare un ordine permanente.
Una volta completato il trasferimento in uscita, ti verr√† chiesto di spuntare una casella che creer√† un ordine permanente. Dopo che avrai inserito l'importo del bonifico ed il suo destinatario, seleziona "Salvare come ordine permanente?" sotto il testo di riferimento. Da qui sarai in grado di impostare anche le date che desideri e scegliere gli intervalli di pagamento.
√à possibile visualizzare i trasferimenti programmati e gli ordini permanenti direttamente nell'app mobile N26:
Per poter visualizzare i tuoi bonifici programmati e bonifici ricorrenti tramite l'app mobile: 
Vai al tuo elenco transazioni (schermata iniziale dell'app).
Quindi clicca sui tre puntini in alto a destra per Android, o appena sopra la tua lista transazioni per iOS.
Apparir√† una nuova finestra, dove potrai selezionare e visionare i tuoi "ordini permanenti".
In questo menu √® possibile annullare e / o modificare i dettagli di tali transazioni. Per cancellare un ordine permanente, trascinalo semplicemente fino all'icona del cestino. 
‚ÑπÔ∏è ¬†Ti preghiamo di ricordare che, in caso un trasferimento periodico fallisca per insufficienza di fondi, non effettueremo nuovamente il bonifico - dovrai effettuare il bonifico manualmente. Tuttavia i successivi trasferimenti programmati procederanno normalmente.

title: Wie funktioniert Google Pay?
content:
Verf√ºgbar in Deutschland, Frankreich, Italien, Spanien, Belgien, D√§nemark, Finnland, Irland, Norwegen, Polen, Slowakei, Schweden, Schweiz.
Mit Google Pay kannst du mit deinem Smartphone bezahlen und musst so deine Mastercard nicht st√§ndig bei dir tragen.
Google Pay ist in allen Shops, die kontaktlose Zahlungen (NFC) unterst√ºtzen, sowie in Online-Shops verf√ºgbar. Halte einfach dein Smartphone in die N√§he des kontaktlosen Terminals und deine Zahlung wird automatisch verarbeitet. Wenn du online bezahlst, w√§hle Google Pay als Zahlungsmethode aus. Wir werden dich beim Abschluss des Bezahlvorgangs per¬†Push-Nachricht¬†auffordern, deine Zahlung zu best√§tigen.
Einige Tipps:
Um deine N26 Mastercard zu deinem Google Wallet hinzuzuf√ºgen, lade die Google Pay App herunter und w√§hle Hinzuf√ºgen, um deine Kartendaten einzugeben. Du brauchst Android 5.0 (Lollipop) oder h√∂her sowie ein NFC-f√§higes Smartphone.
Google Pay erfordert eine Bildschirmsperre. Falls du diese noch nicht eingerichtet hast, wirst du dazu aufgefordert, bevor du deine Mastercard zur Google Pay App hinzuf√ºgst.
Falls dein Smartphone mit einer Schutzh√ºlle versehen ist, musst du diese zum Bezahlen eventuell entfernen. Manche Zahlungsterminals erkennen dein Smartphone m√∂glicherweise nicht, wenn die Schutzh√ºlle zu dick ist.
Wenn das Zahlungsterminal dich dazu auffordert, deine Karte (erneut) vorzuzeigen, dann hast du dein Smartphone m√∂glicherweise zu schnell wieder weggenommen oder nicht nah genug an das Terminal gehalten. Versuche es einfach erneut.

title: Wie reklamiere ich eine Transaktion?
content:
Wir k√∂nnen nur Kartentransaktionen reklamieren, die in deinem monatlichen Kontoauszug sichtbar sind und nicht l√§nger als 120 Tage zur√ºckliegen. Bitte f√ºlle ein Formular f√ºr Umsatzreklamationen in¬†Deutsch(neuen Tab) oder¬†Englisch(neuen Tab)¬†aus und schicke es uns als Anhang in einer Email. Bitte stelle sicher, dass du:
Eine neue Karte bestellen und deine aktuelle als gestohlen markierst
F√ºr jede Kartenzahlung ein eigenes Formular ausf√ºllst und es unterschreibst
Nur einen Streitgrund ausw√§hlst
Alle zus√§tzlich ben√∂tigten Unterlagen(neuen Tab) hinzuf√ºgst

title: What is CASH26?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Applies to German, Austrian and Italian T&C
CASH26 allows you to withdraw or deposit cash by creating and showing a barcode at our participating stores. 
CASH26 is available in:
11.918 REWE, Penny, dm, real, Budni, Ludwig, Eckert, ON, Adam‚Äôs, OMV, Barbarino or Rossmann locations in Germany,¬†
2.019 participating dm, Billa, Merkur, and PENNY Austria locations in Austria¬†
202 PAM & Panorama and 386 PENNY stores in Italy.
You can find your nearest location, including opening times and directions, on the CASH26 map in the app‚Äîtap on the Actions tab in the bottom right hand corner of your mobile app and select CASH26.
Withdrawals:
As soon as you create a withdrawal barcode, the amount will be deducted from your balance. If you change your mind, you can delete the code and the amount will instantly return to your account.
If a barcode remains unused, the amount will be returned to your account after 10 minutes.
You can withdraw up to ‚Ç¨900 (‚Ç¨200 per transaction) within 24 hours.
Withdrawals are always free.
Deposits:
Deposits made with CASH26 are available on your account right away.
You can deposit up to ‚Ç¨999 (minimum ‚Ç¨50 per deposit) within 24 hours.
You can deposit up to ‚Ç¨100 a month for free. Extra deposits are charged a fee of 1,5% of the deposit amount.
You don't need to buy anything in the store to make a withdrawal or deposit cash.
Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial(new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube(new tab) channel.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: How to make a SEPA transfer?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è You can send debit transfers to any country within the SEPA zone (if the receiving bank accepts Euros).
Outgoing debit transfers can be made in either the N26 app or our Web app.
From the Home screen choose the Actions tab,

Select Send Money followed by Bank Transfer and then ‚Äúadd a new recipient‚Äù,

Enter the recipient's name and IBAN and select Continue,

Choose the amount and select Next,

Add a message if required or select Skip It,

Check the Transfer Review screen (which sums up the transfer),

Here you can also schedule the date of your transfer and save it as a standing order,

Press send and confirm with your confirmation PIN.
You‚Äôll then need to either Confirm or Cancel the transfer via push notification in the app from your paired device.
Once the transfer was confirmed in the mobile app, we can't reverse it or change the recipient's details.
If you cannot confirm your debit transfer within the app you need to:
Ensure that you have a stable internet connection.
Ensure that your mobile phone has push notifications enabled. This is done through the phone settings, not in our app.
Ensure that you use your paired device.
Once your debit transfer is sent you‚Äôll be able to download a PDF confirmation of it. To do so:
Go to your Transactions list.

Locate and select the specific debit transfer.

Scroll down to the Transaction Information and tap PDF by selecting Transfer Confirmation.

title: Why is N26 secure?
content:
To protect your account, we use a three-layered security architecture:
Secure login.¬†Your login details of both the mobile and¬†WebApp(new tab)¬†consist of a username and password or fingerprint/face recognition (depending on your smartphone). Please choose a¬†secure password¬†and don‚Äôt reveal your login details to anyone.
Confirmation PIN.¬†This¬†4-digit code¬†is required every time you make a transfer or connect/disconnect your phone. You first set it up once you have successfully connected your smartphone to your account. You can then¬†change it¬†in the app yourself after that.
Push messages.¬†For every incoming and outgoing payment, a push message will be sent to your¬†connected smartphone. It's also used to confirm and finalize your transactions. We've also added¬†3D Secure¬†to protect you from online card fraud.
Every time you contact us we‚Äôll ask you some security questions to make sure it's really you. But we‚Äôll never ask for your debit card number, card verification code (CVV), password, or your card or Confirmation PINs.
We‚Äôve also taken steps to protect your data: we store as little information about you as possible, only for as long as we are legally obligated to, and we delete data when it is no longer required for a product or service. You can¬†download your personal data¬†up to 6 months after you close your account. Find more information in our¬†Privacy Policy(new tab).

title: Perch√© mi √® stato addebitato pi√π di quanto mi aspettassi?
content:
Tutte le transazioni avvengono in tempo reale. Ti avvertiremo tramite notifica push quando una qualsiasi transazione in entrata o in uscita avviene.
A volte una transazione pu√≤ sembrare sospetta perch√© l‚Äôimporto finale addebitato pu√≤ essere diverso dall‚Äôimporto originale della transazione per alcuni motivi:
L‚Äôesercente blocca un importo pi√π elevato come deposito (es. alla stazione di benzina, per un noleggio auto o una prenotazione alberghiera), e la differenza viene accreditata sul tuo conto non appena il deposito non sar√† pi√π necessario.
Le variazioni dei tassi di cambio possono comportare lievi differenze nel totale delle operazioni effettuate in valuta estera.
In entrambi i casi, non applichiamo interessi per la differenza negli importi.
Ma se sei sicuro di non aver autorizzato una transazione, potremmo aiutarti a¬†recuperare i tuoi soldi.

title: How to upgrade to N26 You (formerly Black)?
content:
You can upgrade to N26 You¬†during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you have a standard N26 bank account. To upgrade to You from the mobile app:
For iOS: Log into your mobile app, go to the Explore tab next to the + button and select Get You.
For Android: Log into the mobile app, swipe right until you reach the Upgrade tab next to your current balance and select Get You. 
After choosing your preferred delivery method and accepting the N26 You T&C's(new tab), you‚Äôll have to confirm your request by entering your Confirmation PIN. Then your new card will be on the way. 
Standard deliveries take up to 10 days whereas express deliveries take 3 business days. 
The membership fee of ¬£4.90 will be deducted directly from your account every month on the date of your upgrade.
The minimum contract period for the N26 You membership is one year. Your membership will automatically renew unless you cancel it up to four weeks before the contract ends.

content:
Vous pouvez annuler votre demande de¬†cr√©dit N26¬†gratuitement pendant la p√©riode de r√©traction de 14 jours √† compter de la signature de l‚Äôoffre de cr√©dit.

title: How to top up by card, Apple Pay, and Google Pay
content:
You can now add money by using a debit or credit card as well as Apple or Google Pay. This is the fastest and easiest way to fund your N26 account.¬†


Adding money with a Debit or Credit card
Open your N26 app and navigate to the Actions tab
Just tap ‚ÄúAdd money‚Äù and select ‚ÄúCard transfer‚Äù
Choose an amount and enter your name on card, card number, expiration date and CVC (we never store your card information)
Follow the steps to confirm the payment
The money is available on your account instantly 

Adding money with a Apple or Google Pay
Open your N26 app and navigate to the Actions tab
Just tap ‚ÄúAdd money‚Äù and select ‚ÄúApple Pay‚Äù or ‚ÄúGoogle Pay‚Äù
Choose an amount¬†
Follow the steps to confirm the payment
The money is available on your account instantly

Accepted cards: 
Visa and Mastercard cards that have a 16-digit card number. 
Prepaid cards are not accepted (ex: Brand A, Brand B etc.). 
To find out more about the difference between debit, credit and prepaid cards read this article(new tab).¬†

Cost:
Whilst this is the fastest and easiest way to instantly add funds in your N26 account, for us, processing these instant top-up transactions is more expensive than other account funding methods(new tab) we offer.

For both methods, the first deposit is always free but extra deposits are charged a fee of 3% of the deposit amount. By charging a card or digital wallet, your money is not sent to N26 instantly, and the fee covers additional costs associated with funding accounts before the money is received so that it is instantly available for your use.

title: Why is N26 secure?
content:
To protect your account, we use a three-layered security architecture:
Secure login.¬†Your login details of both the mobile and¬†WebApp(new tab)¬†consist of a username and password or fingerprint/face recognition (depending on your smartphone). Please choose a¬†secure password¬†and don‚Äôt reveal your login details to anyone.
Confirmation PIN.¬†This¬†4-digit code¬†is required every time you make a transfer or connect/disconnect your phone. You first set it up once you have successfully connected your smartphone to your account. You can then¬†change it¬†in the app yourself after that.
Push messages.¬†For every incoming and outgoing payment, a push message will be sent to your¬†connected smartphone. It's also used to confirm and finalize your transactions. We've also added¬†3D Secure¬†to protect you from online card fraud.
Every time you contact us we‚Äôll ask you some security questions to make sure it's really you. But we‚Äôll never ask for your debit card number, card verification code (CVV), password, or your card or Confirmation PINs.
We‚Äôve also taken steps to protect your data: we store as little information about you as possible, only for as long as we are legally obligated to, and we delete data when it is no longer required for a product or service. You can¬†download your personal data¬†up to 6 months after you close your account. Find more information in our¬†Privacy Policy(new tab).

title: Why can‚Äôt I see other N26 users on MoneyBeam?
content:
To carry out real-time transactions such as¬†MoneyBeams, N26 checks your smartphone‚Äôs contact list and finds other N26 users based on saved phone numbers or emails. You can also enter someone‚Äôs contact details manually to send them a MoneyBeam.
If you don‚Äôt see your friend‚Äôs name on MoneyBeam but you know they‚Äôre an N26 user, they most likely haven‚Äôt made themselves visible. Indeed you can manage your visibility as an N26 user.
Most MoneyBeam transfers that fail between N26 users happen because there are multiple phone numbers or emails listed in the contact entry of a phone's address book. To avoid this, make sure you have the email and phone number your friend uses in your phone book in order to send them MoneyBeams. If the contact details you have stored don‚Äôt match, you cannot send a MoneyBeam to your friend.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: Was ist N26 Savings?
content:
Mit N26 Savings kannst du kostenlos ein Festgeldkonto mit einer Einlage zwischen 2.000 ‚Ç¨ und 100.000 ‚Ç¨ er√∂ffnen. Diese Option findest du in der App im Bereich Entdecken und dann unter N26 Finanzprodukte. Du kannst nicht auf den eingezahlten Betrag zugreifen, bis der Sparplan f√§llig wird (6 bis 60 Monate), aber du erh√§ltst w√§hrend dieser Zeit bis zu 1,48 % Zinsen. Danach erh√§ltst du die Auszahlung direkt auf dein N26 Konto.
N26 Savings wird durch die enge Zusammenarbeit von¬†drei Unternehmen(neuen Tab)¬†mit verschiedenen Partnerbanken m√∂glich gemacht. Du musst die AGB aller vier Teilnehmer akzeptieren, um ein Konto zu er√∂ffnen.
Aus regulatorischen Gr√ºnden ben√∂tigen wir Informationen √ºber deinen Steuerstatus. Wenn du in den Vereinigten Staaten steuerpflichtig sind, k√∂nnen wir dir unser Sparprodukt derzeit¬†nicht anbieten.
Du bist m√∂glicherweise zu einer Steuerbefreiung qualifiziert. Ist das der Fall, f√ºlle¬†unser Formular(neuen Tab) aus und chatte mit uns. Wir leiten deine Anfrage an unsere Partnerbank weiter.
Sobald du dein Sparkonto er√∂ffnest, wird der einmalige Betrag von deinem Girokonto abgebucht. Bitte beachte, dass es bis zu sieben Werktage dauern kann, bis dein Konto er√∂ffnet wird.
Wenn der Sparplan ausl√§uft, erh√§ltst du den eingezahlten Betrag und die Zinsen (abz√ºglich eventueller Kapitalertragsteuer) innerhalb von zwei Tagen deinem N26 Konto gutgeschrieben.
Nach europ√§ischem Recht sind alle Mitgliedstaaten verpflichtet, eine¬†Einlagensicherung¬†von bis zu 100.000 ‚Ç¨ pro Person und Bank zu gew√§hren. Damit dieser Schutz bei Wechselkursschwankungen nicht unterschritten wird, haben wir ein zus√§tzliches Limit f√ºr Sparkonten in L√§ndern au√üerhalb der Eurozone festgelegt.
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erhalte 15‚Ç¨ f√ºr jeden Freund, dem du N26 erfolgreich empfiehlst. Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: How to prove my identity?
content:
As a licensed bank, it‚Äôs important that we know who our customers are. That‚Äôs why we request our customers to prove their identity with a supported ID document when they open an account or use certain products.
We would never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. We‚Äôve gathered other tips to help you protect your identity.
There are two different ways you can show us your ID, and we've also collected some troubleshooting tips for each: photo and video. The method you can choose to show us your ID depends on your nationality, your country of residence, and the type of ID you use:
I live in Germany(new tab)
I live in Spain(new tab)
I live in a different country(new tab)
If your ID isn't on the list, it means we cannot offer you an account with us at the time. We take identity verification very seriously and our Customer Support will not be able to make an exception for you regarding the supported documents.
But we're always adding new documents to this list so it's worth checking back to see if yours has been added.
In case your residential address is in Germany and you're unable to complete your photo or video verification due to a disability, please start the registration process by entering your details and then contact our Customer Support. We're happy to assist you.
Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.¬†

title: PSD2 - sicheres Open Banking
content:
Die Zweite Zahlungsdiensterichtlinie (‚ÄúPSD2‚Äù) ist eine √ºberarbeitete europ√§ische Richtlinie und erm√∂glicht dir, √ºber regulierte Drittanbieter sicher auf deine Kontodaten zuzugreifen und Zahlungen √ºber regulierte Drittanbieter sicher durchzuf√ºhren.
Das bedeutet, dass du regulierten Drittanbietern √ºber eine dedizierte Schnittstelle Zugang zu deinem Konto erlauben kannst:
Du kannst √ºber einen Kontoinformationsdienst (KID) Daten verschiedener Bankkonten an einem Ort zusammenf√ºhren und sie √ºber regulierte Drittanbieter verwalten;
Du kannst bei einem Einkauf auf einer Website einen Zahlungsausl√∂sedienst (ZAD) nutzen.
Der sichere Datenaustausch erfolgt im Hintergrund √ºber unseren Partner Token.io.
Nutzt Du einen regulierten Drittanbieter, wie einen Kontoinformationsdienst oder einen Zahlungausl√∂sedienst, wirst Du √ºber Token.io zur N26 App weitergeleitet, um die jeweilige Zugriffsanfrage zu best√§tigen.¬†
In unserer Datenschutzerkl√§rung(neuen Tab) informieren wir Dich √ºber die Zwecke, die involvierten Parteien und die rechtlichen Grundlagen f√ºr die notwendige Datenverarbeitung, um unsere Verpflichtungen im Rahmen der √ºberarbeiteten Zweiten Zahlungsdiensterichtlinie zu erf√ºllen.
Warum kann ich keinen Drittanbieter mit meinem Konto verlinken?
Wenn der Drittanbieter keine Integration mit unserer dedizierten Schnittstelle vorgenommen hat, muss er zun√§chst √ºber unseren Partner Token.io die Integration mit unserer dedizierten Schnittstelle vornehmen.
Wie kann ich eine Zugriffsbest√§tigung, die ich einem regulierten Drittanbieter gew√§hrt habe, widerrufen?
Um eine Zugangsbest√§tigung zu widerrufen, die Du einem regulierten Drittanbieter gew√§hrt hast, musst Du Dich direkt an den regulierten Drittanbieter wenden.
*gilt f√ºr alle L√§nder im EWR.

title: How to order my card with express delivery?
content:
Not available for Metal cards.
Express delivery is a good option if you need your card in a hurry or if postal deliveries have sometimes failed to reach you for whatever reason.
You‚Äôll be given the option to select express delivery when choosing a delivery method for your first card or if you¬†reorder a card. You‚Äôll then receive a tracking link by email. If you‚Äôre not home during the delivery and your mailbox can‚Äôt be accessed, the card will be left at a nearby access point (you can find it through the provided tracking link). The card only stays at the access point for a limited amount of time. After that, it‚Äôll be returned to us. We‚Äôll inform you by email if that happens.
If you order via express delivery, keep in mind that:
Your new Standard or N26 You Mastercard will be delivered within 2-3 working days. Express delivery is not available for Metal cards.
Deliveries take place between 08:00 and 12:00. 
Deliveries can be made by DHL express to all of our supported countries within Europe. It‚Äôs currently not possible to make deliveries to other countries.
It‚Äôs not possible to cancel or change an express delivery once it‚Äôs been selected as the delivery method.
To close an account, you must pay for the express delivery of your card.
If your card hasn‚Äôt arrived within 3-5 working days of placing your order, please check the tracking link for an update. You can also use the tracking link to inform DHL directly about the details of your delivery address or to redirect the shipment if you can‚Äôt be there at the time of delivery.
N26 Standard and N26 You cards have a fee of ‚Ç¨6 for standard shipping and ‚Ç¨25 for express shipping (which includes the ‚Ç¨6 card replacement fee).

title: PSD2 - Open Banking para proveedores de servicios
content:
Nos hemos asociado con Token.io(pesta√±a nueva) para proporcionar una interfaz dedicada para para terceros proveedores de servicios (''TPPs'' con sus siglas en ingl√©s). Puedes encontrar toda la documentaci√≥n e instrucciones en el Token.io developer portal(pesta√±a nueva). 
Como parte de nuestras obligaciones legales de acuerdo a la normativa de PSD2, N26 ha implementado un mecanismo de contingencia:
Identificaci√≥n fiable de los proveedores que poseen el Certificado de Autenticaci√≥n de Sitio Web (QWAC).
Acceso a la cuenta seguro y autorizado.
Los proveedores pueden acceder a este plan de contingencia a trav√©s de esta p√°gina web: 
https://tpp.tech26.de
Para acceder a la URL mencionada y establecer una conexi√≥n TLS segura se requiere la implementaci√≥n de un certificado cualificado.
A continuaci√≥n puedes consultar la documentaci√≥n t√©cnica de prevenci√≥n de errores: 
Documentaci√≥n AISP(pesta√±a nueva)
Documentaci√≥n PISP(pesta√±a nueva)
Si necesitas enviarnos certificados QWAC o recibir ayuda en esta materia cont√°ctanos a open.banking@n26.com.
Los siguientes reportes comparan la disponibilidad y el rendimiento de nuestra interfaz PSD2 con la del usuario de N26:
3¬∫ cuatrimestre de 2019(pesta√±a nueva)
4¬∫ cuatrimestre de 2019(pesta√±a nueva)

title: How to create a password?
content:
If you forgot your password or want to change it, select¬†Forgot?¬†in the app or¬†Forgot your password?(new tab)¬†in the¬†WebApp(new tab)¬†during login. We‚Äôll send a link to your registered email address so you can create a new password. Make sure your new password meets our requirements:
We do not have a specific set of requirements for our passwords. We measure their strength on the fly and only accept passwords that are considered robust by our underlying algorithm.
We tend to recommend to go with a ‚Äúpassphrase‚Äù rather than a password, and thus go by the common phrase ‚Äúhard to guess, easy to remember‚Äù. 
If your password is not accepted by our system, try to add more special characters, numbers, and vary between upper- and lowercase letters.
If you enter your password incorrectly six times in a row, you‚Äôll be temporarily blocked from your account. If this happens, try logging in again after 30 minutes.
Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.
