title: How does Spaces work?
content:
Set goals, create and personalize Spaces, and transfer money between them instantly. Spaces is available in the mobile and¬†WebApp(new tab).
In addition to your main account (or primary space), you can create and delete additional Spaces as often as you‚Äôd like but the number of active Spaces at any one time depends on your account type: 2 additional Spaces with an N26 or N26 Business account or up to 10 additional Spaces with N26 You, N26 Business You and N26 Metal.
Your primary account statements will include all transactions sent to a space or received from one. You can download balance statements from the confirmation page.
Only your primary space can be negative (if you are eligible for an overdraft). All other balances in Spaces cannot be negative, meaning you can only transfer what is available in a particular space.
You can only use the balance from your primary space toward your Mastercard transactions. So consider transferring money before making a purchase if needed.
Move money from one space to another by holding down on your Main Account and dragging and dropping into your space. Once the amount is confirmed the balance is updated right away.
You can lock and unlock a space at anytime from your mobile and web app. You'll only need to confirm with your confirmation PIN. If a space is locked, you‚Äôll still be able to transfer money to it. If you need to withdraw money from a locked space, you need first to unlock it.
You'll be able to hide the amount within the Space from your account's total balance. Just go into your Space, tap the three dots in the top right corner and select ‚ÄòHide space balance‚Äô.
Spaces includes a feature called Rules which will help you manage your time and your finances effectively.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: Shared Spaces - What is a power of attorney?
content:
The legal model behind Shared Spaces is called Power of Attorney (Kontovollmacht in German).¬†
Participants of a Shared Space do not have equal ownership of the account like a joint account in the traditional banking sense. After receiving Power of Attorney the participants obtain the right to act on behalf of the Owner regarding any transfer of funds within the Shared Space.
The person authorizing the other to act on his behalf is called the ‚ÄúOwner‚Äù, this person is the only account holder. The owner must be a N26 premium account holder e.g. N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business You.
This means that whoever created the Shared Space is its legal owner. The owner of a Shared Space:¬†
Owns all the funds within a Shared Space.¬†
Can transfer funds freely in and out of the account anytime.¬†
Can invite people to the Shared Space by granting others Power of Attorney.
Can revoke the Power of Attorney of a participant at any time.
Can also close a Shared Space after removing a participant. (all funds in the Shared Space will be transferred to the Owner‚Äôs Main Account)
By granting a person Power of Attorney, they‚Äôll have full access to all the money held within a Shared Space. This means that each participant can also transfer funds freely in and out of the Shared Space.¬†

N26 Bank GmbH cannot be held liable for payments covered by the Power of Attorney.
What are Shared Spaces?
How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?

title: Where does N26 invest my money?
content:
We strive to provide our clients' deposits for loans to our customers (provided that they have the appropriate credit rating). For the liquidity not required in the customer business, our investment strategy is low in risk.
We invest our customers' money at short notice with the Deutsche Bundesbank and other European banks in the eurozone with only good risk classes. And we refinance public-law customers mainly in Germany (cities and municipalities) and invest in euro government bonds
We're not a trading book institute. That is: we do not trade for short-term profit.
And we don't engage in speculation, whether on food, foreign exchange, bitcoins or other asset classes.

title: How to rent a car with your N26 card?
content:
N26 has teamed up with Rentalcars.com to offer you 15% off their rental vehicles. The offer runs from February 25, 2020, until May 25, 2020. Follow this link(new tab) to the Rentalcars.com N26 offer page to rent a car.¬† 

In order to rent a car, the main driver is normally required to be a credit card holder, but recently an increasing number of car rental companies have been accepting debit cards due to their growing usage.
As a result, our N26 debit card enables you to rent cars at a great number of companies. Here you‚Äôll find some of the agencies that currently accept debit cards:

Alamo
Avis
Centaur
Enterprise
Europecar
Firefly
Joy rent
Locauto
Greater
SicilyByCar
Thrifty car rental
Before renting a vehicle, we suggest you contact the company: conditions for the rental depend on the single agencies so requirements may vary locally and nationally.
We also recommend checking if the agency accepts debit cards when you reserve the car as well as when you collect it, and whether they require the card to have embossed numbers.
Please also consider that:
in case an unexpected or unjustified amount is charged, you‚Äôll first need to contact and possibly start a dispute with the agency. Only if the dispute has a negative outcome, we‚Äôll be able to offer our assistance to start a new dispute via Mastercard.
the security deposit will be charged (and not authorized, as with credit cards). The deposit will then be credited back to your account after returning the car and if no damage is reported.

title: What are Shared Spaces?
content:
Shared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 users to share money together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.
Shared Spaces are available to N26 premium users (You / Business You / Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their Space. 
Participants can be any N26 account holder regardless of their account type.
The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.
The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants for their space.
Similar to regular Spaces, Shared Spaces have neither an IBAN nor a card attached to them.

title: FATCA - Perch√© richiediamo alcune informazioni da te?
content:
Come previsto dalla normativa FATCA, N26 ha l‚Äôobbligo di fornire informazioni finanziarie al Dipartimento del Tesoro e all‚ÄôInternal Revenue Service (IRS) degli Stati Uniti sui conti di contribuenti statunitensi e di societ√† estere in cui contribuenti statunitensi detengono interessi considerevoli.
La normativa FATCA (Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act) √® stata introdotta dall‚ÄôIRS con lo scopo di prevenire l‚Äôevasione fiscale di contribuenti statunitensi mediante l‚Äôapertura di conti presso istituti finanziari esteri.¬†Puoi trovare maggiori informazioni sulla normativa FATCA sul sito www.irs.gov(nuova tabella)
¬†A differenza della maggior parte dei paesi del mondo, il sistema fiscale statunitense prevede la tassazione dei propri cittadini anche nei casi in cui abbiano la residenza fiscale all‚Äôestero.¬†
¬†Per stabilire se il tuo conto deve essere riportato all‚ÄôIRS, abbiamo bisogno delle seguenti informazioni:
1. Sei (anche) un cittadino statunitense o titolare di una Green Card (permesso di soggiorno permanente) per gli Stati Uniti?
2. Sei soggetto a tasse negli Stati Uniti? 
Essere ‚Äúsoggetto a tasse‚Äù negli Stati Uniti non significa necessariamente pagare imposte sul reddito negli Stati Uniti. Implica, piuttosto, che le normative fiscali richiedono la compilazione della dichiarazione dei redditi (inerente tutti i redditi percepiti al di fuori degli Stati Uniti) da presentare all‚ÄôIRS.¬†
 3. Se sei soggetto a tasse negli Stati Uniti, qual √® il tuo Taxpayer Identification Number (TIN)?
Puoi fornire il tuo Social Security Number (SSN) statunitense oppure il tuo Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN).¬†
Ti informiamo, inoltre, che se il tuo conto presenta un luogo di nascita statunitense, un numero di telefono statunitense oppure se hai impostato un ordine permanente verso gli Stati Uniti, secondo la normativa FATCA, verrai considerato un soggetto ai sensi del FATCA fino a quando non verr√† dimostrato il contrario.¬†
Nel caso si presentassero variazioni della tua situazione personale, potrai aggiornare le tue informazioni fiscali in qualunque momento tramite la app di N26. Baster√† eseguire l‚Äôaccesso > Il mio conto > Impostazioni > Impostazioni personali > Informazioni fiscali.

title: How long does it take to send money with TransferWise?
content:
Once you've initiated your transfer via TransferWise you'll be given an estimated time frame.
If a TransferWise transfer fails, we‚Äôll notify you via push message. The amount will automatically be returned to your account a few days later.
TransferWise doesn‚Äôt charge extra fees for a returned payment and neither do we. However, some participating banks do charge fees, in which case TransferWise will deduct this amount from the money returned under their¬†Conditions of Use(new tab).
Common reasons for a failed transfer:
Error in the transfer details (for example, when entering the recipient‚Äôs name or account information).
Special characters or too many characters in the recipient‚Äôs name or reference field.
Limits have been reached or online payments aren‚Äôt active in card settings.
Foreign currency transfers aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business or N26 Business You or if the recipient is a business account.

title: Comment recevoir la prime de parrainage N26 ?
content:
Vous pouvez recevoir 15 ‚Ç¨ √† chaque fois que vous invitez un ami √† rejoindre N26.
Pour recevoir votre prime de parrainage, votre ami doit remplir toutes ces conditions :
Votre ami doit s‚Äôinscrire depuis votre lien de parrainage ou en ins√©rant son code de parrainage. (Si votre ami n‚Äôa pas re√ßu votre lien, vous pouvez lui en envoyer un nouveau en utilisant cette fois son adresse email plut√¥t que son num√©ro de t√©l√©phone, ou l‚Äôinverse).
Votre ami doit activer sa carte Mastercard.
Votre ami doit r√©aliser au moins une transaction d‚Äôun montant minimum de 15 ‚Ç¨ avec sa Mastercard N26 (un paiement en ligne, en magasin ou une retrait au DAB).
Pour inviter vos amis :
Connectez-vous √† l‚Äôapplication N26
S√©lectionnez l'ic√¥ne Cadeau depuis l'onglet D√©couvrir en bas de votre √©cran d‚Äôaccueil
S√©lectionnez Code de parrainage pour le copier*
Choisissez Invitez un ami
Choisissez l‚Äôune des options propos√©es pour partager votre code
Personnalisez votre message ou utilisez le message par d√©faut, puis appuyez sur Envoyer
Une fois que toutes les conditions requises seront remplies, l'attribution de votre prime de parrainage se fera sous 60 jours. Vous pouvez √† tout moment v√©rifier le statut de votre invitation directement depuis votre application N26 mobile ou sa version web. 
Nous vous pr√©sentons √©galement les raisons pour lesquelles il est possible que vous n‚Äôayez¬†pas encore re√ßu votre prime de parrainage. 
*Le lien de parrainage n‚Äôexpire pas, il peut √™tre utilis√© √† tout moment apr√®s son envoi. Les codes et les liens de parrainage doivent uniquement servir √† des fins personnelles et pour un usage non commercial. Cela veut dire que vous pouvez partager votre lien de parrainage avec vos connexions personnelles via vos r√©seaux sociaux, tant que vous √™tes le d√©tenteur principal du contenu. Notez que N26 est en droit d‚Äôannuler le programme de parrainage √† tout moment.
Vous trouverez plus d‚Äôinformations √† ce sujet dans les¬†Conditions d‚Äôutilisation du programme de parrainage N26(nouvel onglet)

title: Where is my refund?
content:
Your refund will be visible in the app on the day of the original transaction, not the refund date. Scroll down your transaction list or download your previous balance statements to find it.
To view and download PDFs of your (preliminary and previous) monthly balance statements:
On the WebApp(new tab): From Transactions, click on the cloud icon in the upper-right corner to reach Downloads then select Bank statements.

On the mobile app: 
If you're using an iPhone, tap on the three dots to the right of your current balance from the main screen. A menu will pop up and will give you the option to access your balance statement.¬†
For Androids, you'll find the option under Statistics (just tap the 3 dots in the top right-hand corner).

title: Come esportare l'elenco delle mie transazioni?
content:
La¬†(nuova tabella)webapp ti permette di fare una ricerca tra le tue transazioni e scaricarne la cronologia in formato CSV. 
Puoi esportare l'elenco delle transazioni da Transazioni, selezionando l'icona a forma di nuvola in alto a destra e poi Download. In CSV, seleziona la Data di inizio e la Data di fine e poi Scarica CSV.
Puoi ordinare le transazioni anche utilizzando le¬†categorie e hashtags¬†nell'app.
Puoi visualizzare e scaricare i PDF del tuo estratto conto mensile (in corso oppure quelli precedenti) in due modi:
webapp(nuova tabella): da Transazioni, seleziona l'icona a forma di nuvola in alto a destra e poi Download, quindi seleziona Estratto conto. 
app mobile: seleziona i tre puntini in alto a destra nella schermata principale e poi Estratto conto.

title: Perch√© i pagamenti contactless non funzionano?
content:
Non √® possibile disattivare i pagamenti contactless. Se dovessero verificarsi problemi con i pagamenti contactless, considera che:
Per attivare i pagamenti contactless, √® necessario prima utilizzare la carta presso uno sportello bancomat o un POS.

Le transazioni fino a 50‚Ç¨ non richiedono il PIN della carta*. Per importi superiori a tale cifra, dovrai inserire il PIN della carta. 
*Se la modalit√† di pagamento offerta del venditore supporta questa opzione.
Assicurati di tenere la carta direttamente su un POS compatibile con NFC. Se la carta viene rimossa troppo velocemente o se non viene tenuta abbastanza vicina al POS, la transazione potrebbe avere esito negativo: prova di nuovo.

Le carte N26 Metal hanno la funzione NFC sul retro della carta. Assicurati di tenere il retro della carta sul POS per usare l‚ÄôNFC (usando la parte anteriore, il pagamento non andr√† a buon fine).

title: Perch√© mi √® stata addebitata una commissione per l‚Äôaddebito diretto?
content:
Agli addebiti diretti respinti sul tuo conto a causa di fondi insufficienti viene addebitata una commissione di ‚Ç¨ 3 in conformit√† ai nostri¬†Termini e condizioni(nuova tabella). 
Puoi evitare queste commissioni assicurandoti di avere fondi sufficienti sul conto per coprire gli addebiti diretti in entrata entro le ore 18.00 dello stesso giorno lavorativo.
Poich√© i bonifici¬†SEPA¬†possono richiedere pi√π di un giorno, ti consigliamo di utilizzare¬†MoneyBeam¬†o¬†CASH26¬†(se vivi in Germania, Austria o Italia) per trasferire l‚Äôimporto dovuto. Con entrambi i metodi, l‚Äôimporto sar√† accreditato sul conto istantaneamente.
Se non riconosci un addebito diretto, puoi¬†annullarlo¬†nell‚Äôapp.
*Per Polonia, Svezia, Danimarca e Norvegia: se stai istituendo un addebito diretto con un commerciante nella tua valuta nazionale, √® la banca ricevente che determina il cambio di valuta e l'importo finale che viene prelevato da noi.

title: How to create and manage standing orders?
content:
When setting up an outgoing transfer in either the N26 app or Web app you‚Äôll have the option to make it a standing order.
Once you complete the outgoing transfer you'll then be prompted to tick a box which will create a standing order. After you've inputted the amount of the transfer and its recipient, under the reference text field select "Want to save this as a standing order?". From here you'll be able to set the start/end dates of the standing order and choose its payment intervals.
To view your scheduled transfers and standing orders directly in the mobile app:
Go to your transaction list (the main screen).
Then tap on the 3 dots located in the upper¬†right corner for Android and on the top of the transaction list for iOS. 
A small window will pop, where you will be able to select "Standing Orders".
Here you can cancel and/or modify the details of your standing order. To cancel it just tap the standing order you wish to delete and tap the trash icon in the top right-hand corner.
‚ÑπÔ∏è ¬†Please note, if a standing order fails due to insufficient funds we won't attempt the transfer again - you'll need to manually send the transfer, however the next scheduled transfers will proceed as normal.

title: Wie verwendet N26 meine Steuerinformationen?
content:
Die OECD verlangt, dass bestimmte Steuerinformationen mittels des¬†Common Reporting Standard(neuen Tab) ausgetauscht werden. Um unseren Verpflichtungen nachzukommen, m√ºssen wir feststellen, in welchem Land du steuerpflichtig bist. Wir tun dies √ºber deine Steueridentifikationsnummer oder National Insurance number.
Wir leiten diese Informationen √ºber das Bundesamt f√ºr Steuern an Steuerbeh√∂rden in anderen L√§ndern weiter, wenn:
du in einem CRS-Teilnehmerland lebst.
du ein Postfach oder eine zweite Meldeadresse in einem anderen CRS-Teilnehmerland hast.
du bei der Registrierung eine Telefonnummer eines anderen CRS-Teilnehmerlandes angegeben hast.
du einen Dauerauftrag hast oder regelm√§√üige Zahlungen auf ein Konto in einem anderen CRS-Teilnehmerland leistest.
Wir leiten die Daten nach dem¬†Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act(neuen Tab)¬†(FATCA) auch an den U.S.¬†Internal Revenue Service(neuen Tab)¬†(IRS) weiter. Wir k√∂nnen deine Sozialversicherungsnummer (SSN) anfordern, um deinen Steuerstatus in den USA zu √ºberpr√ºfen, wenn:
du US-B√ºrger bist (einschlie√ülich doppelte Staatsb√ºrgerschaft).
du bei der Registrierung eine Telefonnummer aus den USA angegeben hast.
du in den USA (oder in einer US-Botschaft im Ausland) geboren wurdest.
du mit einem US-B√ºrger/einer US-B√ºrgerin verheiratet bist.
du uns eine Adresse in den USA gegeben hast.
du regelm√§√üige √úberweisungen in die USA durchf√ºhrst.
So aktualisierst du deine Steuernummer oder Sozialversicherungsnummer in der App:
Gehe zu üë§ Mein Konto und tippe auf Einstellungen
W√§hle Pers√∂nliche Einstellungen und Steuerdaten
W√§hle das Land aus, in dem du steuerpflichtig bist
Gib entweder deine Steuernummer oder deine Sozialversicherungsnummer ein
Wichtige Informationen
In Deutschland ben√∂tigen wir deine 11-stellige Steueridentifikationsnummer, nicht deine 9-stellige Steuernummer.
In jedem Fall werden deine pers√∂nlichen Daten sicher gespeichert und nur zur Erf√ºllung der CRS- und FATCA-Anforderungen verwendet.
Wir k√∂nnen dich nicht zu deinem Steuerstatus beraten. Wenn du dir √ºber deinen Status nicht sicher bist, sprich bitte mit einem Steuerberater.
Wenn du das Land eingegeben hast, in dem du steuerpflichtig bist, aber nicht deine Steueridentifikationsnummer, bitte entferne das Land noch einmal von der Liste, die dir in der App angezeigt wird, f√ºge das Land erneut hinzu und gib deine Steueridentifikationsnummer ein.

title: Wie kann ich Push-Nachrichten erhalten?
content:
Wir senden dir Push-Mitteilungen, um √úberweisungen abzuschlie√üen (z. B.¬†MoneyBeam) oder einen Service zu best√§tigen (wie bei¬†CASH26). Wenn du diese Push-Nachrichten nicht erh√§ltst, √ºberpr√ºfe zun√§chst, ob die Benachrichtigungen sowohl f√ºr dein Smartphone als auch f√ºr die App aktiviert sind. Dann kannst du abh√§ngig von deinem Smartphone einige unserer Vorschl√§ge zur Fehlerbehebung ausprobieren:
L√∂sche die App und starte dein Smartphone neu. Lade die neueste Version der App aus dem Apple App Store herunter, installiere sie und¬†verkn√ºpfe dein Smartphone¬†wieder.
√úberpr√ºfe, ob du in der App eingeloggt bist.
Die Benachrichtigungsoption f√ºr die App muss in den allgemeinen Einstellungen deines Smartphones aktiviert sein.
L√∂sche die App und starte dein Smartphone neu. Lade die neueste Version der App aus dem Google Play Store herunter, installiere sie und¬†verkn√ºpfe dein Smartphone¬†wieder.
Gehe zu¬†Einstellungen¬†und¬†Optionen¬†und setze im¬†App Manager¬†ein H√§kchen bei¬†Benachrichtigungen anzeigen.
Huawei und Xiaomi: Gehe zu¬†Einstellungen, dann zu¬†Erweiterte Einstellungen¬†und¬†Akkueinstellungen¬†und setze N26 als gesch√ºtzte App.
OnePlus: W√§hle die¬†Akkuoptimierung, √∂ffne dann die N26 App und¬†nicht optimieren.
Oppo: Deaktiviere die¬†Akkuoptimierung¬†f√ºr die App und sperre sie in der¬†Recent apps overview.

title: All About Perks
content:
"Do you need an N26 card to take advantage of these Perks?"
Yes, you need an active N26 card to take advantage of these Perks.

"Will I be able to enroll in Perks as soon as I open an N26 account, or will I need to wait some time?"
Perks will be available to you as soon as you activate your card, and will always be available for you as long as your card is active.

"Can I access Perks through the web app?"
No, you cannot.¬† Perks are only available through the mobile app.


"What is the difference between a Cashback and a Discount Perk?"
The main difference between the two Perks is that the Cashback Perk is a subscription-based benefit, where you get a refund on your monthly subscription payment, from N26.¬† A Discount Perk is a purchase based benefit where you are able to purchase items at a reduced price - a discount.  In general, Discounts are applied instantly while Cashbacks may take up to a couple of business days to get credited to your account.¬† The exception to this is our Booking.com Perk, which offers Cashback.  Per the terms of our Booking.com offer, Booking.com takes at least 64 days until the end of your stay to process your Cashback, and N26 may take a month or more after that to complete processing of the Cashback. 
"Do I need a minimum balance in order to enroll in Perks?"¬†
While you do not need a minimum balance to enroll in Perks,¬† You must have a minimum balance to cover the selected subscription amount for your monthly Cashback Perk or to purchase the goods/services associated with your Discount Perk.


The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Come scaricare i miei dati personali?
content:
Il General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) √® un regolamento europeo in materia di protezione dei dati e della privacy entrato in vigore il 25 maggio 2018. In seguito all'introduzione di questo regolamento, abbiamo aggiunto un‚Äôopzione nella nostra¬†webapp (nuova tabella)che ti permette di scaricare i tuoi dati con una procedura molto semplice: 
 Il mio conto > Impostazioni personali > Dati personali
Il diritto alla portabilit√† dei dati secondo l'articolo 20 GDPR fa riferimento a dati precedentemente forniti e permette agli utenti di trasferire i propri dati ad un altro fornitore di servizi. Il GDPR richiede che i dati trasmessi con questa finalit√† siano in un formato leggibile elettronicamente (JSON file). 
Il tuo dispositivo potrebbe non supportare tale formato e, nel caso lo supportasse, ti preghiamo di notare che i dati sono salvati in modo da essere leggibili solo elettronicamente. 
In qualit√† di banca mobile, la sicurezza dei dati √® una nostra priorit√†. Prima di permettere ai nostri clienti di scaricare i propri dati, verifichiamo l'autenticit√† dell'identit√† di chi effettua la richiesta di scaricare tali dati. 
Puoi richiedere di scaricare i dati personali che hai fornito per un conto N26 attualmente aperto oppure per un conto N26 chiuso negli ultimi 6 mesi. I dati saranno forniti in un formato leggibile elettronicamente in modo da poterli trasferire a terze parti di tua scelta.
Accedi al¬†modulo(nuova tabella)¬†con i dati del tuo conto attuale.
Da qui, √® necessario creare una password temporanea da utilizzare per il link che invieremo all‚Äôindirizzo e-mail registrato. Il link sar√† valido per 24 ore dal momento in cui riceverai l'email. Se viene inserita una password errata 5 volte consecutive, il link non sar√† pi√π valido e sar√† necessario inviare una nuova richiesta di esportazione.
Puoi scaricare i tuoi dati fino a 6 mesi dopo la data di chiusura del conto. Per richiedere tali informazioni, completa il¬†modulo(nuova tabella)¬†di richiesta dati assicurandoti che le informazioni fornite corrispondano esattamente a quelle di accesso al tuo conto N26. Ti verranno richieste le seguenti informazioni:
nome e cognome, numero e data di scadenza del documento d‚Äôidentit√† (documento identificativo nazionale o passaporto) utilizzato per la verifica il conto
indirizzo e-mail del conto registrato

Ti preghiamo di notare che se un campo √® errato o incompleto, la richiesta non andr√† a buon fine.
Da qui, sar√† necessario creare una password temporanea da utilizzare per il link che invieremo all‚Äôindirizzo e-mail registrato. Il link sar√† valido per 24 ore dal momento in cui hai ricevuto l'email. Se viene inserita una password errata 5 volte consecutive, il link non sar√† pi√π valido e sar√† necessario inviare una nuova richiesta di esportazione.
Per ulteriori informazioni riguardanti la raccolta, l‚Äôutilizzo e il trattamento dei dati personali leggi la nostra¬†Informativa sulla privacy(nuova tabella)¬†aggiornata (DEU(nuova tabella)) (EU(nuova tabella)).

title: How to file a complaint?
content:
If you have any questions about our products or need help with your account, we‚Äôre happy to assist. Just open a chat with us directly within the mobile app or WebApp, that's the fastest and simplest way to get in touch.
If you ever feel dissatisfied with one of our products or services, you can also send (new tab)us an email from your registered address or send your feedback by post.
If you're in the UK, you can send the email to complaints.uk@n26.com(new tab). For the rest of Europe please use complaints@n26.com(new tab).¬†
To file a complaint, please include:
your full name and address
the product or service you're not happy with
a description of your concern
the date in which the problem first appeared
We‚Äôll contact you via email to confirm that we‚Äôve received your complaint and then begin an investigation to find a solution you‚Äôre happy with. In case we need more information from you or we can provide you with an immediate solution, we‚Äôll let you know via email as well.
In case we‚Äôre not able to find a solution you‚Äôre happy with, you can escalate your complaint to an independent third party. You have a few options:
An arbitration body is available to you at the German Federal Bank (Deutsche Bundesbank).
Or you could file a complaint with the German Federal Financial Supervisory Authority (Bundesanstalt f√ºr Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht).
Also, the European Commission has set up the Online Dispute Resolution (ODR(new tab)) platform to help consumers dispute online contracts out of court.
We are committed to constantly improving our products and services. Your feedback makes this possible.

title: Comment activer ma carte ?
content:
Utiliser la version digitale de votre carte avant sa livraison
M√™me si vous n‚Äôavez pas encore re√ßu votre carte N26, vous pouvez d√©j√† l‚Äôutiliser avec Google Pay ou Apple Pay. Cette fonctionnalit√© est utilisable pendant 30 jours √† partir de la date de la commande de votre carte. D√®s que vous l‚Äôaurez re√ßue, activez-la depuis votre application mobile ou votre espace client en ligne en suivant les indications ci-dessous. Une fois votre carte activ√©e, vous pourrez continuer √† utiliser Apple Pay ou Google Pay normalement. Si vous n‚Äôactivez pas votre carte physique avant la fin de ce d√©lai, vous ne pourrez temporairement plus utiliser les paiements mobiles - jusqu‚Äô√† ce que vous l‚Äôactiviez.¬†

Activer votre carte √† sa r√©ception
Pour utiliser votre carte, vous devez l‚Äôactiver d√®s sa r√©ception. Pour cela, vous pouvez vous rendre sur l‚Äôapplication mobile une fois celle-ci¬†synchronis√©e √† votre smartphone, puis dans G√©rer > Param√®tres de votre carte > Activer.
Vous pouvez √©galement activer votre carte depuis la version web de l'application(nouvel onglet) en allant dans Mon Compte > Cartes > Activer.
Pour activer votre carte vous devez en entrer le num√©ro token. Il se compose de 10 chiffres et se trouve sous votre nom, √† l‚Äôavant de votre carte si vous avez un compte N26 standard ou N26 Business, et √† l‚Äôarri√®re de votre carte si vous avez un compte N26 You, N26 Metal ou une carte Maestro.
Si vous avez plusieurs cartes en votre possession, dans le cas o√π vous avez command√© votre carte plusieurs fois par exemple, vous ne pourrez activer que la carte la plus r√©cente. En effet, vous ne pouvez avoir qu‚Äôune seule carte active par compte N26 (sauf pour l‚ÄôAllemagne et l‚ÄôAutriche o√π les clients peuvent √©galement utiliser une carte Maestro).
Ces √©tapes sont n√©cessaires √† chaque fois que vous recevez une nouvelle carte, que ce soit suite au passage √† une autre formule de compte ou simplement en cas de carte vol√©e, perdue ou cass√©e.
Vous pouvez, apr√®s avoir activ√© votre carte, choisir vous-m√™me votre¬†code PIN¬†(code confidentiel √† 4 chiffres, demand√© pour vos retraits et vos paiements).
Si vous r√©sidez en France, Estonie, Espagne, Finlande, Gr√®ce, Irlande ou au Royaume-Uni vous devrez effectuer un premier retrait √† un distributeur de billets.¬†Vous pourrez ensuite commencer √† utiliser votre carte pour effectuer des paiements en ligne ou sans contacts.
Vous pr√©f√©rez une vid√©o plut√¥t qu'un texte ? Regardez le tutoriel(nouvel onglet) sur notre cha√Æne YouTube N26 Support.(nouvel onglet)

title: CRS - Pourquoi avons-nous besoin d‚Äôinformations de votre part ?
content:
N26 en tant qu'√©tablissement de cr√©dit est, selon la norme d‚Äô√©change automatique de renseignements (CRS en anglais), tenue de communiquer directement aux autorit√©s fiscales de l'Union Europ√©enne des informations sur les comptes financiers d√©tenus par des clients r√©sidents fiscaux dans un autre pays.
CRS signifie Common Reporting Standard ou Echange Automatique de Renseignements. Le CRS a √©t√© √©labor√© par l'Organisation de coop√©ration et de d√©veloppement √©conomiques (OCDE) et est une norme mondiale de d√©claration pour l'√©change automatique . d'informations (AEOI). L'objectif de CRS est de permettre aux autorit√©s fiscales d'avoir une meilleure compr√©hension des actifs financiers d√©tenus √† l'√©tranger par leurs r√©sidents √† des fins fiscales pour lutter contre la fraude fiscale. Plus de 90 pays ont accept√© de partager des informations sur les actifs et les revenus des r√©sidents en conformit√© avec CRS.
Afin que nous puissions d√©terminer avec pr√©cision si un compte doit √™tre d√©clar√© aux autorit√©s fiscales aux fins de CRS, nous devons vous demander :
¬†Le(s) pays dans le(s)quel(s) vous √™tes imposable
Vous √™tes normalement ¬´r√©sident fiscal¬ª et donc soumis √† l'imp√¥t sur vos revenus dans le pays o√π vous avez un logement. Si vous avez un endroit o√π vivre dans plus d'un pays, il existe normalement des ¬´r√®gles de d√©partage¬ª incluses dans les conventions de double imposition et les lois fiscales des pays concern√©s qui vous aident √† d√©terminer o√π vous √™tes un r√©sident fiscal. Il se peut que vous soyez r√©sident fiscal dans plus d'un pays au cours d'une ann√©e et, dans l'affirmative, nous aurions besoin de conna√Ætre le pays et votre num√©ro d'identification fiscale pour chacun d'eux afin de communiquer des informations exactes aux autorit√©s fiscales comp√©tentes.

Votre num√©ro d‚Äôidentification fiscale (NIF) pour chaque pays dans lequel vous √™tes fiscalement rattach√©
L‚Äôattribution et le format d‚Äôun NIF diff√®rent d‚Äôun pays √† l‚Äôautre. Si vous r√©sidez au sein de l‚ÄôUnion Europ√©enne, vous pourrez trouver le votre en consultant ce guide(nouvel onglet) mis √† disposition par la Commission Europ√©enne.
Si votre situation fiscale vient √† changer, vous pourrez √† tout moment modifier les informations concern√©es depuis votre application mobile. Pour cela, allez dans la rubrique Mon Compte > Param√®tres > Param√®tres personnels > Informations fiscales.

title: What does N26 do with my tax information?
content:
The OECD requires certain tax information to be shared by means of the Common Reporting Standard(new tab) (ECR). To carry out our obligations, we must establish which country you‚Äôre taxable in. We do this through your tax identification or National Insurance number. 
We forward this information via the German Federal Tax Office to tax authorities in other countries if: 
You live in a ECR participating country.
You have a postbox or a second registered address in another ECR participating country.
When registering you gave a telephone number belonging to another ECR participating country.
You have a standing order, or make regular payments, to an account located in another ECR participating country.
We also forward data to the U.S. Internal Revenue Service(new tab) (IRS) according to the Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act(new tab) (FATCA). We may request your Social Security Number (SSN) in order to check your tax status in the U.S. because:
You are a citizen of the U.S (including dual citizenship).
When registering you gave a telephone number belonging to the U.S.
You were born in the U.S. (or in a U.S. embassy located abroad).
You‚Äôre married to a U.S. national.
You gave us an address in the U.S.
You make regular payment transfers to the U.S.
To update your tax identification or social security number in the N26 app:
Go to  My Account and tap on Settings and Account settings
Select Personal settings then Tax information
Select the country in which you‚Äôre tax-liable
Enter either your tax identification number or your social security number
Important information
In Germany, we need your Steueridentifikationsnummer (11 digits) not your Steuernummer (9 digits).
If you‚Äôre not tax-liable in another country, contact us so we can confirm your tax status.
In each and every case your personal data will be securely stored and only used for the fulfillment of ECR and FATCA requirements.
We‚Äôre unable to advise you on your tax status. If you‚Äôre unsure of your status please discuss the matter with a tax advisor.
If you‚Äôve entered the country in which you are liable for tax but not your tax identification number, please remove the country from the list shown to you in the app, reenter the country, and enter your tax identification number again.

Ten en cuenta que eliminar un contacto no significa borrar el historial de transacciones que has tenido con √©l.

title: Custom Audiences
content:
Data Processing in the framework of Facebook Custom Audiences
Custom Audiences allows us to exclude you, as an existing N26 customer, from our advertisements. We do not want to display irrelevant ads to you. Furthermore, it allows us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other Facebook users. These so called ‚ÄúLookalike-Audiences‚Äù are more similar to our customers than the average Facebook user.¬†
In order to profit from the benefits as described above we provide a hashed version of your N26 email address to Facebook. The so-called ‚Äúhashing‚Äù is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. Facebook then matches this email address against your potential Facebook email address. After the matching, regardless of whether it was successful or not, any hashed email addresses are deleted within 6-8 hours by Facebook. Facebook does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. You can find this and further information in the terms of Facebook Custom Audiences(new tab).
You can revoke your consent according to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR to this data processing in the N26 web app at any time.

title: Quel est le d√©lai habituel d'un virement SEPA ?
content:
Toutes les transactions bancaires sur votre compte N26, qu‚Äôelles soient entrantes ou sortantes, sont r√©gies par le r√©seau de paiement europ√©en appel√© SEPA.
Les virements et les pr√©l√®vements automatiques vers et √† partir de comptes SEPA doivent √™tre ex√©cut√©s dans un d√©lai d'un jour ouvrable bancaire. Cette r√®gle s'applique √† tous les virements nationaux et internationaux d'un compte SEPA √† un autre.
Notez que, selon les horaires d‚Äôouverture des banques participantes, un jour bancaire ouvrable peut repr√©senter jusqu'√† deux jours ouvr√©s.
Nous traitons tous les virements SEPA via le syst√®me TARGET2(nouvel onglet) du lundi au vendredi de 7:00 √† 18:00 (hors jours f√©ri√©s allemands*).
Si vous effectuez un virement juste avant un weekend ou un jour f√©ri√©, le d√©lai de son traitement sera l√©g√®rement prolong√©.¬†

Ainsi, comme nous traitons les virements du lundi au vendredi et que la plupart des banques fran√ßaises traitent les virements du mardi au samedi : si un de vos proches vous envoie un virement un dimanche depuis une banque fran√ßaise, celle-ci l‚Äôex√©cutera g√©n√©ralement le mardi. Cela signifie qu‚Äôil arrivera au plus tard sur votre compte N26 le jeudi, entre 7:00 et 18:00.

Comme nous sommes une banque en temps r√©el, nous cr√©ditons votre compte N26 d√®s que nous recevons votre virement.¬†
Nous n'avons pas de visibilit√© sur le statut des virements que vous attendez, avant qu'ils n'arrivent sur votre compte.
Par exemple, si vous attendez un virement pour un remboursement, un paiement ou encore pour des prestations sociales (CAF, etc.), N26 ne pourra malheureusement pas vous renseigner. Si vous attendez votre virement √† une date pr√©cise, veuillez noter que si cette date est un dimanche ou un jour f√©ri√©, il est normal que vous receviez votre virement plus tard.¬†
Si votre virement n‚Äôest toujours pas arriv√© apr√®s 3 jours ouvr√©s, nous vous invitons √† contacter son exp√©diteur afin d‚Äôobtenir plus d‚Äôinformations.
Si le virement que vous avez effectu√© semble hors d√©lais, nous vous invitons √† contacter directement la banque √©mettrice afin de lancer une investigation bancaire.¬†
Nous ne pouvons pas proc√©der √† une investigation bancaire pour un virement entrant, seule la banque √©mettrice du virement peut vous aider.¬†
En revanche, vous pouvez consulter ici¬†les raisons pour lesquelles un virement peut √©chouer(nouvel onglet). 

Vous pouvez √©galement utiliser les virements¬†MoneyBeam pour envoyer et recevoir de l'argent instantan√©ment entre utilisateurs N26.
Ces virements sont d√©bit√©s et cr√©dit√©s en temps r√©el entre comptes N26. Pour effectuer un MoneyBeam, il suffit de choisir la personne √† qui vous envoyez de l‚Äôargent depuis votre liste de contacts dans l‚Äôapplication N26. Ensuite, il vous sera demand√© de confirmer la transaction sur votre application mobile en entrant votre code de validation.

* Jours f√©ri√©s en Allemagne - Berlin en 2020 :
     - 01.01.2020 (jour de l‚Äôan)
     - 08.03.2020 (journ√©e internationale des droits des femmes)
     - 10.04.2020 (vendredi saint)
     - 13.04.2020 (lundi de P√¢ques)
     - 01.05.2020 (f√™te du Travail)
     - 08.05.2020 (Comm√©moration de la fin de la Seconde Guerre Mondiale)
     - 21.05.2020 (Ascension)
     - 01.06.2020 (Whit Monday)
     - 03.10.2020 (R√©unification allemande)
     - 25 et 26.12.2020 (No√´l)

title: ¬øC√≥mo funciona MoneyBeam?
content:
MoneyBeam te permite enviar dinero a tus contactos a trav√©s de tu smartphone sin necesidad de usar sus datos bancarios. Para ello, inicia sesi√≥n en la app:
Desde la pantalla principal pulsa sobre la pesta√±a de ''Gestionar''.
Seleciona ''Hacer un MoneyBeam''.
Selecciona un contacto de tu lista o introduce el destinatario de forma manual utilizando su n√∫mero de tel√©fono o direcci√≥n de correo. Para que funcione, tu contacto tiene que tener cuenta de N26 y estar visible.¬†
Selecciona una cantidad y mensaje de referencia.
Confirma con tu¬†PIN de confirmaci√≥n¬†y el¬†mensaje push¬†que recibir√°s.
Los clientes de N26 recibir√°n la transferencia de forma instant√°nea. Puedes enviar hasta 1000‚Ç¨ cada 24 horas. 
¬øQuieres ganar dinero hablando de nosotros a tus amigos? Consigue 15 ‚Ç¨ por cada amigo al que invites a unirse a N26. Inf√≥rmate m√°s sobre nuestro programa¬†Invita a un amigo.

title: How do I return a SEPA transfer to its sender?
content:
From the 17th March, customers from other banks can request‚Äîat their bank institution‚Äîthe return of a SEPA transfer from an N26 customer.
The sender of a SEPA transfer can now request the recall of their funds from the receiving N26 account by reaching out to the sender bank. This request appears to N26 customers in the form of a push notification on their paired device. Similarly to confirming a debit transfer in the N26 app, you‚Äôll then have the option to reject or accept the credit transfer recall.
If you do not confirm or reject the transfer recall request after 15 days, the request is rejected automatically. Once the transfer recall is accepted, the funds will leave your account and you cannot request them back. If you don‚Äôt have sufficient funds in your Main Account, you‚Äôll not be able to confirm the transfer recall.

content:

title: What to do if my N26 IBAN is not accepted?
content:
Your IBAN includes the DE country code, a two-digit check number, the eight-digit bank sort code, and your ten-digit account number. For example:¬†DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.
The participating countries of the SEPA area (Single Euro Payments Area) have agreed on the IBAN system in order to simplify national and international payments, and to reduce the risk of error in the communication and processing of transactions.
Merchants or employers who do not accept IBANs from other member states of the European Economic Area are violating European law as of 1 February 2016 (Article 9 of¬†Regulation No 260/2012(new tab)).
If you are ever affected by IBAN discrimination, please¬†contact your relevant national authority(new tab) directly and notify them. Provide your contact details, the name of the merchant or company that didn‚Äôt accept your IBAN, as well as a brief description of the incident (including a screenshot of the rejection or other documentation of your communication with them).

title: Comment d√©clarer son compte N26 aux imp√¥ts fran√ßais ?
content:
(S‚Äôapplique aux r√©sidents fran√ßais)
Conform√©ment au Code g√©n√©ral des imp√¥ts, vous √™tes tenu de d√©clarer tout compte bancaire ouvert √† l‚Äô√©tranger si vous l'avez ouvert, utilis√© ou ferm√© au cours de l'ann√©e pour laquelle vous d√©clarez vos revenus. Cela s‚Äôapplique donc pour votre compte N26.
Cela signifie que si vous avez ouvert votre compte N26 en d√©cembre 2017, vous devez d√©clarer votre compte lors de votre d√©claration de revenus gagn√©s en 2017, en 2018. De la m√™me fa√ßon, si vous avez ouvert votre compte en mars 2018, vous devrez le d√©clarer avec vos revenus de 2018, en 2019.
Pour ce faire :
Dans votre d√©claration d'imp√¥ts, vous devez cocher la case ¬´ Compte √©tranger ouvert, utilis√© ou ferm√© ¬ª (8UU)
Vous pourrez ensuite remplir et joindre le document Cerfa n¬∞ 3916(nouvel onglet) √† votre d√©claration fiscale.
Retrouvez une aide d√©taill√©e, √©tape par √©tape, en lisant l'article de notre blog(nouvel onglet) pr√©vu √† cet effet.

title: Comment commander une nouvelle carte ?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è La livraison de votre carte peut prendre jusqu‚Äô√† 10 jours ouvr√©s. Les d√©lais de livraison vers les pays suivants peuvent varier : Espagne, Estonie, Gr√®ce, Italie, Pays-Bas, Portugal, Slovaquie et Gr√®ce.¬†
S‚Äôil s‚Äôagit de la livraison de votre premi√®re carte N26 et que le d√©lai de livraison est d√©pass√©, veuillez nous contacter sur le Livechat depuis votre espace en ligne ou votre application mobile N26 pour que nous puissions la recommander.
Pour toutes autres raisons, veuillez commander une nouvelle carte depuis votre application. 
Avant de commander une nouvelle carte, veuillez-vous assurer que votre adresse de livraison est √† jour.
Vous pouvez mettre √† jour votre adresse de livraison depuis votre application N26 dans la section Mon Compte üë§ > Param√®tres > Param√®tres personnels > Adresse de livraison.
Pour recommander votre carte, rendez-vous dans la section : Mon compte üë§ > Param√®tres de votre carte.
Depuis l‚Äôaper√ßu de vos cartes, glissez votre √©cran vers la gauche jusqu‚Äô√† ce que vous voyez la carte que vous souhaitez commander, puis cliquez sur ‚ÄúRenvoyer‚Äù.
Les cartes N26 Standard, N26 You, N26 Business et N26 Business You vous seront factur√©es 6 ‚Ç¨ pour une livraison standard et 25 ‚Ç¨ pour une livraison Express. Pour les cartes N26 Metal, les frais seront de 45 ‚Ç¨ pour une livraison standard (livraison Express non disponible).

Une fois votre nouvelle carte command√©e, vous pouvez commencer √† l‚Äôutiliser depuis votre smartphone avant m√™me de la recevoir. Pour cela, il vous suffit d‚Äôajouter la version digitale de votre carte √† votre compte Apple Pay ou Google Pay. Cette fonctionnalit√© est utilisable pendant 30 jours √† partir de la date de la commande de votre carte. 
Vous devez, pendant ce d√©lai de 30 jours, activer la version physique de votre carte d√®s sa r√©ception depuis votre application mobile ou votre espace client en ligne. Vous pourrez alors continuer √† utiliser Apple Pay ou Google Pay normalement. Si vous n‚Äôactivez pas votre carte physique avant la fin de ce d√©lai, vous ne pourrez temporairement plus utiliser les paiements mobiles - jusqu‚Äô√† ce que vous l‚Äôactiviez.

title: PSD2 - Open Banking for Third Party Providers
content:
We are partnering with Token.io(new tab) to provide and support a dedicated interface for third-party payment service providers (''TPPs''). The complete documentation and the on-boarding instructions can be found in the Token.io developer portal(new tab). 
As part of its legal obligations under PSD2, N26 has implemented a contingency mechanism, which provides the following: 
Reliable identification of a TPP via possession of a valid Qualified Website Authentication Certificate (QWAC);

Secure and authorised access to an account
TPPs may access our contingency mechanism via the following URLs:
https://aisp.tech26.de
https://pisp.tech26.de
Access to the above URL and establishing the TLS connection requires implementation of a qualified certificate.
Please find the detailed technical documentation for the fallback interface below:
AISP Fallback Documentation(new tab)
PISP Fallback Documentation(new tab)
TPPs may contact N26 via open.banking@n26.com to provide their QWAC certificates and get technical support.
The reports below compare the availability and performance of our PSD2 dedicated interface with the N26 user interface:
3rd quarter of 2019(new tab)
4th quarter of 2019(new tab)

title: How to file a complaint?
content:
If you ever feel dissatisfied with one of our products or services, our support team is here to help. Please tell us more about the problem you're facing in relation to your N26 account. 
You can send us an email from your registered address to reclamaciones.es@n26.com or send your feedback by post.
If you opened your account before April 17th 2019 and therefore your IBAN starts with DE, the email must be sent to reclamaciones@n26.com instead.
To file a complaint, please include:
your full name and address
the product or service you're not happy with
a description of your concern
the date in which the problem first appeared
We will contact you via email to confirm that we've received your complaint. Then, we will begin an investigation to find a solution you‚Äôre happy with. In case we need more information from you or we can provide you with an immediate solution, we'll let you know via email as well. If we are facing any delays by waiting for further information, it may affect the date by which we can resolve your complaint.
Our final response will explain to you whether or not your complaint has been upheld and the reason why.
We will send our final response over to you within 15 business days, following the day that we received your complaint. If for any reason we couldn't provide a final response within that time, we'll send you an email to explain why there's a delay and provide another date by which you can expect to receive the resolution. Our final response will be sent out no later than 35 days if your IBAN is German and one month if your IBAN is Spanish, following the date we received your complaint.
In case we're not able to find a solution you're happy with, you can escalate your complaint to the Banco de Espa√±a by contacting their complaint service Departamento de Conducta de Mercado y Reclamaciones(new tab), located in calle Alcal√° 48, 28014 Madrid.
Here you can find the legal references:
EU Online Dispute Resolution(new tab)
General Rules of transaction transparency and customer protection(new tab)
We are committed to constantly improving our products and services. Your feedback makes this possible. Thank you.

title: Warum funktioniert meine Foto-Verifizierung nicht?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†gilt f√ºr alle Regionen au√üer Deutschland
Vergewissere dich zuerst, ob deine Ortungsdienste aktiviert sind. Dann sieh dir diese kurze¬†Anleitung(neuen Tab) an, in der wir dir erkl√§ren wie du das perfekte Foto machst. 
Die meisten¬†Foto-Verifizierungen¬†scheitern an einer schlechten Bildqualit√§t.
F√ºhre den Prozess in einer hellen Umgebung durch und verwende ein Smartphone mit einer guten Kamera.
Falls du ein Android-Ger√§t verwendest, gehe sicher dass der Auto-Fokus richtig eingestellt ist.
Schalte den Blitz aus. 
Nimm das Selfie auf Augenh√∂he auf.
Stelle sicher, dass du die einzige Person auf dem Foto bist.
√úberpr√ºfe dein Ausweisdokument.
Wir akzeptieren nur Fotos deines Originalausweises (Kopien oder Screenshots sind nicht zul√§ssig).
Lege deinen Ausweis auf eine ebene Oberfl√§che und stelle sicher, dass er vollst√§ndig sichtbar ist und die Ausweisdaten gut lesbar sind.
Wir k√∂nnen nur nationale Ausweise und Reisep√§sse akzeptieren (F√ºhrerscheine oder Aufenthaltsgenehmigungen sind nicht zul√§ssig).
Stelle sicher, dass dein Ausweisdokument unbesch√§digt ist.
Wenn du deinen Ausweis abfotografiert und das Selfie gemacht hast, aber der erste Versuch fehlschl√§gt, kannst du einfach nochmal von vorne anfangen.
Sobald deine Identit√§tspr√ºfung abgeschlossen ist, senden wir dir deine N26 Mastercard zu. Die Lieferzeit betr√§gt 10 Tage.
Du erreichst uns im Chat von Montag bis Sonntag von 07:00-23:00 Uhr.

title: How to create a Shared Space?
content:
To create a Shared Space:
Create a Space and tap it in the Spaces overview.

Tap the + icon in the top right-hand corner of the page.

Read the ‚ÄòLearn more‚Äô information and tap the ‚ÄòInvite new member‚Äô button.

Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you wish to invite. If the person you want to invite has an N26 account but doesn't show up in the contact list, we recommend that you ask them to check if they agreed to be visible to others N26 users via the app, in the My Account section > Settings > Personal Setting > Personal Information.

If needed, enter their full name as we have it listed.

Review the information on the Grant power of attorney page (the legal screen). Once you‚Äôve read and agreed to the T&Cs, tick the box and tap the ‚ÄòAccept power of attorney‚Äô button.

Enter your Confirmation PIN.

Tap on the relevant participant in the list of participants.

Confirm the ‚ÄòSend Invite‚Äô push notification on your paired mobile device.

What are Shared Spaces?
How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?

title: How to add or remove Shared Space participants?
content:
For an owner to remove a participant from a Shared Space:
In the Space overview, tap the menu indicated by the 3 dots in the top right.
From the ‚ÄòParticipants‚Äô list, tap on the arrow to the right of the relevant participant‚Äôs name (iOS). Android users can just simply tap on the participant's name.
Tap ‚Äòrevoke power of attorney‚Äô.
¬†Confirm the notification on the next screen and tap ‚Äòrevoke power of attorney‚Äô.¬†

Accept an invitation and join a Shared Space:
In the Spaces overview, tap the Space with ‚ÄòPending‚Äô and the Shared Space icon. 
Read the Shared Space summary and continue to the Power of Attorney screen.
Once you‚Äôve read and understood the information on the Power of Attorney page (the legal screen), tick the box and tap the ‚ÄòAccept power of attorney‚Äô button.
Enter your Confirmation PIN.
Confirm the ‚ÄòAccept Power of Attorney‚Äô push notification on your paired mobile device
You‚Äôll need to have enough free Space(s) to accept an invitation to a Shared Space. If not, you can only proceed if you delete other Space(s) to free up ‚Ä¶ Space.
You must also not have any open Space with the same name or image as the Shared Space. You can only accept the invitation to join a Shared Space once you change the name/image of the other Space(s).

To leave a Shared Space:
In the Space overview, tap the menu indicated by the 3 dots in the top right.
Inside the settings tap on ‚ÄòExit Shared Space‚Äô.
Confirm the notification on the next screen and tap ‚ÄòLeave the Space‚Äô.
A Shared Space can be created and modified within the N26 app or Webapp

title: Cosa fare se il mio IBAN N26 non √® accettato?
content:
L‚ÄôIBAN include il codice paese DE, due cifre di controllo, le otto cifre del codice sort della banca e le dieci cifre del tuo numero di conto. Per esempio: DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.
I paesi aderenti dell‚Äôarea SEPA (Single Euro Payments Area - Area unica dei pagamenti in euro) hanno concordato il sistema IBAN per semplificare i pagamenti nazionali e internazionali e ridurre il rischio di errore nelle comunicazione e nell‚Äôelaborazione delle transazioni.
I commercianti e i datori di lavoro che non accettano i codici IBAN di altri Stati membri dell‚ÄôArea Economica Europea violano la legge europea del 1¬∞ febbraio 2016 (Articolo 9 del Regolamento UE 260/2012 (nuova tabella)).
Se hai subito discriminazioni sulla base dell‚ÄôIBAN, contatta direttamente l'autorit√† nazionale(nuova tabella) competente del tuo Paese¬†(nuova tabella)e denuncia l‚Äôepisodio. Fornisci i tuoi contatti, il nome del commerciante o dell'azienda che non ha accettato l‚ÄôIBAN e una breve descrizione dell‚Äôaccaduto (incluso uno screenshot del rifiuto o altra documentazione rilevante).

title: How to protect my account?
content:
The security of your account and your personal data is our top priority.
If you ever feel that your N26 login may be compromised or that someone is trying to initiate a chat on your behalf, it‚Äôs crucial to immediately change your N26 account password.
To do so, log into the app and go to My Account > Settings > Security. Please choose a secure password(new tab) and don‚Äôt reveal your login details to anyone.
As the account holder, you and only you should create and have access to your login details. For further advice on identity protection, we encourage you to visit our article How to protect my identity?
If you believe that your account has been compromised or tampered in any way then please get in touch with us immediately.

If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126.

title: Come riordinare una carta?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Le¬†consegne richiedono fino a 15 giorni lavorativi. In alcune aree specifiche dei seguenti paesi (Estonia, Grecia, Italia, Olanda, Portogallo, Slovacchia e Spagna) potrebbero richiedere pi√π tempo. 
Se stai attendendo la consegna della tua prima carta N26 e sono trascorsi pi√π di 15 giorni lavorativi da quando hai verificato la tua identit√†, contattaci via chat. 
In ogni altro caso, puoi ordinare una carta N26 direttamente dalla app in questo modo:
Controlla e, se necessario, modifica il tuo indirizzo di spedizione accedendo a üë§ Il mio Conto > Impostazioni >Impostazioni personali > indirizzo di spedizione.
Ordina una nuova carta tramite¬† Gestisci > Impostazioni della Carta.
Dalla lista delle tue carte, scorri verso il basso finch√© non troverai la carta che desideri e poi seleziona Riordina.
Ti informiamo che le carte sostitutive N26 Standard e N26 You hanno un costo di ‚Ç¨6 per la spedizione standard e di ‚Ç¨25 per la spedizione express.¬†
Le carte sostitutive N26 Metal prevedono un costo di ‚Ç¨45 per spedizione standard. Non √® prevista la spedizione express per le carte N26 Metal.
Potrebbe essere di tuo interesse sapere che quando avrai completato l‚Äôordine di una carta, ne potrai utilizzare subito la versione digitale mentre attendi la consegna della carta fisica.¬†
Se desideri usufruire di questa possibilit√†, aggiungi la versione digitale della tua carta al tuo portafoglio digitale (Apple /Google Wallet). Questa funzione sar√† disponibile solo per 30 giorni a partire dal momento in cui la carta √® stata ordinata. In questo lasso di tempo riceverai la carta fisica e dovrai attivarla tramite l‚Äôapp di N26 per poter continuare ad usarla nel tuo portafoglio digitale ed usufruire di tutte le altre funzionalit√† della carta.
Questa funzione non √® disponibile per clienti che ordinano una nuova carta oppure passano ad un‚Äôaltra tipologia di conto senza bloccare la carta gi√† in loro possesso. In questi casi la loro carta continuer√† a funzionare con Apple Pay/Google Pay finch√© non verr√† attivata quella nuova.

content:

title: Discount Perks
content:
Partners this applies to:¬†8fit,¬†Blinkist, Fiverr,¬†Headout,¬†Skill Yoga, and Udemy
"How do I sign up for a Discount Perk?"
Signing up for a Discount Partner is very simple and is accomplished via the mobile or web app.¬†

The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. title: Dove trovo il mio IBAN o il numero di conto?
content:
Puoi visualizzare l‚ÄôIBAN e il nostro numero BIC sul tuo estratto conto. In alternativa, li troverai nella sezione¬†üë§ Il mio conto¬†dell'app mobile o¬†WebApp(nuova tabella).
Puoi condividere facilmente questi due dati tramite il tasto Condividi. Se necessario, puoi scaricare le informazioni relative al tuo conto bancario in formato PDF accedendo alla¬†WebApp(nuova tabella)¬†e selezionando l‚Äôicona a forma di nuvola nell‚Äôangolo in alto a destra.
I nostri IBAN italiani sono costituiti da 27 caratteri: iniziano con IT (codice Paese), poi seguono il codice di controllo di regolarit√†, il CIN, l'ABI e il CAB. Le ultime 12 cifre corrispondono al numero del conto.
I nostri IBAN tedeschi sono composti da 22 caratteri  e iniziano con DE seguito dal codice di controllo di regolarit√†, poi dal nostro¬†codice banca¬†10011001 e terminano con il tuo¬†numero di conto¬†a 10 cifre (inizia dal 26).
Preferisci vederlo tramite un video? Dai un'occhiata ai nostri tutorial (nuova tabella)sul nostro canale di assistenza YouTube(nuova tabella).

title: PSD2 - un Open Banking seguro
content:
La Segunda Directiva de Servicios de Pago (PSD2, por sus siglas en ingl√©s) es una directiva europea actualizada que te permite acceder a la informaci√≥n de tu cuenta e iniciar pagos de forma segura a trav√©s de terceros proveedores regulados.¬†
Esto significa que puedes permitir que terceros proveedores accedan a la informaci√≥n de tu cuenta a trav√©s de una interfaz creada para conseguir lo siguiente:
Habilitar un servicio de informaci√≥n sobre cuentas (AIS, por sus siglas en ingl√©s) para extraer los datos de tus cuentas bancarias y luego agruparlos y gestionarlos desde un mismo sitio a trav√©s de terceros proveedores;¬†
Pagar de forma segura en cualquier caja o p√°gina web que tenga Servicio de Iniciaci√≥n de Pagos (SIP).
Del intercambio de datos se encarga nuestro socio Token.io.
Al utilizar un servicio de pago provisto por terceros como un servicio de informaci√≥n de cuentas o un servicio de iniciaci√≥n de pagos, Token.io te redirigir√° a la app de N26 para que confirmes la solicitud de acceso.
En nuestra Pol√≠tica de Privacidad(pesta√±a nueva) te informamos sobre la finalidad, las partes involucradas y las bases legales del procesamiento de datos necesario para cumplir con nuestras obligaciones de acuerdo con los nuevos cambios de la directiva europea de servicios de pago.
¬øPor qu√© no puedo asociar mi cuenta con cualquier tercero proveedor?
¬†Si un tercero proveedor no ha adoptado nuestra interfaz dedicada, este tendr√° que hacerlo directamente con nuestro socio Token.io.
¬†¬øC√≥mo puedo revocar una autorizaci√≥n de acceso que conced√≠ a un tercero proveedor con anterioridad?
¬†En este caso, tienes que contactar directamente con el proveedor correspondiente y solicitar la revocaci√≥n del permiso que le hab√≠as concedido.¬†
* Esta informaci√≥n aplica a todos los pa√≠ses del Espacio Econ√≥mico Europeo.

title: Comment d√©finir mon code PIN ?
content:
Nous ne vous envoyons pas votre code PIN par la poste.¬†Vous choisissez vous-m√™me le code PIN de votre Mastercard ou Maestro (si applicable), apr√®s avoir synchronis√© votre t√©l√©phone √† votre compte puis activ√© votre carte.
Pour changer votre code PIN :
Allez dans G√©rer (depuis l'application) ou Mon compte (depuis la version web(nouvel onglet))
Puis dans Param√®tres de votre carte (depuis l‚Äôapplication) ou R√©glages de ma carte (depuis la version web)
Cliquez sur R√©initialiser le code PIN (depuis un iPhone) ou Changer PIN (depuis un Android ou la version web)
Entrez votre token √† 10 chiffres. Il se trouve en dessous de votre nom ou au dos de votre carte
Choisissez votre nouveau code PIN et confirmez la modification
Informations importantes :
Pour des raisons de s√©curit√©, nous n‚Äôacceptons pas les codes PIN contenant des √©l√©ments de votre date de naissance. Nous n‚Äôacceptons pas les codes PIN comportant 4 fois le m√™me chiffre ou des suites de chiffres (1111, 1234 ou 4321). Si le code PIN que vous choisissez est refus√©, nous vous invitons √† essayer une autre combinaison de chiffres.
Si vous r√©sidez en France, Estonie, Espagne, Finlande, Gr√®ce, Irlande ou au Royaume-Uni vous devrez effectuer un premier paiement en ins√©rant la carte dans le terminal et en utilisant le code PIN. Vous pouvez √©galement effectuer un retrait ou une demande de solde √† un distributeur de billets.¬†Vous pourrez ensuite commencer √† utiliser votre carte pour effectuer des paiements en ligne ou sans contacts.
Si un code PIN incorrect est entr√© 3 fois de suite, votre carte sera automatiquement bloqu√©e. Il vous faudra alors contacter le Service Client depuis le Livechat de votre application afin de la d√©bloquer.
Votre code PIN est diff√©rent de votre code de validation. Cependant, vous pouvez choisir la m√™me combinaison de chiffres pour ces deux codes.

title: Was kann ich tun, wenn mein Konto gehackt wurde?
content:
Wenn du verd√§chtige Aktivit√§ten auf deinem Konto bemerkst, kontaktiere uns bitte umgehend.
Am schnellsten erreichst du uns im Chat √ºber die App, auf der N26 Website und - wie hier - unter einigen Artikeln im Support Center. Klicke einfach auf Kundenservice-Chat.
Wenn du lieber telefonieren m√∂chtest, sage uns das einfach im Chat. Wir rufen dich innerhalb einer Stunde zur√ºck und besprechen die Situation mit dir. Bitte erkl√§re uns alles genau, jedes Detail kann wichtig sein.
Du kannst sicher sein, dass wir alles tun, um dir in dieser Situation zu helfen.
Um unsere Sicherheitsma√ünahmen auch √ºber unsere gesetzlichen Verpflichtungen hinaus zu verbessern, haben wir ein engagiertes Team, das jeden Betrugsfall genau analysiert.
Die einzelnen F√§lle sind oft sehr komplex, darum dauert eine Analyse oft einige Tage, manchmal mehrere Wochen.
Falls du sicher bist, dass dein Konto gehackt wurde, empfehlen wir dir au√üerdem, sofort eine Strafanzeige zu erstatten,
Mehr dar√ºber, wie wir dein Konto im Betrugsfall sch√ºtzen, erf√§hrst du in unserem Blog(neuen Tab) und in unserem Artikel √ºber Sicherheit bei N26(neuen Tab).

Du erreichst uns im Chat t√§glich von 07:00 - 23:00 Uhr , auch an Sonn- und Feiertagen.
