title: Come bloccare la mia carta N26?
content:
Puoi bloccare e sbloccare le tue carte in qualsiasi momento nell‚Äôapp. Accedi a Gestisci¬†e seleziona¬†Impostazioni Carta. Li puoi decidere se vuoi limitare temporaneamente o disattivare i prelievi bancomat, i pagamenti online o all‚Äôestero, o bloccare del tutto la carta di debito.
In questo modo hai il pieno controllo della tua carta e puoi proteggerti da¬†transazioni non autorizzate. In caso di sospetto, blocca immediatamente la carta. Puoi sempre sbloccarla successivamente.

Se non hai accesso alla app del tuo telefono o alla WebApp, puoi anche chiedere di bloccare la tua carta o il tuo conto chiamandoci al +39 02 124 123 361.

title: How to upgrade to N26 You?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Poland, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden.
You can upgrade to N26 You¬†during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you have a standard N26 bank account. 
To upgrade to N26 You in the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 You. You can choose between one of our five new colours when ordering a new card: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate.
Then choose your preferred delivery method, accept the N26 You T&C's(new tab) and your new card will be on the way. 
Standard deliveries take up to 10 business days whereas express deliveries take 3 business days. 
The membership fee of ‚Ç¨9,90 will be deducted directly from your account every month on the date of your upgrade.
The minimum contract period for the N26 You membership is one year. Your membership will automatically renew unless you cancel it up to four weeks before the contract ends. 
You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 14‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.

title: Where can I use my Maestro card?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Applies to Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands
Let‚Äôs get a couple of things out of the way: your Maestro can‚Äôt be used for online purchases and it‚Äôs not an EC or Girocard (in Germany).
But you can use your card in ATMs or shops where the Maestro symbol is displayed. Each¬†ATM transaction¬†using your Maestro is ‚Ç¨2 (plus a fee of 1,7% of the amount for foreign currency withdrawals).
You can¬†order your Maestro¬†card directly in the app only if you live in Germany, Austria or the Netherlands and have received a transfer of at least 100 ‚Ç¨ from one of these 3 countries.
If you‚Äôre having issues using your Maestro, first check that your¬†card settings¬†are activated. If nothing is blocked, contact Customer Support via chat and we‚Äôll look into it for you.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: Spazi Condivisi - Il beneficiario fidato
content:
Il beneficiario fidato di uno Spazio Condiviso pu√≤:
Trasferire denaro dai propri Spazi (inclusi gli Spazi Condivisi di cui √® partecipante) a uno Spazio Condiviso.
Accedere e liberamente trasferire fondi presenti su uno Spazio Condiviso.
Abbandonare uno Spazio Condiviso in qualunque momento.
I trasferimenti tra un beneficiario fidato e uno Spazio Condiviso non hanno bisogno di essere autenticati tramite notifiche Pin e Push. I beneficiari possono facilmente trascinare denaro tramite app (mobile e web), cos√¨ come con gli Spazi non condivisi.
Perch√© un proprietario o un partecipante deve essere identificato come beneficiario fidato?
Le leggi bancarie europee regolano le modalit√† secondo cui un trasferimento bancario possa essere autorizzato.
Nell‚Äôambito di queste leggi, la SCA (Strong Customer Authentication) definisce i requisiti per rendere i pagamenti online pi√π sicuri.
Un‚Äôeccezione ai requisiti SCA pu√≤ avvenire se un partecipante di uno Spazio Condiviso viene classificato come ‚Äùbeneficiario fidato‚Äù.
Cosa sono gli Spazi Condivisi?
Come posso aggiungere o rimuovere partecipanti da uno Spazio Condiviso?

title: Wie verwende ich Apple Pay?
content:
(Verf√ºgbar in Belgien, D√§nemark, der Slowakei, Deutschland, Estland, Finnland, Frankreich, Griechenland, Irland, Italien, Liechtenstein, Luxemburg, Norwegen, √ñsterreich, Polen, Portugal, Schweden Slowenien, Spanien, in der Schweiz und im Vereinigten K√∂nigreich)
Apple Pay erm√∂glicht dir, mit dem Smartphone zu bezahlen, so dass du deine Mastercard nicht √ºberallhin mitnehmen musst.
Wir haben ein¬†Video(neuen Tab)¬†erstellt, das dir hilft, deine N26 Mastercard mit Apple Pay einzurichten. Hier sind einige Tipps, die du beachten solltest, wenn deine Zahlung nicht funktioniert:
Deine iPhone-Region muss dem Land entsprechen, in das deine Mastercard zuerst geliefert wurde (du kannst deine Region √ºberpr√ºfen, indem du Einstellungen/Allgemein/Sprache und Region auf deinem Handy ausw√§hlst).
Wenn du dein iPhone verloren hast und es nicht mehr √ºber die Funktion¬†Mein iPhone finden wiederfindest, kannst du jederzeit auf deine iCloud zugreifen und alle Apple Pay-Ger√§te √ºber den Webbrowser auf einem Mac oder PC entfernen. Zus√§tzlich solltest du den¬†Verloren-Modusaktivieren, um deine Mastercard f√ºr Apple Pay zu sperren. Zahlungen mit deiner physischen Karte sind weiterhin m√∂glich.
Wenn deine N26 Mastercard unerwartet aus dem Apple Wallet entfernt wird, kann dies daran liegen, dass du dich von deiner iCloud abgemeldet, den Passcode oder die Touch-ID deaktiviert, dein Ger√§t √ºber iTunes auf die Werkseinstellungen zur√ºckgesetzt oder alle Inhalte und Einstellungen von deinem Ger√§t gel√∂scht hast. In allen F√§llen kannst du deine Karte einfach wieder hinzuf√ºgen. Beachte, dass die Karte nicht entfernt wird, wenn du dein Betriebssystem aktualisierst, deine pers√∂nlichen Ger√§teeinstellungen zur√ºcksetzt oder¬†Mein iPhone finden deaktivierst.
F√ºr Eink√§ufe in Gesch√§ften oder online musst du deine Zahlung per Touch ID oder mit deinem Passwort autorisieren. Wenn du Apple Watch verwendest, erfolgen Autorisierungen durch einen Doppelklick auf die seitliche Taste. Und wenn du deinen Mac verwendest, autorisiere deine Zahlung mit der Touch ID √ºber die Touch Bar in der oberen rechten Ecke deiner Tastatur.
Stelle sicher, dass dein Ger√§t die technischen Anforderungen erf√ºllt, indem du den¬†Apple Support (neuen Tab)besuchst: 
iPhone 6 oder neuer, iPhone SE: verf√ºgbar in Apps, Gesch√§ften und online
Apple Watch verkn√ºpft mit iPhone 5 oder neuer: verf√ºgbar in Apps und Gesch√§ften
iPad Pro, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 3, iPad mini 4: verf√ºgbar in Apps und online
Macs ab 2012 (andere Macs als das MacBook Pro mit Touch Bar und Touch ID erfordern ein iPhone oder Apple Watch): verf√ºgbar online

title: Was ist N26 Savings?
content:
Mit N26 Savings kannst du kostenlos ein Festgeldkonto mit einer Einlage zwischen 2.000 ‚Ç¨ und 100.000 ‚Ç¨ er√∂ffnen. Diese Option findest du in der App im Bereich Entdecken und dann unter N26 Finanzprodukte. Du kannst nicht auf den eingezahlten Betrag zugreifen, bis der Sparplan f√§llig wird (6 bis 60 Monate), aber du erh√§ltst w√§hrend dieser Zeit bis zu 1,48 % Zinsen. Danach erh√§ltst du die Auszahlung direkt auf dein N26 Konto.
N26 Savings wird durch die enge Zusammenarbeit von¬†drei Unternehmen(neuen Tab)¬†mit verschiedenen Partnerbanken m√∂glich gemacht. Du musst die AGB aller vier Teilnehmer akzeptieren, um ein Konto zu er√∂ffnen.
Aus regulatorischen Gr√ºnden ben√∂tigen wir Informationen √ºber deinen Steuerstatus. Wenn du in den Vereinigten Staaten steuerpflichtig sind, k√∂nnen wir dir unser Sparprodukt derzeit¬†nicht anbieten.
Du bist m√∂glicherweise zu einer Steuerbefreiung qualifiziert. Ist das der Fall, f√ºlle¬†unser Formular(neuen Tab) aus und chatte mit uns. Wir leiten deine Anfrage an unsere Partnerbank weiter.
Sobald du dein Sparkonto er√∂ffnest, wird der einmalige Betrag von deinem Girokonto abgebucht. Bitte beachte, dass es bis zu sieben Werktage dauern kann, bis dein Konto er√∂ffnet wird.
Wenn der Sparplan ausl√§uft, erh√§ltst du den eingezahlten Betrag und die Zinsen (abz√ºglich eventueller Kapitalertragsteuer) innerhalb von zwei Tagen deinem N26 Konto gutgeschrieben.
Nach europ√§ischem Recht sind alle Mitgliedstaaten verpflichtet, eine¬†Einlagensicherung¬†von bis zu 100.000 ‚Ç¨ pro Person und Bank zu gew√§hren. Damit dieser Schutz bei Wechselkursschwankungen nicht unterschritten wird, haben wir ein zus√§tzliches Limit f√ºr Sparkonten in L√§ndern au√üerhalb der Eurozone festgelegt.
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erhalte 15‚Ç¨ f√ºr jeden Freund, dem du N26 erfolgreich empfiehlst. Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: How to open my N26 account?
content:
You can open an account in the app (on your smartphone) or in N26 for Web(new tab) if you:
are at least 18 years old
are a resident of a supported country
own a compatible smartphone
hold a supported ID (eligibility depends on whether you live in Germany(new tab) or outside of Germany(new tab))
don't already have an account with us
are able to verify yourself in one of our supported languages: English, German, Spanish, Italian, or French. Please note that only English is supported in the UK. 
This is how the sign-up process for an N26 bank account works:
After confirming your email, personal details, and shipping address, select the type of account you want. *
Prove your identity and connect your smartphone to your new account.
As a new signup, you'll be able to top up your account via Bank Transfer or CASH26 deposit (if you are in Germany, Austria or Italy). 
After a few days, you‚Äôll receive your N26 Mastercard by post.
If you'd like more information, here's how you can get in touch with us.
*If you meet our minimum creditworthiness criteria, you can open an N26 account. If you don‚Äôt, we may offer you an N26 Flex account (Germany only). This decision is calculated through an automated process.
We are available from 7:00 to 23:00 everyday, including Sundays and public holidays.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our Refer a Friend Program.

title: How does N26 protect my money?
content: German deposit protection(new tab)¬†insures all deposits¬†up to ‚Ç¨100.000¬†held in the member states of the European Union. Customers with an account in the UK are protected up to the equivalent amount in GBP based on the exchange rate of the respective day. As the holder of a banking license, N26 Bank must comply with the rules of the German financial regulatory authority.

title: How to protect my account?
content:
The security of your account and your personal data is our top priority.
If you ever feel that your N26 login may be compromised or that someone is trying to initiate a chat on your behalf, it‚Äôs crucial to immediately change your N26 account password.
To do so, log into the app and go to My Account > Settings > Security. Please choose a secure password(new tab) and don‚Äôt reveal your login details to anyone.
As the account holder, you and only you should create and have access to your login details. For further advice on identity protection, we encourage you to visit our article How to protect my identity?
If you believe that your account has been compromised or tampered in any way then please get in touch with us immediately.

If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126.

title: Comment ajouter un nouveau b√©n√©ficiaire de virement ?
content:
√Ä chaque fois que vous effectuez un virement vers un nouveau b√©n√©ficiaire depuis l‚Äôapplication (appuyez sur¬†+¬†puis sur¬†Virement¬†et¬†Ajouter un destinataire), certaines informations comme son nom et son IBAN sont automatiquement enregistr√©es dans votre liste de b√©n√©ficiaires de virement pour faciliter vos futures transactions.
Vous pouvez effacer certains b√©n√©ficiaires de virement ou consulter l‚Äôhistorique de vos transactions avec eux :
iOS : Faites glisser le contact √† modifier vers la gauche. Appuyez sur la corbeille pour supprimer le contact, ou sur le symbole de montre pour afficher l'historique des transactions.
Android : Appuyez et maintenez la pression sur un contact pour afficher les options, vous pouvez choisir de le supprimer ou d‚Äôacc√©der √† l'historique des transactions.
La suppression d'un contact ne supprime pas les transactions correspondantes de la liste.

title: Why is N26 secure?
content:
To protect your account, we use a three-layered security architecture:
Secure login.¬†Your login details of both the mobile and¬†WebApp(new tab)¬†consist of a username and password or fingerprint/face recognition (depending on your smartphone). Please choose a¬†secure password¬†and don‚Äôt reveal your login details to anyone.
Confirmation PIN.¬†This¬†4-digit code¬†is required every time you make a transfer or connect/disconnect your phone. You first set it up once you have successfully connected your smartphone to your account. You can then¬†change it¬†in the app yourself after that.
Push messages.¬†For every incoming and outgoing payment, a push message will be sent to your¬†connected smartphone. It's also used to confirm and finalize your transactions. We've also added¬†3D Secure¬†to protect you from online card fraud.
Every time you contact us we‚Äôll ask you some security questions to make sure it's really you. But we‚Äôll never ask for your debit card number, card verification code (CVV), password, or your card or Confirmation PINs.
We‚Äôve also taken steps to protect your data: we store as little information about you as possible, only for as long as we are legally obligated to, and we delete data when it is no longer required for a product or service. You can¬†download your personal data¬†up to 6 months after you close your account. Find more information in our¬†Privacy Policy(new tab).

title: Come modificare il mio PIN di conferma?
content:
Puoi modificare il tuo¬†PIN di conferma¬†in qualsiasi momento nell‚Äôapp:
Accedi al üë§Mio conto e seleziona Impostazioni e Sicurezza (app mobile) o Impostazioni sicurezza (WebApp(nuova tabella))
Seleziona Reimposta il PIN di conferma
Inserisci il numero a 10 cifre della tua Mastercard
Crea e conferma il tuo nuovo PIN di conferma
Se inserisci il PIN di conferma erroneamente 6 volte, dovrai reimpostarlo prima di riprovare.
Per motivi di sicurezza, il PIN non pu√≤ contenere parti della tua data di nascita o del tuo indirizzo, numeri ripetuti (ad es. 1111, 111 o 11) o sequenze (ad es. 1234 o 4321). Se il PIN scelto non viene accettato, riprova con un altro PIN.
Preferisci vederlo tramite un video? Dai un'occhiata ai nostri tutorial(nuova tabella) sul nostro canale di assistenza YouTube.(nuova tabella)

title: Wie kontaktiere ich N26?
content:
Wenn du uns erreichen m√∂chtest, kannst du einen Chat in deiner App, WebApp oder unter einige Support Center-Artikel starten. Da wir eine Online-Bank sind, haben wir keine Filialen.
Vergewissere dich zun√§chst,¬†dass du die neueste App-Version installiert hast. Falls nicht, lade dir das Update im¬†Apple App Store(neuen Tab)¬†oder¬†Google Play Store(neuen Tab)¬†herunter.
Wenn du √ºber die¬†WebApp(neuen Tab)¬†in dein Konto eingeloggt bist, findest du den Chat in der unteren rechten Ecke.
Um von deinem Smartphone zu chatten, gehe zu¬†üë§ Mein Konto¬†und¬†Support. Scrolle nach unten und w√§hle unter¬†Kontakt¬†den¬†Kundendienst-Chat.
Dort wird dir dein Platz in der Warteliste angezeigt. Halte deine Mastercard bereit; das ist zwar optional, aber du bekommst einen schnelleren Service.
Du erreichst uns t√§glich von 07:00 - 23:00 Uhr, auch an Sonn- und Feiertagen.
Bitte kontaktiere uns √ºber diesen Artikel wenn du eine Bank oder eine andere Beh√∂rde vertrittst(neuen Tab).

title: How to create a Shared Space?
content:
To create a Shared Space:
Create a Space and tap it in the Spaces overview.

Tap the + icon in the top right-hand corner of the page.

Read the ‚ÄòLearn more‚Äô information and tap the ‚ÄòInvite new member‚Äô button.

Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you wish to invite. If the person you want to invite has an N26 account but doesn't show up in the contact list, we recommend that you ask them to check if they agreed to be visible to others N26 users via the app, in the My Account section > Settings > Personal Setting > Personal Information.

If needed, enter their full name as we have it listed.

Review the information on the Grant power of attorney page (the legal screen). Once you‚Äôve read and agreed to the T&Cs, tick the box and tap the ‚ÄòAccept power of attorney‚Äô button.

Enter your Confirmation PIN.

Tap on the relevant participant in the list of participants.

Confirm the ‚ÄòSend Invite‚Äô push notification on your paired mobile device.

What are Shared Spaces?
How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?

title: Why can't I get an overdraft?
content:
Many factors are considered toward your¬†creditworthiness¬†including your SCHUFA or CRIF score (we let both know about any overdraft requests). Being a long-time customer or making your N26 account your¬†main account¬†will have a positive impact on your overdraft application.
This decision is an automated process. If you don‚Äôt qualify right now, you can apply again another time when your financial circumstances have changed. 
If you'd like more information, here's how you can get in touch with us.

title: Warum bekomme ich keinen Dispokredit?
content:
In Bezug auf deine Kreditw√ºrdigkeit spielen viele Faktoren eine Rolle, darunter deine SCHUFA- oder CRIF-Eintr√§ge (und wir informieren diese Institute √ºber eventuelle Anfragen nach Dispokrediten). Wenn du schon lange Kunde bist oder dein N26 Konto zu deinem Hauptkonto machst, wird sich das positiv auswirken. 
Das Ergebnis wird automatisch berechnet, wir k√∂nnen es nicht beeinflussen oder √§ndern. Wenn du aktuell die Bedingungen f√ºr einen Dispokredit nicht erf√ºllst, kannst du es einfach zu einem sp√§teren Zeitpunkt noch einmal versuchen.
Falls du mehr Informationen m√∂chtest, kontaktiere uns gerne.

title: How to dispute a transaction?
content:
We understand that disputed charges (also called ‚Äòchargebacks‚Äô) can cost you time and money.
We can only dispute card transactions that are visible in your monthly balance statement and haven‚Äôt been made more than 120 days ago. Please complete the dispute form (EU(new tab)¬†or¬†UK(new tab)) and send it to us. Also, make sure that you:
Complete a separate form for each card payment and sign it
Select only one dispute reason
Attach all¬†additional documents(new tab)

title: Do I pay fees and taxes with N26 Invest?
content:
N26 Invest doesn‚Äôt charge any performance, transaction, or redemption fees. Your N26 Invest plan will incur a few other fees:
Monthly fee.¬†Charged on a quarterly basis and paid directly from the balance in your investment plan. Depending on the size of your total deposits, you‚Äôll either be charged a fixed fee or a percentage fee:

Average total amount of investment / N26 Invest service fee¬†(annually as a % of the total deposits; minimum fee of ‚Ç¨1,90)*
‚Ç¨0 to ‚Ç¨29,999  /  0.99% *
‚Ç¨30,000 to ‚Ç¨49,999  /  0.79% *
‚Ç¨50,000 and more  /  0.49% *

Operating costs.¬†Paid directly out of the deposits in your investment plan. They depend on the investment strategy:
Fund strategy & their respective operating costs:
Invest 80: 0.44% p.a.
Invest 60: 0.40% p.a.
Invest 40: 0.36% p.a.
Taxes.¬†Investments in the capital market may result in capital gains or income from dividends on individual funds. Income that is above the capital gains tax allowance is taxable in Germany. Investments are also subject to the solidarity surcharge and the¬†church tax.
You're taxable in Germany: We‚Äôll automatically deduct all applicable taxes from your total deposits so your potential returns always show the net amount after tax.
You're not taxable in Germany: You‚Äôll receive the gross amount of your income. Then it‚Äôs up to you to file your capital gains tax in the country where you pay tax.
In either case, we‚Äôll automatically generate an annual tax certificate for you in February. You can find it directly in the app under¬†Savings & Investment. You can also find exemption orders and loss certificates for your¬†tax return¬†there.
Find out more about the method for predicting N26 Invest performance.(new tab)

title: ¬øPor qu√© no me ha dado dinero el cajero autom√°tico?
content:
A veces pasa. Vas al cajero autom√°tico, la cantidad solicitada se descuenta de tu saldo, pero el cajero no te da el efectivo.
Lo primero que debes hacer es comprobar los l√≠mites de tu tarjeta entrando en üë§Mi cuenta y seleccionando Configuraci√≥n de Tarjeta. Aseg√∫rate de que las retiradas de efectivo en cajeros est√°n activadas.
Aunque no podamos decir con certeza de qu√© se trata, s√≠ que podemos ayudarte a recuperar tu dinero. La cantidad que se ha restado de tu saldo disponible no es m√°s que una autorizaci√≥n (una reserva o cantidad bloqueada). Como la transacci√≥n no finaliz√≥ con √©xito, la autorizaci√≥n caducar√° en unas horas o en un m√°ximo de 12 d√≠as h√°biles y el dinero volver√° a tu cuenta.
Si en 12 d√≠as el dinero no ha sido desbloqueado, por favor rellena el¬†formulario de disputa¬†y nosotros haremos todo lo que est√© en nuestras manos para recuperar tu dinero.
Mientras tanto, te sugerimos que pruebes con otro cajero autom√°tico de un operador diferente. Rara vez se da esta situaci√≥n dos veces seguidas.

title: How does N26 Business You work?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Sweden.
It‚Äôs not yet possible to switch between private and business accounts so it‚Äôs important to know if N26 Business You is right for you:
The N26 Business You account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can‚Äôt have your company‚Äôs name on the account or card. 
The account is ‚Ç¨9,90 per month. The minimum membership is one year. Your contract automatically renews if you do not cancel your membership(new tab) at least 4 weeks before the contract expires.  
The premium account includes: Allianz Insurance Package including coverage for business purposes and fee-free foreign currency ATM withdrawals, 
The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. It‚Äôs currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (it‚Äôs available in Germany and Austria, and the Netherlands).
Transfers in foreign currencies aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business You.
You can sign-up during registration or if you‚Äôre already an N26 Business user.
You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 14‚Ç¨ through your N26 app. 
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: Why hasn't my referral bonus arrived?
content:
Once your friend has completed all the eligibility criteria of our¬†Refer a Friend Program, we'll verify your reward. You can always sign in to your account in the app or¬†WebApp(new tab)¬†to check your reward status.
In most cases the referral bonus isn‚Äôt rewarded because the invited friend hasn‚Äôt made a first Mastercard transaction of ¬£10. Please make sure to inform your friend of these requirements.
On November 6th, 2018, we¬†updated our Refer a Friend Program. Your pending invites and earned rewards before that date are no longer visible in the app or WebApp. However, pending rewards from before that date that become eligible will still be rewarded in the next 90 days. After that, they will become invalid.
If you want to make sure that you'll receive your reward for each of the invited friends please send them another invite using the new program. They can use your personal code or link when signing up.
Keep in mind that the reward process could take up to 30 days.
N26 retains the right to withhold a reward in case of suspicious activity that violates the¬†Terms and Conditions(new tab).

title: How to get push messages?
content:
We send you push messages to finalize transfers (such as¬†MoneyBeam) or to confirm a service (as with¬†CASH26). If you aren‚Äôt receiving these messages, first check that notifications are enabled for both your phone and the app. Then try some of our troubleshooting suggestions, depending on your smartphone:
Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Apple App Store and connect your smartphone again.
Check whether you‚Äôre logged into your N26 app.
Make sure messaging for the app has been activated in the general settings of your smartphone.
Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Google Play Store and connect your smartphone again.
Go to your Account settings and activate notification by tapping App settings then Notifications.
Huawei and Xiaomi: go to Settings then Advanced settings and Battery settings. Then set N26 as a protected app.
OnePlus: select battery optimization then the N26 app and then don't optimize.
Oppo: disable battery optimization for the app and lock it in the Recent apps overview.

title: How to file a complaint?
content:
If you have any questions about our products or need help with your account, we‚Äôre happy to assist. Just open a chat with us directly within the mobile app or WebApp, that's the fastest and simplest way to get in touch.
If you ever feel dissatisfied with one of our products or services, you can also send (new tab)us an email from your registered address or send your feedback by post.
If you're in the UK, you can send the email to complaints.uk@n26.com(new tab). For the rest of Europe please use complaints@n26.com(new tab).¬†
To file a complaint, please include:
your full name and address
the product or service you're not happy with
a description of your concern
the date in which the problem first appeared
We‚Äôll contact you via email to confirm that we‚Äôve received your complaint and then begin an investigation to find a solution you‚Äôre happy with. In case we need more information from you or we can provide you with an immediate solution, we‚Äôll let you know via email as well.
In case we‚Äôre not able to find a solution you‚Äôre happy with, you can escalate your complaint to an independent third party. You have a few options:
An arbitration body is available to you at the German Federal Bank (Deutsche Bundesbank).
Or you could file a complaint with the German Federal Financial Supervisory Authority (Bundesanstalt f√ºr Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht).
Also, the European Commission has set up the Online Dispute Resolution (ODR(new tab)) platform to help consumers dispute online contracts out of court.
We are committed to constantly improving our products and services. Your feedback makes this possible.

title: Wie bekomme ich ein Basiskonto?
content:
Lade das Antragsformular(neuen Tab) herunter, f√ºlle es aus und unterschreibe es von Hand.
Bringe das unterschriebene Formular und den beigef√ºgten PostIdent-Coupon zur n√§chstgelegenen Filiale der Deutschen Post, um deine Identit√§t nachzuweisen.
Sobald wir dein Formular erhalten und festgestellt haben, ob wir ein Basiskonto f√ºr dich er√∂ffnen k√∂nnen, senden wir dir eine E-Mail mit dem Vertrag und den AGB.(neuen Tab)
Sende uns deinen unterschriebenen Vertrag an die Klosterstra√üe 62, 10179 Berlin.
Sobald wir deinen Vertrag erhalten haben, er√∂ffnen wir dein Konto innerhalb von 10 Werktagen.
Du erh√§ltst dann eine Benachrichtigung √ºber die Zustellung deiner Karte und den Zugriff auf dein Konto.

title: Why didn't I receive my pairing code via SMS?
content:
A pairing code is required to¬†connect your smartphone¬†to your account. If you didn‚Äôt receive this code via SMS for whatever reason, you can request a new one up to five times in the mobile app. Please wait 30 seconds before requesting a new one. 
If all five codes are requested and pairing is still unsuccessful, then for security reasons you‚Äôll be blocked from making further requests for 24 hours. If this happens, you can either wait or contact our Customer Support via chat - who would be happy to help you.
If your country code is outside of the EU, it‚Äôs likely that you‚Äôll need to contact us to receive a pairing code.

title: How to download my personal data?
content:
The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a European regulation on data protection and privacy that went into effect on May 25th, 2018. We‚Äôve added a data export option to the WebApp(new tab) as a response to Art. 20 GDPR. And, as with everything we do, getting your personal data you provided to us is transparent and simple, and you‚Äôre in complete control: go to üë§ My Account then Personal settings and Your personal data.
The right to data portability under Art. 20 GDPR covers personal data you provided to us. Art. 20 GDPR shall enable you to easily switch the service provider in case you want to use these data to open a bank account at another bank. This is why Art. 20 GDPR requires to provide these data in a machine-readable format to you. ¬†It's important to keep in mind that the file is to be used for data portability purposes only and your computer might not be able to read a JSON file. Also, if you can open the JSON file the data might be difficult to understand as it is not intended to be human-readable, but machine-readable. The file we provide has the only purpose of being transmitted to another bank.¬†
As a mobile bank, we know the importance of data security. For this reason we take additional security measures before you can download your data, which are described below. We do so in order to make sure that you, the account holder, is in fact the person who downloads the data.¬†¬†
You can request to download the personal data you provided for a current or previous account with us up to 6 months after account closure date. It will come in a machine-readable format so you can share it with a third party if you choose to.
Please request your data through our web form(new tab).
You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.
You can download personal data you provided up to 6 months after account closure date. To request this information, complete a data request form(new tab) and make sure that the information you provide correctly matches all your previous account information. You‚Äôll need to know:
the first and last name, personal ID number, and expiration date of the identification document (national ID card or passport) you used to verify the account,
the registered email address of the account,
the date (month and year) you created and closed your account (check your verification email).
For security reasons, we have to make sure it‚Äôs really you downloading the data: if any field is inaccurate or missing, your request will not be successful.
You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.
If you want more information about the collection, use, and processing of your personal data, please visit our updated Privacy Policy (DEU(new tab)) (EU(new tab)).

title: FATCA - La raz√≥n por la que pedimos cierta informaci√≥n a nuestros clientes
content:
N26, al igual que toda instituci√≥n financiera, est√° obligado a informar al Departamento del Tesoro de los Estados Unidos y a su Servicio de Impuestos Internos (IRS, por sus siglas en ingl√©s) de cualquier cuenta bancaria a nombre de quienes denominan ¬´personas estadounidenses¬ª, que vienen a ser tanto los ciudadanos de dicha nacionalidad como los residentes fiscales en EE.UU.
FATCA es el acr√≥nimo de Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act, o Ley de cumplimiento tributario de las cuentas extranjeras, una normativa que lucha contra el fraude fiscal. 
Introducido por el IRS, el prop√≥sito de FATCA es incentivar el cumplimiento total de la Ley de impuestos, previniendo que las personas estadounidenses utilicen bancos extranjeros u otras organizaciones financieras con el objetivo de declarar sus bienes y ganancias.
Encuentra m√°s informaci√≥n sobre FATCA en la web del IRS(pesta√±a nueva).
EE.UU. cuenta con un sistema de impuestos que incluye tambi√©n a ciudadanos que no son residentes en EE.UU., a diferencia de la mayor√≠a de los pa√≠ses del mundo que solo cobran impuestos a los ciudadanos residentes, pero no a los ciudadanos que viven y trabajan en el extranjero.¬†
Para determinar si tienes que declarar tu cuenta al IRS, tenemos que hacerte algunas preguntas adicionales:
¬øEres un ciudadano o posees la Carta Verde de Estados Unidos?
¬øEst√°s sujeto a pagar impuestos en Estados Unidos?¬†
Estar ‚Äò‚Äôsujeto a pagar impuestos‚Äô‚Äô en EE.UU. no significa necesariamente que tengas que pagar impuestos all√≠. Significa que seg√∫n de EE.UU. tienes que rellenar un formulario y declarar tus impuestos internacionales al IRS, incluso si no tienes que pagar los impuestos en EE.UU.¬†
 3. Si la respuesta es s√≠, ¬øCu√°l es tu n√∫mero de identificaci√≥n fiscal en Estados Unidos?
Este n√∫mero(pesta√±a nueva) puede ser tanto tu n√∫mero de la Seguridad Social en EE.UU. (SSN) o tu N√∫mero Individual de Identificaci√≥n Fiscal (ITIN).¬†
Adem√°s, si tu cuenta muestra EE.UU. como lugar de nacimiento, un n√∫mero de tel√©fono de EE.UU. o estableces una transferencia programada a EE.UU., tenemos que asumir, de acuerdo con la legislaci√≥n FATCA, que est√°s sujeto a esta normativa, a no ser que nos confirmes de forma espec√≠fica lo contrario.¬†
En caso de que tus circunstancias cambien, siempre puedes actualizar tu informaci√≥n fiscal en la app de N26. Para esto, tras iniciar sesi√≥n ve a Mi cuenta > Configuraciones > Configuraci√≥n personal > Informaci√≥n de impuestos y actualiza tu informaci√≥n.¬†¬†

title: I represent a bank or an authority and need to contact N26
content:
If you represent the authorities or work for another bank, you can get in touch via the following channels:
Email:¬†officials@n26.com(new tab)
Fax: + 49 (0) 30 2201178 40 
Our opening hours are Monday to Friday from 09:00-18:00 (except bank and Berlin holidays). You can request a call-back via email or fax at any time. We try to call you back on the same day.
Please note that any customer inquiries sent to the above address or fax number will automatically be deleted.
If you have a customer service related question and need to contact us, visit our article How to contact N26?(new tab) or open a chat at the bottom of this article.

title: How long does it take to send money with TransferWise?
content:
Once you've initiated your transfer via TransferWise you'll be given an estimated time frame.
If a TransferWise transfer fails, we‚Äôll notify you via push message. The amount will automatically be returned to your account a few days later.
TransferWise doesn‚Äôt charge extra fees for a returned payment and neither do we. However, some participating banks do charge fees, in which case TransferWise will deduct this amount from the money returned under their¬†Conditions of Use(new tab).
Common reasons for a failed transfer:
Error in the transfer details (for example, when entering the recipient‚Äôs name or account information).
Special characters or too many characters in the recipient‚Äôs name or reference field.
Limits have been reached or online payments aren‚Äôt active in card settings.
Foreign currency transfers aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business or N26 Business You or if the recipient is a business account.

title: ¬øC√≥mo funciona N26 Business?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Disponible en Espa√±a, Alemania, Austria, B√©lgica, Dinamarca, Eslovaquia, Estonia, Finlandia, Francia, Irlanda, Islandia, Italia, Letonia, Liechtenstein, Lituania, Luxemburgo, Los Pa√≠ses Bajos, Noruega, Portugal, Polonia, Suecia y El Reino Unido. 
De momento no es posible cambiar de una cuenta personal a una Business ni viceversa, por eso es importante que sepas si N26 Business es la cuenta apropiada para ti:
N26 Business est√° dise√±ada para¬†aut√≥nomos y freelancers¬†que trabajan por cuenta propia y siempre bajo su nombre. Esto significa que no puedes tener el nombre de tu empresa en la cuenta ni en la tarjeta.
La Mastercard N26 Business est√° dise√±ada √∫nicamente para uso comercial. Recibir√°s un¬†reembolso¬†del 0,1% del dinero gastado con la tarjeta mensualmente. De momento no es posible tener dos cuentas de N26 al mismo tiempo, de modo que si necesitas otra cuenta para tus gastos privados, te recomendamos pedir una Maestro¬†(disponible en Alemania, Austria y Pa√≠ses Bajos).
Al igual que la cuenta personal N26 est√°ndar, N26 Business es¬†gratuita¬†y ofrece varias retiradas de efectivo gratuitas de acuerdo con nuestra¬†Pol√≠tica de Uso Justo. Aun as√≠, con esta cuenta no se pueden hacer¬†transferencias en moneda extranjera¬†desde la app, sino que tendr√≠as que visitar la p√°gina de TransferWise(pesta√±a nueva) para ello.
¬øQuieres ganar dinero hablando de nosotros a tus amigos? Consigue 15 ‚Ç¨ por cada amigo al que invites a unirse a N26. Inf√≥rmate m√°s sobre nuestro programa¬†Invita a un amigo.

title: Warum habe ich meinen Freundschaftsbonus noch nicht erhalten?
content:
Sobald deine Freunde alle Voraussetzungen des¬†Freundschaftswerbungsprogramms¬†erf√ºllt haben, best√§tigen wir deinen Bonus. Du kannst den Status in deiner mobilen App oder¬†WebApp(neuen Tab)¬†einsehen.
In den meisten F√§llen hast du den Werbebonus noch nicht erhalten, weil noch keine Zahlung mit der Mastercard in H√∂he von 15 ‚Ç¨ get√§tigt wurde. Stelle sicher, dass du deine Freunde √ºber diese Voraussetzung informierst.
Es kann bis zu 60 Tage dauern, bis der Bonus ausgezahlt wird.
N26 beh√§lt sich das Recht vor, den Empfehlungsbonus im Fall eines Versto√ües gegen unsere¬†AGB(neuen Tab) einzubehalten.

title: Why hasn't my referral bonus arrived?
content:
Once your friend has completed all the eligibility criteria of our¬†Refer a Friend Program, we'll verify your reward. You can always sign in to your account in the app or¬†WebApp(new tab)¬†to check your reward status.
In most cases the referral bonus isn‚Äôt rewarded because the invited friend hasn‚Äôt made a first Mastercard transaction of 15 EUR. Please make sure to inform your friend of these requirements.
Keep in mind that the reward process could take up to 60 days.
N26 retains the right to withhold a reward in case of suspicious activity that violates the¬†Terms and Conditions(new tab).
Currently, Friend referral rewards are only available for customers in Germany, Austria, Italy, France, Spain, Belgium, Luxembourg, Greece, Portugal, Ireland, the Netherlands, Finland, Estonia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden, Switzerland, Norway, Denmark, Poland, Iceland and Liechtenstein.

Once you've initiated your transfer via TransferWise you'll be given an estimated time frame.
If a TransferWise transfer fails, we‚Äôll notify you via push message. The amount will automatically be returned to your account a few days later.
TransferWise doesn‚Äôt charge extra fees for a returned payment and neither do we. However, some participating banks do charge fees, in which case TransferWise will deduct this amount from the money returned under their¬†Conditions of Use(new tab).

title: N26 Forms
content:
List of important forms:
Direct Deposit Form(new tab): To be used when your employer is requesting a form in order to¬† set up a payroll direct deposit into your N26 account.
Affidavit for Unauthorized ACH Debit(new tab): To be used when you are filing a claim for unauthorized ACH debits.
Affidavit for Unauthorized Transactions(new tab): To be used when you are filing a claim for unauthorized transactions.
ACH Stop Payment Authorization(new tab): To be used when you wish to discontinue a recurring ACH transaction. 
Statement of Consumer Dispute:(new tab) To be used when you are filing a claim of a consumer disputed transaction(s). 
Statement for Difference in Amount:(new tab) To be used to report a difference in amount of a cash transaction. 
Statement for Cash Not Received(new tab): To be used to report cash not received. 

The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: How to get push messages?
content:
We send you push messages to finalize transfers (such as¬†MoneyBeam) or to confirm a service (as with¬†CASH26). If you aren‚Äôt receiving these messages, first check that notifications are enabled for both your phone and the app. Then try some of our troubleshooting suggestions, depending on your smartphone:
Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Apple App Store and connect your smartphone again.
Check whether you‚Äôre logged into your N26 app.
Make sure messaging for the app has been activated in the general settings of your smartphone.
Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Google Play Store and connect your smartphone again.
Go to your Account settings and activate notification by tapping App settings then Notifications.
Huawei and Xiaomi: go to Settings then Advanced settings and Battery settings. Then set N26 as a protected app.
OnePlus: select battery optimization then the N26 app and then don't optimize.
Oppo: disable battery optimization for the app and lock it in the Recent apps overview.

title: Come si fa un bonifico SEPA?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Puoi inviare bonifici verso tutti i paesi dell'area SEPA (se la banca ricevente accetta trasferimenti in euro).
I bonifici in uscita possono essere effettuati tramite la versione mobile e web dell‚Äôapp N26 in questo modo:
Dalla schermata principale, vai nella sezione Gestisci.¬†
Seleziona Dal mio conto,  Bonifico bancario e poi Aggiungi nuovo beneficiario.¬†
Inserisci il nome e l'IBAN del beneficiario e seleziona Continua.
Inserisci l'importo e seleziona Avanti.
Aggiungi un messaggio se necessario, oppure seleziona Salta.
Controlla i dati del bonifico nell‚Äôapposita schermata.
Nella stessa schermata puoi  scegliere la data in cui vuoi che il bonifico venga inviato oppure salvarlo come ordine permanente.
Seleziona Invia e conferma con il tuo PIN di Conferma.
Dovrai, infine, confermare o annullare il bonifico tramite notifica push dal tuo dispositivo associato.
Una volta che il bonifico viene confermato nella app, non possiamo pi√π annullarlo o cambiare i dettagli del beneficiario.
Se non riesci a confermare l‚Äôinvio del bonifico tramite app, dovresti accertarti di quanto segue:
hai una connessione internet stabile
hai abilitato le notifiche push sul tuo dispositivo (le notifiche si abilitano dalle impostazioni del dispositivo e non dall‚Äôapp N26)¬†
stai usando il dispositivo associato 
Dopo aver inviato il bonifico, potrai scaricare il PDF relativo alla transazione in questo modo:¬†
Vai alla tua lista di transazioni.
Individua e seleziona il bonifico.¬†
Scorri verso il basso, fino a Informazioni sul bonifico e seleziona Conferma di trasferimento

title: How to activate my card?
content:
Once you receive your physical card, you‚Äôll need to activate it. You can do this in the app only after you connect your smartphone to your account. Or you can activate it directly from the web app(new tab). 
You‚Äôll need your 10-digit token number: it‚Äôs found below your name on the front of your card (or on the back if you have an N26 You, N26 Metal, or Maestro card). 
To activate your card on the N26 app, from the Home screen:
Go to the Actions tab,
Select Cards settings and swipe until you see the card you want to activate,
Tap Activate.

To activate your card on the web app, just select Activate card from the Home screen.

If you live in France, Spain, Ireland, Greece, Finland, Estonia or in the UK you must make a first ATM withdrawal to fully activate your card.
If you have multiple cards (for example, you ordered your card more than once or your delivery was delayed), you can only activate your most recent card. All other cards will be disabled.
You‚Äôll need to follow these activation steps every time you reorder a new card, like if your card is lost, stolen, broken, or you upgrade your account. ¬†¬†
After you activate your card, the next step is choosing a card PIN.

title: How does 3D Secure work?
content:
3D Secure protects you from online card fraud. It‚Äôs automatically activated when you activate your card in the app. No additional passwords are required.
Whenever you make an online payment using your Mastercard, 3D Secure confirms the transaction with you within 5 minutes via a¬†push message. If you don't see the transaction, try some of the¬†troubleshooting tips¬†we've collected.
If you make a purchase using your smartphone, you‚Äôll see a pending transaction in the app. Tap on the bell icon and the push message will appear for you to confirm and finalize your purchase. Then go back to the merchant‚Äôs website. You should see a confirmation of your successful purchase within a few moments.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: How to open my N26 account?
content:
You can open an account in the app (on your smartphone) or in N26 for Web(new tab) if you:
are at least 18 years old
are a resident of a supported country
own a compatible smartphone
hold a supported ID (eligibility depends on whether you live in Germany(new tab) or outside of Germany(new tab))
don't already have an account with us
are able to verify yourself in one of our supported languages: English, German, Spanish, Italian, or French. Please note that only English is supported in the UK. 
This is how the sign-up process for an N26 bank account works:
After confirming your email, personal details, and shipping address, select the type of account you want. *
Prove your identity and connect your smartphone to your new account.
As a new signup, you'll be able to top up your account via Bank Transfer or CASH26 deposit (if you are in Germany, Austria or Italy). 
After a few days, you‚Äôll receive your N26 Mastercard by post.
If you'd like more information, here's how you can get in touch with us.
*If you meet our minimum creditworthiness criteria, you can open an N26 account. If you don‚Äôt, we may offer you an N26 Flex account (Germany only). This decision is calculated through an automated process.
We are available from 7:00 to 23:00 everyday, including Sundays and public holidays.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our Refer a Friend Program.

title: How to earn money by inviting friends to N26?
content:
You receive ‚Ç¨15 every time you successfully refer a friend to N26 (up to ‚Ç¨1500 maximum). 
You can start inviting friends as soon as you have access to your account (in the app or the¬†Web app(new tab)).
To receive your reward your friend must meet all our requirements:
Complete their sign up using your referral link or personal code.
Activate their Mastercard.
Complete 1 (in-store, online or ATM) transaction with their Mastercard worth a minimum of ‚Ç¨15.
To invite friends:
Log into the N26 app,
From the Home screen, go to the Explore tab,
Select Refer friends,
Tap on your Referral Code to copy it and select one of the options available for sharing,
Optionally, you can write a message to your friend or use the default,
Tap Send!
Once your friend has fulfilled the requirements, you'll receive the bonus within 60 days.¬†You can check the status of your referral bonus in the mobile app or N26 Web.
If your referral bonus hasn‚Äôt arrived yet, we‚Äôve also collected a¬†few reasons why.
*The link does not expire and it can be used at any time. Personal invite codes and links should only be used for personal and non-commercial purposes. This means you can share your invite link with your personal connections via social media as long as you are the primary content owner. N26 has the right to cancel the referral program at any time.
Currently,¬†Friend referral¬†rewards are only available for customers in Germany, Austria, Italy, France, Spain, Belgium, Luxembourg, Greece, Portugal, Ireland, the Netherlands, Finland, Estonia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden, Switzerland, Norway, Denmark, Poland, Iceland and Liechtenstein.
You can find more information in the Refer a Friend Program¬†T&Cs(new tab).

title: How to find my IBAN or account number?
content:
You can find your IBAN and our BIC number on your balance statements or in¬†üë§ My Account¬†from the mobile app or¬†WebApp(new tab)¬†(if you haven‚Äôt activated your card and need to¬†top up your account).
All our IBANs start with DE followed by the¬†check digits¬†(two numbers), then our¬†bank code¬†10011001, and end with your 10-digit¬†account number¬†(start at 26).
If you open your account in the UK, you won't have an IBAN, but you will find your account number and our sort code 04-00-26 in the same section.
You can easily share your information through the share button in¬†üë§ My Account. Or you can download your bank account information as a PDF by logging into the¬†WebApp(new tab)¬†and selecting the cloud icon on the top-right corner of¬†Transactions.
Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial(new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube(new tab) channel.

title: How do I enable Push Notifications?
content:
We send you push messages to finalize transfers (with MoneyBeam, for example). If you aren‚Äôt receiving these messages, first check that notifications are enabled for both your phone and the application. If this does not fix the issue, try some of our troubleshooting suggestions, depending on your smartphone:
iOS:
Unpair your¬†device ("My Account"‚Üí"Settings"‚Üí"Security"‚Üí"Unpair phone").
Uninstall the application.
Force restart.
iPhone 7 and earlier: Hold the Home button and Power button until the Apple logo appears.
iPhone 7 and 7+: Hold Volume button and Power button.
iPhone 8 and later:¬†Press down and quickly release the Volume Up button, then press down and quickly release the Volume Down button.¬†Now press and hold the side Power button and continue holding until you see the Apple logo, then release.
Reinstall the application.
Re-pair the device/application. Click for more information on this step.¬†
If you are still not receiving push notifications, please check that notifications are enabled in the settings.
"iPhone Settings"‚Üí"Notifications"‚Üí"N26 Application"‚Üí"Allow notifications".
Android:
Unpair your¬†device ("My account"‚Üí"Settings"‚Üí"Security"‚Üí"Unpair phone").
Uninstall the application.
Turn off¬†your device for 2 minutes to clear background data.
Turn your device on¬†again and reinstall¬†the application.
Re-pair your device with the application. Click here for more information on this step.
If you are still not receiving notifications, please check the following things:
Google Play Services are up to date.
Notifications have been enabled in the applications manager as well as in your device's settings.

title: What are the benefits of N26 You?
content:
Once you upgrade to N26 You, you‚Äôll receive 10 additional¬†Spaces¬†and the option to choose one of our five new card colours: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate. 
N26 You customers are also covered under the premium account's¬†insurance package provided by Allianz Global Assistance*, which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:
Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.

Snow and mountain rescue.¬†Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.
Car, bike and scooter sharing. Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.
Extra card. You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 14‚Ç¨ through your N26 app. 
If you‚Äôre an N26 You customer, or if you want to upgrade to N26 You, you‚Äôll have the possibility to choose one of our five new colors when ordering a new card: 
Keep these in mind when considering¬†N26 You(new tab):
The N26 You Mastercard has no embossing: the card details, including the number, CVV code, and 10-digit token are printed on the back.
If you upgrade to N26 You, the monthly fee of ‚Ç¨9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade. If you‚Äôre a new customer, the first fee will be deducted 15 days after you prove your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on your sign-up date. Meaning that, if you opened your account at the end of the month, the first two  monthly fees will be charged the following month.
The minimum membership is one year. Your contract automatically renews if you don‚Äôt cancel your membership at least 4 weeks before the contract expires.
You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 14‚Ç¨ through your N26 app. 

*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: How does Spaces work?
content:
Set goals, create and personalize Spaces, and transfer money between them instantly. Spaces is available in the mobile and¬†WebApp(new tab).
In addition to your main account (or primary space), you can create and delete additional Spaces as often as you‚Äôd like but the number of active Spaces at any one time depends on your account type: 2 additional Spaces with an N26 or N26 Business account or up to 10 additional Spaces with N26 You, N26 Business You and N26 Metal.
Your primary account statements will include all transactions sent to a space or received from one. You can download balance statements from the confirmation page.
Only your primary space can be negative (if you are eligible for an overdraft). All other balances in Spaces cannot be negative, meaning you can only transfer what is available in a particular space.
You can only use the balance from your primary space toward your Mastercard transactions. So consider transferring money before making a purchase if needed.
Move money from one space to another by holding down on your Main Account and dragging and dropping into your space. Once the amount is confirmed the balance is updated right away.
You can lock and unlock a space at anytime from your mobile and web app. You'll only need to confirm with your confirmation PIN. If a space is locked, you‚Äôll still be able to transfer money to it. If you need to withdraw money from a locked space, you need first to unlock it.
You'll be able to hide the amount within the Space from your account's total balance. Just go into your Space, tap the three dots in the top right corner and select ‚ÄòHide space balance‚Äô.
Spaces includes a feature called Rules which will help you manage your time and your finances effectively.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

Deposits:

title: ¬øC√≥mo proteger mi identidad?
content:
Para proteger y ayudar a evitar el mal uso de tus datos personales, te recomendamos tener esto en cuenta:
N26 nunca va a¬†verificar tu identidad¬†en nombre de otras personas o empresas.¬†Esto incluye verificaciones para contratos de alquiler de vivienda, l√≠neas de cr√©dito u ofertas de trabajo (incluyendo ofertas de N26). Completa el proceso de verificaci√≥n s√≥lo si quieres abrir una cuenta de N26 para ti mismo.
Como titular de la cuenta, solo t√∫ debes crear y tener acceso a tus credenciales de inicio de sesi√≥n.¬†As√≠ que nunca abras una cuenta N26 con un correo y contrase√±a predefinidos. Si lo haces, estas credenciales pueden utilizarse para conseguir tu informaci√≥n legal y personal. Tampoco debes iniciar sesi√≥n nunca en una cuenta N26 que no sea la tuya.
Nunca env√≠es tu carnet de identidad ni tu pasaporte a desconocidos o destinatarios no verificados.
N26 podr√≠a solicitar ciertos documentos cuando alguna de tus transacciones est√© pasando un control rutinario.¬†Env√≠a dicha documentaci√≥n solo a direcciones de email verificadas de N26.
N26 nunca te preguntar√° tu usuario, contrase√±a o c√≥digo PIN fuera de la app N26.¬†No proporciones nunca esta informaci√≥n en una app o p√°gina web externa, incluso si parece estar relacionada con N26.
Si alguna vez te sientes inseguro, has recibido una solicitud sospechosa de un tercero o piensas que tus credenciales de N26 podr√≠an estar comprometidos, por favor no dudes en ponerte en contacto con nosotros.

title: Pourquoi le distributeur automatique a enregistr√© mon retrait sans d√©livrer mon argent ?
content:
Lorsque vous effectuer un retrait en distributeur automatique, il arrive parfois qu‚Äôil ne vous d√©livre pas votre argent mais que le montant du retrait soit d√©duit du solde de votre compte.
Dans un premier temps, v√©rifiez les¬†plafonds de votre carte¬†en allant dans la rubrique üë§¬†Mon compte¬†puis dans la section¬†Param√®tres de votre carte¬†de votre application mobile. V√©rifiez que les retraits en distributeurs automatiques soient activ√©s.
Si nous ne pouvons pas toujours conna√Ætre la raison de l‚Äô√©chec, nous pouvons vous aider √† r√©cup√©rer le montant de votre retrait. Ce dernier a √©t√© d√©duit du solde de votre compte car le distributeur automatique a √©mis une empreinte de paiement (le montant du retrait est temporairement bloqu√©). Comme l‚Äôop√©ration n‚Äôa pas fonctionn√©, cette empreinte de paiement expirera en quelques heures ou dans un d√©lai maximal de 12 jours ouvr√©s. Le montant sera alors √† nouveau disponible sur votre compte.
Si le montant correspondant √† votre retrait n‚Äôappara√Æt pas sur votre compte au bout de 12 jours ouvr√©s, nous vous invitons √† remplir un¬†formulaire de contestation. Nous ferons alors les d√©marches n√©cessaires pour r√©gler ce litige.
En attendant, nous vous invitons √† effectuer un retrait d‚Äôesp√®ces dans un autre distributeur automatique.

title: How to use Apple Pay?
content:
(Applies to Germany, Austria, France, Italy, Spain, Finland, Ireland, Iceland, Greece, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Portugal, Slovakia, Estonia, Belgium, Poland, Norway, Netherlands, Sweden, Denmark, Switzerland and the UK)
Apple Pay allows you to make payments with your smartphone so you don‚Äôt have to carry your Mastercard everywhere.
We‚Äôve made a¬†video(new tab)¬†to help you set up your N26 Mastercard with Apple Pay.
Some tips to keep in mind:
Your iPhone region matches the country where your Mastercard was first shipped to (you can check your region by selecting Settings then General and Language & Region in your phone).

If you‚Äôve lost your iPhone and aren‚Äôt able to find it again using Find My iPhone, you can always access your iCloud and remove all Apple Pay devices via the web browser on a Mac or PC. In addition, you should turn on Lost Mode to block your Mastercard for Apple Pay. Payments with your physical card will still be possible.

If your N26 Mastercard is unexpectedly removed from Apple Wallet, it may be because you have logged out of your iCloud, turned off Passcode or Touch ID, reset your device to factory settings via iTunes, or deleted all the content and settings from your device. In all cases, you can simply add your card again. Keep in mind that the card won‚Äôt be removed if you update your operating system, reset your personal device settings, or turn off Find My iPhone.

For in-store or online purchases, you must authorize your payment via Touch ID or using your passcode. If you‚Äôre using Apple Watch, authorizations are done by double-clicking on the side button. And if you‚Äôre using your Mac, authorize your payment by using Touch ID via the Touch Bar in the top-right corner of your keyboard.

If you're an N26 Metal or N26 Business You customer, it may happen that the card image displayed in your Apple Wallet shows as an N26 You card (for Metal customers) or as an N26 Business card (for Business You customers). We're working now to resolve this. Rest assured that this does not affect the usability of Apple Pay or your premium membership.

Make sure your device meets the technical requirements by visiting Apple Support(new tab):
iPhone 6 or later, iPhone SE: available in apps, stores and web
Apple Watch paired with iPhone 5 or later: available in apps and stores
iPad Pro, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 3, iPad mini 4: available in apps and web
Macs introduced in 2012 or later (Macs other than the MacBook Pro with Touch Bar and Touch ID require an iPhone or Apple Watch: available in web

title: Wie kann ich meine Karte sperren?
content:
Du kannst deine Karten jederzeit in der App sperren und entsperren. Gehe zu üë§ Mein Konto und w√§hle Karteneinstellungen aus. Dort kannst du entscheiden, ob du deine Abhebungen am Geldautomaten, Online- und Auslandszahlungen vor√ºbergehend einschr√§nken, deaktivieren oder deine Karte komplett sperren m√∂chtest. 
So hast du die volle Kontrolle √ºber deine Karte und kannst dich vor unberechtigten Transaktionen sch√ºtzen. Du solltest deine Karte sofort sperren, wenn dir etwas verd√§chtig vorkommt. Du kannst sie sp√§ter jederzeit wieder entsperren. 

Falls du keinen Zugriff auf deine N26 Smartphone-App oder die WebApp hast, kannst du deine Karte oder dein Konto auch sperren, indem du uns unter +49 (0) 307 675 8333 anrufst.

title: Why are some products and services unavailable to me?
content:
We collaborate with many partners. That‚Äôs why certain products and services require that you meet their requirements as well. The most common reasons why you wouldn‚Äôt be eligible for certain products:
Expired or unsupported identity documents (for example, certain passports due to a lack of security features).
You‚Äôre taxable in the United States. If so, you won‚Äôt be able to use certain invest or savings products. If this is not the case, contact our Customer Support via chat so we can look into your account details. You may need to switch your telephone number if it starts with a North American area code (+1).
You proved your identity using PostIdent (in Germany). We‚Äôll have to reset your account and you‚Äôll have to prove your identity again in order to use certain products and services. If this is the case, we‚Äôll email you about it and find a convenient time for you to do so.
The product or service is not yet available in your country.

content:
(Disponible en Espa√±a, Alemania, Austria, B√©lgica, Dinamarca, Eslovaquia, Eslovenia, Estonia, Finlandia, Francia, Grecia, Irlanda, Italia, Liechtenstein, Luxemburgo, Noruega, Polonia, Portugal, Suecia, Suiza y el Reino Unido).

Si eres un usuario de N26 Metal o N26 Business You, podr√≠a pasar que la imagen de tu tarjeta que se muestra en el Apple Wallet diga N26 You (para los clientes de Metal) y N26 Business (para los clientes de Business You). title: Come funziona 3D Secure?
content:
3D Secure ti protegge dalle frodi online con carta. Si attiva automaticamente quando attivi la tua carta nell‚Äôapp. Non servono password aggiuntive.
Ogni volta che effettui un¬†pagamento online¬†con la tua Mastercard, 3D Secure ti conferma la transazione entro 5 minuti tramite un¬†messaggio push. Se non vedi la transazione, prova alcuni¬†suggerimenti per la risoluzione dei problemi¬†che abbiamo raccolto.
Se effettui un acquisto utilizzando lo smartphone, nell‚Äôapp verr√† visualizzata una transazione in sospeso. Tocca l‚Äôicona della campana per visualizzare il messaggio push per confermare e finalizzare l‚Äôacquisto. Poi torna al sito web dell‚Äôesercente. Dovresti vedere una conferma dell‚Äôavvenuto acquisto entro pochi secondi.
Vuoi parlare di noi ai tuoi amici e guadagnarci? Ottieni ‚Ç¨15 per ogni amico che inviti con successo ad iscriversi ad N26. Scopri di pi√π sul nostro¬†programma Invita un amico.

title: Why did my online purchase fail?
content:
Some reasons why your online payment failed:
If you are unable to confirm the push message within 5 minutes, simply restart the payment process on the merchant's website.
If you do not receive a push message, please make sure that your smartphone is connected and that push messages are enabled on your smartphone.
Ensure that online payments and payments abroad are enabled in your card settings.
A stable internet connection is required.
If you are using an iOS device, make sure you turn off the Do Not Disturb mode.
If the amount on the merchant's site is different from the one stated in the push message, this may be due to the conversion of a foreign currency into euros.
Make sure that you disable any Adblockers running on your browser.
Your Maestro card can‚Äôt be used for online purchases.

title: How to save the details of a transfer recipient?
content:
Every time you make a transfer to a new recipient in the app (tap + then¬†Transfer¬†and¬†Add new recipient), some details like the recipient‚Äôs name and IBAN are automatically saved in your transfer contact list for future transfers. You can also delete contacts or view your transaction history with them:
iOS: swipe a contact entry to the left in order to show the transaction history or delete the entry.
Android: tap and hold on a contact entry in order to show the transaction history or delete the entry.
Keep in mind that deleting a contact entry doesn‚Äôt delete your transaction history with them.

title: FATCA - Why we require certain information from our customers
content:
As a financial institution, N26 is required to report information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers or by foreign entities (in which U.S. taxpayers hold a substantial ownership interest according to FATCA) to the United States Department of Treasury and the Internal Revenue Service (‚ÄúIRS‚Äù).
FATCA is an acronym for Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act and is a legislation designed to prevent tax evasion. Another purpose of FATCA is to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets. You can find more information about FATCA on the IRS website(new tab).
The U.S. tax system includes U.S. citizens who are not presently residing in the U.S. In comparison. So in order for us to be able to accurately determine whether your account is to be reported to the IRS, we‚Äôll need to ask you:
Are you (also) a citizen or green card holder of the United States?¬†

Are you subject to tax in the U.S?

Being ‚Äúsubject to tax‚Äù in the U.S. does not necessarily mean that you‚Äôre also paying personal income tax in the U.S. It means that U.S. tax law requires you to file a tax return and declare your (worldwide) income to the IRS, even if you don‚Äôt end up paying any U.S. tax.

If so, what is your U.S. Taxpayer Identification Number?

As a U.S. TIN you can either use your U.S. Social Security Number (‚ÄúSSN‚Äù) or your U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN). You can find more information about TIN on the IRS' website(new tab).
Additionally, if your account shows:
A U.S. place of birth, 
A U.S. telephone number,
A standing order to the U.S.
then we are required by FATCA legislation to initially assume that you are subject to FATCA until you can specifically confirm to us otherwise.
In case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the N26 app. To do this, simply log in to the N26 app and go to:
My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Tax Information¬†

title: How do I create or reset a password?
content:
If you forgot your password or want to change it follow these easy steps:
During login, select "Forgot?"in the N26 mobile application or Forgot your password(new tab)? on the N26 website.¬†
A link will be sent to your registered email address.
Check your email and click on the link to create a new password.
Log into the N26 mobile application or the N26 website by using your new password.
We do not have a specific set of requirements for passwords. However, for security purposes, we only accept passwords that are considered robust by our underlying algorithm.
If your password is not accepted, try to add special characters / numbers and vary between uppercase and lowercase letters.
If you enter your password incorrectly six times in a row, you will be temporarily blocked from logging into your account. If this happens, try logging in again after 30 minutes.
