title: Why was I charged an ATM fee?
content:
ATM fees could happen for a few reasons: 
A ‚Ç¨2 fee applies to any additional withdrawal beyond our Fair Use Policy. We‚Äôll remind you via push message when you‚Äôre running low on free withdrawals. 
Some ATMs may come with their own fees. We have no control over these fees and can‚Äôt reject or reverse them. You‚Äôll be informed before the end of a withdrawal if additional fees apply and will have the possibility of cancelling it.
Foreign currency ATM withdrawals sometimes include fees. With the N26 account, there‚Äôs a fee of 1.7% of the withdrawal amount. This fee is waived for N26 You or N26 Metal members. 
Using your Maestro for ATM withdrawals. A ‚Ç¨2 fee applies to both domestic or international withdrawals. Maestro is only available in Germany, Austria, or the Netherlands. 

To avoid certain fees, especially when travelling, you can use the Mastercard ATM Locator(new tab) to find free ATMs nearby by selecting no access fee. 
You can find an overview of our plans and fees on our website(new tab).

title: When will my card arrive?
content:
The estimated delivery timeline for card deliveries is 10 working days. Deliveries may take longer in some specific areas in the following countries: Estonia, Greece, Italy, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia and Spain. 
Please consider this before taking any action regarding a card re-order:
If the delivery fails and your card is returned to us, we‚Äôll let you know via email.
If it's been less than 10 working days since you ordered your card, we encourage you to wait before reaching out to us. 
If you've waited longer than the expected timeline, please check and if necessary update your shipping address, you can do this within the N26 app: üë§ My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Shipping Address.
If your shipping address was incorrect and this is your first N26 card, please¬†contact us via live chat(new tab) and we‚Äôll help you order a new one.
If your shipping address was incorrect and you‚Äôve had an active card before, you'll need to reorder the card via the App.
If your shipping address was correct, there might have been an issue with your card's delivery. Please contact us via live chat and we‚Äôll help you order a new one.
If your card fails to arrive or you need your card quickly, you may consider ordering it via¬†express delivery (with an additional fee) which takes up to 3 working days. Please note that express delivery is not available for Metal cards.
Your first card is immediately produced and mailed out once you‚Äôre done¬†proving your identity. If you opened a Metal account, please to top up your account after completing the sign up with at least the amount of the monthly Metal fee in order to receive the card.
Tips for a successful delivery:
If your address contains special characters, please contact us via the live chat.
We only send cards to residential addresses (businesses are not accepted).
Don‚Äôt enter any spaces when entering the postal code for your delivery address.
Ensure that important delivery information isn‚Äôt missing (for example, the name on your mailbox if you live in Germany or your building number, stairwell number, and door code if applicable). If you‚Äôre staying somewhere temporarily (with a friend or in an Airbnb), make sure to include the name on the mailbox that belongs to the main tenant of the apartment.
If you‚Äôre moving somewhere and this is your first card, make sure to select the country and address where you‚Äôll move to and wish to receive your N26 card.

title: ¬øD√≥nde invierte N26 mi dinero?
content:
Como regla general, nos esforzamos para que los dep√≥sitos de nuestros clientes sean otorgados en forma de pr√©stamo a nuestros propios clientes (siempre y cuando dispongan de una solvencia apropiada). En cuanto a la liquidez que no se utiliza para los clientes, nuestra estrategia de inversi√≥n es de bajo riesgo.
Invertimos el dinero de nuestros clientes con el Deutsche Bundesbank (Banco Federal Alem√°n) y otros bancos europeos dentro de la eurozona, √∫nicamente con un buen tipo de riesgo y a corto plazo. Adem√°s, refinanciamos colectivos de derecho p√∫blico principalmente en Alemania (ciudades y municipios) e invertimos en bonos de estado en euros.
No somos una instituci√≥n de trading y por lo tanto no comerciamos para obtener beneficios a corto plazo.
No nos involucramos en la especulaci√≥n; ni con comida, divisas extranjeras, bitcoins u otras clases de activos.

title: Warum funktioniert meine Video-Verifizierung nicht?
content:
Einige Tipps f√ºr eine erfolgreiche Video-Verifizierung:
Die meisten Anrufe scheitern aufgrund einer schwachen Internetverbindung oder schlechter Bildqualit√§t (z.B. zu verschwommen oder unterbelichtet). Bitte f√ºhre den Anruf in einer hellen Umgebung durch, verwende ein Smartphone mit einer guten Kamera und stelle sicher, dass du eine schnelle Internetverbindung hast.
Bitte gehe sicher, dass du die einzige Person im Video bist.
Du musst in einem unserer unterst√ºtzten L√§nder leben, um ein Konto bei uns er√∂ffnen zu k√∂nnen.
Wir akzeptieren nur nationale Ausweise und Reisep√§sse (F√ºhrerscheine oder Aufenthaltsgenehmigungen sind nicht zul√§ssig). Stelle au√üerdem sicher, dass dein Ausweisdokument unbesch√§digt ist.
Sobald deine Identit√§tspr√ºfung abgeschlossen ist, senden wir dir deine N26 Mastercard zu. Die Lieferzeit betr√§gt 10 Tage.
Du erreichst uns im Chat t√§glich von 07:00 - 23:00 Uhr, auch an Sonn- und Feiertagen.

title: How to connect or disconnect my smartphone to my account?
content:
In order to use your N26 account, you need a smartphone : either an iPhone (5s or newer, at least iOS 11) or an Android (6.0 or newer - we do not support the customized versions of Amazon Fire and Oxygen OS). Only one device can be paired per account.
You'll need to pair and/or unpair your smartphone when you first create an account or if you get a new phone number or device.
To pair your smartphone with your account, simply open the app on your smartphone. You will be asked to¬†confirm your mobile phone number.
Enter the¬†4-digit code we send you via SMS¬†and your phone is paired. 
If you want to pair a new device, you must unpair your old device for¬†security reasons. You can do this in¬†üë§ My Account¬†(mobile app) or in the¬†Web app(new tab)¬†under¬†üë§ My Account¬†then¬†Security Settings if you don‚Äôt have access to your smartphone anymore. You‚Äôll receive an email from us with further instructions.
If you log into your N26 account with a new device, you'll receive two codes ‚Äì a Login SMS code with 6 digits and Pairing SMS code with 4 digits. You'll need the Login code to access your account and the Pairing code for pairing your device.

title: What are Shared Spaces?
content:
Shared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 users to share money together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.
Shared Spaces are available to N26 premium users (You / Business You / Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their Space. 
Participants can be any N26 account holder regardless of their account type.
The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.
The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants for their space.
Similar to regular Spaces, Shared Spaces have neither an IBAN nor a card attached to them.

title: Warum ist mein Online-Einkauf fehlgeschlagen?
content:
Tipps und Tricks f√ºr eine erfolgreiche Online-Zahlung:
 Wenn du die Push-Nachricht nicht innerhalb von 5 Minuten best√§tigen kannst, starte einfach den Bezahlvorgang auf der Website des H√§ndlers neu.
Wenn du keine Push-Nachricht erh√§ltst, stelle bitte sicher, dass dein Smartphone verkn√ºpft ist und Push-Nachrichten auf deinem Smartphone aktiviert sind. 
Gehe sicher, dass Online- und Auslandszahlungen in deinen Karteneinstellungen aktiviert sind.
Du brauchst eine stabile Internetverbindung.
Wenn du ein iOS-Ger√§t verwendest, muss der Nicht St√∂ren-Modus deaktiviert sein.
Wenn der Betrag auf der Website des H√§ndlers von dem Betrag in der Push-Mitteilung abweicht, kann das an Kursschwankungen bei der Umrechnung einer Fremdw√§hrung in Euro liegen.
Alle Adblocker in deinem Browser m√ºssen deaktiviert sein.
Deine Maestro kann nicht f√ºr Online-Zahlungen verwendet werden.

title: Reinvest your N26 Invest portfolio capital to Moneyfarm (formerly Vaamo)
content:
You can reinvest the funds from your N26 Invest plan to a brand new investment plan with Moneyfarm.¬†

Important risk notice: As this option would mean closing your existing portfolio and reinvesting the capital in a new portfolio, this can result in a financial loss depending on the actual market value of your portfolio compared to the amount originally invested.
To begin the transfer of your portfolio capital to a new investment plan with Moneyfarm please follow the steps below:
Register an account with(new tab) Moneyfarm(new tab) (please use the link you received in the email we sent you as special conditions apply for N26 customers). You‚Äôll need to verify your email address with them.  
You‚Äôll then need to complete Moneyfarm‚Äôs advice/suitability questionnaire. which includes your risk preferences and your risk bearing capacity as a basis for a strategy/portfolio recommendation that suits your needs.¬† 
Plan your investment by selecting a strategy/portfolio and choose your initial investment as well as your monthly investment plan. A minimum investment amount does not apply for existing N26 Invest customers.¬†
Open the account by entering relevant personal information (name, address, date of birth etc).
You‚Äôll then need to confirm both Moneyfarm and FIL Fondsbank‚Äôs (FFB) legal documentation.
Complete verification by either video verification or PostIdent.
Once your application is accepted, you can reach out to Moneyfarm (new tab)customer support(new tab)* who will arrange the transfer of your N26 Invest portfolio and the reinvestment of your portfolio capital to your new Moneyfarm investment plan.¬† ¬† 
Their customer service will provide you with an already completed portfolio form that you‚Äôll need to sign and send back to Moneyfarm (electronic signatures are accepted).¬†
Moneyfarm will then instruct FFB to complete the transfer of your N26 Invest portfolio.
Please note that this option must be completed by 03.09.2019 ‚Äì¬† the completion of your sign-up, verification and transfer of your portfolio capital make take up to several days, please ensure that these steps are completed in their entirety before the above date.
You'll be able to contact Moneyfarm here:¬†
Tel: +49 (0) 69 3807 6632
Email: service@moneyfarm.de(new tab)
Moneyfarm‚Äôs website is currently only available in German but their customer service will be able to answer any queries in English.

title: Kann ich in meinem Land ein N26 Konto er√∂ffnen?
content:
Wir bieten unsere Konten in folgenden L√§ndern an: in Deutschland, √ñsterreich, Irland, Frankreich, Spanien, Italien, den Niederlanden, Belgien, Portugal, Finnland, Luxemburg, Slowenien, Estland, Griechenland, der Slowakei, der Schweiz, Polen, Schweden, D√§nemark, Norwegen, Liechtenstein, Island und den USA.
Du kannst dein Konto er√∂ffnen, wenn du in einem dieser L√§nder wohnst und die Voraussetzungen erf√ºllst. Unsere Produkte und Dienstleistungen variieren je nach Land. Solltest du bereits ein Konto bei uns haben und wirst f√ºr 18 Monate oder l√§nger in ein nicht unterst√ºtztes Land ziehen, kontaktiere bitte unseren Customer Support.
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Bekomme 15‚Ç¨ f√ºr jeden Freund, dem du N26 erfolgreich empfiehlst. Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: How to get my money back in case of fraud?
content:
If you don‚Äôt recognize a transaction or you‚Äôre sure you didn‚Äôt authorize it,¬†blocking your card¬†won‚Äôt be enough. In these cases you should immediately:
Request new card(new tab) and indicate that the old one has been stolen. Please tear up the card by cutting it with scissors, for example. Both the chip, the NFC antenna and the magnetic stripe must be cut into pieces.
Then fill out the dispute form(new tab). From there we will do everything we can to get your money back.
You can continue using your account for bank transfers until your new card arrives. If you're in Germany or Austria, you can also use¬†CASH26¬†for cash withdrawals.
You should keep in mind that changes in the¬†final amount debited¬†from your account don't necessarily indicate fraud.

title: Why is N26 secure?
content:
To protect your account, we use a three-layered security architecture:
Secure login.¬†Your login details of both the mobile and¬†WebApp(new tab)¬†consist of a username and password or fingerprint/face recognition (depending on your smartphone). Please choose a¬†secure password¬†and don‚Äôt reveal your login details to anyone.
Confirmation PIN.¬†This¬†4-digit code¬†is required every time you make a transfer or connect/disconnect your phone. You first set it up once you have successfully connected your smartphone to your account. You can then¬†change it¬†in the app yourself after that.
Push messages.¬†For every incoming and outgoing payment, a push message will be sent to your¬†connected smartphone. It's also used to confirm and finalize your transactions. We've also added¬†3D Secure¬†to protect you from online card fraud.
Every time you contact us we‚Äôll ask you some security questions to make sure it's really you. But we‚Äôll never ask for your debit card number, card verification code (CVV), password, or your card or Confirmation PINs.
We‚Äôve also taken steps to protect your data: we store as little information about you as possible, only for as long as we are legally obligated to, and we delete data when it is no longer required for a product or service. You can¬†download your personal data¬†up to 6 months after you close your account. Find more information in our¬†Privacy Policy(new tab).

title: Suis-je imposable aux √âtats-Unis ?
content:
En tant que banque d√©tentrice d‚Äôune licence bancaire, nous sommes tenus de communiquer directement √† l'‚ÄùInternal Revenue Service‚Äù (IRS). Nous leurs fournissons des renseignements sur les comptes bancaires d√©tenus par les contribuables am√©ricains, conform√©ment au FATCA. Cette loi a √©t√© √©tablie par le d√©partement du Tr√©sor am√©ricain et l'IRS pour favoriser une meilleure conformit√© fiscale. Elle emp√™che les ressortissants am√©ricains de recourir aux banques et autres organismes financiers √©trangers pour √©viter de payer l‚Äôimp√¥t sur le revenu et les actifs.

Vous trouverez plus d‚Äôinformations √† propos du FATCA ici(nouvel onglet).¬†

Dans le cadre du FATCA, un ressortissant am√©ricain est d√©fini comme :
Un citoyen des Etats-Unis (y compris les binationaux)
Un r√©sident des Etats-Unis, par exemple en tant que titulaire d'une carte verte en cours de validit√© ou en tant que personne ayant r√©ussi le "Substantial Presence Test" (voir ci-dessous).

Si vous n'√™tes pas certain de savoir si vous √™tes un ressortissant des Etats-Unis, veuillez consulter un conseiller fiscal.

‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù signifie:
Que vous avez √©t√© physiquement pr√©sent aux √âtats-Unis pendant 183 jours ou plus au cours de l'ann√©e civile en cours
OU
Que vous avez √©t√© physiquement pr√©sent aux √âtats-Unis pendant 183 jours ou plus au cours des trois derni√®res ann√©es civiles :

(31 jours ou plus dans l'ann√©e civile en cours) + (le nombre de jours de pr√©sence physique aux √âtats-Unis l'ann√©e derni√®re) divis√© par 3 + (le nombre de jours de pr√©sence physique aux √âtats-Unis l'avant-derni√®re ann√©e) divis√© par 6.

De plus, si votre compte pr√©sente l'une des caract√©ristiques suivantes :
Citoyennet√© ou r√©sidence aux √âtats-Unis
Lieu de naissance aux √âtats-Unis
Adresse postale ou de r√©sidence aux √âtats-Unis, y compris les bo√Ætes postales
Num√©ro de t√©l√©phone aux √âtats-Unis
Ordres de virements permanents ou paiements r√©currents √† un compte domicili√© aux √âtats-Unis

Dans ce cas nous sommes oblig√©s de vous consid√©rer comme ressortissant des Etats-Unis, √† moins que vous ne nous transmettiez les documents suivants :¬†
Un formulaire d'auto-certification W-8BEN ou un document similaire agr√©√©, et
Un passeport ou une autre pi√®ce d'identit√© d√©livr√©e par un autre gouvernement attestant votre citoyennet√© ou de votre nationalit√© dans un pays autre que les √âtats-Unis.
Si vous √™tes n√© aux √âtats-Unis, merci de nous transmettre une copie de votre certificat de perte de nationalit√©.

title: Am I liable to tax in the United States?
content:
As a licensed bank we're required to report directly to the IRS information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers according to FATCA, a legislation designed by the US Department of Treasury and the U.S. Internal Revenue Service to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets.
You can find more information about FATCA here(new tab).¬†
In the context of FATCA, a U.S. Person is defined as, among other things:
A citizen of the United States (including dual citizens)
A resident in the United States, for example as a holder of a valid U.S. Green Card or as a person who passes the ‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù (see below).
If you're unsure as to how to determine whether you're a U.S. Person, please consult a tax advisor.
‚ÄúSubstantial Presence Test‚Äù means:
That you've been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more in the current calendar year
OR
That you have been physically present in the U.S. 183 days or more over the last three calendar years, to be calculated as follows: 


(31 days or more in the current calendar year) + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. last year) divided by 3 + (the number of days physically present in the U.S. the year before last) divided by 6.
¬†In addition, if your account shows any of the following:
U.S. citizenship or U.S. residence
U.S. place of birth
U.S. mailing or residence address, including U.S. PO boxes
U.S. telephone number
Standing instructions to a U.S. address or an account maintained in the US
we're still obliged to treat you as a U.S. Person, unless we receive the following from you:¬†
A W-8BEN or similar agreed self-certification form and
A non-U.S. passport or other government-issued identification evidencing your citizenship or nationality in a country other than the U.S.
In case you were born in the US, a copy of your Certificate of Loss of Nationality of the US.

title: Que sont les Espaces Partag√©s ?
content:
Espaces Partag√©s est une nouvelle fonctionnalit√© qui permet aux utilisateurs de N26 d‚Äôorganiser leurs d√©penses communes ou d‚Äô√©conomiser pour un projet commun avec leurs amis. Ces espaces peuvent √™tre utilis√©s pour partager des factures entre colocataires, pour pr√©voir le budget de ses prochaines vacances entre amis ou faire un pot commun pour le cadeau d‚Äôanniversaire d‚Äôun proche, par exemple.
Les espaces partag√©s sont disponibles pour les utilisateurs premium (N26 You / N26 Business You / N26 Metal), qui peuvent cr√©er et inviter des participants √† contribuer √† un espace partag√©.
Tous les utilisateurs N26, quel que soit le compte qu‚Äôils poss√®dent, peuvent √™tre invit√©s √† rejoindre un espace partag√©.
L‚Äôadministrateur de l‚Äôespace partag√© poss√®de l‚Äôargent contenu dans ce dernier.
L‚Äôadministrateur peut inviter jusqu‚Äô√† 10 participants dans un espace partag√©.
Comme pour tous les espaces, les espaces partag√©s ne sont ni rattach√©s √† un IBAN ni √† une carte.

title: Comment synchroniser ou d√©synchroniser mon smartphone de mon compte ?
content:
Pour pouvoir utiliser votre compte N26, vous devez poss√©der un t√©l√©phone compatible, correspondant √† l‚Äôun des crit√®res suivants : iPhone (mod√®le 5s ou plus r√©cent avec la version 11 ou sup√©rieure d'iOS) ou Android (version 6.0 ou sup√©rieure - nous ne prenons pas en charge les versions personnalis√©es d'Amazon Fire et d'Oxygen OS).
Pour des raisons de s√©curit√©, vous ne pouvez synchroniser qu‚Äôun seul t√©l√©phone avec votre compte.
S‚Äôil s‚Äôagit de la premi√®re synchronisation de votre t√©l√©phone avec votre compte N26, entrez simplement le code √†¬†4 chiffres que vous recevez par SMS¬†apr√®s avoir commenc√© le processus de synchronisation.
Si vous souhaitez changer le t√©l√©phone li√© √† votre compte, pour des raisons de s√©curit√©, vous devez dans un premier temps d√©synchroniser votre ancien mobile. Pour cela, rendez-vous dans la rubrique¬†Mon compte¬†>¬†Param√®tres¬†>¬†S√©curit√©¬†et s√©lectionnez¬†D√©synchroniser votre t√©l√©phone. Nous vous enverrons un e-mail qui vous expliquera les √©tapes √† suivre.
Vous recevrez en tout deux codes par SMS pour synchroniser votre application mobile N26 √† un nouveau t√©l√©phone :
Un code d‚Äôauthentification √† 6 chiffres qui vous permet d‚Äôacc√©der √† votre compte.
Un code de synchronisation √† 4 chiffres qui vous permet de synchroniser l‚Äôapplication N26 √† votre t√©l√©phone.
Une fois votre t√©l√©phone synchronis√©, vous pourrez vous connecter √† votre compte N26 en rentrant simplement votre adresse email et votre mot de passe. Vous ne recevrez plus de code par SMS.

title: Wie erstelle ich einen Shared Space?
content:
So erstellst du einen Shared Space:
Erstelle im Spaces-Tab einen neuen Space und tippe darauf.

Tippe dann auf das M√§nnchen in der oberen rechten Ecke des Bildschirms.

Lies dir aufmerksam die Informationen unter "Mehr erfahren √ºber Shared Spaces" durch und tippe auf "Teilnehmer einladen".

Suche und w√§hle den Kontakt des N26 Nutzers aus, den du einladen m√∂chtest. Wenn die Person, die du einladen m√∂chtest, ein N26 Konto hat aber nicht in deiner Kontaktliste auftaucht, kann es daran liegen dass sie sich in der App nicht als N26 Nutzer erkennbar gemacht hat. Diese Option l√§sst sich unter Mein Konto < Einstellungen < Pers√∂nliche Einstellungen < Pers√∂nliche Daten aktivieren.

Falls n√∂tig, trage deren vollen Namen an, wie in deren N26 Konto hinterlegt.

Sieh dir die Informationen unter Kontovollmacht erteilen (die rechtliche √úbersicht) an. Wenn du die Nutzungsbestimmungen durchgelesen und akzeptiert hast, tippe auf das K√§stchen "Kontovollmacht erteilen".

Gib deine Best√§tigungs-PIN ein.

Tippe auf den jeweiligen Teilnehmer aus der Teilnehmerliste.

Best√§tige auf deinem verkn√ºpften Smartphone die Push-Nachricht "Einladung senden".
Was sind Shared Spaces?
Wie kann ich Teilnehmer zu einem Shared Space hinzuf√ºgen oder davon entfernen?

title: How to create a Shared Space?
content:
To create a Shared Space:
Create a Space and tap it in the Spaces overview.

Tap the + icon in the top right-hand corner of the page.

Read the ‚ÄòLearn more‚Äô information and tap the ‚ÄòInvite new member‚Äô button.

Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you wish to invite. If the person you want to invite has an N26 account but doesn't show up in the contact list, we recommend that you ask them to check if they agreed to be visible to others N26 users via the app, in the My Account section > Settings > Personal Setting > Personal Information.

If needed, enter their full name as we have it listed.

Review the information on the Grant power of attorney page (the legal screen). Once you‚Äôve read and agreed to the T&Cs, tick the box and tap the ‚ÄòAccept power of attorney‚Äô button.

Enter your Confirmation PIN.

Tap on the relevant participant in the list of participants.

Confirm the ‚ÄòSend Invite‚Äô push notification on your paired mobile device.

title: Why can‚Äôt I get a loan?
content:
(Applies to Germany and France)
When applying for N26 Credit, we ask about your personal and financial situation during our assessment. If N26 isn‚Äôt your main account, you‚Äôll need to securely log into your online bank account at another bank to continue with the application.
For second bank accounts, we only accept banks from the country where you‚Äôre applying from (for example, French customers can only add a French bank account and German customers can only add a German bank account).
We‚Äôll also look at your current SCHUFA credit score. This won't negatively impact your score. However, your score isn‚Äôt the only factor: we also require information about your monthly income, excluding any payments from public authorities (such as unemployment or child benefits).
Once you‚Äôve sent an application to us, you‚Äôre unable to change your answers for 90 days (even if your creditworthiness improves). You‚Äôll have to wait until then to apply for another loan.
The decision is then calculated through an automated process.
If you'd like more information, here's how you can get in touch with us.

title: How to declare my N26 account for my taxes in France?
content:
(Applies to all French residents)
According to the French General Tax Code, all French residents are required to declare any bank accounts they have opened, used, or closed within the year of declaring an income. This includes your N26 bank account. To do this:
In your tax return, check the box Foreign account opened, used or closed (8UU) (Compte √©tranger ouvert, utilis√© ou ferm√©).
Complete the Cerfa n¬∞ 3916(new tab) form and attach it to your tax return.

title: Comment modifier mes informations personnelles ?
content:
Il est important de garder vos donn√©es personnelles √† jour : elles sont directement li√©es √† votre compte N26. Certaines actions sur votre compte N26 ou sur l‚Äôapplication ne sont possibles qu'apr√®s une identification, comme c‚Äôest le cas par exemple lorsque vous synchronisez votre t√©l√©phone. Vous devez √©galement garder votre num√©ro de t√©l√©phone √† jour pour recevoir des SMS et des MoneyBeam.
Voici vos options pour modifier vos informations :
Adresse de livraison,¬†mot de passe,¬†informations fiscales : Vous pouvez changer ces information √† n‚Äôimporte quel moment dans votre application N26. Pour cela, veuillez vous rendre dans la section¬†üë§Mon compte¬†et cliquez sur¬†Param√®tres ou S√©curit√© selon les donn√©es √† modifier.
Nom¬†et¬†genre : Contactez nous par Livechat. Apr√®s avoir v√©rifi√© votre identit√©, nous vous demanderons de nous transmettre la copie de votre nouveau document d‚Äôidentit√© ainsi que celle d‚Äôun document officiel confirmant le changement (un certificat de mariage ou un extrait de naissance par exemple). Nous pouvons √©galement commander une nouvelle carte avec votre nouveau nom une fois que votre compte a √©t√© mis √† jour.
Nationalit√© : Contactez nous par Livechat. Apr√®s avoir v√©rifi√© votre identit√©, nous aurons besoin de la copie de votre nouveau document d‚Äôidentit√©.
Num√©ro de t√©l√©phone¬†et¬†adresse email : Pour changer ces informations, vous devez nous contacter. En effet, nous avons besoin de v√©rifier votre identit√© avant de modifier ces informations, nous ne pouvons donc pas le faire par email. La fa√ßon la plus simple de nous contacter est le Livechat disponible depuis votre application N26.

title: How to contact N26?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏èFor UK customers, click here(new tab)
If you want to reach out, you can open a chat with us directly within the mobile or WebApp, or from certain Support Center(new tab) articles.¬†As an online bank we don't have branches.

title: How to invite friends to join N26?
content:
You can start inviting friends as soon as you have access to your account, in the mobile app or¬†N26 WebApp.(new tab) To invite friends:
on iOS:
Log into the mobile app and tap on the Explore tab next to the + button.
Tap on Refer friends.

Select one of the options available for sharing. 
Write a message to your friend or use the default then tap Send.
on Android:

Tap on your Referral Code to copy it.
Tap Tell a friend.
Select one of the options available for sharing.
Write a message to your friend or use the default then tap Send.
Find out how you can be rewarded for your referrals with our¬†Refer a Friend Program¬†(available in select countries).

title: How can I invite friends to join N26?
content:
You can start inviting friends from the N26 mobile application and web application as soon as you have access to your account. Once your friend successfully opens their N26 account and spends $10, you will get $10 from us and your friend will get $5!
To invite friends:
On iOS and Android
Log into your account and tap on the ‚ÄúExplore‚Äù button.
Tap on ‚ÄúRefer friends‚Äù.
Tap on ‚ÄúTell a friend‚Äù. 
Select one of the options available for sharing.
Write a message to your friend or use the default message then tap ‚ÄúSend‚Äù.
On the web application
Log into your account, then go to ‚ÄúMy Account‚Äù in the top right-hand corner of the screen. 
Click on the ‚ÄúInvite your friends‚Äù option (next to the gift box icon).
After reading the instructions and viewing the terms and conditions, click on ‚ÄúStart inviting‚Äù.
You can copy your unique referral code by clicking on it or you can send the referral directly via your preferred sharing method.
Related Topics:
‚ÄúDoes the link that I sent my friend expire?‚Äù
The link does not expire and can be used at any time, unless your friend has already started the sign-up process. Please note that we reserve the right to cancel this promotion at any time.
‚ÄúCan I invite more than one person?‚Äù
You can share your unique and personal referral code with more than one friend. You can even post it on social media!
‚ÄúHow can I check the status of a referral?‚Äù
You can check on the status of a referral directly through the N26 mobile or web application. To check on the status of a referral:
In the mobile application:
Log into your account.
Tap on ‚ÄúExplore‚Äù. 
Tap on ‚ÄúRefer friends‚Äù.
Tap on ‚ÄúSee your Invites‚Äù.
Any friends who have used your referral code will be displayed. 
In the web application:
Log into your account.
Click on ‚ÄúMy Account‚Äù in the upper right-hand corner.
Click on ‚ÄúInvite your friends‚Äù.
Any friends who have used your referral code will be displayed. 
‚ÄúCan I invite someone outside of the US?‚Äù
No - N26 accounts are available only to US residents.
‚ÄúHow does the referral bonus work?‚Äù
When your friend has completed the sign-up process and made a purchase that is equal to or more than $10 with their N26 Visa debit card, both parties will receive the bonus ($10 for the person who made the referral and $5 for their friend). In order to qualify for a bonus, the purchase must be a single transaction that is at least $10, not a¬†series of transactions that add up to $10
‚ÄúHow long does it take for my friend and I to receive the referral bonus?‚Äù
The referral credit should be added to your accounts immediately once the conditions mentioned above are met. 
The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Custom Audiences
content:
Data Processing in the framework of Facebook Custom Audiences
Custom Audiences allows us to exclude you, as an existing N26 customer, from our advertisements. We do not want to display irrelevant ads to you. Furthermore, it allows us to define a relevant target group for which the displayed ads are more relevant than for other Facebook users. These so called ‚ÄúLookalike-Audiences‚Äù are more similar to our customers than the average Facebook user.¬†
In order to profit from the benefits as described above we provide a hashed version of your N26 email address to Facebook. The so-called ‚Äúhashing‚Äù is a form of pseudonymisation which encrypts your email address in a way that you can no longer be identified by this hashed email address. Facebook then matches this email address against your potential Facebook email address. After the matching, regardless of whether it was successful or not, any hashed email addresses are deleted within 6-8 hours by Facebook. Facebook does not share these data with third parties or other advertisers or grants access to these data. You can find this and further information in the terms of Facebook Custom Audiences(new tab).
You can revoke your consent according to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR to this data processing in the N26 web app at any time.

title: Can I open an N26 account in my country?
content:
We offer our accounts in the following countries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, and the US.
You can open your account if you live in one of these countries and meet our¬†requirements. Our products and services vary by country. Should you have an existing account with us and move to a country where N26 is not yet available for 18 months or more please get in touch with our Customer Support.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: How to get push messages?
content:
We send you push messages to finalize transfers (such as¬†MoneyBeam) or to confirm a service (as with¬†CASH26). If you aren‚Äôt receiving these messages, first check that notifications are enabled for both your phone and the app. Then try some of our troubleshooting suggestions, depending on your smartphone:
Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Apple App Store and connect your smartphone again.
Check whether you‚Äôre logged into your N26 app.
Make sure messaging for the app has been activated in the general settings of your smartphone.
Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Google Play Store and connect your smartphone again.
Go to your Account settings and activate notification by tapping App settings then Notifications.
Huawei and Xiaomi: go to Settings then Advanced settings and Battery settings. Then set N26 as a protected app.
OnePlus: select battery optimization then the N26 app and then don't optimize.
Oppo: disable battery optimization for the app and lock it in the Recent apps overview.

title: How to do contactless payments work?
content:
It‚Äôs not possible to deactivate contactless payments. If you‚Äôre experiencing issues with your contactless payments, keep in mind that:¬†¬†
To activate contactless payments, you must first use your card at an ATM or payment terminal.¬†

Transactions up to ‚Ç¨50 don‚Äôt require a card PIN*. For amounts over ‚Ç¨50, you‚Äôll need to enter your card PIN.¬†
*If the merchant's payment system supports this option.
Make sure your card is held directly onto an NFC-compatible payment terminal. If you remove your card too fast or didn‚Äôt hold it close enough, just try again.¬†

N26 Metal cards only have NFC on the backside of the card. Make sure to hold the backside of the card against the terminal to use NFC (using the front won‚Äôt work).

title: Why was I charged more than expected?
content:
All transactions take place in real-time. We'll alert you when any incoming or outgoing transaction happens via push message.
Sometimes a transaction could look suspicious because the final debited amount can differ from the original transaction amount for a few reasons:
A merchant blocks a higher amount for a deposit (for example, at a gas station, or a car rental or hotel booking), and the difference is credited to your account once the deposit is no longer required.
Changes in exchange rates may result in slight differences in the total for transactions made in foreign currencies.
In both cases, we don‚Äôt charge interest for the difference in amounts.
But if you‚Äôre certain that a transaction is unauthorized by you, we could help¬†get your money back.

title: How to use Apple Pay?
content:
(Applies to Germany, Austria, France, Italy, Spain, Finland, Ireland, Iceland, Greece, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Portugal, Slovakia, Estonia, Belgium, Poland, Norway, Netherlands, Sweden, Denmark, Switzerland and the UK)
Apple Pay allows you to make payments with your smartphone so you don‚Äôt have to carry your Mastercard everywhere.
We‚Äôve made a¬†video(new tab)¬†to help you set up your N26 Mastercard with Apple Pay.
Some tips to keep in mind:
Your iPhone region matches the country where your Mastercard was first shipped to (you can check your region by selecting Settings then General and Language & Region in your phone).

If you‚Äôve lost your iPhone and aren‚Äôt able to find it again using Find My iPhone, you can always access your iCloud and remove all Apple Pay devices via the web browser on a Mac or PC. In addition, you should turn on Lost Mode to block your Mastercard for Apple Pay. Payments with your physical card will still be possible.

If your N26 Mastercard is unexpectedly removed from Apple Wallet, it may be because you have logged out of your iCloud, turned off Passcode or Touch ID, reset your device to factory settings via iTunes, or deleted all the content and settings from your device. In all cases, you can simply add your card again. Keep in mind that the card won‚Äôt be removed if you update your operating system, reset your personal device settings, or turn off Find My iPhone.

For in-store or online purchases, you must authorize your payment via Touch ID or using your passcode. If you‚Äôre using Apple Watch, authorizations are done by double-clicking on the side button. And if you‚Äôre using your Mac, authorize your payment by using Touch ID via the Touch Bar in the top-right corner of your keyboard.

If you're an N26 Metal or N26 Business You customer, it may happen that the card image displayed in your Apple Wallet shows as an N26 You card (for Metal customers) or as an N26 Business card (for Business You customers). We're working now to resolve this. Rest assured that this does not affect the usability of Apple Pay or your premium membership.

Make sure your device meets the technical requirements by visiting Apple Support(new tab):
iPhone 6 or later, iPhone SE: available in apps, stores and web
Apple Watch paired with iPhone 5 or later: available in apps and stores
iPad Pro, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 3, iPad mini 4: available in apps and web
Macs introduced in 2012 or later (Macs other than the MacBook Pro with Touch Bar and Touch ID require an iPhone or Apple Watch: available in web

title: How do I change my Confirmation PIN?
content:
You can change your Confirmation PIN at any time in the mobile application or WebApp.
In the mobile application:
Tap on the My Account icon (‚Äú üë§‚Äù)
Tap on ‚ÄúSettings‚Äù.
Select ‚ÄùSecurity‚Äù. 
Select ‚ÄúChange Confirmation PIN‚Äù.
Enter the 10-digit token number on your Visa debit card.
Create and confirm your new Confirmation PIN.
In the WebApp(new tab):
Click on ‚Äú üë§ My Account‚Äù.
Click on ‚ÄùSecurity Settings‚Äù. 
Select ‚ÄúChange Confirmation PIN‚Äù.
Enter the 10-digit token number on your Visa debit card.
Create and confirm your new Confirmation PIN.
If you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times, you'll need to wait 24 hours before trying again.
Please note that, for security reasons, your PIN cannot contain:
Parts of your date of birth or your address
Repeated numbers (such as 1111, 111, or 11), or sequences (such as 1234 or 4321). 
If the PIN you‚Äôve chosen is not accepted, please try again using a different one. 
If your card was stolen or lost, contact Customer Support immediately by phone at 1-888-N26-0-N26 (1-888-626-0626) or chat through the mobile app or WebApp(new tab).

title: How to find my IBAN or account number?
content:
You can find your IBAN and our BIC number on your balance statements or in¬†üë§ My Account¬†from the mobile app or¬†WebApp(new tab)¬†(if you haven‚Äôt activated your card and need to¬†top up your account).
All our IBANs start with DE followed by the¬†check digits¬†(two numbers), then our¬†bank code¬†10011001, and end with your 10-digit¬†account number¬†(start at 26).
If you open your account in the UK, you won't have an IBAN, but you will find your account number and our sort code 04-00-26 in the same section.
You can easily share your information through the share button in¬†üë§ My Account. Or you can download your bank account information as a PDF by logging into the¬†WebApp(new tab)¬†and selecting the cloud icon on the top-right corner of¬†Transactions.

title: How to dispute a transaction?
content:
We understand that disputed charges (also called ‚Äòchargebacks‚Äô) can cost you time and money.
We can only dispute card transactions that are visible in your monthly balance statement and haven‚Äôt been made more than 120 days ago. Please complete the dispute form (EU(new tab)¬†or¬†UK(new tab)) and send it to us. Also, make sure that you:
Complete a separate form for each card payment and sign it
Select only one dispute reason
Attach all¬†additional documents(new tab)

title: Warum wurde mir eine Lastschriftgeb√ºhr berechnet?
content:
Wenn eine Lastschrift aufgrund unzureichender Deckung* deines Kontos zur√ºckgeht, wird gem√§√ü unseren Allgemeinen Gesch√§ftsbedingungen(neuen Tab) eine Geb√ºhr von 3 ‚Ç¨ erhoben. Wenn dein Kontostand durch diese Geb√ºhr in das Soll f√§llt, werden auch √úberziehungszinsen in H√∂he von 8.9% f√§llig. 
Du kannst diese Geb√ºhren vermeiden, indem du sicher stellst, dass du gen√ºgend Geld auf deinem Konto hast, um eingehende Lastschriften bis 18 Uhr am selben Werktag abzudecken.
Da SEPA-√úberweisungen mehr als einen Tag dauern k√∂nnen, empfehlen wir dir, den f√§lligen Betrag mit MoneyBeam (zwischen N26 Konten) oder CASH26 (wenn du in Deutschland oder √ñsterreich wohnst) zu √ºberweisen. Bei beiden Methoden wird der Betrag sofort deinem Konto gutgeschrieben. 
Und wenn du eine Lastschrift nicht anerkennst, kannst du sie in der App r√ºckg√§ngig machen.

*In Polen, Schweden, D√§nemark und Norwegen: Wenn du eine Lastschrift in deiner Landesw√§hrung einrichtest, bestimmt die Bank des Zahlungsempf√§ngers die Geb√ºhren f√ºr den W√§hrungsumtausch sowie den endg√ºltigen Betrag, der bei uns abgebucht wird.

title: ¬øC√≥mo recibir mensajes push?
content:
Te mandamos mensajes push para finalizar transferencias (como por ejemplo¬†MoneyBeam) o para confirmar servicios (como¬†CASH26). Si no est√°s recibiendo estos mensajes, primero verifica que las notificaciones est√°n activadas tanto en tu m√≥vil como en la app. Despu√©s prueba nuestras soluciones dependiendo del tel√©fono que tengas:
Elimina la aplicaci√≥n y reinicia tu smartphone. Desc√°rgate e instala la √∫ltima versi√≥n de la app en la App Store de Apple y¬†conecta tu smartphone¬†de nuevo.
Verifica si ha iniciado sesi√≥n en tu app N26
Aseg√∫rate de que los mensajes est√©n activados en los ajustes generales para esta app en concreto.
Elimina la aplicaci√≥n y reinicia tu smartphone. Descarga e instala la √∫ltima versi√≥n de la app N26 en la Google Play Store y¬†conecta tu smartphone de nuevo.
Ve a¬†Mi cuenta¬†y activa las notificaciones pulsando¬†Configuraci√≥n de la app¬†y luego¬†Notificaciones.
Huawei y Xiaomi: entra en¬†Ajustes, despu√©s¬†Ajustes Avanzados¬†y finalmente en¬†Ajustes de Bater√≠a. Elige la app N26 como una app protegida.
OnePlus: Selecciona la opci√≥n de optimizar la bater√≠a y despu√©s la app N26; finalmente no desactiva tal optimizaci√≥n.
Oppo: deshabilita las opciones de optimizaci√≥n de la bater√≠a para la app y bloqu√©alo en el¬†Resumen de apps recientes.

title: Warum wurde mir etwas doppelt berechnet?
content:
Wir bieten dir Banking in Echtzeit. Das bedeutet, dass du Prozesse hinter deinem Konto sehen kannst, die du sonst nicht sehen w√ºrdest. Es gibt zwei Haupttransaktionsarten, die bei einem Kauf in einem Gesch√§ft oder im Internet stattfinden:
Autorisierungen. Ein Betrag, der von einem Einzelh√§ndler oder Verk√§ufer blockiert oder reserviert wurde. Dies kann alles von der morgendlichen Tasse Kaffee bis hin zu Hotel- oder Mietwagenbuchungen (einschlie√ülich Kautionen) sein.
Buchungen. Der tats√§chliche Betrag, der von deinem Konto abgeht. Die Tasse Kaffee wurde endg√ºltig von deinem Konto abgebucht, du hast deine Kaution nach dem Auschecken im Hotel zur√ºckerhalten oder das Auto unversehrt zur√ºckgegeben.
Sobald eine Autorisierung best√§tigt wurde, k√∂nnen wir sie nicht mehr stornieren oder r√ºckg√§ngig machen. An diesem Punkt k√∂nnen¬†mit deiner Autorisierung¬†ein paar Dinge passieren:¬†Sie wird zu einer Buchung, sie wird abgelehnt oder sie verf√§llt¬†(und kehrt nach sp√§testens 12 Tagen automatisch auf dein Konto zur√ºck). Nicht vergessen:
Manchmal siehst du sowohl die Autorisierung als auch die endg√ºltige Buchung, wenn es am Zahlungsterminal technische Probleme gibt oder die Verbindung w√§hrend des Vorgangs unterbrochen wurde. Letztlich erlischt diese Autorisierung. Wenn das nach 12 Tagen nicht passiert ist, k√∂nnen wir dir helfen, dein Geld zur√ºckzubekommen.
Verifizierungsautorisierungen (in der Regel sehr kleine Betr√§ge) werden verwendet, um zu pr√ºfen, ob deine Karte aktiv ist (z.B. beim Google Play Store). Dieses Geld wird auf dein Konto zur√ºck√ºberwiesen.
Die H√∂he einer Autorisierung kann aus verschiedenen Gr√ºnden von der endg√ºltigen Vorlage abweichen.

title: How to create and manage standing orders?
content:
When setting up an outgoing transfer in either the N26 app or Web app you‚Äôll have the option to make it a standing order.
Once you complete the outgoing transfer you'll then be prompted to tick a box which will create a standing order. After you've inputted the amount of the transfer and its recipient, under the reference text field select "Want to save this as a standing order?". From here you'll be able to set the start/end dates of the standing order and choose its payment intervals.
To view your scheduled transfers and standing orders directly in the mobile app:
Go to your transaction list (the main screen).
Then tap on the 3 dots located in the upper¬†right corner for Android and on the top of the transaction list for iOS. 
A small window will pop, where you will be able to select "Standing Orders".
Here you can cancel and/or modify the details of your standing order. To cancel it just tap the standing order you wish to delete and tap the trash icon in the top right-hand corner.
‚ÑπÔ∏è ¬†Please note, if a standing order fails due to insufficient funds we won't attempt the transfer again - you'll need to manually send the transfer, however the next scheduled transfers will proceed as normal.

title: How to export a list of my transactions?
content:
Our¬†web app(new tab)¬†allows you to search within your transactions. You can also download a history of your transactions in CSV format. To export your transaction list:
From Transactions, click on the cloud icon in the upper-right corner to reach Downloads

Under CSV you can select the Start Date and End Date and Download CSV
You can also sort your transactions using¬†categories and hashtags¬†in the app.
To view and download PDFs of your (preliminary and previous) monthly balance statements:
In the web app(new tab): From Transactions, click on the cloud icon in the upper-right corner to reach Downloads then select Bank statements.

In the mobile app: From the Home screen, tap on the three bullet points in the top-right corner of the screen and choose Balance statements.

title: ¬øC√≥mo proteger mi cuenta?
content:
La seguridad de tu cuenta y tu informaci√≥n personal es nuestra m√°xima prioridad.
Si alguna vez tienes la sensaci√≥n de que los credenciales de acceso a tu cuenta N26 pueden estar comprometidos, o de que alguien est√° intentando hacerse pasar por ti, es crucial que cambies la contrase√±a de tu cuenta N26 inmediatamente.
Para hacerlo, inicia sesi√≥n en la app y ve a Mi cuenta > Configuraciones > Seguridad. Por favor, crea una contrase√±a segura y no reveles tus credenciales a nadie.
Como titular de la cuenta, t√∫ y solo t√∫ deber√≠as conocer tus credenciales de inicio de sesi√≥n. Te recomendamos que visites nuestro art√≠culo ¬øC√≥mo proteger mi identidad? para ver consejos sobre la protecci√≥n de tu identidad.
Si crees que tu cuenta puede estar comprometida o que se ha alterado algo, por favor, ponte en contacto con nosotros inmediatamente.

Si no tienes acceso a la app de tu m√≥vil ni a la WebApp, tambi√©n puedes pedir que bloqueemos tu tarjeta o tu cuenta llamando al +34 910 480 660.

title: Warum habe ich meinen Freundschaftsbonus noch nicht erhalten?
content:
Sobald deine Freunde alle Voraussetzungen des¬†Freundschaftswerbungsprogramms¬†erf√ºllt haben, best√§tigen wir deinen Bonus. Du kannst den Status in deiner mobilen App oder¬†WebApp(neuen Tab)¬†einsehen.
In den meisten F√§llen hast du den Werbebonus noch nicht erhalten, weil noch keine Zahlung mit der Mastercard in H√∂he von 15 ‚Ç¨ get√§tigt wurde. Stelle sicher, dass du deine Freunde √ºber diese Voraussetzung informierst.
Es kann bis zu 60 Tage dauern, bis der Bonus ausgezahlt wird.
N26 beh√§lt sich das Recht vor, den Empfehlungsbonus im Fall eines Versto√ües gegen unsere¬†AGB(neuen Tab) einzubehalten.

title: Shared Spaces - Trusted Beneficiary
content:
A trusted beneficiary of a Shared Space can:
Transfer money from their own Spaces (including other Shared Spaces of which they are a participant) to a Shared Space. 
Access and freely transfer the funds of a Shared Space at any time.
Leave a Shared Space at any time.
Transfers between a trusted beneficiary and a Shared Space do not need to be authenticated via Pin and Push notification. This means that beneficiaries can seamlessly drag-and-drop money via the N26 app and Web app similarity to how normal Space transactions work.

Why do I need to classify an owner or member as a trusted beneficiary?
European banking law regulates how bank transfers must be authorised.¬†
In this law strong customer authentication (SCA) is a requirement to make online payments more secure.¬†
One exception to this is the classification of a person in a Shared Space as a ‚Äútrusted beneficiary‚Äù so that transfers to this person do not require SCA.
What are Shared Spaces?
How to add or remove Shared Space participants?

title: Where is my refund?
content:
Your refund will be visible in the app on the day of the original transaction, not the refund date. Scroll down your transaction list or download your previous balance statements to find it.
To view and download PDFs of your (preliminary and previous) monthly balance statements:
On the WebApp(new tab): From Transactions, click on the cloud icon in the upper-right corner to reach Downloads then select Bank statements.

On the mobile app: 
If you're using an iPhone, tap on the three dots to the right of your current balance from the main screen. A menu will pop up and will give you the option to access your balance statement.¬†
For Androids, you'll find the option under Statistics (just tap the 3 dots in the top right-hand corner).

title: Spazi Condivisi - Cos'√® il Potere Legale?
content:
Il modello legale utilizzato per Spazi Condivisi si chiama Potere Legale (Kontovollmacht in Tedesco).¬†
I partecipanti di uno Spazio Condiviso non hanno pari propriet√† del conto come un conto condiviso nel senso bancario tradizionale. Dopo aver ricevuto il Potere Legale i partecipanti ottengono il diritto di agire a nome dell'amministratore, per tutto ci√≤ che riguarda il trasferimento dei fondi entro lo Spazio Condiviso. 
La persona che autorizza l'altro ad agire per suo conto √® denominata "Amministratore", questa persona √® il proprietario legale del conto. L'amministratore deve essere un titolare di un conto premium N26, ad esempio N26 You, N26 Metal e N26 Business You.
Ci√≤ significa che chiunque abbia creato lo Spazio Condiviso ne √® il suo proprietario legale. L'amministratore di uno Spazio Condiviso:¬†
- E' il proprietario di tutti i fondi presenti nello Spazio Condiviso.
- Pu√≤ trasferire fondi liberamente dentro e fuori dal conto in qualsiasi momento.
- Pu√≤ invitare partecipanti al proprio Spazio Condiviso garantendo loro il Potere Legale. 
- Pu√≤ revocare il Potere Legale di un partecipante in qualsiasi momento.
- Pu√≤ anche chiudere uno Spazio Condiviso dopo aver rimosso un partecipante (tutti i fondi di quello Spazio Condiviso saranno trasferiti nel conto principale del proprietario). 
Garantendo il Potere Legale ad una persona, quest'ultima avr√† accesso ad ogni fondo presente nello Spazio Condiviso.  Questo significa che ogni partecipante potr√† trasferire fondi liberamente dentro e fuori dal conto in qualsiasi momento.

N26 Bank GmbH non pu√≤ essere ritenuta responsabile per i pagamenti coperti dal Potere Legale.

title: ¬øC√≥mo funciona 3D Secure?
content:
3D Secure te protege de fraudes en pagos online y se activa autom√°ticamente cuando activas tu tarjeta en la app. No requiere contrase√±as adicionales.
Cuando hagas un pago online¬†utilizando tu Mastercard, 3D Secure confirma la transacci√≥n en 5 minutos mediante un mensaje push en la aplicaci√≥n. Si no ves la transacci√≥n, prueba algunos de estos¬†consejos para solucionarlo.
Si haces una compra desde tu tel√©fono, ver√°s una transacci√≥n pendiente en la app. Pulsa en el icono de la campana y aparecer√° un mensaje push en tu pantalla para que confirmes y finalices tu compra. Despu√©s, vuelve a la p√°gina del vendedor. Deber√≠as ver la confirmaci√≥n de tu compra en unos instantes.
¬øQuieres ganar dinero hablando de nosotros a tus amigos? Consigue 15 ‚Ç¨ por cada amigo al que invites a unirse a N26. Inf√≥rmate m√°s sobre el programa Invita a un amigo(pesta√±a nueva).

title: PSD2 - Strong Customer Authentication
content:
SCA acts as an additional layer of security for all N26 customers by providing Two-Factor Authentication (2FA). This is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. You‚Äôre probably familiar with using just your personal password to sign in to your account but with Two-Factor Authentication you‚Äôll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.
When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you‚Äôll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number to confirm your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log into your N26 account. 
When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. Therefore, the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.
SCA is being introduced as part of the revised European Payments Services Directive (PSD2) which applies to all European Banks. The objective of PSD2 is to enhance the security of the customers‚Äô data and account security. Find out more about PSD2 in our dedicated article about the PSD2. 
I cannot log into my account. How do I solve this?
First, try update your phone to the newest version. If you still cannot log into your account but still have access to your registered email address, please try to reset your password. If you don‚Äôt have access to your registered email address, please contact us via our live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out. 
I lost access to my paired device. How will I be able to log into my account again?
If you lost access to your paired device but you still have access to your registered phone number, please log into your N26 account and request an authentication code. To do this:
Login to the Webapp
When prompted to confirm your login on your paired device, select Help 
Choose Send SMS Code
Once you receive the SMS code, input it into the Webapp
As you confirm the authentication code you‚Äôve completed two-factor authentication and you‚Äôll be able to pair your new device with your account again.
If you don‚Äôt have access to your registered phone number - either because you have a new phone number or your phone was lost or stolen - please contact our customer service via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out. 
What if my phone doesn‚Äôt support the latest app version?
If you have an older smartphone device that doesn‚Äôt support the latest app version,  you won‚Äôt be able to access N26 via the mobile app anymore using your phone.¬†
You can still use our Webapp to view your account, to do this you'll need to confirm your login attempt via an SMS verification code which we‚Äôll send to your account's registered phone number. 
You‚Äôll still be able to complete card transactions and cash withdrawals as normal using your Mastercard but bear in mind that you won't be able to perform any bank transfers or payments until you can confirm the transfer within the N26 app.

title: Why does N26 do checks on transactions?
content:
We have the responsibility to run routine checks on accounts and transactions in order to ensure your account‚Äôs security (see GwG ¬ß 10(new tab)). These checks are automatically initiated by our systems.¬†
As a result, we may ask you to provide some documents. If you receive such a request, please send the requested documents via Messages from N26. There are no exceptions or evasion for such checks.¬†
This practice is a standard banking procedure and ensures the safety of our customers. Both the process and the result are confidential and handled internally. Here are some tips to speed up the process:
The document that we need you to provide will be exactly named in the message you‚Äôll receive from N26. You can send us scanned documents, pictures, or screenshots, as long as the original content of the document is easily readable. Please make sure to also provide a detailed description.¬†
Be precise in your answers, details, and documents. After we receive your required proof and description, we will let you know if your reply fulfills our check. In a few cases, we might ask for further clarification which could prolong the process.
Reply as soon as possible, always before the deadline stated in the message you received from N26. Use that email to reply and send attachments.¬†
Our Customer Support doesn‚Äôt have any additional information on this subject.
You must provide valid documentation depending on your situation.

 Find here some examples:
You've received financial help from your family to complete projects or have inherited land or money from deceased relatives.
A granting/loan contract, an official document of inheritance, or an official document of the source of the loan (such as the sales documents of a sold property to finance the loan or bank statements of granting relatives).
You've sold a property or your shares on the stock market.
The contract showing the agreed transactions or the official notarial documentation of the transfer of property.
You've received or sent money to pay bills or buy a product.
Documents showing the balance statements confirming the source of this money or documents showing the use of the money and its purpose.
You've received a final payout from your previous employer.
Documents proving the end of your employment, detailing the payment and/or a bank statement from your previous employer.

title: How do I add money to my N26 account?
content:
We make it easy to fund your N26 account. You can add money via several methods, including direct deposit, transfer from external bank, external bank account to N26 (ACH transfer) debit card transfer (non funded accounts only), and MoneyBeam, to name a few. Please look below for more information. 
Direct Deposit:  If you intend to fund your account via direct deposit, simply provide the sender (your employer, financial institution, Armed Forces, Social Security, etc.) with our ABA routing number (122287675) and your personal N26 account number.¬†
You can locate your account number by clicking on the ‚ÄúMy Account‚Äù option on the top right side of the website (and the mobile application) after logging into your N26 account.
In case your employer needs a direct deposit form, please click here(new tab).¬†

Transfer from external bank:  Transfer money from your external bank into your N26 account, conveniently, from within the N26 mobile application.
To transfer funds to your N26 account using the N26 mobile application, follow these steps:
Launch your N26 mobile application.
Tap the Actions button at the bottom right of your mobile's screen.
Tap on Add Money.
Tap External bank transfer
Select the account to use to transfer funds from.
Enter the amount you want to transfer.
Tap Continue.
Enter your 4 digit Confirmation PIN.
Tap Confirm transfer to initiate the transfer.
A message will be displayed in your Transaction List indicating that the transfer is scheduled.

External Bank Account to N26 (ACH transfer):  Transfer funds directly from your primary bank account into your N26 account with an ACH Transfer.
Log into your financial institution's online banking platform or mobile app (if applicable).
Locate the ‚ÄúExternal Transfers‚Äù or ‚ÄúTransfer Money‚Äù or ‚ÄúExternal Account‚Äù or similar option and add your N26 checking account as a new account.
The bank account originating the transfer does not have to be under your name. However, please make sure that the recipient‚Äôs name is your full name as entered during the account sign-up process.
Input our ABA routing number (122287675) and your personal checking account number.
You can locate your account number by clicking on the ‚ÄúMy Account‚Äù option on the top right side of the website or by clicking the icon in the mobile app, after logging into your N26 account.
Your financial institution may make a small test deposit(s) into your N26 account, within a few days, to verify your account. Typically, to complete the process, you may have to confirm the test deposit(s) with the originating financial institution.
Upon completing the initial process, you should be able to transfer funds in or out of your N26 account using the third party banks fund transfer feature.
¬†Note:¬†
Please be advised that these are general guidelines and your financial institution‚Äôs requirements may differ.
Some banks may experience issues processing money transfers to the routing number 122287675. At this time, ACH bank transfers from Capital One and from USAA are not available to fund your N26 account. If you encounter this issue, please use another bank account to transfer money into your N26 account.

Debit card transfer (Non Funded Accounts Only):  Use a debit card to instantly fund your account right from the app. This is the fastest and simplest way to add money to your N26 account with a free, one-time transaction. Just log into the iOS or Android app and follow the instructions on the main screen.
This option is available to customers who have not previously funded their N26 account. 
Find additional details in this document(new tab). 

MoneyBeam:  Instantly send money to (or receive money from) other N26 members. Find additional details in our "What is MoneyBeam?(new tab)" article. 

Third party payment processors
Put money into your account using these services:
Cash App(new tab)
PayPal(new tab)
Venmo(new tab)
Zelle¬Æ(new tab)
Ingo Money(new tab) (mobile check cashing service)
Apple Cash¬Æ:  You can transfer money from Apple Cash into your N26 account.
How can I link my N26 Visa¬Æ debit card to Apple Cash?
You can link your N26 card to Apple Cash by following these steps"
Open "Wallet" on your Apple device.
Select "Apple Cash".
Tap the three dots on the upper right hand corner.
Select "Add Money".
Select "Add Card".
Position your N26 card in the frame to scan.
Tap "next" when the scan is complete.
Enter your card's 3-digit security code.
Tap "Next".
Your card is now linked.
How can I transfer money to my N26 account from Apple Cash?
Transferring money to your N26 account from Apple Cash can be achieved by following these steps:
Select "Transfer to Bank".
Enter the amount you want to transfer.
Select how quickly you want the money transferred.
"Instant Transfer".  There is a fee associated with this option.
"1-3 Business Days".  There is no charge for this option.
Done.

The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Kann ich meine Karte mit Expressversand schneller bekommen?
content:
F√ºr Metal Karten nicht verf√ºgbar.
Die Expresslieferung ist eine gute Wahl, wenn du deine Karte schnell ben√∂tigst. 
Wenn du deine erste Karte bestellst oder eine neue Karte bestellst, steht auch die Option Expressversand zur Verf√ºgung. Die Karte ist nicht nur schneller bei dir, du erh√§ltst auch noch einen Tracking-Link per E-Mail. Wenn du bei der Zustellung nicht zu Hause bist und dein Postfach nicht erreichbar ist, wird die Karte an einen Zugangspunkt in deiner N√§he geliefert (den du √ºber den Tracking-Link findest). Die Karte bleibt nur f√ºr eine begrenzte Zeit dort, danach wird sie an uns zur√ºckgesandt. Wir informieren dich in diesem Fall per E-Mail.
Wenn du die Expresslieferung w√§hlst, beachte bitte:
Deine neue N26 Mastercard wird innerhalb von drei Werktagen ausgeliefert. F√ºr Metal Karten steht die Express-Lieferung nicht zur Verf√ºgung.
Die Zustellung erfolgt zwischen 8 und 12 Uhr.
Lieferungen k√∂nnen per DHL Express in alle von uns unterst√ºtzten L√§nder innerhalb Europas erfolgen. Lieferungen in andere L√§nder sind derzeit nicht m√∂glich.
Wenn Expresslieferung als Versandart ausgew√§hlt wurde, kann die Lieferung nicht storniert oder ge√§ndert werden.
Auch wenn du dein Konto schlie√üt, wird die Geb√ºhr f√ºr die Expresslieferung f√§llig.
Wenn deine Karte nicht innerhalb von 3-5 Werktagen nach deiner Bestellung eingetroffen ist, √ºberpr√ºfe bitte den Tracking-Link auf m√∂gliche Updates. Du kannst den Tracking-Link auch verwenden, um DHL direkt √ºber die Details deiner Lieferadresse zu informieren oder die Sendung umzuleiten, wenn du zum Zeitpunkt der Lieferung nicht zuhause bist.
Bei N26 Standard und N26 You kostet eine neue Karte 6 ‚Ç¨ inklusive Standardversand oder 25 ‚Ç¨, wenn du dich f√ºr eine Expresslieferung entscheidest.

title: Comment annuler mon adh√©sion N26 You ou N26 Metal ?
content:
Le contrat d'adh√©sion de votre compte N26 You ou N26 Metal dispose d‚Äôune p√©riode d‚Äôengagement d‚Äôun an. Si vous n‚Äôannulez pas votre contrat il sera automatiquement renouvel√© pour une ann√©e suppl√©mentaire.
Dans cet article, vous trouverez comment : 
annuler votre souscription √† un compte premium pendant la p√©riode de droit de r√©traction 
mettre fin √† votre adh√©sion pendant la p√©riode d'engagement jusqu‚Äô√† un mois avant son renouvellement.
annuler le renouvellement de votre adh√©sion jusqu‚Äô√† un mois avant qu‚Äôil ne s'effectue automatiquement. 
Si vous d√©sirez annuler votre souscription √† une offre N26 You ou Metal, vous pouvez nous en faire la demande jusqu'√† 14 jours apr√®s votre souscription en nous contactant directement depuis le Livechat.
Veuillez noter qu'il ne sera pas possible de s'inscrire √† la m√™me adh√©sion dans le futur si vous annulez votre contrat avant l'√©ch√©ance du m√™me.
Si vous souhaitez mettre fin √† votre adh√©sion N26 You ou Metal pendant la p√©riode d‚Äôengagement, vous pouvez nous en faire la demande  jusqu‚Äô√† un mois avant la fin de votre contrat (apr√®s la p√©riode de r√©vocation de 14 jours pass√©e) en nous contactant depuis le Livechat.
Si vous choisissez cette option, vos avantages N26 You ou N26 Metal prendront fin, y compris l‚Äôensemble des assurances dont vous b√©n√©ficiez.
Vous pouvez annuler le renouvellement de votre adh√©sion N26 You ou N26 Metal directement depuis l‚Äôapplication jusqu‚Äô√† 4 semaines avant sa date de renouvellement automatique. Pour cela :
Allez dans üë§ Mon Compte
S√©lectionnez N26 You ou N26 Metal
Puis D√©tails de votre adh√©sion
Choisissez Annuler votre adh√©sion
Confirmez l‚Äôannulation de votre contrat depuis le message push que vous allez recevoir.
Vous pouvez continuer √† utiliser toutes les fonctionnalit√©s de votre compte N26 You ou N26 Metal jusqu'√† la fin de votre adh√©sion. L‚Äôensemble d‚Äôassurances li√© √† votre compte demeure actif jusqu'√† la fin de la p√©riode obligatoire de paiement de vos frais d'adh√©sion. Une fois votre p√©riode d'engagement termin√©e, nous vous enverrons une nouvelle carte N26 Standard. Ce changement est automatique, vous n‚Äôavez pas besoin de nous contacter.
Nous vous enverrons un email vous rappelant le renouvellement de votre adh√©sion 8 semaines avant la date anniversaire de votre contrat.
Pour fermer d√©finitivement votre compte N26, veuillez consulter l‚Äôarticle Comment puis-je cl√¥turer mon compte N26 ?.

title: Kann N26 mein Konto schlie√üen?
content:
Kurz gesagt: ja.
Wir k√∂nnen dein Konto auf drei Arten schlie√üen (mit einer K√ºndigungsfrist von 2 Monaten, 14 Tagen oder sofort). Diese K√ºndigungen sind endg√ºltig: Unser Kundenservice kann keine Informationen √ºber den Hintergrund einzelner K√ºndigungen geben und die Entscheidung auch nicht r√ºckg√§ngig machen. Du kannst deine Gesch√§ftsbeziehungen zu uns auch jederzeit, sofort und ohne Angabe von Gr√ºnden, beenden. Jegliche ausstehenden Vertragsgeb√ºhren m√ºssen vor dem Beendigungszeitpunkt beglichen werden.
2 Monate K√ºndigungsfrist
Wir sind berechtigt, jede Gesch√§ftsbeziehung mit einer Frist von 2 Monaten ohne Angabe von Gr√ºnden zu k√ºndigen (siehe ¬ß 19 Abs. 1 unserer¬†AGB(neuen Tab)¬†oder ¬ß 675h BGB).
14 Tage K√ºndigungsfrist
Wir k√∂nnen jede Gesch√§ftsbeziehung auch mit einer Frist von 14 Tagen k√ºndigen (siehe ¬ß 19 Abs. 3 unserer¬†AGB(neuen Tab)), wenn aufgrund der Verletzung vertraglicher Pflichten hinreichende Gr√ºnde hierzu vorliegen. Solche Gr√ºnde sind:
Nutzung eines Privatkontos f√ºr gesch√§ftliche Zwecke¬†Nach unseren AGB darf ein Privatkonto nur f√ºr den pers√∂nlichen Gebrauch genutzt werden. Alle √úberweisungen, die sich auf Honorare f√ºr erbrachte Dienstleistungen und/oder verkaufte Produkte beziehen, gelten als Gesch√§ftstransaktionen. Wenn du dein Konto f√ºr diesen Zweck nutzen m√∂chtest, er√∂ffne bitte ein¬†N26 Business¬†oder¬†N26 Business You Konto.
Bereitstellung falscher oder unzureichender Informationen f√ºr eine routinem√§√üige Hintergrundpr√ºfung.¬†Wir sind eine Bank, deshalb¬†√ºberpr√ºfen wir manche Transaktionen. Wenn du keine korrekten und/oder ausreichenden Angaben zu der betreffenden Transaktion machst, haben wir das Recht, die Gesch√§ftsbeziehung zu k√ºndigen, da wir deutschen Finanzvorschriften entsprechen m√ºssen. -
Missbr√§uchliches Verhalten gegen√ºber N26-Mitarbeitern.¬†Wir tolerieren kein missbr√§uchliches Verhalten gegen√ºber unseren Mitarbeitern. Die Androhung von K√∂rperverletzung oder allgemeines missbr√§uchliches Verhalten ist nach deutschem Recht strafbar und wird ausnahmslos der zust√§ndigen Beh√∂rde gemeldet.
Fristlose K√ºndigung
Wir k√∂nnen jede Gesch√§ftsbeziehung auch au√üerordentlich k√ºndigen (siehe ¬ß 19 Abs. 3 unserer¬†AGB(neuen Tab)). Das bedeutet: jederzeit, ohne Vorank√ºndigung und ohne K√ºndigungsfrist bei Vorliegen eines wichtigen Grundes f√ºr eine solche K√ºndigung. Solche Gr√ºnde sind:
Falsche Angaben gegen√ºber N26 √ºber deine finanzielle Situation, insbesondere bei der Beantragung eines Kredits
Du kannst ein Darlehen oder eine Verschuldung gegen√ºber N26 nicht zur√ºckzahlen
Nichterf√ºllung der Forderungen von N26 bez√ºglich deines Darlehens (siehe Bestellung oder Verst√§rkung von Sicherheiten, ¬ß 13 (2) unserer AGB(neuen Tab)).

title: How to protect my account?
content:
The security of your account and your personal data is our top priority.
If you ever feel that your N26 login may be compromised or that someone is trying to initiate a chat on your behalf, it‚Äôs crucial to immediately change your N26 account password.
To do so, log into the app and go to My Account > Settings > Security. Please choose a secure password(new tab) and don‚Äôt reveal your login details to anyone.
As the account holder, you and only you should create and have access to your login details. For further advice on identity protection, we encourage you to visit our article How to protect my identity?
If you believe that your account has been compromised or tampered in any way then please get in touch with us immediately.

If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126.

title: ¬øC√≥mo puedo hacer de N26 mi cuenta principal?
content:
Podemos ayudarte a convertir N26 en tu cuenta principal moviendo tus movimientos cotidianos desde otra cuenta: informaremos a cada entidad en donde tengas pagos domiciliados (como suscripciones mensuales o facturas) o a quien transfiera dinero a tu cuenta (como alg√∫n empleado), y les explicaremos c√≥mo configurar las √≥rdenes permanentes o bien c√≥mo transferir los fondos restantes. 
Lee a continuaci√≥n como hacer de N26 tu cuenta principal:
Junto a nuestro socio finleap estamos ofreci√©ndote una plataforma para, que de forma f√°cil y online, puedas cambiar de cuenta. Es un proceso autom√°tico y completamente gratuito.
Utiliza nuestro formulario(pesta√±a nueva) e inicia sesi√≥n con los datos de tu cuenta bancaria anterior. Cuando rellenes todos los campos, tardaremos entre 5 y 7 d√≠as laborales en enviar todas las cartas de notificaci√≥n respectivamente. Puede que los comercios o empresas asociadas necesiten m√°s tiempo para modificar tus datos y as√≠ cambiar las futuras transacciones.

title: How to file a complaint?
content:
If you have any questions about our products or need help with your account, we‚Äôre happy to assist. Just open a chat with us directly within the mobile app or WebApp, that's the fastest and simplest way to get in touch.
If you ever feel dissatisfied with one of our products or services, you can also send (new tab)us an email from your registered address or send your feedback by post.
If you're in the UK, you can send the email to complaints.uk@n26.com(new tab). For the rest of Europe please use complaints@n26.com(new tab).¬†
To file a complaint, please include:
your full name and address
the product or service you're not happy with
a description of your concern
the date in which the problem first appeared
We‚Äôll contact you via email to confirm that we‚Äôve received your complaint and then begin an investigation to find a solution you‚Äôre happy with. In case we need more information from you or we can provide you with an immediate solution, we‚Äôll let you know via email as well.
In case we‚Äôre not able to find a solution you‚Äôre happy with, you can escalate your complaint to an independent third party. You have a few options:
An arbitration body is available to you at the German Federal Bank (Deutsche Bundesbank).
Or you could file a complaint with the German Federal Financial Supervisory Authority (Bundesanstalt f√ºr Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht).
Also, the European Commission has set up the Online Dispute Resolution (ODR(new tab)) platform to help consumers dispute online contracts out of court.
We are committed to constantly improving our products and services. Your feedback makes this possible.

title: How to create and manage standing orders?
content:
When setting up an outgoing transfer in either the N26 app or Web app you‚Äôll have the option to make it a standing order.
Once you complete the outgoing transfer you'll then be prompted to tick a box which will create a standing order. After you've inputted the amount of the transfer and its recipient, under the reference text field select "Want to save this as a standing order?". From here you'll be able to set the start/end dates of the standing order and choose its payment intervals.
To view your scheduled transfers and standing orders directly in the mobile app:
Go to your transaction list (the main screen).
Then tap on the 3 dots located in the upper¬†right corner for Android and on the top of the transaction list for iOS. 
A small window will pop, where you will be able to select "Standing Orders".
Here you can cancel and/or modify the details of your standing order. To cancel it just tap the standing order you wish to delete and tap the trash icon in the top right-hand corner.
‚ÑπÔ∏è ¬†Please note, if a standing order fails due to insufficient funds we won't attempt the transfer again - you'll need to manually send the transfer, however the next scheduled transfers will proceed as normal.

title: Where does N26 invest my money?
content:
We strive to provide our clients' deposits for loans to our customers (provided that they have the appropriate credit rating). For the liquidity not required in the customer business, our investment strategy is low in risk.
We invest our customers' money at short notice with the Deutsche Bundesbank and other European banks in the eurozone with only good risk classes. And we refinance public-law customers mainly in Germany (cities and municipalities) and invest in euro government bonds
We're not a trading book institute. That is: we do not trade for short-term profit.
And we don't engage in speculation, whether on food, foreign exchange, bitcoins or other asset classes.

title: How to activate my card?
content:
Once you receive your physical card, you‚Äôll need to activate it. You can do this in the app only after you connect your smartphone to your account. Or you can activate it directly from the web app(new tab). 
You‚Äôll need your 10-digit token number: it‚Äôs found below your name on the front of your card (or on the back if you have an N26 You, N26 Metal, or Maestro card). 
To activate your card on the N26 app, from the Home screen:
