title: Wie investiert N26 mein Geld?
content:
Wir streben an, die Einlagen unserer Kunden auch f√ºr Kredite an unsere Kunden zur Verf√ºgung zu stellen (sofern diese √ºber eine entsprechende Bonit√§t verf√ºgen). F√ºr die nicht im Kundengesch√§ft ben√∂tigte Liquidit√§t ist unsere Anlagestrategie risikoarm.
Wir legen das Geld unserer Kunden kurzfristig bei der Deutschen Bundesbank und bei anderen europ√§ischen Banken im Euroraum mit ausschlie√ülich guten Risikoklassen an. Daneben refinanzieren wir √∂ffentlich-rechtliche Kunden haupts√§chlich in Deutschland (St√§dte und Gemeinden) und investieren in Euro-Staatsanleihen.
Wir sind kein Handelsbuchinstitut. Das hei√üt, wir betreiben keinen Handel zur kurzfristigen Gewinnerzielung.
Und wir t√§tigen auch keine Spekulationsgesch√§fte, weder auf Nahrungsmittel, Devisen, Bitcoins, noch auf andere Anlageklassen.

title: Who can get a Basiskonto?
content:
You can open a free N26 bank account through our website or by downloading our app. 
The German Payment Accounts Act (Zahlungskontengesetz or ZKG) also gives all consumers who legally reside in the European Union the right to hold a basic payment account. This applies to those who live in a supported country.
The N26 Basiskonto comes with a monthly 6‚Ç¨ account management fee. You can find all other fees in our pricing lists. 
If you don‚Äôt have a bank account at N26 or at any other financial institution in Germany yet, you can apply. Under some circumstances, N26 is allowed to reject your request. ¬†
Please note that some products and services such as N26 Overdraft, N26 Credit, N26 You, or N26 Metal are not accessible with an N26 Basiskonto.

title: How does Spaces work?
content:
Set goals, create and personalize Spaces, and transfer money between them instantly. Spaces is available in the mobile and¬†WebApp(new tab).
In addition to your main account (or primary space), you can create and delete additional Spaces as often as you‚Äôd like but the number of active Spaces at any one time depends on your account type: 2 additional Spaces with an N26 or N26 Business account or up to 10 additional Spaces with N26 You, N26 Business You and N26 Metal.
Your primary account statements will include all transactions sent to a space or received from one. You can download balance statements from the confirmation page.
Only your primary space can be negative (if you are eligible for an overdraft). All other balances in Spaces cannot be negative, meaning you can only transfer what is available in a particular space.
You can only use the balance from your primary space toward your Mastercard transactions. So consider transferring money before making a purchase if needed.
Move money from one space to another by holding down on your Main Account and dragging and dropping into your space. Once the amount is confirmed the balance is updated right away.
You can lock and unlock a space at anytime from your mobile and web app. You'll only need to confirm with your confirmation PIN. If a space is locked, you‚Äôll still be able to transfer money to it. If you need to withdraw money from a locked space, you need first to unlock it.
You'll be able to hide the amount within the Space from your account's total balance. Just go into your Space, tap the three dots in the top right corner and select ‚ÄòHide space balance‚Äô.
Spaces includes a feature called Rules which will help you manage your time and your finances effectively.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

content:

Wenn dein Kontostand dadurch in's Minus ger√§t, werden √úberziehungszinsen in der H√∂he von 8.9% erhoben. Eine Lastschrift kann nicht verz√∂gert werden.
Um diese Geb√ºhr zu vermeiden, kannst du direkt in der App pr√ºfen, ob dir ein¬†Dispokredit¬†zur Verf√ºgung steht.
*In Polen, Schweden, D√§nemark und Norwegen: Wenn du eine Lastschrift in deiner Landesw√§hrung einrichtest, bestimmt die Bank des Zahlungsempf√§ngers die Geb√ºhren f√ºr den W√§hrungsumtausch sowie den endg√ºltigen Betrag, der bei uns abgebucht wird.

title: Why didn't an ATM give me cash?
content:
It happens: you go to an ATM, the requested amount is deducted from your balance, but the machine doesn‚Äôt give you cash. 
First, check your card limits by going to üë§ My Account and selecting Card settings. Make sure ATM withdrawals are active. 
While we can‚Äôt say for sure why it happened, we can definitely help get your money back. The amount that was deducted from your balance is only an authorization (a reservation or blocked amount). Because the transaction wasn‚Äôt successful, this reserved amount will expire either in a few hours or a maximum of 12 working days and return to your balance. 
If the reserved amount doesn‚Äôt expire after 12 working days, please complete a dispute form. We‚Äôll do our best to get the money back for you. 
In the meantime, we suggest you try another ATM from a different operator. This rarely happens twice in a row.

title: How to get a Basiskonto?
content:
Download the request form(new tab) and complete it with a handwritten signature.
Take your signed form and the attached PostIdent coupon to your nearest branch of Deutsche Post to prove your identity.
Once we‚Äôve received your form and determined whether we can open a Basiskonto for you, we‚Äôll send you an email including the contract and the T&Cs(new tab).
Send your signed contract to us at Klosterstra√üe 62, 10179 Berlin.
Once we‚Äôve received your contract, we‚Äôll open your account within 10 business days.
You‚Äôll then receive a notification about your card delivery and accessing your account.

title: Why is my transfer still pending in the N26 app?
content:
You‚Äôll need your Confirmation PIN to finalize all transfers whether¬†MoneyBeam, standing orders, or¬†CASH26. Your transfer will remain pending until you either¬†Confirm¬†or¬†Cancel¬†it via push message in the app.
Your Confirmation PIN differs from your¬†card PIN¬†but you can use the same number for both. You‚Äôll be asked to choose your Confirmation PIN after¬†connecting your smartphone¬†(whereas you select a card PIN after activating your card).
If you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, your PIN will be blocked for security reasons. You can restore your PIN by¬†changing it¬†in the app: go to¬†üë§ My Account¬†then tap¬†Settings¬†and¬†Security. Then tap¬†Change Confirmation PIN¬†(iPhone) or¬†Reset Confirmation PIN¬†(Android).

title: Comment faire une r√©clamation ?
content:
Si vous avez des questions sur nos produits ou si vous avez besoin d‚Äôaide, nous serons heureux de vous assister. Vous pouvez nous contacter en d√©marrant un Livechat depuis votre application, rubrique Aide, ou √† la fin de cet article en cliquant sur D√©marrer un chat. ¬†
Si vous n‚Äô√™tes pas satisfait d‚Äôun de nos produits ou services, vous pouvez nous le faire savoir en adressant un email √† litiges@n26.com ou nous envoyer votre r√©clamation par courrier. 
Pour faire une r√©clamation suite √† un litige, veuillez pr√©ciser :
votre nom complet et votre adresse
le service ou produit concern√©
la description d√©taill√©e du litige
la date de d√©but du litige
Nous vous contacterons par email pour accuser la r√©ception de votre r√©clamation et nous lancerons alors une enqu√™te afin de r√©soudre le litige dans les plus brefs d√©lais. Dans le cas o√π nous aurions besoin de plus d‚Äôinformations de votre part ou dans le cas o√π nous serions √† m√™me de r√©soudre le litige imm√©diatement, nous vous pr√©viendrons √©galement par email.
Dans le cas o√π nous ne serions pas en mesure de trouver une solution satisfaisante pour r√©soudre le litige pour lequel vous avez d√©pos√© une r√©clamation, vous pourrez vous tourner vers une tierce partie ind√©pendante :
Vous pouvez vous adresser √† l‚Äôinstance d'arbitrage de la Banque f√©d√©rale d‚ÄôAllemagne (Deutsche Bundesbank).
Vous pouvez d√©poser une plainte aupr√®s de l'Autorit√© F√©d√©rale Allemande de Surveillance Financi√®re (Bundesanstalt f√ºr Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht).
La Commission Europ√©enne a √©galement mis en place un service de R√®glement en ligne des litiges (ODR(nouvel onglet)) pour aider les consommateurs qui veulent saisir un prestataire de service d‚Äôune r√©clamation.
Nous vous remercions de prendre le temps de nous faire part de vos remarques concernant nos services et nos produits.

title: Can N26 close my account?
content:
In short: yes.
We can close your account in 3 ways (with 2 months notice, 14 days notice, or immediately). These cancellations are final: our Customer Support can‚Äôt provide any information about the background of individual cancellations nor can they reverse the decision. You‚Äôre also able to terminate your business relationship with us at any time, immediately, and without a reason. Any outstanding contract fees must be paid before the termination date.
2 months notice:
We have the right to terminate any business relationship with 2 months notice without a cause (see section 19 (1) of our¬†T&Cs(new tab)¬†or ¬ß 675h of the German Civil Code).
14 days notice:
We can also terminate any business relationship with 14 days notice (see section 19 (3) of our¬†T&Cs(new tab)) if reasonable cause is given due to the breach of contractual duties. These include:
Using a personal account for business purposes.¬†According to our T&Cs, a private account may only be used for personal use. Any credit transfers that relate to professional fees for provided services and/or sold products are considered business transactions. If you‚Äôd like to use your account for this purpose, please sign up for an N26 Business or N26 Business You account.
Providing incorrect or insufficient information for a routine background check. We‚Äôre a bank so we sometimes run checks on transactions. If you don‚Äôt provide correct and/or sufficient information about the transaction in question, we have the right to terminate the business relationship in order to be compliant with German financial regulations.
Displaying abusive behaviour towards N26 employees. We don‚Äôt tolerate abusive behaviour towards our employees. The threat of physical harm or general abusive behaviour may be considered a criminal offense according to German law and will be reported to the respective authority without exception.
Immediate cancellation
We may also terminate any business relationship on an extraordinary basis (see section 19 (3) of our¬†T&Cs(new tab)). That means: at any time, without prior notice, and without a cancellation period when there is reasonable cause for such termination. These include:
Providing incorrect statements to N26 about your financial situation, especially when you apply for a credit.
Failure to repay your loan or any debt toward N26.
Failure to comply with N26's requests about your loan (see provision or increase of security, section 13 (2) of our T&C's(new tab)).

title: Why is N26 secure?
content:
To protect your account, we use a three-layered security architecture:
Secure login.¬†Your login details of both the mobile and¬†WebApp(new tab)¬†consist of a username and password or fingerprint/face recognition (depending on your smartphone). Please choose a¬†secure password¬†and don‚Äôt reveal your login details to anyone.
Confirmation PIN.¬†This¬†4-digit code¬†is required every time you make a transfer or connect/disconnect your phone. You first set it up once you have successfully connected your smartphone to your account. You can then¬†change it¬†in the app yourself after that.
Push messages.¬†For every incoming and outgoing payment, a push message will be sent to your¬†connected smartphone. It's also used to confirm and finalize your transactions. We've also added¬†3D Secure¬†to protect you from online card fraud.
Every time you contact us we‚Äôll ask you some security questions to make sure it's really you. But we‚Äôll never ask for your debit card number, card verification code (CVV), password, or your card or Confirmation PINs.
We‚Äôve also taken steps to protect your data: we store as little information about you as possible, only for as long as we are legally obligated to, and we delete data when it is no longer required for a product or service. You can¬†download your personal data¬†up to 6 months after you close your account. Find more information in our¬†Privacy Policy(new tab).

title: Pourquoi mon achat en ligne a-t-il √©chou√© ?
content:
Votre application N26 vous guidera dans le processus de paiement en ligne.

title: PSD2 - Strong Customer Authentication
content:
SCA acts as an additional layer of security for all N26 customers by providing Two-Factor Authentication (2FA). This is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. You‚Äôre probably familiar with using just your personal password to sign in to your account but with Two-Factor Authentication you‚Äôll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.
When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you‚Äôll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number to confirm your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log into your N26 account. 
When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. Therefore, the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.
SCA is being introduced as part of the revised European Payments Services Directive (PSD2) which applies to all European Banks. The objective of PSD2 is to enhance the security of the customers‚Äô data and account security. Find out more about PSD2 in our dedicated article about the PSD2. 
I cannot log into my account. How do I solve this?
First, try update your phone to the newest version. If you still cannot log into your account but still have access to your registered email address, please try to reset your password. If you don‚Äôt have access to your registered email address, please contact us via our live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out. 
I lost access to my paired device. How will I be able to log into my account again?
If you lost access to your paired device but you still have access to your registered phone number, please log into your N26 account and request an authentication code. To do this:
Login to the Webapp
When prompted to confirm your login on your paired device, select Help 
Choose Send SMS Code
Once you receive the SMS code, input it into the Webapp
As you confirm the authentication code you‚Äôve completed two-factor authentication and you‚Äôll be able to pair your new device with your account again.
If you don‚Äôt have access to your registered phone number - either because you have a new phone number or your phone was lost or stolen - please contact our customer service via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out. 
What if my phone doesn‚Äôt support the latest app version?
If you have an older smartphone device that doesn‚Äôt support the latest app version,  you won‚Äôt be able to access N26 via the mobile app anymore using your phone.¬†
You can still use our Webapp to view your account, to do this you'll need to confirm your login attempt via an SMS verification code which we‚Äôll send to your account's registered phone number. 
You‚Äôll still be able to complete card transactions and cash withdrawals as normal using your Mastercard but bear in mind that you won't be able to perform any bank transfers or payments until you can confirm the transfer within the N26 app.

title: Come proteggere il mio conto?
content:
La sicurezza del tuo conto e il tuo dati personali sono la nostra priorit√†. 
Se ritieni che il tuo login di N26 possa essere compromesso o che qualcuno sta provando a contattarci per tuo conto, √® fondamentale cambiare immediatamente la tua password del tuo account N26.
Per fare ci√≤, effettua il log in nella tuo app e vai a Il mio conto > Impostazioni > Sicurezza. Per favore scegli una password sicura e non condividere i dettagli del tuo log con nessuno. 
In quanto titolare del conto, dovresti essere l'unico a creare e ad avere accesso ai tuoi dati. Per ulteriori consigli su come proteggere il tuo conto, ti invitiamo a leggere l'articolo come proteggere la mia identit√†?
Se ritieni che il tuo conto sia stato compromesso o manomesso, per favore contattaci immediatamente. 

Se non hai accesso alla app del tuo telefono o alla WebApp, puoi anche chiedere di bloccare la tua carta o il tuo conto chiamandoci al +39 02 124 123 361.

title: How to reorder a card?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Deliveries normally take up to 10 working days. Deliveries may take longer in some specific areas in the following countries: Estonia, Greece, Italy, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia and Spain.
If you‚Äôre waiting for your first card¬† and it has been more than 10 working days since you've successfully completed your identity verification, please contact us via live chat.
¬†For any other reason, please re-order your card via the N26 app.
First, check and update your shipping address
You can do this within the N26 app: üë§ My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Shipping Address.
To reorder your card go to Actions and tap Card Settings.¬†
From your list of cards, swipe until you see the card you wish to reorder and select Reorder.¬†¬†
Note that the Standard and the N26 You replacement cards have a fee of ‚Ç¨6 for standard shipping and ‚Ç¨25 for express shipping. For N26 Metal cards, the fee is ‚Ç¨45 for standard shipping. Express delivery for Metal cards is not available.
Once you‚Äôve ordered your new card, you can activate a digital version while your card is on its way. You can do this within the N26 app by scrolling to your card in Card Settings and adding it to the mobile wallet of choice. This feature is available for 30 days starting from the day your card has been ordered. After this you'll need to activate your physical card through the N26 app. Once the physical card is activated, your mobile wallet will continue working normally. If you don‚Äôt activate your physical card during this period, the digital version will expire until your card is activated.
This feature is not be enabled for customers who reorder their card or move to another account without blocking their current card. In these cases their current card will continue working with Apple Pay or Google Pay until the new one is activated.

title: How to get a Basiskonto?
content:
Download the request form(new tab) and complete it with a handwritten signature.
Take your signed form and the attached PostIdent coupon to your nearest branch of Deutsche Post to prove your identity.
Once we‚Äôve received your form and determined whether we can open a Basiskonto for you, we‚Äôll send you an email including the contract and the T&Cs(new tab).
Send your signed contract to us at Klosterstra√üe 62, 10179 Berlin.
Once we‚Äôve received your contract, we‚Äôll open your account within 10 business days.
You‚Äôll then receive a notification about your card delivery and accessing your account.

title: Why was I charged an ATM fee?
content:
ATM fees could happen for a few reasons: 
A ‚Ç¨2 fee applies to any additional withdrawal beyond our Fair Use Policy. We‚Äôll remind you via push message when you‚Äôre running low on free withdrawals. 
Some ATMs may come with their own fees. We have no control over these fees and can‚Äôt reject or reverse them. You‚Äôll be informed before the end of a withdrawal if additional fees apply and will have the possibility of cancelling it.
Foreign currency ATM withdrawals sometimes include fees. With the N26 account, there‚Äôs a fee of 1.7% of the withdrawal amount. This fee is waived for N26 You or N26 Metal members. 
Using your Maestro for ATM withdrawals. A ‚Ç¨2 fee applies to both domestic or international withdrawals. Maestro is only available in Germany, Austria, or the Netherlands. 

To avoid certain fees, especially when travelling, you can use the Mastercard ATM Locator(new tab) to find free ATMs nearby by selecting no access fee. 
You can find an overview of our plans and fees on our website(new tab).

title: Warum kann ich keine anderen N26 MoneyBeam Nutzer sehen?
content:
Um Echtzeit-Transaktionen wie¬†MoneyBeams¬†durchzuf√ºhren, √ºberpr√ºft N26 die Kontaktliste deines Smartphones und findet andere N26 Nutzer anhand der gespeicherten Telefonnummer oder E-Mail-Adresse. Wenn jemand erkannt wurde, siehst du das an dem blauen Punkt neben seinem Namen.
Wenn du die Namen deiner Freunde in der MoneyBeam-Liste nicht siehst, aber wei√üt, dass sie N26 Nutzer sind, haben sie  sich h√∂chstwahrscheinlich nicht sichtbar gemacht. Du kannst auch w√§hlen, ob du selbst dich f√ºr andere N26 Nutzer sichtbar oder unsichtbar machen m√∂chtest.
Wenn ein MoneyBeam zwischen N26 Nutzern scheitert, liegt es wahrscheinlich daran, dass bei einem oder beiden Nutzern mehrere Telefonnummern oder E-Mail-Adressen im Profil in der Kontaktliste gespeichert sind. Stelle sicher, dass du die aktuelle E-Mail-Adresse und Telefonnummer deiner Freunde in deinem Handy abgespeichert hast, um ihnen MoneyBeams zu senden. Wenn die in deinem Handy gespeicherten Kontaktdaten nicht stimmen, kannst du keinen MoneyBeam senden.
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erhalte 15‚Ç¨ f√ºr jeden Freund, dem du N26 erfolgreich empfiehlst. Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: How to upgrade to Metal?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Available in Germany, Austria, France, Spain, Italy, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Iceland, Liechtenstein.
N26 Metal is available during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you already have a N26 bank account or a N26 You membership. 
To upgrade to N26 Metal from the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 Metal. and choose between a Charcoal Black, Quartz Rose, or Slate Grey card.
Check the conditions of the¬†delivery and accept the N26 Metal¬†T&Cs(new tab). Once you confirm your request by entering your¬†Confirmation PIN, your new card will be on the way.
Standard deliveries take up to 10 business days.
The membership fee of ‚Ç¨16,90 (¬£14.90 in UK) will be deducted directly from your account every month on the date of your upgrade.
The minimum contract period for the N26 Metal membership is one year. Your membership will automatically renew unless you cancel it up to four weeks before the contract ends.
All purchases and travel booked using your N26 You Mastercard will remain insured.
If you‚Äôre already a N26 You member, you don‚Äôt have to pay the fees for the N26 You membership on top.

title: How to connect or disconnect my smartphone to my account?
content:
In order to use your N26 account, you need a smartphone : either an iPhone (5s or newer, at least iOS 11) or an Android (6.0 or newer - we do not support the customized versions of Amazon Fire and Oxygen OS). Only one device can be paired per account.
You'll need to pair and/or unpair your smartphone when you first create an account or if you get a new phone number or device.
To pair your smartphone with your account, simply open the app on your smartphone. You will be asked to¬†confirm your mobile phone number.
Enter the¬†4-digit code we send you via SMS¬†and your phone is paired. 
If you want to pair a new device, you must unpair your old device for¬†security reasons. You can do this in¬†üë§ My Account¬†(mobile app) or in the¬†Web app(new tab)¬†under¬†üë§ My Account¬†then¬†Security Settings if you don‚Äôt have access to your smartphone anymore. You‚Äôll receive an email from us with further instructions.
If you log into your N26 account with a new device, you'll receive two codes ‚Äì a Login SMS code with 6 digits and Pairing SMS code with 4 digits. You'll need the Login code to access your account and the Pairing code for pairing your device.

title: Wie melde ich einen Versicherungsfall?
content:
Deine¬†N26 You(neuen Tab)- und¬†N26 Metal(neuen Tab)-Mitgliedschaft umfasst eine Vielzahl von Versicherungsleistungen, die von unserem Partner Allianz Global Assistance Europe abgedeckt werden.*
Um einen Versicherungsfall zu melden, logge dich in deine App ein, gehe zu üë§ Mein Konto und w√§hle N26 You/Metal und Schaden melden.
Dort findest du:
Einen Leitfaden, wie du einen Versicherungsfall einreichen kannst (z. B. Flug- oder Gep√§ckversp√§tung, Handydiebstahl, Garantieverl√§ngerung oder Reisestornierung)
Deine Konto- und Vertragsinformationen, einschlie√ülich deiner N26 You- oder Metal-ID

title: Warum bekomme ich keinen Kredit?
content:
Bei der Beantragung eines N26 Credit fragen wir dich im Rahmen unserer Pr√ºfung nach deiner pers√∂nlichen und finanziellen Situation. Wenn N26 nicht dein¬†Hauptkonto¬†ist, musst du dich sicher in dein Online-Bankkonto bei einer anderen Bank einloggen, um mit dem Antrag fortzufahren.
F√ºr dein zweites Bankkonto akzeptieren wir nur Banken aus dem Land, aus dem du dich bewirbst (so k√∂nnen z. B. franz√∂sische Kunden nur ein franz√∂sisches Bankkonto und deutsche Kunden nur ein deutsches Bankkonto hinzuf√ºgen).
Wir schauen uns auch deine aktuelle SCHUFA-Kreditw√ºrdigkeit an. Dies wird sich nicht negativ auf dein Ergebnis auswirken. Aber nicht nur dein SCHUFA Scorel ist ausschlaggebend: Wir ben√∂tigen auch Informationen √ºber dein monatliches Einkommen, unter Ausschluss von Zahlungen der √∂ffentlichen Hand (z. B. Arbeitslosen- oder Kindergeld).
Sobald du einen¬†Antrag¬†an uns gesendet hast, kannst du deine Antworten 90 Tage lang nicht mehr √§ndern (auch dann nicht, wenn sich deine Bonit√§t verbessert). Du musst dann bis zum Ablauf der 90 Tage warten, um einen weiteren Kredit zu beantragen.
Das Ergebnis wird automatisch berechnet.
Kontaktiere uns gerne f√ºr weitere Informationen.

title: How to use Google Pay?
content:
Applies to Germany, Spain, Italy, Ireland, Belgium, Slovakia, France, Denmark, Finland, Sweden, Norway, Poland and Switzerland. 
Google Pay is a payment method that allows you to pay with your smartphone so you don‚Äôt have to carry your Mastercard with you all the time.
Google Pay is available in all shops supporting contactless (NFC) payments as well as online shops. Hold your smartphone near the contactless terminal and your payment will automatically process. When paying online, select Google Pay as the payment option. We‚Äôll ask you to confirm your payment via¬†push message¬†during checkout.
Some tips to keep in mind:
To add your N26 Mastercard, download the Google Pay app and select Get Started to enter your card details. You‚Äôll need Android 5.0 (Lollipop) or higher as well as an NFC-capable smartphone.
Google Pay requires a screen lock. If you didn‚Äôt set it up yet, you‚Äôll be asked to before adding your Mastercard to the Google Pay app.
If you‚Äôre protecting your smartphone with a case, you might have to remove it to pay. Some payment terminals don‚Äôt recognize your phone if the case is too big.
If the payment terminal asks you to present your card (again), you might have removed the smartphone too fast or didn‚Äôt hold it close enough. Just try again while keeping this in mind.

title: How can I lock and unlock my N26 card?
content:
You can lock and unlock your debit card at any time in our mobile application. 
Log into the application.
Tap on "Actions".
Select ‚ÄúCard settings‚Äù. 
Decide if you want to temporarily:
Limit or disable your ATM withdrawals.
Disable your online payments.
Disable your payments abroad.
Lock your debit card.
With N26, you have full control of your debit card and can protect yourself against unauthorized transactions. You should immediately lock your card if anything looks suspicious, you can always unlock it later by enabling the settings mentioned above.
The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

Pour √©viter de vous retrouver dans cette situation, v√©rifiez aupr√®s de votre ami quel num√©ro de t√©l√©phone ou quelle adresse email est li√©e √† son compte N26.

title: How does 3D Secure work?
content:
3D Secure protects you from online card fraud. It‚Äôs automatically activated when you activate your card in the app. No additional passwords are required.
Whenever you make an online payment using your Mastercard, 3D Secure confirms the transaction with you within 5 minutes via a¬†push message. If you don't see the transaction, try some of the¬†troubleshooting tips¬†we've collected.
If you make a purchase using your smartphone, you‚Äôll see a pending transaction in the app. Tap on the bell icon and the push message will appear for you to confirm and finalize your purchase. Then go back to the merchant‚Äôs website. You should see a confirmation of your successful purchase within a few moments.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: What are Shared Spaces?
content:
Shared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 users to share money together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.
Shared Spaces are available to N26 premium users (You / Business You / Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their Space. 
Participants can be any N26 account holder regardless of their account type.
The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.
The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants for their space.
Similar to regular Spaces, Shared Spaces have neither an IBAN nor a card attached to them.

title: How often can I withdraw cash for free?
content:
Cash withdrawals using your Mastercard depend on your T&C country (the address you originally shipped your first card to):
Germany: 3 to 5* free ATM withdrawals per month in Germany and unlimited free withdrawals in the eurozone or by using¬†CASH26
Austria and Italy: unlimited free withdrawals (including¬†CASH26)
France, Spain, the Netherlands, and the Rest of Europe: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in your country of residence and the eurozone
Switzerland: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in the eurozone and a 1.7% markup on local withdrawals
UK: unlimited free withdrawals
There‚Äôs always a ‚Ç¨2 fee if you use your¬†Maestro¬†card to withdraw cash (only available in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands).
Check our¬†pricing lists¬†if you‚Äôve been¬†charged an ATM fee.
*Germany only: You receive 5 free withdrawals during the first three months. After that you'll receive 3 free withdrawals but you can keep receiving 5 if:
You are younger than 26 years old.
You receive your salary, pension, student allowance, or government benefits for at least two consecutive months (your additional free withdrawals start the following month).
You receive payments of at least ‚Ç¨1.000 per month for at least two months (your additional free withdrawals start the following month).

And if you ever feel dissatisfied with one of our products or services, you can also¬†file a complaint.

title: What is CASH26?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Applies to German, Austrian and Italian T&C
CASH26 allows you to withdraw or deposit cash by creating and showing a barcode at our participating stores. 
CASH26 is available in:
11.918 REWE, Penny, dm, real, Budni, Ludwig, Eckert, ON, Adam‚Äôs, OMV, Barbarino or Rossmann locations in Germany,¬†
2.019 participating dm, Billa, Merkur, and PENNY Austria locations in Austria¬†
202 PAM & Panorama and 386 PENNY stores in Italy.
You can find your nearest location, including opening times and directions, on the CASH26 map in the app‚Äîtap on the Actions tab in the bottom right hand corner of your mobile app and select CASH26.
Withdrawals:
As soon as you create a withdrawal barcode, the amount will be deducted from your balance. If you change your mind, you can delete the code and the amount will instantly return to your account.
If a barcode remains unused, the amount will be returned to your account after 10 minutes.
You can withdraw up to ‚Ç¨900 (‚Ç¨200 per transaction) within 24 hours.
Withdrawals are always free.
Deposits:
Deposits made with CASH26 are available on your account right away.
You can deposit up to ‚Ç¨999 (minimum ‚Ç¨50 per deposit) within 24 hours.
You can deposit up to ‚Ç¨100 a month for free. Extra deposits are charged a fee of 1,5% of the deposit amount.
You don't need to buy anything in the store to make a withdrawal or deposit cash.
Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial(new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube(new tab) channel.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: How to get my money back in case of fraud?
content:
If you don‚Äôt recognize a transaction or you‚Äôre sure you didn‚Äôt authorize it,¬†blocking your card¬†won‚Äôt be enough. In these cases you should immediately:
Request new card(new tab) and indicate that the old one has been stolen. Please tear up the card by cutting it with scissors, for example. Both the chip, the NFC antenna and the magnetic stripe must be cut into pieces.
Then fill out the dispute form(new tab). From there we will do everything we can to get your money back.
You can continue using your account for bank transfers until your new card arrives. If you're in Germany or Austria, you can also use¬†CASH26¬†for cash withdrawals.
You should keep in mind that changes in the¬†final amount debited¬†from your account don't necessarily indicate fraud.

title: How to download my personal data?
content:
The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a European regulation on data protection and privacy that went into effect on May 25th, 2018. We‚Äôve added a data export option to the WebApp(new tab) as a response to Art. 20 GDPR. And, as with everything we do, getting your personal data you provided to us is transparent and simple, and you‚Äôre in complete control: go to üë§ My Account then Personal settings and Your personal data.
The right to data portability under Art. 20 GDPR covers personal data you provided to us. Art. 20 GDPR shall enable you to easily switch the service provider in case you want to use these data to open a bank account at another bank. This is why Art. 20 GDPR requires to provide these data in a machine-readable format to you. ¬†It's important to keep in mind that the file is to be used for data portability purposes only and your computer might not be able to read a JSON file. Also, if you can open the JSON file the data might be difficult to understand as it is not intended to be human-readable, but machine-readable. The file we provide has the only purpose of being transmitted to another bank.¬†
As a mobile bank, we know the importance of data security. For this reason we take additional security measures before you can download your data, which are described below. We do so in order to make sure that you, the account holder, is in fact the person who downloads the data.¬†¬†
You can request to download the personal data you provided for a current or previous account with us up to 6 months after account closure date. It will come in a machine-readable format so you can share it with a third party if you choose to.
Please request your data through our web form(new tab).
You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.
You can download personal data you provided up to 6 months after account closure date. To request this information, complete a data request form(new tab) and make sure that the information you provide correctly matches all your previous account information. You‚Äôll need to know:
the first and last name, personal ID number, and expiration date of the identification document (national ID card or passport) you used to verify the account,
the registered email address of the account,
the date (month and year) you created and closed your account (check your verification email).
For security reasons, we have to make sure it‚Äôs really you downloading the data: if any field is inaccurate or missing, your request will not be successful.
You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.
If you want more information about the collection, use, and processing of your personal data, please visit our updated Privacy Policy (DEU(new tab)) (EU(new tab)).

title: Come guadagnare soldi invitando amici in N26?
content:
Ricevi 15‚Ç¨ ogni volta che un amico apre un conto N26 tramite il tuo invito (fino a un massimo di ‚Ç¨ 1500). 
Puoi iniziare a invitare amici tramite app oppure WebApp(nuova tabella) appena avrai accesso al tuo conto.
Per ricevere il bonus, il tuo amico dovr√†:
completare la registrazione utilizzando il tuo link di riferimento* o codice personale.
attivare la Mastercard N26.
completare una transazione (tramite POS, online o presso uno sportello ATM) con la Mastercard N26 dal valore minimo di 15‚Ç¨.
Per invitare i tuoi amici:
accedi all'app N26 e seleziona üë§ Il mio conto, in alto a destra nella schermata
seleziona Invita un amico e poi il tuo Codice di riferimento per copiarlo
scegli come condividere il tuo invito
aggiungi un messaggio per il tuo amico oppure inserisci un messaggio predefinito (opzionale) 
invia l'invito.
Una volta che il tuo amico avr√† soddisfatto i requisiti, riceverai il bonus entro 60 giorni. Puoi controllare lo stato del tuo bonus dalla app N26, sia mobile che web. Se il tuo bonus non √® stato ancora accreditato, leggi questo articolo per scoprire perch√©.
*¬†Il link non scade e pu√≤ essere utilizzato in qualsiasi momento. I codici e i link di invito personali devono essere utilizzati solo a scopo personale e non commerciale. Ci√≤ significa che puoi condividere il tuo link di invito con i tuoi contatti personali tramite i social media se sei il principale proprietario dei contenuti. N26 ha il diritto di annullare il programma Invita un amico in qualsiasi momento.
Al momento, il programma 'Invita un amico' √® presente nei seguenti paesi: Germania, Austria, Italia, Francia, Spagna, Belgio, Lussemburgo, Grecia, Portogallo, Irlanda, Olanda, Finlandia, Estonia, Svezia, Svizzera, Norvegia, Danimarca, Polonia, Islanda e Liechtenstein. 
Puoi trovare maggiori informazioni nei¬†Termini e condizioni del programma Invita un amico(nuova tabella).

title: Come posso effettuare l'accesso con l'autenticazione a due fattori?
content:
Cos‚Äô√® l‚ÄôAutenticazione a due fattori?
L‚ÄôAutenticazione a due fattori √® una procedura che si basa sull‚Äôuso di due o pi√π elementi di sicurezza. Oltre all‚Äôuso della password personale, con l‚Äôautenticazione a due fattori avrai bisogno di confermare l‚Äôaccesso tramite un dispositivo associato oppure un codice che riceverai via sms.¬†¬†¬†
Clicca qui per scoprire di pi√π sull‚ÄôAutenticazione a due fattori
Come effettuo l‚Äôaccesso con l‚ÄôAutenticazione a due fattori?
Quando eseguirai l‚Äôaccesso al tuo conto N26 da web app oppure da un dispositivo non associato, ti verr√† richiesto di confermare una notifica push sul tuo dispositivo associato. In alternativa, potrai richiedere la ricezione di un codice via sms sul numero di telefono registrato con noi per confermare l‚Äôaccesso al conto.
Questa procedura garantisce che soltanto tu possa accedere al tuo conto N26.
Quando esegui l‚Äôaccesso al conto N26 dal tuo dispositivo associato, l‚Äôautenticazione a due fattori ha luogo automaticamente. √à sufficiente accedere utilizzando le tue credenziali.
Quali sono i requisiti?
Innanzitutto, dovrai aggiornare all‚Äôultima versione sia il sistema operativo del tuo telefono che l‚Äôapp N26. Se ancora non riesci ad accedere al conto ma hai accesso all‚Äôindirizzo email associato al conto, resetta la tua password.¬†Se non hai accesso al tuo indirizzo email, contattaci via chat. Saremo lieti di assisterti.
Cosa devo fare se non ricordo la mia password?
Clicca qui per sapere come impostare la tua password.
Non riesco ad accedere al mio dispositivo associato. Come posso eseguire il login al mio conto?
Se non puoi accedere al tuo dispositivo associato ma puoi utilizzare il numero di telefono registrato, esegui l‚Äôaccesso al conto N26 e richiedi un codice di autenticazione.
Per fare questo:
Accedi alla webapp oppure alla versione mobile di un dispositivo non associato.
Quando viene richiesto di confermare l‚Äôaccesso dal dispositivo associato, seleziona Aiuto.
Seleziona Invia Codice SMS.
Quando riceverai il codice, inseriscilo nel campo dedicato.
In questo modo, avrai completato l‚Äôautenticazione a due fattori e sarai in grado di associare di nuovo il tuo dispositivo.
Cosa devo fare se ho un nuovo numero o non posso ricevere SMS per altri motivi?
Se non hai accesso al tuo numero registrato perch√© hai un nuovo numero oppure non sei pi√π in possesso del telefono, contatta la nostra assistenza clienti via chat. Saremo lieti di assisterti.
E se il mio telefono non supporta l‚Äôultima versione dell‚Äôapp N26?
Se hai un dispositivo che non supporta l‚Äôultima versione dell‚Äôapp, non potrai eseguire l‚Äôaccesso al conto attraverso la versione mobile dell‚Äôapp tramite quel telefono. 
Potrai utilizzare la versione web per visualizzare informazioni relative al tuo conto. Per fare questo, dovrai confermare il tuo tentativo di accesso attraverso un codice di verifica che verr√† inviato via sms sul numero di telefono associato al tuo conto.
Potrai continuare ad effettuare pagamenti e prelievi con la tua Mastercard. Trasferimenti e bonifici, invece, potranno essere eseguiti solo averli confermati tramite l‚Äôapp N26.

title: What to do if my N26 IBAN is not accepted?
content:
Your IBAN includes the DE country code, a two-digit check number, the eight-digit bank sort code, and your ten-digit account number. For example:¬†DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.
The participating countries of the SEPA area (Single Euro Payments Area) have agreed on the IBAN system in order to simplify national and international payments, and to reduce the risk of error in the communication and processing of transactions.
Merchants or employers who do not accept IBANs from other member states of the European Economic Area are violating European law as of 1 February 2016 (Article 9 of¬†Regulation No 260/2012(new tab)).
If you are ever affected by IBAN discrimination, please¬†contact your relevant national authority(new tab) directly and notify them. Provide your contact details, the name of the merchant or company that didn‚Äôt accept your IBAN, as well as a brief description of the incident (including a screenshot of the rejection or other documentation of your communication with them).

title: Come creo un codice a barre per CASH26?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Si applica ai conti aperti in Germania, Austria e Italia
Per creare un codice a barre ¬†CASH26:
Dalla schermata principale seleziona Gestisci e poi CASH26.
Scegli tra Deposito e Prelievo. 
Inserisci l'importo ed il tuo PIN di Conferma. 
Completa la transazione tramite notifica push.
Mostra il codice a barre presso la cassa di uno dei nostri negozi convenzionati. Ti verranno dati i contanti richiesti oppure dovrai corrispondere l'importo che vuoi depositare. La transazione apparir√† sul tuo conto entro i successivi 10 minuti. Se il codice a barre viene eliminato oppure non viene utilizzato entro 10 minuti da quando viene creato, questo scadr√† e verr√† rimosso automaticamente dall'elenco delle transazioni.
Preferisci vederlo tramite un video? Dai un'occhiata ai nostri tutorial(nuova tabella) sul nostro canale di assistenza YouTube(nuova tabella).
Vuoi proporre N26 ai tuoi amici e guadagnare soldi? Ottieni ‚Ç¨15 per ogni amico che inviti con successo ad iscriversi ad N26. Scopri di pi√π sul nostro¬†programma Invita un amico.

title: ¬øPuede N26 cerrar mi cuenta?
content:
En resumidas cuentas: s√≠.
Podemos cerrar tu cuenta de 3 maneras: con notificaci√≥n previa de 2 meses, de 14 d√≠as, o de forma inmediata. Estas cancelaciones son definitivas: Atenci√≥n al cliente no puede proporcionarte informaci√≥n sobre el trasfondo de casos individuales ni tampoco puede cambiar la decisi√≥n. T√∫ tambi√©n puedes rescindir tu relaci√≥n comercial con nosotros en cualquier momento, de forma inmediata y sin ninguna justificaci√≥n. Antes de la rescisi√≥n se deber√° pagar, eso s√≠, cualquier comisi√≥n del contrato que quede pendiente.
2 meses de preaviso
Tenemos derecho a rescindir cualquier relaci√≥n comercial con 2 meses de preaviso sin ninguna justificaci√≥n (consulta la secci√≥n 13 (1) de nuestros¬†T&C(pesta√±a nueva). Sin embargo, si abriste la cuenta antes del 17 de abril y por lo tanto tu IBAN empieza por DE,¬†consulta la secci√≥n 19 (1) de nuestros¬†T&C(pesta√±a nueva)¬†o ¬ß 675h del C√≥digo Civil Alem√°n).
14 d√≠as de preaviso
Tambi√©n podemos rescindir nuestra relaci√≥n comercial con una notificaci√≥n previa de 14 d√≠as si hay una causa razonable debida al incumplimiento de las obligaciones contractuales (consulta la secci√≥n 13 (3) de nuestros¬†T&C(pesta√±a nueva). Sin embargo, si abriste la cuenta antes del 17 de abril y por lo tanto tu IBAN empieza por DE,¬†consulta la secci√≥n 19 (3) de nuestros¬†T&C(pesta√±a nueva)). Dichas causas incluyen:
Utilizar una cuenta personal para fines comerciales.¬†Seg√∫n nuestros T√©rminos y Condiciones de uso, una cuenta privada solo puede utilizarse para fines personales. Cualquier transferencia que est√© relacionada con honorarios profesionales por la prestaci√≥n de servicios y/o la venta de productos, est√° considerada como una transacci√≥n comercial. Si quieres utilizar tu cuenta con este prop√≥sito, por favor reg√≠strate para una cuenta¬†N26 Business¬†o¬†N26 Business You.
Proporcionar informaci√≥n incorrecta o insuficiente para los controles rutinarios.¬†Somos un banco, por eso hacemos¬†controles rutinarios¬†de vez en cuando. Si no proporcionas la informaci√≥n correcta o suficiente sobre la transacci√≥n en cuesti√≥n, tenemos derecho a cesar nuestra relaci√≥n comercial para as√≠ cumplir con las regulaciones financieras Alemanas.
Tener un comportamiento abusivo con alg√∫n miembro de N26.¬†No toleramos los comportamientos abusivos contra nuestros empleados. Tanto una amenaza de da√±o f√≠sico como cualquier otro tipo de abuso en general, puede considerarse un delito de acuerdo con la legislaci√≥n alemana y se denunciar√° a las autoridades competentes sin excepci√≥n.
Cancelaci√≥n inmediata
Podr√≠amos incluso rescindir nuestra relaci√≥n comercial inmediatamente de forma extraordinaria (consulta la secci√≥n 13 (3) de nuestros¬†T&C(pesta√±a nueva). Sin embargo, si abriste la cuenta antes del 17 de abril y por lo tanto tu IBAN empieza por DE,¬†consulta la secci√≥n 19 (3) de nuestros¬†T&C(pesta√±a nueva)). Esto quiere decir en cualquier momento, sin notificaci√≥n previa y sin un periodo de cancelaci√≥n, en caso de que haya una causa razonable de rescisi√≥n. Esto incluye:
Proporcionar extractos incorrectos a N26 sobre tu situaci√≥n econ√≥mica, especialmente cuando solicitas un cr√©dito.
No puedes pagar tu pr√©stamo o cualquier otra deuda que tengas con N26.
No cumples las condiciones de N26 en lo referido a los pr√©stamos (consulta la provisi√≥n o aumento de fianzas, secci√≥n 13 (2) de nuestros¬†T&C(pesta√±a nueva)).

title: What is the maximum I can spend?
content:
The maximum¬†daily¬†limits (total sum within 24 hours) for card payments are:
ATM withdrawals: ‚Ç¨2.500 (or ‚Ç¨400 in Togo, Congo, Benin, Ivory Coast, Kenya, Cameroon, Nigeria, Senegal and Algeria)
In-store or online payments: ‚Ç¨5.000
You can¬†set your own¬†daily ATM withdrawal and payment limits within our limits directly in the app by tapping¬†üë§ My Account¬†then¬†Card settings.
The maximum¬†daily¬†limits (rolling 24 hours) for bank transfers are:
MoneyBeam to N26 customers (the recipient must be visible): ‚Ç¨1.000
Outgoing transfers: ‚Ç¨50.000
Incoming transfers: No limit
The maximum¬†monthly¬†limit (total sum) for card transactions is ‚Ç¨20.000*. 
*a monthly limit of ‚Ç¨10.000 applies to ATM withdrawals for customers who opened their account in France. 
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: When will my card arrive?
content:
The estimated delivery timeline for card deliveries is 10 working days. Deliveries may take longer in some specific areas in the following countries: Estonia, Greece, Italy, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia and Spain. 
Please consider this before taking any action regarding a card re-order:
If the delivery fails and your card is returned to us, we‚Äôll let you know via email.
If it's been less than 10 working days since you ordered your card, we encourage you to wait before reaching out to us. 
If you've waited longer than the expected timeline, please check and if necessary update your shipping address, you can do this within the N26 app: üë§ My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Shipping Address.
If your shipping address was incorrect and this is your first N26 card, please¬†contact us via live chat(new tab) and we‚Äôll help you order a new one.
If your shipping address was incorrect and you‚Äôve had an active card before, you'll need to reorder the card via the App.
If your shipping address was correct, there might have been an issue with your card's delivery. Please contact us via live chat and we‚Äôll help you order a new one.
If your card fails to arrive or you need your card quickly, you may consider ordering it via¬†express delivery (with an additional fee) which takes up to 3 working days. Please note that express delivery is not available for Metal cards.
Your first card is immediately produced and mailed out once you‚Äôre done¬†proving your identity. If you opened a Metal account, please to top up your account after completing the sign up with at least the amount of the monthly Metal fee in order to receive the card.
Tips for a successful delivery:
If your address contains special characters, please contact us via the live chat.
We only send cards to residential addresses (businesses are not accepted).
Don‚Äôt enter any spaces when entering the postal code for your delivery address.
Ensure that important delivery information isn‚Äôt missing (for example, the name on your mailbox if you live in Germany or your building number, stairwell number, and door code if applicable). If you‚Äôre staying somewhere temporarily (with a friend or in an Airbnb), make sure to include the name on the mailbox that belongs to the main tenant of the apartment.
If you‚Äôre moving somewhere and this is your first card, make sure to select the country and address where you‚Äôll move to and wish to receive your N26 card.

title: Ricarica con carta, Apple Pay e Google Pay
content:
Adesso puoi trasferire denaro utilizzando una carta di debito o di credito oltre ad Apple e Google Pay. Questo √® il modo pi√π semplice e veloce per ricaricare il tuo conto N26.
Come trasferire denaro con una carta di debito o di credito
Apri l‚Äôapp N26 e vai su Azioni
Clicca su ‚ÄúAggiungi denaro‚Äù e seleziona ‚ÄúTrasferimento da carta‚Äù
Scegli un importo e inserisci il tuo nome sulla carta, il numero della carta, la data di scadenza e il CVC (non memorizziamo mai i dati della tua carta)
Segui i passaggi per confermare il pagamento
Il denaro √® disponibile sul tuo conto all‚Äôistante
Come trasferire denaro con Apple o Google Pay
Apri l‚Äôapp N26 e vai su Azioni
Clicca su ‚ÄúAggiungi denaro‚Äù e seleziona ‚ÄúApple Pay‚Äù o ‚ÄúGoogle Pay‚Äù
Scegli un importo
Segui i passaggi per confermare il pagamento
Il denaro √® disponibile sul tuo conto all‚Äôistante
Carte accettate:¬†
Carte Visa e Mastercard che hanno un numero di 16 cifre. 
Le carte prepagate non sono accettate (es: tipo A, tipo B ecc.). 
Per saperne di pi√π sulla differenza tra carte di debito, credito e carte prepagate leggi questo articolo (inglese).(nuova tabella)
Costo:
Sebbene questo sia il modo pi√π semplice e veloce per trasferire immediatamente fondi sul tuo conto N26, per noi, l‚Äôelaborazione di queste transazioni di ricarica istantanee √® pi√π costosa di altri metodi di ricarica del conto(nuova tabella) che offriamo.
Per entrambi i metodi, il primo deposito √® sempre gratuito, ma per i depositi aggiuntivi viene addebitata una commissione del 3% sull‚Äôimporto del deposito. Caricando una carta o un portafoglio digitale, i tuoi soldi non vengono inviati immediatamente a N26 e la commissione copre i costi aggiuntivi associati alla ricarica del conto prima che i soldi vengano ricevuti, in modo che siano immediatamente disponibili per l‚Äôuso.

title: COVID-19: Neueste Informationen zur Erreichbarkeit unseres Kundenservice
content:
Vor dem Hintergrund des COVID-19 ergreifen wir kontinuierliche Ma√ünahmen, um die Sicherheit unserer Mitarbeiter zu sch√ºtzen, w√§hrend wir unseren Kunden weiterhin den bestm√∂glichen Service und Komfort bieten wollen.
Unser Ziel bleibt es, dich zu unterst√ºtzen und dir unser Banking und unseren Kundenservice unver√§ndert zur Verf√ºgung zu stellen. Falls sich die Lage ver√§ndert, wollen wir dich dar√ºber informieren.
Wir sind t√§glich zu unseren √ºblichen Servicezeiten erreichbar von 7:00 - 23:00 Uhr auch an Sonntagen und gesetzlichen Feiertagen.
Falls du aufgrund eines Notfalls deine Karte sperren willst, kannst du das direkt in deiner N26 App tun oder indem du unsere Notfall-Hotline anrufst: +49 (0) 307 675 8333.
Weitere updates zu Servicezeiten und Wartezeiten werden wir auf dieser Seite zur Verf√ºgung stellen.¬†

title: Wie er√∂ffne ich mein N26 Konto?
content:
Du kannst ein N26 Konto in der App (auf deinem Smartphone) oder in der¬†WebApp(neuen Tab)¬†er√∂ffnen, wenn du:
mindestens 18 Jahre alt bist
in einem unterst√ºtzten Land lebst
ein kompatibles Smartphone besitzt
ein unterst√ºtztes Ausweisdokument hast (die Eignung h√§ngt davon ab, ob du in Deutschland(neuen Tab) oder au√üerhalb von Deutschland(neuen Tab) wohnst) 
noch kein Konto bei uns hast
dich in einer unserer unterst√ºtzten Sprachen verifizieren kannst (Deutsch, Englisch, Spanisch, Franz√∂sisch, Italienisch).
So meldest du dich an:
Nachdem du deine Email, pers√∂nlichen Daten und die Lieferadresse best√§tigt hast, w√§hle deinen gew√ºnschten Kontotypen aus. *
Weise deine Identit√§t nach und verkn√ºpfe dein Smartphone mit deinem Konto.
Ab jetzt kannst du √ºber SEPA oder FPS √úberweisungen dein Konto aufladen oder √ºber CASH26 Bargeld auf dein Konto einzahlen (wenn du in Deutschland, √ñsterreich oder Italien bist).
Nach einigen Tagen erh√§ltst du deine Mastercard per Post.
Falls du noch mehr erfahren m√∂chtest, kontaktiere uns gerne.
*Wenn deine Bonit√§t die Mindestanforderungen erf√ºllt, kannst du ein N26 Konto er√∂ffnen. Falls nicht, k√∂nnen wir dir m√∂glicherweise ein N26 Flex Konto (nur in Deutschland) anbieten. Diese Entscheidung wird automatisch berechnet. 
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Bekomme 15‚Ç¨ f√ºr jeden Freund, dem du N26 erfolgreich empfiehlst. Erfahre mehr √ºber unser Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

Du erreichst uns im Chat t√§glich von 07:00 - 23:00 Uhr, auch an Sonn- und Feiertagen.

title: Wie bekomme ich einen Dispokredit?
content:
Einen Dispo kannst du direkt in der App beantragen. Du erf√§hrst in Echtzeit, ob er dir zur Verf√ºgung steht. Ganz ohne Papierkram.
Gehe zum Bereich Entdecken und dann zu N26 Finanzprodukte, um einen Dispokredit  anzufragen. Du kannst ihn dort auch jederzeit k√ºndigen, deine √úberziehungslimits √§ndern oder die angefallenen Zinsen einsehen.
Wir bieten einen Zinssatz von 8,9% an. Am Ende jedes Quartals ziehen wir die Zinsen von deinem Konto ein.
Weitere Informationen findest du in unseren¬†Dispokredit-Bedingungen(neuen Tab).
Lieber Videos statt Text? Sieh dir das Tutorial(neuen Tab) auf unserem N26 Support YouTube(neuen Tab) Kanal an.
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Bekomme 15‚Ç¨ f√ºr jeden Freund, dem du N26 erfolgreich empfiehlst. Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: Come funziona Spaces?
content:
Spaces ti permette di creare diversi spazi nel tuo conto principale, per mettere da parte del denaro. Puoi personalizzare ogni spazio a tuo piacimento e trasferire denaro dal tuo conto principale allo spazio, in tempo reale. Spaces √® disponibile via app e¬†webapp(nuova tabella)¬†in tutti i paesi.
Oltre al tuo conto corrente principale (o space principale), che possiamo anche definire spazio principale, puoi creare degli spazi aggiuntivi tutte le volte che vuoi, ma ricorda che il numero di spazi attivi che puoi avere, dipende dalla tipologia di conto che possiedi: 2 spazi oltre per il conto N26 standard e il conto N26 Business o 10 spazi oltre per dei conti Premium, N26 You, N26 Business You e N26 Metal.
Inoltre, l‚Äôestratto conto del tuo conto principale, includer√† anche le transazioni inviate a uno spazio specifico e quelle ricevute da esso.
Solo il tuo spazio principale (conto corrente principale) pu√≤ avere un saldo negativo, nel caso in cui lo scoperto di conto sia disponibile per te. Tutti gli altri spazi non possono avere un saldo negativo, puoi trasferire negli spazi soltanto un ammontare di denaro effettivamente disponibile.
Per effettuare una qualsiasi transazione con la tua Mastercard, potrai usare soltanto il saldo disponibile nel tuo conto principale. Ti suggeriamo quindi di trasferire nel tuo conto principale denaro sufficiente per effettuare la transazione, prima che questa avvenga.
Sposta denaro da uno space all'altro tenendo premuto sul tuo account principale e trascinandolo nel tuo space. Una volta confermato l‚Äôammontare, il tuo saldo attuale verr√† aggiornato subito dopo.
Puoi bloccare e sbloccare uno space in qualsiasi momento dal tuo dispositivo mobile e dalla tua app web. Dovrai solo confermare l'operazione con il tuo PIN di conferma. Se uno space √® bloccato, sarai comunque in grado di trasferire denaro verso di esso. Se devi prelevare denaro da uno space bloccato, dovrai prima sbloccarlo.
Puoi anche aprire i dettagli della transazione dalla lista movimenti Spaces, esattamente come nel tuo conto principale.
Puoi tenere nascosto il saldo presente in uno Space al saldo totale sul conto. Per fare questo, entra nello Space, seleziona i tre puntini in alto a destra e poi "nascondi il saldo dello spazio".
Spaces include una opzione chiamata Regole, con le quali potrai gestire il tuo tempo e il tuo denaro in maniera molto semplice.

Vuoi parlare di noi ai tuoi amici e guadagnarci? Ottieni ‚Ç¨15 per ogni amico che inviti con successo ad iscriversi ad N26. Scopri di pi√π sul nostro¬†programma Invita un amico.

title: How can I download my Monthly Statements?
content:
Our¬†WebApp(new tab)¬†allows you to search for and sort (via categories and hashtags) your transactions. You can also download your bank statements in PDF format via both the WebApp and mobile application.
In the WebApp:
From the Home page click on the cloud icon in the upper-right corner to reach ‚ÄúDownloads‚Äù.
Select the balance statement that you wish to download as a PDF.
In the mobile application:
Tap on the Statistics feature (the 3 dots in the top right-hand corner).
Tap on ‚ÄúBalance Statements‚Äù. 
Select the balance statement that you wish to download as a PDF.
Tap on the Share icon (the square with the arrow in the upper-right corner). 
Tap on the recipient with whom you would like to share the statement or the method by which you would like to download the PDF (message, email, etc).

The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Wie lege ich meine Karten-PIN fest?
content:
Wir senden dir keine PIN per Post; du legst die PIN f√ºr deine Mastercard oder Maestro Card selbst fest, nachdem du dein Smartphone erfolgreich mit deinem Konto verkn√ºpft und deine Karte(n)¬†aktiviert hast. So legst du deine PIN fest oder √§nderst sie:
Gehe zu üë§ Mein Konto
W√§hle Karteneinstellungen und streiche nach links, um eine Karte auszuw√§hlen
W√§hle PIN √§ndern
Gib die 10-stellige Token-Nummer auf deiner Karte ein
W√§hle deine neue PIN und best√§tige sie
Beachte:
Wenn du in Frankreich, Spanien, Irland, Griechenland, Finnland oder Estland wohnst, musst du deine erste Zahlung mit dem Chip und der PIN deiner Karte t√§tigen, um die Karte vollst√§ndig zu aktivieren. Alternativ kannst du daf√ºr an einem Geldautomaten auch deinen Kontostand abfragen oder Geld abheben.
Aus Sicherheitsgr√ºnden akzeptieren wir keine PIN, die Elemente deines Geburtsdatums, deiner Adresse oder eine Kombination aus wiederholten Ziffern oder Zahlenfolgen (z. B. 1111, 1234 oder 4321) enth√§lt. Wenn die von dir gew√§hlte Nummer nicht akzeptiert wird, versuche es bitte erneut mit einer anderen Kombination.
Wird eine PIN dreimal hintereinander falsch eingegeben, wird die Karte aus Sicherheitsgr√ºnden automatisch gesperrt. In diesem Fall wende dich bitte per Chat an unseren Kundenservice, damit wir die Sperre f√ºr dich aufheben k√∂nnen.
Deine Karten-PIN ist eine andere als deine Best√§tigungs-PIN, du kannst jedoch f√ºr beide dieselbe Zahlenkombination w√§hlen.

title: Wie kann ich mich mit Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung einloggen?
content:
Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung bedeutet, dass der Login √ºber mindestens zwei verschiedene, sichere Elemente erfolgt. Zus√§tzlich zur Eingabe deines pers√∂nlichen Passworts musst du deinen Login-Versuch entweder durch dein verkn√ºpftes Ger√§t oder einen SMS-Code best√§tigen.
Mehr zu diesem Thema erf√§hrst du in unserem Artikel: PSD2 - Starke Kundenauthentifizierung
Wenn du dich von der WebApp oder von einem nicht verkn√ºpften Ger√§t einloggst, musst du deinen Login-Versuch zus√§tzlich best√§tigen. Das kannst du tun, indem du entweder eine Push-Mitteilung auf deinem verkn√ºpften Ger√§t best√§tigst oder indem du einen SMS-Code anforderst, der an deine registrierte Handynummer geschickt wird. So wird sichergestellt, dass nur du dich in dein N26 Konto einloggen kannst.
Wenn du dich von deinem verkn√ºpften Ger√§t in dein N26 Konto einloggst, liegt damit schon Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung vor. Das bedeutet, der Login-Prozess √§ndert sich bei deinem verkn√ºpften Ger√§t nicht.
Stell sicher, dass das Betriebssystem deines Handys auf dem neuesten Stand ist und die neueste Version der N26 App installiert ist. Falls du dich nicht mehr einloggen kannst, aber noch Zugang zu deiner registrierten E-Mail-Adresse hast, versuch bitte, dein Passwort zur√ºckzusetzen. Falls du keinen Zugang mehr zu deiner registrierten E-Mail-Adresse hast, kontaktiere uns bitte in unserem Live Chat und wir helfen dir gerne weiter.
Mehr Informationen dar√ºber findest du in unserem Artikel: Wie erstelle ich ein Passwort?
Wenn du keinen Zugang mehr zu deinem verkn√ºpften Ger√§t, aber noch Zugang zu deiner registrierten Handynummer hast, kannst du dich in dein N26 Konto einloggen und zur Authentifizierung einen SMS-Code anfordern:
Logge dich in die WebApp oder von einem nicht verkn√ºpften Ger√§t ein
Wenn du aufgefordert wirst, deinen Login-Versuch durch dein verkn√ºpftes Ger√§t zu best√§tigen, w√§hle Hilfe
W√§hle SMS-Code schicken
Nachdem du den SMS-Code erhalten hast, gib ihn in der WebApp ein.
Dadurch ist die Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung abgeschlossen und du kannst dein neues Ger√§t wieder mit deinem Konto verkn√ºpfen.
Falls dir deine registrierte Handynummer nicht mehr zur Verf√ºgung steht - z.B. weil du eine neue hast oder dein Handy verloren gegangen ist oder gestohlen wurde - kontaktiere bitte unseren Kundenservice im Live-Chat und wir helfen dir gerne weiter.
Wenn du ein √§lteres Smartphone benutzt, das die neueste Version der App nicht mehr unterst√ºtzt, kannst du dich mit diesem nicht mehr in die N26 App einloggen.
Du kannst dennoch die WebApp benutzen, um Zugang zu deinem Konto zu erhalten. Daf√ºr musst du deinen Login-Versuch mit einem SMS-Code best√§tigen, den wir dir an deine registrierte Handynummer schicken.
Mit deiner Karte kannst du nach wie vor Geld abheben und Zahlungen t√§tigen. Bitte beachte aber, dass du keine √úberweisungen ausf√ºhren und kein CASH26 mehr benutzen kannst, solange du diese in der N26 App nicht best√§tigen kannst.

title: How does N26 Business work?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, and Switzerland.
It‚Äôs not yet possible to switch between accounts so it‚Äôs important to know if N26 Business is right for you:
The N26 Business account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can‚Äôt have your company‚Äôs name on the account or card.
The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. It‚Äôs currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (it‚Äôs available in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands).
As with the N26 bank account, the account is free and we cover certain cash withdrawals as part of our Fair Use Policy. Unlike other accounts, transfers in foreign currencies aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business within the app. You can visit Transferwise(new tab) for this.
Business to business (B2B) payments are not supported with a N26 Business account. 
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

content: La¬†garanzia sui depositi(nuova tabella)¬†tedesca assicura tutti i depositi¬†fino a 100.000 ‚Ç¨¬†posseduti negli Stati membri dell'Unione Europea. title: How to prove my identity?
content:
As a licensed bank, it‚Äôs important that we know who our customers are. That‚Äôs why we request our customers to prove their identity with a supported ID document when they open an account or use certain products.
We would never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. We‚Äôve gathered other tips to help you protect your identity.
There are two different ways you can show us your ID, and we've also collected some troubleshooting tips for each: photo and video. The method you can choose to show us your ID depends on your nationality, your country of residence, and the type of ID you use:
I live in Germany(new tab)
I live in Spain(new tab)
I live in a different country(new tab)
If your ID isn't on the list, it means we cannot offer you an account with us at the time. We take identity verification very seriously and our Customer Support will not be able to make an exception for you regarding the supported documents.
But we're always adding new documents to this list so it's worth checking back to see if yours has been added.
In case your residential address is in Germany and you're unable to complete your photo or video verification due to a disability, please start the registration process by entering your details and then contact our Customer Support. We're happy to assist you.
Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.¬†

title: Comment fonctionne le compte N26 Business You ?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏èDisponible en Allemagne, Autriche, Belgique, Danemark, Espagne, Estonie, Finlande, France, Irlande, Islande, Islande, Italie, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Norv√®ge, Pays-Bas, Pologne, Portugal, Slovaquie, Slov√©nie, Su√®de.
Pour le moment, il n‚Äôest pas possible de passer d‚Äôune offre de compte priv√© √† un compte business (ou vice versa). D‚Äôembl√©e, il est donc important de savoir si le compte N26 Business You correspond √† vos besoins :
Le compte N26 Business You est con√ßu sp√©cialement pour les auto-entrepreneurs et non pour les entreprises ou autres personnes morales. Ce compte permet de g√©rer vos d√©penses professionnelles avec un compte bancaire et une carte de d√©bit √† votre nom.
Le compte a un co√ªt de 9,90 ‚Ç¨ par mois. Le contrat d'adh√©sion √† N26 Business You est d‚Äôune dur√©e minimale d‚Äôun an. Vous pouvez annuler la reconduction de votre contrat jusqu‚Äô√† 4 semaines avant sa date de renouvellement automatique.
Ce compte premium inclut : des garanties d'assurance et d'assistance N26 Business You fournies par Allianz, qui couvrent vos voyages professionnels et vos outils de travail, mais ce compte vous permet √©galement de retirer de l‚Äôargent en devises √©trang√®res sans frais suppl√©mentaires, aussi souvent que vous le souhaitez.
La carte N26 Business You est une Mastercard con√ßue exclusivement pour une utilisation professionnelle. Vous b√©n√©ficiez de 0,1 % de cashback sur tous vos achats effectu√©s avec votre carte N26 Business. N‚Äô√©tant pas possible d‚Äôavoir deux compte N26 en m√™me temps, nous vous conseillons de commander une Maestro (disponible en Autriche et en Allemagne) pour vos d√©penses priv√©s.
Votre compte N26 Business You ne vous permet pas d‚Äôeffectuer de virements en devises √©trang√®res.
Pour le moment, les pr√©l√®vements interentreprises ou B2B ne sont pas possibles avec un compte N26 Business You. 
Vous pouvez choisir cette offre √† l‚Äôouverture de votre compte ou directement depuis votre application si vous √™tes d√©j√† client N26 Business.
Vous souhaitez parler de nous √† vos amis ? Recevez 15 ‚Ç¨ √† chaque fois que l‚Äôun d‚Äôentre eux nous rejoint. D√©couvrez notre¬†programme de parrainage.

title: How to add or remove Shared Space participants?
content:
For an owner to remove a participant from a Shared Space:
In the Space overview, tap the menu indicated by the 3 dots in the top right.
From the ‚ÄòParticipants‚Äô list, tap on the arrow to the right of the relevant participant‚Äôs name (iOS). Android users can just simply tap on the participant's name.
Tap ‚Äòrevoke power of attorney‚Äô.
¬†Confirm the notification on the next screen and tap ‚Äòrevoke power of attorney‚Äô.¬†

Accept an invitation and join a Shared Space:
In the Spaces overview, tap the Space with ‚ÄòPending‚Äô and the Shared Space icon. 
Read the Shared Space summary and continue to the Power of Attorney screen.
Once you‚Äôve read and understood the information on the Power of Attorney page (the legal screen), tick the box and tap the ‚ÄòAccept power of attorney‚Äô button.
Enter your Confirmation PIN.
Confirm the ‚ÄòAccept Power of Attorney‚Äô push notification on your paired mobile device
You‚Äôll need to have enough free Space(s) to accept an invitation to a Shared Space. If not, you can only proceed if you delete other Space(s) to free up ‚Ä¶ Space.
You must also not have any open Space with the same name or image as the Shared Space. You can only accept the invitation to join a Shared Space once you change the name/image of the other Space(s).

To leave a Shared Space:
In the Space overview, tap the menu indicated by the 3 dots in the top right.
Inside the settings tap on ‚ÄòExit Shared Space‚Äô.
Confirm the notification on the next screen and tap ‚ÄòLeave the Space‚Äô.
A Shared Space can be created and modified within the N26 app or Webapp
