title: PSD2 - Open Banking for Third Party Providers
content:
We are partnering with Token.io(new tab) to provide and support a dedicated interface for third-party payment service providers (''TPPs''). The complete documentation and the on-boarding instructions can be found in the Token.io developer portal(new tab). 
As part of its legal obligations under PSD2, N26 has implemented a contingency mechanism, which provides the following: 
Reliable identification of a TPP via possession of a valid Qualified Website Authentication Certificate (QWAC);

Secure and authorised access to an account
TPPs may access our contingency mechanism via the following URLs:
https://aisp.tech26.de
https://pisp.tech26.de
Access to the above URL and establishing the TLS connection requires implementation of a qualified certificate.
Please find the detailed technical documentation for the fallback interface below:
AISP Fallback Documentation(new tab)
PISP Fallback Documentation(new tab)
TPPs may contact N26 via open.banking@n26.com to provide their QWAC certificates and get technical support.
The reports below compare the availability and performance of our PSD2 dedicated interface with the N26 user interface:
3rd quarter of 2019(new tab)
4th quarter of 2019(new tab)

title: How to download my personal data?
content:
The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a European regulation on data protection and privacy that went into effect on May 25th, 2018. We‚Äôve added a data export option to the WebApp(new tab) as a response to Art. 20 GDPR. And, as with everything we do, getting your personal data you provided to us is transparent and simple, and you‚Äôre in complete control: go to üë§ My Account then Personal settings and Your personal data.
The right to data portability under Art. 20 GDPR covers personal data you provided to us. Art. 20 GDPR shall enable you to easily switch the service provider in case you want to use these data to open a bank account at another bank. This is why Art. 20 GDPR requires to provide these data in a machine-readable format to you. ¬†It's important to keep in mind that the file is to be used for data portability purposes only and your computer might not be able to read a JSON file. Also, if you can open the JSON file the data might be difficult to understand as it is not intended to be human-readable, but machine-readable. The file we provide has the only purpose of being transmitted to another bank.¬†
As a mobile bank, we know the importance of data security. For this reason we take additional security measures before you can download your data, which are described below. We do so in order to make sure that you, the account holder, is in fact the person who downloads the data.¬†¬†
You can request to download the personal data you provided for a current or previous account with us up to 6 months after account closure date. It will come in a machine-readable format so you can share it with a third party if you choose to.
Please request your data through our web form(new tab).
You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.
You can download personal data you provided up to 6 months after account closure date. To request this information, complete a data request form(new tab) and make sure that the information you provide correctly matches all your previous account information. You‚Äôll need to know:
the first and last name, personal ID number, and expiration date of the identification document (national ID card or passport) you used to verify the account,
the registered email address of the account,
the date (month and year) you created and closed your account (check your verification email).
For security reasons, we have to make sure it‚Äôs really you downloading the data: if any field is inaccurate or missing, your request will not be successful.
You will be asked to create a temporary password to use for the link we send to your registered email address. This link is only valid for 24 hours from the moment you received the email. And please note that if the password is entered incorrectly five times, the link will become invalid and you will need to create a new export request.
If you want more information about the collection, use, and processing of your personal data, please visit our updated Privacy Policy (DEU(new tab)) (EU(new tab)).

title: When will my card arrive?
content:
The estimated delivery timeline for card deliveries is 10 working days. Deliveries may take longer in some specific areas in the following countries: Estonia, Greece, Italy, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia and Spain. 
Please consider this before taking any action regarding a card re-order:
If the delivery fails and your card is returned to us, we‚Äôll let you know via email.
If it's been less than 10 working days since you ordered your card, we encourage you to wait before reaching out to us. 
If you've waited longer than the expected timeline, please check and if necessary update your shipping address, you can do this within the N26 app: üë§ My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Shipping Address.
If your shipping address was incorrect and this is your first N26 card, please¬†contact us via live chat(new tab) and we‚Äôll help you order a new one.
If your shipping address was incorrect and you‚Äôve had an active card before, you'll need to reorder the card via the App.
If your shipping address was correct, there might have been an issue with your card's delivery. Please contact us via live chat and we‚Äôll help you order a new one.
If your card fails to arrive or you need your card quickly, you may consider ordering it via¬†express delivery (with an additional fee) which takes up to 3 working days. Please note that express delivery is not available for Metal cards.
Your first card is immediately produced and mailed out once you‚Äôre done¬†proving your identity. If you opened a Metal account, please to top up your account after completing the sign up with at least the amount of the monthly Metal fee in order to receive the card.
Tips for a successful delivery:
If your address contains special characters, please contact us via the live chat.
We only send cards to residential addresses (businesses are not accepted).
Don‚Äôt enter any spaces when entering the postal code for your delivery address.
Ensure that important delivery information isn‚Äôt missing (for example, the name on your mailbox if you live in Germany or your building number, stairwell number, and door code if applicable). If you‚Äôre staying somewhere temporarily (with a friend or in an Airbnb), make sure to include the name on the mailbox that belongs to the main tenant of the apartment.
If you‚Äôre moving somewhere and this is your first card, make sure to select the country and address where you‚Äôll move to and wish to receive your N26 card.

title: Wie √ºberweise ich in Fremdw√§hrungen?
content:
Wir arbeiten mit TransferWise zusammen, um einfache √úberweisungen in Fremdw√§hrungen(neuen Tab) zu erm√∂glichen. TransferWise bietet Echtzeit-Wechselkurse ohne versteckte Geb√ºhren.
Um eine √úberweisung mit Transferwise durchzuf√ºhren, logge dich zun√§chst in deiner mobilen App ein:
1. Klicke auf ‚ÄúAktionen‚Äù auf deinem Hauptbildschirm
2. W√§hle dann ‚ÄúBank√ºberweisung‚Äù f√ºge einen Kontoakt hinzu
3. Wenn du einen neuen Kontakt hinzuf√ºgst, kannst du die gew√ºnschte W√§hrung ausw√§hlen, indem du auf die Europa-Flagge in der oberen rechten Ecke des Bildschirms tippst. 
4. Gib dann den Betrag sowie die Bankverbindung des Empf√§ngers an 
5. Schlie√üe die √úberweisung mit deiner Best√§tigungs-PIN ab.

title: How can I keep track of my daily spending?
content:
To make it easier for you to stay on top of your daily spending, we automatically sort your transactions and display our findings in Statistics (the bullet point icon in the top-right corner of the mobile app). We do this by sorting your:
Categories:
We collect information on retailers and payment reasons in order to improve the way we sort transactions into categories such as ATM, Food & Groceries, or Shopping. For example, if you send a transfer with the reference text Lunch, we‚Äôll put it in the Bars & Restaurants category.
If you feel like a category doesn‚Äôt fit, you can just change it by selecting the transaction and choosing a category from the drop-down list.
Hashtags(#):
We‚Äôve also added default hashtags for:
Transaction times (#weekend)
Types of transactions (#books)
Locations of purchases (#newyork).
You can further sort your transactions by adding your own hashtags:
Tap on a transaction and then the pencil icon to add tags, such as #portugal_trip or #everymonth or to remove unwanted tags.
Please note that we are constantly adding new features to our mobile application. If you do not see a feature that we describe here, please make sure you are using the latest version of our app by visiting the App Store or Google Play. 
The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: How to prove my identity?
content:
As a licensed bank, it‚Äôs important that we know who our customers are. That‚Äôs why we request our customers to prove their identity with a supported ID document when they open an account or use certain products.
We would never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. We‚Äôve gathered other tips to help you protect your identity.
There are two different ways you can show us your ID, and we've also collected some troubleshooting tips for each: photo and video. The method you can choose to show us your ID depends on your nationality, your country of residence, and the type of ID you use:
I live in Germany(new tab)
I live in Spain(new tab)
I live in a different country(new tab)
If your ID isn't on the list, it means we cannot offer you an account with us at the time. We take identity verification very seriously and our Customer Support will not be able to make an exception for you regarding the supported documents.
But we're always adding new documents to this list so it's worth checking back to see if yours has been added.
In case your residential address is in Germany and you're unable to complete your photo or video verification due to a disability, please start the registration process by entering your details and then contact our Customer Support. We're happy to assist you.
Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.¬†

title: How to top up my account?
content:
Once you are successfully verified, you'll be able to top up your account in several ways:
MoneyBeam. Instantly receive money from other N26 users.

Debit card. If you have no previous transactions on your account, you'll be able to enter the card details from your other account within the N26 app. You can choose to deposit between ¬£20 and ¬£150. Please note that this feature is only available when topping up your account for the first time. Credit and prepaid cards are not accepted.

Transfer. The transfer must be in GBP. You‚Äôll just need to provide your Account Number and your name as it‚Äôs written on the ID you used to create your account. Please note that: 
For the transfer details field, make sure the recipient‚Äôs name is your name as it‚Äôs written on the identity document you used to prove your identity (especially if you have an N26 Business account ‚Äì we don‚Äôt accept company names).

title: FATCA - Warum wir bestimmte Informationen von dir ben√∂tigen
content:
N26 ist als reguliertes Finanzinstitut dazu verpflichtet, dem United States Department of Treasury sowie dem Internal Revenue Service (IRS) Informationen √ºber Kundenkonten von U.S. Steuerzahlern oder ausl√§ndischen Entit√§ten zur Verf√ºgung zu stellen, die laut FATCA f√ºr U.S. Steuerzahler von erheblichem Interesse sind.
FATCA steht f√ºr Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act und ist ein Gesetz zur Bek√§mpfung von Steuerhinterziehung. Eingef√ºhrt vom IRS erreicht FATCA bessere steuerliche Entsprechungen, indem er U.S. Steuerzahler daran hindert, ausl√§ndische Banken oder Finanzinstitute daf√ºr zu nutzen, ihre Verm√∂genswerte und Einkommen der Besteuerung zu entziehen. Mehr √ºber FATCA oder den IRS erf√§hrst du auf: www.irs.gov.
Anders als die meisten L√§nder haben die Vereinigten Staaten ein Steuersystem, das auch diejenigen US-Staatsb√ºrger erfasst, deren Wohnsitz nicht in den Vereinigten Staaten liegt. Die meisten anderen L√§nder besteuern die weltweiten Einkommen ihrer B√ºrger nur insofern, als letztere ihren Wohnsitz im Inland haben bzw. besteuern nicht diejenigen B√ºrger, die permanent im Ausland leben und arbeiten.
Um zuverl√§ssig festzustellen, ob dein Kundenkonto dem IRS mitzuteilen ist, m√ºssen wir dir die folgenden 3 Fragen stellen:
Hast du (auch) die US-amerikanische Staatsangeh√∂rigkeit oder besitzt du eine Green Card?

Bist du in den Vereinigten Staaten steuerpflichtig?
In den Vereinigten Staaten steuerpflichtig zu sein, hei√üt nicht ohne Weiteres, dass du dort eine pers√∂nliche Einkommensteuer zahlen musst. Es bedeutet zun√§chst nur, dass du laut amerikanischem Recht verpflichtet bist, eine Steuererkl√§rung abgeben musst und dein (weltweites) Einkommen dem IRS angeben musst - selbst wenn du schlie√ülich keine Steuern in den Vereinigten Staaten zahlen musst.

Falls ja, wie lautet deine US-amerikanische Steuer-Identifikationsnummer (US-TIN)?
Als US-TIN kannst du entweder deine US-Sozialversicherungsnummer (SSN) oder deine US-Steuer-Identifikationsnummer (ITIN) benutzen.
Bitte beachte: Falls in deinem Konto eine amerikanische Telefonnummer oder ein amerikanischer Geburtsort registriert ist oder du einen Dauerauftrag in die USA erstellst, haben wir nach FATCA davon auszugehen, dass die in FATCA festgelegten Bestimmungen f√ºr dich Geltung haben, bis du uns das Gegenteil best√§tigst.
Falls sich deine Lage ver√§ndert, kannst du deine Steuerdaten jederzeit in deiner N26 App aktualisieren. Logge dich dazu einfach in deine N26 App ein und gehe zu: 

Mein Konto > Einstellungen > Pers√∂nliche Einstellungen > Steuerdaten, und aktualisiere dort deine Informationen.

title: Warum ist meine SEPA √úberweisung fehlgeschlagen?
content:
Wir akzeptieren √úberweisungen in EUR √ºber SEPA. Wir arbeiten nicht mit SWIFT, falls du also eine √úberweisung in einer Fremdw√§hrung machen m√∂chtest, bitte verwende TransferWise (in der App oder auf der Website).
Um eine √úberweisung zu erhalten, musst du dem Absender nur deinen vollst√§ndigen Namen (so wie er auf dem Ausweisdokument steht, mit dem du dich bei uns verifiziert hast) und deine IBAN angeben.
Du findest deine IBAN auf deinen Kontoausz√ºgen und unter üë§ Mein Konto (in der App oder WebApp).
H√§ufige Gr√ºnde f√ºr fehlgeschlagene √úberweisungen:
Der Empf√§ngername auf dem √úberweisungsauftrag unterscheidet sich vom Namen des  Kontoinhabers (so wie er auf dessen Ausweis steht). 
Als Empf√§nger wird der Name einer Firma anstatt eines pers√∂nlichen Namens/Kontos angegeben (gilt auch f√ºr N26 Business).
Die IBAN ist falsch. 
Du erh√§ltst keine Push-Nachricht um die √úberweisung zu best√§tigen.
Eine unsachgem√§√üe Verwendung wurde festgestellt. N26 ist in der Verantwortung, Routinepr√ºfungen von Transaktionen durchzuf√ºhren (siehe GwG ¬ß 10(neuen Tab)). Deshalb kann es vorkommen, dass wir Unterlagen anfordern, um den Hintergrund oder die Herkunft einer Transaktion zu √ºberpr√ºfen. Dies kann dazu f√ºhren, dass eine Gutschrift verz√∂gert oder nicht vorgenommen wird.

title: Come posso proteggere la mia identit√†?
content:
Per proteggere ed evitare l'uso improprio dei tuoi dati personali, tieni presente che:
Non ti chiederemo mai di verificare la tua identit√† per conto di altre persone o societ√†. Ci√≤ include verifiche per contratti di affitto di appartamenti, linee di credito o offerte di lavoro (compresi i lavori con N26). Completa il processo di verifica solo se desideri aprire un conto bancario N26.
Come proprietario dell'account, solo tu dovresti creare e avere accesso ai tuoi dati di accesso.
Non creare mai un conto bancario N26 con un indirizzo e-mail e una password predefiniti. Se usi le credenziali di accesso che ti sono state fornite, queste credenziali possono essere utilizzate per raggiungere le tue informazioni personali e legali. Inoltre, non accedere mai ad un account N26 che non √® il tuo.
Non inviare ID o passaporto a destinatari sconosciuti o non verificati.
N26 pu√≤ richiedere determinati documenti quando una transazione soggetta a un controllo di routine. Invia una documentazione valida solo agli account di posta elettronica N26 verificati.
N26 non chieder√† mai il nome utente, la password o i codici PIN al di fuori dell'app N26.
¬†
Non fornire mai queste informazioni in un sito Web o un'app esterna, anche se sembra correlata a N26.
Se dovessi avere dubbi, hai ricevuto una richiesta sospetta da una terza parte o pensi che il tuo login N26 possa essere compromesso, non esitare a contattarci.

title: Was ist ein N26 Flex Konto?
content:
Wir bieten dir ein N26 Flex Konto an, wenn du aufgrund deiner Bonit√§t die Mindestanforderungen f√ºr die Er√∂ffnung eines N26 Bankkontos nicht erf√ºllst:
Wir berechnen eine monatliche Kontof√ºhrungsgeb√ºhr von 6 ‚Ç¨. Wir buchen diese Geb√ºhr direkt vom Konto ab. Die erste Geb√ºhr wird zehn Tage nach Er√∂ffnung des Kontos abgebucht. Danach buchen wir den Betrag jeden Monat zum Datum der Anmeldung ab. Stelle sicher, dass du gen√ºgend Geld f√ºr diese Geb√ºhr auf deinem Konto hast, um √úberziehungszinsen zu vermeiden.

title: How to declare my N26 account for my taxes in France?
content:
(Applies to all French residents)
According to the French General Tax Code, all French residents are required to declare any bank accounts they have opened, used, or closed within the year of declaring an income. This includes your N26 bank account. To do this:
In your tax return, check the box Foreign account opened, used or closed (8UU) (Compte √©tranger ouvert, utilis√© ou ferm√©).
Complete the Cerfa n¬∞ 3916(new tab) form and attach it to your tax return.

title: How to dispute a transaction?
content:
We understand that disputed charges (also called ‚Äòchargebacks‚Äô) can cost you time and money.
We can only dispute card transactions that are visible in your monthly balance statement and haven‚Äôt been made more than 120 days ago. Please complete the dispute form (EU(new tab)¬†or¬†UK(new tab)) and send it to us. Also, make sure that you:
Complete a separate form for each card payment and sign it
Select only one dispute reason
Attach all¬†additional documents(new tab)

title: Warum pr√ºft N26 Transaktionen?
content:
Wir haben die Aufgabe, Routinepr√ºfungen von Transaktionen durchzuf√ºhren, um die Sicherheit deines Kontos zu gew√§hrleisten (siehe¬†GwG ¬ß 10(neuen Tab)). Diese √úberpr√ºfungen betreffen einzelne Transaktionen und werden automatisch von unseren Systemen initiiert.
Aus diesem Grund kann es vorkommen, dass wir dich nach bestimmten Dokumenten fragen. Wenn Du eine solche Anfrage erh√§ltst, sende uns die angeforderten Unterlagen bitte via Nachrichten von N26. Es gibt keine Ausnahmen f√ºr solche √úberpr√ºfungen, und sie k√∂nnen auch nicht umgangen werden.¬†
Dabei handelt es sich um Standardprozesse wie sie bei Banken √ºblich sind, um die Sicherheit unserer Kundenkonten zu gew√§hrleisten.
Der genaue Pr√ºfvorgang und das Ergebnis werden vertraulich behandelt und nur intern verarbeitet. Hier findest du einige Tipps, um den Prozess zu beschleunigen:
Hier sind einige Tipps, um den Prozess zu beschleunigen:
In der E-Mail, die du von uns erh√§ltst, werden wir dir genau erkl√§ren, welches spezifische Dokument wir von dir ben√∂tigen. Du kannst uns eingescannte Dokumente, Bilder oder Screenshots zusenden (vorausgesetzt, der Originalinhalt des Dokuments ist deutlich lesbar). Bitte gib uns auch eine genaue Beschreibung √ºber den Inhalt des Dokuments.
Du kannst einen Beleg, eine Rechnung, einen Vertrag oder ein √§hnliches Dokument einreichen, das es uns erm√∂glicht, die jeweilige Transaktion und deren Herkunft und Zweck eindeutig zu identifizieren. .
Sei pr√§zise in deinen Antworten, Details und Dokumenten. Nachdem wir deine Unterlagen erhalten haben, lassen wir dich wissen, ob sie f√ºr die √úberpr√ºfung ausreichend sind. In einigen F√§llen kann es vorkommen, dass wir dich nach weiteren Details fragen werden, was zu Verz√∂gerungen f√ºhren kann.
Antworte so fr√ºh wie m√∂glich, also vor der genannten Frist, direkt auf die E-Mail, die du von uns erhalten hast und sende deine Unterlagen mit.¬†
Unserem Kundendienst liegen zu diesem Thema keine weiteren Informationen vor.
Du musst die je nach deiner Situation g√ºltigen Dokumente vorlegen. 

Einige Beispiele:
Du hast finanzielle Hilfe von deiner Familie erhalten, um Projekte abzuschlie√üen oder hast Grundst√ºcke oder Geld von Verwandten geerbt.Ein Gew√§hrungs-/Darlehensvertrag, ein offizielles Erbschaftsdokument oder ein offizielles Dokument √ºber die Herkunft des Darlehens (z.B. Verkaufsunterlagen einer ver√§u√üerten Immobilie zur Finanzierung des Darlehens oder Kontoausz√ºge von Verwandten, von denen das Geld stammt).
Du hast eine Immobilie ver√§u√üert oder deine Aktien an der B√∂rse verkauft.Den Vertrag √ºber die vereinbarten Gesch√§fte oder notarielle Beurkundung des Eigentums√ºbergangs.
Du hast Geld erhalten oder gesendet, um Rechnungen zu bezahlen oder ein Produkt zu kaufen.Kontoausz√ºge √ºber die Herkunft des Geldes oder Dokumente, die die Verwendung des Geldes und seinen Zweck belegen.
Du hast eine Abfindung von deinem vorherigen Arbeitgeber erhalten.Dokumente, die das Ende deines Arbeitsverh√§ltnisses belegen, mit einer Zahlungsbegr√ºndung und/oder einem Kontoauszug deines fr√ºheren Arbeitgebers.

title: Why didn't I receive my pairing code via SMS?
content:
A pairing code is required to¬†connect your smartphone¬†to your account. If you didn‚Äôt receive this code via SMS for whatever reason, you can request a new one up to five times in the mobile app. Please wait 30 seconds before requesting a new one. 
If all five codes are requested and pairing is still unsuccessful, then for security reasons you‚Äôll be blocked from making further requests for 24 hours. If this happens, you can either wait or contact our Customer Support via chat - who would be happy to help you.
If your country code is outside of the EU, it‚Äôs likely that you‚Äôll need to contact us to receive a pairing code.

title: How to repay my loan early?
content:
You can always repay your¬†N26 Credit¬†loan early. Keep in mind that a 1% early repayment fee applies. If your remaining credit period is less than 12 months, the fee is 0.5% of the prematurely repaid amount.
Contact us via chat to request an early repayment and we‚Äôll provide you with an exact calculation of the early repayment fee.
*The above only applies to loans with N26. For auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) or Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99) loans, please contact the appropriate partner directly.

title: ¬øC√≥mo funciona N26 Business You?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Disponible en Espa√±a, Alemania, Austria, B√©lgica, Dinamarca, Eslovaquia, Eslovenia, Estonia, Finlandia, Francia, Grecia, Irlanda, Islandia, Italia, Letonia, Liechtenstein, Lituania, Luxemburgo, Los Pa√≠ses Bajos, Noruega, Portugal, Polonia, Suecia y El Reino Unido.

La cuenta N26 Business You est√° dise√±ada para¬†freelancers o aut√≥nomos que trabajan bajo su propio nombre. Eso significa que no puedes poner el nombre de tu empresa en la tarjeta ni en tu cuenta.
La tarifa es de¬†9,90‚Ç¨¬†al mes. La permanencia m√≠nima es de un a√±o de contrato y este se renueva autom√°ticamente si no cancelas tu suscripci√≥n por lo menos cuatro semanas antes de que se acabe.

De momento no es posible tener dos cuentas N26 al mismo tiempo, as√≠ que si tambi√©n necesitas una cuenta para tus gastos personales, te recomendamos pedir una tarjeta Maestro (disponible en Alemania, Austria y los  Pa√≠ses Bajos).

title: How to create and manage standing orders?
content:
When setting up an outgoing transfer in either the N26 app or Web app you‚Äôll have the option to make it a standing order.
Once you complete the outgoing transfer you'll then be prompted to tick a box which will create a standing order. After you've inputted the amount of the transfer and its recipient, under the reference text field select "Want to save this as a standing order?". From here you'll be able to set the start/end dates of the standing order and choose its payment intervals.
To view your scheduled transfers and standing orders directly in the mobile app:
Go to your transaction list (the main screen).
Then tap on the 3 dots located in the upper¬†right corner for Android and on the top of the transaction list for iOS. 
A small window will pop, where you will be able to select "Standing Orders".
Here you can cancel and/or modify the details of your standing order. To cancel it just tap the standing order you wish to delete and tap the trash icon in the top right-hand corner.
‚ÑπÔ∏è ¬†Please note, if a standing order fails due to insufficient funds we won't attempt the transfer again - you'll need to manually send the transfer, however the next scheduled transfers will proceed as normal.

title: Kann ich ein Konto er√∂ffnen, wenn ich au√üerhalb der Eurozone wohne?
content:
Wenn du in Polen, Schweden, D√§nemark, Norwegen, Liechtenstein, Island oder der Schweiz lebst, kannst du ein N26 Konto er√∂ffnen. Wir bieten dir:
Die Wahl zwischen einem Standard-Konto oder N26 Business.
Ein Konto in Euro, eine deutsche IBAN und √úberweisungen per SEPA oder MoneyBeam.

Kostenloser Versand deiner Mastercard oder Expressversand f√ºr 25‚Ç¨.
√úberweisungen in Fremdw√§hrungen mit TransferWise (mit dem Standard-Konto).
5 geb√ºhrenfreie Abhebungen am Geldautomaten (1.7% Geb√ºhr auf Abhebungen in Fremdw√§hrungen).
0.1% Cashback auf alle Kartenzahlungen ( bei N26 Business).
2 zus√§tzliche Spaces zu deinem Hauptkonto
Einen Bonus f√ºr alle Freunde, die du √ºber unser Freundschaftswerbungsprogramm erfolgreich zu N26 einl√§dst.
Kontaktlose Zahlungen mit Google Pay und Apple Pay.

Tipps f√ºr ein- und ausgehende Zahlungen:
Damit du stets den g√ºnstigsten Wechselkurs erh√§ltst, empfehlen wir dir, bei Eink√§ufen und Bargeldabhebungen mit deiner Mastercard stets deine Landesw√§hrung auszuw√§hlen (andernfalls k√∂nnen zus√§tzliche Geb√ºhren anfallen).
Um Geld in deiner Landesw√§hrung auf dein Euro-Konto einzuzahlen, empfehlen wir dir eine SEPA-√úberweisung √ºber die TransferWise-Website(neuen Tab), unser Partner f√ºr Geldtransfers in Fremdw√§hrungen. Alternativ kannst du auch √ºber deine √∂rtliche Bank Geld √ºberweisen.
Ausgehende √úberweisungen auf Euro-Konten kannst du ganz einfach √ºber die Standardfunktion in der N26 App t√§tigen. √úberweisungen auf Konten in Fremdw√§hrungen kannst du √ºber TransferWise auch in der App t√§tigen.*

*Bitte beachte: TransferWise ist nicht f√ºr N26 Business verf√ºgbar (nur SEPA-√úberweisungen in Euro).

title: Why did my online purchase fail?
content:
Some reasons why your online payment failed:
If you are unable to confirm the push message within 5 minutes, simply restart the payment process on the merchant's website.
If you do not receive a push message, please make sure that your smartphone is connected and that push messages are enabled on your smartphone.
Ensure that online payments and payments abroad are enabled in your card settings.
A stable internet connection is required.
If you are using an iOS device, make sure you turn off the Do Not Disturb mode.
If the amount on the merchant's site is different from the one stated in the push message, this may be due to the conversion of a foreign currency into euros.
Make sure that you disable any Adblockers running on your browser.
Your Maestro card can‚Äôt be used for online purchases.

title: Why was I charged an ATM fee?
content:
ATM fees could happen for a few reasons: 
A ‚Ç¨2 fee applies to any additional withdrawal beyond our Fair Use Policy. We‚Äôll remind you via push message when you‚Äôre running low on free withdrawals. 
Some ATMs may come with their own fees. We have no control over these fees and can‚Äôt reject or reverse them. You‚Äôll be informed before the end of a withdrawal if additional fees apply and will have the possibility of cancelling it.
Foreign currency ATM withdrawals sometimes include fees. With the N26 account, there‚Äôs a fee of 1.7% of the withdrawal amount. This fee is waived for N26 You or N26 Metal members. 
Using your Maestro for ATM withdrawals. A ‚Ç¨2 fee applies to both domestic or international withdrawals. Maestro is only available in Germany, Austria, or the Netherlands. 

To avoid certain fees, especially when travelling, you can use the Mastercard ATM Locator(new tab) to find free ATMs nearby by selecting no access fee. 
You can find an overview of our plans and fees on our website(new tab).

title: ¬øPor qu√© me han cobrado comisi√≥n en el cajero?
content:
Las comisiones en los cajeros se dan por diferentes motivos:
La comisi√≥n de 2‚Ç¨ se aplica a cada retirada de efectivo adicional siguiendo nuestra Pol√≠tica de Uso Justo. Cuando te est√©s quedando sin retiradas gratuitas, te lo recordaremos con un mensaje.
La retirada de efectivo en moneda extranjera incluye comisi√≥n en algunas ocasiones. Con la cuenta N26 y N26 Business la comisi√≥n es de 1.7% de la cantidad total. Con la N26 You o N26 Metal no hay ninguna comisi√≥n.
Usar tu Maestro para retirar efectivo en cajeros autom√°ticos. Se aplica una comisi√≥n de 2‚Ç¨ tanto en retiros de efectivo nacionales como internacionales. La Maestro solo est√° disponible en Alemania, Austria o Pa√≠ses Bajos.
Algunos cajeros autom√°ticos tienen sus propias comisiones. No tenemos control sobre estas comisiones, por lo que no podemos rechazarlas ni revertirlas. Antes de finalizar la retirada, se te avisar√° si se aplican comisiones adicionales o no, y tendr√°s la posibilidad de cancelar la operaci√≥n.

Para evitar dichas comisiones, sobre todo cuando est√©s de viaje, puedes utilizar el¬†localizador de cajeros MasterCard(pesta√±a nueva)¬†para encontrar cajeros autom√°ticos gratuitos cerca de ti. 
Eso s√≠, esta b√∫squeda avanzada solo est√° disponible en la versi√≥n en ingl√©s; pero te ayudamos: haz clic en Search Criteria > View More Options > Select Features-Optional > No Access Fee (within country).

Puedes ver todas nuestras comisiones en la p√°gina web.

title: What is the maximum I can spend?
content:
The maximum¬†daily¬†limits (total sum within 24 hours) for card payments are:
ATM withdrawals: ‚Ç¨2.500 (or ‚Ç¨400 in Togo, Congo, Benin, Ivory Coast, Kenya, Cameroon, Nigeria, Senegal and Algeria)
In-store or online payments: ‚Ç¨5.000
You can¬†set your own¬†daily ATM withdrawal and payment limits within our limits directly in the app by tapping¬†üë§ My Account¬†then¬†Card settings.
The maximum¬†daily¬†limits (rolling 24 hours) for bank transfers are:
MoneyBeam to N26 customers (the recipient must be visible): ‚Ç¨1.000
Outgoing transfers: ‚Ç¨50.000
Incoming transfers: No limit
The maximum¬†monthly¬†limit (total sum) for card transactions is ‚Ç¨20.000*. 
*a monthly limit of ‚Ç¨10.000 applies to ATM withdrawals for customers who opened their account in France. 
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: Come salvare i dati del destinatario di un bonifico?
content:
Ogni volta che nell'app crei un bonifico per un nuovo destinatario (tocca + quindi¬†Trasferisci¬†e¬†Aggiungi nuovo destinatario), alcuni dettagli, come il nome del destinatario e l‚ÄôIBAN, vengono salvati automaticamente nell'elenco dei contatti per utilizzi futuri. Puoi anche cancellare i contatti o visualizzare con essi la cronologia delle transazioni:
iOS: fai scorrere il contatto verso sinistra per visualizzare la cronologia delle transazioni o per eliminarlo.
Android: tocca e tieni premuto il contatto per visualizzare la cronologia delle transazioni o eliminarlo.
L‚Äôeliminazione di un contatto non elimina la relativa cronologia delle transazioni.

title: How to reorder a card?
content:
If your card is lost, stolen, broken, or if there was a problem with the¬†delivery¬†of your first card, you can reorder a new one.
First, check your shipping address in the app: select üë§ My Account then Settings and Personal Settings. By tapping¬†Shipping address, you can view and update your shipping address, then:
If you've activated a card already: Reorder a card in the app by tapping¬†My Account¬†then¬†Card Settings. Swipe until you see the card you want to order and tap¬†Reorder.
If you've never had an active card: You‚Äôll need to contact us via chat so we can reorder a card for you.
Deliveries for N26 You or N26 Metal upgrades are free. And in case your first or upgrade card gets lost on its way to you, we‚Äôll also delivery you a new card for free.
Once your new card arrives, you‚Äôll need to¬†activate it¬†either in the N26 app or our Webapp(new tab).

title: How to repay my loan early?
content:
You can always repay your¬†N26 Credit¬†loan early. Keep in mind that a 1% early repayment fee applies. If your remaining credit period is less than 12 months, the fee is 0.5% of the prematurely repaid amount.
Contact us via chat to request an early repayment and we‚Äôll provide you with an exact calculation of the early repayment fee.
*The above only applies to loans with N26. For auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) or Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99) loans, please contact the appropriate partner directly.

title: Custom Audiences
content:
Datenverarbeitung im Rahmen von Facebook Custom Audiences
Custom Audiences erm√∂glicht uns, dich als bestehenden N26 Kunden von unseren Werbema√ünahmen auszuschlie√üen. Wir m√∂chten dir keine irrelevante Werbung anzeigen. Dar√ºber k√∂nnen wir eine relevante Zielgruppe definieren, f√ºr welche die angezeigte Werbung relevanter ist als f√ºr andere Facebook-Nutzer. Diese sog. ‚ÄúLookalike-Audiences‚Äù sind unseren eigenen Kunden √§hnlicher als der durchschnittliche Facebook-Nutzer.¬†
Um die oben beschrieben Vorteile nutzen zu k√∂nnen, stellen wir Facebook eine ‚Äúgehashte‚Äù Version deiner N26 E-Mail-Adresse zur Verf√ºgung. Das sog. ‚ÄúHashing‚Äù ist eine Form der Pseudonymisierung durch die deine Email-Adresse verschl√ºsselt wird, sodass du anhand dieser gehashten E-Mail-Adresse nicht mehr identifiziert werden kannst. Deine gehashte E-Mail-Adresse wird von Facebook dahingehend abgeglichen, ob diese auch bei Facebook hinterlegt ist. Nach dem Abgleich, unabh√§ngig davon ob dieser erfolgreich war oder nicht, werden s√§mtliche gehashte E-Mail-Adressen innerhalb von 6-8 Stunden gel√∂scht. Facebook teilt diese Daten nicht mit Dritten oder anderen Werbetreibenden oder gew√§hrt diesen Zugang zu deinen Daten. Diese und weitere Informationen kannst du den AGB von Facebook Custom Audiences(neuen Tab) entnehmen.
Du kannst deine Einwilligung zu dieser Verarbeitung deiner Daten gem√§√ü Art. 6 Abs. 1 Bst. a DSGVO jederzeit in der N26 Web App widerrufen.

title: How to report an insurance claim?
content:
Your¬†N26 You(new tab)¬†and¬†N26 Metal(new tab)¬†membership includes a wide range of insurance benefits, covered by our partner Allianz Global Assistance Europe.*
To report a claim, log into your app, go to üë§ My Account and select N26 You/Metal, then select Make a claim.
There you'll find:

title: How to reorder a card?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Deliveries normally take up to 10 working days. Deliveries may take longer in some specific areas in the following countries: Estonia, Greece, Italy, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia and Spain.
If you‚Äôre waiting for your first card¬† and it has been more than 10 working days since you've successfully completed your identity verification, please contact us via live chat.
¬†For any other reason, please re-order your card via the N26 app.
First, check and update your shipping address
You can do this within the N26 app: üë§ My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Shipping Address.
To reorder your card go to Actions and tap Card Settings.¬†
From your list of cards, swipe until you see the card you wish to reorder and select Reorder.¬†¬†
Note that the Standard and the N26 You replacement cards have a fee of ‚Ç¨6 for standard shipping and ‚Ç¨25 for express shipping. For N26 Metal cards, the fee is ‚Ç¨45 for standard shipping. Express delivery for Metal cards is not available.
Once you‚Äôve ordered your new card, you can activate a digital version while your card is on its way. You can do this within the N26 app by scrolling to your card in Card Settings and adding it to the mobile wallet of choice. This feature is available for 30 days starting from the day your card has been ordered. After this you'll need to activate your physical card through the N26 app. Once the physical card is activated, your mobile wallet will continue working normally. If you don‚Äôt activate your physical card during this period, the digital version will expire until your card is activated.
This feature is not be enabled for customers who reorder their card or move to another account without blocking their current card. In these cases their current card will continue working with Apple Pay or Google Pay until the new one is activated.

title: Was ist MoneyBeam?
content:
MoneyBeam erm√∂glicht dir, deinen Kontakten in Echtzeit Geld zu schicken, ohne dass du dazu ihre Bankverbindung eingeben musst. Um einen MoneyBeam zu senden, logge dich in deine App ein:
Tippe auf "Aktionen" auf deinem Hauptbildschirm und w√§hle dann MoneyBeam.
W√§hle einen Kontakt aus der Liste aus oder f√ºge manuell einen Empf√§nger hinzu, indem du seine Telefonnummer und E-Mail Adresse angibst. Damit das klappt, muss der Empf√§nger ein N26 Nutzer sein und als solcher sichtbar sein.
Gib den Betrag sowie einen Verwendungszweck ein.
Best√§tige mit deiner Best√§tigungs-PIN und der Push-Mitteilung, die du erh√§ltst.
N26 Kunden werden den MoneyBeam sofort erhalten. Das Limit f√ºr MoneyBeams an andere N26 Nutzer liegt bei 1000‚Ç¨ pro 24 Stunden.
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erhalte 15‚Ç¨ f√ºr jeden Freund, dem du N26 erfolgreich empfiehlst. Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: How to find my IBAN or account number?
content:
You can find your IBAN and our BIC number on your balance statements or in¬†üë§ My Account¬†from the mobile app or¬†WebApp(new tab)¬†(if you haven‚Äôt activated your card and need to¬†top up your account).
All our IBANs start with DE followed by the¬†check digits¬†(two numbers), then our¬†bank code¬†10011001, and end with your 10-digit¬†account number¬†(start at 26).

title: Quanto tempo occorre per inviare denaro con TransferWise?
content:
Una volta creato un trasferimento TransferWise, visualizzerai la data stimata per il trasferimento.
Se il trasferimento TransferWise non riesce, ti invieremo un messaggio push al riguardo. L‚Äôimporto ritorner√† sul tuo conto pochi giorni dopo.
TransferWise non addebita alcuna commissione extra in caso di pagamento restituito e nemmeno noi. Tuttavia, alcune banche partecipanti addebitano commissioni, nel qual caso TransferWise detrarr√† tale importo dal denaro restituito conformemente alle relative¬†Condizioni di utilizzo(nuova tabella).
Ragioni comuni del mancato trasferimento:
Errore nei dettagli del trasferimento (ad es. quando si inseriscono il nome del destinatario o le informazioni del conto).

Limiti raggiunti o pagamenti online non attivi nelle impostazioni della carta.
Non sono possibili trasferimenti in valuta estera con il conto N26 Business or N26 Business You o se il destinatario √® un conto business.

title: Why does N26 do checks on transactions?
content:
We have the responsibility to run routine checks on accounts and transactions in order to ensure your account‚Äôs security (see GwG ¬ß 10(new tab)). These checks are automatically initiated by our systems.¬†
As a result, we may ask you to provide some documents. If you receive such a request, please send the requested documents via Messages from N26. There are no exceptions or evasion for such checks.¬†
This practice is a standard banking procedure and ensures the safety of our customers. Both the process and the result are confidential and handled internally. Here are some tips to speed up the process:
The document that we need you to provide will be exactly named in the message you‚Äôll receive from N26. You can send us scanned documents, pictures, or screenshots, as long as the original content of the document is easily readable. Please make sure to also provide a detailed description.¬†
Be precise in your answers, details, and documents. After we receive your required proof and description, we will let you know if your reply fulfills our check. In a few cases, we might ask for further clarification which could prolong the process.
Reply as soon as possible, always before the deadline stated in the message you received from N26. Use that email to reply and send attachments.¬†
Our Customer Support doesn‚Äôt have any additional information on this subject.
You must provide valid documentation depending on your situation.

 Find here some examples:
You've received financial help from your family to complete projects or have inherited land or money from deceased relatives.
A granting/loan contract, an official document of inheritance, or an official document of the source of the loan (such as the sales documents of a sold property to finance the loan or bank statements of granting relatives).
You've sold a property or your shares on the stock market.
The contract showing the agreed transactions or the official notarial documentation of the transfer of property.
You've received or sent money to pay bills or buy a product.
Documents showing the balance statements confirming the source of this money or documents showing the use of the money and its purpose.
You've received a final payout from your previous employer.
Documents proving the end of your employment, detailing the payment and/or a bank statement from your previous employer.

title: How to log in with Two Factor Authentication?
content:
Two-Factor Authentication is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. You‚Äôre probably familiar with using only¬† your personal password to sign in to your account, but with Two-Factor Authentication you‚Äôll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.
Go here for more information on Two-Factor Authentication
When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you‚Äôll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or, if this isn't possible, you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number, confirming your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log in to your N26 account.
When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. This means the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.
First, you‚Äôll need to update your phone‚Äôs operating system and the N26 app to their latest versions. If you‚Äôre unable to login to your account, but still have access to your registered email address, try to reset your password. If you don‚Äôt have access to your registered email address, please contact us via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out.
Read more in our article on how to create a password.
If you‚Äôve lost access to your paired device, but you still have access to your registered phone number, you‚Äôll be able to log into your N26 account and request an authentication code. To do this:
Login to the Webapp
When prompted to confirm your login on your paired device, select Help
Choose Send SMS Code
Once you receive the SMS code, input it into the Webapp
As you've just confirmed the authentication code you‚Äôve successfully completed two-factor authentication, and can now pair your new device with your account.
If you don‚Äôt have access to your registered phone number ‚Äì either because you have a new phone number, or your phone was lost or stolen ‚Äì please contact our customer service via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out.
If you have an older smartphone that doesn‚Äôt support the latest app version, you won‚Äôt be able to access N26 via the mobile app anymore using that phone. 
However, you can still use our Webapp to view your account, to do this you'll need to confirm your login attempt via an SMS verification code which we‚Äôll send to your account's registered phone number.
You‚Äôll still be able to complete card transactions and cash withdrawals as normal using your Mastercard, but bear in mind that you won't be able to perform any bank transfers or payments until you can confirm the transfer within the N26 app.
Read more in our article on Strong Customer Authentification.

title: Wie lade ich meine pers√∂nlichen Daten herunter?
content:
Die Datenschutzgrundverordnung (DSGVO) ist eine europ√§ische Verordnung zum Schutz personenbezogener Daten, die am 25. Mai 2018 in Kraft getreten ist. Wir haben daraufhin eine Funktion zum Datenexport in der WebApp(neuen Tab) hinzugef√ºgt, um dein Recht auf Daten√ºbertragbarkeit gem√§√ü Art. 20 DSGVO zu gew√§hrleisten. Die Beschaffung der von dir bereitgestellten pers√∂nlichen Daten ist transparent und einfach und somit besitzt du die vollst√§ndige Kontrolle: Gehe zu üë§ Mein Konto und Pers√∂nliche Einstellungen und klicke auf Deine pers√∂nlichen Daten.
Das Recht auf Daten√ºbertragbarkeit gem√§√ü Art. 20 DSGVO umfasst personenbezogene Daten, die du uns bereitgestellt hast. Art. 20 DSGVO soll dir erm√∂glichen, ohne gro√üen Aufwand den Dienstleister zu wechseln f√ºr den Fall, dass du die von dir bereitgestellten Daten nutzen m√∂chtest, um ein Konto bei einer anderen Bank zu er√∂ffnen. Aus diesem Grund verpflichtet uns Art. 20 DSGVO dazu, dir diese Daten in einem maschinenlesbaren Format bereitzustellen. Dabei ist zu beachten, dass die Datei lediglich f√ºr Zwecke der Daten√ºbertragbarkeit zu nutzen ist und dein Computer die JSON Datei m√∂glicherweise nicht lesen kann. Falls du die JSON Datei √∂ffnen kannst, k√∂nnen ihre Inhalte dennoch schwierig zu verstehen sein, da die Datei f√ºr Maschinenlesbarkeit konzipiert ist und nicht f√ºr die unmittelbare Verarbeitung durch Menschen. Die Datei, die wir ausstellen, ist lediglich zur √úbertragung an andere Banken bestimmt.
Als mobile Bank sind wir uns der Wichtigkeit der Sicherheit deiner Daten bewusst. Daher haben wir zus√§tzliche Sicherheitsma√ünahmen installiert bevor du deine Daten herunterladen kannst. Diese Ma√ünahmen sind im folgenden Absatz beschrieben. Wir tun dies, um sicherzustellen, dass du, der Kontoinhaber, auch derjenige bist, der die Daten herunterl√§dt.¬†
Du kannst die von dir bereitgestellten personenbezogenen Daten, die du f√ºr ein laufendes oder vorheriges Konto angegeben hast, bis zu 6 Monate nach Kontoschlie√üung beantragen herunterzuladen. Du erh√§ltst das Dokument in einem maschinenlesbaren Format, sodass du es mit einem Dritten teilen kannst.
Bitte frage deine Daten √ºber unser Webformular(neuen Tab) an.
Du wirst aufgefordert, ein tempor√§res Passwort f√ºr den Link zu erstellen, den wir an deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse senden. Dieser Link ist nur f√ºr 24 Stunden g√ºltig, ab dem Zeitpunkt, an dem du die E-Mail erhalten hast. Wenn du das Passwort 5 Mal falsch eingibst, wird der Link ung√ºltig und du musst eine neue Exportanfrage stellen.
Du kannst von dir bereitgestellte personenbezogene Daten bis zu 6 Monate nach Kontoschlie√üung herunterladen. F√ºlle einfach das Datenanforderungsformular(neuen Tab) aus und vergewissere dich, dass deine angegebenen Informationen mit deinen vorherigen Kontoinformationen exakt √ºbereinstimmen. Welche pers√∂nlichen Informationen du ben√∂tigst:
Vor- und Nachname, Lichtbildausweis (Identifikationsnummer und Ablaufdatum des Dokuments mit dem du dein Konto best√§tigt hast (Personalausweis oder Reisepass)
Die registrierte E-Mail-Adresse des Kontos
Datum (Monat und Jahr) an dem du dein Konto erstellt und abgeschlossen hast (sieh in deiner Best√§tigungsemail nach).
Aus Sicherheitsgr√ºnden sind wir verpflichtet sicherzustellen, dass die Daten heruntergeladen wurden: Wenn du ein Feld leer l√§sst oder falsch ausgef√ºllt hast, kann deine Anfrage nicht abgeschlossen werden.
Du wirst aufgefordert, ein tempor√§res Passwort f√ºr den Link zu erstellen, den wir an deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse senden. Dieser Link ist aber nur f√ºr 24 Stunden g√ºltig. Wenn du das Passwort 5 Mal falsch eingibst, wird der Link ung√ºltig und du musst eine neue Exportanfrage stellen.
F√ºr weitere Informationen √ºber die Erfassung, Verwendung oder Verarbeitung deiner pers√∂nlichen Daten, schau dir bitte unsere Datenschutzerkl√§rung (neuen Tab)an.

title: Combien de temps prend un virement bancaire avec TransferWise ?
content:
Une fois le virement en devises √©trang√®res effectu√©, une date d‚Äôestimation du d√©lai de r√©ception par son b√©n√©ficiaire est indiqu√©e.
Si un virement bancaire par TransferWise √©choue, vous recevrez imm√©diatement une notification sur votre t√©l√©phone pour vous pr√©venir. Le montant du virement sera recr√©dit√© sur votre compte N26 quelques jours plus tard.
Ni TransferWise, ni N26 ne facture de frais suppl√©mentaires pour un virement qui a √©chou√©. Cependant, certaines banques partenaires peuvent pr√©lever une commission. Dans ce cas, TransferWise d√©duira directement cette commission du montant qui sera recr√©dit√© sur votre compte, comme indiqu√© dans nos¬†Conditions G√©n√©rales(nouvel onglet).
Les raisons possibles de l‚Äô√©chec d‚Äôun virement via TransferWise :
Les coordonn√©es bancaires ne sont pas correctes (comme le nom ou le RIB du destinataire).
Vous avez entr√© des caract√®res sp√©ciaux dans le nom du destinataire ou le texte de description.
Les plafonds de votre carte ont √©t√© atteints ou les paiements en ligne ne sont pas activ√©s dans les param√®tres de votre carte.
Les virements en devises √©trang√®res ne sont pas possibles depuis un compte N26 Business ou N26 Business You ou vers le compte d‚Äôune entreprise.

title: Come invitare i miei amici a N26?
content:
Puoi iniziare a invitare amici nell'app mobile o su¬†N26 Web(nuova tabella), non appena avrai accesso al tuo account.
Effettua l'accesso alla app N26 e vai in üë§Il mio Conto oppure in Esplora, seleziona Invita amici.
Tocca il tuo Codice di riferimento per copiarlo e poi Invita un amico.
Seleziona una delle opzioni disponibili per la condivisione.
Scrivi un messaggio al tuo amico o usa il messaggio predefinito, quindi seleziona Invia.
Scopri come puoi essere ricompensato per i tuoi referral con il nostro¬†Programma Invita un amico(disponibile in alcuni paesi).

title: How to keep track of my daily spending?
content:
We automatically sort¬†your transactions¬†and display our findings in¬†Statistics¬†(top-right corner of the mobile app) by sorting your:
Categories: We collect information on retailers and payment reasons in order to improve our categorization (such as ATM, Food & Groceries, or Shopping). For example, if you send a MoneyBeam with the reference text Lunch, we‚Äôll put it in the Bars & Restaurants category. If you feel like a category doesn‚Äôt fit, you can just change it by selecting the transaction and choosing a category from the drop-down list.

Hashtags: We‚Äôve also added default hashtags for transaction times (#weekend), types of transactions (#books), or locations of purchases (#berlin). You can further sort your transactions by adding your own hashtags: tap on a transaction and then the pencil icon to add tags (such as #portugal_trip or #everymonth) or remove unwanted tags.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: Come effettuare bonifici in valute estere?
content:
Collaboriamo con TransferWise per rendere pi√π facili i trasferimenti in valuta estera. TransferWise offre tassi di cambio in tempo reale e nessuna commissione nascosta.
Per effettuare un trasferimento in valuta estera:
Effettua il login nella versione mobile dell'app N26.
Dalla schermata principale seleziona Gestisci, Dal mio conto e poi Bonifico bancario. 
Aggiungi il destinatario e scegli la valuta tramite la bandiera con il simbolo dell'Euro, nell'angolo in alto a destra dello schermo. 
Inserisci l'importo che desideri inviare e i dettagli bancari del beneficiario.
Completa il trasferimento con il tuo PIN di conferma.
Se al momento non offriamo la¬†valuta estera(nuova tabella)¬†di cui hai bisogno, visita¬†TransferWise(nuova tabella)¬†per ulteriori opzioni di valuta. Puoi effettuare il login utilizzando i dati di accesso del tuo conto N26 e selezionando 'Hai dimenticato la password?'. Riceverai una email da TransferWise per reimpostare la tua password. Una volta completato questo passaggio, potrai utilizzare questo account per effettuare il trasferimento.
Ti preghiamo di notare che i trasferimenti in valuta estera non sono possibili con il conto N26 Business o N26 Business You, n√© lo sono i trasferimenti verso conti aziendali.
TransferWise applica commissioni che verranno indicate prima di confermare il bonifico. 
Vuoi parlare di noi ai tuoi amici e guadagnarci? Ottieni ‚Ç¨15 per ogni amico che inviti con successo ad iscriversi ad N26. Scopri di pi√π sul nostro¬†programma Invita un amico.

title: Warum sind einige Produkte und Dienstleistungen f√ºr mich nicht verf√ºgbar?
content:
Wir arbeiten mit vielen Partnern zusammen. Bestimmte Produkte und Dienstleistungen setzen voraus, dass du auch deren Anforderungen erf√ºllst. Die h√§ufigsten Gr√ºnde, warum du f√ºr bestimmte Produkte nicht in Frage kommst:
Abgelaufene oder nicht unterst√ºtzte Ausweispapiere (z. B. bestimmte P√§sse, denen Sicherheitsmerkmale fehlen).
Du bist in den Vereinigten Staaten¬†steuerpflichtig. In diesem Fall kannst du bestimmte Anlage- oder Sparprodukte nicht nutzen. Wenn dies nicht der Fall ist, kontaktiere unseren Kundenservice per Chat, damit wir deine Kontodaten einsehen k√∂nnen. M√∂glicherweise musst du deine Telefonnummer wechseln, wenn sie mit einer nordamerikanischen Vorwahl beginnt (+1).
Du hast deine¬†Identit√§t¬†(in Deutschland) mit PostIdent nachgewiesen. Wir m√ºssen dein Konto zur√ºcksetzen und du musst deine Verifizierung wiederholen, um bestimmte Produkte und Dienstleistungen nutzen zu k√∂nnen. Ist das der Fall, senden wir dir eine E-Mail um einen passenden Zeitpunkt zu vereinbaren.

title: How to block my N26 card?
content:
You can block and unblock your cards at any time in the app. Go to¬†üë§ My Account¬†and select¬†Card settings. There you can decide if you want to temporarily limit or disable your ATM withdrawals, online payments or payments abroad, or block your card entirely.
This way, you have full control of your card and can protect yourself against¬†unauthorized transactions. You should immediately block your card if anything looks suspicious. You can always unblock it later.

If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126.

title: Wo kann ich meine Maestro Card einsetzen?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è gilt f√ºr Deutschland, √ñsterreich und die Niederlande
Deine Maestro kann nicht f√ºr Online-Eink√§ufe verwendet werden und ist nicht in das deutsche Electronic Cash- (EC-) oder Girocard-System eingebunden.
Aber du kannst deine Karte an Geldautomaten oder Gesch√§ften verwenden, die das Maestro-Symbol tragen. Jede¬†Abhebung am Geldautomaten¬†mit der Maestrocard kostet 2 ‚Ç¨ (bei Fremdw√§hrungen zuz√ºglich einer Geb√ºhr von 1,7% auf den abgehobenen Betrag).
Du kannst¬†deine Maestro Card¬†direkt in der App bestellen, wenn du in Deutschland, √ñsterreich oder den Niederlanden lebst und eine √úberweisung in der H√∂he von mindestens 100 ‚Ç¨ aus einem dieser drei L√§nder erhalten hast.
Wenn du Probleme mit deiner Maestrocard hast, pr√ºfe zuerst, ob deine¬†Karteneinstellungen¬†aktiviert sind. Wenn nichts blockiert ist, kontaktiere den Kundendienst per Chat und wir werden uns darum k√ºmmern.
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Bekomme 15‚Ç¨ f√ºr jeden Freund, dem du N26 erfolgreich empfiehlst. Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm(neuen Tab).

title: How to change my confirmation PIN?
content:
You can change your¬†Confirmation PIN¬†at any time in the app:
Go to üë§ My Account then: Settings and Security (mobile app) or Security Settings (WebApp(new tab))
Select Change Confirmation PIN
Enter the 10-digit token number on your Mastercard
Create and confirm your new Confirmation PIN
If you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times, you'll need to reset it before trying again.
For security reasons, your PIN can‚Äôt contain parts of your date of birth or your address, repeated numbers (such as 1111, 111, or 11), or sequences (such as 1234 or 4321). If the PIN you‚Äôve chosen is not accepted, please try again using a different one.
Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial(new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube(new tab) channel.

title: Where is my refund?
content:
Your refund will be visible in the app on the day of the original transaction, not the refund date. Scroll down your transaction list or download your previous balance statements to find it.
To view and download PDFs of your (preliminary and previous) monthly balance statements:
On the WebApp(new tab): From Transactions, click on the cloud icon in the upper-right corner to reach Downloads then select Bank statements.

On the mobile app: 
If you're using an iPhone, tap on the three dots to the right of your current balance from the main screen. A menu will pop up and will give you the option to access your balance statement.¬†
For Androids, you'll find the option under Statistics (just tap the 3 dots in the top right-hand corner).

title: How to cancel my N26 You or N26 Metal membership?
content:
N26 You(new tab) or¬†N26 Metal(new tab)¬†contracts have a term of one year. This contract automatically renews for another year unless you cancel it. 
In this article you will find the difference between revocation, cancellation of the membership and cancellation of the renewal of your membership. You have 3 options:
Revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period
Cancel your membership at any time up to 1 month before your contract ends
Stop your membership‚Äôs renewal up to 1 month before it expires
Find in details how to do so below. 
You can revoke your membership within the 14-day revocation period. Simply open a chat with us and we'll assist you from there.
Keep in mind that if you cancel your contract before it ends, you won‚Äôt be able to sign up for the same membership plan in the future.
If you want to terminate your membership at any time up to *1 month before your contract ends and after the 14-day revocation period, please contact us.
If you choose this option all your N26 You or N26 Metal benefits will end, which includes your insurance coverage.
You have up to 4 weeks before your membership expires to cancel the renewal of your N26 You or N26 Metal membership. To do so:
Log into the mobile app and go to üë§ My Account
Select N26 You/Metal
Tap Membership details followed by Cancel Membership
 you can also see your membership expiration date here
Confirm the cancellation via the push message we send you
You can continue to use your N26 You or N26 Metal Mastercard fully until your membership expires. That means you‚Äôll keep your insurance coverage as long as you‚Äôre still required to pay your membership fee. After that, your Mastercard will work like a standard card without the benefits. We‚Äôll send you a standard card before your contract ends. No need to contact us about it.
We‚Äôll notify you of the renewal via email 8 weeks before your anniversary date.
If you want to definitely close your account, visit our article How to close my N26 account.

title: Alimenter mon compte par carte, Apple Pay et Google Pay
content:
Vous pouvez d√®s √† pr√©sent alimenter votre compte en utilisant une carte de d√©bit ou de cr√©dit mais aussi Apple ou Google Pay. C‚Äôest la mani√®re la plus rapide et simple d‚Äôalimenter votre compte N26.

Alimenter votre compte avec une carte de d√©bit ou de cr√©dit
Depuis votre application N26, rendez-vous dans la section ‚ÄúG√©rer‚Äù¬†
Cliquez simplement sur ‚ÄúRecevoir‚Äù et s√©lectionnez ‚ÄúCarte de d√©bit‚Äù
Choisissez un montant, entrez le nom qui figure sur la carte, le num√©ro de carte, la date d‚Äôexpiration et le cryptogramme visuel (nous ne conservons jamais ces donn√©es de carte)
Suivez les √©tapes afin de confirmer le paiement
L‚Äôargent est disponible de fa√ßon instantan√©e sur votre compte

Alimenter votre compte avec Apple ou Google Pay

Depuis votre application N26, rendez-vous dans la section ‚ÄúG√©rer‚Äù¬†
Cliquez simplement sur ‚ÄúRecevoir‚Äù et s√©lectionnez ‚ÄúApple Pay‚Äù ou ‚ÄúGoogle Pay‚Äù
Choisissez un montant
Suivez les √©tapes afin de confirmer le paiement
L‚Äôargent est disponible de fa√ßon instantan√©e sur votre compte

Cartes accept√©es : 
les cartes Visa et Mastercard qui poss√®dent un num√©ro de carte √† 16 chiffres. 
Ne sont pas accept√©es les cartes pr√©pay√©es (ex : marque A, marque B‚Ä¶.). 
Pour en savoir plus sur les diff√©rences entre cartes de d√©bit, cr√©dit et pr√©pay√©es, vous pouvez lire cet article(nouvel onglet) (Anglais).
Co√ªt :
Bien que ce soit le moyen le plus rapide et simple d‚Äôalimenter instantan√©ment votre compte N26, pour nous, le traitement de ces transactions est plus co√ªteux que les autres options de financement de compte que nous proposons en raison des co√ªts r√©els de l‚Äôoffre du service.
Pour les deux m√©thodes, le premier d√©p√¥t est toujours gratuit mais les suivants sont factur√©s √† hauteur de 3% du montant du d√©p√¥t. En chargeant une carte ou un portefeuille num√©rique, votre argent n‚Äôest pas envoy√© instantan√©ment √† N26 et les frais couvrent les co√ªts suppl√©mentaires associ√©s √† l‚Äôapprovisionnement de compte avant que l‚Äôargent ne soit re√ßu, afin qu‚Äôil soit instantan√©ment disponible pour votre utilisation.

title: How to log in with Two Factor Authentication?
content:
Two-Factor Authentication is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. You‚Äôre probably familiar with using only¬† your personal password to sign in to your account, but with Two-Factor Authentication you‚Äôll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.
Go here for more information on Two-Factor Authentication
When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you‚Äôll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or, if this isn't possible, you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number, confirming your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log in to your N26 account.
When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. This means the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.
First, you‚Äôll need to update your phone‚Äôs operating system and the N26 app to their latest versions. If you‚Äôre unable to login to your account, but still have access to your registered email address, try to reset your password. If you don‚Äôt have access to your registered email address, please contact us via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out.
Read more in our article on how to create a password.
If you‚Äôve lost access to your paired device, but you still have access to your registered phone number, you‚Äôll be able to log into your N26 account and request an authentication code. To do this:
Login to the Webapp
When prompted to confirm your login on your paired device, select Help
Choose Send SMS Code
Once you receive the SMS code, input it into the Webapp
As you've just confirmed the authentication code you‚Äôve successfully completed two-factor authentication, and can now pair your new device with your account.
If you don‚Äôt have access to your registered phone number ‚Äì either because you have a new phone number, or your phone was lost or stolen ‚Äì please contact our customer service via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out.
If you have an older smartphone that doesn‚Äôt support the latest app version, you won‚Äôt be able to access N26 via the mobile app anymore using that phone. 
However, you can still use our Webapp to view your account, to do this you'll need to confirm your login attempt via an SMS verification code which we‚Äôll send to your account's registered phone number.
You‚Äôll still be able to complete card transactions and cash withdrawals as normal using your Mastercard, but bear in mind that you won't be able to perform any bank transfers or payments until you can confirm the transfer within the N26 app.
Read more in our article on Strong Customer Authentification.

title: Wie √§ndere ich meine Kartenlimits?
content:
Du kannst deine Karten-PIN √§ndern, deine t√§glichen Abhebe- oder Zahlungslimits festlegen sowie die Auslands- und Onlinezahlungen oder Abhebungen am Geldautomaten aktivieren und deaktivieren. Gehe daf√ºr zu üë§ Mein Konto und Karteneinstellungen in der App oder WebApp(neuen Tab).
Jede √Ñnderung, die du vornimmst, wird sofort auf alle deine Karten angewendet.
Du kannst deine¬†Karte auch sperren¬†oder eine neue bestellen, falls sie verloren geht oder gestohlen wird.
Lieber Videos statt Text? Sieh dir das Tutorial(neuen Tab) auf unserem N26 Support YouTube(neuen Tab) Kanal an.

title: Come annullare l‚Äôiscrizione a N26 You o N26 Metal?
content:
I contratti¬†N26 You¬†(nuova tabella)o¬†N26 Metal(nuova tabella)¬†hanno una durata di un anno. Il contratto si rinnova in maniera automatica per un ulteriore anno, salvo disdetta. 
In questo articolo troverai informazioni su come:
revocare la tua iscrizione entro il periodo di revoca di 14 giorni. 
cancellare la tua iscrizione in qualsiasi momento entro 1 mese dal rinnovo del tuo contratto. 
annullare il rinnovo della tua iscrizione entro 1 mese dalla data di rinnovo.

Puoi revocare la tua iscrizione entro il periodo di revoca di 14 giorni dall'apertura del conto. Apri semplicemente una chat con noi e ti assisteremo con la procedura. 
Richiedendo la revoca, non sar√† possibile aprire un conto premium in futuro.
Se desideri cancellare la tua iscrizione dopo il periodo di revoca di 14 giorni ed entro 1 mese dalla scadenza del tuo contratto, puoi farlo mettendoti in contatto con noi. Scegliendo questa opzione non si avr√† pi√π accesso ai vantaggi N26 You o N26 Metal, come la copertura assicurativa.
Fino a 4 settimane prima della data di rinnovo, puoi richiedere l'annullamento del tuo contratto N26 You o N26 Metal. Per fare questo:
Effettua l'accesso alla app e vai a üë§ Il mio conto
Seleziona N26 You o N26 Metal
Seleziona Dettagli iscrizione (qui puoi anche vedere la data di scadenza della tua iscrizione)
Annulla l'iscrizione
Conferma l'annullamento tramite il messaggio push che ti invieremo
Con l'annullamento, potrai continuare ad utilizzare pienamente la tua Mastercard N26 You o N26 Metal fino alla scadenza della sottoscrizione, mantenendo la copertura assicurativa fino a quella data. Successivamente, passerai ad un conto standard gratuito che non prevede i benefici dei conti premium. Ti invieremo una carta standard prima della scadenza del contratto. Non √® necessario richiederla.
Ti avviseremo del rinnovo via email 8 settimane prima della data del rinnovo.

Se vuoi chiudere il tuo conto definitivamente, visita il nostro articolo su Come chiudere il conto?

title: How do I create or reset a password?
content:
If you forgot your password or want to change it follow these easy steps:
During login, select "Forgot?"in the N26 mobile application or Forgot your password(new tab)? on the N26 website.¬†
A link will be sent to your registered email address.
Check your email and click on the link to create a new password.
Log into the N26 mobile application or the N26 website by using your new password.
We do not have a specific set of requirements for passwords. However, for security purposes, we only accept passwords that are considered robust by our underlying algorithm.
If your password is not accepted, try to add special characters / numbers and vary between uppercase and lowercase letters.
If you enter your password incorrectly six times in a row, you will be temporarily blocked from logging into your account. If this happens, try logging in again after 30 minutes.
The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Perch√© il bancomat non ha erogato i contanti?
content:
Pu√≤ succedere: vai ad un ATM, l‚Äôimporto richiesto viene detratto dal tuo saldo, ma la macchina non eroga i contanti.
Per prima cosa controlla i¬†limiti della tua carta¬†accedendo al Mio Account e selezionando Impostazioni Carte. Assicurati che i prelievi ATM siano attivi.
Anche se non sappiamo dirti con certezza perch√© √® successo, possiamo sicuramente aiutarti a recuperare i tuoi soldi. L‚Äôimporto che √® stato detratto dal saldo √® solo un‚Äôautorizzazione (una prenotazione o un importo stornato). Dato che la transazione non √® andata a buon fine, l‚Äôimporto prenotato scadr√† entro poche ore o al massimo 12 giorni lavorativi e sar√† riaccreditato al tuo saldo.
Se l‚Äôimporto prenotato non scade dopo 12 giorni lavorativi, per favore completa il¬†modulo di contestazione. Faremo del nostro meglio per recuperare i tuoi soldi.
Nel frattempo ti consigliamo di provare un altro ATM di un altro operatore. Raramente accade due volte di seguito.

title: How to report an insurance claim?
content:
Your¬†N26 You(new tab)¬†and¬†N26 Metal(new tab)¬†membership includes a wide range of insurance benefits, covered by our partner Allianz Global Assistance Europe.*
To report a claim, log into your app, go to üë§ My Account and select N26 You/Metal, then select Make a claim.
There you'll find:
A guide to submit your claim (for example, flight or luggage delay, extended warranty, or travel cancellation)
Your account and contract information, including your N26 You or N26 Metal ID
The option to contact Allianz directly in the case of a medical emergency
For emergencies, please have the following information ready:
The full address and telephone number of your current location
Names of all official contacts (doctors, hospitals, and/or police)
An exact description of the situation
*Allianz Global Assistance Europe is a trading name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and a member of the Allianz Group.

title: ¬øC√≥mo cerrar mi cuenta?
content:

title: I represent a bank or an authority and need to contact N26
content:
If you represent the authorities or work for another bank, you can get in touch via the following channels:
Email:¬†officials@n26.com(new tab)
Fax: + 49 (0) 30 2201178 40 
Our opening hours are Monday to Friday from 09:00-18:00 (except bank and Berlin holidays). You can request a call-back via email or fax at any time. We try to call you back on the same day.

If you have a customer service related question and need to contact us, visit our article How to contact N26?(new tab) or open a chat at the bottom of this article.

title: What if my balance is negative?
content:
Your balance can be negative as long as you‚Äôre within your¬†Overdraft¬†limit. 
If you have a negative account balance, you'll be charged an overdraft interest rate of 8.9%.
Otherwise, you‚Äôll receive an email to notify you that the authorized limit of your account has been exceeded. This means you don‚Äôt have enough funds on your account to cover future charges.
Even if you haven‚Äôt used your account since you opened it, certain charges still apply (such as N26 You or N26 Metal monthly fees or express delivery costs) and have resulted in a negative balance.
So you‚Äôll need to¬†top up your account¬†via SEPA transfer (choose international transfer if you‚Äôre making the transfer outside of Germany) or¬†CASH26¬†(if you‚Äôre in Germany or Austria). Your account will remain active for the next 60 days without doing so. At that point:
You‚Äôll receive two additional reminders (each cost ‚Ç¨3).
If you have an Overdraft: it‚Äôll be cancelled after the second reminder and you‚Äôll have to repay that amount immediately (or you can set up a repayment plan).
If you have an N26 You, N26 Metal, or N26 Business You account: all benefits will be cancelled after 60 days and your account will turn into a standard one.
If you don‚Äôt respond after 60 days, we may close your account.

title: How to upgrade to Metal?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Available in Germany, Austria, France, Spain, Italy, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Iceland, Liechtenstein.
N26 Metal is available during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you already have a N26 bank account or a N26 You membership. 
To upgrade to N26 Metal from the mobile app, simply go to the Explore tab and select Get N26 Metal. and choose between a Charcoal Black, Quartz Rose, or Slate Grey card.
Check the conditions of the¬†delivery and accept the N26 Metal¬†T&Cs(new tab). Once you confirm your request by entering your¬†Confirmation PIN, your new card will be on the way.
Standard deliveries take up to 10 business days.
The membership fee of ‚Ç¨16,90 (¬£14.90 in UK) will be deducted directly from your account every month on the date of your upgrade.
The minimum contract period for the N26 Metal membership is one year. Your membership will automatically renew unless you cancel it up to four weeks before the contract ends.
All purchases and travel booked using your N26 You Mastercard will remain insured.
If you‚Äôre already a N26 You member, you don‚Äôt have to pay the fees for the N26 You membership on top.
You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 14‚Ç¨ through your N26 app. 
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: Shared Spaces - Trusted Beneficiary
content:
A trusted beneficiary of a Shared Space can:
Transfer money from their own Spaces (including other Shared Spaces of which they are a participant) to a Shared Space. 
Access and freely transfer the funds of a Shared Space at any time.
Leave a Shared Space at any time.
Transfers between a trusted beneficiary and a Shared Space do not need to be authenticated via Pin and Push notification. This means that beneficiaries can seamlessly drag-and-drop money via the N26 app and Web app similarity to how normal Space transactions work.

Why do I need to classify an owner or member as a trusted beneficiary?
European banking law regulates how bank transfers must be authorised.¬†
In this law strong customer authentication (SCA) is a requirement to make online payments more secure.¬†
One exception to this is the classification of a person in a Shared Space as a ‚Äútrusted beneficiary‚Äù so that transfers to this person do not require SCA.

title: Why is my transfer still pending in the N26 app?
content:
You‚Äôll need your Confirmation PIN to finalize all transfers whether¬†MoneyBeam, standing orders, or¬†CASH26. Your transfer will remain pending until you either¬†Confirm¬†or¬†Cancel¬†it via push message in the app.
Your Confirmation PIN differs from your¬†card PIN¬†but you can use the same number for both. You‚Äôll be asked to choose your Confirmation PIN after¬†connecting your smartphone¬†(whereas you select a card PIN after activating your card).
If you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, your PIN will be blocked for security reasons. You can restore your PIN by¬†changing it¬†in the app: go to¬†üë§ My Account¬†then tap¬†Settings¬†and¬†Security. Then tap¬†Change Confirmation PIN¬†(iPhone) or¬†Reset Confirmation PIN¬†(Android).

title: How to change my card limits?
content:
You can change your¬†card PIN, define your daily withdrawal or payment limits, and enable or disable your ATM withdrawals, online or payments abroad in¬†üë§ My Account¬†by selecting¬†Card Settings¬†in the mobile app or¬†WebApp(new tab).
Each change you make is applied instantly to all of your cards.
You can also¬†block your card¬†or order a new one, in case it‚Äôs lost or stolen.
Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial(new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube(new tab) channel.

title: Why can‚Äôt I see other N26 users on MoneyBeam?
content:
To carry out real-time transactions such as¬†MoneyBeams, N26 checks your smartphone‚Äôs contact list and finds other N26 users based on saved phone numbers or emails. You can also enter someone‚Äôs contact details manually to send them a MoneyBeam.
If you don‚Äôt see your friend‚Äôs name on MoneyBeam but you know they‚Äôre an N26 user, they most likely haven‚Äôt made themselves visible. Indeed you can manage your visibility as an N26 user.
Most MoneyBeam transfers that fail between N26 users happen because there are multiple phone numbers or emails listed in the contact entry of a phone's address book. To avoid this, make sure you have the email and phone number your friend uses in your phone book in order to send them MoneyBeams. If the contact details you have stored don‚Äôt match, you cannot send a MoneyBeam to your friend.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

In the mobile app: From the Home screen, tap on the three bullet points in the top-right corner of the screen and choose Balance statements.
