title: Comment effectuer un virement SEPA?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Vous pouvez effectuer des virements vers tous les pays faisant partie de la zone SEPA, si la banque r√©ceptrice accepte les virements en euros.
Vous pouvez effectuer un virement sortant depuis votre application mobile N26 ou depuis sa version web app.n26.com(nouvel onglet). Pour cela : 
Rendez-vous dans la rubrique G√©rer en bas √† droite de l‚Äô√©cran d‚Äôaccueil
Appuyez sur Envoyer, puis s√©lectionnez Virement bancaire
Choisissez Ajouter un destinataire et saisissez les coordonn√©es bancaires du b√©n√©ficiaire
Entrez le montant de votre virement 
V√©rifiez l‚Äô√©cran de confirmation (qui r√©sume votre virement) 
Depuis cet √©cran, vous pouvez √©galement planifier la date d‚Äôenvoi de votre virement 
Confirmez avec votre code de validation. 
Vous devez ensuite confirmer ou annuler votre virement par notification push depuis l‚Äôapplication mobile de votre smartphone synchronis√©. 
Nous ne pouvons pas bloquer un virement sortant ou modifier les coordonn√©es bancaires du destinataire apr√®s que le virement ait √©t√© valid√© depuis l‚Äôapplication mobile N26.
Si vous ne pouvez pas confirmer votre virement depuis votre application, veuillez v√©rifier les points suivants :
Assurez-vous d‚Äôavoir une connexion internet stable. 
Assurez-vous d‚Äôavoir activ√© les notifications depuis les param√®tres de votre smartphone. 
Assurez-vous d‚Äôutiliser un appareil synchronis√©.
Une fois votre virement effectu√©, vous pouvez t√©l√©charger une confirmation de virement au format PDF. Pour cela :
Rendez-vous sur votre liste de transactions (√©cran d‚Äôaccueil de votre application) 
Trouvez et s√©lectionnez le virement.
Faites d√©filer votre √©cran vers le bas et s√©lectionnez Confirmation de virement.

title: Pourquoi n‚Äôai-je pas re√ßu le code de synchronisation par SMS ?
content:
Si vous n‚Äôavez pas re√ßu par SMS le code n√©cessaire √† la¬†synchronisation de votre t√©l√©phone¬†avec votre compte, vous pouvez demander l‚Äôenvoi d‚Äôun nouveau code depuis votre application, et ce, jusqu‚Äô√† 5 fois. Veuillez patienter 30 secondes avant chaque nouvelle demande. 
Au del√† de ces 5 essais, pour des raisons de s√©curit√©, vous devrez attendre 24h avant de demander un nouveau code. Si vous vous retrouvez dans cette situation, nous vous invitons √† patienter 24 heures ou √† contacter notre service client par Livechat. 
Si vous poss√©dez un num√©ro de t√©l√©phone en dehors de l‚ÄôUnion europ√©enne, nous vous invitons √† nous contacter directement par Livechat.

title: How to top up by card, Apple Pay, and Google Pay
content:
You can now add money by using a debit or credit card as well as Apple or Google Pay. This is the fastest and easiest way to fund your N26 account.¬†


Adding money with a Debit or Credit card
Open your N26 app and navigate to the Actions tab
Just tap ‚ÄúAdd money‚Äù and select ‚ÄúCard transfer‚Äù
Choose an amount and enter your name on card, card number, expiration date and CVC (we never store your card information)
Follow the steps to confirm the payment
The money is available on your account instantly 

Adding money with a Apple or Google Pay
Open your N26 app and navigate to the Actions tab
Just tap ‚ÄúAdd money‚Äù and select ‚ÄúApple Pay‚Äù or ‚ÄúGoogle Pay‚Äù
Choose an amount¬†
Follow the steps to confirm the payment
The money is available on your account instantly

Accepted cards: 
Visa and Mastercard cards that have a 16-digit card number. 
Prepaid cards are not accepted (ex: Brand A, Brand B etc.). 
To find out more about the difference between debit, credit and prepaid cards read this article(new tab).¬†

Cost:
Whilst this is the fastest and easiest way to instantly add funds in your N26 account, for us, processing these instant top-up transactions is more expensive than other account funding methods(new tab) we offer.

For both methods, the first deposit is always free but extra deposits are charged a fee of 3% of the deposit amount. By charging a card or digital wallet, your money is not sent to N26 instantly, and the fee covers additional costs associated with funding accounts before the money is received so that it is instantly available for your use.

title: How to protect my account?
content:
The security of your account and your personal data is our top priority.
If you ever feel that your N26 login may be compromised or that someone is trying to initiate a chat on your behalf, it‚Äôs crucial to immediately change your N26 account password.
To do so, log into the app and go to My Account > Settings > Security. Please choose a secure password(new tab) and don‚Äôt reveal your login details to anyone.
As the account holder, you and only you should create and have access to your login details. For further advice on identity protection, we encourage you to visit our article How to protect my identity?
If you believe that your account has been compromised or tampered in any way then please get in touch with us immediately.

If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126.

title: Why is my transfer still pending in the N26 app?

You‚Äôll need your Confirmation PIN to finalize all transfers whether¬†MoneyBeam, standing orders, or¬†CASH26. Your transfer will remain pending until you either¬†Confirm¬†or¬†Cancel¬†it via push message in the app.
Your Confirmation PIN differs from your¬†card PIN¬†but you can use the same number for both. You‚Äôll be asked to choose your Confirmation PIN after¬†connecting your smartphone¬†(whereas you select a card PIN after activating your card).
If you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, your PIN will be blocked for security reasons. You can restore your PIN by¬†changing it¬†in the app: go to¬†üë§ My Account¬†then tap¬†Settings¬†and¬†Security. Then tap¬†Change Confirmation PIN¬†(iPhone) or¬†Reset Confirmation PIN¬†(Android).

title: How to add or remove Shared Space participants?
content:
For an owner to remove a participant from a Shared Space:
In the Space overview, tap the menu indicated by the 3 dots in the top right.
From the ‚ÄòParticipants‚Äô list, tap on the arrow to the right of the relevant participant‚Äôs name (iOS). Android users can just simply tap on the participant's name.
Tap ‚Äòrevoke power of attorney‚Äô.
¬†Confirm the notification on the next screen and tap ‚Äòrevoke power of attorney‚Äô.¬†

Accept an invitation and join a Shared Space:
In the Spaces overview, tap the Space with ‚ÄòPending‚Äô and the Shared Space icon. 
Read the Shared Space summary and continue to the Power of Attorney screen.
Once you‚Äôve read and understood the information on the Power of Attorney page (the legal screen), tick the box and tap the ‚ÄòAccept power of attorney‚Äô button.
Enter your Confirmation PIN.
Confirm the ‚ÄòAccept Power of Attorney‚Äô push notification on your paired mobile device
You‚Äôll need to have enough free Space(s) to accept an invitation to a Shared Space. If not, you can only proceed if you delete other Space(s) to free up ‚Ä¶ Space.
You must also not have any open Space with the same name or image as the Shared Space. You can only accept the invitation to join a Shared Space once you change the name/image of the other Space(s).

To leave a Shared Space:
In the Space overview, tap the menu indicated by the 3 dots in the top right.
Inside the settings tap on ‚ÄòExit Shared Space‚Äô.
Confirm the notification on the next screen and tap ‚ÄòLeave the Space‚Äô.
A Shared Space can be created and modified within the N26 app or Webapp

title: Comment recevoir les notifications N26 ?
content:

Si vous ne recevez pas ces notifications, veuillez v√©rifier dans un premier temps que vous avez bien activ√© les notifications sur votre t√©l√©phone, mais aussi les notifications provenant de l‚Äôapplication N26.

V√©rifiez que vous √™tes bien connect√© √† N26 depuis l‚Äôapplication.
Assurez vous √† nouveau que les notifications sont bien autoris√©es pour N26 dans les param√®tres de votre t√©l√©phone.
Supprimez l‚Äôapplication et red√©marrez votre t√©l√©phone. T√©l√©chargez et installez la derni√®re version de l‚Äôapplication depuis le Play Store de Google et connectez-vous √† nouveau.
Rendez vous dans Mon compte, puis Param√®tres, Param√®tres de l‚Äôapplication, Notifications, cochez toutes les cases sous l‚Äôic√¥ne du t√©l√©phone et choisissez 0 ‚Ç¨ pour les deux seuils.
Pour les t√©l√©phones Huawei et Xiaomi : allez dans Param√®tres, puis Param√®tres avanc√©s et Param√®tres batterie, et d√©finissez N26 comme une application prot√©g√©e.
Pour les t√©l√©phones OnePlus : s√©lectionnez optimisation de la batterie, puis l‚Äôapplication N26 et choisissez de ne pas l‚Äôoptimiser.
Pour les t√©l√©phones Oppo : d√©sactivez l‚Äôoptimisation de la batterie pour l‚Äôapplication N26

title: Wo bleibt meine R√ºckerstattung?

Deine R√ºckerstattung wird in der App am Tag der urspr√ºnglichen Transaktion angezeigt, nicht am Tag der R√ºckerstattung. Scrolle in deiner Umsatzliste nach unten oder lade deine Kontoausz√ºge herunter, um sie zu finden.

N26 Bank permet l‚Äôouverture de comptes N26 dans les pays suivants : Allemagne, Autriche, Belgique, Danemark, Espagne, Estonie, Finlande, France, Gr√®ce, Irlande, Islande Italie, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Norv√®ge, Pays-Bas, Pologne, Portugal, Slovaquie, Slov√©nie, Suisse, Su√®de, √âtats-Unis.

title: How to order my card with express delivery?
content:
Not available for Metal cards.
Express delivery is a good option if you need your card in a hurry or if postal deliveries have sometimes failed to reach you for whatever reason.
You‚Äôll be given the option to select express delivery when choosing a delivery method for your first card or if you¬†reorder a card. You‚Äôll then receive a tracking link by email. If you‚Äôre not home during the delivery and your mailbox can‚Äôt be accessed, the card will be left at a nearby access point (you can find it through the provided tracking link). The card only stays at the access point for a limited amount of time. After that, it‚Äôll be returned to us. We‚Äôll inform you by email if that happens.
If you order via express delivery, keep in mind that:
Your new Standard or N26 You Mastercard will be delivered within 2-3 working days. Express delivery is not available for Metal cards.
Deliveries take place between 08:00 and 12:00. 
Deliveries can be made by DHL express to all of our supported countries within Europe. It‚Äôs currently not possible to make deliveries to other countries.
It‚Äôs not possible to cancel or change an express delivery once it‚Äôs been selected as the delivery method.
To close an account, you must pay for the express delivery of your card.
If your card hasn‚Äôt arrived within 3-5 working days of placing your order, please check the tracking link for an update. You can also use the tracking link to inform DHL directly about the details of your delivery address or to redirect the shipment if you can‚Äôt be there at the time of delivery.
N26 Standard and N26 You cards have a fee of ‚Ç¨6 for standard shipping and ‚Ç¨25 for express shipping (which includes the ‚Ç¨6 card replacement fee).

title: How to block my N26 card?
content:
You can block and unblock your cards at any time in the app. Go to¬†üë§ My Account¬†and select¬†Card settings. There you can decide if you want to temporarily limit or disable your ATM withdrawals, online payments or payments abroad, or block your card entirely.
This way, you have full control of your card and can protect yourself against¬†unauthorized transactions. You should immediately block your card if anything looks suspicious. You can always unblock it later.

If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126.

title: How to create and manage standing orders?
content:
When setting up an outgoing transfer in either the N26 app or Web app you‚Äôll have the option to make it a standing order.
Once you complete the outgoing transfer you'll then be prompted to tick a box which will create a standing order. After you've inputted the amount of the transfer and its recipient, under the reference text field select "Want to save this as a standing order?". From here you'll be able to set the start/end dates of the standing order and choose its payment intervals.
To view your scheduled transfers and standing orders directly in the mobile app:
Go to your transaction list (the main screen).
Then tap on the 3 dots located in the upper¬†right corner for Android and on the top of the transaction list for iOS. 
A small window will pop, where you will be able to select "Standing Orders".
Here you can cancel and/or modify the details of your standing order. To cancel it just tap the standing order you wish to delete and tap the trash icon in the top right-hand corner.
‚ÑπÔ∏è ¬†Please note, if a standing order fails due to insufficient funds we won't attempt the transfer again - you'll need to manually send the transfer, however the next scheduled transfers will proceed as normal.

title: What to do if my N26 IBAN is not accepted?
content:
Your IBAN includes the DE country code, a two-digit check number, the eight-digit bank sort code, and your ten-digit account number. For example:¬†DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.
The participating countries of the SEPA area (Single Euro Payments Area) have agreed on the IBAN system in order to simplify national and international payments, and to reduce the risk of error in the communication and processing of transactions.
Merchants or employers who do not accept IBANs from other member states of the European Economic Area are violating European law as of 1 February 2016 (Article 9 of¬†Regulation No 260/2012(new tab)).
If you are ever affected by IBAN discrimination, please¬†contact your relevant national authority(new tab) directly and notify them. Provide your contact details, the name of the merchant or company that didn‚Äôt accept your IBAN, as well as a brief description of the incident (including a screenshot of the rejection or other documentation of your communication with them).

title: How to block my N26 card?
content:
You can block and unblock your cards at any time in the app. Go to¬†üë§ My Account¬†and select¬†Card settings. There you can decide if you want to temporarily limit or disable your ATM withdrawals, online payments or payments abroad, or block your card entirely.
This way, you have full control of your card and can protect yourself against¬†unauthorized transactions. You should immediately block your card if anything looks suspicious. You can always unblock it later.

If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126.

title: ¬øPor qu√© ha fallado mi transferencia SEPA?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†V√°lido en todas las regiones a excepci√≥n del Reino Unido
Aceptamos¬†transferencias¬†en euros ‚Ç¨ v√≠a SEPA. No soportamos las transferencias SWIFT, de modo que si tienes que hacer una transferencia en moneda extranjera puedes utilizar TransferWise (en la app o en su¬†p√°gina web(pesta√±a nueva)). 
Para recibir una transferencia, deber√°s proporcionar al remitente tu nombre completo (tal y como est√° escrito en el documento que proporcionaste para tu verificaci√≥n) y tu IBAN.
Puedes¬†encontrar tu IBAN¬†en los extractos de tu cuenta y en el apartado¬†Mi Cuenta¬†(en la aplicaci√≥n del m√≥vil o en la¬†Web App(pesta√±a nueva)).
Razones m√°s comunes por las que las transferencias fallan:
El nombre del destinatario en la transferencia no coincide con el nombre del propietario de la cuenta (debe tener el mismo nombre que aparece en el DNI).
El nombre del destinatario hace referencia al nombre de la empresa y no al nombre de la persona (en el caso de N26 Business).
El IBAN es incorrecto.
No recibes la notificaci√≥n push para confirmar tu transferencia.
Se ha detectado un uso inapropiado. N26 tiene la responsabilidad de hacer controles rutinarios en las transacciones (GwG ¬ß 10(pesta√±a nueva)). Por eso, es posible que te pidamos documentos para verificar el origen o la fuente de esta transacci√≥n. Como consecuencia, la transferencia puede retrasarse o incluso no llegar a realizarse.

title: Warum pr√ºft N26 Transaktionen?
content:
Wir haben die Aufgabe, Routinepr√ºfungen von Transaktionen durchzuf√ºhren, um die Sicherheit deines Kontos zu gew√§hrleisten (siehe¬†GwG ¬ß 10(neuen Tab)). Diese √úberpr√ºfungen betreffen einzelne Transaktionen und werden automatisch von unseren Systemen initiiert.
Aus diesem Grund kann es vorkommen, dass wir dich nach bestimmten Dokumenten fragen. Wenn Du eine solche Anfrage erh√§ltst, sende uns die angeforderten Unterlagen bitte via Nachrichten von N26. Es gibt keine Ausnahmen f√ºr solche √úberpr√ºfungen, und sie k√∂nnen auch nicht umgangen werden.¬†
Dabei handelt es sich um Standardprozesse wie sie bei Banken √ºblich sind, um die Sicherheit unserer Kundenkonten zu gew√§hrleisten.
Der genaue Pr√ºfvorgang und das Ergebnis werden vertraulich behandelt und nur intern verarbeitet. Hier findest du einige Tipps, um den Prozess zu beschleunigen:
Hier sind einige Tipps, um den Prozess zu beschleunigen:
In der E-Mail, die du von uns erh√§ltst, werden wir dir genau erkl√§ren, welches spezifische Dokument wir von dir ben√∂tigen. Du kannst uns eingescannte Dokumente, Bilder oder Screenshots zusenden (vorausgesetzt, der Originalinhalt des Dokuments ist deutlich lesbar). Bitte gib uns auch eine genaue Beschreibung √ºber den Inhalt des Dokuments.
Du kannst einen Beleg, eine Rechnung, einen Vertrag oder ein √§hnliches Dokument einreichen, das es uns erm√∂glicht, die jeweilige Transaktion und deren Herkunft und Zweck eindeutig zu identifizieren. .
Sei pr√§zise in deinen Antworten, Details und Dokumenten. Nachdem wir deine Unterlagen erhalten haben, lassen wir dich wissen, ob sie f√ºr die √úberpr√ºfung ausreichend sind. In einigen F√§llen kann es vorkommen, dass wir dich nach weiteren Details fragen werden, was zu Verz√∂gerungen f√ºhren kann.
Antworte so fr√ºh wie m√∂glich, also vor der genannten Frist, direkt auf die E-Mail, die du von uns erhalten hast und sende deine Unterlagen mit.¬†
Unserem Kundendienst liegen zu diesem Thema keine weiteren Informationen vor.
Du musst die je nach deiner Situation g√ºltigen Dokumente vorlegen. 

Einige Beispiele:
Du hast finanzielle Hilfe von deiner Familie erhalten, um Projekte abzuschlie√üen oder hast Grundst√ºcke oder Geld von Verwandten geerbt.Ein Gew√§hrungs-/Darlehensvertrag, ein offizielles Erbschaftsdokument oder ein offizielles Dokument √ºber die Herkunft des Darlehens (z.B. Verkaufsunterlagen einer ver√§u√üerten Immobilie zur Finanzierung des Darlehens oder Kontoausz√ºge von Verwandten, von denen das Geld stammt).
Du hast eine Immobilie ver√§u√üert oder deine Aktien an der B√∂rse verkauft.Den Vertrag √ºber die vereinbarten Gesch√§fte oder notarielle Beurkundung des Eigentums√ºbergangs.
Du hast Geld erhalten oder gesendet, um Rechnungen zu bezahlen oder ein Produkt zu kaufen.Kontoausz√ºge √ºber die Herkunft des Geldes oder Dokumente, die die Verwendung des Geldes und seinen Zweck belegen.
Du hast eine Abfindung von deinem vorherigen Arbeitgeber erhalten.Dokumente, die das Ende deines Arbeitsverh√§ltnisses belegen, mit einer Zahlungsbegr√ºndung und/oder einem Kontoauszug deines fr√ºheren Arbeitgebers.

title: Was passiert, wenn mein Kontostand negativ ist?
content:
Dein Kontostand darf negativ sein, solange du innerhalb deines¬†Dispolimits¬†bleibst.
Andernfalls bekommst du eine E-Mail, um dich dar√ºber zu informieren dass das verf√ºgbare Limit deines Kontos √ºberschritten wurde. Das bedeutet, dass du nicht √ºber gen√ºgend Guthaben f√ºr zuk√ºnftige Zahlungen verf√ºgst.
Auch wenn du dein Konto seit der Er√∂ffnung noch nicht verwendet hast, fallen bestimmte Geb√ºhren an (wie z. B. deine monatlichen N26 You oder N26 Metal Geb√ºhren oder Kosten f√ºr die Expresslieferung), die zu einem negativen Kontostand f√ºhren k√∂nnen.
Du musst also √ºber eine SEPA-√úberweisung (w√§hle internationale √úberweisung aus, wenn du au√üerhalb Deutschlands bist) oder¬†CASH26¬†(falls du in Deutschland oder √ñsterreich bist)¬†Geld auf dein Konto einzahlen. Dein Konto bleibt weitere 60 Tage aktiv, wenn du das nicht tust. In diesem Zeitraum:
Bekommst du zwei Erinnerungen (jede kostet 3 ‚Ç¨).
Falls du einen Dispokredit hast, wird dieser nach der zweiten Erinnerung gek√ºndigt und du musst den Betrag sofort zur√ºckzahlen (oder du kannst einen R√ºckzahlungsplan beantragen).
Wenn du ein N26 You, N26 Metal oder N26 Business You Konto hast, werden alle Leistungen nach 60 Tagen gek√ºndigt und dein Konto in ein Standardkonto umgewandelt.
Wenn du nach diesen 60 Tagen nicht handelst, k√∂nnen wir dein Konto schlie√üen.

title: How to change my confirmation PIN?
content:
You can change your¬†Confirmation PIN¬†at any time in the app:
Go to üë§ My Account then: Settings and Security (mobile app) or Security Settings (WebApp(new tab))
Select Change Confirmation PIN
Enter the 10-digit token number on your Mastercard
Create and confirm your new Confirmation PIN
If you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times, you'll need to reset it before trying again.
For security reasons, your PIN can‚Äôt contain parts of your date of birth or your address, repeated numbers (such as 1111, 111, or 11), or sequences (such as 1234 or 4321). If the PIN you‚Äôve chosen is not accepted, please try again using a different one.
Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial(new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube(new tab) channel.

title: Update on N26 Invest (General information)
content:
*Update effective 17.07.19
We‚Äôve decided to end our partnership with Moneyfarm (formerly Vaamo), the company that provides our N26 Invest product. From 17.09.2019, N26 Invest will no longer be available in the N26 app. We made this decision as we feel the product no longer serves the needs of the majority of our current customers.

We‚Äôve sent you ‚Äì N26 Invest customers ‚Äì an email update. This article contains detailed information on the three different options available to you:

Until 16.09.2019 you can liquidate and cash out your N26 Invest portfolio via the N26 app. Full instructions on this option can be found by clicking this link.

You can sign-up with Moneyfarm and reinvest your N26 Invest portfolio with Moneyfarm.
Note: In May April 2019 European digital wealth manager Moneyfarm (an online investment company) acquired Vaamo. Further information on Moneyfarm can be found here(new tab).
If you choose this option you‚Äôll have your N26 Invest plan closed, and the portfolio capital reinvested into a new Moneyfarm investment plan.
Step by step instructions can be found by clicking this link. 

FFB is the bank that holds your Invest depot. If by 17.09.19 you‚Äôve not chosen option 1 or 2 as described above, FFB will contact you by post providing you with a letter that will contain your login data that can be used to access your existing investment portfolio via the FFB website.
Note: If you have changed your address since you‚Äôve opened your invest account, please inform FFB so that they send the documents to the correct address.

Accessing your investment portfolio through FFB's website will be possible as soon as you receive your login data from FFB. Full information about this option can be found by clicking this link.
Whilst we‚Äôre ending our Partnership with Moneyfarm (formerly Vaamo) and ending our business relationship with you in regards to the N26 Invest product, this will have no bearing on any other aspect of your N26 account or any premium membership plans that you may have with us. 

Since launching N26 Invest in 2016, we‚Äôve gone on to develop more products & services that reflect our growing customer base and the increasingly global nature of our bank. We are committed to bringing you new products that will make your financial lives easier and tailored for your needs in the future.

The good news is you can continue your investment portfolio with FIL Fondsbank. The email you received from us summarises the information, and you can see further details in our Support Center. Alternatively if you take no action, FIL Fondsbank GmbH (FFB) will contact you by letter before 17.09.2019 providing you with login data to use so you can access your existing portfolio via the FFB website as soon as you receive your login data to the FFB website from FFB.

In April this year, European digital wealth manager Moneyfarm acquired Vaamo. Further information about Moneyfarm can be found on their website(new tab).

Section 11.3. of our Terms and Conditions for N26 Invest details the right of termination from our side. Sorry if this has come as disappointing news to you. Don‚Äôt forget you still have the option to reinvest your N26 Invest portfolio with Moneyfarm (formerly Vaamo) as explained in our email and dedicated article on the subject. You also have the option to continue your current N26 Invest plan via FIL Fondsbank GmbH.

Not at all. Closure of your N26 Invest portfolio will not affect your N26 account, premium membership or other products you may hold with us.

Any capital gains tax you would be required to pay will be withheld automatically by FFB¬† unless you have provided an exemption order for capital gains (Freistellungsauftrag). Any remaining cash would then be transferred to the reference account (your N26 bank account).¬†¬†¬†
In order to settle tax debts you must explicitly instruct FFB to sell units within the investment funds. If you close N26 Invest via the N26 app all investment funds will be sold automatically and any capital gains tax withheld by FFB.

After closing an N26 Invest portfolio, FIL Fondsbank GmbH (FFB) will send you tax reports by post if there was a tax exemption in place. In the event that you move after closure of your N26 Invest portfolio, please contact FFB to inform them of your new address.¬†

Contact details for FFB:

Monday to Friday from 8am to 6pm
Telephone: +49 (0) 69 770 60 - 200
Fax: +49 (0) 69 770 60 - 555

title: PSD2 - Open Banking for Third Party Providers
content:
We are partnering with Token.io(new tab) to provide and support a dedicated interface for third-party payment service providers (''TPPs''). The complete documentation and the on-boarding instructions can be found in the Token.io developer portal(new tab). 
As part of its legal obligations under PSD2, N26 has implemented a contingency mechanism, which provides the following: 
Reliable identification of a TPP via possession of a valid Qualified Website Authentication Certificate (QWAC);

Secure and authorised access to an account
TPPs may access our contingency mechanism via the following URLs:
https://aisp.tech26.de
https://pisp.tech26.de
Access to the above URL and establishing the TLS connection requires implementation of a qualified certificate.
Please find the detailed technical documentation for the fallback interface below:
AISP Fallback Documentation(new tab)
PISP Fallback Documentation(new tab)
TPPs may contact N26 via open.banking@n26.com to provide their QWAC certificates and get technical support.
The reports below compare the availability and performance of our PSD2 dedicated interface with the N26 user interface:
3rd quarter of 2019(new tab)
4th quarter of 2019(new tab)

title: How to get a loan?
content:
(Applies to Germany and France)
With N26 Credit, we‚Äôve partnered with auxmoney (in Germany) and Younited Credit (in France) to offer personal loans between ‚Ç¨1.000 to ‚Ç¨50.000 with repayment terms of 6 to 84 months.
Request a loan at any time directly in the app into the Explore section then N26 Financial Products: We‚Äôll ask you a few questions about the loan and your creditworthiness (you‚Äôll need to provide additional online banking information for your main account if you‚Äôve used N26 for less than 6 months).
Prove your identity: We‚Äôll need to see your ID card or passport in Germany and possibly your proof of residence (in the form of a utility bill or similar). And if you‚Äôre a non-EU citizen, you‚Äôll need to send us a photo of your residency permit.
Edit your answers during the application process: Once you‚Äôre happy with your loan application, send it to us in real-time and we‚Äôll make you a binding offer that you can delete or accept. Otherwise applications expire in 90 days and you won‚Äôt be able to request another loan during that time.
Confirm your loan: If you accept our offer, you‚Äôll either have to sign the contract electronically through a video call or confirm via SMS message.
Receive a push message as soon as the payment has been made: In Germany, the loan amount will be credited to your N26 account within 5-7 working days. In France, payouts take a week.
We offer interest rates between 1.99% and 19% p.a. Apart from the interest, there are no other charges. However, if you¬†change your plan¬†or are in default of your monthly payments, additional fees may apply.
For more information, see the N26 Credit¬†T&Cs(new tab).

title: Why isn't my video verification working?
content:
Tips for a successful video¬†verification:
Most video calls fail due to poor internet connection or bad picture quality (for example, too blurry or due to low lighting). Please complete the call in a bright environment, use a phone with a good camera, and make sure you have a fast internet connection.
Please make sure that you are the only person in the video.
You need to live in one of our¬†supported countries¬†to open an account with us.
We can only accept national IDs and passports (driver‚Äôs licenses or residence permits can‚Äôt be used). Also, the document shouldn‚Äôt be damaged.
As soon as your verification is complete, we‚Äôll send you your N26 Mastercard.¬†Deliveries¬†take up to 10 days.

Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

title: How to do contactless payments work?
content:
It‚Äôs not possible to deactivate contactless payments. If you‚Äôre experiencing issues with your contactless payments, keep in mind that:¬†¬†
To activate contactless payments, you must first use your card at an ATM or payment terminal.¬†

Transactions up to ‚Ç¨50 don‚Äôt require a card PIN*. For amounts over ‚Ç¨50, you‚Äôll need to enter your card PIN.¬†
*If the merchant's payment system supports this option.
Make sure your card is held directly onto an NFC-compatible payment terminal. If you remove your card too fast or didn‚Äôt hold it close enough, just try again.¬†

N26 Metal cards only have NFC on the backside of the card. Make sure to hold the backside of the card against the terminal to use NFC (using the front won‚Äôt work).

title: How to keep track of my daily spending?
content:
We automatically sort¬†your transactions¬†and display our findings in¬†Statistics¬†(top-right corner of the mobile app) by sorting your:
Categories: We collect information on retailers and payment reasons in order to improve our categorization (such as ATM, Food & Groceries, or Shopping). For example, if you send a MoneyBeam with the reference text Lunch, we‚Äôll put it in the Bars & Restaurants category. If you feel like a category doesn‚Äôt fit, you can just change it by selecting the transaction and choosing a category from the drop-down list.

Hashtags: We‚Äôve also added default hashtags for transaction times (#weekend), types of transactions (#books), or locations of purchases (#berlin). You can further sort your transactions by adding your own hashtags: tap on a transaction and then the pencil icon to add tags (such as #portugal_trip or #everymonth) or remove unwanted tags.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: How does Spaces work?
content:
Set goals, create and personalize Spaces, and transfer money between them instantly. Spaces is available in the mobile and¬†WebApp(new tab).
In addition to your main account (or primary space), you can create and delete additional Spaces as often as you‚Äôd like but the number of active Spaces at any one time depends on your account type: 2 additional Spaces with an N26 or N26 Business account or up to 10 additional Spaces with N26 You, N26 Business You and N26 Metal.
Your primary account statements will include all transactions sent to a space or received from one. You can download balance statements from the confirmation page.
Only your primary space can be negative (if you are eligible for an overdraft). All other balances in Spaces cannot be negative, meaning you can only transfer what is available in a particular space.
You can only use the balance from your primary space toward your Mastercard transactions. So consider transferring money before making a purchase if needed.
Move money from one space to another by holding down on your Main Account and dragging and dropping into your space. Once the amount is confirmed the balance is updated right away.
You can lock and unlock a space at anytime from your mobile and web app. You'll only need to confirm with your confirmation PIN. If a space is locked, you‚Äôll still be able to transfer money to it. If you need to withdraw money from a locked space, you need first to unlock it.
You'll be able to hide the amount within the Space from your account's total balance. Just go into your Space, tap the three dots in the top right corner and select ‚ÄòHide space balance‚Äô.
Spaces includes a feature called Rules which will help you manage your time and your finances effectively.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: Why did my SEPA transfer fail?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Applies to all regions except the UK
We accept¬†transfers¬†in EUR done via SEPA. We don't support SWIFT so if you need to make a¬†foreign currency transfer, please use TransferWise (in the app or from their¬†website(new tab)).
To get a transfer, you'll only need to provide the sender with your full name (as it's written on the ID you provided for verification) and your IBAN.
You can¬†find your IBAN¬†on your balance statements and in¬†üë§ My Account¬†(in the mobile app or¬†WebApp(new tab)).
Common reasons for failed transfers:
The recipient's name on the transfer order is different from the name on their account (must be their name as written on their ID).
The recipient's name is a company name instead of a personal/account name (applies to N26 Business).
The IBAN is incorrect.
You're not receiving the push message to confirm your transfer.
An inappropriate use was found. N26 has the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see¬†GwG ¬ß 10(new tab)). As a result, we may ask for documentation to verify the origin or source of these transactions. This can result in the credit being delayed or not taking place.

title: Will my direct debit go through if I'm low on funds?
content:
If your balance can‚Äôt cover a direct debit* when it‚Äôs due, it‚Äôll bounce and you‚Äôll be charged a¬†‚Ç¨3 fee. And if you have a negative account balance, you'll be charged an overdraft interest of 8.9%. It‚Äôs not possible to delay a direct debit.
To avoid this fee in the future, you can instantly check whether you‚Äôre eligible for an¬†Overdraft¬†directly in the app (available in Germany and Austria).
*For Poland, Sweden, Denmark, and Norway only: if you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and ultimate amount that is collected from us.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: Espacios Compartidos - ¬øQu√© es un poder notarial?
content:
El modelo legal que cumplen los Espacios Compartidos se llama Poder notarial (Kontovollmacht in German).¬†
Un espacio compartido no es lo mismo que una cuenta compartida en el sentido tradicional, donde cada persona es propietaria parcialmente del dinero de la cuenta. En el caso del espacio compartido, cuando los participantes reciben el poder notarial, obtienen el derecho de actuar en nombre del administrador, como por ejemplo para recibir y realizar transferencias.¬†
La persona que autoriza a las dem√°s a actuar en su nombre es el administrador y es el √∫nico propietario de la cuenta. El administrador tiene que ser un usuario con cuenta de N26 premium (N26 You, N26 Metal o N26 Business You).
Esto significa, que el creador del espacio compartido es su due√±o legal.¬†
El due√±o del espacio compartido:¬†
- Tiene posesi√≥n de todos los fondos dentro del espacio.¬†
- Puede transferir fondos a la cuenta o desde la cuenta siempre que los necesite.¬†
- Puede invitar a otros usuarios a su espacio compartido d√°ndoles poder notarial.
- Puede revocar el poder notarial del resto de los participantes siempre que quiera.
- Puede cerrar el espacio compartido (todos los fondos se transferir√°n a la cuenta principal del administrador).
Cuando se le concede poder notarial a una persona, esta tendr√° acceso a todo el dinero del espacio compartido. Esto significa que cada participante enviar y recibir dinero en ese espacio compartido.¬†
N26 Bank GmbH no se hace responsable de los pagos cubiertos por el poder notarial.

¬øQu√© son los Espacios Compartidos?
¬øC√≥mo crear un Espacios Compartido?

title: I tried but was not able to sign up for an N26 account.
content:
Uh Oh! There may be various reasons why you were not able to sign up for an account.
If you think you submitted incorrect information during the sign-up process, please reach out to our customer support team.¬†¬†
Otherwise, once we have more info, our customer support team will reach out to you with additional information via the email address you provided during the sign-up process.
The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: What to do if my N26 IBAN is not accepted?
content:
Your IBAN includes the DE country code, a two-digit check number, the eight-digit bank sort code, and your ten-digit account number. For example:¬†DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.
The participating countries of the SEPA area (Single Euro Payments Area) have agreed on the IBAN system in order to simplify national and international payments, and to reduce the risk of error in the communication and processing of transactions.
Merchants or employers who do not accept IBANs from other member states of the European Economic Area are violating European law as of 1 February 2016 (Article 9 of¬†Regulation No 260/2012(new tab)).
If you are ever affected by IBAN discrimination, please¬†contact your relevant national authority(new tab) directly and notify them. Provide your contact details, the name of the merchant or company that didn‚Äôt accept your IBAN, as well as a brief description of the incident (including a screenshot of the rejection or other documentation of your communication with them).

title: Why was I charged a direct debit fee?
content:
Direct debits returned to your account due to¬†insufficient funds* are charged a ‚Ç¨3 fee in accordance with our¬†Terms & Conditions(new tab). If your balance becomes negative due to this fee,¬†overdraft¬†interest will also apply at a rate of 8.9%.
You can avoid these fees by making sure you have enough funds in your account to cover incoming direct debits by 18:00 on the same business day.
Since¬†SEPA transfers¬†could take more than one day to complete, we suggest you use¬†MoneyBeam (between N26 accounts) or¬†CASH26¬†(if you live in Germany, Austria or Italy) to transfer the amount due. With both methods, the amount will be credited to your account instantly.
And if you don‚Äôt recognize a direct debit, you can¬†reverse it¬†in the app.
*For Poland, Sweden, Denmark, and Norway: if you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and ultimate amount that is collected from us.

title: Wie kann ich meine Adresse, Telefonnummer oder andere pers√∂nliche Daten √§ndern?
content:
Es ist wichtig, dass deine pers√∂nlichen Daten auf dem neuesten Stand sind. Du brauchst z.B. deine Telefonnummer um dein Smartphone zu verkn√ºpfen oder um einen MoneyBeam zu versenden und empfangen. So √§nderst du deine Daten:

Name¬†und¬†Geschlecht: Chatte mit uns und schicke uns zwei Dokumente: eine Kopie deines neuen Personalausweises oder Reisepasses sowie ein offizielles Dokument der √Ñnderung (z. B. eine Heirats- oder aktualisierte Geburtsurkunde).

title: Come ricevere la mia carta pi√π velocemente con la consegna express?
content:
Non disponibile per carte Metal.
La consegna express √® un'ottima soluzione se hai bisogno di ricevere la tua carta in tempi brevi o se per qualche motivo la prima consegna non √® andata a buon fine.
Ti verr√† data la possibilit√† di selezionare la consegna express quando scegli un metodo di consegna per la tua prima carta o se riordini una carta. Riceverai, quindi, un link di tracciamento via email. Se non sei a casa al momento della consegna e la cassetta della posta non √® accessibile, la carta verr√† lasciata presso un punto di ritiro nelle vicinanze (puoi trovarlo tramite il link di tracciabilit√†). La carta sar√† custodita nel punto di ritiro per un periodo di tempo limitato, dopodich√© verr√† restituita a N26. In tal caso, ti contatteremo via e-mail.
Se selezioni la spedizione Express, ricorda che:
La tua nuova Mastercard N26 ti arriver√† entro 2 - 3 giorni lavorativi. 
L'opzione non √® disponibile per la carta Metal.
Le consegne possono avvenire tramite DHL Express in tutti i paesi supportati in Europa. Al momento non si effettuano consegne in altri Paesi.
Non √® possibile annullare o modificare una consegna express dopo che √® stata selezionata come metodo di consegna.
Per chiudere un conto, si dovr√† pagare la consegna express della carta.
Se la carta non √® arrivata entro 3-5 giorni lavorativi dall'ordine, controlla il link di tracciabilit√† per aggiornamenti. Puoi utilizzare il link anche per informare direttamente DHL sui dettagli dell‚Äôindirizzo di consegna o per reindirizzare la spedizione se non puoi essere presente al momento della consegna.
Le carte standard e N26 You hanno un costo di ‚Ç¨6 per spedizione ordinaria e di ‚Ç¨25 per spedizione express.¬†Per le carte N26 Metal, il costo √® di ‚Ç¨45 per spedizione standard.

title: Why does N26 do checks on transactions?
content:
We have the responsibility to run routine checks on accounts and transactions in order to ensure your account‚Äôs security (see GwG ¬ß 10(new tab)). These checks are automatically initiated by our systems.¬†
As a result, we may ask you to provide some documents. If you receive such a request, please send the requested documents via Messages from N26. There are no exceptions or evasion for such checks.¬†
This practice is a standard banking procedure and ensures the safety of our customers. Both the process and the result are confidential and handled internally. Here are some tips to speed up the process:
The document that we need you to provide will be exactly named in the message you‚Äôll receive from N26. You can send us scanned documents, pictures, or screenshots, as long as the original content of the document is easily readable. Please make sure to also provide a detailed description.¬†
Be precise in your answers, details, and documents. After we receive your required proof and description, we will let you know if your reply fulfills our check. In a few cases, we might ask for further clarification which could prolong the process.
Reply as soon as possible, always before the deadline stated in the message you received from N26. Use that email to reply and send attachments.¬†
Our Customer Support doesn‚Äôt have any additional information on this subject.
You must provide valid documentation depending on your situation.

 Find here some examples:
You've received financial help from your family to complete projects or have inherited land or money from deceased relatives.
A granting/loan contract, an official document of inheritance, or an official document of the source of the loan (such as the sales documents of a sold property to finance the loan or bank statements of granting relatives).
You've sold a property or your shares on the stock market.
The contract showing the agreed transactions or the official notarial documentation of the transfer of property.
You've received or sent money to pay bills or buy a product.
Documents showing the balance statements confirming the source of this money or documents showing the use of the money and its purpose.
You've received a final payout from your previous employer.
Documents proving the end of your employment, detailing the payment and/or a bank statement from your previous employer.

title: Can N26 close my account?
content:
In short: yes.
We can close your account in 3 ways (with 2 months notice, 14 days notice, or immediately). These cancellations are final: our Customer Support can‚Äôt provide any information about the background of individual cancellations nor can they reverse the decision. You‚Äôre also able to terminate your business relationship with us at any time, immediately, and without a reason. Any outstanding contract fees must be paid before the termination date.
2 months notice:
We have the right to terminate any business relationship with 2 months notice without a cause (see section 19 (1) of our¬†T&Cs(new tab)¬†or ¬ß 675h of the German Civil Code).
14 days notice:
We can also terminate any business relationship with 14 days notice (see section 19 (3) of our¬†T&Cs(new tab)) if reasonable cause is given due to the breach of contractual duties. These include:
Using a personal account for business purposes.¬†According to our T&Cs, a private account may only be used for personal use. Any credit transfers that relate to professional fees for provided services and/or sold products are considered business transactions. If you‚Äôd like to use your account for this purpose, please sign up for an N26 Business or N26 Business You account.
Providing incorrect or insufficient information for a routine background check. We‚Äôre a bank so we sometimes run checks on transactions. If you don‚Äôt provide correct and/or sufficient information about the transaction in question, we have the right to terminate the business relationship in order to be compliant with German financial regulations.
Displaying abusive behaviour towards N26 employees. We don‚Äôt tolerate abusive behaviour towards our employees. The threat of physical harm or general abusive behaviour may be considered a criminal offense according to German law and will be reported to the respective authority without exception.
Immediate cancellation
We may also terminate any business relationship on an extraordinary basis (see section 19 (3) of our¬†T&Cs(new tab)). That means: at any time, without prior notice, and without a cancellation period when there is reasonable cause for such termination. These include:
Providing incorrect statements to N26 about your financial situation, especially when you apply for a credit.
Failure to repay your loan or any debt toward N26.
Failure to comply with N26's requests about your loan (see provision or increase of security, section 13 (2) of our T&C's(new tab)).

title: How to export a list of my transactions?
content:
Our¬†web app(new tab)¬†allows you to search within your transactions. You can also download a history of your transactions in CSV format. To export your transaction list:
From Transactions, click on the cloud icon in the upper-right corner to reach Downloads

Under CSV you can select the Start Date and End Date and Download CSV
You can also sort your transactions using¬†categories and hashtags¬†in the app.
To view and download PDFs of your (preliminary and previous) monthly balance statements:
In the web app(new tab): From Transactions, click on the cloud icon in the upper-right corner to reach Downloads then select Bank statements.

In the mobile app: From the Home screen, tap on the three bullet points in the top-right corner of the screen and choose Balance statements.

title: Qui peut b√©n√©ficier des services bancaires de base ?
content:
Vous pouvez ouvrir¬†un compte N26¬†gratuitement depuis notre site web ou depuis notre¬†application mobile.
La loi allemande de mobilit√© bancaire (en allemand, la Zahlungskontengesetz ou ZKG) permet √† tout consommateur en s√©jour l√©gal dans l'Union europ√©enne de demander un compte courant assorti des prestations de base pour effectuer ses op√©rations financi√®res quotidiennes. Toutes les personnes vivant dans un pays o√π N26 est disponible peuvent demander √† b√©n√©ficier des services bancaires de base.
Contrairement au compte Standard N26 gratuit, les frais mensuels de gestion de ce compte courant  vous permettant d‚Äôacc√©der aux services bancaires de base s'√©l√®vent √† 6,00 ‚Ç¨. Vous trouverez le d√©tails des autres frais applicables dans notre¬†liste de prix.
Pour¬†avoir acc√®s¬†aux¬†services bancaires de base, vous ne devez √™tre en possession d‚Äôaucun autre compte bancaire, ni chez N26, ni aupr√®s d‚Äôune autre institution financi√®re en Allemagne. N26 est en mesure de¬†refuser votre demande¬†sous certaines conditions.
Notez que certaines prestations comme le¬†d√©couvert, le¬†Cr√©dit N26¬†ou les comptes standards,¬†N26 You¬†et¬†N26 Metal¬†ne sont pas accessibles pour les d√©tenteurs d‚Äôun compte courant qui donne acc√®s aux services bancaires de base.

title: Wie behalte ich meine t√§glichen Ausgaben im Blick?
content:
Wir sortieren deine¬†Transaktionen¬†automatisch und zeigen unsere Ergebnisse in der Statistik an (obere rechte Ecke der mobilen App), anhand folgender Kriterien:
Kategorien. Wir sammeln Informationen √ºber Einzelh√§ndler und Zahlungsgr√ºnde, um unsere Kategorisierung zu verbessern (z. B. Geldautomaten, Lebensmittel oder Bekleidung). Wenn du zum Beispiel einen Moneybeam mit dem Verwendungszweck Mittagessen versendest, werden wir ihn in die Kategorie Kneipen und Restaurants einordnen. Wenn du der Meinung bist, dass eine Kategorie nicht passt, kannst du sie einfach √§ndern, indem du die Transaktion ausw√§hlst und eine andere Kategorie aus der Dropdown-Liste ausw√§hlst.
Hashtags. Wir haben auch Standard-Hashtags f√ºr Transaktionszeiten (#Wochenende), Transaktionsarten (#B√ºcher) oder Kauforte (#Berlin) hinzugef√ºgt. Du kannst deine Transaktionen weiter sortieren, indem du deine eigenen Hashtags hinzuf√ºgst: Tippe auf eine Transaktion und dann auf das Bleistiftsymbol, um Tags hinzuzuf√ºgen (z. B. #Portugal_Trip oder #jeden_Monat) oder um unerw√ºnschte Tags zu entfernen.
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erhalte 15‚Ç¨ f√ºr jeden Freund, dem du N26 erfolgreich empfiehlst. Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: What is the maximum I can spend?
content:
We have limits for bank transactions and debit card transactions.
Maximum Daily Limits (total sum within 24 hours):
POS:  Daily:  $5,000; Monthly:  $30,000
ATM:  Daily:  $1,500; Monthly:  $10,000
ACH:  No limits for incoming credits or debits
Limits can NOT be raised above the maximum.
These limits are in place to protect the account from potential fraudulent activity.
You can customize your daily ATM withdrawal and payment limits directly in the N26 mobile application by:
Logging into the mobile application.
Tapping on the "Actions" icon in the lower right-hand corner of the screen.
Tapping on "Card Settings" under the "Manage" menu.
Tapping on "Limits" under the "Settings" menu.
Adjusting the "Daily Withdrawal Limit" and/or "Daily Payment Limit" sliders.  


The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Wo kann ich meine Maestro Card einsetzen?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è gilt f√ºr Deutschland, √ñsterreich und die Niederlande
Deine Maestro kann nicht f√ºr Online-Eink√§ufe verwendet werden und ist nicht in das deutsche Electronic Cash- (EC-) oder Girocard-System eingebunden.
Aber du kannst deine Karte an Geldautomaten oder Gesch√§ften verwenden, die das Maestro-Symbol tragen. Jede¬†Abhebung am Geldautomaten¬†mit der Maestrocard kostet 2 ‚Ç¨ (bei Fremdw√§hrungen zuz√ºglich einer Geb√ºhr von 1,7% auf den abgehobenen Betrag).
Du kannst¬†deine Maestro Card¬†direkt in der App bestellen, wenn du in Deutschland, √ñsterreich oder den Niederlanden lebst und eine √úberweisung in der H√∂he von mindestens 100 ‚Ç¨ aus einem dieser drei L√§nder erhalten hast.
Wenn du Probleme mit deiner Maestrocard hast, pr√ºfe zuerst, ob deine¬†Karteneinstellungen¬†aktiviert sind. Wenn nichts blockiert ist, kontaktiere den Kundendienst per Chat und wir werden uns darum k√ºmmern.
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Bekomme 15‚Ç¨ f√ºr jeden Freund, dem du N26 erfolgreich empfiehlst. Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm(neuen Tab).

title: What to do if my account was hacked?
content:
If you suspect possible fraudulent activity on your account, please contact us as soon as possible. Our chat function is available in the app, on the N26 website(new tab), and at the end of some of our Support Center articles, such as this one. Just click on Start a chat. 
If you‚Äôd rather speak on the phone, you can request this during the chat. We‚Äôll arrange a callback within the hour so we can discuss the matter further with you. Once in contact with one of our agents, please thoroughly explain the situation to us.  Every detail here is important. 

Please be assured that we‚Äôll take all necessary measures to assist you in this situation. 
In addition to our legal obligations for fraud prevention, and in order to continually improve our security safeguards, we have a dedicated team who analyzes each fraud case individually. The fraud cases themselves are often relatively complicated and have to be dealt with in detail. Depending on the complexity, this can take a few days, but in some cases it can take several weeks.
Finally, if you have evidence or strong feelings that the account might have been hacked, we recommend that you file a police report as well.
To learn more about how we protect your account in case of fraud, visit our blog article(new tab). Visit our page about Security at N26(new tab) to discover our commitment to protect your funds and your account.
Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.
If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126.

title: How long does it take to send money with TransferWise?
content:
Once you've initiated your transfer via TransferWise you'll be given an estimated time frame.
If a TransferWise transfer fails, we‚Äôll notify you via push message. The amount will automatically be returned to your account a few days later.
TransferWise doesn‚Äôt charge extra fees for a returned payment and neither do we. However, some participating banks do charge fees, in which case TransferWise will deduct this amount from the money returned under their¬†Conditions of Use(new tab).
Common reasons for a failed transfer:
Error in the transfer details (for example, when entering the recipient‚Äôs name or account information).
Special characters or too many characters in the recipient‚Äôs name or reference field.
Limits have been reached or online payments aren‚Äôt active in card settings.
Foreign currency transfers aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business or N26 Business You or if the recipient is a business account.

title: ¬øPor qu√© me han cobrado dos veces?
content:
Ofrecemos banking en tiempo real. Esto significa que puedes ver todo lo que est√° ocurriendo en tu cuenta en todo momento. Hay dos tipos de transacciones que se dan durante una compra, tanto en tienda como online:
Autorizaci√≥n.¬†Un importe bloqueado o una reserva hecha por un comercio. Esto incluye desde el caf√© que te tomas por la ma√±ana hasta la reserva de hotel o el coche de alquiler (incluyendo dep√≥sitos de seguridad).
Presentaci√≥n del pago.¬†El importe real que ha sido deducido de tu cuenta; el caf√© se ha cobrado del todo, o bien te han devuelto el dep√≥sito tras terminar tu estancia en el hotel o devolver el coche sano y salvo.
Una vez que la autorizaci√≥n se ha confirmado, no podemos cancelarla o revocarla. En este momento solo pueden pasar tres cosas con tu¬†autorizaci√≥n: se convierte en una presentaci√≥n, es rechazada o caduca¬†(y autom√°ticamente vuelve a tu cuenta en un m√°ximo de 12 d√≠as). Las cantidades bloqueadas como dep√≥sito por alquiler de un coche pueden tardar hasta 30 d√≠as en volver a tu cuenta. Recuerda:
En ocasiones ver√°s ambas, la autorizaci√≥n y la presentaci√≥n del pago, esto ocurre si se desconectan o existen problemas t√©cnicos en el terminal de pago. Finalmente, la autorizaci√≥n acabar√° caducando. Si no caduca en 12 d√≠as, podemos ayudarte a¬†recuperar tu dinero.
Verificar autorizaciones (normalmente cantidades muy peque√±as), las cuales sirven para comprobar si tu tarjeta est√° activa. Este dinero acabar√° volviendo a tu saldo disponible.
La cantidad de una autorizaci√≥n puede ser diferente a la presentaci√≥n final por¬†varias razones.

title: Wie kontaktiere ich N26?
content:
Wenn du uns erreichen m√∂chtest, kannst du einen Chat in deiner App, WebApp oder unter einige Support Center-Artikel starten. Da wir eine Online-Bank sind, haben wir keine Filialen.
Vergewissere dich zun√§chst,¬†dass du die neueste App-Version installiert hast. Falls nicht, lade dir das Update im¬†Apple App Store(neuen Tab)¬†oder¬†Google Play Store(neuen Tab)¬†herunter.
Wenn du √ºber die¬†WebApp(neuen Tab)¬†in dein Konto eingeloggt bist, findest du den Chat in der unteren rechten Ecke.
Um von deinem Smartphone zu chatten, gehe zu¬†üë§ Mein Konto¬†und¬†Support. Scrolle nach unten und w√§hle unter¬†Kontakt¬†den¬†Kundendienst-Chat.
Dort wird dir dein Platz in der Warteliste angezeigt. Halte deine Mastercard bereit; das ist zwar optional, aber du bekommst einen schnelleren Service.
Du erreichst uns t√§glich von 07:00 - 23:00 Uhr, auch an Sonn- und Feiertagen.
Bitte kontaktiere uns √ºber diesen Artikel wenn du eine Bank oder eine andere Beh√∂rde vertrittst(neuen Tab).

title: When will my card arrive?
content:
The estimated delivery timeline for card deliveries is 10 working days. Deliveries may take longer in some specific areas in the following countries: Estonia, Greece, Italy, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia and Spain. 
Please consider this before taking any action regarding a card re-order:
If the delivery fails and your card is returned to us, we‚Äôll let you know via email.
If it's been less than 10 working days since you ordered your card, we encourage you to wait before reaching out to us. 
If you've waited longer than the expected timeline, please check and if necessary update your shipping address, you can do this within the N26 app: üë§ My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Shipping Address.
If your shipping address was incorrect and this is your first N26 card, please¬†contact us via live chat(new tab) and we‚Äôll help you order a new one.
If your shipping address was incorrect and you‚Äôve had an active card before, you'll need to reorder the card via the App.
If your shipping address was correct, there might have been an issue with your card's delivery. Please contact us via live chat and we‚Äôll help you order a new one.
If your card fails to arrive or you need your card quickly, you may consider ordering it via¬†express delivery (with an additional fee) which takes up to 3 working days. Please note that express delivery is not available for Metal cards.
Your first card is immediately produced and mailed out once you‚Äôre done¬†proving your identity. If you opened a Metal account, please to top up your account after completing the sign up with at least the amount of the monthly Metal fee in order to receive the card.
Tips for a successful delivery:
If your address contains special characters, please contact us via the live chat.
We only send cards to residential addresses (businesses are not accepted).
Don‚Äôt enter any spaces when entering the postal code for your delivery address.
Ensure that important delivery information isn‚Äôt missing (for example, the name on your mailbox if you live in Germany or your building number, stairwell number, and door code if applicable). If you‚Äôre staying somewhere temporarily (with a friend or in an Airbnb), make sure to include the name on the mailbox that belongs to the main tenant of the apartment.
If you‚Äôre moving somewhere and this is your first card, make sure to select the country and address where you‚Äôll move to and wish to receive your N26 card.

title: Was sind Spaces?
content:
Setze dir Ziele, erstelle, personalisiere und √ºberweise Geld zwischen den verschiedenen Spaces in Echtzeit. Spaces ist in deiner App und¬†WebApp(neuen Tab)¬†verf√ºgbar.
Neben deinem Hauptkonto (oder prim√§ren Space) kannst du noch weitere Spaces erstellen und l√∂schen. Die Anzahl der parallel aktiven Spaces h√§ngt von deinem Kontotyp ab: Bei einem N26 Konto und N26 Business Konto kannst du¬†2 weitere Spaces¬†neben deinem prim√§ren Space nutzen, bei unseren Premium-Konten N26 You, N26 Business You und N26 Metal sind es¬†10 zus√§tzliche Spaces.
Die Kontoausz√ºge deines Hauptkontos enthalten alle Transaktionen, die an die verschiedenen Spaces √ºberwiesen oder empfangen wurden. Die Kontoausz√ºge kannst du online herunterladen.
Nur dein prim√§rer Space kann sich im Minus befinden (wenn du einen¬†Dispokredit¬†hast). In allen anderen Spaces kann dein Kontostand nicht negativ sein. Du kannst also zwischen den verschiedenen Spaces nur Betr√§ge √ºberweisen, die dort jeweils auch verf√ºgbar sind.
Du kannst nur das Guthaben von deinem prim√§ren Space f√ºr Mastercard Zahlungen verwenden. Beachte also, dass du eventuell erst Geld √ºberweisen musst, bevor du einen Kauf t√§tigen kannst.
Verschiebe Geld von einem zum anderen Space, indem du dein Hauptkonto gedr√ºckt h√§ltst und es per Drag and Drop in den anderen Space ziehst.
Du kannst einen Space jederzeit sperren und wieder entsperren, direkt aus deiner App oder dem Online Banking. Dazu musst du nur deine Best√§tigungs-PIN eingeben. Wenn ein Space gesperrt ist, kannst du noch immer Geld darauf √ºberweisen. Wenn du aber Geld von einem gesperrten Space entnehmen m√∂chtest, musst du ihn zuerst entsperren.
Du kannst den Betrag in einem Space verstecken, sodass er nicht in dein Gesamt-Saldo eingerechnet wird. Gehe daf√ºr zum gew√ºnschten Space, tippe auf die drei Punkte und dann auf "Space-Saldo verstecken".
Spaces enth√§lt eine Funktion, die ‚ÄúRegeln‚Äù hei√üt. Diese Funktion hilft dir dabei, dein Geld und deine Zeit effektiver zu verwalten.

Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erhalte 15 ‚Ç¨ f√ºr jeden Freund, dem du N26 erfolgreich empfiehlst. Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: What are the benefits of N26 Metal?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Available in Germany, Austria, France, Spain, Italy, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Iceland, and Liechtenstein.
Upgrade to N26 Metal¬†and you‚Äôll receive 10 additional¬†Spaces, dedicated Customer Support, access to exclusive partner offerings(new tab), as well as the N26 Metal¬†insurance package, provided by Allianz Global Assistance*, which covers a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:
Travel insurance. Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.

Snow and mountain rescue. Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.

Mobile phone theft insurance. Compensation if your smartphone is stolen in your home country or abroad.

Travel car rental. Get vehicle coverage in the event of damage or theft.
Extra card. You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 14‚Ç¨ through your N26 app. 
Keep these in mind when considering¬†N26 Metal(new tab):
N26 Metal features an NFC-enabled Mastercard with a metal core in your choice of charcoal black, quartz rose, or slate grey.
If you‚Äôre a new customer, the first fee will be deducted 15 days after you prove your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on your sign-up date.
Please top up your account right after completing the sign up with at least the amount of the monthly Metal fee in order to receive the card 
If you upgrade to N26 Metal, the monthly fee of ‚Ç¨16,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade.
If you were previously an N26 You member, all purchases and travel booked using your N26 You Mastercard will remain insured.
The minimum membership is one year. Your contract automatically renews if you do not cancel your membership at least 4 weeks before the contract expires.
You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 14‚Ç¨ through your N26 app.
