title: Was kann ich tun, wenn meine IBAN nicht akzeptiert wird?
content:
Deine IBAN enth√§lt die DE-L√§nderkennzahl, eine zweistellige Pr√ºfnummer, die achtstellige Bankleitzahl und deine zehnstellige Kontonummer.  Zum Beispiel:¬†DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.
Die teilnehmenden L√§nder des SEPA-Raums (Single Euro Payments Area) haben sich auf das IBAN-System geeinigt, um nationale und internationale Zahlungen zu vereinfachen und das Fehlerrisiko bei der Kommunikation und Abwicklung von Transaktionen zu reduzieren.
H√§ndler oder Arbeitgeber, die IBANs aus anderen Mitgliedstaaten des Europ√§ischen Wirtschaftsraums nicht akzeptieren, versto√üen ab 1. Februar 2016 gegen europ√§isches Recht (Artikel 9 der¬†Verordnung Nr. 260/2012(neuen Tab)).
Wenn du jemals von einer IBAN-Diskriminierung betroffen bist, wende dich bitte direkt an deine¬†zust√§ndige nationale Beh√∂rde(neuen Tab)¬†und informiere diese √ºber den Vorfall. Gib deine Kontaktdaten sowie den Namen des H√§ndlers oder Unternehmens an, der deine IBAN nicht akzeptiert hat, und lege eine kurze Beschreibung des Vorfalls bei (einschlie√ülich eines Screenshot der Ablehnung oder einen anderen Kommunikationsbeleg).

title: How to top up my account?
content:
Once you are successfully verified, you'll be able to top up your account in several ways:
CASH26 (in Germany, Austria, and Italy). Deposit cash through our partner stores;
MoneyBeam. Instantly receive money from other N26 users;
Debit card. You can add money to your account by entering the card details from your other account within the N26 app. You can choose to deposit between 20‚Ç¨ and 150‚Ç¨. Please note that prepaid cards are not accepted. Likewise, we don‚Äôt support American Express credit cards.
Apple Pay or Google Pay(new tab). You can add money to your account by using Apple Pay (for iOS devices) or GPay (for Android devices).You can choose to deposit between 20‚Ç¨ and 150‚Ç¨. Please note that prepaid cards are not accepted. Likewise, we don‚Äôt support American Express credit cards.
SEPA transfer. The transfer must be in EUR and within SEPA. You‚Äôll just need to provide your IBAN and your name as it‚Äôs written on the ID you used to create your account. You should also know that: 
For the transfer details, make sure the recipient‚Äôs name is your name as it‚Äôs written on the identity document you used to prove your identity (especially if you have an N26 Business account ‚Äì we don‚Äôt accept company names). 
The transfer will be instant if the sending bank support SEPA instant outgoing transfers, if not, it will completed within one banking day. Due to the opening times of the participating banks, one banking day may stretch to two working days.
In France, your first transfer can only be sent from another one of your accounts. For all other regions, you can use any other bank account to make the transfer (it doesn‚Äôt have to be under your name). 
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: How to set my card PIN?
content:
We don‚Äôt send you a PIN via post; you set the PIN for your Mastercard or Maestro card¬†once you‚Äôve successfully connected your smartphone to your account and¬†activated¬†your card(s). To set or change your card PIN:
Go to üë§ My Account.
Select Card settings and swipe to choose a card.
Select Reset PIN on the mobile or WebApp(new tab).
Enter the 10-digit token number on your card.
Choose your new PIN and confirm it.
Keep in mind that:
If you live in France, Spain, Ireland, Greece, Finland, Estonia or the UK, you must make your first payment using Chip and PIN before you can use your card anywhere else. You can also first make a withdrawal or balance inquiry at ATM instead.
For security reasons we don‚Äôt accept any PIN containing elements of your birth date, address, or any combination of repeated digits or numerical sequences (such as 1111, 1234, or 4321). If the number you‚Äôve chosen is not accepted please try again using a different combination.
If a PIN is entered incorrectly three times in a row, the card will automatically be blocked for security reasons. If this happens, please contact our Customer Support via chat so we can unblock it for you.
Your card PIN is separate from your Confirmation PIN, however you can choose the same PIN for both.

title: Why did my online purchase fail?
content:
An online payment can fail for several reasons. Here are some of the most common reasons:
Your account is low on funds. Don‚Äôt forget to check your balance before making an online purchase. Your balance must be greater than the total purchase amount.
The card settings in the mobile application don‚Äôt allow online payments. We recommend that you check your card settings in your N26 application before making an online purchase. To do this:
Log into the mobile application.
Tap on ‚ÄúActions‚Äù.
Tap on "Card Settings."
Ensure that the toggle button is set to enable ‚ÄúOnline payments‚Äù.
You have set the limit on your card to be too low. 
Log into the mobile application.
Tap on "Actions".
Tap on ‚ÄúCard settings‚Äù.
Tap on ‚ÄúLimits‚Äù. 
Check the ‚ÄúDaily Payment Limit‚Äù on your card and adjust it if necessary. Note: This limit cannot be raised above $5,000/day.
You made a purchase on a website that doesn‚Äôt accept debit cards. Check the information provided by the website itself. It might only accept credit cards and not debit cards. If that is the case, you will not be able to use your N26 Visa card.

The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Wie funktionieren kontaktlose Zahlungen?
content:
Es ist nicht m√∂glich, kontaktlose Zahlungen zu deaktivieren. Wenn du Probleme mit deinen kontaktlosen Zahlungen hast, bedenke Folgendes:
Um kontaktlose Zahlungen zu aktivieren, musst du deine Karte zun√§chst an einem Geldautomaten oder Zahlungsterminal verwenden.

F√ºr Zahlungen bis zu 50 ‚Ç¨ ist keine Karten-PIN erforderlich*. F√ºr Betr√§ge √ºber 50‚Ç¨ musst du deine Karten-PIN eingeben.
*Sofern der Anbieter kontaktlose Zahlungen unterst√ºtzt.
Du musst deine Karte direkt an ein NFC-kompatibles Zahlungsterminal halten. Wenn du deine Karte zu schnell entfernst oder sie nicht nah genug daran gehalten hast, versuche es einfach noch einmal.

Bei N26 Metal Karten ist die NFC Funktion auf der R√ºckseite. Stelle sicher, dass du die R√ºckseite der Karte an das Zahlungsterminal h√§ltst, wenn du kontaktlos zahlen m√∂chtest (mit der Vorderseite funktioniert es nicht).

title: How to change my phone number, address, or other personal data?
content:
It‚Äôs important to keep your personal data up to date (for example, your phone number is necessary to¬†connect your smartphone¬†or to send and receive¬†MoneyBeams). Here's how you can change your information:
Delivery address,¬†password, or¬†tax information: You can change this information yourself at any time in the app. Just go to¬†üë§ My Account¬†and select¬†Settings¬†then¬†Personal Settings.
Name¬†and¬†sex: Chat with us and send two forms of ID: a copy of your new ID card or passport as well as an official document of the change (a marriage licence or updated birth certificate).  We can also re-order a card with your new name once your account has been updated.
Nationality: Chat with us and send a copy of your new ID card or passport.
Phone number or¬†email address: You‚Äôll need to contact us via chat for this. We need to verify it‚Äôs really you changing your information so we can‚Äôt change any personal data over email.

title: Can I open an account if I live outside the eurozone?
content:
If you live in Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Liechtenstein, Switzerland or Iceland you may¬†open an account with us. We offer:
The choice between a standard bank account or N26 Business.
Accounts in ‚Ç¨, a German IBAN, and transfers with SEPA or Moneybeam.
Good currency conversion with your Mastercard debit card.
Free shipping of your Mastercard or ‚Ç¨25 for express.
Foreign currency transfers with TransferWise (with the standard account).
5 free ATM withdrawals in ‚Ç¨ in the EU (1.7% markup on foreign currencies withdrawals).
0.1% cashback on all card payments (for Business accounts).
2 Spaces in addition to the main account.
A bonus for every friend you successfully invite to N26 with our Refer a Friend Program.
Contactless payment with Google Pay and Apple Pay.
Tips for incoming and outgoing transfers:
We recommend choosing your local currency to get the best exchange rate when using your Mastercard for purchases or to withdraw cash (if not, additional fees may apply).
To top up your account using your local currency, we recommend converting your currency via SEPA transfer either using TransferWise (on their website(new tab)) or using your local bank.
For outgoing transfers to ‚Ç¨ accounts, simply use the app's internal SEPA transfer. For outgoing transfers to non-‚Ç¨ accounts, use TransferWise in the app.*
*Please note: TransferWise is unavailable for N26 Business accounts (only SEPA transfers in EUR).

title: Will my direct debit go through if I'm low on funds?
content:
If your balance can‚Äôt cover a direct debit* when it‚Äôs due, it‚Äôll bounce and you‚Äôll be charged a¬†‚Ç¨3 fee. And if you have a negative account balance, you'll be charged an overdraft interest of 8.9%. It‚Äôs not possible to delay a direct debit.
To avoid this fee in the future, you can instantly check whether you‚Äôre eligible for an¬†Overdraft¬†directly in the app (available in Germany and Austria).
*For Poland, Sweden, Denmark, and Norway only: if you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and ultimate amount that is collected from us.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: How does Spaces work?
content:
Set goals, create and personalize Spaces, and transfer money between them instantly. Spaces is available in the mobile and¬†WebApp(new tab).
In addition to your main account (or primary space), you can create and delete additional Spaces as often as you‚Äôd like but the number of active Spaces at any one time depends on your account type: 2 additional Spaces with an N26 or N26 Business account or up to 10 additional Spaces with N26 You, N26 Business You and N26 Metal.
Your primary account statements will include all transactions sent to a space or received from one. You can download balance statements from the confirmation page.
Only your primary space can be negative (if you are eligible for an overdraft). All other balances in Spaces cannot be negative, meaning you can only transfer what is available in a particular space.
You can only use the balance from your primary space toward your Mastercard transactions. So consider transferring money before making a purchase if needed.
Move money from one space to another by holding down on your Main Account and dragging and dropping into your space. Once the amount is confirmed the balance is updated right away.
You can lock and unlock a space at anytime from your mobile and web app. You'll only need to confirm with your confirmation PIN. If a space is locked, you‚Äôll still be able to transfer money to it. If you need to withdraw money from a locked space, you need first to unlock it.
You'll be able to hide the amount within the Space from your account's total balance. Just go into your Space, tap the three dots in the top right corner and select ‚ÄòHide space balance‚Äô.
Spaces includes a feature called Rules which will help you manage your time and your finances effectively.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: How to protect my identity?
content:
To protect and help avoid the misuse of your personal data, please keep in mind that:
We will never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. This includes verifications for apartment rental contracts, lines of credit, or job offers (including jobs with N26). Only complete the verification process if you want to open an N26 bank account for yourself.
As the account owner, only you should create and have access to your login details. Never create an N26 bank account with a predefined email address and password. If you use login credentials that were given to you, these credentials may be used to reach your personal and legal information. Also, never log into an N26 account that is not yours.
Do not send your ID or passport to unknown or unverified recipients.
We may ask for certain documents when your transaction is subject to a routine check. Only send valid documentation to verified N26 email accounts.
We will never ask for your username, password, or PIN codes outside the N26 app. Never provide this information in an external website or app, even if it looks N26-related.
If you ever feel in doubt, have received a suspicious request from a third party, or think your N26 login may be compromised, please do not hesitate to contact us.

title: How do I add money to my N26 account?
content:
We make it easy to fund your N26 account. You can add money via several methods, including direct deposit, transfer from external bank, external bank account to N26 (ACH transfer) debit card transfer (non funded accounts only), and MoneyBeam, to name a few. Please look below for more information. 
Direct Deposit:  If you intend to fund your account via direct deposit, simply provide the sender (your employer, financial institution, Armed Forces, Social Security, etc.) with our ABA routing number (122287675) and your personal N26 account number.¬†
You can locate your account number by clicking on the ‚ÄúMy Account‚Äù option on the top right side of the website (and the mobile application) after logging into your N26 account.
In case your employer needs a direct deposit form, please click here(new tab).¬†

Transfer from external bank:  Transfer money from your external bank into your N26 account, conveniently, from within the N26 mobile application.
To transfer funds to your N26 account using the N26 mobile application, follow these steps:
Launch your N26 mobile application.
Tap the Actions button at the bottom right of your mobile's screen.
Tap on Add Money.
Tap External bank transfer
Select the account to use to transfer funds from.
Enter the amount you want to transfer.
Tap Continue.
Enter your 4 digit Confirmation PIN.
Tap Confirm transfer to initiate the transfer.
A message will be displayed in your Transaction List indicating that the transfer is scheduled.

External Bank Account to N26 (ACH transfer):  Transfer funds directly from your primary bank account into your N26 account with an ACH Transfer.
Log into your financial institution's online banking platform or mobile app (if applicable).
Locate the ‚ÄúExternal Transfers‚Äù or ‚ÄúTransfer Money‚Äù or ‚ÄúExternal Account‚Äù or similar option and add your N26 checking account as a new account.
The bank account originating the transfer does not have to be under your name. However, please make sure that the recipient‚Äôs name is your full name as entered during the account sign-up process.
Input our ABA routing number (122287675) and your personal checking account number.
You can locate your account number by clicking on the ‚ÄúMy Account‚Äù option on the top right side of the website or by clicking the icon in the mobile app, after logging into your N26 account.
Your financial institution may make a small test deposit(s) into your N26 account, within a few days, to verify your account. Typically, to complete the process, you may have to confirm the test deposit(s) with the originating financial institution.
Upon completing the initial process, you should be able to transfer funds in or out of your N26 account using the third party banks fund transfer feature.
¬†Note:¬†
Please be advised that these are general guidelines and your financial institution‚Äôs requirements may differ.
Some banks may experience issues processing money transfers to the routing number 122287675. At this time, ACH bank transfers from Capital One and from USAA are not available to fund your N26 account. If you encounter this issue, please use another bank account to transfer money into your N26 account.

Debit card transfer (Non Funded Accounts Only):  Use a debit card to instantly fund your account right from the app. This is the fastest and simplest way to add money to your N26 account with a free, one-time transaction. Just log into the iOS or Android app and follow the instructions on the main screen.
This option is available to customers who have not previously funded their N26 account. 
Find additional details in this document(new tab). 

MoneyBeam:  Instantly send money to (or receive money from) other N26 members. Find additional details in our "What is MoneyBeam?(new tab)" article. 

Third party payment processors
Put money into your account using these services:
Cash App(new tab)
PayPal(new tab)
Venmo(new tab)
Zelle¬Æ(new tab)
Ingo Money(new tab) (mobile check cashing service)
Apple Cash¬Æ:  You can transfer money from Apple Cash into your N26 account.
How can I link my N26 Visa¬Æ debit card to Apple Cash?
You can link your N26 card to Apple Cash by following these steps"
Open "Wallet" on your Apple device.
Select "Apple Cash".
Tap the three dots on the upper right hand corner.
Select "Add Money".
Select "Add Card".
Position your N26 card in the frame to scan.
Tap "next" when the scan is complete.
Enter your card's 3-digit security code.
Tap "Next".
Your card is now linked.
How can I transfer money to my N26 account from Apple Cash?
Transferring money to your N26 account from Apple Cash can be achieved by following these steps:
Select "Transfer to Bank".
Enter the amount you want to transfer.
Select how quickly you want the money transferred.
"Instant Transfer".  There is a fee associated with this option.
"1-3 Business Days".  There is no charge for this option.
Done.

The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: ¬øPor qu√© ha fallado mi compra online?
content:
Consejos y sugerencias para una transacci√≥n exitosa:
Si no puedes confirmar la transacci√≥n mediante la notificaci√≥n push en 5 minutos, simplemente empieza de nuevo el proceso de pago en la p√°gina web del comerciante.
Si no recibes el mensaje push, aseg√∫rate de que tu smartphone est√© vinculado y los mensajes push est√°n activados en los ajustes.
Comprueba tambi√©n que los pagos m√≥viles y los pagos en el extranjero est√°n activados en los ajustes de tu tarjeta.
Requiere buena conexi√≥n a internet. Prueba cambiando de WiFi a 3G/4G o viceversa.

title: How long do transfers take?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Applies to all regions except the UK
All domestic and international incoming SEPA transfers are instant if they come from a bank that supports instant transfers and the sender selects this option. Banking regulation applies to SEPA instant transfers and may delay the transfer in case it needs additional monitoring.
In case the sender bank doesn‚Äôt offer instant transfers or the sender doesn‚Äôt choose this option, the transfer will be completed within one banking day. However, due to the opening times of the participating banks, one banking day may stretch to two working days. Please, note that outgoing SEPA transfers are completed within one banking day.
If the transfer is not instant, keep in mind that if a transfer has been made right before a weekend or bank holiday, the time frame will be extended. We send our SEPA payment orders through TARGET2(new tab). It‚Äôs open to process payments every working day from 07:00 to 18:00 CET. The system is closed on the following days:
1 January (New Year's Day), Good Friday, Easter Monday, 1 May (Labour Day), 25 December (Christmas Day), 26 December.
With¬†MoneyBeam, you can transfer money to other N26 customers instantly and you can also receive instant MoneyBeam requests from banks that supports instant transfers. Times vary for¬†foreign currency transfers¬†with TransferWise (but you‚Äôll see an estimated transfer time when you create the transfer).
You'll need to confirm each type of transfer via¬†push message¬†in the app before we send anything out.
Please note: we only accept transfers in EUR via SEPA (that means no SWIFT transfers).
If your incoming transfer is outside of these estimated time frames, please contact the sender (bank) for a payment investigation. We can't investigate incoming transfers. But we've collected a few reasons why your¬†SEPA¬†or¬†foreign currency¬†transfer could have failed.

title: Where can I use my Maestro card?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Applies to Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands
Let‚Äôs get a couple of things out of the way: your Maestro can‚Äôt be used for online purchases and it‚Äôs not an EC or Girocard (in Germany).
But you can use your card in ATMs or shops where the Maestro symbol is displayed. Each¬†ATM transaction¬†using your Maestro is ‚Ç¨2 (plus a fee of 1,7% of the amount for foreign currency withdrawals).
You can¬†order your Maestro¬†card directly in the app only if you live in Germany, Austria or the Netherlands and have received a transfer of at least 100 ‚Ç¨ from one of these 3 countries.
If you‚Äôre having issues using your Maestro, first check that your¬†card settings¬†are activated. If nothing is blocked, contact Customer Support via chat and we‚Äôll look into it for you.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: Perch√© non posso ottenere un Conto base?
content:
In alcune circostanze, N26 pu√≤ rifiutare la tua richiesta di¬†Conto base. Questo pu√≤ accadere nei seguenti casi:
Non vivi in uno dei nostri paesi supportati.
Hai gi√† un conto N26 o un altro conto corrente in Germania e puoi utilizzarlo pienamente.
Sei stato condannato per reati contro la banca, i suoi dipendenti o clienti negli ultimi 3 anni.
Hai gi√† avuto in passato un Conto base presso N26 che √® stato chiuso per saldo negativo o uso vietato.
Non hai soddisfatto i requisiti minimi delle due diligenze generali ai sensi di Money Laundering Act (la legge antiriciclaggio) e del Credit Services Act (la legge sui servizi di credito).

title: How to use Google Pay?
content:
Applies to Germany, Spain, Italy, Ireland, Belgium, Slovakia, France, Denmark, Finland, Sweden, Norway, Poland and Switzerland. 
Google Pay is a payment method that allows you to pay with your smartphone so you don‚Äôt have to carry your Mastercard with you all the time.
Google Pay is available in all shops supporting contactless (NFC) payments as well as online shops. Hold your smartphone near the contactless terminal and your payment will automatically process. When paying online, select Google Pay as the payment option. We‚Äôll ask you to confirm your payment via¬†push message¬†during checkout.
Some tips to keep in mind:
To add your N26 Mastercard, download the Google Pay app and select Get Started to enter your card details. You‚Äôll need Android 5.0 (Lollipop) or higher as well as an NFC-capable smartphone.
Google Pay requires a screen lock. If you didn‚Äôt set it up yet, you‚Äôll be asked to before adding your Mastercard to the Google Pay app.
If you‚Äôre protecting your smartphone with a case, you might have to remove it to pay. Some payment terminals don‚Äôt recognize your phone if the case is too big.
If the payment terminal asks you to present your card (again), you might have removed the smartphone too fast or didn‚Äôt hold it close enough. Just try again while keeping this in mind.

title: Warum wurde mir etwas doppelt berechnet?
content:
Wir bieten dir Banking in Echtzeit. Das bedeutet, dass du Prozesse hinter deinem Konto sehen kannst, die du sonst nicht sehen w√ºrdest. Es gibt zwei Haupttransaktionsarten, die bei einem Kauf in einem Gesch√§ft oder im Internet stattfinden:
Autorisierungen. Ein Betrag, der von einem Einzelh√§ndler oder Verk√§ufer blockiert oder reserviert wurde. Dies kann alles von der morgendlichen Tasse Kaffee bis hin zu Hotel- oder Mietwagenbuchungen (einschlie√ülich Kautionen) sein.
Buchungen. Der tats√§chliche Betrag, der von deinem Konto abgeht. Die Tasse Kaffee wurde endg√ºltig von deinem Konto abgebucht, du hast deine Kaution nach dem Auschecken im Hotel zur√ºckerhalten oder das Auto unversehrt zur√ºckgegeben.
Sobald eine Autorisierung best√§tigt wurde, k√∂nnen wir sie nicht mehr stornieren oder r√ºckg√§ngig machen. An diesem Punkt k√∂nnen¬†mit deiner Autorisierung¬†ein paar Dinge passieren:¬†Sie wird zu einer Buchung, sie wird abgelehnt oder sie verf√§llt¬†(und kehrt nach sp√§testens 12 Tagen automatisch auf dein Konto zur√ºck). Nicht vergessen:
Manchmal siehst du sowohl die Autorisierung als auch die endg√ºltige Buchung, wenn es am Zahlungsterminal technische Probleme gibt oder die Verbindung w√§hrend des Vorgangs unterbrochen wurde. Letztlich erlischt diese Autorisierung. Wenn das nach 12 Tagen nicht passiert ist, k√∂nnen wir dir helfen, dein Geld zur√ºckzubekommen.
Verifizierungsautorisierungen (in der Regel sehr kleine Betr√§ge) werden verwendet, um zu pr√ºfen, ob deine Karte aktiv ist (z.B. beim Google Play Store). Dieses Geld wird auf dein Konto zur√ºck√ºberwiesen.
Die H√∂he einer Autorisierung kann aus verschiedenen Gr√ºnden von der endg√ºltigen Vorlage abweichen.

title: Pourquoi la v√©rification de mon identit√© par appel vid√©o ne fonctionne pas ?
content:
Voici des solutions aux probl√®mes¬†les plus fr√©quemment rencontr√©s¬†lors de la v√©rification par appel vid√©o :
Assurez-vous de r√©aliser l‚Äôappel vid√©o dans un lieu suffisamment √©clair√©, avec une cam√©ra de qualit√© et une connexion internet haut d√©bit.

Assurez-vous d‚Äô√™tre la seule personne √† appara√Ætre sur la vid√©o.

Le document d‚Äôidentit√© principal que vous devez nous pr√©senter peut √™tre votre passeport ou votre carte d‚Äôidentit√© (s‚Äôils sont accept√©s par nos services). Nous ne pouvons pas accepter les permis de conduire ou les titres de s√©jour comme document d‚Äôidentit√© principal.

title: How to reorder a card?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Deliveries normally take up to 10 working days. Deliveries may take longer in some specific areas in the following countries: Estonia, Greece, Italy, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia and Spain.
If you‚Äôre waiting for your first card¬† and it has been more than 10 working days since you've successfully completed your identity verification, please contact us via live chat.
¬†For any other reason, please re-order your card via the N26 app.
First, check and update your shipping address
You can do this within the N26 app: üë§ My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Shipping Address.
To reorder your card go to Actions and tap Card Settings.¬†
From your list of cards, swipe until you see the card you wish to reorder and select Reorder.¬†¬†
Note that the Standard and the N26 You replacement cards have a fee of ‚Ç¨6 for standard shipping and ‚Ç¨25 for express shipping. For N26 Metal cards, the fee is ‚Ç¨45 for standard shipping. Express delivery for Metal cards is not available.
Once you‚Äôve ordered your new card, you can activate a digital version while your card is on its way. You can do this within the N26 app by scrolling to your card in Card Settings and adding it to the mobile wallet of choice. This feature is available for 30 days starting from the day your card has been ordered. After this you'll need to activate your physical card through the N26 app. Once the physical card is activated, your mobile wallet will continue working normally. If you don‚Äôt activate your physical card during this period, the digital version will expire until your card is activated.
This feature is not be enabled for customers who reorder their card or move to another account without blocking their current card. In these cases their current card will continue working with Apple Pay or Google Pay until the new one is activated.

title: Why did my online purchase fail?
content:
Some reasons why your online payment failed:
If you are unable to confirm the push message within 5 minutes, simply restart the payment process on the merchant's website.
If you do not receive a push message, please make sure that your smartphone is connected and that push messages are enabled on your smartphone.
Ensure that online payments and payments abroad are enabled in your card settings.
A stable internet connection is required.
If you are using an iOS device, make sure you turn off the Do Not Disturb mode.
If the amount on the merchant's site is different from the one stated in the push message, this may be due to the conversion of a foreign currency into euros.
Make sure that you disable any Adblockers running on your browser.
Your Maestro card can‚Äôt be used for online purchases.

title: Come impostare il PIN della carta?
content:
Non ti manderemo un PIN per posta: puoi impostare il PIN per la carta Mastercard o Maestro¬†dopo aver collegato correttamente il tuo smartphone al conto e aver¬†attivato¬†la carta/e. Per impostare o modificare il PIN della carta:
Vai a Gestisci.
Seleziona Impostazioni della carta per scegliere una carta.
Seleziona Reimposta.
Inserisci il numero a 10 cifre sulla tua carta.
Scegli il nuovo PIN e confermalo.
Ricordati che:
Per motivi di sicurezza, non accettiamo PIN contenenti parti della tua data di nascita, dell'indirizzo o combinazioni di cifre ripetute o sequenze numeriche (come 1111, 1234 o 4321). Se il numero scelto non viene accettato, riprova con una combinazione diversa.
Se vivi in Francia, Spagna, Irlanda, Grecia, Finlandia o Estonia devi effettuare il tuo primo pagamento utilizzando Chip e PIN prima di poter utilizzare la tua carta altrove. Puoi anche  fare un prelievo o una richiesta di saldo attuale presso un ATM.
Se si digita un PIN errato per tre volte consecutive, la carta viene automaticamente bloccata per motivi di sicurezza. In tal caso, contatta la nostra Assistenza clienti tramite chat per farla sbloccare.
Il PIN della carta √® distinto dal PIN di conferma, ma puoi scegliere lo stesso PIN per entrambi.

title: How to change my card limits?
content:
You can change your¬†card PIN, define your daily withdrawal or payment limits, and enable or disable your ATM withdrawals, online or payments abroad in¬†üë§ My Account¬†by selecting¬†Card Settings¬†in the mobile app or¬†WebApp(new tab).
Each change you make is applied instantly to all of your cards.
You can also¬†block your card¬†or order a new one, in case it‚Äôs lost or stolen.

title: Why didn't an ATM give me cash?
content:
It happens: you go to an ATM, the requested amount is deducted from your balance, but the machine doesn‚Äôt give you cash. 
First, check your card limits by going to üë§ My Account and selecting Card settings. Make sure ATM withdrawals are active. 
While we can‚Äôt say for sure why it happened, we can definitely help get your money back. The amount that was deducted from your balance is only an authorization (a reservation or blocked amount). Because the transaction wasn‚Äôt successful, this reserved amount will expire either in a few hours or a maximum of 12 working days and return to your balance. 
If the reserved amount doesn‚Äôt expire after 12 working days, please complete a dispute form. We‚Äôll do our best to get the money back for you. 
In the meantime, we suggest you try another ATM from a different operator. This rarely happens twice in a row.

title: Warum habe ich meinen Verkn√ºpfungscode nicht per SMS erhalten?
content:
Du brauchst einen Verkn√ºpfungscode, um dein Smartphone mit deinem Konto zu verkn√ºpfen. Falls du die SMS mit dem Code nicht erh√§ltst, kannst du einen neuen bis zu f√ºnf Mal in der App anfordern. Bitte warte 30 Sekunden, bevor du es nochmal versuchst. 
Wenn du bereits alle f√ºnf Codes angefordert hast und die Verkn√ºpfung noch immer nicht funktioniert, werden weitere Anfragen aus Sicherheitsgr√ºnden f√ºr 24 Stunden blockiert. Wenn das geschieht, kannst du entweder warten, oder unseren Customer Support per Chat kontaktieren - wir helfen dir gerne weiter. 
Wenn deine L√§ndervorwahl au√üerhalb der EU liegt, ist es wahrscheinlich dass du die SMS mit dem Code nicht bekommst und du uns kontaktieren musst.

title: Why can‚Äôt I see other N26 users on MoneyBeam?
content:
To carry out real-time transactions such as¬†MoneyBeams, N26 checks your smartphone‚Äôs contact list and finds other N26 users based on saved phone numbers or emails. You can also enter someone‚Äôs contact details manually to send them a MoneyBeam.
If you don‚Äôt see your friend‚Äôs name on MoneyBeam but you know they‚Äôre an N26 user, they most likely haven‚Äôt made themselves visible. Indeed you can manage your visibility as an N26 user.
Most MoneyBeam transfers that fail between N26 users happen because there are multiple phone numbers or emails listed in the contact entry of a phone's address book. To avoid this, make sure you have the email and phone number your friend uses in your phone book in order to send them MoneyBeams. If the contact details you have stored don‚Äôt match, you cannot send a MoneyBeam to your friend.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: ¬øC√≥mo saber cu√°l es mi IBAN o n√∫mero de cuenta?
content:
Puedes encontrar tu IBAN y tu n√∫mero BIC en los extractos de tu cuenta o en el apartado¬†üë§ Mi cuenta¬†en la app o¬†WebApp(pesta√±a nueva)¬†(en caso de que no hayas activado tu tarjeta y necesites¬†ingresar dinero¬†en tu cuenta).
Puedes compartir la informaci√≥n de forma sencilla haciendo clic en el bot√≥n de compartir que encontrar√°s en¬†üë§ Mi cuenta. Tambi√©n puedes descargar en formato PDF la informaci√≥n bancaria. Para hacerlo, entra a tu cuenta desde la¬†WebApp(pesta√±a nueva)¬†y haz clic en el icono de la nube en la esquina superior derecha de las¬†Transacciones.
Todos nuestros c√≥digos IBAN espa√±oles empiezan por ES seguido de un c√≥digo de control de 2 d√≠gitos, luego nuestro c√≥digo de entidad financiera 1563 2626, despu√©s 2 d√≠gitos de control y, por √∫ltimo, tu n√∫mero de cuenta de 10 d√≠gitos.
Nuestro IBAN alem√°n, en cambio, empieza por DE seguido de un c√≥digo de control de 2 d√≠gitos, luego nuestro¬†c√≥digo de entidad financiera 10011001 y terminan con tu¬†n√∫mero de cuenta¬†de 10 d√≠gitos (empieza por 26).

title: Wie reklamiere ich eine Transaktion?
content:
Wir k√∂nnen nur Kartentransaktionen reklamieren, die in deinem monatlichen Kontoauszug sichtbar sind und nicht l√§nger als 120 Tage zur√ºckliegen. Bitte f√ºlle ein Formular f√ºr Umsatzreklamationen in¬†Deutsch(neuen Tab) oder¬†Englisch(neuen Tab)¬†aus und schicke es uns als Anhang in einer Email. Bitte stelle sicher, dass du:
Eine neue Karte bestellen und deine aktuelle als gestohlen markierst
F√ºr jede Kartenzahlung ein eigenes Formular ausf√ºllst und es unterschreibst
Nur einen Streitgrund ausw√§hlst
Alle zus√§tzlich ben√∂tigten Unterlagen(neuen Tab) hinzuf√ºgst

title: Pourquoi des frais ont √©t√© pr√©lev√©s apr√®s un pr√©l√®vement automatique ?
content:
Comme mentionn√© dans nos¬†Conditions G√©n√©rales(nouvel onglet)*, si un pr√©l√®vement automatique est refus√© en raison d‚Äôun solde de compte insuffisant, des frais de 3 ‚Ç¨ sont appliqu√©s. Si votre solde devient n√©gatif √† cause de ces frais, les taux d'int√©r√™t appliqu√©s au montant du¬†d√©couvert¬†(agios) s'√©l√®veront √† 8,9 %.
Vous pouvez √©viter ces frais en vous assurant d‚Äôavoir les fonds suffisants sur votre compte ou en recevant un virement pour alimenter votre compte avant 18 heures le jour m√™me du pr√©l√®vement.
Un¬†virement SEPA¬†peut prendre plus d‚Äôun jour ouvr√© pour arriver sur le compte du destinataire. Nous vous conseillons donc plut√¥t d‚Äôalimenter votre compte avec un¬†MoneyBeam¬†(entre deux comptes N26) ou¬†CASH26¬†(disponible uniquement en Allemagne et en Autriche). Avec ces deux m√©thodes, votre compte N26 sera cr√©dit√© imm√©diatement.
Si vous souhaitez¬†annuler un pr√©l√®vement automatique, vous pouvez le faire depuis votre application mobile N26.
*En Pologne, Su√®de, Danemark et en Norv√®ge, si vous mettez en place un pr√©l√®vement automatique avec un marchand et qu‚Äôil est factur√© dans la devise locale de votre pays, le taux de change appliqu√© (et donc le montant final d√©bit√© sur votre compte N26) est d√©fini par la banque qui re√ßoit votre paiement.

title: Warum zahle ich Kirchensteuer?
content:
Wir sind gesetzlich verpflichtet, Daten √ºber kirchensteuerliche Abz√ºge anzufordern und diese gegebenenfalls vorzunehmen. Dies wird jedes Jahr vom 1. September bis zum 31. Oktober durchgef√ºhrt.
Du hast das Recht, gegen die Weitergabe von Informationen √ºber deine Religionszugeh√∂rigkeit durch das Formular¬†‚ÄûErkl√§rung zum Sperrvermerk‚Äú(neuen Tab)¬†Berufung einzulegen. Du kannst dies vor dem 30. Juni eines jeden Jahres tun. Wenn du Widerspruch einlegst, wird dein Finanzamt dich auffordern, eine Kirchensteuererkl√§rung abzugeben.
Weitere Informationen findest du auf der Website des¬†Bundeszentralamtes f√ºr Steuern(neuen Tab).

title: How to do contactless payments work?
content:
It‚Äôs not possible to deactivate contactless payments. If you‚Äôre experiencing issues with your contactless payments, keep in mind that:¬†¬†
To activate contactless payments, you must first use your card at an ATM or payment terminal.¬†

Transactions up to ‚Ç¨50 don‚Äôt require a card PIN*. For amounts over ‚Ç¨50, you‚Äôll need to enter your card PIN.¬†
*If the merchant's payment system supports this option.
Make sure your card is held directly onto an NFC-compatible payment terminal. If you remove your card too fast or didn‚Äôt hold it close enough, just try again.¬†

N26 Metal cards only have NFC on the backside of the card. Make sure to hold the backside of the card against the terminal to use NFC (using the front won‚Äôt work).

title: ¬øCu√°ndo llega mi tarjeta?
content:
Dependiendo del destino,¬†el env√≠o puede tardar hasta 10 d√≠as laborables. El per√≠odo de entrega var√≠a en las islas de Espa√±a, Francia e Italia. Si el env√≠o falla y nos devuelven la tarjeta, te lo comunicaremos por email.
Una vez que has¬†verificado tu identidad, tu tarjeta se crear√° y se enviar√° inmediatamente. Por ello, antes de empezar es importante que te asegures de que tu direcci√≥n est√° correctamente escrita. Si necesitas cambiar tu direcci√≥n despu√©s de haber finalizado el proceso de verificaci√≥n, entonces es necesario¬†pedir una tarjeta nueva.
Si no has recibido tu tarjeta en 10 d√≠as h√°biles, estas son las opciones:
Mi direcci√≥n no es correcta. Para¬†cambiar la direcci√≥n de env√≠o¬†entra en el¬†üë§ Mi Cuenta, selecciona¬†Configuraciones¬†y despu√©s¬†Configuraci√≥n personal. Actualiza tu informaci√≥n y pide una tarjeta nueva, en caso de que ya hayas tenido una tarjeta activa anteriormente. Si esta es tu primera tarjeta, entonces contacta con nosotros por chat y te pediremos una nueva.
Han pasado m√°s de 10 d√≠as desde que verifiqu√© mi identidad. Verifica la direcci√≥n de env√≠o. Si es correcta, por favor cont√°ctanos v√≠a chat para que podamos pedirte una nueva tarjeta.
Necesito mi tarjeta de inmediato. Si el env√≠o de tu tarjeta falla por segunda vez, o bien si necesitas utilizarla con urgencia, quiz√° quieras plantearte pedir el¬†env√≠o express.
Si tu direcci√≥n contiene caracteres especiales, cont√°ctanos mediante el chat de la app.
Solo enviamos las tarjetas a direcciones residenciales (no se admiten direcciones comerciales).
En la direcci√≥n de entrega, no utilices espacios cuando escribas el c√≥digo postal.
Aseg√∫rate de que no falta informaci√≥n esencial (por ejemplo, el nombre en tu buz√≥n si vives en Alemania o el n√∫mero de edificio, n√∫mero de escalera y c√≥digo de la puerta, si corresponde). Si te vas a quedar temporalmente en alg√∫n lugar (con un amigo o en un Airbnb), aseg√∫rate de incluir el nombre en el buz√≥n que pertenece al inquilino principal del departamento.
Si te vas a mudar a alg√∫n lugar y esta es tu primera tarjeta, aseg√∫rate de seleccionar el pa√≠s y la direcci√≥n a donde te mudar√°s y deseas recibir tu tarjeta N26.

title: Wie investiert N26 mein Geld?
content:
Wir streben an, die Einlagen unserer Kunden auch f√ºr Kredite an unsere Kunden zur Verf√ºgung zu stellen (sofern diese √ºber eine entsprechende Bonit√§t verf√ºgen). F√ºr die nicht im Kundengesch√§ft ben√∂tigte Liquidit√§t ist unsere Anlagestrategie risikoarm.
Wir legen das Geld unserer Kunden kurzfristig bei der Deutschen Bundesbank und bei anderen europ√§ischen Banken im Euroraum mit ausschlie√ülich guten Risikoklassen an. Daneben refinanzieren wir √∂ffentlich-rechtliche Kunden haupts√§chlich in Deutschland (St√§dte und Gemeinden) und investieren in Euro-Staatsanleihen.
Wir sind kein Handelsbuchinstitut. Das hei√üt, wir betreiben keinen Handel zur kurzfristigen Gewinnerzielung.
Und wir t√§tigen auch keine Spekulationsgesch√§fte, weder auf Nahrungsmittel, Devisen, Bitcoins, noch auf andere Anlageklassen.

title: Why hasn't my referral bonus arrived?
content:
Once your friend has completed all the eligibility criteria of our¬†Refer a Friend Program, we'll verify your reward. You can always sign in to your account in the app or¬†WebApp(new tab)¬†to check your reward status.
In most cases the referral bonus isn‚Äôt rewarded because the invited friend hasn‚Äôt made a first Mastercard transaction of 15 EUR. Please make sure to inform your friend of these requirements.
Keep in mind that the reward process could take up to 60 days.
N26 retains the right to withhold a reward in case of suspicious activity that violates the¬†Terms and Conditions(new tab).
Currently, Friend referral rewards are only available for customers in Germany, Austria, Italy, France, Spain, Belgium, Luxembourg, Greece, Portugal, Ireland, the Netherlands, Finland, Estonia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden, Switzerland, Norway, Denmark, Poland, Iceland and Liechtenstein.

title: FATCA - Why we require certain information from our customers
content:
As a financial institution, N26 is required to report information about financial accounts held by U.S. taxpayers or by foreign entities (in which U.S. taxpayers hold a substantial ownership interest according to FATCA) to the United States Department of Treasury and the Internal Revenue Service (‚ÄúIRS‚Äù).
FATCA is an acronym for Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act and is a legislation designed to prevent tax evasion. Another purpose of FATCA is to encourage better tax compliance by preventing U.S. Persons from using foreign banks and other financial organizations in order to avoid U.S. taxation on their income and assets. You can find more information about FATCA on the IRS website(new tab).
The U.S. tax system includes U.S. citizens who are not presently residing in the U.S. In comparison. So in order for us to be able to accurately determine whether your account is to be reported to the IRS, we‚Äôll need to ask you:
Are you (also) a citizen or green card holder of the United States?¬†

Are you subject to tax in the U.S?

Being ‚Äúsubject to tax‚Äù in the U.S. does not necessarily mean that you‚Äôre also paying personal income tax in the U.S. It means that U.S. tax law requires you to file a tax return and declare your (worldwide) income to the IRS, even if you don‚Äôt end up paying any U.S. tax.

If so, what is your U.S. Taxpayer Identification Number?

As a U.S. TIN you can either use your U.S. Social Security Number (‚ÄúSSN‚Äù) or your U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN). You can find more information about TIN on the IRS' website(new tab).
Additionally, if your account shows:
A U.S. place of birth, 
A U.S. telephone number,
A standing order to the U.S.
then we are required by FATCA legislation to initially assume that you are subject to FATCA until you can specifically confirm to us otherwise.
In case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the N26 app. To do this, simply log in to the N26 app and go to:
My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Tax Information¬†

title: Comment modifier les plafonds de ma carte ?
content:
Vous pouvez facilement changer les param√®tres de votre¬†carte N26, soit depuis l‚Äôapplication mobile, soit depuis¬†votre espace personnel en ligne(nouvel onglet).
Depuis l'application mobile, allez dans G√©rer > Param√®tres de votre carte > Plafonds.
Depuis votre espace personnel en ligne, allez dans Mon Compte > Param√®tres de votre carte.
Vous pouvez :
Modifier les plafonds de votre carte
Activer ou d√©sactiver certaines options comme :
          - les retrait au distributeur
          - les retraits √† l‚Äô√©tranger
          - les paiements en ligne
Les modifications des param√®tres mentionn√©s ci-dessus prennent effet imm√©diatement et sont applicables √† toutes vos cartes N26.
Vous pouvez √©galement¬†bloquer¬†votre carte ou en commander une nouvelle, en cas de perte ou de vol par exemple.
Vous pr√©f√©rez une vid√©o plut√¥t qu'un texte? Regardez le tutoriel(nouvel onglet) sur notre cha√Æne YouTube N26 Support(nouvel onglet).

title: Wie lange dauern √úberweisungen?
content:
Alle eingehenden nationalen und internationalen SEPA-√úberweisungen werden in Echtzeit gebucht, wenn sie als Echtzeit√ºberweisungen get√§tigt werden. Echtzeit√ºberwiesungen unterliegen geltenden Bankregularien, wodurch ggf. Verz√∂gerungen auftreten k√∂nnen.
Falls die auftraggebende Bank keine Echtzeit√ºberweisungen unterst√ºtzt oder nicht diese Form der √úberweisung gew√§hlt hat, dauert die √úberweisung einen Bankarbeitstag, also bis zu zwei Werktage. Bitte beachte, dass eingehende √úberweisungen regul√§r einen Bankarbeitstag ben√∂tigen.
Wenn du also eine √úberweisung kurz vor dem Wochenende oder einem Bankfeiertag t√§tigst, dauert es etwas l√§nger, bis der Betrag dem Zahlungsempf√§nger gutgeschrieben wird. Wir wickeln unsere SEPA-√úberweisungen √ºber das europ√§ische Zahlungsverkehrssystem TARGET2(neuen Tab) ab, welches Zahlungen an Werktagen von 7:00 bis 18:00 CET verarbeitet. Abgesehen von Wochenenden arbeitet TARGET2 auch an folgenden Feiertagen nicht: 1. Januar (Neujahr), Karfreitag, Ostermontag, 1. Mai (Tag der Arbeit), 25. und 26. Dezember (Weihnachtsfeiertage).
Mit MoneyBeam kannst du Geld an andere N26-Nutzer in Echtzeit √ºberweisen. Bei √úberweisungen in Fremdw√§hrungen √ºber TransferWise variiert die Dauer (du bekommst aber eine gesch√§tztes Geldeingangsdatum angezeigt, wenn du die √úberweisung t√§tigst).
Jede √úberweisung musst du noch einmal √ºber eine Push-Nachricht in deiner App best√§tigen, bevor wir sie freigeben.
Bitte beachte: Wir akzeptieren nur Euro-√úberweisungen innerhalb des SEPA-Raums (also keine SWIFT-√úberweisungen).
Wenn deine eingehende √úberweisung au√üerhalb dieses Zeitrahmens liegt, kontaktiere bitte den Zahlungssender bzw. dessen Bank f√ºr einen Nachforschungsauftrag. Wir k√∂nnen eingehende √úberweisungen nicht √ºberpr√ºfen. Wir haben aber einige Gr√ºnde gesammelt, weshalb deine SEPA-√úberweisung oder √úberweisung in einer Fremdw√§hrung fehlgeschlagen sein k√∂nnte.

title: Wie kann ich mein Smartphone mit meinem Konto verkn√ºpfen oder trennen?
content:
Um dein N26 Konto nutzen zu k√∂nnen, brauchst du ein Smartphone: entweder ein iPhone (5s oder neuer, mindestens iOS 11) oder ein Android-Ger√§t (6.0 oder neuer - wir unterst√ºtzen keine Custom-ROMs oder Aftermarket-Firmware von Amazon Fire oder Oxygen OS). Jedes Konto kann nur mit einem einzigen Ger√§t verkn√ºpft werden.
Du musst dein Smartphone verkn√ºpfen und/oder entkn√ºpfen, wenn du dein Konto er√∂ffnest oder wenn du eine neue Telefonnummer oder ein neues Ger√§t verwendest.
Um dein Smartphone mit deinem Konto zu verkn√ºpfen, √∂ffne einfach die App auf deinem Smartphone. Du wirst aufgefordert, deine Handynummer zu best√§tigen.
Gib den 4-stelligen Code ein, den wir dir per SMS senden und schon ist dein Smartphone verkn√ºpft.
Wenn du ein neues Ger√§t verkn√ºpfen m√∂chtest, musst du aus Sicherheitsgr√ºnden die Verbindung zu deinem alten Ger√§t trennen. Das kannst du in der App unter üë§ Mein Konto, dann Einstellungen und Sicherheit tun oder in der WebApp(neuen Tab) unter üë§ Mein Konto und Sicherheitseinstellungen; falls du auf dein Smartphone keinen Zugriff mehr hast. Du erh√§ltst dann eine E-Mail mit weiteren Anweisungen.
Wenn du dich nach dem Entkn√ºpfen des alten Handys auf deinem neuen Handy in deine N26 App einloggst, erh√§ltst du 2 Codes - einen 6-stelligen Login-SMS-Code und einen 4-stelligen Pairing-SMS-Code. Mit dem Login-Code loggst du dich in dein Konto ein und mit dem Pairing-Code verkn√ºpfst du dein neues Ger√§t mit deinem Konto.

title: How does Spaces work?
content:
Set goals, create and personalize Spaces, and transfer money between them instantly. Spaces is available in the mobile and¬†WebApp(new tab).
In addition to your main account (or primary space), you can create and delete additional Spaces as often as you‚Äôd like but the number of active Spaces at any one time depends on your account type: 2 additional Spaces with an N26 or N26 Business account or up to 10 additional Spaces with N26 You, N26 Business You and N26 Metal.
Your primary account statements will include all transactions sent to a space or received from one. You can download balance statements from the confirmation page.
Only your primary space can be negative (if you are eligible for an overdraft). All other balances in Spaces cannot be negative, meaning you can only transfer what is available in a particular space.
You can only use the balance from your primary space toward your Mastercard transactions. So consider transferring money before making a purchase if needed.
Move money from one space to another by holding down on your Main Account and dragging and dropping into your space. Once the amount is confirmed the balance is updated right away.
You can lock and unlock a space at anytime from your mobile and web app. You'll only need to confirm with your confirmation PIN. If a space is locked, you‚Äôll still be able to transfer money to it. If you need to withdraw money from a locked space, you need first to unlock it.
You'll be able to hide the amount within the Space from your account's total balance. Just go into your Space, tap the three dots in the top right corner and select ‚ÄòHide space balance‚Äô.
Spaces includes a feature called Rules which will help you manage your time and your finances effectively.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: How to find my IBAN or account number?
content:
You can find your IBAN and our BIC number on your balance statements or in¬†üë§ My Account¬†from the mobile app or¬†WebApp(new tab)¬†(if you haven‚Äôt activated your card and need to¬†top up your account).
All our IBANs start with DE followed by the¬†check digits¬†(two numbers), then our¬†bank code¬†10011001, and end with your 10-digit¬†account number¬†(start at 26).
If you open your account in the UK, you won't have an IBAN, but you will find your account number and our sort code 04-00-26 in the same section.
You can easily share your information through the share button in¬†üë§ My Account. Or you can download your bank account information as a PDF by logging into the¬†WebApp(new tab)¬†and selecting the cloud icon on the top-right corner of¬†Transactions.
Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial(new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube(new tab) channel.

title: Pourquoi je ne peux pas acc√©der √† certains services ou produits ?
content:
Nous collaborons avec diff√©rents partenaires afin de proposer des services financiers innovants suppl√©mentaires. Certains de nos partenaires, tout comme N26, doivent v√©rifier votre identit√©, c‚Äôest pourquoi nous leur fournissons les informations √† notre disposition concernant votre identit√©, √† condition que vous nous ayez pr√©alablement donn√© votre accord.
Voici les raisons les plus fr√©quentes pour lesquelles vous ne pouvez pas acc√©der √† certains produits ou fonctionnalit√©s :
Vos documents d‚Äôidentit√© ont expir√© ou ne sont pas accept√©s (c‚Äôest par exemple le cas pour certains passeports qui ne disposent pas de tous les √©l√©ments de s√©curit√© n√©cessaires).
Vous √™tes¬†imposable(nouvel onglet)¬†aux Etats-Unis. Dans ce cas l√† vous ne pourrez pas utiliser nos produits d‚Äôinvestissement ou d‚Äô√©pargne. Si vous n‚Äô√™tes pas imposable aux Etats-Unis, il est possible que vous deviez changer votre num√©ro de t√©l√©phone s‚Äôil commence par le code pays nord-am√©ricain (+1). Si le probl√®me persiste, veuillez contacter notre Service Client depuis le Livechat de votre application afin que nous puissions vous aider.
Vous avez proc√©d√© √† la¬†v√©rification de votre identit√©(nouvel onglet)¬†via PostIdent (uniquement en Allemagne) lors de l‚Äôouverture de votre compte. Nous allons dans ce cas devoir r√©initialiser la v√©rification de votre identit√© que vous devrez effectuer √† nouveau pour pouvoir utiliser certains de nos produits et services. Nous vous enverrons un email √† ce sujet et nous conviendrons avec vous du moment le plus opportun pour proc√©der √† la nouvelle v√©rification de votre identit√©.
Le produit ou service en question n'est pas encore disponible dans votre pays.

title: How to revoke my loan application?
content:
N26 Credit¬†revocations are free and are possible within 14 days of signing a loan agreement.
We‚Äôll need written confirmation of your withdrawal request so it‚Äôs best to chat with us about this. We‚Äôll take it from there and let you know via email when it‚Äôs done.
Please make sure that the full amount of your credit is available on your account until the revocation is complete.
If your credit is paid out by one of our partners, please contact them directly. We partner with auxmoney (+49 211 737 100 020) in Germany and Younited Credit (+33 1 78 42 53 99) in France.

title: Why are some products and services unavailable to me?
content:
We collaborate with many partners. That‚Äôs why certain products and services require that you meet their requirements as well. The most common reasons why you wouldn‚Äôt be eligible for certain products:
Expired or unsupported identity documents (for example, certain passports due to a lack of security features).
You‚Äôre taxable in the United States. If so, you won‚Äôt be able to use certain invest or savings products. If this is not the case, contact our Customer Support via chat so we can look into your account details. You may need to switch your telephone number if it starts with a North American area code (+1).
You proved your identity using PostIdent (in Germany). We‚Äôll have to reset your account and you‚Äôll have to prove your identity again in order to use certain products and services. If this is the case, we‚Äôll email you about it and find a convenient time for you to do so.
The product or service is not yet available in your country.

title: PSD2 - Strong Customer Authentication
content:
SCA acts as an additional layer of security for all N26 customers by providing Two-Factor Authentication (2FA). This is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. You‚Äôre probably familiar with using just your personal password to sign in to your account but with Two-Factor Authentication you‚Äôll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.
When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you‚Äôll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number to confirm your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log into your N26 account. 
When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. Therefore, the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.
SCA is being introduced as part of the revised European Payments Services Directive (PSD2) which applies to all European Banks. The objective of PSD2 is to enhance the security of the customers‚Äô data and account security. Find out more about PSD2 in our dedicated article about the PSD2. 
I cannot log into my account. How do I solve this?
First, try update your phone to the newest version. If you still cannot log into your account but still have access to your registered email address, please try to reset your password. If you don‚Äôt have access to your registered email address, please contact us via our live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out. 
I lost access to my paired device. How will I be able to log into my account again?
If you lost access to your paired device but you still have access to your registered phone number, please log into your N26 account and request an authentication code. To do this:
Login to the Webapp
When prompted to confirm your login on your paired device, select Help 
Choose Send SMS Code
Once you receive the SMS code, input it into the Webapp
As you confirm the authentication code you‚Äôve completed two-factor authentication and you‚Äôll be able to pair your new device with your account again.
If you don‚Äôt have access to your registered phone number - either because you have a new phone number or your phone was lost or stolen - please contact our customer service via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out. 
What if my phone doesn‚Äôt support the latest app version?
If you have an older smartphone device that doesn‚Äôt support the latest app version,  you won‚Äôt be able to access N26 via the mobile app anymore using your phone.¬†
You can still use our Webapp to view your account, to do this you'll need to confirm your login attempt via an SMS verification code which we‚Äôll send to your account's registered phone number. 
You‚Äôll still be able to complete card transactions and cash withdrawals as normal using your Mastercard but bear in mind that you won't be able to perform any bank transfers or payments until you can confirm the transfer within the N26 app.

title: PSD2 - Secure Open Banking
content:
Payment Services Directive 2 (‚ÄúPSD2‚Äù) is a revised European directive allowing you to access your account information and initiate payments through regulated third-party providers in a safe and secure manner. 
 
This means that you can permit regulated Third Party Providers to access your account information through a dedicated interface: 
You can enable an Account Information Service (AIS) to pull together data from different bank accounts you may have, and then aggregate and manage their details in the same place through certified third-party providers.
You can securely pay at the checkout of any website that offers Payment Initiation Services (PIS). 
The data exchange is handled in the background via our partner - Token.io.
If you begin using a third-party payment service like an Account Information Service or a Payment Initiation Service, you‚Äôll be redirected to your N26 app via Token.io to confirm the access request.
In our Privacy Policy(new tab) we inform you about the purposes, involved parties and legal bases of the necessary data processing involved to fulfil our obligations as part of the revised European Payment Services Directive.
Why can't I link any Third Party Provider to my account?
If a third party provider has not integrated with our dedicated interface, the third party provider will need to integrate with our dedicated interface via our partner Token.io.
How can I revoke an individual access permission I have granted to a third party provider?
You need to contact the respective Third Party Provider and revoke the access permission directly with them.¬†
*applies to all countries in the EEA.

title: Perch√© N26 √® sicuro?
content:
Per proteggere il tuo conto, utilizziamo un‚Äôarchitettura di sicurezza a 3 livelli:
Accesso sicuro.¬†I dati di accesso dell‚Äôapp mobile e della¬†WebApp(nuova tabella)¬†sono costituiti da un nome utente e una password o dal riconoscimento delle impronte digitali/del volto (a seconda dello smartphone). Scegli una¬†password sicura¬†e non rivelare i tuoi dati di accesso a nessuno.
PIN di conferma.¬†Questo [codice a 4 cifre] √® necessario ogni volta che fai un trasferimento o colleghi/scolleghi il telefono. Lo imposti la prima volta dopo aver collegato lo smartphone al conto. Dopodich√© puoi¬†modificarlo¬†da solo nell‚Äôapp.
Messaggi push.¬†Per ogni pagamento in entrata e in uscita, verr√† inviato un messaggio push allo smartphone collegato. Viene utilizzato anche per confermare e finalizzare le tue transazioni. Abbiamo anche implementato 3D Secure per proteggerti dalle frodi online con carta.
Ogni volta ci contatti ti chiederemo alcune domande di sicurezza per assicurarci che sei realmente tu. Non ti chiederemo mai il numero della tua carta di debito, il codice di sicurezza della carta (CVV), password, o il tuo PIN della carta o di conferma.
Abbiamo anche fatto progressi per proteggere i tuoi dati:¬†custodiamo¬†meno informazioni possibili su di te, solo finch√® siamo legalmente obbligati, e cancelliamo i dati quando non sono pi√π richiesti per un prodotto o un servizio. Puoi¬†scaricare i tuoi dati personali¬†fino a 6 mesi dopo aver chiuso il tuo account. Puoi trovare pi√π informazioni sulla nostra¬†politica di privacy(nuova tabella).

title: N26 Forms
content:
List of important forms:
Direct Deposit Form(new tab): To be used when your employer is requesting a form in order to¬† set up a payroll direct deposit into your N26 account.
Affidavit for Unauthorized ACH Debit(new tab): To be used when you are filing a claim for unauthorized ACH debits.
Affidavit for Unauthorized Transactions(new tab): To be used when you are filing a claim for unauthorized transactions.

The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Why did my online purchase fail?
content:
Some reasons why your online payment failed:
If you are unable to confirm the push message within 5 minutes, simply restart the payment process on the merchant's website.
If you do not receive a push message, please make sure that your smartphone is connected and that push messages are enabled on your smartphone.
Ensure that online payments and payments abroad are enabled in your card settings.
A stable internet connection is required.
If you are using an iOS device, make sure you turn off the Do Not Disturb mode.
If the amount on the merchant's site is different from the one stated in the push message, this may be due to the conversion of a foreign currency into euros.
Make sure that you disable any Adblockers running on your browser.
Your Maestro card can‚Äôt be used for online purchases.

title: Why is my transfer still pending in the N26 app?
content:
You‚Äôll need your Confirmation PIN to finalize all transfers whether¬†MoneyBeam, standing orders, or¬†CASH26. Your transfer will remain pending until you either¬†Confirm¬†or¬†Cancel¬†it via push message in the app.
Your Confirmation PIN differs from your¬†card PIN¬†but you can use the same number for both. You‚Äôll be asked to choose your Confirmation PIN after¬†connecting your smartphone¬†(whereas you select a card PIN after activating your card).
If you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, your PIN will be blocked for security reasons. You can restore your PIN by¬†changing it¬†in the app: go to¬†üë§ My Account¬†then tap¬†Settings¬†and¬†Security. Then tap¬†Change Confirmation PIN¬†(iPhone) or¬†Reset Confirmation PIN¬†(Android).

title: How long do transfers take?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Applies to all regions except the UK
All domestic and international incoming SEPA transfers are instant if they come from a bank that supports instant transfers and the sender selects this option. Banking regulation applies to SEPA instant transfers and may delay the transfer in case it needs additional monitoring.
In case the sender bank doesn‚Äôt offer instant transfers or the sender doesn‚Äôt choose this option, the transfer will be completed within one banking day. However, due to the opening times of the participating banks, one banking day may stretch to two working days. Please, note that outgoing SEPA transfers are completed within one banking day.
If the transfer is not instant, keep in mind that if a transfer has been made right before a weekend or bank holiday, the time frame will be extended. We send our SEPA payment orders through TARGET2(new tab). It‚Äôs open to process payments every working day from 07:00 to 18:00 CET. The system is closed on the following days:
1 January (New Year's Day), Good Friday, Easter Monday, 1 May (Labour Day), 25 December (Christmas Day), 26 December.
With¬†MoneyBeam, you can transfer money to other N26 customers instantly and you can also receive instant MoneyBeam requests from banks that supports instant transfers. Times vary for¬†foreign currency transfers¬†with TransferWise (but you‚Äôll see an estimated transfer time when you create the transfer).
You'll need to confirm each type of transfer via¬†push message¬†in the app before we send anything out.
Please note: we only accept transfers in EUR via SEPA (that means no SWIFT transfers).
If your incoming transfer is outside of these estimated time frames, please contact the sender (bank) for a payment investigation. We can't investigate incoming transfers. But we've collected a few reasons why your¬†SEPA¬†or¬†foreign currency¬†transfer could have failed.

title: Wie verwalte ich meine Sichtbarkeit als N26 Nutzer?
content:
Wenn du als N26 Nutzer sichtbar bist, kannst du alle Funktionen deiner App zu nutzen, wie z.B. Shared Spaces oder Echtzeit-Transaktionen mit MoneyBeam oder Geldanfragen. Dazu gleicht N26 deine Kontaktdaten mit denen anderer N26 Nutzer ab.
Hier erf√§hrst du, wie das funktioniert und wie du deine Sichtbarkeit als N26 Nutzer verwalten kannst. 
Alle deine Kontakte, die ein N26 Konto haben, kannst du in der in-App Kontaktliste einsehen. Ebenso wirst du in der Kontaktliste von anderen N26 Nutzern, die deine Kontaktdaten haben, angezeigt. Deine Kontaktliste wird von N26 nicht dauerhaft gespeichert und nur f√ºr Nutzung der entsprechenden Funktionen verwendet.
Deine Sichtbarkeit als N26 Nutzer kannst du in deiner App verwalten unter üë§ Mein Konto > Einstellungen > Pers√∂nliche Einstellungen > Pers√∂nliche Daten. Hier kannst du dein H√§kchen setzen bei "Allow my contacts who are also N26 users to find me easily for transfers".

title: Come posso creare Regole per i miei Spaces?
content:
Nell‚Äôambito dei tuoi Spaces puoi decidere le tue Regole: puoi preimpostare trasferimenti periodici verso i tuoi Spaces e risparmiare tempo e denaro in modo molto semplice.
Se vuoi impostare una Regola dalla webapp, effettua un bonifico con Spaces e poi seleziona ‚ÄúRipeti questa operazione‚Äù. Per cancellare una regola, clicca sui 3 puntini indicanti le impostazioni. Da l√¨, vedrai tutte le regole attive. Clicca sull‚Äôicona del cestino per cancellare la regola. Se vuoi modificare una regola esistente, puoi semplicemente eliminarla dalle impostazioni dello Space in cui l‚Äôhai creata e crearne una nuova.
¬†Dai dispositivi Android effettua un bonifico e seleziona ‚ÄúRipeti questa operazione‚Äù. In alternativa, dalla sezione Spaces, seleziona i tre puntini e poi ‚Äúcrea regola‚Äù. Da questo punto, segui i passaggi successivi fino a confermare le informazioni inserite.
Dai dispositivi iOS, entra nella sezione Spaces e seleziona ‚Äúcrea regola‚Äù. Baster√† inserire le informazioni richieste e confermare.
¬†Ti informiamo, inoltre, che le regole per i tuoi Spaces ed eventuali ordini di bonifici verranno elaborati allo stesso orario (0100 UTC) se impostate per lo stesso giorno. Accertati di avere fondi sufficienti per coprire queste transazioni ed evitare che non vengano eseguite.¬†
Se non riesci a coprire l‚Äôimporto richiesto, baster√† impostare le transazioni in date differenti in base alle tue priorit√†.

title: ¬øC√≥mo dar mi opini√≥n o sugerir un nuevo producto?
content:
Enviamos encuestas con bastante frecuencia para saber tu opini√≥n, y la participaci√≥n siempre es voluntaria y an√≥nima. Para preguntas individuales o sugerencias puedes enviarnos tu opini√≥n a¬†ideas@n26.com(pesta√±a nueva). Te estaremos agradecidos si puedes dedicar un par de minutos para ayudarnos a mejorar a√∫n m√°s.
Y si alguna vez te sientes insatisfecho con nuestros productos o servicios, tambi√©n puedes presentar una queja.

title: Quando arriver√† la mia carta?
content:
Le¬†consegne richiedono fino a 15 giorni lavorativi. La consegna potrebbe richiedere pi√π tempo in alcune aree specifiche dei seguenti paesi: Estonia, Grecia, Italia, Olanda, Portogallo, Slovacchia e Spagna. 
Prima di ordinare una carta, ti invitiamo a considerare quanto segue: :
Se una consegna fallisce e la tua carta viene restituita a noi, ti contatteremo via email.
Se sono trascorsi meno di 15 giorni lavorativi dal tuo ordine, ti preghiamo di attendere prima di contattare il nostro servizio clienti. 
Se sono trascorsi pi√π di 15 giorni lavorativi dal tuo ordine, ti chiediamo di controllare e, se necessario, di modificare il tuo indirizzo di spedizione, accedendo a üë§ Il mio Conto > Impostazioni > Impostazioni personali > indirizzo di spedizione.
Se il tuo indirizzo di spedizione non era corretto e si tratta della tua prima carta, contattaci via chat e ti aiuteremo ad effettuare un nuovo ordine. 
Se il tuo indirizzo di spedizione non era corretto e hai gi√† avuto una carta attiva, puoi¬†riordinare la carta tramite l'app.
Se il tuo indirizzo di spedizione √® corretto, potrebbero esserci stati dei problemi con la spedizione. In questo caso, contattaci via chat e saremo lieti di assisterti. 
La produzione e la spedizione della carta avviene dopo aver completato con successo la verifica della tua identit√†. Se hai aperto un conto Metal, ricorda di effettuare una ricarica dopo aver completato l‚Äôapertura del conto. La carta verr√† spedita dopo l'addebito della prima mensilit√† del tuo conto Metal.¬†

Se la spedizione della tua carta non dovesse andare a buon fine o se hai bisogno di usarla con urgenza, puoi scegliere l'opzione¬†consegna Express (con costi aggiuntivi), che impiega 3 giorni lavorativi. Questa opzione non √® disponibile per la spedizione della carta Metal.
Se il tuo indirizzo contiene caratteri speciali, contattaci tramite la chat in-app.
La carta pu√≤ essere consegnata solo a indirizzi residenziali (non si accettano indirizzi commerciali).
Non digitare spazi quando immetti il codice postale per l‚Äôindirizzo di consegna.
Assicurati che non manchino informazioni importanti (ad es. il nome sulla tua cassetta della posta o il numero dell‚Äôabitazione). Se sei in un‚Äôabitazione temporanea (es. da un amico o con Airbnb), assicurati di includere il tuo nome sulla casella postale.
Se stai per trasferirti in un altro paese e questa √® la tua prima carta, considera i tempi di consegna prima di inserire l'indirizzo di spedizione.

title: How can I protect my account?
content:
The security of your account and your personal data is our top priority.
If you ever feel that your N26 login may be compromised or that someone is trying to initiate a chat on your behalf, it‚Äôs crucial to immediately change your N26 account password. You can do so via both our mobile and web applications. 
On the web:
Log in and click on ‚ÄúMy Account‚Äù.
Click on ‚ÄúSecurity Settings‚Äù. 
Enter your current password and enter a new (new tab)secure password(new tab). Please don‚Äôt reveal your login details to anyone. 
Click on ‚ÄúSet new password‚Äù.
In the mobile application:
Log in and go to ‚ÄúMy Account" > "Settings" > "Security‚Äù. 
Tap on ‚ÄúChange login Password‚Äù. Please choose a secure password(new tab). Please don‚Äôt reveal your login details to anyone.
It is important to remember that, as the account holder, you and only you should create and have access to your login details.  
If you believe that your account has been compromised or tampered with in any way, you can get in touch with us immediately by phone at 1-888-N26-0-N26 (1-888-626-0626) or chat with us directly from the N26 mobile application or WebApp(new tab). 
The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: I represent a bank or an authority and need to contact N26
content:
If you represent the authorities or work for another bank, you can get in touch via the following channels:
Email:¬†officials@n26.com(new tab)
Fax: + 49 (0) 30 2201178 40 
Our opening hours are Monday to Friday from 09:00-18:00 (except bank and Berlin holidays). You can request a call-back via email or fax at any time. We try to call you back on the same day.
Please note that any customer inquiries sent to the above address or fax number will automatically be deleted.
If you have a customer service related question and need to contact us, visit our article How to contact N26?(new tab) or open a chat at the bottom of this article.

title: How to make a SEPA transfer?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è You can send debit transfers to any country within the SEPA zone (if the receiving bank accepts Euros).
Outgoing debit transfers can be made in either the N26 app or our Web app.
From the Home screen choose the Actions tab,

Select Send Money followed by Bank Transfer and then ‚Äúadd a new recipient‚Äù,

Enter the recipient's name and IBAN and select Continue,

Choose the amount and select Next,

Add a message if required or select Skip It,

Check the Transfer Review screen (which sums up the transfer),

Here you can also schedule the date of your transfer and save it as a standing order,

Press send and confirm with your confirmation PIN.
You‚Äôll then need to either Confirm or Cancel the transfer via push notification in the app from your paired device.
Once the transfer was confirmed in the mobile app, we can't reverse it or change the recipient's details.
If you cannot confirm your debit transfer within the app you need to:
Ensure that you have a stable internet connection.
Ensure that your mobile phone has push notifications enabled. This is done through the phone settings, not in our app.
Ensure that you use your paired device.
Once your debit transfer is sent you‚Äôll be able to download a PDF confirmation of it. To do so:
Go to your Transactions list.

Locate and select the specific debit transfer.

Scroll down to the Transaction Information and tap PDF by selecting Transfer Confirmation.

content:
Puedes bloquear y desbloquear tus tarjetas cuando quieras desde la app, ve a¬†Gestionar¬†y selecciona¬†Configuraci√≥n de tarjetas. Una vez dentro puedes decidir si quieres limitarla temporalmente o deshabilitar las retiradas de efectivo en cajero, los pagos online o bloquear completamente la tarjeta.
Tienes el control absoluto sobre tu tarjeta y puedes protegerte ante¬†transacciones no autorizadas. Deber√≠as bloquear la tarjeta inmediatamente si algo te resulta sospechoso. Siempre puedes desbloquearla m√°s tarde.

Si no tienes acceso a la app de tu m√≥vil ni a la WebApp, tambi√©n puedes pedir que bloqueemos tu tarjeta o tu cuenta llamando al +34 910 480 660.

content:

You can order your first¬†Maestro(new tab) card free of charge directly in the app by tapping¬†üë§ My Account¬†then¬†Cards settings. Swipe left on your card until you see the Maestro card and tap¬†Order.
You'll only see the option if you live in Germany, Austria or the Netherlands and have received a transfer of at least 100 ‚Ç¨ from one of these 3 countries. 
Once ordered your card should arrive within 10 working days. For more information about the delivery timeline please go to our dedicated article.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: Why can‚Äôt I get a Basiskonto?
content:
Under some circumstances, N26 is allowed to reject your Basiskonto request. That‚Äôs the case if you:
Live outside of a supported country.
Already have an N26 bank account or another bank account in Germany and can use it to its full extent. 
Were convicted of a crime against the bank, its employees, or its customers within the past 3 years. 
Have already maintained a Basiskonto at N26 in the past that was closed due to prohibited usage or a negative balance. 
You didn‚Äôt meet minimum requirements in accordance to the Money Laundering Act and the Credit Services Act.

content:

If you want to reach out, you can open a chat with us directly within the mobile or WebApp, or from certain Support Center(new tab) articles.¬†As an online bank we don't have branches.

Our chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.
