title: PSD2 - Autenticaci√≥n Reforzada de Clientes
content:
SCA act√∫a como capa de seguridad adicional para los clientes de N26, ya que proporciona dos factores de autenticaci√≥n. Esta autenticaci√≥n se basa en el uso de dos o m√°s elemento de seguridad. Probablemente est√°s familiarizado con el inicio de sesi√≥n utilizando tu contrase√±a, pero con los dos factores de autenticaci√≥n, vas a necesitar la confirmaci√≥n desde el dispositivo vinculado o un c√≥digo por SMS. 
Cuando inicies sesi√≥n en tu cuenta de N26 desde la web app o un dispositivo no vinculado, recibir√°s un notificaci√≥n emergente en tu dispositivo vinculado o puedes solicitar un c√≥digo SMS a tu n√∫mero registrado. Esto asegurar√° que solo t√∫ puedes entrar en tu cuenta. 
Cuando inicies sesi√≥n desde tu dispositivo vinculado, los dos factores de autenticaci√≥n ya est√°n funcionando, por lo tanto este proceso sigue siendo igual.
SCA se introduce como parte de la Directiva de Servicios de Pagos Europeos al que los bancos europeos deben acogerse. El objetivo de PSD2 es aumentar la seguridad de nuestros clientes, sus cuentas e informaci√≥n. Puedes leer m√°s informaci√≥n acerca de esto en nuestro art√≠culo sobre PSD2. 
No puedo iniciar sesi√≥n en mi cuenta. ¬øC√≥mo lo puedo resolver?
Si no puedes iniciar sesi√≥n en la cuenta, pero a√∫n tienes acceso a tu email registrado, intenta restablecer la contrase√±a. Si no tienes acceso a tu email registrado, contactanos por chat y estaremos encantados de ayudarte. 
Ya no tengo acceso a mi dispositivo vinculado. ¬øC√≥mo puedo iniciar sesi√≥n en mi cuenta?
Si has perdido el acceso a tu dispositivo vinculado pero tienes acceso a tu n√∫mero de tel√©fono registrado, inicia sesi√≥n en tu cuenta de N26 y solicita un c√≥digo de vinculaci√≥n. Para ello haz lo siguiente:
Inicia sesi√≥n en la  WebApp
Cuando vayas a confirmar el acceso en tu dispositivo vinculado selecciona ''Ayuda''. 
Selecciona ''Enviar SMS''.
Cuando hayas recibido el c√≥digo por SMS, introd√∫celo en la WebApp. 
Cuando confirmes el c√≥digo ya tendr√°s los dos factores de autenticaci√≥n autom√°ticamente y podr√°s vincular tu nuevo dispositivo con la cuenta. 
Si no tienes acceso a tu tel√©fono registrado (bien por tienes un nuevo n√∫mero o porque has perdido el tel√©fono), cont√°ctanos por chat y estaremos encantados de ayudarte.
¬øQu√© pasa si dispositivo no es compatible con la nueva versi√≥n?
Si tienes un smartphone m√°s antiguo que no es compatible con la nueva versi√≥n de la app, no podr√°s acceder a la app N26 desde ese dispositivo.
Puedes seguir utilizando tu Mastercard como hasta ahora y acceder a tu cuenta iniciando sesi√≥n desde la Web App N26, para ello tienes que confirmar el inicio de sesi√≥n con el SMS de verificaci√≥n que enviaremos a tu dispositivo vinculado. Lo enviaremos al n√∫mero de tel√©fono que tengas en la secci√≥n Mi Cuenta de tu app. Ten en cuenta que no podr√°s hacer transferencias ni otras operaciones desde el navegador si no confirmas desde el dispositivo vinculado.

title: How to get your COVID-19 stimulus payment
content:
During times of uncertainty, we know managing your finances can be challenging. Thankfully, the U.S. COVID-19 stimulus package for the CARES Act is rolling out to those eligible and will assist during these unprecedented times.

Submit your N26 account and routing number to the IRS to get your stimulus payment via direct deposit. Here‚Äôs how:
1. Find your N26 account and routing number by tapping the ‚ÄúMy Account‚Äù icon on the top right corner of the¬†N26 mobile¬†application.
2. Enter your N26 account information on the IRS¬†Get My Payment website(new tab).
Please note that our Customer Support team does not have information on the status of stimulus package payments. Check the¬†IRS website(new tab)¬†for the most accurate and up-to-date information. 
We hope you are staying safe and looking after those close to you.

title: Why was I charged more than expected?
content:
All transactions take place in real-time. We'll alert you when any incoming or outgoing transaction happens via push message.
Sometimes a transaction could look suspicious because the final debited amount can differ from the original transaction amount for a few reasons:
A merchant blocks a higher amount for a deposit (for example, at a gas station, or a car rental or hotel booking), and the difference is credited to your account once the deposit is no longer required.
Changes in exchange rates may result in slight differences in the total for transactions made in foreign currencies.
In both cases, we don‚Äôt charge interest for the difference in amounts.
But if you‚Äôre certain that a transaction is unauthorized by you, we could help¬†get your money back.

title: How to keep track of my daily spending?
content:
We automatically sort¬†your transactions¬†and display our findings in¬†Statistics¬†(top-right corner of the mobile app) by sorting your:
Categories: We collect information on retailers and payment reasons in order to improve our categorization (such as ATM, Food & Groceries, or Shopping). For example, if you send a MoneyBeam with the reference text Lunch, we‚Äôll put it in the Bars & Restaurants category. If you feel like a category doesn‚Äôt fit, you can just change it by selecting the transaction and choosing a category from the drop-down list.

Hashtags: We‚Äôve also added default hashtags for transaction times (#weekend), types of transactions (#books), or locations of purchases (#berlin). You can further sort your transactions by adding your own hashtags: tap on a transaction and then the pencil icon to add tags (such as #portugal_trip or #everymonth) or remove unwanted tags.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: How to manage my visibility as an N26 user?
content:
To grant you access to all our in-app features, N26 matches your contact data with other N26 users.
In order to manage your consent to be seen as a N26 user, you can simply go to üë§ My Account in the app and selecting Settings then Personal Settings and Personal information. Then just check or uncheck the box ‚ÄúI agree to be identifiable for other users as N26 customer‚Äù.
All of your contacts who have an N26 account set to visible will show up in the in-app contact list. Similarly, you‚Äôll also appear in the list of other N26 customers who have your contact information. Your contact list is not permanently stored by N26 and is only used when accessing the respective N26 feature.
You can access to all our in-app features,¬†e.g.¬†MoneyBeam, which carries out real-time transactions without¬†typing in a 22-digit IBAN, but only by selecting a name from your contact list. Vice versa, you can also request money from people in your contact list who then only have to accept (or decline) your request. Also, being visible¬†enables you to use Shared Spaces, a sub-account, which you can share with other N26 users¬†selected from your contact list.

title: ¬øC√≥mo recuperar mi dinero en caso de fraude?
content:
Si no reconoces alguna transacci√≥n o est√°s seguro de que t√∫ no la has autorizado, bloquear tu tarjeta no ser√° suficiente. En este caso deber√≠as hacer lo siguiente inmediatamente:
Pedir una nueva tarjeta e indicar que la antigua ha sido robada. Por favor, rompe la tarjeta cort√°ndola con unas tijeras, por ejemplo. Tanto el chip, la antena NFC como la banda magn√©tica deben estar cortadas en pedazos.
Despu√©s rellena el formulario de disputa (en¬†espa√±ol(pesta√±a nueva)¬†o en¬†ingl√©s(pesta√±a nueva)). Desde ah√≠ haremos todo lo que podamos para recuperar tu dinero.
Puedes seguir utilizando tu cuenta bancaria para transacciones antes de que llegue la nueva tarjeta. Si est√°s en Alemania o Austria, tambi√©n puedes utilizar las retiradas de efectivo mediante¬†CASH26(pesta√±a nueva).
Debes tener en cuenta que los cambios en el¬†importe final¬†de un cargo no necesariamente tienen por qu√© ser fraude.

title: Why does N26 do checks on transactions?
content:
We have the responsibility to run routine checks on accounts and transactions in order to ensure your account‚Äôs security (see GwG ¬ß 10(new tab)). These checks are automatically initiated by our systems.¬†
As a result, we may ask you to provide some documents. If you receive such a request, please send the requested documents via Messages from N26. There are no exceptions or evasion for such checks.¬†
This practice is a standard banking procedure and ensures the safety of our customers. Both the process and the result are confidential and handled internally. Here are some tips to speed up the process:
The document that we need you to provide will be exactly named in the message you‚Äôll receive from N26. You can send us scanned documents, pictures, or screenshots, as long as the original content of the document is easily readable. Please make sure to also provide a detailed description.¬†
Be precise in your answers, details, and documents. After we receive your required proof and description, we will let you know if your reply fulfills our check. In a few cases, we might ask for further clarification which could prolong the process.
Reply as soon as possible, always before the deadline stated in the message you received from N26. Use that email to reply and send attachments.¬†
Our Customer Support doesn‚Äôt have any additional information on this subject.
You must provide valid documentation depending on your situation.

 Find here some examples:
You've received financial help from your family to complete projects or have inherited land or money from deceased relatives.
A granting/loan contract, an official document of inheritance, or an official document of the source of the loan (such as the sales documents of a sold property to finance the loan or bank statements of granting relatives).
You've sold a property or your shares on the stock market.
The contract showing the agreed transactions or the official notarial documentation of the transfer of property.
You've received or sent money to pay bills or buy a product.
Documents showing the balance statements confirming the source of this money or documents showing the use of the money and its purpose.
You've received a final payout from your previous employer.
Documents proving the end of your employment, detailing the payment and/or a bank statement from your previous employer.

content:
‚ÑπÔ∏èVerf√ºgbar in Deutschland, √ñsterreich, Frankreich, Spanien, Italien, Belgien, Estland, Finnland, Irland, Litauen, Luxemburg, Niederlande, Portugal, Slowakei, Slowenien, Polen, Schweden, D√§nemark, Norwegen, Island, Liechtenstein.
Wenn du bereits ein N26 Standard-Konto hast oder¬†N26 You  Mitglied bist, kannst du in der App auf N26 Metal upgraden: 
Um dich zu upgraden, logge dich einfach in die App ein, tippe auf den "Entdecken" am unteren Bildschirmrand und w√§hle dann "Entdecke N26 You".¬†
Du kannst zwischen einer Karte in Quarzrosa, Platingrau oder Carbonschwarz w√§hlen.
Nachdem du deine bevorzugte¬†Versandmethode¬†und die Farbe (Quarzrosa, Platingrau oder Carbonschwarz) ausgew√§hlt hast, musst du nur noch die N26 Metal¬†AGB(neuen Tab)¬†akzeptieren und den Auftrag mit deiner¬†Best√§tigungs-PIN¬†abschlie√üen. Schon ist deine Karte auf dem Weg!
Standardlieferungen dauern bis zu 10 Werktage.
Der Mitgliedsbeitrag von 16,90 ‚Ç¨ wird jeden Monat von deinem Konto abgebucht, gez√§hlt ab dem Tag deines Upgrades.

Alle K√§ufe und Reisen, die du mit deiner N26 You Mastercard bezahlt hast, bleiben versichert.
Wenn du bereits N26 You Mitglied bist, musst du die You Geb√ºhren nicht zus√§tzlich zahlen.
Du kannst eine zus√§tzlich N26 You Karte f√ºr eine einmalige Geb√ºhr von 14‚Ç¨ in deiner N26 App bestellen.

title: Will my direct debit go through if I'm low on funds?
content:
If your balance can‚Äôt cover a direct debit* when it‚Äôs due, it‚Äôll bounce and you‚Äôll be charged a¬†‚Ç¨3 fee. And if you have a negative account balance, you'll be charged an overdraft interest of 8.9%. It‚Äôs not possible to delay a direct debit.
To avoid this fee in the future, you can instantly check whether you‚Äôre eligible for an¬†Overdraft¬†directly in the app (available in Germany and Austria).
*For Poland, Sweden, Denmark, and Norway only: if you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and ultimate amount that is collected from us.

title: Wie kann ich mein Konto schlie√üen?
content:
Um dein Konto zu schlie√üen, schicke uns eine E-Mail an support@n26.com von deiner registrierten E-Mail-Adresse oder kontaktiere uns im Live Chat mit folgenden Informationen:
Eine Erkl√§rung, ob du dein Konto zu einem bestimmten Datum oder dem n√§chstm√∂glichen Zeitpunkt k√ºndigen m√∂chtest
Deinen vollst√§ndigen Namen
Deine N26 IBAN
Falls dein Kontostand positiv ist oder du noch Guthaben in deinen Spaces hast, brauchen wir zus√§tzlich eine SEPA IBAN auf die wir dein Restguthaben √ºberweisen k√∂nnen.
Die folgende Einverst√§ndniserkl√§rung, damit wir dir deine K√ºndigungsbest√§tigung an deine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse schicken d√ºrfen: ‚ÄúHiermit best√§tige ich, dass N26 mir meine personenbezogenen Daten an meine registrierte E-Mail-Adresse schicken darf.‚Äù Alternativ k√∂nnen wir dir deine K√ºndigungsbest√§tigung per Post schicken, aber beachte bitte, dass es auf diesem Weg etwas l√§nger dauert.
Oder du kannst unser¬†K√ºndigungsformular(neuen Tab)¬†verwenden.
Ein paar Dinge, die du bei der Schlie√üung deines Kontos beachten solltest:
Am schnellsten kannst du dein Konto schlie√üen, indem du eventuelles Restguthaben selbst auf ein anderes Konto √ºberweist. Wenn dein Kontostand negativ ist, zahle Geld auf dein Konto ein.
Alle ausstehenden Geb√ºhren sind sofort f√§llig. Darin enthalten sind Geb√ºhren f√ºr Expresslieferungen und N26 You oder N26 Metal (falls zutreffend).
Zerst√∂re deine Karten mit einer Schere oder einem Aktenvernichter. Der Chip, die NFC-Antenne und der Magnetstreifen m√ºssen in St√ºcke geschnitten und separat entsorgt werden.

title: Wie exportiere ich eine Liste meiner Transaktionen?
content:
Unsere¬†WebApp(neuen Tab)¬†erm√∂glicht dir die Suche innerhalb deiner Transaktionen. Du kannst auch eine Historie deiner Transaktionen im CSV-Format herunterladen. Um deine Transaktionsliste zu exportieren:
Klicke auf das Cloud-Symbol in der oberen rechten Ecke √ºber deiner Transaktionsliste, um zu den Downloads zu gelangen

Unter CSV kannst du das Start- und Enddatum angeben und CSV herunterladen w√§hlen
Du kannst deine Transaktionen auch nach¬†Kategorien und Hashtags¬†in der App sortieren.
So kannst du deine (vorl√§ufigen und vergangenen) Kontoausz√ºge einsehen und als PDF herunterladen:
In der¬†WebApp(neuen Tab): Vom Hauptmen√º¬†Transaktionen, klicke auf die Wolke in der oberen rechten Ecke, um zu¬†Downloads¬†zu kommen. Klicke dann auf¬†Kontoausz√ºge.

In der Smartphone-App: Tippe im Hauptbildschirm auf die drei Punkte am oberen rechten Bildschirmrand und w√§hle Kontoausz√ºge.

title: How to declare my N26 account for my taxes in France?
content:
(Applies to all French residents)
According to the French General Tax Code, all French residents are required to declare any bank accounts they have opened, used, or closed within the year of declaring an income. This includes your N26 bank account. To do this:
In your tax return, check the box Foreign account opened, used or closed (8UU) (Compte √©tranger ouvert, utilis√© ou ferm√©).
Complete the Cerfa n¬∞ 3916(new tab) form and attach it to your tax return.

title: How to use Moneybeam?
content:
MoneyBeam allows you to send money to your smartphone‚Äôs contacts without knowing their bank account details. In order to send a MoneyBeam, log into the app:
From the Home screen choose the Actions tab,

Tap Send Money followed by the MoneyBeam option,

Either select a contact from your phone‚Äôs contact list or add a recipient manually, using their phone number or email address. For this to work, the recipient has to be visible as an N26 customer,

Enter the amount and a reference text,

Confirm with your Confirmation PIN and the push message you receive.
N26 customers will receive the transfer instantly. You can send up to ‚Ç¨1.000 to other N26 customers within a 24-hour period.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: Was sind Shared Spaces?
content:
Mit Shared Spaces kannst du ganz einfach Geld mit anderen N26 Nutzern teilen und es gemeinsam nutzen. Ob ihr einen gemeinsamen Urlaub plant, Rechnungen teilen wollt oder ein Geburtstagsgeschenk f√ºr eure Liebsten organisieren m√∂chtet - mit diesen Unterkonten ist es m√∂glich.
Premium-Kunden (N26 You, Business You oder Metal) k√∂nnen einen Shared Space erstellen und andere Teilnehmer dazu einladen.
Alle N26 Nutzer k√∂nnen teilnehmen, unabh√§ngig von ihren Kontotypen.
Dem Besitzer geh√∂ren alle Gelder innerhalb des Shared Space.
Der Besitzer kann bis zu 10 Teilnehmer zu einem Space einladen und entfernen.
Wie auch bei unseren anderen Spaces, haben Shared Spaces keine eigene IBAN oder Bankkarte.

title: How do I pair my smartphone to my N26 account?
content:
In order to use your N26 account, you will need a compatible phone:
iPhone 5s or newer,
Android 5.0 or newer
Once you create an account, you will need to pair it with your phone. Only one phone can be paired per account. In order to pair your phone to your account, follow these steps:
Open the N26 mobile application on your phone.
You will be asked to confirm your phone number.
We will send a 4-digit code via SMS to the phone number you provided.
Enter the 4-digit code to complete pairing.

The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: How to earn money by inviting friends to N26?
content:
You receive ‚Ç¨15 every time you successfully refer a friend to N26 (up to ‚Ç¨1500 maximum). 
You can start inviting friends as soon as you have access to your account (in the app or the¬†Web app(new tab)).
To receive your reward your friend must meet all our requirements:
Complete their sign up using your referral link or personal code.
Activate their Mastercard.
Complete 1 (in-store, online or ATM) transaction with their Mastercard worth a minimum of ‚Ç¨15.
To invite friends:
Log into the N26 app,
From the Home screen, go to the Explore tab,
Select Refer friends,
Tap on your Referral Code to copy it and select one of the options available for sharing,
Optionally, you can write a message to your friend or use the default,
Tap Send!
Once your friend has fulfilled the requirements, you'll receive the bonus within 60 days.¬†You can check the status of your referral bonus in the mobile app or N26 Web.
If your referral bonus hasn‚Äôt arrived yet, we‚Äôve also collected a¬†few reasons why.
*The link does not expire and it can be used at any time. Personal invite codes and links should only be used for personal and non-commercial purposes. This means you can share your invite link with your personal connections via social media as long as you are the primary content owner. N26 has the right to cancel the referral program at any time.
Currently,¬†Friend referral¬†rewards are only available for customers in Germany, Austria, Italy, France, Spain, Belgium, Luxembourg, Greece, Portugal, Ireland, the Netherlands, Finland, Estonia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden, Switzerland, Norway, Denmark, Poland, Iceland and Liechtenstein.
You can find more information in the Refer a Friend Program¬†T&Cs(new tab).

title: PSD2 - Autenticazione Forte del Cliente
content:
L‚ÄôAutenticazione Forte del Cliente (SCA) √® uno strumento che garantisce un ulteriore livello di sicurezza ai titolari di conto N26 attraverso l‚Äôautenticazione a due fattori. Questa procedura si basa sull‚Äôuso di due o pi√π elementi di sicurezza. Hai gi√† familiarit√† con la procedura di accesso al conto attraverso l‚Äôinserimento della password personale. Con l‚Äôautenticazione a due fattori avrai bisogno di confermare l‚Äôaccesso tramite un dispositivo associato oppure un codice che riceverai via sms.¬†¬†¬†
Quando eseguirai l‚Äôaccesso al tuo conto N26 da web app oppure da un dispositivo non associato, ti verr√† richiesto di confermare una notifica push sul tuo dispositivo associato. In alternativa, potrai richiedere la ricezione di un codice via sms sul numero di telefono registrato con noi e confermare l‚Äôaccesso al conto.
Questa procedura garantisce che soltanto tu possa accedere al tuo conto N26.
Quando esegui l‚Äôaccesso al conto N26 dal tuo dispositivo associato, l‚Äôautenticazione a due fattori ha luogo automaticamente. √à sufficiente accedere utilizzando le tue credenziali.
La SCA √® una misura di sicurezza che rientra nella nuova direttiva sui pagamenti (nuova tabella)(PSD2)e si applica a tutte le banche europee. L‚Äôobiettivo del PSD2 √® rafforzare la tutela dei dati del clienti e la sicurezza dei loro conti. Scopri di pi√π leggendo il nostro articolo dedicato alla PSD2.
Non riesco ad accedere al mio conto. Come posso risolvere?
Innanzitutto, aggiorna il sistema operativo del tuo telefono all‚Äôultima versione.¬†Se ancora non riesci ad accedere al conto ma hai accesso all‚Äôindirizzo email associato al conto, resetta la tua password.¬†Se non hai accesso al tuo indirizzo email, contattaci via chat. Saremo lieti di assisterti.
Non riesco ad accedere al mio dispositivo associato. Come posso eseguire il login al mio conto?
Se non puoi accedere al tuo dispositivo associato ma puoi utilizzare il numero di telefono registrato, esegui l‚Äôaccesso al conto N26 e richiedi un codice di autenticazione. Per fare questo:
Esegui l'accesso dalla webapp;
Seleziona Aiuto quando ti viene richiesto di confermare l'accesso tramite dispositivo associato
Seleziona Invia Codice Sms
Ricevuto il codice, inseriscilo nella webapp
Una volta confermato con il codice, avrai completato l‚Äôautenticazione a due fattori e potrai associare il tuo nuovo dispositivo al conto.
Se non hai accesso al tuo numero registrato perch√© hai un nuovo numero oppure non sei pi√π in possesso del telefono, contatta la nostra assistenza clienti via chat. Saremo lieti di assisterti.
Cosa posso fare se il mio telefono non supporta l‚Äôultima versione dell‚Äôapp N26?
Se hai un dispositivo che non supporta l‚Äôultima versione dell‚Äôapp, non potrai eseguire l‚Äôaccesso al conto attraverso la versione mobile dell‚Äôapp.
Potrai utilizzare la versione web per visualizzare informazioni relative al tuo conto. Per accedere sar√† necessario confermare il tuo tentativo di accesso con un codice di verifica inviato via sms sul numero di telefono associato al tuo conto.
Potrai continuare ad effettuare pagamenti e prelievi con la tua Mastercard. I trasferimenti potranno essere eseguiti solo averli confermati tramite app.

title: ¬øPor qu√© no funciona mi verificaci√≥n por foto?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†V√°lido en todas las regiones excepto Alemania
Primero aseg√∫rate de tener activada la geolocalizaci√≥n y luego revisa esta¬†gu√≠a(pesta√±a nueva)¬†para ayudarte a tomar las mejores fotos.
La mayor√≠a de las¬†verificaciones¬†por foto fallan debido a una mala calidad de imagen.
Completa el proceso en un entorno con luz y con un tel√©fono con buena c√°mara.
Si estas utilizando un dispositivo Android, aseg√∫rate de tener un buen enfoque autom√°tico.
Enciende o apaga el flash en funci√≥n de la luz que haya a tu alrededor.
S√°cate el selfie como una foto de pasaporte (la c√°mara debe estar al mismo nivel que tus ojos).
Aseg√∫rate de ser la √∫nica persona que aparece en la foto.
Comprueba tu documento.
Solo aceptamos fotos de tu documento de identidad original (las fotocopias no est√°n permitidas).
Coloca tu documento en una superficie plana y aseg√∫rate de que todos los datos est√©n visibles y legibles.
Solo aceptamos documentos de identificaci√≥n nacionales (los permisos de residencia o las licencias para conducir no valen).
El documento no puede estar da√±ado ni caducado.
Si te sacas un selfie y una foto a tu documentaci√≥n y al primer intento no sale bien, puedes volver a probar.
Una vez que el proceso de verificaci√≥n est√© completado, te enviaremos tu tarjeta MasterCard de N26. La¬†entrega¬†puede tardar hasta 10 d√≠as, o hasta 30 d√≠as si vives en alguna de las islas de Espa√±a, en Ceuta o en Melilla.
El chat est√° disponible todos los d√≠as de 07:00 a 23:00, domingos y festivos incluidos.

title: Comment fonctionne Apple Pay ?
content:
(Disponible uniquement en Allemagne, Autriche, France, Italie, Espagne, Finlande, Irlande, Islande, Gr√®ce, Liechtenstein, Portugal, Slovaquie, Luxembourg, Estonie, Belgique, Pologne, Norv√®ge, Su√®de, Danemark, Pays-bas, Suisse et au Royaume-Uni)
Apple Pay vous permet d‚Äôeffectuer des paiements sans contact avec votre t√©l√©phone mobile.
Nous avons r√©alis√© une¬†vid√©o(nouvel onglet)¬†pour vous aider √† utiliser votre carte N26 avec Apple Pay.
Si vos paiements avec Apple Pay ne fonctionnent pas, voici quelques astuces :
La r√©gion de votre iPhone doit correspondre au pays o√π votre Mastercard N26 vous a √©t√© envoy√©e (vous pouvez le v√©rifier dans les param√®tres de votre application N26).
Si vous avez perdu votre iPhone et ne le retrouvez pas en utilisant¬†Localiser mon iPhone, vous pouvez acc√©der √† iCloud et supprimer tous les appareils li√©s √† Apple Pay depuis un navigateur web sur PC ou Mac. Vous devriez √©galement activer le¬†mode Perdu¬†pour bloquer l‚Äôutilisation de votre Mastercard depuis Apple Pay. Vous pourrez toujours effectuer des paiements en magasin avec votre carte physique.
Si votre Mastercard N26 est supprim√©e par inadvertance de l‚ÄôApple Wallet, il se peut que ce soit parce que vous vous √™tes d√©connect√© de votre iCloud, avez supprim√© le mot de passe de verrouillage de votre t√©l√©phone ou Touch ID, avez r√©initialis√© votre appareil via iTunes, ou avez supprim√© tout le contenu et les param√®tres de votre appareil. Dans ces cas l√†, vous pouvez simplement ajouter √† nouveau votre carte au Wallet. Veuillez noter que votre carte ne sera pas supprim√©e si vous mettez √† jour votre syst√®me d‚Äôexploitation, si vous r√©initialisez vos param√®tres personnels ou d√©sactivez l‚Äôoption¬†Localiser mon iPhone.
Pour les achats en magasin ou en ligne, vous devez confirmer vos paiements en utilisant Touch ID ou en entrant le mot de passe de verrouillage de votre t√©l√©phone. Si vous utilisez votre Apple Watch, les confirmations de paiement se font par un double-clic sur le bouton lat√©ral. Si vous utilisez votre Mac, vous devez autoriser les paiements par Touch ID via la Touch Bar, qui se trouve dans la partie sup√©rieure droite de votre clavier.
Si vous √™tes client N26 Metal ou N26 Business You, il est possible que le visuel affich√© dans votre Apple Wallet soit celui de la carte N26 You (pour les clients Metal) ou de la carte N26 Business (pour les clients Business You). Nous travaillons actuellement sur ce sujet afin de vous apporter une solution au plus vite. Cela n'affecte en rien votre utilisation d'Apple Pay avec les conditions du compte premium. 
Assurez-vous que vos appareils soient compatibles avec Apple Pay en visitant¬†l'assistance Apple(nouvel onglet):
iPhone 6 ou plus r√©cent, iPhone SE : utilisable sur les applications, en ligne et en boutique.
Apple Watch coupl√©e avec l'iPhone 5 ou plus r√©cent : utilisable sur les applications et en boutique.
iPad Pro, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 3, iPad mini 4 : utilisable sur les applications et sur internet.
Macs pr√©sent√©s en 2012 ou apr√®s (Macs autres que les MacBook Pro avec Touch Bar et Touch ID n√©cessitent un iPhone ou une Apple Watch) : utilisable uniquement sur internet. 

Utilisez votre carte avant m√™me de la recevoir avec Apple Pay
N26 vous permet d‚Äôutiliser votre nouvelle carte avant m√™me de la recevoir en l‚Äôajoutant √† votre compte Apple Pay.
Cette fonctionnalit√© est disponible si vous venez d‚Äôouvrir un compte N26 ou si vous commandez une nouvelle carte suite au vol ou √† la perte de l‚Äôancienne.
Cette fonctionnalit√© est utilisable pendant 30 jours √† partir de la date de la commande de votre carte. Si vous n‚Äôactivez pas votre nouvelle carte physique dans ce d√©lai, vous ne pourrez temporairement plus utiliser les paiements mobiles.
D√®s que vous aurez re√ßu votre carte, activez-la depuis votre application mobile ou votre espace client en ligne en suivant les √©tapes indiqu√©es.
Vous pouvez effectuer des paiements avec votre smartphone dans la limite de 200 ‚Ç¨ par jour. Ces limites ne s‚Äôappliquent pas si vous changez de formule de compte ou commandez une nouvelle carte sans que l‚Äôancienne ne soit d√©sactiv√©e (carte endommag√©e par exemple). Veuillez noter que cette fonctionnalit√© ne vous permet pas de retirer des esp√®ces en DAB ni d‚Äôutiliser CASH26 (si disponible dans votre pays).

title: ¬øC√≥mo presentar una reclamaci√≥n?
content:
Es muy importante que sepas que, si est√°s decepcionado con algo o si hay algo que no ha salido como esperabas, nosotros estamos aqu√≠ para ayudarte y nos gustar√≠a que nos lo contaras.
Puedes enviarnos un email a reclamaciones.es@n26.com desde tu direcci√≥n registrada en N26, o puedes enviarnos tu opini√≥n por correo.
Sin embargo, si abriste la cuenta antes del 17 de abril y por lo tanto tu IBAN empieza por DE, el email tendr√≠as que enviarlo a reclamaciones@n26.com.
Si quieres presentar una queja, tendr√≠as que incluir:
tu nombre completo y tu direcci√≥n
el producto o servicio con el que no est√°s satisfecho
una descripci√≥n detallada de lo que te preocupa o no te gusta
la fecha en la que tu problema apareci√≥ por primera vez
Te contactaremos por email para confirmar que hemos recibido tu reclamaci√≥n y, desde ese momento, comenzaremos a investigar el tema para encontrar una soluci√≥n que te satisfaga. En caso de que necesitemos m√°s informaci√≥n sobre ti o si no pudi√©semos darte una soluci√≥n al momento, tambi√©n te avisar√≠amos por email. Si nos toca esperar para recibir la informaci√≥n adicional, podr√≠a repercutir en la fecha en que resolvemos tu reclamaci√≥n.
En nuestra respuesta final te diremos si hemos ratificado o no tu reclamaci√≥n y explicaremos el porqu√©.
Dicha respuesta la damos en un plazo de 15 d√≠as laborables desde la fecha en que recibimos tu reclamaci√≥n. Si por alguna raz√≥n no pudi√©ramos darte una respuesta en ese tiempo, te avisar√≠amos por email explic√°ndote la raz√≥n del retraso y te comunicar√≠amos la nueva fecha para darte una respuesta. En cualquier caso, el plazo total en que te damos la respuesta final nunca pasar√° de los 35 d√≠as laborables si tienes IBAN alem√°n y un mes si tienes IBAN espa√±ol, desde la fecha en la que recibimos tu reclamaci√≥n.
Si no logr√°ramos encontrar una soluci√≥n que te complazca, tienes derecho a acudir al Banco de Espa√±a poni√©ndote en contacto con el Departamento de Conducta de Mercado y Reclamaciones(pesta√±a nueva), situado en la calle Alcal√° 48, 28014 Madrid.
A continuaci√≥n, te dejamos las referencias legales pertinentes:
Resoluci√≥n de litigios en l√≠nea de la Uni√≥n Europea(pesta√±a nueva)
Normativa general de protecci√≥n del consumidor y condiciones de contrataci√≥n(pesta√±a nueva)
Nos hemos comprometido a seguir mejorando cada d√≠a nuestros productos y servicios, y tu opini√≥n hace que sea posible. ¬°Gracias!

title: Comment fonctionne Espaces ?
content:
N26 Espaces vous permet de cr√©er des sous-comptes pour mettre votre argent de c√¥t√©, selon vos projets ou vos besoins. Vous pouvez personnaliser vos sous-comptes et d√©placer instantan√©ment votre argent depuis votre compte courant vers un de vos sous-comptes, et vice-versa, depuis l‚Äôapplication mobile et¬†internet(nouvel onglet).
En plus de votre compte courant, vous pouvez cr√©er et supprimer des sous-comptes aussi souvent que vous le souhaitez selon ces limites : 2 sous-comptes en plus de votre compte courant pour les comptes N26 Standard et N26 Business et jusqu‚Äô√† 10 sous-comptes en plus de votre compte courant pour les utilisateurs N26 You, N26 Business You et N26 Metal.
Les relev√©s de votre compte courant incluront √©galement les transactions entrantes ou sortantes depuis/vers vos sous-comptes.
Vous avez acc√®s √† la liste de transactions de chacun de vos espaces tout comme celle de votre compte principal.
Vous pouvez uniquement utiliser le solde de votre compte courant pour payer avec votre Mastercard N26. Si vous souhaitez utiliser l‚Äôargent disponible sur l‚Äôun de vos sous-comptes, vous devez d‚Äôabord le transf√©rer vers votre compte courant.
Seul votre compte principal peut √™tre √†¬†d√©couvert¬†(dans les pays √©ligibles). Le solde de vos sous-comptes ne peut pas √™tre n√©gatif. Vous pouvez seulement transf√©rer l‚Äôargent qui est disponible sur votre sous-compte.
Le virement se fait en maintenant la pression et en d√©pla√ßant le doigt vers le sous-compte de destination. Une fois le montant confirm√© avec votre code de validation, le solde du compte est instantan√©ment mis √† jour.
Vous pouvez verrouiller ou d√©verrouiller un sous-compte directement depuis votre application mobile ou web. Il vous faudra pour cela utiliser votre code de validation. Si un sous-compte est verrouill√©, vous pouvez toujours ajouter de l'argent sur celui-ci. Si vous avez besoin de retirer de l'argent depuis un sous-compte verrouill√©, il faudra dans un premier temps le d√©verrouiller.
Vous pouvez masquer le solde de votre espace du solde total de votre compte. Il vous suffit d‚Äôaller dans votre espace, puis de cliquer sur les trois points en haut √† droite de votre application et de s√©lectionner ‚ÄúMasquer le solde de l‚Äôespace‚Äù.
Nous avons r√©cemment mis en place une nouvelle fonctionnalit√© : les r√®gles automatiques. Cette fonctionnalit√© d‚ÄôEspaces vous permet de mettre en place des virements automatiques entre votre compte principal et vos espaces.

Vous souhaitez parler de nous √† vos amis ? Recevez 15 ‚Ç¨ √† chaque fois que l‚Äôun d‚Äôentre eux nous rejoint. D√©couvrez notre¬†programme de parrainage.

title: Quels sont les documents demand√©s pour la v√©rification de mon identit√© ?
content:
En tant qu‚Äô√©tablissement bancaire, nous devons v√©rifier votre identit√©. C‚Äôest pourquoi nous proc√©dons √† une v√©rification d‚Äôidentit√© √† partir de votre passeport ou d‚Äôune pi√®ce d‚Äôidentit√© accept√©e par nos services lorsque vous ouvrez un compte ou que vous utilisez certains produits.
Nous ne v√©rifierons¬†jamais¬†votre identit√© au nom de particuliers ou autres entit√©s.
Nous avons aussi publi√© des¬†astuces pour vous aider √† prot√©ger votre identit√©.
La v√©rification de votre identit√© se fait soit par appel¬†vid√©o, soit √† partir de¬†photos, selon le document d‚Äôidentit√© avec lequel vous ouvrez votre compte.

title: Where is my refund?
content:
Your refund will be visible in the app on the day of the original transaction, not the refund date. Scroll down your transaction list or download your previous balance statements to find it.
To view and download PDFs of your (preliminary and previous) monthly balance statements:
On the WebApp(new tab): From Transactions, click on the cloud icon in the upper-right corner to reach Downloads then select Bank statements.

On the mobile app: 
If you're using an iPhone, tap on the three dots to the right of your current balance from the main screen. A menu will pop up and will give you the option to access your balance statement.¬†
For Androids, you'll find the option under Statistics (just tap the 3 dots in the top right-hand corner).

title: Why are some products and services unavailable to me?
content:
We collaborate with many partners. That‚Äôs why certain products and services require that you meet their requirements as well. The most common reasons why you wouldn‚Äôt be eligible for certain products:
Expired or unsupported identity documents (for example, certain passports due to a lack of security features).
You‚Äôre taxable in the United States. If so, you won‚Äôt be able to use certain invest or savings products. If this is not the case, contact our Customer Support via chat so we can look into your account details. You may need to switch your telephone number if it starts with a North American area code (+1).
You proved your identity using PostIdent (in Germany). We‚Äôll have to reset your account and you‚Äôll have to prove your identity again in order to use certain products and services. If this is the case, we‚Äôll email you about it and find a convenient time for you to do so.
The product or service is not yet available in your country.

title: Shared Spaces - What is a power of attorney?
content:
The legal model behind Shared Spaces is called Power of Attorney (Kontovollmacht in German).¬†
Participants of a Shared Space do not have equal ownership of the account like a joint account in the traditional banking sense. After receiving Power of Attorney the participants obtain the right to act on behalf of the Owner regarding any transfer of funds within the Shared Space.
The person authorizing the other to act on his behalf is called the ‚ÄúOwner‚Äù, this person is the only account holder. The owner must be a N26 premium account holder e.g. N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business You.
This means that whoever created the Shared Space is its legal owner. The owner of a Shared Space:¬†
Owns all the funds within a Shared Space.¬†
Can transfer funds freely in and out of the account anytime.¬†
Can invite people to the Shared Space by granting others Power of Attorney.
Can revoke the Power of Attorney of a participant at any time.
Can also close a Shared Space after removing a participant. (all funds in the Shared Space will be transferred to the Owner‚Äôs Main Account)
By granting a person Power of Attorney, they‚Äôll have full access to all the money held within a Shared Space. This means that each participant can also transfer funds freely in and out of the Shared Space.¬†

N26 Bank GmbH cannot be held liable for payments covered by the Power of Attorney.

title: How to protect my account?
content:
The security of your account and your personal data is our top priority.
If you ever feel that your N26 login may be compromised or that someone is trying to initiate a chat on your behalf, it‚Äôs crucial to immediately change your N26 account password.
To do so, log into the app and go to My Account > Settings > Security. Please choose a secure password(new tab) and don‚Äôt reveal your login details to anyone.
As the account holder, you and only you should create and have access to your login details. For further advice on identity protection, we encourage you to visit our article How to protect my identity?
If you believe that your account has been compromised or tampered in any way then please get in touch with us immediately.

If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126.

title: Will my direct debit go through if I am low on funds?
content:
If your account has insufficient funds when a direct debit is due, it will simply be declined. It is not possible to delay a direct debit. Please note, your account will not be charged an insufficient funds fee. 
The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: How to use Google Pay?
content:
Applies to Germany, Spain, Italy, Ireland, Belgium, Slovakia, France, Denmark, Finland, Sweden, Norway, Poland and Switzerland. 
Google Pay is a payment method that allows you to pay with your smartphone so you don‚Äôt have to carry your Mastercard with you all the time.
Google Pay is available in all shops supporting contactless (NFC) payments as well as online shops. Hold your smartphone near the contactless terminal and your payment will automatically process. When paying online, select Google Pay as the payment option. We‚Äôll ask you to confirm your payment via¬†push message¬†during checkout.
Some tips to keep in mind:
To add your N26 Mastercard, download the Google Pay app and select Get Started to enter your card details. You‚Äôll need Android 5.0 (Lollipop) or higher as well as an NFC-capable smartphone.
Google Pay requires a screen lock. If you didn‚Äôt set it up yet, you‚Äôll be asked to before adding your Mastercard to the Google Pay app.
If you‚Äôre protecting your smartphone with a case, you might have to remove it to pay. Some payment terminals don‚Äôt recognize your phone if the case is too big.
If the payment terminal asks you to present your card (again), you might have removed the smartphone too fast or didn‚Äôt hold it close enough. Just try again while keeping this in mind.

title: How often can I withdraw cash for free?
content:
Cash withdrawals using your Mastercard depend on your T&C country (the address you originally shipped your first card to):
Germany: 3 to 5* free ATM withdrawals per month in Germany and unlimited free withdrawals in the eurozone or by using¬†CASH26
Austria and Italy: unlimited free withdrawals (including¬†CASH26)
France, Spain, the Netherlands, and the Rest of Europe: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in your country of residence and the eurozone
Switzerland: 5 free ATM withdrawals per month in the eurozone and a 1.7% markup on local withdrawals
UK: unlimited free withdrawals
There‚Äôs always a ‚Ç¨2 fee if you use your¬†Maestro¬†card to withdraw cash (only available in Germany, Austria, and the Netherlands).
Check our¬†pricing lists¬†if you‚Äôve been¬†charged an ATM fee.
*Germany only: You receive 5 free withdrawals during the first three months. After that you'll receive 3 free withdrawals but you can keep receiving 5 if:
You are younger than 26 years old.
You receive your salary, pension, student allowance, or government benefits for at least two consecutive months (your additional free withdrawals start the following month).
You receive payments of at least ‚Ç¨1.000 per month for at least two months (your additional free withdrawals start the following month).

title: Why was I charged twice?
content:
We offer you banking in real-time. This means you‚Äôre able to see the processes going on behind your account that you otherwise wouldn‚Äôt see. There are two main transaction types that take place during an in-store or online purchase:
Authorizations.¬†A block or reserved amount made by a retailer or merchant. This includes anything from your morning cup of coffee to hotel or car rental bookings (including security deposits).
Presentments.¬†The actual amount that is deducted from your account. Again, that cup of coffee is finally cleared from your account or you can get your security deposit back once that hotel room or car is returned safe and sound.
Once an authorization has been confirmed, we can‚Äôt cancel or reverse it. At that point, a few things can happen to¬†your authorization: it turns into a presentment, it's rejected, or it expires¬†(and automatically returns to your account up to 12 days at the latest). Keep in mind:
Sometimes you‚Äôll see both the authorization and the presentment if they become disconnected or due to technical issues at the payment terminal. Eventually the authorization will expire. If it doesn‚Äôt, we can help get your money back.
Verification authorizations (usually very small amounts) are used to check whether your card is active. This money will return to your account.
The amount of an authorization can differ from the final presentment for a variety of reasons.

title: Why was I charged a direct debit fee?
content:
Direct debits returned to your account due to¬†insufficient funds* are charged a ‚Ç¨3 fee in accordance with our¬†Terms & Conditions(new tab). If your balance becomes negative due to this fee,¬†overdraft¬†interest will also apply at a rate of 8.9%.
You can avoid these fees by making sure you have enough funds in your account to cover incoming direct debits by 18:00 on the same business day.
Since¬†SEPA transfers¬†could take more than one day to complete, we suggest you use¬†MoneyBeam (between N26 accounts) or¬†CASH26¬†(if you live in Germany, Austria or Italy) to transfer the amount due. With both methods, the amount will be credited to your account instantly.
And if you don‚Äôt recognize a direct debit, you can¬†reverse it¬†in the app.
*For Poland, Sweden, Denmark, and Norway: if you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and ultimate amount that is collected from us.

title: Pourquoi mon virement a √©chou√© ?
content:
Nous acceptons les¬†virements¬†en euros r√©gis par le r√©seau de paiement europ√©en SEPA. Nous ne proc√©dons pas aux virements SWIFT, si vous avez besoin d‚Äôenvoyer un¬†virement en devise √©trang√®re, nous vous invitons √† utiliser notre partenaire Transferwise (directement depuis votre application ou depuis leur¬†site web(nouvel onglet)).
Vous¬†trouverez vos coordonn√©es bancaires¬†dans la section¬†üë§ Mon compte¬†de votre application N26 (mobile ou site web).
Vous pouvez √©galement t√©l√©charger une version imprimable de votre RIB depuis la version web de l‚Äôapplication N26 sur¬†app.n26.com(nouvel onglet). Sur la page¬†Transactions, cliquez sur l‚Äôic√¥ne nuage √† c√¥t√© du symbole ‚Äú+‚Äù, puis sur¬†T√©l√©chargez votre RIB.
Voici les raisons pour lesquelles un virement bancaire peut √©chouer :
Le nom du destinataire du virement ne correspond pas au nom de naissance du titulaire du compte.
Vous avez un compte¬†N26 Business¬†et le nom de votre activit√© a √©t√© indiqu√© au lieu de votre nom de naissance.
L‚ÄôIBAN est incorrect.
Vous ne recevez pas de notification push pour valider le virement.
Votre virement peut faire l‚Äôobjet d‚Äôun contr√¥le si une utilisation inappropri√©e de votre compte est suspect√©e. N26 est tenue d‚Äôeffectuer des contr√¥les de routine sur les transactions (voir ¬†GwG ¬ß 10(nouvel onglet)). Pour cette raison, nous pouvons vous demander des informations suppl√©mentaires quant √† l‚Äôorigine ou la provenance de ces transactions. La r√©ception du virement peut ainsi √™tre retard√©e ou annul√©e.

title: Why hasn't my referral bonus arrived?
content:
Once your friend has completed all the eligibility criteria of our¬†Refer a Friend Program, we'll verify your reward. You can always sign in to your account in the app or¬†WebApp(new tab)¬†to check your reward status.
In most cases the referral bonus isn‚Äôt rewarded because the invited friend hasn‚Äôt made a first Mastercard transaction of 15 EUR. Please make sure to inform your friend of these requirements.
Keep in mind that the reward process could take up to 60 days.
N26 retains the right to withhold a reward in case of suspicious activity that violates the¬†Terms and Conditions(new tab).
Currently, Friend referral rewards are only available for customers in Germany, Austria, Italy, France, Spain, Belgium, Luxembourg, Greece, Portugal, Ireland, the Netherlands, Finland, Estonia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden, Switzerland, Norway, Denmark, Poland, Iceland and Liechtenstein.

title: How to upgrade to Metal?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Available in Germany, Austria, France, Spain, Italy, Belgium, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Ireland, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Iceland, Liechtenstein.
N26 Metal is available during initial sign-up, or by upgrading in the mobile app if you already have a N26 bank account or a N26 You membership.

Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: Warum wurde mir eine Geldautomatengeb√ºhr berechnet?
content:
Geldautomatengeb√ºhren k√∂nnen aus verschiedenen Gr√ºnden anfallen:
F√ºr jede Auszahlung, die √ºber unsere Fair Use Policy hinausgeht, erheben wir eine Geb√ºhr von 2 ‚Ç¨. Wir informieren dich per Push-Nachricht, wenn du nur noch wenige kostenlose Auszahlungen zur Verf√ºgung hast.
Einige Betreiber von Geldautomaten erheben ihre eigenen Geb√ºhren. Darauf haben wir keinen Einfluss, wir k√∂nnen sie weder ablehnen noch r√ºckg√§ngig machen. Sollten zus√§tzliche Geb√ºhren anfallen, wirst du vor dem Ende einer Auszahlung informiert und kannst die Auszahlung sofort stornieren.
Abhebungen in Fremdw√§hrungen k√∂nnen geb√ºhrenpflichtig sein. Beim N26 Konto f√§llt eine Geb√ºhr von 1,7% des ausgezahlten Betrages an. Diese Geb√ºhr entf√§llt f√ºr N26 You- oder N26 Metal-Mitglieder.
Nutzung deiner Maestrocard f√ºr Abhebungen am Geldautomaten. Hier f√§llt sowohl f√ºr nationale als auch f√ºr internationale Abhebungen eine Geb√ºhr von 2 ‚Ç¨ an. Maestro ist nur in Deutschland, √ñsterreich und den Niederlanden erh√§ltlich.
Um geb√ºhrenfreie Automaten in deiner N√§he zu finden, insbesondere auf Reisen, kannst du die¬†Mastercard-Geldautomatensuche(neuen Tab)¬†verwenden. W√§hle dazu in den erweiterten Suchoptionen ‚Äúkeine Nutzungsgeb√ºhr‚Äù aus.
Eine √úbersicht unserer Angebote und Geb√ºhren findest du auf unserer¬†(neuen Tab)Website(neuen Tab).

Direct debits returned to your account due to¬†insufficient funds* are charged a ‚Ç¨3 fee in accordance with our¬†Terms & Conditions(new tab). If your balance becomes negative due to this fee,¬†overdraft¬†interest will also apply at a rate of 8.9%.
You can avoid these fees by making sure you have enough funds in your account to cover incoming direct debits by 18:00 on the same business day.
Since¬†SEPA transfers¬†could take more than one day to complete, we suggest you use¬†MoneyBeam (between N26 accounts) or¬†CASH26¬†(if you live in Germany, Austria or Italy) to transfer the amount due. With both methods, the amount will be credited to your account instantly.

title: Wie zahle ich Geld auf mein Konto ein?
content:
Sobald du dich erfolgreich verifiziert hast, kannst du auf verschiedene Weisen Geld auf dein Konto einzahlen:
CASH26 (verf√ºgbar in Deutschland, √ñsterreich und Italien). Zahle Bargeld √ºber unsere Partnergesch√§fte direkt auf dein Konto ein. 
Moneybeam. Erhalte sofort Geld von anderen N26 Nutzern.
Debitkarte: Du kannst Geld von einem anderen Bankkonto auf dein N26 Konto laden, indem du die Karteninformationen in der App hinterlegst. Du kannst jeweils Betr√§ge zwischen 20 ‚Ç¨ und 150 ‚Ç¨ auf dein N26 Konto √ºberweisen. Bitte beachte, dass wir keine Prepaidkarten und American Express Kreditkarten akzeptieren k√∂nnen.
Apple Pay oder Google Pay(neuen Tab): Lade Geld auf dein N26 Konto, indem du Apple Pay (f√ºr iOS-Ger√§te) oder GPay (f√ºr Android-Ger√§te) verwendest. Du kannst jeweils Betr√§ge zwischen 20 ‚Ç¨ und 150 ‚Ç¨ auf dein N26 Konto √ºberweisen. Bitte beachte, dass wir keine Prepaidkarten und American Express Kreditkarten akzeptieren k√∂nnen.
Debitkarte. Wenn du noch keine Transaktionen auf deinem N26 Konto hast, kannst du in deiner App die Kartendetail von einer Debitkarte deines anderen Bankkontos eingeben und so zwischen 20‚Ç¨ und 150‚Ç¨ auf dein N26 Konto einzahlen. Bitte beachte, dass diese Funktion nur verf√ºgbar ist, um erstmalig Geld auf dein Konto einzuzahlen.
SEPA-√úberweisung. Die √úberweisung muss in Euro und innerhalb des SEPA-Raums erfolgen. Daf√ºr brauchst du nur deine IBAN und deinen Namen, wie er auf deinem registrierten Ausweisdokument eingetragen ist, eingeben. Bitte beachte auch dabei folgende Punkte:
Wenn du per SEPA-√úberweisung Geld auf dein N26 Konto einzahlst, stell sicher, dass der Empf√§ngername deinem Namen entspricht so wie er auf dem Ausweisdokument eingetragen ist, das du bei der Kontoer√∂ffnung f√ºr deine Verifizierung verwendet hast. (Insbesondere, wenn du ein N26 Business Konto hast - wir akzeptieren keine Firmennamen.)
Eine eingehende √úberweisung wird in Echtzeit gebucht, wenn sie als Echtzeit√ºberweisung get√§tigt wurde, andernfalls ben√∂tigt eine √úberweisung einen Bankarbeitstag bzw. zwei Werktage.
In Frankreich muss die erste Zahlung auf dein N26 Konto von einem Konto erfolgen, das dir geh√∂rt. (In allen anderen L√§ndern ist es nicht n√∂tig, dass das andere Bankkonto dir geh√∂rt.)
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erhalte 15 ‚Ç¨ f√ºr jeden Freund, dem du N26 erfolgreich empfiehlst. Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: How to use Apple Pay?
content:
(Applies to Germany, Austria, France, Italy, Spain, Finland, Ireland, Iceland, Greece, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Portugal, Slovakia, Estonia, Belgium, Poland, Norway, Netherlands, Sweden, Denmark, Switzerland and the UK)
Apple Pay allows you to make payments with your smartphone so you don‚Äôt have to carry your Mastercard everywhere.
We‚Äôve made a¬†video(new tab)¬†to help you set up your N26 Mastercard with Apple Pay.
Some tips to keep in mind:
Your iPhone region matches the country where your Mastercard was first shipped to (you can check your region by selecting Settings then General and Language & Region in your phone).

If you‚Äôve lost your iPhone and aren‚Äôt able to find it again using Find My iPhone, you can always access your iCloud and remove all Apple Pay devices via the web browser on a Mac or PC. In addition, you should turn on Lost Mode to block your Mastercard for Apple Pay. Payments with your physical card will still be possible.

If your N26 Mastercard is unexpectedly removed from Apple Wallet, it may be because you have logged out of your iCloud, turned off Passcode or Touch ID, reset your device to factory settings via iTunes, or deleted all the content and settings from your device. In all cases, you can simply add your card again. Keep in mind that the card won‚Äôt be removed if you update your operating system, reset your personal device settings, or turn off Find My iPhone.

For in-store or online purchases, you must authorize your payment via Touch ID or using your passcode. If you‚Äôre using Apple Watch, authorizations are done by double-clicking on the side button. And if you‚Äôre using your Mac, authorize your payment by using Touch ID via the Touch Bar in the top-right corner of your keyboard.

If you're an N26 Metal or N26 Business You customer, it may happen that the card image displayed in your Apple Wallet shows as an N26 You card (for Metal customers) or as an N26 Business card (for Business You customers). We're working now to resolve this. Rest assured that this does not affect the usability of Apple Pay or your premium membership.

Make sure your device meets the technical requirements by visiting Apple Support(new tab):
iPhone 6 or later, iPhone SE: available in apps, stores and web
Apple Watch paired with iPhone 5 or later: available in apps and stores
iPad Pro, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 3, iPad mini 4: available in apps and web
Macs introduced in 2012 or later (Macs other than the MacBook Pro with Touch Bar and Touch ID require an iPhone or Apple Watch: available in web

Direct debits returned to your account due to¬†insufficient funds* are charged a ‚Ç¨3 fee in accordance with our¬†Terms & Conditions(new tab). If your balance becomes negative due to this fee,¬†overdraft¬†interest will also apply at a rate of 8.9%.
You can avoid these fees by making sure you have enough funds in your account to cover incoming direct debits by 18:00 on the same business day.
Since¬†SEPA transfers¬†could take more than one day to complete, we suggest you use¬†MoneyBeam (between N26 accounts) or¬†CASH26¬†(if you live in Germany, Austria or Italy) to transfer the amount due. With both methods, the amount will be credited to your account instantly.
And if you don‚Äôt recognize a direct debit, you can¬†reverse it¬†in the app.
*For Poland, Sweden, Denmark, and Norway: if you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and ultimate amount that is collected from us.

title: Wie kann ich zu N26 You upgraden?
content:
‚Ñπ Verf√ºgbar in √ñsterreich, Belgien, D√§nemark, Estland, Finnland, Frankreich, Deutschland, Irland, Italy, Lettland, Liechtenstein, Litauen, Luxemburg, Polen, Niederlande, Norwegen, Portugal, Slowenien, Spanien, Schweden.

Du kannst zwischen 5 neuen Farben w√§hlen: Rhabarber, Ozean, Sand, Aqua und Schiefer.
W√§hle dann deine bevorzugte¬†Versandmethode¬†aus, akzeptiere die N26 You¬†AGB(neuen Tab)¬†und schon ist deine neue Karte zu dir unterwegs!
Standardlieferungen dauern bis zu zehn Werktage, Expresslieferungen drei Werktage.

Die Mindestvertragslaufzeit f√ºr die N26 You Mitgliedschaft betr√§gt ein Jahr. Deine Mitgliedschaft wird automatisch erneuert, wenn du sie nicht sp√§testens vier Wochen vor Laufzeitende k√ºndigst.

title: CRS - Why we require certain information from our customers
content:
N26 as a financial institution is (according to CRS) required to report information directly to tax authorities in the European Union concerning financial accounts held by customers who are tax resident in another country.
CRS stands for Common Reporting Standard. The CRS has been developed by the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD) and is a global reporting standard for the automatic exchange of information (AEOI). The goal of CRS is to allow tax authorities to obtain a clearer understanding of financial assets held abroad by their residents for tax purposes in order to fight tax evasion. More than 90 countries have agreed to share information on residents' assets and incomes in conformation with CRS.
In order for us to be able to accurately determine whether an account is to be reported to the tax authorities for CRS purposes, we need to ask you:
In which country(ies) are you a tax resident?¬†

You are normally a ‚Äútax resident‚Äù and therefore subject to tax on your worldwide income in the country where you have a residential address. If you have a place to live in more than one country, then there are normally ‚Äútie-breaker rules‚Äù included in double tax treaties and tax laws of the relevant countries that help determine where you are a tax resident. It may be that you are tax resident in more than one country during a year and, if so, we'd need to know both the country and your taxpayer identification number for each of them in order to accurately report the information to the relevant tax authorities.¬†

What is your taxpayer identification number (‚ÄúTIN‚Äù) for each country?

The issuance and format of a TIN differs by country. For EU countries, the European Commission has published guidance on TINs in each EU country(new tab), which may help you in identifying your individual TIN(s) in these countries.¬†
In case your circumstances change, you can always update your tax information in the N26 app. To do this, simply log in to the N26 app and go to:
My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Tax Information¬†

title: How to find my IBAN or account number?
content:
You can find your IBAN and our BIC number on your balance statements or in¬†üë§ My Account¬†from the mobile app or¬†WebApp(new tab)¬†(if you haven‚Äôt activated your card and need to¬†top up your account).
All our IBANs start with DE followed by the¬†check digits¬†(two numbers), then our¬†bank code¬†10011001, and end with your 10-digit¬†account number¬†(start at 26).
If you open your account in the UK, you won't have an IBAN, but you will find your account number and our sort code 04-00-26 in the same section.
You can easily share your information through the share button in¬†üë§ My Account. Or you can download your bank account information as a PDF by logging into the¬†WebApp(new tab)¬†and selecting the cloud icon on the top-right corner of¬†Transactions.
Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial(new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube(new tab) channel.

title: How do I pair my smartphone to my N26 account?
content:
In order to use your N26 account, you will need a compatible phone:
iPhone 5s or newer,
Android 5.0 or newer
Once you create an account, you will need to pair it with your phone. Only one phone can be paired per account. In order to pair your phone to your account, follow these steps:
Open the N26 mobile application on your phone.
You will be asked to confirm your phone number.
We will send a 4-digit code via SMS to the phone number you provided.
Enter the 4-digit code to complete pairing.

The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Why isn't my video verification working?
content:
Tips for a successful video¬†verification:
Most video calls fail due to poor internet connection or bad picture quality (for example, too blurry or due to low lighting). Please complete the call in a bright environment, use a phone with a good camera, and make sure you have a fast internet connection.
Please make sure that you are the only person in the video.
You need to live in one of our¬†supported countries¬†to open an account with us.
We can only accept national IDs and passports (driver‚Äôs licenses or residence permits can‚Äôt be used). Also, the document shouldn‚Äôt be damaged.
As soon as your verification is complete, we‚Äôll send you your N26 Mastercard.¬†Deliveries¬†take up to 10 days.

Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

title: ¬øC√≥mo crear y modificar transferencias programadas?
content:
Crear una transferencia programada es muy f√°cil y puedes hacerlo desde la app o la WebApp. 
Cuando haces una transferencia saliente desde tu cuenta, tienes la posibilidad de convertirla en una transferencia programada. Para ello, marca la casilla verde que aparece en la parte de abajo de la pantalla y confirma los datos del beneficiario y la cantidad. Tambi√©n puedes elegir con qu√© frecuencia se va repetir y hasta qu√© fecha.
Puedes consultar tus transferencias programadas desde la app:
1. Ve a la lista de transacciones (o sea, la pantalla principal).
2. Pulsa en los tres puntos situados en la esquina derecha superior (Android) o encima de la lista de transacciones (iOS).
3. Aparecer√° una ventana donde estar√°n todas tus transferencias programadas.
Desde esa secci√≥n vas a poder modificar o cancelar dichas transferencias. Para cancelarla, simplemente pincha sobre la transferencia que quieres eliminar y arr√°strala hasta la papelera. 
‚ÑπÔ∏è  Ten en cuenta que, si una transferencia no se realiza por falta de fondos en la cuenta, no habr√° otro intento autom√°ticamente y ser√° necesario enviar la transferencia de forma manual. La siguiente transferencia ya se volver√° a emitir de forma normal.

title: What to do if my account was hacked?
content:
If you suspect possible fraudulent activity on your account, please contact us as soon as possible. Our chat function is available in the app, on the N26 website(new tab), and at the end of some of our Support Center articles, such as this one. Just click on Start a chat. 
If you‚Äôd rather speak on the phone, you can request this during the chat. We‚Äôll arrange a callback within the hour so we can discuss the matter further with you. Once in contact with one of our agents, please thoroughly explain the situation to us.  Every detail here is important. 

Please be assured that we‚Äôll take all necessary measures to assist you in this situation. 
In addition to our legal obligations for fraud prevention, and in order to continually improve our security safeguards, we have a dedicated team who analyzes each fraud case individually. The fraud cases themselves are often relatively complicated and have to be dealt with in detail. Depending on the complexity, this can take a few days, but in some cases it can take several weeks.
Finally, if you have evidence or strong feelings that the account might have been hacked, we recommend that you file a police report as well.
To learn more about how we protect your account in case of fraud, visit our blog article(new tab). Visit our page about Security at N26(new tab) to discover our commitment to protect your funds and your account.
Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.
If you do not have access to your N26 mobile app or your N26 webapp login, you can also request to block your card or account by calling us at +44 2035 107126.

title: How to activate my card?
content:
Once you receive your physical card, you‚Äôll need to activate it. You can do this in the app only after you connect your smartphone to your account. Or you can activate it directly from the web app(new tab). 
You‚Äôll need your 10-digit token number: it‚Äôs found below your name on the front of your card (or on the back if you have an N26 You, N26 Metal, or Maestro card). 
To activate your card on the N26 app, from the Home screen:
Go to the Actions tab,
Select Cards settings and swipe until you see the card you want to activate,
Tap Activate.

To activate your card on the web app, just select Activate card from the Home screen.

If you live in France, Spain, Ireland, Greece, Finland, Estonia or in the UK you must make a first ATM withdrawal to fully activate your card.
If you have multiple cards (for example, you ordered your card more than once or your delivery was delayed), you can only activate your most recent card. All other cards will be disabled.
You‚Äôll need to follow these activation steps every time you reorder a new card, like if your card is lost, stolen, broken, or you upgrade your account. ¬†¬†
After you activate your card, the next step is choosing a card PIN.

title: How to reverse and block a direct debit?
content:
You have the ability to reverse a direct debit in the app yourself up to 8 weeks after it has been debited.
Open your transaction list and select the direct debit in question. 
Choose¬†Refund. 
The amount will then be credited to your account within 2 banking days.
*For Poland, Sweden, Denmark, and Norway only: if you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and ultimate amount that is collected from us.

title: How to use Moneybeam?
content:
MoneyBeam allows you to send money to your smartphone‚Äôs contacts without knowing their bank account details. In order to send a MoneyBeam, log into the app:
From the Home screen choose the Actions tab,

Tap Send Money followed by the MoneyBeam option,

Either select a contact from your phone‚Äôs contact list or add a recipient manually, using their phone number or email address. For this to work, the recipient has to be visible as an N26 customer,

Enter the amount and a reference text,

Confirm with your Confirmation PIN and the push message you receive.
N26 customers will receive the transfer instantly. You can send up to ‚Ç¨1.000 to other N26 customers within a 24-hour period.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: How to create and manage standing orders?
content:
When setting up an outgoing transfer in either the N26 app or Web app you‚Äôll have the option to make it a standing order.
Once you complete the outgoing transfer you'll then be prompted to tick a box which will create a standing order. After you've inputted the amount of the transfer and its recipient, under the reference text field select "Want to save this as a standing order?". From here you'll be able to set the start/end dates of the standing order and choose its payment intervals.
To view your scheduled transfers and standing orders directly in the mobile app:
Go to your transaction list (the main screen).
Then tap on the 3 dots located in the upper¬†right corner for Android and on the top of the transaction list for iOS. 
A small window will pop, where you will be able to select "Standing Orders".
Here you can cancel and/or modify the details of your standing order. To cancel it just tap the standing order you wish to delete and tap the trash icon in the top right-hand corner.
‚ÑπÔ∏è ¬†Please note, if a standing order fails due to insufficient funds we won't attempt the transfer again - you'll need to manually send the transfer, however the next scheduled transfers will proceed as normal.

title: Warum wurde mir eine Lastschriftgeb√ºhr berechnet?
content:
Wenn eine Lastschrift aufgrund unzureichender Deckung* deines Kontos zur√ºckgeht, wird gem√§√ü unseren Allgemeinen Gesch√§ftsbedingungen(neuen Tab) eine Geb√ºhr von 3 ‚Ç¨ erhoben. Wenn dein Kontostand durch diese Geb√ºhr in das Soll f√§llt, werden auch √úberziehungszinsen in H√∂he von 8.9% f√§llig. 
Du kannst diese Geb√ºhren vermeiden, indem du sicher stellst, dass du gen√ºgend Geld auf deinem Konto hast, um eingehende Lastschriften bis 18 Uhr am selben Werktag abzudecken.
Da SEPA-√úberweisungen mehr als einen Tag dauern k√∂nnen, empfehlen wir dir, den f√§lligen Betrag mit MoneyBeam (zwischen N26 Konten) oder CASH26 (wenn du in Deutschland oder √ñsterreich wohnst) zu √ºberweisen. Bei beiden Methoden wird der Betrag sofort deinem Konto gutgeschrieben.
