*In Polen, Schweden, D√§nemark und Norwegen: Wenn du eine Lastschrift in deiner Landesw√§hrung einrichtest, bestimmt die Bank des Zahlungsempf√§ngers die Geb√ºhren f√ºr den W√§hrungsumtausch sowie den endg√ºltigen Betrag, der bei uns abgebucht wird.

title: Perch√© il mio bonifico non √® andato a buon fine?
content:
Accettiamo¬†bonifici¬†in EUR fatti tramite SEPA. Non supportiamo SWIFT quindi se hai bisogno di effettuare un¬†trasferimento in valuta estera, devi utilizzare TransferWise (nell'app o dal loro¬†sito web(nuova tabella)).
Per ricevere un bonifico, devi fornire al mittente solo il tuo nome completo (come √® scritto sul documento d‚Äôidentit√† che hai fornito per la verifica) e il tuo IBAN.
Trovi l‚ÄôIBAN¬†sull‚Äôestratto conto, sul retro della tua Mastercard N26 e nel¬†üë§ Il mio conto¬†(nell'app mobile o¬†WebApp(nuova tabella)).
Motivi comuni per cui un bonifico non va a buon fine:
Il nome del destinatario del bonifico √® diverso dal nome del conto (deve avere lo stesso nome scritto sul loro documento di identit√†).
Per N26 Business, il nome del destinatario √® il nome della societ√† e non il nome del conto.
L‚ÄôIBAN √® errato.
Non stai ricevendo il messaggio push per confermare il trasferimento.
√à stato riscontrato un uso improprio. N26 ha la responsabilit√† di eseguire controlli di routine sulle transazioni (vedere GwG ¬ß 10(nuova tabella)). Di conseguenza, potremmo chiedere una documentazione per verificare l'origine o la fonte di queste transazioni. Ci√≤ pu√≤ comportare il ritardo o il mancato accredito dell'importo.

title: Come utilizzare MoneyBeam?
content:
MoneyBeam consente di inviare denaro ai contatti sul tuo smartphone senza doverne conoscere le coordinate bancarie. Per inviare un MoneyBeam, accedi all'app:
Dalla schermata principale, vai nella sezione Gestisci.
Seleziona Dal mio conto e poi MoneyBeam.
Seleziona un contatto dalla tua rubrica oppure aggiungine uno tramite il indirizzo email o numero di telefono. √à necessario che il tuo contatto sia un utente N26.
Inserisci l'importo e un testo di riferimento
Conferma con il PIN di conferma e messaggio push.
Il denaro verr√† accreditato in tempo reale. Puoi inviare fino a ‚Ç¨1.000 ad altri clienti N26 nell'arco di 24 ore.
Vuoi parlare di noi ai tuoi amici e guadagnarci? Ottieni ‚Ç¨15 per ogni amico che inviti con successo ad iscriversi ad N26. Scopri di pi√π sul nostro programma Invita un amico.

title: How to file a complaint?
content:
If you have any questions about our products or need help with your account, we‚Äôre happy to assist. Just open a chat with us directly within the mobile app or WebApp, that's the fastest and simplest way to get in touch.
If you ever feel dissatisfied with one of our products or services, you can also send (new tab)us an email from your registered address or send your feedback by post.
If you're in the UK, you can send the email to complaints.uk@n26.com(new tab). For the rest of Europe please use complaints@n26.com(new tab).¬†
To file a complaint, please include:
your full name and address
the product or service you're not happy with
a description of your concern
the date in which the problem first appeared
We‚Äôll contact you via email to confirm that we‚Äôve received your complaint and then begin an investigation to find a solution you‚Äôre happy with. In case we need more information from you or we can provide you with an immediate solution, we‚Äôll let you know via email as well.
In case we‚Äôre not able to find a solution you‚Äôre happy with, you can escalate your complaint to an independent third party. You have a few options:
An arbitration body is available to you at the German Federal Bank (Deutsche Bundesbank).
Or you could file a complaint with the German Federal Financial Supervisory Authority (Bundesanstalt f√ºr Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht).
Also, the European Commission has set up the Online Dispute Resolution (ODR(new tab)) platform to help consumers dispute online contracts out of court.
We are committed to constantly improving our products and services. Your feedback makes this possible.

title: Comment fonctionnent les paiements sans contact ?
content:
Il n‚Äôest pas possible de d√©sactiver les paiements sans contact.
Si vous rencontrez des probl√®mes avec ce mode de paiement, veuillez noter que :
Pour activer les paiements sans contact, dans le cas o√π vous √™tes un nouveau client, vous devez d‚Äôabord activer votre carte en effectuant un premier paiement par carte ou un premier retrait en distributeur.

Vous n‚Äôaurez pas √† entrer votre code PIN lors de paiements sans contact de moins de 50 ‚Ç¨*. Au del√† de ce montant, votre¬†code PIN vous sera demand√©.
*Si le terminal de paiement du marchand est compatible avec cette option.
Le terminal de paiement de votre marchand doit √™tre compatible avec les paiements sans contact. Si votre paiement √©choue car votre carte n‚Äô√©tait pas suffisamment proche du terminal de paiement ou si vous l‚Äôavez retir√©e trop rapidement, nous vous invitons √† r√©essayer.

Sur la carte N26 Metal, la fonction NFC (sans contact) est √† l‚Äôarri√®re. Pour effectuer un paiement sans contact, il faut donc pr√©senter l‚Äôarri√®re de la carte sur le terminal de paiement.

title: Kann N26 mein Konto schlie√üen?
content:
Kurz gesagt: ja.
Wir k√∂nnen dein Konto auf drei Arten schlie√üen (mit einer K√ºndigungsfrist von 2 Monaten, 14 Tagen oder sofort). Diese K√ºndigungen sind endg√ºltig: Unser Kundenservice kann keine Informationen √ºber den Hintergrund einzelner K√ºndigungen geben und die Entscheidung auch nicht r√ºckg√§ngig machen. Du kannst deine Gesch√§ftsbeziehungen zu uns auch jederzeit, sofort und ohne Angabe von Gr√ºnden, beenden. Jegliche ausstehenden Vertragsgeb√ºhren m√ºssen vor dem Beendigungszeitpunkt beglichen werden.
2 Monate K√ºndigungsfrist
Wir sind berechtigt, jede Gesch√§ftsbeziehung mit einer Frist von 2 Monaten ohne Angabe von Gr√ºnden zu k√ºndigen (siehe ¬ß 19 Abs. 1 unserer¬†AGB(neuen Tab)¬†oder ¬ß 675h BGB).
14 Tage K√ºndigungsfrist
Wir k√∂nnen jede Gesch√§ftsbeziehung auch mit einer Frist von 14 Tagen k√ºndigen (siehe ¬ß 19 Abs. 3 unserer¬†AGB(neuen Tab)), wenn aufgrund der Verletzung vertraglicher Pflichten hinreichende Gr√ºnde hierzu vorliegen. Solche Gr√ºnde sind:
Nutzung eines Privatkontos f√ºr gesch√§ftliche Zwecke¬†Nach unseren AGB darf ein Privatkonto nur f√ºr den pers√∂nlichen Gebrauch genutzt werden. Alle √úberweisungen, die sich auf Honorare f√ºr erbrachte Dienstleistungen und/oder verkaufte Produkte beziehen, gelten als Gesch√§ftstransaktionen. Wenn du dein Konto f√ºr diesen Zweck nutzen m√∂chtest, er√∂ffne bitte ein¬†N26 Business¬†oder¬†N26 Business You Konto.
Bereitstellung falscher oder unzureichender Informationen f√ºr eine routinem√§√üige Hintergrundpr√ºfung.¬†Wir sind eine Bank, deshalb¬†√ºberpr√ºfen wir manche Transaktionen. Wenn du keine korrekten und/oder ausreichenden Angaben zu der betreffenden Transaktion machst, haben wir das Recht, die Gesch√§ftsbeziehung zu k√ºndigen, da wir deutschen Finanzvorschriften entsprechen m√ºssen. -
Missbr√§uchliches Verhalten gegen√ºber N26-Mitarbeitern.¬†Wir tolerieren kein missbr√§uchliches Verhalten gegen√ºber unseren Mitarbeitern. Die Androhung von K√∂rperverletzung oder allgemeines missbr√§uchliches Verhalten ist nach deutschem Recht strafbar und wird ausnahmslos der zust√§ndigen Beh√∂rde gemeldet.
Fristlose K√ºndigung
Wir k√∂nnen jede Gesch√§ftsbeziehung auch au√üerordentlich k√ºndigen (siehe ¬ß 19 Abs. 3 unserer¬†AGB(neuen Tab)). Das bedeutet: jederzeit, ohne Vorank√ºndigung und ohne K√ºndigungsfrist bei Vorliegen eines wichtigen Grundes f√ºr eine solche K√ºndigung. Solche Gr√ºnde sind:
Falsche Angaben gegen√ºber N26 √ºber deine finanzielle Situation, insbesondere bei der Beantragung eines Kredits
Du kannst ein Darlehen oder eine Verschuldung gegen√ºber N26 nicht zur√ºckzahlen
Nichterf√ºllung der Forderungen von N26 bez√ºglich deines Darlehens (siehe Bestellung oder Verst√§rkung von Sicherheiten, ¬ß 13 (2) unserer AGB(neuen Tab)).

title: Pourquoi la v√©rification de mon identit√© par photo ne fonctionne pas ?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†S'applique √† tous les pays sauf √† l'Allemagne
Avant toute chose, v√©rifiez que l‚Äôoption de g√©olocalisation est bien activ√©e sur votre smartphone. Ensuite voici¬†quelques conseils(nouvel onglet)¬†pour r√©ussir la v√©rification de votre identit√©.
La plupart du temps la¬†v√©rification¬†√©choue √† cause de la qualit√© des photos.
Assurez-vous de r√©aliser les photographies de vos documents dans un lieu suffisamment √©clair√© et sur une surface plate pour √©viter les reflets. Utilisez un appareil photo de qualit√©.
Si vous utilisez Android, assurez vous de la qualit√© de l‚Äôautofocus.
Si vous utilisez Android, vous pouvez activer ou d√©sactiver le flash en fonction de la luminosit√© ambiante.
Prenez une photo de vous-m√™me (un selfie) et de votre document d'identit√©, en vous assurant que rien ne cache votre visage et en pla√ßant l‚Äôobjectif de votre t√©l√©phone √† la hauteur de vos yeux.
Veillez √† ce que vous soyez la seule personne √† appara√Ætre sur votre selfie et que votre document d'identit√© soit enti√®rement visible.
V√©rifiez vos documents
Nous n‚Äôacceptons que les photos de l‚Äôoriginal de votre document d‚Äôidentit√©.
Le document d‚Äôidentit√© principal que vous devez nous pr√©senter peut √™tre votre passeport ou votre carte d‚Äôidentit√© s'ils sont accept√©s par nos services.
Gardez votre document bien √† plat pendant la prise de vue et assurez-vous que toutes les informations sont lisibles.
Assurez-vous que votre document n‚Äôest pas abim√©.
Si votre selfie ou les photos de votre document d'identit√© ne sont pas d‚Äôune qualit√© suffisante, recommencez la proc√©dure de v√©rification d‚Äôidentit√© depuis le d√©but.
D√®s que la v√©rification de votre identit√© est termin√©e, nous enverrons votre Mastercard N26. En attendant de la¬†recevoir, vous pourrez imm√©diatement synchroniser votre t√©l√©phone avec votre compte.
Le Livechat est disponible du lundi au dimanche de 7:00 √† 23:00 h.

title: I represent a bank or an authority and need to contact N26
content:
If you represent the authorities or work for another bank, you can get in touch via the following channels:
Email:¬†officials@n26.com(new tab)
Fax: + 49 (0) 30 2201178 40 
Our opening hours are Monday to Friday from 09:00-18:00 (except bank and Berlin holidays). You can request a call-back via email or fax at any time. We try to call you back on the same day.
Please note that any customer inquiries sent to the above address or fax number will automatically be deleted.
If you have a customer service related question and need to contact us, visit our article How to contact N26?(new tab) or open a chat at the bottom of this article.

title: How to save the details of a transfer recipient?
content:
Every time you make a transfer to a new recipient in the app (tap + then¬†Transfer¬†and¬†Add new recipient), some details like the recipient‚Äôs name and IBAN are automatically saved in your transfer contact list for future transfers. You can also delete contacts or view your transaction history with them:
iOS: swipe a contact entry to the left in order to show the transaction history or delete the entry.
Android: tap and hold on a contact entry in order to show the transaction history or delete the entry.
Keep in mind that deleting a contact entry doesn‚Äôt delete your transaction history with them.

title: How to create a Shared Space?
content:
To create a Shared Space:
Create a Space and tap it in the Spaces overview.

Tap the + icon in the top right-hand corner of the page.

Read the ‚ÄòLearn more‚Äô information and tap the ‚ÄòInvite new member‚Äô button.

Search and select the contact list for the N26 user you wish to invite. If the person you want to invite has an N26 account but doesn't show up in the contact list, we recommend that you ask them to check if they agreed to be visible to others N26 users via the app, in the My Account section > Settings > Personal Setting > Personal Information.

If needed, enter their full name as we have it listed.

Review the information on the Grant power of attorney page (the legal screen). Once you‚Äôve read and agreed to the T&Cs, tick the box and tap the ‚ÄòAccept power of attorney‚Äô button.

Enter your Confirmation PIN.

Tap on the relevant participant in the list of participants.

Confirm the ‚ÄòSend Invite‚Äô push notification on your paired mobile device.

What are Shared Spaces?
How to add or remove Shared Spaces participants?

title: Why is my transfer still pending in the N26 app?
content:
You‚Äôll need your Confirmation PIN to finalize all transfers whether¬†MoneyBeam, standing orders, or¬†CASH26. Your transfer will remain pending until you either¬†Confirm¬†or¬†Cancel¬†it via push message in the app.
Your Confirmation PIN differs from your¬†card PIN¬†but you can use the same number for both. You‚Äôll be asked to choose your Confirmation PIN after¬†connecting your smartphone¬†(whereas you select a card PIN after activating your card).
If you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, your PIN will be blocked for security reasons. You can restore your PIN by¬†changing it¬†in the app: go to¬†üë§ My Account¬†then tap¬†Settings¬†and¬†Security. Then tap¬†Change Confirmation PIN¬†(iPhone) or¬†Reset Confirmation PIN¬†(Android).

title: Why can‚Äôt I get a Basiskonto?
content:
Under some circumstances, N26 is allowed to reject your Basiskonto request. That‚Äôs the case if you:
Live outside of a supported country.
Already have an N26 bank account or another bank account in Germany and can use it to its full extent. 
Were convicted of a crime against the bank, its employees, or its customers within the past 3 years. 
Have already maintained a Basiskonto at N26 in the past that was closed due to prohibited usage or a negative balance. 
You didn‚Äôt meet minimum requirements in accordance to the Money Laundering Act and the Credit Services Act.

title: Comment inviter un ami √† rejoindre N26 ?
content:
Vous pouvez commencer √† inviter des amis d√®s que vous avez acc√®s √† votre compte (depuis l‚Äôapplication mobile ou la version web(nouvel onglet)).
Pour inviter vos amis :
Connectez-vous √† l‚Äôapplication N26
Appuyez sur le symbole Cadeau depuis l'onglet D√©couvrir en bas de votre √©cran d‚Äôaccueil
S√©lectionnez votre Code de parrainage pour le copier
Choisissez Invitez vos amis
Choisissez l‚Äôune des options possibles pour partager votre invitation.
Personnalisez votre message ou utilisez le message par d√©faut, puis appuyez sur Envoyer
Pour d√©couvrir comment obtenir une prime de parrainage en invitant vos amis √† rejoindre N26, nous vous invitons √† consulter notre article concernant¬†l'attribution de la prime de parrainage¬†(uniquement disponible dans certains pays).

title: How does N26 Business You work?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Applies to Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Sweden.
It‚Äôs not yet possible to switch between private and business accounts so it‚Äôs important to know if N26 Business You is right for you:
The N26 Business You account is designed for self-employed and freelance users doing business under their own name. That means you can‚Äôt have your company‚Äôs name on the account or card. 
The account is ‚Ç¨9,90 per month. The minimum membership is one year. Your contract automatically renews if you do not cancel your membership(new tab) at least 4 weeks before the contract expires.  
The premium account includes: Allianz Insurance Package including coverage for business purposes and fee-free foreign currency ATM withdrawals, 
The N26 Business Mastercard is intended for business use only. You receive 0.1% cashback every month on all payments made using the card. It‚Äôs currently not possible to have two separate N26 accounts at the same time so if you also need a card for private expenses, we recommend ordering a Maestro card (it‚Äôs available in Germany and Austria, and the Netherlands).
Transfers in foreign currencies aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business You.
You can sign-up during registration or if you‚Äôre already an N26 Business user.
You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 14‚Ç¨ through your N26 app. 
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: How long does it take to send money with TransferWise?
content:
Once you've initiated your transfer via TransferWise you'll be given an estimated time frame.
If a TransferWise transfer fails, we‚Äôll notify you via push message. The amount will automatically be returned to your account a few days later.
TransferWise doesn‚Äôt charge extra fees for a returned payment and neither do we. However, some participating banks do charge fees, in which case TransferWise will deduct this amount from the money returned under their¬†Conditions of Use(new tab).
Common reasons for a failed transfer:
Error in the transfer details (for example, when entering the recipient‚Äôs name or account information).
Special characters or too many characters in the recipient‚Äôs name or reference field.
Limits have been reached or online payments aren‚Äôt active in card settings.
Foreign currency transfers aren‚Äôt possible with N26 Business or N26 Business You or if the recipient is a business account.

title: When will my card arrive?
content:
The estimated delivery timeline for card deliveries is 10 working days. Deliveries may take longer in some specific areas in the following countries: Estonia, Greece, Italy, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia and Spain. 
Please consider this before taking any action regarding a card re-order:
If the delivery fails and your card is returned to us, we‚Äôll let you know via email.
If it's been less than 10 working days since you ordered your card, we encourage you to wait before reaching out to us. 
If you've waited longer than the expected timeline, please check and if necessary update your shipping address, you can do this within the N26 app: üë§ My Account > Settings > Personal Settings > Shipping Address.
If your shipping address was incorrect and this is your first N26 card, please¬†contact us via live chat(new tab) and we‚Äôll help you order a new one.
If your shipping address was incorrect and you‚Äôve had an active card before, you'll need to reorder the card via the App.
If your shipping address was correct, there might have been an issue with your card's delivery. Please contact us via live chat and we‚Äôll help you order a new one.
If your card fails to arrive or you need your card quickly, you may consider ordering it via¬†express delivery (with an additional fee) which takes up to 3 working days. Please note that express delivery is not available for Metal cards.
Your first card is immediately produced and mailed out once you‚Äôre done¬†proving your identity. If you opened a Metal account, please to top up your account after completing the sign up with at least the amount of the monthly Metal fee in order to receive the card.
Tips for a successful delivery:
If your address contains special characters, please contact us via the live chat.
We only send cards to residential addresses (businesses are not accepted).
Don‚Äôt enter any spaces when entering the postal code for your delivery address.
Ensure that important delivery information isn‚Äôt missing (for example, the name on your mailbox if you live in Germany or your building number, stairwell number, and door code if applicable). If you‚Äôre staying somewhere temporarily (with a friend or in an Airbnb), make sure to include the name on the mailbox that belongs to the main tenant of the apartment.
If you‚Äôre moving somewhere and this is your first card, make sure to select the country and address where you‚Äôll move to and wish to receive your N26 card.

title: Cosa fa N26 con le mie informazioni finanziarie?
content:
L‚ÄôOCSE richiede che certe informazioni di carattere finanziario vengano condivise per mezzo del¬†Common Reporting Standard(nuova tabella)¬†(CRS). Per poter adempiere a tale obbligo, dobbiamo stabilire in quale Paese paghi le tasse. Per questo abbiamo bisogno del tuo numero di identificazione fiscale o numero di assicurazione nazionale.
Noi inviamo questo dato tramite l‚ÄôUfficio federale delle tasse tedesco alle autorit√† fiscali di altri Paesi se:
Vivi in un paese che partecipa al CRS.
Hai una casella postale o un secondo indirizzo registrato in un altro Paese che partecipa al CRS.
Durante la registrazione hai fornito un numero di telefono di un altro Paese che partecipa al CRS.
Hai un ordine permanente, o effettui pagamenti periodici, su un conto di un altro Paese che partecipa al CRS.
Inviamo i dati anche all‚ÄôInternal Revenue Service(nuova tabella)¬†(IRS) statunitense, ai sensi del¬†Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act(nuova tabella)¬†(FATCA). Possiamo richiedere il tuo numero di sicurezza sociale (SSN) per verificare il tuo stato fiscale negli Stati Uniti perch√©:
Sei un cittadino degli Stati Uniti (anche doppia cittadinanza).
Durante la registrazione hai fornito un numero di telefono degli Stati Uniti.
Sei nato negli Stati Uniti (o in un‚Äôambasciata degli Stati Uniti all‚Äôestero).
Il tuo coniuge √® di nazionalit√† statunitense.
Ci hai fornito un indirizzo degli Stati Uniti.
Effettui regolari pagamenti verso gli Stati Uniti.
Per aggiornare il tuo numero di identificazione fiscale o di sicurezza sociale nella app N26:
Vai a üë§ Il mio conto e tocca su Impostazioni
Seleziona Impostazioni personali poi Informazioni fiscali
Seleziona il Paese in cui paghi le tasse
Inserisci il tuo numero di identificazione fiscale o il numero di sicurezza sociale
Informazioni importanti
In Germania, abbiamo bisogno dello steueridentifikationsnummer (il numero di identificazione fiscale equivalente alla partita IVA italiana, 11 cifre) non dello steuernummer (9 cifre).
In ogni caso, i tuoi dati personali saranno memorizzati in modo sicuro e utilizzati esclusivamente per adempiere ai requisiti del CRS e del FATCA.
Non possiamo fornirti informazioni sul tuo stato fiscale. Se hai dubbi, rivolgiti a un consulente fiscale.
Se hai inserito il Paese nella quale sei soggetto a tassazione ma non il tuo numero di identificazione fiscale, rimuovi gentilmente il Paese dall‚Äôelenco che ti appare nella app, reinserisci il Paese, e inserisci il tuo numero di identificazione fiscale di nuovo.

title: What are Spaces?
content:
Spaces are sub accounts that you can create and personalize. Spaces help you visualize your short- and long-term financial goals by giving you a place to set aside your money and track your progress. You can instantaneously move money between your Spaces accounts as often as you like. This¬†feature is available using our mobile application¬†and WebApp. See below for more information about how to start using Spaces today!
Related Topics
"How can I use Spaces?"
Congratulations on taking the first step toward reaching your financial goals. A step-by-step guide to using Spaces is here(new tab).
"How many Spaces can I create?"
In addition to your main account (or primary space), you can create and delete two additional Spaces sub accounts as often as you‚Äôd like.
"How can I see transactions into and out of my Spaces?"
Your primary account statements will include all transactions sent to a Space or received from one. You can download balance statements from the confirmation page.
"How long does it take to transfer the money between Spaces?"
No time at all! Once the amount is confirmed, the balance is updated¬†instantaneously.
"How do I lock a Space?
Locking a Space is a great way to ensure that you are not moving funds¬†out of it and thereby staying on track to reach your financial goals.¬†
To Lock/Unlock the Space:
Go to your Space.
Tap on the three buttons in the top right corner.
Select "Lock/Unlock space" (in the WebApp, "Lock space")
Enter your Confirmation PIN.¬†
"How do I move money into a Space?"
You can move money into a Space by tapping (or clicking) and holding down on your primary account,  and then dragging across into your Space. You can also add a reference text of your choice. Once the amount is confirmed, the balance is updated right away.
"Can I move money into a locked Space?"
Yes, funds can be deposited into a locked Space. Please note that if you need to withdraw money from a locked Space, you will need to unlock it first.
"Is the money in my Space visible in my Main Account balance?"
Yes, but if you want to keep the balance in your Space separate from the balance in your Main Account, you can hide the Space balance. To hide a Space balance:
Go to the Space in the mobile application or WebApp.¬†
Tap on the three buttons in the top right corner.
Tap or click on "Hide space balance".¬†

The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: How to dispute a transaction?
content:
We understand that disputed charges (also called ‚Äòchargebacks‚Äô) can cost you time and money.
We can only dispute card transactions that are visible in your monthly balance statement and haven‚Äôt been made more than 120 days ago. Please complete the dispute form (EU(new tab)¬†or¬†UK(new tab)) and send it to us. Also, make sure that you:
Complete a separate form for each card payment and sign it
Select only one dispute reason
Attach all¬†additional documents(new tab)

title: How to create a barcode for CASH26?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Applies to German, Austrian and Italian T&C
To create a barcode for¬†CASH26:
From the Home screen, select the Actions tab,
Tap CASH26 and choose whether you want to Deposit cash or Withdraw cash,
Enter the amount and your Confirmation PIN,
Confirm the transaction via push message.
Simply show this barcode to a partner representative and you'll either be given cash on the spot or asked for the cash you wanted to deposit. It can take up to 10 minutes until this change is reflected on your bank balance. If you delete the barcode or don't use it within 10 minutes, it‚Äôll expire and be removed from your transaction list automatically.
Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial(new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube(new tab) channel.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: How to protect my identity?
content:
To protect and help avoid the misuse of your personal data, please keep in mind that:
We will never ask you to prove your identity on behalf of other individuals or companies. This includes verifications for apartment rental contracts, lines of credit, or job offers (including jobs with N26). Only complete the verification process if you want to open an N26 bank account for yourself.
As the account owner, only you should create and have access to your login details. Never create an N26 bank account with a predefined email address and password. If you use login credentials that were given to you, these credentials may be used to reach your personal and legal information. Also, never log into an N26 account that is not yours.
Do not send your ID or passport to unknown or unverified recipients.
We may ask for certain documents when your transaction is subject to a routine check. Only send valid documentation to verified N26 email accounts.
We will never ask for your username, password, or PIN codes outside the N26 app. Never provide this information in an external website or app, even if it looks N26-related.
If you ever feel in doubt, have received a suspicious request from a third party, or think your N26 login may be compromised, please do not hesitate to contact us.

title: How to create a password?
content:
If you forgot your password or want to change it, select¬†Forgot?¬†in the app or¬†Forgot your password?(new tab)¬†in the¬†WebApp(new tab)¬†during login. We‚Äôll send a link to your registered email address so you can create a new password. Make sure your new password meets our requirements:
We do not have a specific set of requirements for our passwords. We measure their strength on the fly and only accept passwords that are considered robust by our underlying algorithm.
We tend to recommend to go with a ‚Äúpassphrase‚Äù rather than a password, and thus go by the common phrase ‚Äúhard to guess, easy to remember‚Äù. 
If your password is not accepted by our system, try to add more special characters, numbers, and vary between upper- and lowercase letters.
If you enter your password incorrectly six times in a row, you‚Äôll be temporarily blocked from your account. If this happens, try logging in again after 30 minutes.
Chat is available everyday from 07:00-23:00 including Sundays and bank holidays.

title: Wie funktioniert Google Pay?
content:
Verf√ºgbar in Deutschland, Frankreich, Italien, Spanien, Belgien, D√§nemark, Finnland, Irland, Norwegen, Polen, Slowakei, Schweden, Schweiz.
Mit Google Pay kannst du mit deinem Smartphone bezahlen und musst so deine Mastercard nicht st√§ndig bei dir tragen.
Google Pay ist in allen Shops, die kontaktlose Zahlungen (NFC) unterst√ºtzen, sowie in Online-Shops verf√ºgbar. Halte einfach dein Smartphone in die N√§he des kontaktlosen Terminals und deine Zahlung wird automatisch verarbeitet. Wenn du online bezahlst, w√§hle Google Pay als Zahlungsmethode aus. Wir werden dich beim Abschluss des Bezahlvorgangs per¬†Push-Nachricht¬†auffordern, deine Zahlung zu best√§tigen.
Einige Tipps:
Um deine N26 Mastercard zu deinem Google Wallet hinzuzuf√ºgen, lade die Google Pay App herunter und w√§hle Hinzuf√ºgen, um deine Kartendaten einzugeben. Du brauchst Android 5.0 (Lollipop) oder h√∂her sowie ein NFC-f√§higes Smartphone.
Google Pay erfordert eine Bildschirmsperre. Falls du diese noch nicht eingerichtet hast, wirst du dazu aufgefordert, bevor du deine Mastercard zur Google Pay App hinzuf√ºgst.
Falls dein Smartphone mit einer Schutzh√ºlle versehen ist, musst du diese zum Bezahlen eventuell entfernen. Manche Zahlungsterminals erkennen dein Smartphone m√∂glicherweise nicht, wenn die Schutzh√ºlle zu dick ist.
Wenn das Zahlungsterminal dich dazu auffordert, deine Karte (erneut) vorzuzeigen, dann hast du dein Smartphone m√∂glicherweise zu schnell wieder weggenommen oder nicht nah genug an das Terminal gehalten. Versuche es einfach erneut.

title: ¬øQu√© pasa si rechazan mi IBAN de N26?
content:
Si abriste la cuenta en Espa√±a despu√©s del 17 de abril de 2019, tu IBAN es espa√±ol. Dicho IBAN tiene el c√≥digo de pa√≠s ES, un c√≥digo de control de 2 d√≠gitos, luego los 10 d√≠gitos del c√≥digo de entidad financiera, despu√©s 2 d√≠gitos de control y, por √∫ltimo, los 10 d√≠gitos de tu n√∫mero de cuenta. Por ejemplo:¬†ES XX 1563 2626 XX 326XXXXXXX.
En cambio, si la abriste antes del 17 de abril de 2019, o despu√©s de esa fecha pero fuera de Espa√±a, tu IBAN es alem√°n. Este tiene el c√≥digo de pa√≠s DE, un c√≥digo de control de 2 d√≠gitos, el c√≥digo bancario de 8 d√≠gitos y, por √∫ltimo, los 10 d√≠gitos de tu n√∫mero de cuenta. Por ejemplo:¬†DE XX 10011001 26XXXXXXXX.
Los pa√≠ses que est√°n en la zona SEPA (Zona √önica de pagos en Euros) han acordado el sistema de IBAN para simplificar los pagos tanto nacionales como internacionales, y para reducir el riesgo de error en la comunicaci√≥n y en el procesamiento de transacciones.
Los comerciantes y empresas que no aceptan el IBAN de otros estados miembros del Espacio Econ√≥mico Europeo (EEE), est√°n violando la legislaci√≥n europea desde el 1 de febrero de 2016 (Art√≠culo 9 del¬†Reglamento No. 260/2012(pesta√±a nueva)).
Si te ves afectado por una discriminaci√≥n de IBAN, te pedimos que te pongas en contacto con las¬†(pesta√±a nueva)autoridades competentes(pesta√±a nueva)¬†directamente y des parte del incidente. Facilita tu informaci√≥n de contacto, el nombre de la empresa o del comerciante que no acepte el IBAN y una descripci√≥n del incidente (incluyendo capturas de pantalla del rechazo o cualquier otra documentaci√≥n de tu comunicaci√≥n con ellos).

title: ¬øQui√©n puede obtener una Basiskonto?
content:
Puedes abrir una¬†cuenta N26¬†gratuita desde nuestra p√°gina web o descargando la app.
El Acta de Cuentas de Pagos Alemana (Zahlungskontengesetz or ZKG) proporciona a todos los clientes que residen legalmente en la Uni√≥n Europea el derecho a tener una Basiskonto. Esto aplica a todas aquellas personas que vivan en uno de los pa√≠ses donde prestamos servicio.
N26 Basiskonto tiene una cuota mensual de mantenimiento de 6 ‚Ç¨. Puedes encontrar las dem√°s comisiones en nuestra¬†lista de precios.
Si no tienes una cuenta en N26 ni en ninguna otra instituci√≥n financiera en Alemania, puedes¬†solicitarla. Bajo ciertas circunstancias, N26 tiene derecho a¬†rechazar la solicitud.
Ten en cuenta que algunos productos y servicios como¬†N26 You, o¬†N26 Metal¬†no est√°n disponibles con una N26 Basiskonto.

title: How to activate my card?
content:
Once you receive your physical card, you‚Äôll need to activate it. You can do this in the app only after you connect your smartphone to your account. Or you can activate it directly from the web app(new tab). 
You‚Äôll need your 10-digit token number: it‚Äôs found below your name on the front of your card (or on the back if you have an N26 You, N26 Metal, or Maestro card). 
To activate your card on the N26 app, from the Home screen:
Go to the Actions tab,
Select Cards settings and swipe until you see the card you want to activate,
Tap Activate.

To activate your card on the web app, just select Activate card from the Home screen.

If you live in France, Spain, Ireland, Greece, Finland, Estonia or in the UK you must make a first ATM withdrawal to fully activate your card.
If you have multiple cards (for example, you ordered your card more than once or your delivery was delayed), you can only activate your most recent card. All other cards will be disabled.
You‚Äôll need to follow these activation steps every time you reorder a new card, like if your card is lost, stolen, broken, or you upgrade your account. ¬†¬†
After you activate your card, the next step is choosing a card PIN.

title: How long do transfers take?
content:
All incoming ACH payments are completed within one banking day. Due to the opening times of the participating banks, one banking day may stretch over two working days.
If your incoming transfer is outside of these estimated time frames, please contact the sender (bank) for a payment investigation as we cannot track incoming transfers.
Related Topics
"Why hasn‚Äôt my money arrived?"
There are a few reasons why this may have happened.
Please double check with the payment sender that the correct account and routing number were used.¬†
Ensure that the payment sender put your correct name as it is written on your ID. A correct account and routing number are not sufficient.

All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: Pourquoi des frais ont √©t√© pr√©lev√©s lors d‚Äôun retrait en distributeur automatique ?
content:
Voici les raisons pour lesquelles des frais sont parfois pr√©lev√©s lors d‚Äôun retrait en distributeur automatique :
2 euros par retrait peuvent √™tre pr√©lev√©s si vous avez √©puis√© les¬†5 retraits gratuits¬†dont vous b√©n√©ficiez chaque mois, d‚Äôapr√®s notre Politique en mati√®re de retraits en Distributeurs Automatiques de Billets (DAB).
Certains DAB appliquent leurs propres frais.¬†Nous n‚Äôavons pas de contr√¥le sur ces frais qui ne peuvent √™tre ni refus√©s, ni rembours√©s une fois pr√©lev√©s. Les DAB qui appliquent ces frais suppl√©mentaires vous pr√©viennent avant que vous confirmiez votre retrait. Vous avez donc le choix de l‚Äôannuler et de vous rendre √† un autre distributeur automatique.
Des commissions peuvent √™tre pr√©lev√©es lors de retraits en DAB en devises √©trang√®res.¬†Avec le compte N26 Standard, une commission de 1.7 % du montant de votre retrait en devises est pr√©lev√©. Cela ne concerne pas les d√©tenteurs de comptes N26 You ou N26 Metal.
Des frais peuvent s‚Äôappliquer si vous retirez de l‚Äôargent avec votre carte Maestro.¬†Pour les cartes Maestro, uniquement disponibles en Allemagne, en Autriche et aux Pays-Bas, 2 euros sont pr√©lev√©s sur tous les retraits (en euros et en devises √©trang√®res).
Pour savoir o√π se trouvent les distributeurs les plus proches de vous, vous pouvez consulter la carte des DAB √† proximit√©, disponible depuis votre application mobile.
Vous pouvez consulter un aper√ßu de¬†(nouvel onglet)nos tarifs sur notre site web(nouvel onglet).

title: How to create a barcode for CASH26?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Applies to German, Austrian and Italian T&C
To create a barcode for¬†CASH26:
From the Home screen, select the Actions tab,
Tap CASH26 and choose whether you want to Deposit cash or Withdraw cash,
Enter the amount and your Confirmation PIN,
Confirm the transaction via push message.
Simply show this barcode to a partner representative and you'll either be given cash on the spot or asked for the cash you wanted to deposit. If you delete the barcode or don't use it within 10 minutes, it‚Äôll expire and be removed from your transaction list automatically.

title: Was kann ich tun, wenn ich meinen Dispo oder mein Darlehen nicht zur√ºckzahlen kann?
content:
Wir bieten R√ºckzahlungspl√§ne an, wenn du deinen¬†Dispo¬†oder dein Darlehen mit¬†N26 Credit¬†nicht zur√ºckzahlen kannst. Das kann passieren, wenn dein Dispo storniert wurde oder du mehr als zwei Monate gebraucht hast, um deinen negativen Saldo auszugleichen.
So geht es: Chatte mit uns und schlage einen detaillierten Plan vor, wie du deinen Dispokredit oder dein Darlehen in Raten zur√ºckzahlen willst, z. B. jeden Monat einen bestimmten Betrag, bis dein Darlehen abbezahlt ist. Es ist nicht m√∂glich, einfach den Gesamtbetrag zu einem sp√§teren Zeitpunkt zur√ºckzuzahlen.
Wir werden dann entweder akzeptieren, ablehnen oder einen alternativen Plan vorschlagen. Es liegt dann an dir, diesem zuzustimmen.
√úbrigens: Dein Konto wird geschlossen, wenn es √ºber einen l√§ngeren Zeitraum im Soll ist. Alle K√ºndigungsdaten sind endg√ºltig, es sei denn, du zahlst dein Darlehen vor diesem Datum zur√ºck. Wenn nicht, wird der Fall an ein Inkassob√ºro weitergeleitet.

title: Will my direct debit go through if I'm low on funds?
content:
If your balance can‚Äôt cover a direct debit* when it‚Äôs due, it‚Äôll bounce and you‚Äôll be charged a¬†‚Ç¨3 fee. And if you have a negative account balance, you'll be charged an overdraft interest of 8.9%. It‚Äôs not possible to delay a direct debit.
To avoid this fee in the future, you can instantly check whether you‚Äôre eligible for an¬†Overdraft¬†directly in the app (available in Germany and Austria).
*For Poland, Sweden, Denmark, and Norway only: if you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and ultimate amount that is collected from us.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: ¬øPor qu√© no puedo ver a otros usuarios de N26 en MoneyBeam?
content:
Para realizar transacciones en tiempo real con¬†MoneyBeam, N26 verifica la lista de tus contactos y encuentra a otros usuarios de N26 bas√°ndose en el n√∫mero de tel√©fono o el email. Tambi√©n puedes introducir un contacto manualmente utilizando uno de estos dos datos.¬†
Si no ves el nombre de tu amigo/a en MoneyBeam pero sabes que utiliza N26, es porque no se ha hecho visible. De hecho, si lo deseas puedes revocar el permiso para ser visible. Puedes hacerlo si entras en üë§ Mi Cuenta, luego en Configuraci√≥n y finalmente en Configuraci√≥n Personal. Despu√©s marca o desmarca la casilla seg√∫n lo que quieras.
La mayor√≠a de los errores de MoneyBeam que se dan entre usuarios de N26 se debe a que hay varios n√∫meros de tel√©fono o e-mails registrados en la misma entrada de la lista de contactos. Para evitarlo de cara al futuro, averigua qu√© email o qu√© n√∫mero de tel√©fono utiliza tu amigo en su cuenta N26 y aseg√∫rate de enviar ah√≠ el MoneyBeam. Si los datos de tu contacto no coinciden no es posible enviar el MoneyBeam. 
¬øQuieres ganar dinero hablando de nosotros a tus amigos? Consigue 15 ‚Ç¨ por cada amigo al que invites a unirse a N26. Inf√≥rmate m√°s sobre nuestro programa¬†Invita a un amigo.

title: Dove investe i miei soldi N26?
content:
Ci sforziamo di fornire ai nostri clienti depositi per i prestiti (a condizione che abbiano un appropriato rating di credito). Per la liquidit√† non richiesta nel business dei clienti, la nostra strategia di investimento √® a basso rischio.
Investiamo i soldi dei nostri clienti in breve tempo con la Deutsche Bundesbank e altre banche europee nell'area dell'euro, solamente con buone classi di rischio. E rifinanziamo i clienti di diritto pubblico principalmente in Germania (citt√† e comuni) e investendo in titoli di stato in euro.
Non siamo un istituto di trading book. Cio√®: non scambiamo per profitto a breve termine.
E non ci occupiamo di speculazioni, sia sul cibo, sui cambi, su bitcoin o su altre classi di attivit√†.

title: What are Shared Spaces?
content:
Shared Spaces is a new and easy way for N26 users to share money together. These spaces can be used for anything from splitting bills, to planning a vacation or organising a birthday gift for a friend or relative.
Shared Spaces are available to N26 premium users (You / Business You / Metal), who can both create Shared Spaces and invite participants to their Space. 
Participants can be any N26 account holder regardless of their account type.
The owner of the Shared Space owns the money inside it.
The owner can invite up to 10 participants and remove participants for their space.
Similar to regular Spaces, Shared Spaces have neither an IBAN nor a card attached to them.

title: Comment faire une r√©clamation ?
content:
Si vous avez des questions sur nos produits ou si vous avez besoin d‚Äôaide, nous serons heureux de vous assister. Vous pouvez nous contacter en d√©marrant un Livechat depuis votre application, rubrique Aide, ou √† la fin de cet article en cliquant sur D√©marrer un chat. ¬†
Si vous n‚Äô√™tes pas satisfait d‚Äôun de nos produits ou services, vous pouvez nous le faire savoir en adressant un email √† litiges@n26.com ou nous envoyer votre r√©clamation par courrier. 
Pour faire une r√©clamation suite √† un litige, veuillez pr√©ciser :
votre nom complet et votre adresse
le service ou produit concern√©
la description d√©taill√©e du litige
la date de d√©but du litige
Nous vous contacterons par email pour accuser la r√©ception de votre r√©clamation et nous lancerons alors une enqu√™te afin de r√©soudre le litige dans les plus brefs d√©lais. Dans le cas o√π nous aurions besoin de plus d‚Äôinformations de votre part ou dans le cas o√π nous serions √† m√™me de r√©soudre le litige imm√©diatement, nous vous pr√©viendrons √©galement par email.
Dans le cas o√π nous ne serions pas en mesure de trouver une solution satisfaisante pour r√©soudre le litige pour lequel vous avez d√©pos√© une r√©clamation, vous pourrez vous tourner vers une tierce partie ind√©pendante :
Vous pouvez vous adresser √† l‚Äôinstance d'arbitrage de la Banque f√©d√©rale d‚ÄôAllemagne (Deutsche Bundesbank).
Vous pouvez d√©poser une plainte aupr√®s de l'Autorit√© F√©d√©rale Allemande de Surveillance Financi√®re (Bundesanstalt f√ºr Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht).
La Commission Europ√©enne a √©galement mis en place un service de R√®glement en ligne des litiges (ODR(nouvel onglet)) pour aider les consommateurs qui veulent saisir un prestataire de service d‚Äôune r√©clamation.
Nous vous remercions de prendre le temps de nous faire part de vos remarques concernant nos services et nos produits.

title: Warum sind einige Produkte und Dienstleistungen f√ºr mich nicht verf√ºgbar?
content:
Wir arbeiten mit vielen Partnern zusammen. Bestimmte Produkte und Dienstleistungen setzen voraus, dass du auch deren Anforderungen erf√ºllst. Die h√§ufigsten Gr√ºnde, warum du f√ºr bestimmte Produkte nicht in Frage kommst:
Abgelaufene oder nicht unterst√ºtzte Ausweispapiere (z. B. bestimmte P√§sse, denen Sicherheitsmerkmale fehlen).
Du bist in den Vereinigten Staaten¬†steuerpflichtig. In diesem Fall kannst du bestimmte Anlage- oder Sparprodukte nicht nutzen. Wenn dies nicht der Fall ist, kontaktiere unseren Kundenservice per Chat, damit wir deine Kontodaten einsehen k√∂nnen. M√∂glicherweise musst du deine Telefonnummer wechseln, wenn sie mit einer nordamerikanischen Vorwahl beginnt (+1).
Du hast deine¬†Identit√§t¬†(in Deutschland) mit PostIdent nachgewiesen. Wir m√ºssen dein Konto zur√ºcksetzen und du musst deine Verifizierung wiederholen, um bestimmte Produkte und Dienstleistungen nutzen zu k√∂nnen. Ist das der Fall, senden wir dir eine E-Mail um einen passenden Zeitpunkt zu vereinbaren.

title: ¬øQu√© son los Espacios Compartidos?
content:
Con los Espacios Compartidos ahora puedes compartir dinero de forma r√°pida y f√°cil. Estos espacios se pueden usar para lo que sea, tanto para compartir facturas como para planear vacaciones u organizar el cumplea√±os de un amigo o familiar.
Los Espacios Compartidos est√°n disponibles para los usuarios con plan premium (N26 You, N26 Metal y N26 Business You), los cuales pueden crear e invitar a otros a su Espacio.
Puede participar en un espacio cualquier usuario de N26, tenga la cuenta que tenga. 
El administrador del espacio es el due√±o legal del dinero de ese espacio. 
El administrador puede invitar hasta 10 participantes y puede eliminarlos siempre que quiera. 
Como todos los Espacios, los Espacios Compartidos no tienen un IBAN o tarjeta asociada a ellos.

title: How to make a SEPA transfer?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è You can send debit transfers to any country within the SEPA zone (if the receiving bank accepts Euros).
Outgoing debit transfers can be made in either the N26 app or our Web app.
From the Home screen choose the Actions tab,

Select Send Money followed by Bank Transfer and then ‚Äúadd a new recipient‚Äù,

Enter the recipient's name and IBAN and select Continue,

Choose the amount and select Next,

Add a message if required or select Skip It,

Check the Transfer Review screen (which sums up the transfer),

Here you can also schedule the date of your transfer and save it as a standing order,

Press send and confirm with your confirmation PIN.
You‚Äôll then need to either Confirm or Cancel the transfer via push notification in the app from your paired device.
Once the transfer was confirmed in the mobile app, we can't reverse it or change the recipient's details.
If you cannot confirm your debit transfer within the app you need to:
Ensure that you have a stable internet connection.
Ensure that your mobile phone has push notifications enabled. This is done through the phone settings, not in our app.
Ensure that you use your paired device.
Once your debit transfer is sent you‚Äôll be able to download a PDF confirmation of it. To do so:
Go to your Transactions list.

Locate and select the specific debit transfer.

Scroll down to the Transaction Information and tap PDF by selecting Transfer Confirmation.

title: Shared Spaces - What is a power of attorney?
content:
The legal model behind Shared Spaces is called Power of Attorney (Kontovollmacht in German).¬†
Participants of a Shared Space do not have equal ownership of the account like a joint account in the traditional banking sense. After receiving Power of Attorney the participants obtain the right to act on behalf of the Owner regarding any transfer of funds within the Shared Space.
The person authorizing the other to act on his behalf is called the ‚ÄúOwner‚Äù, this person is the only account holder. The owner must be a N26 premium account holder e.g. N26 You, N26 Metal and N26 Business You.
This means that whoever created the Shared Space is its legal owner. The owner of a Shared Space:¬†
Owns all the funds within a Shared Space.¬†
Can transfer funds freely in and out of the account anytime.¬†
Can invite people to the Shared Space by granting others Power of Attorney.
Can revoke the Power of Attorney of a participant at any time.
Can also close a Shared Space after removing a participant. (all funds in the Shared Space will be transferred to the Owner‚Äôs Main Account)
By granting a person Power of Attorney, they‚Äôll have full access to all the money held within a Shared Space. This means that each participant can also transfer funds freely in and out of the Shared Space.¬†

N26 Bank GmbH cannot be held liable for payments covered by the Power of Attorney.

title: Wie verwendet N26 meine Steuerinformationen?
content:
Die OECD verlangt, dass bestimmte Steuerinformationen mittels des¬†Common Reporting Standard(neuen Tab) ausgetauscht werden. Um unseren Verpflichtungen nachzukommen, m√ºssen wir feststellen, in welchem Land du steuerpflichtig bist. Wir tun dies √ºber deine Steueridentifikationsnummer oder National Insurance number.
Wir leiten diese Informationen √ºber das Bundesamt f√ºr Steuern an Steuerbeh√∂rden in anderen L√§ndern weiter, wenn:
du in einem CRS-Teilnehmerland lebst.
du ein Postfach oder eine zweite Meldeadresse in einem anderen CRS-Teilnehmerland hast.
du bei der Registrierung eine Telefonnummer eines anderen CRS-Teilnehmerlandes angegeben hast.
du einen Dauerauftrag hast oder regelm√§√üige Zahlungen auf ein Konto in einem anderen CRS-Teilnehmerland leistest.
Wir leiten die Daten nach dem¬†Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act(neuen Tab)¬†(FATCA) auch an den U.S.¬†Internal Revenue Service(neuen Tab)¬†(IRS) weiter. Wir k√∂nnen deine Sozialversicherungsnummer (SSN) anfordern, um deinen Steuerstatus in den USA zu √ºberpr√ºfen, wenn:
du US-B√ºrger bist (einschlie√ülich doppelte Staatsb√ºrgerschaft).
du bei der Registrierung eine Telefonnummer aus den USA angegeben hast.
du in den USA (oder in einer US-Botschaft im Ausland) geboren wurdest.
du mit einem US-B√ºrger/einer US-B√ºrgerin verheiratet bist.
du uns eine Adresse in den USA gegeben hast.
du regelm√§√üige √úberweisungen in die USA durchf√ºhrst.
So aktualisierst du deine Steuernummer oder Sozialversicherungsnummer in der App:
Gehe zu üë§ Mein Konto und tippe auf Einstellungen
W√§hle Pers√∂nliche Einstellungen und Steuerdaten
W√§hle das Land aus, in dem du steuerpflichtig bist
Gib entweder deine Steuernummer oder deine Sozialversicherungsnummer ein
Wichtige Informationen
In Deutschland ben√∂tigen wir deine 11-stellige Steueridentifikationsnummer, nicht deine 9-stellige Steuernummer.
In jedem Fall werden deine pers√∂nlichen Daten sicher gespeichert und nur zur Erf√ºllung der CRS- und FATCA-Anforderungen verwendet.
Wir k√∂nnen dich nicht zu deinem Steuerstatus beraten. Wenn du dir √ºber deinen Status nicht sicher bist, sprich bitte mit einem Steuerberater.
Wenn du das Land eingegeben hast, in dem du steuerpflichtig bist, aber nicht deine Steueridentifikationsnummer, bitte entferne das Land noch einmal von der Liste, die dir in der App angezeigt wird, f√ºge das Land erneut hinzu und gib deine Steueridentifikationsnummer ein.

title: Come posso aggiungere o rimuovere partecipanti da uno Spazio Condiviso?
content:
Come rimuovere un partecipante da uno Spazio Condiviso se sei un amministratore:
Nella schermata dello Space, clicca sul men√π indicato dai 3 puntini in alto a destra.
Dalla lista dei ‚ÄòParticipanti‚Äô, tocca sulla freccia che si trova sulla destra del nome del partecipante. 
Tocca su ‚Äòrimuovi potere legale‚Äô.
¬†Conferma la notifica che appare sullo schermo, e clicca di nuovo ‚Äòrimuovi potere legale‚Äô.¬†

Per partecipare ad uno Spazio Condiviso:
Nella schermata dello Space, tocca lo Space con l'icona "In attesa" e l'icona dello Spazio Condiviso.
Leggi le istruzioni su Spazi Condivisi e prosegui alla schermata del Potere Legale.
Una volta che hai letto e compreso le informazioni sul Potere Legale (schermata legale),  you‚Äôve read and understood the information on the Power of Attorney page (the legal screen), spunta la casella e tocca il pulsante "Concedi procura".
Inserisci il tuo PIN di Conferma.
Conferma la notifica push ‚ÄòAccetta Potere Legale‚Äô tramite il tuo dispositivo associato.
Dovrai avere abbastanza Space(s) liberi per poter accettare l'invito ad uno Spazio Condiviso. Se non ne hai, potrai procedere solo se cancelli altri Space(s) per fare spazio ad un altro.
Inoltre, non devi avere spazi aperti con lo stesso nome o immagine dello Spazio Condiviso. Potrai accettare l'invito ad uno Spazio Condiviso solo una volta cambiato il nome/immagine dell'altro Space(s). 

Per lasciare uno Spazio Condiviso:
Nella schermata dello Space, clicca sul men√π indicato dai 3 puntini in alto a destra.
Nelle impostazioni, tocca su ‚ÄòAbbandona Spazio Condiviso‚Äô.
Conferma la notifica che appare sullo schermo, e clicca di nuovo ‚ÄòAbbandona Spazio Condiviso‚Äô.
Uno Spazio Condiviso pu√≤ essere creato e modificato all'interno dell'app N26 o Webapp

title: Audiences similaires
content:
Le Traitement des donn√©es concernant les audiences similaires de Facebook, Google et Zeotap 
Les ‚Äúaudiences similaires‚Äù nous permettent de vous exclure, en tant que client N26, de la liste de diffusion de nos publicit√©s sur Facebook. En effet, nous ne souhaitons pas vous exposer √† des publicit√©s qui ne sont pas pertinentes pour vous.
De plus, cette option nous permet de d√©finir un public cible pour lequel les annonces affich√©es ont plus de pertinence que pour d'autres utilisateurs de Facebook. Ce public cible ou ¬´ audiences similaires ¬ª, g√©n√©r√© par Google, Facebook et Zeotap, est plus proche de nos clients qu'un utilisateur ordinaire de Facebook.
Pour cela, nous cryptons votre adresse email ou l‚Äôidentifiant unique de votre application mobile avant de les fournir √† Facebook. Ce cryptage, ou ‚Äúhachage‚Äù, est une forme de pseudonymisation qui permet de rendre ces informations intra√ßables : vous ne pouvez donc plus √™tre identifi√© gr√¢ce √† cette adresse ou cet identifiant. Ces prestataires comparent ensuite votre adresse ou votre identifiant avec votre  potentielle adresse email ou identifiant Facebook, Google et Zeotap. Ces informations ‚Äúhach√©es‚Äù sont ensuite supprim√©es dans les 48 heures. Veuillez noter que Facebook, Google et Zeotap ne partagent pas ces donn√©es avec des tiers ou d'autres annonceurs.
Vous trouverez plus d‚Äôinformations dans :
- les Conditions d‚Äôutilisation des audiences personnalis√©es de Facebook(nouvel onglet)
- les Conditions d'utilisation des audiences personnalis√©es de Google(nouvel onglet)
- les Conditions d'utilisation des audiences personnalis√©es de Zeotap(nouvel onglet)
Conform√©ment √† l'art. 6 ¬ß 1 lit. a GDPR, vous pouvez r√©voquer votre consentement au traitement de vos donn√©es. Pour cela, veuillez vous rendre dans la section Mon Compte > Informations personnelles, depuis votre espace client en ligne N26. Vous pourrez ensuite d√©cocher la case ‚ÄúJ‚Äôaccepte que N26 puisse envoyer mon adresse e-mail √† Facebook pour ne pas voir les publicit√©s N26 et pour aider N26 √† mieux d√©finir ses groupes d‚Äôutilisateurs. Ce consentement est r√©vocable √† tout moment.‚Äù

title: Shared Spaces - Was ist eine Kontovollmacht?
content:
Shared Spaces sind keine Gemeinschaftskonten im klassischen Sinn. Sie funktionieren durch die Erteilung einer Kontovollmacht.
Die Person, die die anderen Teilnehmer dazu berechtigt, in dessen Namen zu handeln, wird ‚ÄúBesitzer‚Äù genannt. Diese Person ist und bleibt der alleinige Kontoinhaber. Der Besitzer muss ein N26 Premium-Kunde sein, das hei√üt N26 You, N26 Metal oder N26 Business You nutzen.
Teilnehmer eines Shared Space sind nicht Kontoinhaber des Shared Space. Durch die Erteilung der Kontovollmacht erhalten alle Teilnehmer das Recht, im Namen des Besitzers √ºber die Gelder innerhalb des Shared Spaces zu verf√ºgen.
Das bedeutet, dass diejenige Person, die den Shared Space erstellt hat, dessen alleiniger Inhaber ist. Der Besitzer eines Shared Space

ist Besitzer des gesamten Guthabens auf dem Shared Space.
kann √ºber die Gelder des Shared Space jederzeit verf√ºgen.
kann andere Teilnehmer einladen, indem er ihnen eine Kontovollmacht erteilt.
kann die Kontovollmacht eines Teilnehmers jederzeit widerrufen.
kann einen Shared Space schlie√üen, nachdem alle Teilnehmer entfernt worden sind (in diesem Fall werden alle Gelder innerhalb des Shared Space dem Hauptkonto des Besitzers gutgeschrieben).

Die Erteilung der Kontovollmacht hat zur Folge, dass der jeweilige Teilnehmer vollen Zugriff auf das gesamte Guthaben des Shared Space hat. Das bedeutet, dass auch die Teilnehmer eines Shared Spaces √ºber alle dort verbuchten Gelder frei verf√ºgen k√∂nnen.
Die N26 Bank GmbH kann nicht haftbar gemacht werden f√ºr Zahlungen, die von einer Kontovollmacht gedeckt sind.
Was sind Shared Spaces?
