title: Why was I charged more than expected?
content:
All transactions take place in real-time. We'll alert you when any incoming or outgoing transaction happens via push message.
Sometimes a transaction could look suspicious because the final debited amount can differ from the original transaction amount for a few reasons:
A merchant blocks a higher amount for a deposit (for example, at a gas station, or a car rental or hotel booking), and the difference is credited to your account once the deposit is no longer required.
Changes in exchange rates may result in slight differences in the total for transactions made in foreign currencies.
In both cases, we don‚Äôt charge interest for the difference in amounts.
But if you‚Äôre certain that a transaction is unauthorized by you, we could help¬†get your money back.

title: Warum war eine Zahlung h√∂her als erwartet?
content:
Alle Transaktionen erfolgen in Echtzeit. Du bekommst eine Push-Nachricht, wenn eine Zahlung ein- oder ausgeht.
Manchmal kann eine Transaktion verd√§chtig aussehen, weil der belastete Endbetrag aus verschiedenen Gr√ºnden vom erwarteten Betrag abweichen kann:
Ein H√§ndler sperrt einen h√∂heren Betrag f√ºr eine Kaution (z. B. an einer Tankstelle, bei einer Autovermietung oder Hotelbuchung). Die Differenz wird deinem Konto gutgeschrieben, sobald die Kaution nicht mehr gebraucht wird.
Bei Transaktionen in Fremdw√§hrungen k√∂nnen Wechselkurs√§nderungen zu kleinen Abweichungen der Gesamtsumme f√ºhren.
In beiden F√§llen berechnen wir keine Zinsen f√ºr die Betragsdifferenz.
Wenn du aber sicher bist, dass eine Transaktion nicht von dir autorisiert wurde, k√∂nnen wir dir helfen, dein Geld zur√ºckzubekommen.

title: How does 3D Secure work?
content:
3D Secure protects you from online card fraud. It‚Äôs automatically activated when you activate your card in the app. No additional passwords are required.
Whenever you make an online payment using your Mastercard, 3D Secure confirms the transaction with you within 5 minutes via a¬†push message. If you don't see the transaction, try some of the¬†troubleshooting tips¬†we've collected.
If you make a purchase using your smartphone, you‚Äôll see a pending transaction in the app. Tap on the bell icon and the push message will appear for you to confirm and finalize your purchase. Then go back to the merchant‚Äôs website. You should see a confirmation of your successful purchase within a few moments.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: What is MoneyBeam?
content:
MoneyBeam is a service that allows you to send money to (or receive money from) other N26 members.
How can I send money using MoneyBeam?
Launch the N26 mobile app.
Tap the "Actions" icon at the bottom right corner of the screen.
Tap "Send Money" in the Transfer Money section.
Select the contact you are sending a MoneyBeam to.
Enter the amount you are sending in dollars and cents.
Tap "Continue".
Enter an optional, brief message to the recipient (max. 135 characters).
Tap "Send".
Enter your Confirmation PIN to initiate the transfer.
A "Confirm MoneyBeam" screen will be displayed showing the transaction details.
If all is in order, tap "Confirm" to execute the MoneyBeam.
Your Home screen will be displayed showing the MoneyBeam transaction that was just completed.
How can I request money using MoneyBeam?
Launch the N26 mobile app.
Tap the "Actions" icon at the bottom right corner of the screen.
Tap "Request money" in the Transfer Money section.
Select the contact you are requesting a MoneyBeam from.
Enter the amount you are requesting in dollars and cents.
Enter an optional, brief message to the person from whom you are requesting money (max. 135 characters).
Tap "Request".
Your Home screen will be displayed once the request has been successfully sent.
When the requested MoneyBeam is sent to you, an entry will be made in your Transaction List showing the credited amount.
What do I do when I receive a MoneyBeam Request?
When you receive a MoneyBeam Request from another US N26 customer, you can either accept or reject it.  Either way, you will first have to launch the N26 mobile app to see the details of the request.
Your Home screen will be displayed along with a transaction list showing a "Pending transaction" (the MoneyBeam Request).
Tap on the transaction to go to the next screen.
The "Request details" screen will be displayed.  Either accept or decline the request by tapping on the appropriate icon.
If you accept the request, you will be taken to the "Identity Check" screen.
Enter the 4 digit Confirmation PIN that you created earlier.  This will initiate the transfer.
After entering your Confirmation PIN, you will be asked a final time to either confirm or delete the transaction.  Please note:  Once confirmed, the transaction cannot be canceled.
After the transfer is complete, your Home screen will be displayed with a Transaction List showing the funds that were withdrawn from your account.

Related topics
"Can I send a MoneyBeam to a Non-N26 customer?"
Unfortunately, no. MoneyBeam transfers can only occur between N26 customers.
"Can I send a MoneyBeam to a Non-US N26 customer?"
Unfortunately, no. US MoneyBeam transfers can only be made to fellow US N26 customers.
"Do I actively have to opt in to use MoneyBeam?"
Yes, both parties have to actively opt in to use the MoneyBeam feature.
"Are there limits to MoneyBeam?"
Yes. The maximum amount that you can transfer is¬†$3,000 (per transaction), $3,000 daily limit (rolling 24 hours), and a $12,000 monthly limit (= per calendar month).
"Are there fees associated with MoneyBeam?"
No, there are no fees to use MoneyBeam.
"How will this transaction show up in my account?"
Each MoneyBeam transaction will show up as a 2 line item in the transaction detail file. One line will have a positive amount, and the other line will have a negative amount depending on who is sending the money (debited) and who is receiving the money (credited).
"How can I make sure that I am visible/not visible to all of my contacts?"¬†
That's easy! To make sure that you are visible/not visible:
Go to¬†üë§My Account¬†in the application.
Select¬†"Settings"‚Üí"Personal settings"‚Üí"Personal Information".¬†
To allow other N26 users in your contact list to find you for easier transfers, make sure the toggle switch at the bottom of the screen is activated. 
To be invisible, simply deactivate the switch.
"Why can't I see other N26 users on MoneyBeam?"
If you don‚Äôt see a friend on MoneyBeam but you know they are an N26 user:
They most likely haven‚Äôt made themselves visible. Please share the process above with them.
Make sure your friend's contact number/email is the same as the one associated with their N26 account.

The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: How to manage my visibility as an N26 user?
content:
To carry out real time transactions, like MoneyBeam, money requests or to use features like Shared Spaces, N26 matches your contact data with other N26 users.
In order to manage your consent to be seen as a N26 user, you can simply go to üë§ My Account in the app and selecting Settings then Personal Settings and Personal information. Then just check or uncheck the box ‚ÄúI agree to be identifiable for other users as N26 customer‚Äù.
All of your contacts who have an N26 account set to visible will show up in the in-app contact list. Similarly, you‚Äôll also appear in the list of other N26 customers who have your contact information. Your contact list is not permanently stored by N26 and is only used when accessing the respective N26 feature.
Why I have to be visible as an N26 user ?
You can access to all our in-app features,¬†e.g.¬†MoneyBeam, which carries out real-time transactions without¬†typing in a 22-digit IBAN, but only by selecting a name from your contact list. Vice versa, you can also request money from people in your contact list who then only have to accept (or decline) your request. Also, being visible¬†enables you to use Shared Spaces, a sub-account, which you can share with other N26 users¬†selected from your contact list.

title: What does N26 do with my tax information?
content:
The OECD requires certain tax information to be shared by means of the Common Reporting Standard(new tab) (ECR). To carry out our obligations, we must establish which country you‚Äôre taxable in. We do this through your tax identification or National Insurance number. 
We forward this information via the German Federal Tax Office to tax authorities in other countries if: 
You live in a ECR participating country.
You have a postbox or a second registered address in another ECR participating country.
When registering you gave a telephone number belonging to another ECR participating country.
You have a standing order, or make regular payments, to an account located in another ECR participating country.
We also forward data to the U.S. Internal Revenue Service(new tab) (IRS) according to the Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act(new tab) (FATCA). We may request your Social Security Number (SSN) in order to check your tax status in the U.S. because:
You are a citizen of the U.S (including dual citizenship).
When registering you gave a telephone number belonging to the U.S.
You were born in the U.S. (or in a U.S. embassy located abroad).
You‚Äôre married to a U.S. national.
You gave us an address in the U.S.
You make regular payment transfers to the U.S.
To update your tax identification or social security number in the N26 app:
Go to  My Account and tap on Settings and Account settings
Select Personal settings then Tax information
Select the country in which you‚Äôre tax-liable
Enter either your tax identification number or your social security number
Important information
In Germany, we need your Steueridentifikationsnummer (11 digits) not your Steuernummer (9 digits).
If you‚Äôre not tax-liable in another country, contact us so we can confirm your tax status.
In each and every case your personal data will be securely stored and only used for the fulfillment of ECR and FATCA requirements.
We‚Äôre unable to advise you on your tax status. If you‚Äôre unsure of your status please discuss the matter with a tax advisor.
If you‚Äôve entered the country in which you are liable for tax but not your tax identification number, please remove the country from the list shown to you in the app, reenter the country, and enter your tax identification number again.

title: Wie kann ich mich ausweisen?
content:
Als Bank m√ºssen wir wissen, wer du bist. Deshalb musst du uns ein zul√§ssiges Ausweisdokument vorzeigen, wenn du ein Konto er√∂ffnen oder bestimmte Produkte nutzen m√∂chtest.
Wir werden dich niemals danach fragen, deine Identit√§t √ºber andere Personen oder Unternehmen nachzuweisen. Wir haben einige Tipps gesammelt, um deine Identit√§t zu sch√ºtzen.
Du kannst uns deinen Ausweis mit zwei verschiedenen Methoden zeigen: Foto oder Video. Welches der beiden Verfahren gew√§hlt wird, h√§ngt von deiner Nationalit√§t, deinem Ausweisdokument und dem Land deines Wohnsitzes ab:
Ich lebe in Deutschland(neuen Tab)
Ich wohne au√üerhalb Deutschlands(neuen Tab)
Wenn dein Ausweisdokument nicht auf der Liste steht, k√∂nnen wir dir derzeit kein Konto anbieten. Wir nehmen die Identit√§tspr√ºfung sehr ernst und unser Kundenservice kann bez√ºglich der unterst√ºtzten Dokumente keine Ausnahme f√ºr dich machen.
Wir erweitern diese Liste aber st√§ndig; es lohnt sich also, sie im Auge zu behalten.
Falls dein Wohnsitz in Deutschland liegt und du die Foto- oder Videoverifizierung aufgrund einer Behinderung nicht abschlie√üen kannst, beginne bitte mit der Registrierung deiner Daten und kontaktiere dann unseren Kundensupport. Wir helfen dir gerne weiter.
Du erreichst uns im Chat t√§glich von 07:00 - 23:00 Uhr, auch an Sonn- und Feiertagen.

title: Why is my transfer still pending in the N26 app?
content:
You‚Äôll need your Confirmation PIN to finalize all transfers whether¬†MoneyBeam, standing orders, or¬†CASH26. Your transfer will remain pending until you either¬†Confirm¬†or¬†Cancel¬†it via push message in the app.
Your Confirmation PIN differs from your¬†card PIN¬†but you can use the same number for both. You‚Äôll be asked to choose your Confirmation PIN after¬†connecting your smartphone¬†(whereas you select a card PIN after activating your card).
If you enter your Confirmation PIN incorrectly 6 times in a row, your PIN will be blocked for security reasons. You can restore your PIN by¬†changing it¬†in the app: go to¬†üë§ My Account¬†then tap¬†Settings¬†and¬†Security. Then tap¬†Change Confirmation PIN¬†(iPhone) or¬†Reset Confirmation PIN¬†(Android).

title: How to change my card limits?
content:
You can change your¬†card PIN, define your daily withdrawal or payment limits, and enable or disable your ATM withdrawals, online or payments abroad in¬†üë§ My Account¬†by selecting¬†Card Settings¬†in the mobile app or¬†WebApp(new tab).
Each change you make is applied instantly to all of your cards.
You can also¬†block your card¬†or order a new one, in case it‚Äôs lost or stolen.
Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial(new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube(new tab) channel.

title: Wie mache ich N26 zu meinem Hauptkonto?
content:
Wir k√∂nnen dir helfen, N26 zu deinem Hauptkonto zu machen, indem wir dein t√§gliches Bankgesch√§ft von einem anderen Konto √ºbernehmen: Wir informieren alle Zahlungspartner, die wiederkehrende Lastschriften (z. B. f√ºr deine monatlichen Abonnements oder Rechnungen) berechnen oder Geld auf dein Konto √ºberweisen (z. B. deinen Arbeitgeber), und wir erkl√§ren dir, wie du Dauerauftr√§ge einrichtest oder Restbetr√§ge √ºberweist.
Es gibt drei M√∂glichkeiten, deine Bankkonten auf N26 umzustellen:
Gemeinsam mit unserem Partner finleap bieten wir dir eine Plattform, auf der du deine Bankkonten einfach online wechseln kannst. Das ist ein automatisierter Prozess und v√∂llig kostenfrei.
Benutze dazu zun√§chst unser¬†Formular(neuen Tab)¬†und logge dich mit deinen bisherigen Kontodaten ein. Sobald du alle erforderlichen Informationen eingetragen hast, dauert es 5 bis 7 Werktage, bis wir alle Benachrichtigungsschreiben verschickt haben. Deine Zahlungspartner ben√∂tigen m√∂glicherweise zus√§tzliche Zeit, um deine Bankverbindung f√ºr zuk√ºnftige Transaktionen zu √§ndern.
Du kannst deine Zahlungspartner auch selbst informieren. Dazu musst du den¬†Brief zur Informierung von Zahlungspartnern(neuen Tab)¬†ausf√ºllen und an den jeweiligen Zahlungspartner versenden. Damit kannst du auch die K√ºndigung deines Bankkontos bei deiner vorherigen Bank beantragen.
Auch dieser Service ist kostenlos. Wenn du Hilfe bei diesem Prozess ben√∂tigst, kontaktiere unseren Kundenservice per Chat.
Alle in Deutschland zugelassenen Banken sind verpflichtet, im Rahmen des ¬ß21 ZKG (Zahlungskontengesetz) einen Kontowechsel anzubieten. Um diesen Dienst zu starten, lade bitte das¬†Formular zum Kontenwechsel(neuen Tab)¬†herunter, drucke es aus und sende es an: N26 Bank GmbH Kundenservice Klosterstra√üe 62 10179 Berlin.
Sobald wir deine Anfrage erhalten haben, werden wir sie innerhalb von 7 Werktagen bearbeiten. Deine Zahlungspartner ben√∂tigen m√∂glicherweise zus√§tzliche Zeit, um deine Bankverbindung f√ºr zuk√ºnftige Transaktionen zu √§ndern.
F√ºr diesen Service berechnen wir eine Geb√ºhr bis zu 20 ‚Ç¨, abh√§ngig von deiner individuellen Anfrage.

Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erhalte 15‚Ç¨ f√ºr jeden Freund, dem du N26 erfolgreich empfiehlst. Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: How to log in with Two Factor Authentication?
content:
Two-Factor Authentication is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. You‚Äôre probably familiar with using only¬† your personal password to sign in to your account, but with Two-Factor Authentication you‚Äôll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.
Go here for more information on Two-Factor Authentication
When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you‚Äôll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or, if this isn't possible, you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number, confirming your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log in to your N26 account.
When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. This means the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.
First, you‚Äôll need to update your phone‚Äôs operating system and the N26 app to their latest versions. If you‚Äôre unable to login to your account, but still have access to your registered email address, try to reset your password. If you don‚Äôt have access to your registered email address, please contact us via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out.
Read more in our article on how to create a password.
If you‚Äôve lost access to your paired device, but you still have access to your registered phone number, you‚Äôll be able to log into your N26 account and request an authentication code. To do this:
Login to the Webapp
When prompted to confirm your login on your paired device, select Help
Choose Send SMS Code
Once you receive the SMS code, input it into the Webapp
As you've just confirmed the authentication code you‚Äôve successfully completed two-factor authentication, and can now pair your new device with your account.
If you don‚Äôt have access to your registered phone number ‚Äì either because you have a new phone number, or your phone was lost or stolen ‚Äì please contact our customer service via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out.
If you have an older smartphone that doesn‚Äôt support the latest app version, you won‚Äôt be able to access N26 via the mobile app anymore using that phone. 
However, you can still use our Webapp to view your account, to do this you'll need to confirm your login attempt via an SMS verification code which we‚Äôll send to your account's registered phone number.
You‚Äôll still be able to complete card transactions and cash withdrawals as normal using your Mastercard, but bear in mind that you won't be able to perform any bank transfers or payments until you can confirm the transfer within the N26 app.
Read more in our article on Strong Customer Authentification.

title: How to get my money back in case of fraud?
content:
If you don‚Äôt recognize a transaction or you‚Äôre sure you didn‚Äôt authorize it,¬†blocking your card¬†won‚Äôt be enough. In these cases you should immediately:
Request new card(new tab) and indicate that the old one has been stolen. Please tear up the card by cutting it with scissors, for example. Both the chip, the NFC antenna and the magnetic stripe must be cut into pieces.
Then fill out the dispute form(new tab). From there we will do everything we can to get your money back.
You can continue using your account for bank transfers until your new card arrives. If you're in Germany or Austria, you can also use¬†CASH26¬†for cash withdrawals.
You should keep in mind that changes in the¬†final amount debited¬†from your account don't necessarily indicate fraud.

title: How to open my N26 account?
content:
You can open an account in the app (on your smartphone) or in N26 for Web(new tab) if you:
are at least 18 years old
are a resident of a supported country
own a compatible smartphone
hold a supported ID (eligibility depends on whether you live in Germany(new tab) or outside of Germany(new tab))
don't already have an account with us
are able to verify yourself in one of our supported languages: English, German, Spanish, Italian, or French. Please note that only English is supported in the UK. 
This is how the sign-up process for an N26 bank account works:
After confirming your email, personal details, and shipping address, select the type of account you want. *
Prove your identity and connect your smartphone to your new account.
As a new signup, you'll be able to top up your account via Bank Transfer or CASH26 deposit (if you are in Germany, Austria or Italy). 
After a few days, you‚Äôll receive your N26 Mastercard by post.
If you'd like more information, here's how you can get in touch with us.
*If you meet our minimum creditworthiness criteria, you can open an N26 account. If you don‚Äôt, we may offer you an N26 Flex account (Germany only). This decision is calculated through an automated process.
We are available from 7:00 to 23:00 everyday, including Sundays and public holidays.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our Refer a Friend Program.

title: COVID-19: Latest updates on our customer service availability
content:
In light of recent global developments due to COVID-19, we are constantly taking measures to ensure the safety of our staff, while continuing to deliver the best possible customer service experience for you.
Our mission to support you and deliver our banking and customer services as per usual remain unchanged. That said, we want to be able to update you should the situation evolve.
We are reachable at our normal opening hours, from 07:00 - 23:00 hrs daily, including Sundays and public holidays.
If you need to block your card in an emergency, you will be able to do so in your N26 app, or by calling our automated emergency hotline at +44 2035 107126.
Any further updates to availability and waiting times will be published on this page.

title: PSD2 - Strong Customer Authentication
content:
SCA acts as an additional layer of security for all N26 customers by providing Two-Factor Authentication (2FA). This is an authentication process based on the use of two or more secure elements. You‚Äôre probably familiar with using just your personal password to sign in to your account but with Two-Factor Authentication you‚Äôll need either confirmation from a paired device or an SMS code.
When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you‚Äôll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number to confirm your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log into your N26 account. 
When you log into your N26 account from your paired device, Two-Factor Authentication is already in motion. Therefore, the process of logging into your N26 account from your paired device stays the same.
SCA is being introduced as part of the revised European Payments Services Directive (PSD2) which applies to all European Banks. The objective of PSD2 is to enhance the security of the customers‚Äô data and account security. Find out more about PSD2 in our dedicated article about the PSD2. 
I cannot log into my account. How do I solve this?
First, try update your phone to the newest version. If you still cannot log into your account but still have access to your registered email address, please try to reset your password. If you don‚Äôt have access to your registered email address, please contact us via our live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out. 
I lost access to my paired device. How will I be able to log into my account again?
If you lost access to your paired device but you still have access to your registered phone number, please log into your N26 account and request an authentication code. To do this:
Login to the Webapp
When prompted to confirm your login on your paired device, select Help 
Choose Send SMS Code
Once you receive the SMS code, input it into the Webapp
As you confirm the authentication code you‚Äôve completed two-factor authentication and you‚Äôll be able to pair your new device with your account again.
If you don‚Äôt have access to your registered phone number - either because you have a new phone number or your phone was lost or stolen - please contact our customer service via live chat and we‚Äôll be glad to help you out. 
What if my phone doesn‚Äôt support the latest app version?
If you have an older smartphone device that doesn‚Äôt support the latest app version,  you won‚Äôt be able to access N26 via the mobile app anymore using your phone.¬†
You can still use our Webapp to view your account, to do this you'll need to confirm your login attempt via an SMS verification code which we‚Äôll send to your account's registered phone number. 
You‚Äôll still be able to complete card transactions and cash withdrawals as normal using your Mastercard but bear in mind that you won't be able to perform any bank transfers or payments until you can confirm the transfer within the N26 app.

title: Can I open an account if I live outside the eurozone?
content:
If you live in Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Liechtenstein, Switzerland or Iceland you may¬†open an account with us. We offer:
The choice between a standard bank account or N26 Business.
Accounts in ‚Ç¨, a German IBAN, and transfers with SEPA or Moneybeam.
Good currency conversion with your Mastercard debit card.
Free shipping of your Mastercard or ‚Ç¨25 for express.
Foreign currency transfers with TransferWise (with the standard account).
5 free ATM withdrawals in ‚Ç¨ in the EU (1.7% markup on foreign currencies withdrawals).
0.1% cashback on all card payments (for Business accounts).
2 Spaces in addition to the main account.
A bonus for every friend you successfully invite to N26 with our Refer a Friend Program.
Contactless payment with Google Pay and Apple Pay.
Tips for incoming and outgoing transfers:
We recommend choosing your local currency to get the best exchange rate when using your Mastercard for purchases or to withdraw cash (if not, additional fees may apply).
To top up your account using your local currency, we recommend converting your currency via SEPA transfer either using TransferWise (on their website(new tab)) or using your local bank.
For outgoing transfers to ‚Ç¨ accounts, simply use the app's internal SEPA transfer. For outgoing transfers to non-‚Ç¨ accounts, use TransferWise in the app.*
*Please note: TransferWise is unavailable for N26 Business accounts (only SEPA transfers in EUR).

title: How to reverse and block a direct debit?
content:
You have the ability to reverse a direct debit in the app yourself up to 8 weeks after it has been debited.
Open your transaction list and select the direct debit in question. 
Choose¬†Refund. 
The amount will then be credited to your account within 2 banking days.
*For Poland, Sweden, Denmark, and Norway only: if you are setting up a direct debit with a merchant in your home currency, it's the receiving bank who dictates the currency exchange and ultimate amount that is collected from us.

title: How to get push messages?
content:
We send you push messages to finalize transfers (such as¬†MoneyBeam) or to confirm a service (as with¬†CASH26). If you aren‚Äôt receiving these messages, first check that notifications are enabled for both your phone and the app. Then try some of our troubleshooting suggestions, depending on your smartphone:
Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Apple App Store and connect your smartphone again.
Check whether you‚Äôre logged into your N26 app.
Make sure messaging for the app has been activated in the general settings of your smartphone.
Delete the app and restart your smartphone. Download and install the latest version of the app from the Google Play Store and connect your smartphone again.
Go to your Account settings and activate notification by tapping App settings then Notifications.
Huawei and Xiaomi: go to Settings then Advanced settings and Battery settings. Then set N26 as a protected app.
OnePlus: select battery optimization then the N26 app and then don't optimize.
Oppo: disable battery optimization for the app and lock it in the Recent apps overview.

title: I represent a bank or an authority and need to contact N26
content:
If you represent the authorities or work for another bank, you can get in touch via the following channels:
Email:¬†officials@n26.com(new tab)
Fax: + 49 (0) 30 2201178 40 
Our opening hours are Monday to Friday from 09:00-18:00 (except bank and Berlin holidays). You can request a call-back via email or fax at any time. We try to call you back on the same day.
Please note that any customer inquiries sent to the above address or fax number will automatically be deleted.
If you have a customer service related question and need to contact us, visit our article How to contact N26?(new tab) or open a chat at the bottom of this article.

title: Why was I charged more than expected?
content:
All debit card transactions take place in real-time. We'll alert you via push notification when any incoming or outgoing transaction happens .
Sometimes a transaction can look suspicious because the final debited amount can differ from the original transaction amount. This can be because:
A merchant blocks a higher amount for a deposit (for example, at a gas station, or a car rental or hotel booking), and the difference is credited to your account once the deposit is no longer required.
Changes in exchange rates may result in slight differences in the total for transactions made in foreign currencies.
If the transaction was not authorized by you, we're happy to help.  Either call us at 1-888-N26-0-N26 (1-888-626-0626) or chat with us and we‚Äôll be happy to help you.

The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

title: What are the benefits of N26 You?
content:
Once you upgrade to N26 You, you‚Äôll receive 10 additional¬†Spaces¬†and the option to choose one of our five new card colours: Rhubarb, Ocean, Sand, Aqua, and Slate. 
N26 You customers are also covered under the premium account's¬†insurance package provided by Allianz Global Assistance*, which includes a broad range of personal and financial benefits such as:
Travel insurance: Reimbursement of medical expenses abroad, for travel cancellations after a medical emergency, expenses incurred during a flight delay of more than 4 hours, expenses in the event of a checked-in luggage delay of more than 6 hours, and medical repatriation expenses.

Snow and mountain rescue.¬†Get covered for search, rescue, first transportation costs, and medical expenses in the event of accidents during a trip in the mountains.
Car, bike and scooter sharing. Coverage for any damage or theft of vehicles rented from ride-sharing companies.
Extra card. You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 14‚Ç¨ through your N26 app. 
If you‚Äôre an N26 You customer, or if you want to upgrade to N26 You, you‚Äôll have the possibility to choose one of our five new colors when ordering a new card: 
Keep these in mind when considering¬†N26 You(new tab):
The N26 You Mastercard has no embossing: the card details, including the number, CVV code, and 10-digit token are printed on the back.
If you upgrade to N26 You, the monthly fee of ‚Ç¨9,90 will be deducted directly from your N26 account every month starting on the date of your upgrade. If you‚Äôre a new customer, the first fee will be deducted 15 days after you prove your identity. From then on, you‚Äôll be charged your monthly fee on your sign-up date. Meaning that, if you opened your account at the end of the month, the first two  monthly fees will be charged the following month.
The minimum membership is one year. Your contract automatically renews if you don‚Äôt cancel your membership at least 4 weeks before the contract expires.
You can purchase an extra N26 You card for a one-off fee of 14‚Ç¨ through your N26 app. 

*Allianz Global Assistance Europe trade name of AWP P&C S.A. - Dutch branch, and member of the Allianz Group.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: How to add or remove Shared Space participants?
content:
For an owner to remove a participant from a Shared Space:
In the Space overview, tap the menu indicated by the 3 dots in the top right.
From the ‚ÄòParticipants‚Äô list, tap on the arrow to the right of the relevant participant‚Äôs name (iOS). Android users can just simply tap on the participant's name.
Tap ‚Äòrevoke power of attorney‚Äô.
¬†Confirm the notification on the next screen and tap ‚Äòrevoke power of attorney‚Äô.¬†

Accept an invitation and join a Shared Space:
In the Spaces overview, tap the Space with ‚ÄòPending‚Äô and the Shared Space icon. 
Read the Shared Space summary and continue to the Power of Attorney screen.
Once you‚Äôve read and understood the information on the Power of Attorney page (the legal screen), tick the box and tap the ‚ÄòAccept power of attorney‚Äô button.
Enter your Confirmation PIN.
Confirm the ‚ÄòAccept Power of Attorney‚Äô push notification on your paired mobile device
You‚Äôll need to have enough free Space(s) to accept an invitation to a Shared Space. If not, you can only proceed if you delete other Space(s) to free up ‚Ä¶ Space.
You must also not have any open Space with the same name or image as the Shared Space. You can only accept the invitation to join a Shared Space once you change the name/image of the other Space(s).

To leave a Shared Space:
In the Space overview, tap the menu indicated by the 3 dots in the top right.
Inside the settings tap on ‚ÄòExit Shared Space‚Äô.
Confirm the notification on the next screen and tap ‚ÄòLeave the Space‚Äô.
A Shared Space can be created and modified within the N26 app or Webapp

title: Warum wurde mir eine Geldautomatengeb√ºhr berechnet?
content:
Geldautomatengeb√ºhren k√∂nnen aus verschiedenen Gr√ºnden anfallen:
F√ºr jede Auszahlung, die √ºber unsere Fair Use Policy hinausgeht, erheben wir eine Geb√ºhr von 2 ‚Ç¨. Wir informieren dich per Push-Nachricht, wenn du nur noch wenige kostenlose Auszahlungen zur Verf√ºgung hast.
Einige Betreiber von Geldautomaten erheben ihre eigenen Geb√ºhren. Darauf haben wir keinen Einfluss, wir k√∂nnen sie weder ablehnen noch r√ºckg√§ngig machen. Sollten zus√§tzliche Geb√ºhren anfallen, wirst du vor dem Ende einer Auszahlung informiert und kannst die Auszahlung sofort stornieren.
Abhebungen in Fremdw√§hrungen k√∂nnen geb√ºhrenpflichtig sein. Beim N26 Konto f√§llt eine Geb√ºhr von 1,7% des ausgezahlten Betrages an. Diese Geb√ºhr entf√§llt f√ºr N26 You- oder N26 Metal-Mitglieder.
Nutzung deiner Maestrocard f√ºr Abhebungen am Geldautomaten. Hier f√§llt sowohl f√ºr nationale als auch f√ºr internationale Abhebungen eine Geb√ºhr von 2 ‚Ç¨ an. Maestro ist nur in Deutschland, √ñsterreich und den Niederlanden erh√§ltlich.
Um geb√ºhrenfreie Automaten in deiner N√§he zu finden, insbesondere auf Reisen, kannst du die¬†Mastercard-Geldautomatensuche(neuen Tab)¬†verwenden. W√§hle dazu in den erweiterten Suchoptionen ‚Äúkeine Nutzungsgeb√ºhr‚Äù aus.
Eine √úbersicht unserer Angebote und Geb√ºhren findest du auf unserer¬†(neuen Tab)Website(neuen Tab).

title: CRS - Warum wir bestimmte Informationen von dir ben√∂tigen
content:
N26 ist als reguliertes Finanzinstitut gem√§√ü des Common Reporting Standard (CRS) dazu verpflichtet, steuerlichen Beh√∂rden in der Europ√§ischen Union Informationen √ºber Kundenkonten zur Verf√ºgung zu stellen, deren Inhaber in anderen L√§ndern steuerpflichtig sind.
Der CRS wurde von der OECD (Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development) entwickelt und ist ein globaler Standard f√ºr den automatischen Austausch von Informationen (AEOI). Das Ziel des CRS ist es, zur Bek√§mpfung von Steuerhinterziehung beizutragen, indem er steuerlichen Beh√∂rden den Bestand im Ausland befindlicher Verm√∂genswerte tranparenter macht. Mehr als 90 L√§nder haben sich erkl√§rt, im Rahmen des CRS Informationen ihrer Einwohner √ºber ihre Verm√∂genswerte und Einkommen zu teilen.
Damit wir feststellen k√∂nnen, ob ein Konto den steuerlichen Beh√∂rden zwecks CRS mitzuteilen ist, m√ºssen wir dich fragen:
In welchem Land du als steuerpflichtige Person giltst:
Normalerweise giltst du als steuerpflichtige Person desjenigen Landes, in dem deine Wohnadresse liegt. Wenn du mehrere Wohnadressen in verschiedenen L√§ndern hast, greifen f√ºr gew√∂hnlich bestimmte Entscheidungsregeln, die in den Steuerabkommen und Steuergesetzen der betreffenden L√§nder festgehalten sind. Es kann vorkommen, dass du in mehreren L√§ndern steuerpflichtig bist. Wenn dieser Fall gegeben ist, m√ºssen wir wissen, um welche L√§nder es sich handelt und wie deine entsprechenden Identifikationsnummern als Steuerzahler lauten, damit wir den steuerlichen Beh√∂rden zuverl√§ssige Informationen zur Verf√ºgung stellen k√∂nnen.

Wie deine Steuer-Identifikationsnummer (‚ÄúTIN‚Äù) lautet:
Die Zuteilung und das Format der TIN variiert zwischen den L√§ndern. Die EU hat eine Anleitung(neuen Tab) zur Identifikation der TINs ihrer Mitgliedstaaten ver√∂ffentlicht, mit der du deine individuelle(n) TIN(s) in den verschiedenen L√§ndern identifizieren kannst.
Falls sich deine Lebenslage ver√§ndert, kannst deine Steuerinformationen in der N26 App jederzeit anpassen. Logge dich daf√ºr einfach in deine N26 App ein, und gehe zum Bereich: Mein Konto > Einstellungen > Pers√∂nliche Einstellungen > Steuerdaten, und aktualisiere dort deine Informationen.

title: Come funziona Google Pay?
content:
Italia, Germania, Francia, Spagna, Belgio, Danimarca, Finlandia, Irlanda, Norvegia, Polonia, Slovacchia, Svezia e Svizzera.
Google Pay √® un metodo di pagamento che ti consente di pagare con il tuo smartphone per non dover portare sempre con te la Mastercard.
Google Pay √® disponibile in tutti i negozi che supportano i pagamenti contactless (NFC) e nei negozi online. Tieni lo smartphone vicino al terminale contactless per effettuare automaticamente il pagamento. Per i pagamenti online, scegli Google Pay come metodo di pagamento. Ti verr√† chiesto tramite¬†messaggio push¬†di confermare il pagamento al completamento della transazione.
Ecco alcuni consigli da tenere a mente:
Per aggiungere la Mastercard N26, scarica l‚Äôapplicazione di Google Pay e scegli Cominciare per inserire i dettagli della tua carta. Devi avere un sistema operativo Android 5.0 (Lollipop) o successivo e uno smartphone compatibile con NFC.
Google Pay richiede il blocco dello schermo. Se non l'hai ancora configurato, ti verr√† chiesto di farlo prima di aggiungere la Mastercard all‚Äôapplicazione Google Pay.
Se proteggi il tuo smartphone con una custodia, potrebbe essere necessario rimuoverla per pagare. Alcuni terminali di pagamento non riconoscono il telefono se la custodia √® troppo grande.
Se il terminale di pagamento ti chiede di mostrare (di nuovo) la carta, √® possibile che tu abbia allontanato lo smartphone troppo velocemente o che non fosse abbastanza vicino. Riprova facendo pi√π attenzione.

title: How to make transfers in foreign currencies?
content:
We have partnered with TransferWise to make foreign currency transfers easy. TransferWise offers real-time exchange rates and no hidden fees.
To initiate a transfer in a foreign currency start by logging into the mobile app: 
From the Home screen choose the Actions tab,

Select Add Money followed by Foreign Currency Transfer,

Choose ‚Äúadd a new recipient‚Äù or select an existing payee. When adding a new recipient you'll be given the option to change the currency by tapping on the Euro flag in the top right corner of the screen,

Enter the amount you'd like to send and add any additional bank details,

Finalize the transfer with your Confirmation PIN.
If we don‚Äôt currently offer the¬†foreign currency(new tab)¬†you need, please visit¬†TransferWise(new tab)¬†for more currency options. You can log in by entering your N26 account email and selecting Forgot password? You‚Äôll receive an email from TransferWise to change your password and then you can use both log in details to perform the transfer from there.
Please note that foreign currency transfers in the app are not possible with the N26 Business or Business You account nor are transfers to businesses.
TransferWise has its own transfer types and fees but this will all be indicated before you confirm the transfer.
Want to tell your friends about us and earn some money? Get ‚Ç¨15 for each friend that you successfully refer to N26. Learn more about our¬†Refer a Friend Program.

title: How to find my IBAN or account number?
content:
You can find your IBAN and our BIC number on your balance statements or in¬†üë§ My Account¬†from the mobile app or¬†WebApp(new tab)¬†(if you haven‚Äôt activated your card and need to¬†top up your account).
All our IBANs start with DE followed by the¬†check digits¬†(two numbers), then our¬†bank code¬†10011001, and end with your 10-digit¬†account number¬†(start at 26).
If you open your account in the UK, you won't have an IBAN, but you will find your account number and our sort code 04-00-26 in the same section.
You can easily share your information through the share button in¬†üë§ My Account. Or you can download your bank account information as a PDF by logging into the¬†WebApp(new tab)¬†and selecting the cloud icon on the top-right corner of¬†Transactions.
Prefer a video over text? Watch the tutorial(new tab) on our N26 Support YouTube(new tab) channel.

title: Was ist N26 Business?
content:
‚Ñπ Verf√ºgbar in √ñsterreich, Belgien, D√§nemark, Estland, Finnland, Frankreich, Griechenland, Deutschland, Island, Irland, Italien, Liechtenstein, Luxemburg, Polen, Niederlande, Norwegen, Portugal, Slowenien, Slowakei Spanien, Schweden und der Schweiz.
Es ist aktuell noch nicht m√∂glich, zwischen verschiedenen Konten zu wechseln, daher musst du entscheiden, ob N26 Business das Richtige f√ºr dich ist:
Das N26 Business Konto ist f√ºr¬†Selbst√§ndige und Freiberufler, die unter ihrem eigenen Namen arbeiten. Das bedeutet, dass du auf dem Konto oder der Karte nicht den Namen deiner Firma haben kannst.
Die N26 Business Mastercard ist nur f√ºr den gesch√§ftlichen Gebrauch bestimmt. Du erh√§ltst monatlich 0,1%¬†Cashback¬†auf alle mit der Karte get√§tigten Zahlungen. Es ist derzeit nicht m√∂glich, zwei separate N26 Konten gleichzeitig zu f√ºhren. Wenn du also auch eine Karte f√ºr private Ausgaben ben√∂tigst, empfehlen wir dir, eine¬†Maestrocard¬†zu ordern (erh√§ltlich in Deutschland, √ñsterreich und den Niederlanden).
Wie beim N26 Bankkonto ist das Konto¬†geb√ºhrenfrei¬†und wir decken bestimmte Bargeldabhebungen im Rahmen unserer¬†Fair Use Policy¬†ab. Im Gegensatz zu anderen Konten sind √úberweisungen in Fremdw√§hrungen mit N26 Business nicht aus der App m√∂glich. Das kannst du √ºber¬†TransferWise(neuen Tab)¬†machen.
Firmenlastschriften (Business to Business oder B2B) sind mit dem N26 Business Konto nicht m√∂glich.
Du willst deinen Freunden von uns erz√§hlen und gleichzeitig Geld verdienen? Erhalte 15‚Ç¨ f√ºr jeden Freund, dem du N26 erfolgreich empfiehlst. Erfahre mehr √ºber unser¬†Freunde-Empfehlungsprogramm.

title: COVID-19: aggiornamenti relativi alla nostra assistenza clienti
content:
Alla luce degli sviluppi relativi alla diffusione del COVID-19, stiamo costantemente adottando misure idonee per garantire la sicurezza del nostro personale e per offrire un'eccellente esperienza di assistenza ai nostri clienti.
La nostra missione √® garantire la continuit√† dei nostri servizi. Tuttavia, vogliamo essere in grado di informarti nel caso ci fossero aggiornamenti.
Gli orari della nostra assistenza rimangono invariati: siamo disponibili tutti i giorni dalle 7 alle 23, domeniche e festivi inclusi.
Se sei in una situazione di emergenza e hai bisogno di bloccare la tua carta, potrai farlo tramite l‚Äôapp di N26 oppure chiamando la nostra assistenza telefonica automatizzata al numero +39 02 124 123 361.
Ulteriori aggiornamenti sull‚Äôoperativit√† della nostra assistenza clienti ed eventuali tempi di attesa verranno pubblicati in questa pagina.

title: Bezahle ich mit N26 Invest Geb√ºhren und Steuern?
content:
N26 Invest berechnet keine Performance-, Transaktions- oder R√ºcknahmegeb√ºhren. F√ºr deinen N26 Invest-Plan fallen einige weitere Geb√ºhren an:
Monatliche Geb√ºhr.¬†Wird viertelj√§hrlich berechnet und direkt aus dem Saldo deines Kapitalanlageplans bezahlt. Abh√§ngig von der H√∂he deiner gesamten Einzahlungen wird dir entweder eine feste Geb√ºhr oder eine prozentuale Geb√ºhr berechnet:

Durchschnittliche Gesamtanlagesumme / N26 Invest-Servicegeb√ºhr¬†(j√§hrlich als Prozentsatz der gesamten Einlagen. Mindestgeb√ºhr 1,90 ‚Ç¨)*
0 ‚Ç¨ bis 29.999 ‚Ç¨  /  0,99 % *
30.000 ‚Ç¨ bis 49.999 ‚Ç¨  /  0,79 % *
50.000 ‚Ç¨ und mehr  /  0,49 % *

Verwaltungskosten.¬†Zahlung direkt aus den Einlagen in deinem Kapitalanlageplan. Diese h√§ngen von der Anlagestrategie ab:
Invest 80: 0,44 % p.a.
Invest 60: 0,40 % p.a.
Invest 40: 0,36 % p.a.
Steuern.¬†Anlagen am Kapitalmarkt k√∂nnen zu Kapitalgewinnen oder Ertr√§gen aus Dividenden auf einzelne Fonds f√ºhren. Eink√ºnfte, die √ºber dem Kapitalertragsteuer-Freibetrag liegen, sind in Deutschland steuerpflichtig. Auch Kapitalanlagen unterliegen dem Solidarit√§tszuschlag und der¬†Kirchensteuer.
Du bist in Deutschland steuerpflichtig. Wir ziehen automatisch alle anfallenden Steuern von deinen gesamten Einlagen ab, so dass deine potenziellen Ertr√§ge immer den Nettobetrag nach Steuern anzeigen.
Du bist in Deutschland nicht steuerpflichtig. Du erh√§ltst den Bruttobetrag deiner Ertr√§ge. Dann liegt es an dir, deine Kapitalertragsteuer in dem Land einzureichen, in dem du Steuern zahlst.
In beiden F√§llen erstellen wir f√ºr dich im Februar automatisch eine j√§hrliche Steuerbescheinigung. Du findest diese direkt in der App unter¬†Sparen und Anlegen. Dort findest du auch Freistellungsauftr√§ge und Verlustscheine f√ºr deine¬†Steuererkl√§rung.
Weitere Informationen findest du in N26 Invest: Verfahren zur Wertentwicklungsprognose(neuen Tab).

title: Why did my SEPA transfer fail?
content:
‚ÑπÔ∏è¬†Applies to all regions except the UK
We accept¬†transfers¬†in EUR done via SEPA. We don't support SWIFT so if you need to make a¬†foreign currency transfer, please use TransferWise (in the app or from their¬†website(new tab)).
To get a transfer, you'll only need to provide the sender with your full name (as it's written on the ID you provided for verification) and your IBAN.
You can¬†find your IBAN¬†on your balance statements and in¬†üë§ My Account¬†(in the mobile app or¬†WebApp(new tab)).
Common reasons for failed transfers:
The recipient's name on the transfer order is different from the name on their account (must be their name as written on their ID).
The recipient's name is a company name instead of a personal/account name (applies to N26 Business).
The IBAN is incorrect.
You're not receiving the push message to confirm your transfer.
An inappropriate use was found. N26 has the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see¬†GwG ¬ß 10(new tab)). As a result, we may ask for documentation to verify the origin or source of these transactions. This can result in the credit being delayed or not taking place.

title: Come collegare o scollegare il mio smartphone al conto?
content:
Per aprire un conto N26, √® necessario essere in possesso di uno smartphone con le seguenti caratteristiche:
iPhone (5s o pi√π recente, iOS 11 o superiore)  
Android (6.0 o superiore - non supportiamo il sistema operativo di Amazon Fire e Oxygen OS).
Il conto dovr√† sempre essere associato al dispositivo. 
Per associare il tuo telefono al conto, baster√† avviare l‚Äôapp sullo smartphone e confermare il tuo numero di cellulare. Inserisci il codice di¬†4 cifre che ti invieremo tramite SMS¬†e il tuo telefono sar√† collegato.
Se vuoi associare un nuovo dispositivo, per ragioni di sicurezza devi dissociare quello precedente, accedendo alla sezione Impostazioni di Sicurezza daüë§ Il mio conto¬†della app (o della¬†WebApp(nuova tabella) se non hai pi√π accesso allo smartphone). Riceverai un'email con ulteriori istruzioni.
Completato questo passaggio, nel momento in cui tenterai di accedere al tuo conto N26 da un nuovo dispositivo, riceverai i seguenti due codici via SMS:
un codice di 4 cifre che ti permetter√† di associare il conto al tuo dispositivo 
un codice di 6 cifre che ti permetter√† di eseguire il login al tuo conto N26.

Ricorda che √® possibile associare il conto soltanto ad un dispositivo.

title: Why isn't my video verification working?
content:
Tips for a successful video¬†verification:
Most video calls fail due to poor internet connection or bad picture quality (for example, too blurry or due to low lighting). Please complete the call in a bright environment, use a phone with a good camera, and make sure you have a fast internet connection.
Please make sure that you are the only person in the video.
You need to live in one of our¬†supported countries¬†to open an account with us.
We can only accept national IDs and passports (driver‚Äôs licenses or residence permits can‚Äôt be used). Also, the document shouldn‚Äôt be damaged.
As soon as your verification is complete, we‚Äôll send you your N26 Mastercard.¬†Deliveries¬†take up to 10 days.

title: Cards
content: The N26 account is offered by Axos Bank¬Æ, Member FDIC. N26 Inc. is a service provider of Axos Bank. All deposit accounts of the same ownership and/or vesting held at Axos Bank are combined and insured under the same FDIC Certificate 35546. All deposit accounts through Axos Bank brands are not separately insured by the FDIC from other deposit accounts held with the same ownership and/or vesting at Axos Bank. The N26 Visa¬Æ Debit Card is issued by Axos Bank pursuant to a license by Visa U.S.A. Inc. The N26 Visa Debit Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.
